11211.content:
I sit in the back seat of an empty bus with a sketchy looking man driving it. I'm a high school junior now, but I starte my first two year at a human school. But I got kicked out of there so I soon got accepted into Yokai Academy. That's a good thing because I can be myself without living in fear of rejection. You see, I'm different than other people. I have abilities and traits that most people don't, and that had made it difficult for me to fit in. Sometimes my abilities slip out and I have to move away. My mother thought it would be a good idea to go to Yokai because it was filled with people "just like me," but I didn't believe it. But she insisted and I was obligated to go. It wasnt like I had much of a choice. I was out of options for schools. And you may be wondering "what does your father think you should do?" Well he's not in the picture. He left when I was really young, I don't know much about him, but I know that he's the reason that I'm different. I hated him for that.

As I got further away from home, I noticed how wierd the environment got. It seemed dark and sinister. The bus suddenly halted and I arrive near a cliff with a scarecrow perched near it. I assumed that the school is nearby so I got my stuff and went to get off the bus. "Hey kid." I looked over and the bus driver had finally talked. "Your a new student at Yokai?" She said with a creepy voice. "Yeah" I answered. "You better watch your back, kid. That's one scary-ass school. And be careful who you meet there. Not everything is as it looks." He smiled evily while he said this. I thought he was crazy and just trying to scare me. "Whatever man. Thanks for the ride." I said and got off the bus. I looked around and saw a huge building and I concluded that must be the school. It was on the other side of a sketchy-looking forest. I was reluctant, but I decided to walk through the woods. When I looked back, the bus was already gone. "Creepy" I said out loud. As I walked through the quiet and creepy forest, I noticed someone was also there......

After a talk about keeping a low profile and being careful around any violent students, i walked out of the office and started my day.

I’m your teacher Ms. Nekonome. Well, if you would please introduce yourself and tell us a little about yourself, we can get you seated.” the teacher said. You Walked into the room and shut the door. “My name is Sasuke Uchiha. I really have no dislikes and I don’t like anything in particular. And what I desire is not a dream, because I will make it a reality. I’m going to restore my clan, and destroy a certain someone.” you said in your usual tone. Most of the class whispered to each other, but you couldn’t care less about what they thought of you. Ms. Nekonome said (with an anime style sweat drop) “A-Alright then, you can sit at the open desk over there.” You nodded and walked over to the only open desk near the window. You were one of the only students there who were not wearing a uniform, like you would wear it anyway. No one even bothered to point out the swor dyou had in your possession. Class seemed to progress normally and once it was over, you decided to head for the roof.
112121.title: Your New Life Begins

1121211.content:
(Moka)

As you stood there on the roof, you knew this school wasn’t normal. You could feel some kind of weird chakra from the other students. You then noticed that there were a couple of students walking out of the building and you decided to investigate the bizarre chakra you felt. Thanks to the sharingan, that was the easy part. You felt some kind of chakra that was definitely not human. “What the hell are they?” you said to yourself. “They’re monsters.” a woman said from behind. You turned around to find a very beautiful woman with long, silver hair and blood red eyes. “Monsters huh? And I assume you’re one as well.” "Yes. Youkai is a unique school, one that’s exclusively for monsters.” “I guess I’m the exception to that rule.” “It would seem that way. I’ve heard of the Uchiha clan. But until today I’ve never met one of their members.” “I see.” you said turning your back on her. “And since you’re a monster, mind telling me what you are exactly.” “I see you don’t really care for the rules of the school.” “Long as those rules don’t end up getting in my way, I will operate within them. But being you sit behind me, I’d like to know what I’m turning my back on.” “The woman smiled and said “Very well. My name is Moka Akashiya, and I’m a vampire.” “Vampire huh? That would explain the chakra I felt from you.” Moka then started to walk towards you. But in an instant, you vanished and reappeared standing on top of the roof entrance. “Sorry, but I need to make sure I can trust you first. See ya.” you said as you vanished once again. Moka just smiled and decided she would give you your space. And no one saw you for the rest of the day.
1121211.title: On the Roof

11212111.content: The next day, Moka decided to go for an early morning walk, and see if she could bump into you. As she was walking, she hard what seemed like birds chirping, but she also noticed a flash of light popping up every now and again. She decided to investigate. When she got to the location of the light, she saw you standing there with the top part of your outfit hanging down, but it was still on your body, you just took your arms out of the sleeves and let it hang from the back. Moka decided to watch for a moment. In a moment, a large number of leaves fell from the trees. She then noticed that you created some sort of lightning blade in your right hand. You then waved your hand and a large number of needles made of lightning fired towards the leaves, destroying every single one. You then put the top part of your outfit back on and said “You might as well come out, I could feel your chakra a mile away.” Moka came from behind the tree and asked what you were doing. “Training.” you said as you began to walk away. “Why do you do it?” You stopped walking and turned towards her. “Why do you isolate yourself like that?” “What does it matter to you?” you said as you walked away. She was getting frustrated that you took that tone with her, but then you threw a kunai right at the tree next to her head. She noticed a note on the kunai which was stuck into the tree. She then read the note and it said “For your own good, you shouldn’t get close to me.” She looked and saw you were gone when she was done reading the note. Even though she knew where you were, she couldn’t help but wonder what you meant by that.
11212111.title: The Next Day

112121111.content: Once Moka got to the classroom, she saw you at your desk and she got in her own. Most of the time, you continued to stare out the window and Moka was still trying to figure out what you meant by what you said in the note. But then, a large explosion came from the forest outside the school and you opened the window, preparing to jump out and investigate. “Wait Mr. Uchiha! You can’t go, it’s much to danger-” “Shut up!” you said cutting her off. “I don’t take orders from you. If I think a situation need my personal attention then I’m going. If you want to stop me, go ahead and try.” you said jumping out the window and rushing off to the forest.
112121111.title: Later

1121211111.content:
(Blackheart)

As you continued to rush towards the location of the explosion you noticed a bunch of demons running towards you. “Hideaks. I don’t have time for you.” you said drawing your sword. You managed to take care of all of them with no effort. You soon reached the location of the explosion and saw one of the Master’s generals; Blackheart, who played a part in your clans destruction. “Hello Sasuke.” “Blackheart.” you said with the sharingan ablaze in your eyes. “I see you’re not happy to see me. I wouldn’t be either if I met the person who had a hand in the destruction of my clan.” “Shut up!” you said as you attacked with your Chidori Senbon. But he quickly dodged it and not even your sharingan could keep up with his speed. “Where did he-” “Looking for someone?” he said as he appeared behind you. In an instant, he landed a powerful blow to your back, sending his claws into your back, causing you to feel a massive amount of pain. He then sent a large amount of chakra into his hand and fired a beam of negative energy into your back. You were feeling more pain than you thought was possible. “Come on Sasuke. You can do better than that.” You tried to get up, but Blackheart continued to toy with you, by landing a powerful kick to your stomach, which sent you high enough off the ground to land a punch to your face, which sent you through several trees. You were struggling to get up, so you ended up using your sword in order to rise to your feet. “If this is the best you can do Sasuke, I guess you are not worthy to face the Master.” he said as he walked up to you. But in an instant, you sent the Chidori into your blade and sliced his shoulder. He jumped back before you could slice it off and said with a little bit of a laugh “Good Sasuke. There might be hope for you yet.” he said as he charged at you. But before he could connect his attack, someone showed up and landed a very powerful kick to Blackheart’s stomach, which ended up sending him through many, many trees. You had trouble recognizing who is was at first, because the pain blurred your vision. But you managed to recognize the one who saved your life as none other than Moka. “M-Moka…” “I hope that this will prove to you that you can trust me.” But then, Blackheart showed up and we was not happy about Moka interfering. But before e could attack again, he heard the voice of one of the Ten Terrors, calling him off. “You got lucky this time Sasuke. But the next time we meet, you will not be walking away from it. And I will deal with you as well.” he said looking at Moka before disappearing into the darkness. In that moment, you began to pass out. Moka caught you as you fell, which resulted in your face landing in her breasts. She smiled and then took you to the infirmary.
1121211111.title: Blackheart Returns

11212111111.content: As you began to regain consciousness, your vision was still pretty blurred. But in a few moments, you were able to see clearly again. “Are you alright Mr. Uchiha?” “Ms. Nekonome. Where am I?” “You’re in the infirmary. Ms. Akashiya brought you to us and told us everything. You were right to jump out the window earlier.” You began to sit up and said “Sorry I snapped at you Ms. Nekonome.” “Don’t worry about it. If I were in your situation, I would have done the same.” “If that is the case, I need to ask you to stop calling me Mr. Uchiha. Just call me Sasuke.” “Fair enough.” “By the way, how long was I out?” “About a week.” “A week? I see.” Ms. Nekonome left you with the nurse after that. You just stared at the ceiling for a while before someone entered the room.
11212111111.title: Later

112121111111.content: You got up and noticed Moka enter the room. “Moka.” “Hello Sasuke. How you feeling?” “I’ve been better.” “You took a large amount of damage from that guy. Who was he anyway?” You turned away and Moka sighed and was about to walk away. “His name is Blackheart.” She stopped walking and turned around with a surprised look on her face. “Moka, you saved my life. You have more than earned my trust.” Moka smiled and walked over to the chair next to your bed and sat down. You then told her about Blackheart and his role in your clan’s destruction. You also told her about the Ten Terrors and the Master. And to top it off, you told her why the Terrors let you live, because of your powers of Chaos. Once you were finished explaining, you turned to Moka and said “Now you see why I isolated myself from others. So they wouldn’t get hurt because of me.” “Sasuke…” “I have been cursed with the fact I will have to face the strongest demons that ever existed. And so, I haven’t let people get close to me.” you said as you looked away from Moka. You then felt Moka’s hand hold onto your own. “You know you don’t have to deal with this alone anymore.” “Moka…” “You of all people should know that even the strongest warrior can’t win an entire war alone.” You looked at her and then smiled. “Moka, thank you.” “No problem.”
112121111111.title: You Usual Visitor

1121211111111.content:
As the two of you were enjoying each other’s company, Ms. Nekonome came in and said “”Sasuke, Ms. Akashiya, we have a problem.” Moka rose to her feet and you got out of the bed and put your shirt back on and grabbed your sword. Ms. Nekonome then led you both to the student quarters. You both noticed that your dorms were destroyed. “My dorm, all my belongings…” “Are safe.” you said cutting her off. She looked at you with great confusion. “I had a feeling Blackheart would try this. In that instant I saw that you were the one who saved me, I created a chaos clone with the last of my chakra to move all your belongings to a safe location.” You said as you snapped your fingers. And then, all of Moka’s stuff appeared before her in some kind of energy sphere. “Sasuke…” “When you saved my life, you became my ally and friend. And I look out for my friends.” “Thank you.” “But there is the issue of where the two of you will stay.” “I can take care of that as well.” you said as you began to walk off. Moka and Ms. Nekonome followed you. Once you came your way to a clearing which you thought would be good enough. You called upon the power of earth. You then sent a massive amount of chakra into your hands, enough that Moka and Ms. Nekonome could see it. You then slammed your hands down onto the ground and in that moment, the energy began to outline into some kind of small castle. Once the outline was complete, the outline turned into an actual small castle. Moka and Ms. Nekonome were amazed at your power. But one it was finished, you fell onto the ground and Moka ran up to you to see if you were alright. “I’m fine Moka. I just used up a massive amount of chakra.” “Ms. Nekonome, I request that Sasuke and I both stay in this castle.” She thought about it for a moment and looked at you. “This place has a barrier over it so Blackheart can’t get in. I will place a similar barrier over the rest of the student dorms the instant I get my strength back.” In the end, she agreed and left the two of you to settle in to your new dorm.
Once Ms. Nekonome had left, Moka got under your arm and helped you inside. Once there, Moka was surprised at how much was in there. There were multiple weapons on the wall, mainly Kunai and many large shuriken; the Demon Wind Shuriken, otherwise known as the Windmill of Shadows. The mark of the Uchiha clan rested at the top of the stairs. She was impressed with the place, and even more impressed that you had the power to create a place like this. You then told her that there was an herbal bath in the castle as well. You created a small bat out of your chakra and you told her that if she wanted to use the bath, she just needed to follow the bat. You let her have the bath this evening, and she accepted your offer. Later on that night, she saw that you were sleeping against the wall with your sword in hand. She smiled and placed a sheet over you before she got into the bed herself. She fell asleep shortly after that.
1121211111111.title: Your New Home

11212111111111.content: The next morning, Moka woke up to find that you were not in the spot where you fell asleep. She got dressed and went to look for you. She then found the bat that you gave her before and it flew off down the hall. She decided to follow it and sure enough, it led her right to you. Moka noticed that you were once again training. And like before, she decided to watch. She then noticed that you shot multiple fireballs from your mouth. She noticed that they all hit all the targets in a perfect bull’s-eye. She was impressed by your aim. “Morning Moka.” you said without even turning around. She walked into the training hall and saw the multiple holes in the rocks around it. “I see you were training hard.” “I usually do. Now even though this is one of our days off, I have a promise to keep with Ms. Nekonome.” you said as you walked out the door. Moka decided to go with you in case it used too much of your chakra. And she was surprised that you didn’t collapse this time, even though the barriers you had to create were very large in size.
11212111111111.title: The Next Day

112121111111111.content: Once you had finished creating the barriers, you and Moka decided to head for the school and relax on the roof. The two of you sat next to each other and you both leaned against the roof entrance, you ended up taking a slight nap. As you slept, Moka noticed how cool and collected you were, and she smiled at this. She enjoyed having your company. But as she was about ready to take a little nap herself, you both heard something coming at the two of you. You both jumped out of the way and some kind of energy blast hit the rooftop entrance, but it was not destroyed. “Let me guess, a barrier?” “Better safe than sorry.” “Good point.” The two of you looked and saw that a massive number of hideaks came onto the roof. “What the hell are these things?” “Hideaks, soldiers of the underworld.” You and Moka then charged at the Hideaks and cleared through them with without too much trouble. The combination of Moka’s strength and your powers was far too great for the hideaks could handle. As soon as the two of you were finished with the hideaks, you and Moka smiled at each other. It was clear to both of you that you were a great team. But once it was done, Moka grew weak instantly and passed out, but you caught her before she hit the ground. “Moka, what's wrong?” You got no response, and you figured out what she needed. You then bit your finger, which caused you to bleed. You then let the blood drip from your finger and into her mouth. She regained consciousness and looked at you. “Moka, are you alright?” you said as you helped her sit up straight. “I’m sorry Sasuke. I just got weak all of a sudden.” “You need blood to sustain yourself Moka. And it seems you ignored the blood packets and tomato juice.” “I guess you’re right.” “Moka, if you needed my blood, you could have asked.” “Sasuke…” You then exposed your neck to her. She gasped lightly at the thought that you were allowing her to suck your blood. She chuckled a little and gently bit your neck. She sucked enough of your blood to sustain her for the rest of the day.
112121111111111.title: Later

1121211111111111.content: Over the course of the next several days, you and Moka started to become the best of friends. You let her suck your blood whenever she needed it, even though she got a little carrier away a couple of times. You both began to get a feel for each others fighting styles, and learned how to create powerful combination attacks. And as you spent more and more time with her, Moka began to soften your heart for the first time in years. And as she spent time with you, Moka felt closer to you than anyone else in her life. She actually started to fall in love, and much to your surprise, so were you. Moka introduced you o a few of her friends, Kurumu, Yukari, Mizore, and a werewolf by the name of Gin. But as you both grew closer, Blackheart grew much stronger. He was getting ready to destroy you and Moka, even though it was against the wishes of the Ten Terrors and the Master.
1121211111111111.title: A Time of Peace

11212111111111111.content:
(Gin)

One say, you and Moka were sitting through class with the others and everything seemed to be normal, but then, another large explosion came from the forest near the school and both you and Moka knew who it was. Ms. Nekonome didn’t stop you this time. You and Moka went into the forest and found none other than Blackheart again, but thanks to your sharingan, you could tell that he was much stronger than before. You and Moka both knew he would be much more trouble than last time. You drew your sword and you and Moka charged at him. But he was not interested in Moka at the moment, so he snapped his fingers and a large number of hideaks came from the underworld and attacked her. “Hang on Moka.” “Never mind her, worry about yourself!” he said as he charged at you and slashed you with his claws. You struck back with a swipe of your sword, which sliced his chest as well. But in an instant, his wounds were completely healed and you knew this was not going to be easy. The two of you fought hand to hand for a while. But as you fought, you felt like something was not right. You could tell he was holding back. But as you thought this, he managed to create an opening an slammed a powerful attack into the left side of your chest. You managed to see what he did and it looked like your chidori, only this was made from negative energy. “Sasuke!” “You’re next on my list vampire.” he said as he was about to take his hand out of your body, but he felt something grab his wrist. He turned and saw you still conscious and holding onto him. “What the hell?!” “C-Chidori…Stream!” you said as you sent a massive amount of lightning into his body. He began to roar in pain, but he sent even more power into his Negative Chidori. It was a battle of endurance at this point. It took about ten minutes, but you couldn’t fight back anymore and were an the verge of death. “You have more guts than I thought Sasuke. It’s a shame I have to kill you!” he said as he landed a blow to the face, making claw marks on your cheek. Moka tried to get to you, but she couldn’t get through the hideaks in time. “Now say good-bye!!” he said as he prepared to impale you with his claws. But just before he managed to strike you, someone grabbed your body and got you out of there with incredible speed. Blackheart and Moka were both confused as to what just happened. But then they both noticed Gin who grabbed you by the back of your shirt and gently set you down. “I have had enough of these fools getting in my way!” But in that moment a large number of Hideaks were frozen solid and they were shattered by someone else. Yukari, Kurumu and Mizore had also arrived on the scene. “You don’t expect to fight all of us do you?” “Don’t get cocky werewolf. I will admit, that you and the vampire would give me a little trouble. But…” he said as he looked over to you. “Your only hope to defeat me is gone. The whole in his chest may heal, but the internal damage his body has suffered is too much for even his powers to heal. You had all better say your good-byes now.” he said before vanishing into the darkness.
11212111111111111.title: Blackheart's Revenge

112121111111111111.content:
(Yukari Kurumu Mizore)

As soon as Blackheart left, Moka ran up to you as fast as she could. She picked up your nearly lifeless body and prayed that you were alive. "Sasuke…” You then turned towards her and looked into her eyes. “Moka…” you said extending your hand towards her face. You gently placed it on her cheek and she placed her hand on your own. “Are you alright?” “Idiot, don’t worry about me. Look at the state you’re in!” “I will admit, I’ve been better.” you said as you started to fade out. “Sasuke, remember what you said when you introduced yourself to the class?” “Yes.” “Well, I want to help you Sasuke. With all of it.” Even though you were in terrible pain, you couldn’t help but blush. “T-Thank you…Moka.” you passed out at that point. “What can we do?” “I can save him if I inject my blood into Sasuke.” “She’s right. Vampire blood has amazing regenerative powers. And combined with Sasuke’s already incredible ability to heal, it might be the only chance he has.” “Well, do what you have to do Moka.” Moka nodded and an aura formed around her. “Sasuke…accept my blood, and return to me.” she said as she bit down on your neck and injected a large amount of her blood into you. After about five minutes of this, everyone but Moka was about to give up. But then, she took her fangs out of your neck and they all noticed that you were breathing. They all let out a big sigh of relief and they all took you to the infirmary.
112121111111111111.title: Vamire's Blood

1121211111111111111.content: As you were lying there on the infirmary bed, Moka couldn't stop thinking about the pain you must have felt. As the tohers were asleep, she gently kissed you on the cheek and left the room. Once she was out of the school, she began her search for Blackheart. But along the way, she ran into Kurumu. "Kurumu." "You were planing on taking on Blackheart alone weren't you?" "Don't try and stop me." "I would do no such thing. I am going to help you." "So am I." "Me too." Mizore and Yukari came from behind a couple of trees.Moka smiled and thanked them for their help. But then, a bolt of black lightning struck the spot between all four of them and they were all sent back a bit. "Lookiing for me?" "You are going to pay for what you did to Sasuke." "Give it your best shot vampire. And it is going to take a lot more than a snow girl, a succubus and a witch to take me down." "We will never know until we try." "Come and get me fools." Yukari decided to attack from a distance and Moka, Kurumu and Mizore attacked him head on and the baatlle began.
1121211111111111111.title: Moka Takes Action

11212111111111111111.content:
(Ruby) (Note, you are wearing a sleevless version of the Akatsuki cloaks)

The girls were all attacking him at once and he was able to dodge all of them with minimal effort. He jumped away from them and said with a laugh. “Come on now. If you can’t even hit me, this isn’t going to be a very interesting fight.” Kurumu used all the speed she could call on and got behind him and slashed his back. But sadly, the wound healed instantly. “Now we are getting somewhere.” Mizore stuck multiple ice shards into his back but he was still able to heal. But then, he felt a strong power coming from Yukari’s location. He turned around to find that she was working with another with named Ruby. “Now I see. You were planning to use a powerful magic blast to attack me. Not going to happen!” he said as he charged at the two of them. But Moka got in front of him and the two of the fought each other. As the two of them fought, Ruby and Yukari had finished charging up their attack, but then needed Blackheart to stay still. That’s when Gin arrived on the scene and held Blackheart in place. “What?” “Now you two!” “Right!” They both thrusted their wands forward and a powerful magical blast was sent toward Blackheart. But just before it hit, Gin let go and got out of there just in time. They thought it was over when they heard a very demonic laugh. “N-No way…” “He survived?” “Of course. He’s been toying with us this whole time.” “Now you’re catching on. I have to admit you provided me some entertainment, but you have outlived that purpose and you must die!” he said as he was getting ready to fire a blast of negative energy from his hand. But then, a massive number of kunai made of lightning came out of nowhere and went right through him. He ended up firing a small blast at Moka. But in an instant, Moka vanished and the beam missed her. “What happened to Moka?” “Look, up there!” she said pointing to the top of a tree. She saw you standing on the very tip of the tree and holding Moka in your arms. “Sasuke.” She noticed that you looked very different. Your hair was silver in color and you had a golden aura around you. “Sorry I’m late, Moka.” Moka just hugged you for being alright. You then jumped down from the tree and gently floated down to the ground. “This can’t be! Sasuke is now a vampire?” “Well, you’re half right. My transformation will not be complete for a little while. But tanks to Moka, I can easily handle you now.” “Don’t you dare mock me!” he said as he fired a large energy blast at the two of you. You then hit the blast with a powerful kick, sending it into the air. “I-Impossible!” “Let’s end this Blackheart.” “With pleasure!”
11212111111111111111.title: The Battle Begins

112121111111111111111.content:
(Both)

You and blackheart floated into the air and your two aura’s clashed. The amount of chakra that was present made the air seem much heavier. Blackheart was the first to make an attack towards you. You managed to avoid his attack just by moving your head to the side. He continued his attack with a flurry of claw attacks, but you managed to avoid each of them. Blackheart then slammed you with his tail and you were sent towards the ground. You landed on your hands and feet and looked at Blackheart who fired a massive number of energy blasts at you. You managed to avoid them by flipping backwards. “Sasuke…he his avoiding Blackheart with minimal effort.” “Is that good?” “He Hasn’t even begun to show us his power. Right now he’s just gauging his opponent. When it comes to the battlefield, he is a genius.” The others just continued to watch as you were soon backed up against a wall. “Die!” he said charging towards you with the intent of impaling his claws into your head. You avoided this by ducking at the very last second causing Blackheart’s hand to get stuck in the wall. You then focused your chakra into your hands and hit him with your gentle fist attacks. It temporarily messed up his chakra network. But his rage fixed that problem as he sent a powerful blast into the wall, destroying it and the instant he turned around, he was hit by a much more powerful version of you Chidori Senbon. “That’s the way Sasuke!” “You fools, this changes nothing!” he said as he was getting ready to heal. But the instant he tried this, his body grew extremely weak and he fell to his knees. “What’s the matter? Can’t heal yourself?” “What have you done?” “I took a good look at your chakra and saw it’s entire flow. I used my gentle fist to destroy the part of you that allows you to heal instantly.” “Amazing.” “No! I refuse to lose to you! If I die…” he said as he took to the sky. “I AM TAKING YOU ALL WITH ME!!!” he said as he fired a blast big enough to take out the entire school, as well as a nice chunk of the human world. “Sasuke, get out of there!” “No.” Moka gasped a little. “I have come too far to back down. Not only is my home at stake, but my friends and as well as the woman I love.” “Sasuke…” “And in order to protect you Moka, I will fight the entire underworld alone!” Moka felt incredible touched. You then called on a massive amount of chakra. You then yelled as you thrusted both of your hands forward “Chaos Blast!” And in that moment, a massive blast of energy came from your hands and ended up shredding the shirt and cloak on your back. The two blasts collided and the force from the two was incredible, enough to pull some of the trees from their roots. The two of you were in a dead heat and Moka knew she had to do something. She made a mad dash towards you and grabbed onto your shoulders. “Moka!” “You are not doing this alone!” “This battle is between Blackheart and myself. I don’t want you getting caught up in this-” you were cut off by Moka moving her hands up your arms until they reached your hands. “No Moka.” “I’m your partner. I’m fighting with you no matter what. Together we’re stronger Sasuke.” “Okay Moka.” You both smiled warmly at each other and you felt a new power arise within you. Moka could feel it too and you both knew how to finish him. “Now feel the power of our love. Ultimate Chaos Blast!“ you both said as a much larger golden beam shot from your hands and collided with Blackheart’s attack. “WHAT?!” “TAKE THIS!!” you said as your beam hit Blackheart. “NO! THIS CANNOT BE HAPPENING!” “KNOW YOUR PLACE!” “NOOOOO!!!” he said as the beam destroyed him instantly
112121111111111111111.title: The Final Battle

1122.content:
(you, Moka-san)

One day, you were alone as usual walking through a dead forest. You were not scared of anything that could be in this forest. You came to this forest because of a vision you've had during the night. You remember seeing a beautiful woman with red eyes and silver hair in the vision. She also had amazing speed and power. All you knew was that you need to find this woman. You walked through the forest for hours and found nothing. Soon you ened up finding a tunnel. Just as you got to the tunnel, a bus pulled up and the driver said to you "Are you Sasuke Uchiha?" You nodded. "Get in. I am here to take you to Youkai Acadamy." he said. You knew that the woman you were looking for had to be there. So you got in the bus and he drove you through the tunnel.As he was driving, he said "That is an interesting armor you are wearing. You make that yourself?" You just nodded. "I see you have something on your mind. Maybe I can help." You looked at the driver and told him about the vision you had."I see" he said. "Looks like you have a certain someone who has eyes for you. And the way you described her, I'd say she is a...." he gets cut off by you saying "Vampire?" He was surprised at your knowledge, but soon you arrived at the bus stop near Youkai Acadamy. You got off and continued your search. You soon found yourself at a small pond in the middle of the forest. You just enjoyed the scenery for a while until you heard someone speak to you."At last we meet. You must be Sasukue Uchiha." You turned and saw the woman from the vision. You looked at her and said "I need to confirm that you have the speed and power from my dream. You ok with that?" The woman looked at you and nodded. You then made a swipe with your arm while yelling "CHAOS SPEAR!" A large number of energy spear came at the woman and she dodged them with lightning speed. You lost track with your eyes, but you used your ears to listen for her next move. Just then you heard something move towards you. You put your arm up and blocked a very powerful kick. Moka-san stared up at the site where the explosion was and started to cry. She thought that you were dead. The others came and knew what happened. They comforted Moka-san until Mizore said "Look!" Moka-san and the others looked in the say and saw something coming at them. They jumped out of the way and the spot where they were standing was a giant crater. Moka-san ran up to the crater and saw what looked like wings wrapped around something. The wings then started to part and reavealed what they were wrapped around; you. Moka-san gasped and she dove into the crater. She then picked up the front half of your body in her arms and started to cry. But then she heard a weak groan. She saw that you were still alive. "I told you didn't I? I will never leave you." Moka-san smiled and embraced you with all her might. You embraced her as well. You then stood up and picked her up and flew ut of the crater with her in your arms. You opened all the portals needed to send everyone back to the monster world.
112311211111121211111111111111.title: Continue

1123112111111212111111111111111.content: As things in the human world returned to normal, you and Moka-san were excited for the birth of your child. But the two of you didn't have to wait for too long. About nine months later, Moka-san gave birth to your child. A little boy with red eyes and long silver hair. "It looks like he takes after the two of us." "Yes he does my love. He certianly does." "What should we name him?" You looked at your son for a moment before deciding his name. "Shadow. His name is Shadow." "I think it's a wonderful name (name)-kun." For the next few years, you and Moka-san raised your son together and teaching him how to control the powers he recived from you. And in due time, he fell in love with Mizore's daughter and the bloodline continues for all time.
1123112111111212111111111111111.title: Continue

1132.content:
(You) (You look exactly like Sasuke Uchiha from Naruto Shippuden)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the lone survivor of the once mighty Uchiha clan. Your clan was the greatest group of warrior the earth had ever seen. You were the strongest member of the clan to ever exist, thanks to your powers of chaos. Even though you were grateful for your powers, you began to wonder if there would ever be a place where you could feel like you belonged. You had swore to avenge your clan’s demise at the hands of the Master and his Ten Terrors, and until that time, you would not return to the Uchiha Clan’s grounds, and you lived the life of a nomad. But one day, your nomadic lifestyle came to an end. As you were walking along the side of the road, a bus pulled up to you and the driver opened the door. “Sasuke Uchiha?” “Yeah?” you asked in your usual cool and collected tone. “I have been assigned to take you to Youkai Academy. Get in.” You listened to him and got in the bus. You figured that a place called Youkai Academy would at least keep you entertained. Soon the man had drove you through a tunnel which you could tell lead to an area protected by some kind of barrier. The driver stopped and said as you got out “Welcome to your new home Sasuke. I should tell you, you are going to be the only human here.” he said as he drove off. You knew he was right, just the feel of this place wasn’t human. You then made your way to the academy using Chaos Control. You saw the building and you went inside, knowing that this is the beginning of your new life.
1132.title: Chaos + Vampire (Outter)

11321.content:
(Moka)

As you were walking through the dark forest, you thought about what the driver meant by you being the only human in the school. “Alright, if I’m the only human in this school, what would that make the other students here?” But your thoughts were interrupted by something coming your way. You turned and found nothing, but you still heard something. You drew a kunai just in case you need it. You continued walking and continued to hear that noise, but saw nothing. As soon as you made it to an open area, you stopped and figured out the sound you heard was being made by a bike. “Huh, I guess I never needed this.” you said looking at your kunai. But as your guard was down, you ended up getting slammed by someone on a bike. But you accidentally sliced your cheek with your kunai before you let go of it. “Shouldn’t have let my guard down.” you said as you tried to get up. But then you heard a slight gasp as well as the feel of something soft against your hand. You then saw your hand was on a girls thigh, you quickly remove your hand. “I’m sorry. I got dizzy for a second and my vision blurred.” she said as she looked at you. She had long pink hair and beautiful green eyes. “It’s fine.” you said as you dusted yourself off. But then you felt blood run down your cheek. “Oh no, you’re bleeding!” she said pulling out a handkerchief and prepared to wipe the blood away. But then she started to shiver and said “This scent…” “Scent?” She gently grabbed your face and said “I’m sorry. I can’t help myself, because I’m a vampire.” she said as she gently bit your neck. You could tell she was telling the truth. This girl was sucking the blood out of your body. She snapped out of it and then stopped herself from going further. “I’m so sorry!” “It’s fine.” “So, are you attending Yokai Academy?” “Yeah, though it’s my first year.” “That’s great. It’s my first year too.” “I see. So, you’re a vampire huh?” “I-is that bad?” “I have no problem with that.” “That’s great!” she said as she tackle hugged you. “Maybe we could be friends, what do you think?” “Sure.” “Oh that’s a relief. I was scared that I wouldn’t make friends. Oh, my name’s Moka Akashiya.” “I’m Sasuke Uchiha. Let me ask you, you got a problem with humans?” “No, why?” “Because I am one.” “What? How can that be? Human’s aren’t allowed here.” “You got me. The bus driver said he was assigned to pick me up. I guess my powers make me the only human allowed here.” “Powers?” “I can explain later. We better go before we’re late.” you said as you walked off. Moka followed you and the two of you walked to school together.
11321.title: Meeting Moka Akashiya

1142.content:
(You) (You look exactly like Sasuke Uchiha from Naruto Shippuden)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the lone survivor of the once mighty Uchiha clan. Your clan was the greatest group of warrior the earth had ever seen. You were the strongest member of the clan to ever exist, thanks to your powers of chaos. Even though you were grateful for your powers, you began to wonder if there would ever be a place where you could feel like you belonged. You had swore to avenge your clan’s demise at the hands of the Master and his Ten Terrors, and until that time, you would not return to the Uchiha Clan’s grounds, and you lived the life of a nomad. But one day, your nomadic lifestyle came to an end. As you were walking along the side of the road, a bus pulled up to you and the driver opened the door. “Sasuke Uchiha?” “Yeah?” you asked in your usual cool and collected tone. “I have been assigned to take you to Youkai Academy. Get in.” You listened to him and got in the bus. You figured that a place called Youkai Academy would at least keep you entertained. Soon the man had drove you through a tunnel which you could tell lead to an area protected by some kind of barrier. The driver stopped and said as you got out “Welcome to your new home Sasuke. I should tell you, you are going to be the only human here.” he said as he drove off. You knew he was right, just the feel of this place wasn’t human. You then made your way to the academy using Chaos Control. You saw the building and you went inside, knowing that this is the beginning of your new life.
1142.title: Chaos + Vampire (Inner)

11421.content:
(Ms Nekonome)

As you finally made your way into your home room, you opened the door and the teacher looked at you. “Oh hello, you must be our new student.” you nod. “Well, my name is Ms. Nekonome, your home room teacher. Why don’t you stand in front of the class and tell us about yourself. Your likes, dislikes, and your dreams.” You walk in front of the class and already a lot of the girls are talking about you. “My name is Sasuke Uchiha. I have no dislikes, and I don’t like anything in particular. And what I desire isn’t a dream, because I will make it a reality. I’m going to restore my clan, and destroy a certain someone.” Silence fell onto the class room, but little did you know you attracted the attention of the toughest woman you would ever meet. The teacher broke the silence. “Okay then. Why don’t you have a seat in front of Ms. Akashiya?” You remains silent and walked over to the open desk in front of a girl reading some sort of martial arts book. You took your seat and listened to each rule. The one that caught your attention was the one where if a human enters the school, that human would be killed on the spot. Even though you could fool them with the second state transformation, you needed to be on your guard around here. Once class was done, the rest of the day was just being introduced to the other teacher. But the entire time, you knew someone was observing you carefully. For the time being you let it go. Once the day was done, you decided to go to the roof and get a view of the place.
11421.title: Yokai Academy

1151.content: Why be normal and boring when you can be hot blooded and exciting?
1151.title: Wait!

11511.content: You may be a human but you have passionate interests in music, story telling, and your eccentric.
11511.title: Normal but not quite boring

11512.content: That's more like it. By the way , NO SASUKE! Sasuke is emo, not hot blooded. Kamina is hot blooded. Kouji Kabuto, Ryoma Nagare, Domon Kashuu, Duo Maxwell, Simon from TTGL and Momotaros are all hot blooded as well. So, ikkouze.
11512.title: Hot blooded and exciting

1152.content:
(You) (You look exactly like Sasuke Uchiha from Naruto Shippuden)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the lone survivor of the once mighty Uchiha clan. Your clan was the greatest group of warrior the earth had ever seen. You were the strongest member of the clan to ever exist, thanks to your powers of chaos. Even though you were grateful for your powers, you began to wonder if there would ever be a place where you could feel like you belonged. You had swore to avenge your clan’s demise at the hands of the Master and his Ten Terrors, and until that time, you would not return to the Uchiha Clan’s grounds, and you lived the life of a nomad. But one day, your nomadic lifestyle came to an end. As you were walking along the side of the road, a bus pulled up to you and the driver opened the door. “Sasuke Uchiha?” “Yeah?” you asked in your usual cool and collected tone. “I have been assigned to take you to Youkai Academy. Get in.” You listened to him and got in the bus. You figured that a place called Youkai Academy would at least keep you entertained. Soon the man had drove you through a tunnel which you could tell lead to an area protected by some kind of barrier. The driver stopped and said as you got out “Welcome to your new home Sasuke. I should tell you, there is another human here, look for a guy named Tsukune Aono.” he said as he drove off. You then made your way to the academy using Chaos Control. You saw the building and you went inside, knowing that this is the beginning of your new life.
1152.title: Chaos + Vampires

11521.content:
(Outter Moka Inner Moka Tsukune Yukari Kurumu Ruby Mizore Gin) (Note, Moka and Tsukune have not been in love at all)

As you were walking, you soon made your way to the academy. You then noticed a group of people composing of two men and six women. They seemed to be pretty good friends and you needed to find this Tsukune guy anyway, so you decided to get some info from them. “Excuse me.” you said walking up to the group. “I’m looking for a guy named Tsukune Aono. You know him?” “Yeah, I’m Tsukune. How can I help you?” “So you’re the other human here huh?” “What, you’re a human?” “Yes, my name is Sasuke Uchiha.” “So how did you get in? I mean, for the most part, humans are not allowed here.” “I assume this would be the reason.” you said as you created the chidori in your hand. Needless to say, everyone was surprised. “I was born with the power of chaos.” You then shut down your attack and stood before the others. “It’s very nice to meet you Sasuke. My name is Yukari.” “I’m Kurumu.” “My name is Mizore.” “I’m Gin, president of the newspaper club.” “I’m Ruby.” “Who are these two?” You said looking at the pink-haired and silver-haired girls. “Well, believe it or not, they are both the same girl.” “Really?” you asked in a cool and collected tone. “Yeah, you see their sister used an item called Lilith’s mirror to split them apart into two different bodies. Only unlike the first time, they’re not weakened.” “I see.” “Our name’s are Moka Akashiya.” “So, you’re human too huh?” “Yes. So, what are the rest of you if Tsukune and I are human?” “Well, I’m a succubus.” “Ruby and I are witches.” “I’m a werewolf.” “I’m a snow woman.” “And we’re vampires.” “I see, so this is a school for monsters. That does explain the name.” “Right.” “Alright, well, I might as well see what homeroom I’m in.” you said walking off. “See ya.” Both Moka’s looked at you in an interested way. Later, you found out you were in the same class as all the others (Ruby and Gin excluded of course).
11521.title: A Pair of Vampires

115211.content: As soon as you got to homeroom, you were seated between the two Moka’s after telling the class something about yourself. Class went by rather smoothly. Once it was done, you decided to go on the roof and relax a little. You spent a couple minutes alone until you were joined by both Moka’s. “Hey Sasuke.” “Mind if we join you?” “Go ahead.” The two of them sat beside you. “So Sasuke, you said you were born with the power of chaos. What do you mean by that?” “Let me show you.” you said taking out a kunai and sending a little of your energy into it. You then carved seven little gems in a circle. “These are the Chaos Emeralds, seven gems which hold a massive amount of power. Each one represents a different element.” “Erath, fire, wind, water, darkness, ice and lightning, right?” “Exactly. The emeralds seem to have a mind of their own.” You then carved lines that connected each of them. “Alone, these elements are strong, but together, their power is said to allow one to do the impossible.” “So how did you end up with these powers?” “While I was inside my mother’s womb, it seems I was chosen to be the host of these emeralds. Their energies entered by body before I was born an from that day, I had these powers.” “So, what happened to your mother? A human bearing a child of such power is impossible to think.” “She survived my birth, but…” “Sasuke?” “Never mind. I am not ready to discuss it yet.” You then felt the hand of the Inner Moka on your shoulder. “You know, if you have a problem, you can come to me.” “Or me Sasuke. You can count on both of us if you need us.” she said placing her hand on top of your own. You smiled and thanked them. But then, a large explosion came from the forest outside the academy. “What’s going on?” “Both of you stay here. I’ll handle this.” you said drawing your sword. “Sasuke, what’s going on here?” “Sorry, but I don’t want you getting caught up in this.” you said as you ran down the walls of the buildings and towards the forest. “What do you think, should we follow him?” “Yeah, let’s go.” The two of them rushed off after you, and the others were not too far behind.
115211.title: The Story of Your Power

1152111.content: As you were charging towards the explosion, you used your sharingan to see what caused it. “I knew it. Hideaks, they came here to Yokai.” You increased your speed and sent the power of lightning into your blade. As soon as you arrived, you charged through them and half of them were destroyed in an instant, being you sliced them with your sword. You then ran towards the remaining Hideaks. There were still a large number of them however. You used your sword and your Chidori to attack. The hideaks had blades of their own and scored a few slices, such as across your face and side. This went on for a couple minutes before you had enough. “Alright, let’s get this over with. Chaos Rotation!” you said as you spun around with a great amount of speed, destroying the Hideaks. As soon as you stopped spinning however, you were sent through a few trees when you were hit by a powerful energy blast. You struggled to stand up and ended up using your sword as a support. But as soon as you stood up, your head was grabbed by the general that lead the Hideaks. “Sasuke, you will die in the name o the Master!” “Not going to happen. My clan will be avenged! Chaos Rasengan!” you said as you thrusted an attack in his stomach. The attack sent him flying through several trees. Once he was destroyed, you put your sword away and got ready to head back to the academy. Bur before you could do that, you noticed Moka and the others looking at you. “I assume you all saw that?” They nodded. You then walked past them and went back to the academy. Now the two Moka’s were curious.
1152111.title: Battle in the Forest

11521111.content: Later that day, the sun was beginning to set and you were still dripping with blood from your fight earlier today. “Damn it. The energy from all these monsters is reducing my enhanced healing abilities.” You sat on the roof as your injuries healed, slower than usual. “Sasuke, are you alright?” You noticed the beautiful pair of vampires looking concerned. “Moka, what are the two of you doing here?” “You should now the answer to that.” You let out a sigh. “I’m fine. I’ve had injuries far worse than this before.” “What do you mean?” “Believe it or not, those guys are weak compared to the true enemies that are out there.” “Sasuke, you need to tell us what you’re talking about.” “Very well then.” You explained to the girls how you were the lone survivor of the Uchiha Can, how Blackheart was a part of their destruction and about the Ten Terrors and the Master. You gave them ever detail you could. “Sasuke, how long has it been since you’ve seen your home?” “About 12 years.” “I’m sorry to hear that.” “It’s not your fault. I’m used to being alone.” Both of the girls felt very sorry for you. But at the same time, they were having a lot of trouble keeping control over themselves with the scent of your blood. You could tell and exposed your neck. “Sasuke?” “Go ahead. You are vampires after all.” “Thank you, Sasuke.” Both of them gently bit your neck and drank your blood. The energy that flowed through it made it much tastier for them and they got a little carried away. You blacked out from blood loss and once that happened, the girls helped you out by taking you to the infirmary.
11521111.title: Later

115211111.content: You woke up an hour later in the infirmary with the girls sitting at your side. “Look he’s waking up.” “Ugh…my head.” “We apologize Sasuke. We got carried away when we sucked your blood.” “It’s fine.” you said getting up. You noticed the full moon. “Beautiful. I see the moo is totally different here than in the human world.” “That’s right.” Just then, your teacher Ms. Nekonome entered the room with shocking news. “Ms. Akashiya! Your dorm has been destroyed!” “What?” The four of you rushed to what remained of their dorm. “Who could have done this?” “That bastard.” The girls turned towards you. “Blackheart, he ordered this attack.” “But why?” “I don’t know.” “Where will we sleep?” “I might be able to help. Let me take care of this first.” you said as you created a large and powerful barrier around both dorms. “Alright, follow me.” you said as you walked off. The two Moka’s followed and you soon made your way to a clearing. You called on all of your powers and focused them into your hand. “This should proved you with a suitable home!” you said as you slammed your palm onto the ground. Just then, the energy began to outline the outside of a small castle. An outline of the inside was also being created, with furniture and all. About five minutes later, the outline was complete. The castle materialized and appeared before you, Ms. Nekonome and the two Moka’s. Needless to say, all of them were surprised. But in that moment, you collapsed to the ground. “Sasuke!” “Are you alright?” they said running up to you. “Yeah, I’m fine. I just used up a large amount of my energy. I hope this home is to your liking you two.” “We couldn’t accept this.” “It was one of my enemies that caused this mess, so I have to make it right.” “Look Sasuke, we will accept on one condition.” “And that is?” “You live in this home as well.” “I…I don’t know.” “Oh please Sasuke? It would be fun if you were around too.” “I guess my hands are tied.” you said with a chuckle. The girls helped you up and you all entered the house.
115211111.title: A New Home

1152111111.content:
(Moka is wearing the robe in this picture, for acurate details see end credits of season 2 http://lon3lyaznikka.deviantart.com/art/... )

You gave the girls a tour of the house, from the bedrooms, to the training hall, the living room, and the herbal bath. “Sasuke you created all this if five minutes?” “I’m full of surprises.” “No kidding. Where will you sleep?” “I’ll just sleep on the couch.” “You sure?” “Yes. You know I am still getting used to the whole group thing, so you will have to give me time to adjust.” “We understand.” “Thank you. I can get there myself. Night girls.” you said as you went to the couch. “Good night…” “Sasuke.” Both girls went to the bedroom and you slept on the couch with your sword at your side. Later that night, the Inner Moka came out in her robe and covered you with a blanket. She placed a gentle kiss on your forehead and went back to sleep in her room.
1152111111.title: A Tour of the Castle

11521111111.content: The next morning, you woke up to the sun shining on your face at dawn. You immediately noticed the blanket over you. You were curious as to which Moka put it over you. But you would worry about that later. For the moment you decided to head for the training hall. You set the training hall to fire shuriken and kunai at you, so you would have to block them without your powers or dodge them. You began the exercise and you managed to dodge and block most of them. But a couple did slice both of your cheeks up a bit. But your injuries healed as fast as you got them. “My healing powers seem to have returned to normal.” You left the training hall and went to see if the girls were awake. As you made it to the living room, you saw both of the girls were wide awake. “Good morning Sasuke.” “Did you sleep well?” “Yes, thank you. By the way, which of you gave me the blanket last night?” “I did.” “Thank you.” “No problem.” “So, should we head to class?” “I don't see why not.” “Sasuke.” “Yes?” You then noticed the look in their eyes. “You smell good.” They both tackled you. “Hey hold on.” Both of them gently bit your neck again, only this time they didn’t get carried away. “This is going to take some getting used to.” The three of you left the castle and went to class.
11521111111.title: The Next Morning

115211111111.content: Back at school, you and the others were just having an average day. Though during gym, you were picked to race a few guys who were considered to be the fastest in the school. You let the others get a few second head start before starting yourself. It didn’t take you more than five seconds to catch up to them. You decided to keep pace with them so you wouldn’t humiliate them. Just when you were coming at the final stretch, you increased your speed and won the race. After that, it was a game of dodge ball. You, Tsukune, Kurumu, Mizore, Yukari and the two Moka’s were on the same team. But you were facing a team that was ruthless. Mizore didn’t give too much effort due to the fact she could melt. Kurumu and Yukari’s constant bickering got them out. Tsukune put up a good effort, but he got hit as well. “Alright guys, I say we take out the vampires!” “Bring it on.” “As you wish!” he said as he threw a couple of dodge balls at them with a large amount of power behind them. “That’s enough!” you said as you caught both of them. “What the? Take him out!” The rest of the team threw the dodge balls at you as hard as they could and you blocked them all with the balls in your hand. One of them threw another one at you and you caught it in between the ones in your hand. “No way.” “Sasuke…” “I will not let you gang up on my friends.” “Alright Sasuke, show me what you got.” “With pleasure.” you said as you threw two of the balls in the air and threw the other. You threw it faster than they could see and it hit all but the leader. You caught the two you threw in the air. “Wow.” “Very impressive.” “Thanks.” “Alright, come one!” “Very well.” You threw one of the balls at him and he jumped into the air to dodge it. You then threw the other one and scored a blow to the face. He was sent to the ground and the ball landed on his face. “Make a mental note of this. Do not mess with my friends.” “You’ll pay for this!” he said running off with his team. “Any time you're ready.” The rest of the day went rather normal. Soon, class was over and you decided to head back home with the girls.
115211111111.title: At School

1152111111111.content: On the way back from school, you and the two Moka’s noticed the same group of guys in front of you. “What do you guys want?” “We are here to settle things with Sasuke Uchiha.” They said as they transformed. One of them was a Cerberus, and the other four were lizard men. “So, these are your monster forms huh” “don’t get overconfident punk! We are going to take you down!” “You still have to contend with me.” “No Moka, it’s alright. I wont even need my powers to fight them.” You said as you stepped forward. “What did you say?! You little punk!” the lizard men said as they charged at you. They were not difficult to defeat, all you did was land one blow to each and they were sent into the trees. “Next.” you said looking at the leader. “I see you managed to win against my men, now you will feel the power of a Cerberus!” he said as he charged at you. “No, it’s time you learned your place.” You said as you got in front of him in an instant. You then landed a powerful punch to the stomach, which caused him to bed over and change back into his human form. “Did you learn anything?” “Yes, I know my place now.” he said in pain “Good, now beat it!” The gang leader knew better than to stay or to piss you off, so he and his men ran off as fast as they could. “Wow Sasuke, you’re really strong.” “And you manage to defeat them with a minimal amount of effort.” “True, but not all enemies are not as easy to defeat. Which is a good thing. Otherwise it wouldn’t be nearly as fun.” you said walking away. The girls followed you and soon, you all reached your home. Later that night, you decided to get into the bath yourself. You needed to relax a little.
1152111111111.title: Later

11521111111111.content: In the bath, the herbs felt pretty good against your skin, even though you had a pair of swimming trunks on. For the first time in weeks, you actually started to relax. But then, much to your surprise, both Moka’s entered the bathroom. “Hey Sasuke.” You instantly dove under the water being you didn’t expect this to happen. Both of them couldn’t help but giggle. You slowly rose to the surface and saw they were in swimsuits as well. “Hey girls.” “You mind if we join you?” “Sure, it’s fine.” Both of the girls entered the bath after setting their towels down of course, and they started to relax a little as well. You on the other hand were having trouble relaxing with the fact two very attractive girls were in the bath with you. Both of them noticed this and got closer to you. In that moment, they noticed the large number of scars on your body. “Sasuke, where did you get those scars?” “I have been in more battles than you would think. All of these were given to me by Blackheart and his forces.” “Man, and I thought I’ve had my fair share of fights.” “All of that is in the past. I must defeat Blackheart and the others.” “Sasuke…” “If you will both excuse me, I must train.” you said as you attempted to leave the bath, but both of the girls place their hands on your shoulders and force you back into the bath. “No Sasuke, you need to relax.” “It’s obvious you haven’t done that in ages.” “So let us help you.” In that moment, the Inner Moka began to massage your shoulders and the Outer Moka massaged your temples. You couldn’t help but sigh in relaxation. “I see you are enjoying this.” “I can’t think of a reason not to enjoy it.” “We are happy to help Sasuke.” “Thank you, both of you.” “No, thank you Sasuke.” “For what?” “For coming into our lives.” As soon as she said that, they both kissed you on the cheek and you couldn’t help but blush. The girls continued to help you relax for about an hour before you all got out.
11521111111111.title: In the Bath

choices: Then turns back and walks over to you.
Then looks back and winks at you, before going with her friend.
121.content:
(You Ruby Yukari)

As you start your new school as a second year student, you walk around the campus. You are here as an exchange student. Your father is the foremost expert on folklore and occult matters at a large university in Japan. He is a well connected person. You didn't know how well connected until he informed you that a good friend of his, the head of a special school wanted to start an exchange program. He then went on to explain that the school was for monsters. You didn't quite believe him, but you did know that your dad has been involved with so strange stuff. After thinking about it you decided that going to a school for monsters might be a once in a life time experience, so you let your father make all the arrangements. You had the weirdest bus ride there. The bus driver was really creepy. You were having second thoughts about it, but when you arrived you were greeted by your fathers friend, the Headmaster. He explained not to let on to the other students and teachers that you were human. Only he and his hot assistant Ruby would know you weren't a monster. After headmaster finishes giving you the guidelines and rules he leaves you alone in the office with Ruby. You can't help but look her up and down. She catches you doing so and smiles. You look into her eyes and turn beat red. This makes her smile bigger. She then says. "So, later on would you like me to introduce you to some of your classmates?" "Um sure. That would be cool." “Ah! (name)! Please have a seat.” The Headmaster gestured to the seat opposite him at his desk.

“Thank you, sir.” you nodded slightly, shutting the door behind you and taking the seat opposite him.

The Headmaster opened up a drawer and pulled out a bandaid, giving it to you as you opened the seal and put it over where you had been bitten. “I must apologize for everything that happened last night. Ruby has informed me of everything that has happened. What Ms. Shuzen did was completely out of line.”

“I appreciate that you were worried for my safety, sir. But it’s not your fault.” you said.

“I’ve spoken with your father on the phone. We realize now that we may have rushed into everything without thinking it all through. If you feel your safety’s a risk, you’re free to leave.”

“Leave Yōkai Academy?” you asked. The Headmaster nodded.

“We never did tell you… that the reason for your enrolment… was to see if we could trial run a human peacefully existing with monsters. You may not know this, but a couple years back, another human student, Tsukune Aono, was discovered to be human and… It didn’t really go down well with the School’s Security Enforcement Committee. Some of the corrupt members tried to have him killed. That entire situation was rather unfortunate. Of course, at that time, we didn’t have any proper channels for human enrolment at a school for monsters, which is why you were asked if you would like to enrol here.”

What the Headmaster had said hit you like a ton of bricks. You knew about the proposed exchange program, and you knew not to tell any of the other students that you were a human, but you didn’t know that the reason for not telling anyone that you were human was because you’d be killed if you were found out. Maybe if you had’ve been told that little tidbit of information, you wouldn’t have enrolled here.

“So you didn’t tell me any of this?!” you snapped, getting up out of your seat. “And my father knew?!”

The Headmaster nodded. “I understand your concern-”

“BULL-FUCKING-SHIT!” you shouted, almost at the top of your lungs. “You might find it petty to be freaked out by a prepubescent Vampire, and you might think I should’ve been more prepared from listening to my dad’s lectures at the University when he had to stay late, and maybe I should’ve been more prepared, but I wasn’t. If this place is supposed to be an educational facility for monsters to learn how to live with humans, why the Hell is it condoning acts of violence against humans?!” A few seconds of silence passed until you realized that you had just cursed off the Headmaster. “I’m sorry, sir…” you muttered. “I didn’t mean to-”

“It’s fine, (name).” The Headmaster sighed. “You must understand though that it’s a small minority of monsters who think poorly of humans. A lot of the students here have come from human schools all across Japan, and a lot of them peacefully coexist with humans. You know this for a fact. The members of the Newspaper Club don’t care that you’re human. Ruby told me that Kurumu was very concerned for your safety. I’m sure that she and the other members of the Newspaper Club would be more than willing to look out for you. And you won’t need to worry about Ms. Shuzen anymore. Your homeroom teacher, Ms. Nekonome is punishing her accordingly for her actions.”

“I don’t know…”

“(name), if you want to leave Yōkai Academy, I won’t stop you. You can head back to your room to collect your things. The next bus arrives at the bus stop in fifteen minutes. We won’t make an issue of it. Just tell me if you’d like to stay, or go.”

You thought it over. On one hand, staying at Yōkai Academy could be potentially life-threatening for you, especially if Kokoa decides to pay you another ‘visit’ in the night, or even worse, tells another student that you’re a human. But on the other hand, you had made a great group of friends on your first day. Friends who you knew would do anything and everything in their power to keep you safe. But when it got right down to it, what the Headmaster had told you only made you more hesitant to stay. If you yourself didn’t feel safe, you wouldn’t be able to focus on your schoolwork, and you’d end up failing, completely defeating the purpose of your enrolment at Yōkai Academy.

There were a lot of things you had to think about, but eventually, you cleared your throat and told the Headmaster your choice:
