Kurumu: YOU! What are you doing here?!

Unknown woman: Long time no see Kurumu.

(Name): Uh, you know her?

Kurumu: That's Keito the bitch from the Public Safety Commission.

You remember that the headmaster said something about a security enforcement a little back. You looked at Keito and notice she's just passing by. She stopped and said.

Keito: As much I would love to chat, I have a meeting to attend. Oh and Kurumu... tell your little club, I haven't forget about what happen last time... oh and new student...

(Name): Me?

Keito: Mmm... never mind, later.

Then Keito turned around and left. You were wondering what she wanted to say to you. You looked at Kurumu and notice a angry look on her her.

(Name): Kurumu, what's going on? Who is she?

Kurumu: I tell you about it after later, ok?

You nod, and you both headed to the classroom. When did you talk with Kurumu?
121121111221121212111122211211111.title: a evil woman with long purple hair appears

1211211112211212121111222112111112.content:
After class you and Kurumu head to the room where the newspaper club room is. Tsukune and Moka were already there so you ask them to fill you in about Keito and the Public Safety Commission. They told you what happen on that day which cause you to worry for your friends safety a bit.

Tsukune: But if Keito is here, does that mean...

(Name): She said she haven't forget what happen that day. It's likely she's going to get revenge.

Moka: You need to be careful Tsukune, or else she'll...

Kurumu: What are you talking about Moka? If that bitch prove that (Name) is human, he'll be the one killed!

(Name): Kurumu, calm down. I'm more worried about you and the others.

Mizore: I have to agree with Kurumu on this (Name)

The four of you looked up and saw Mizore hanging out of a vent with those dreamy eyes staring at you. She dropped down next to you and held your hand with her's.

(Name): M-Mizore, you been here this whole time?

Mizore: Not just me. You can come out now.

Yukari: Geez, you have to ruin it!

Then Yukari and Ruby came in and told you that they heard everything. You blush a little for knowing they have value your life.

Ruby: (Name) even if you aren't helpless we're always here to protect you, I should know since I agree when you started to enroll here. *Hugs other arm*

Yukari: You're my friend and I'm not going to let a butch of bullies pick on you! *Hugs your neck*

Kurumu: Yeah, well... I'm his love interest so he'll feel a lot safer with me.

Kurumu press her well-endowed chest against your which cause you to nervous smile as the other girls hug you. Tsukune and Moka sweatdrop at the scene and laugh a little. After the little group hug you were in your dorm room getting ready for bed. You though about your friends as you slowly fall asleep.

What happen next?
1211211112211212121111222112111112.title: After Class

12112111122112121211112221121111122.content:
Once you was fully asleep. You found yourself in a field of small white flowers under a serene night sky with a hint of a breeze. ( http://fav.me/d5qhhh7 ) You looked around the area and notice a lake with some trees around it. You walk towards the lake, hoping you could find someone. It took about 3 or 4 minutes to get to your destination.

(Name): I... I think I been here, but not as a dream.

You tried to remember when you were here until you notice an unknown figure approaching out of nowhere. You hide and study this person who happens to be a woman in a white/blue dress. You also notice the woman holding a child in her arms. She stop at the edge of the lake and started chanting in a unknown language in which the woman and child glowed in the night.

(Name): What's going on?

Then orbs of light rise out of the lake and into the child. Once the spell was done the woman smiled and white feathered wings appeared on her back. She turn around and flew in the direction where she came from. You walked up in the area where she were, wondering what that whole thing was about. The area sudden started to brighten up.

(Name): Look like I'm waking up... hm?

You look down at the lake's reflection and notice a pair of those wings on your own reflection before the dream is over.

What happen next?
12112111122112121211112221121111122.title: Dream State

121121111221121212111122211211111221.content:
The next day came and you were walking toward the academy to meet up with the others. You then saw Tsukune, Moka, and Ruby talking at the front of the school. They notice you and wave hello as you did the same.

Moka: Good Morning.

Tsukune: You alright?

(Name): Sort of.

Ruby: Slept well sweet heart?

(Name); I'm fine Ruby... say where's the others?

Moka: Yukari and Mizore should be already at class, I haven't seen Kurumu though.

You were a little sadden upon hearing that, you were hoping that you and Kurumu could walk to class together like last time. But then again she could be ahead of you and planning a surprise. Through out the day, you attained class after class and you still didn't see Kurumu anywhere. You were sitting on the chair at the newspaper club room with the other members, wondering if Kurumu is alright.

(Name): She haven't even notify anyone.

Ruby: I'm... sure she's alright.

Yukari: Y-Yeah... come on (Name) give us a big smile!

(Name): Mmm, I guess I am overreacting a bit. I'm going to get a drink of water.

Tsukune: Alright, we'll wait for you.

You head to the nearest water fountain for your quick drink until you notice a letter that was there on the floor. You pick up the letter and open to read what is written on it.

(Name), see me at the bus stop. Kurumu.


Your heart skip a beat upon reading her name and you ran to see her, but little did you know Mizore saw the whole scene of what you didn't see and ran to the others to tell then what she saw. You were at the area where the bus stop is and...
121121111221121212111122211211111221.title: Missing You

1211211112211212121111222112111112212.content:
Keito was there! She look at you and smiled.

Keito: Heh, I knew you would come.

(Name): K-Keito, where's Kurumu!?

Keito: You want to know the whereabouts your little succubus? Then admit it.

(Name): Admit what?

Keito: You know what I'm talking about, admit that you're human!

You were shocked that Keito said that. You know that if the whole academy acknowledge that you're human, almost everyone will be against you. You were a little scared but you can't back down, so you looked at Keito and said.

(Name): What if you're wrong? You do know that the barrier prevent humans ever coming in.

There was a moment of silence until Keito made an evil smile and said.

Keito: You know what? It doesn't matter. I'm still going to get my revenge, now admit or else...

(Name): Else what?

Ketio: Else... that succubus will fall into a tragic fate, like dropping her into a pit of... oh I don't know, I have list to make her suffer.

She snapped her fingers and one of her lackeys appear and gave you a picture a girl who is chain to a celling. Then you recognize who she's was and you gasp in horror.

(Name): Kurumu!

Keito: You can save her you know. Admit your a human and she'll be free. But if you don't will...

(Name): I... I...
1211211112211212121111222112111112212.title: Ketio was there!

12112111122112121211112221121111122121.content:
(Name): Alright fine! I'm a human, and I don't care what anyone thinks of me! But I have my reasons. Now let her go you bitch!

Keito: He admit it master, he's human.

Then suddenly a giant flame appeared at the entrance to the tunnel and out stepped a man with long blond hair with crazy amount of monster energy. He wasn't alone he had a gang of monsters with him, but no Kurumu. He look at and smile until you realizes Keito called him 'master'

(Name): Y-you... you're Kuyo?

Kuyo: Ah, so I assume the newspaper club told you about me?

(Name): Yeah, they told me everything. NOW RELEASE KURUMU!!!

Kuyo: Oh you can have her, but you will have to prove it.

(Name): I already did, what more did I have to do?

Kuyo: How about... you join us?

(Name): What?

Kuyo: Or will you stand against us and be killed?

(Name): I admitted I'm human! I will not join your stupid group! Free Kurumu or... else I'll... I'll...

(Voice): Try 'we'll' (Name).

You looked behind you and it was Tsukune, Moka, Yukari, Mizore, and Ruby. Kuyo saw this and order Keito and some of the other monster to attack them.

Kuyo: How about this little human, you can have your succubus after you defeat me and the others. Hmhmhm, like that's going to happen.

Then Tsukune tripped and took off Moka's rosary (again), and became Inner Moka. Some of the monster back away while the one who aren't charge at her. She easily dodge all the attack gave a powerful kick to all of them. You notice Kuyo and Keito have already left the area.

(Name): Guys, they have Kurumu, we need to find them.

Tsukune: We know (Name), Mizore saw the whole thing at the hallway.

Mizore: I knew that bitch would be up to something, so I thought everyone should know.

(Name): Mizore, everyone... thanks.

Inner Moka: Save your thanks when Kurumu is safe and that Kuyo is beaten to a pulp.

(Name) Then let's go.

You, Tsukune, and the other head towards the Public Safety Commission hideout, until...
12112111122112121211112221121111122121.title: The Return of Kuyo

121121111221121212111122211211111221211.content:
Keito and her minions were at the front entrance.

Keito: Heh, you arrived at last...

(Name): Keito, get out of the way!

Inner Moka: Like she's going to listen to reason.

Keito then grew spider legs out of her stomach and was ready to fight. Inner Moka took on Keito while Mizore, Yukari, and Ruby fight her minions. Keito laugh at this and decided to mock you more.

Keito: Hahaha, too weak to fight your own battles? Truly a weak human.

(Name): ...

After the battle Keito and her minions were tired and could no longer fight. One of her minions ran towards a lever and gave it a flip.

Tsukune: What the?

Yukari: Hey! What did that... *SHAKE* ...do?

Then the ground open up and...
121121111221121212111122211211111221211.title: Vs. Keito

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
You fell down the trap. The others saw this and tried to save but was to late. You landed into some dark jail cell with no one around.

(Name): Damn, I got careless. I only if I... was stronger.

You looked down at the ground and thought of what Keito said a minute ago. 'Too weak to fight your own battles' You hated that bitch for saying that, but you knew it was true. Kurumu saved you from Kokoa, Ruby healed you to health, and to top it all off monsters in this academy can seriously put a beaten on you.

(Name): Kurumu, Tsukune, Moka, Yukari, Mizore, Ruby...

Then you remember something.

-flashback-

(Name): Yeah I am. Besides I don't think the Newspaper club will let me go that easily. And I wanna get to know them more. They're the type of people who will look out for you, whether you're a monster or human. If Tsukune survived in a school like this then I think I can too.

Headmaster: A wise choice (name). I couldn't have said it better myself.

-end of flashback-

(Name): Heh, reminding me at a moment like this?

You got back up on your feet. You don't care if Kuyo or his lackeys are stronger then you are, you just don't want to give up. The others are trying they best at saving Kurumu and finding you. And you should be doing the same.

(Name): Alright, let's see if I can find a way out.
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Hideout Basement

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
You looked at the other side of the bars and notice the key on a table. You thought to yourself that if you were in the cell next to your with a long stick, you could get the key and escape. You examine the cell you're currently in, and notice a small hole up on the wall that you can fit thought. From the looks of it, it look like you can barely make it with a running jump, so you did and it worked.

(Name): Yes! Now to get that key.

You then looked around your new cell and notice chains on the ground. You picked them up and threw at the key and drag it towards you. It take a couple of tries but you manage to get it done. You grab the key, unlock the door, then open it.

(Name): Yes! I'm now freed, hang on Kurumu I'm coming.

You ran out of the prison room and notice a dark hallway with very little lights. You were a little scared and felt the chills, but you had to go thought it. After you you walk down the hallway cautiously, a dark shadowy figure with red eyes and red claws appeared where you were and disappear. As you were navigating through the darkness you were hearing a battle going on.

(Name): I hope that's Tsukune and the others.

It was...
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Prison Break

choices: Yukari, and Ruby attack it with magic
You strike it down with a your sealed power
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
Kokoa beating up Kuyo's lackeys with a giant mace.

Ko: That's another point for Ms. Kokoa, whee!

(Name): K-Kokoa? What are you doing here?

Kokoa: Huh? No way you broke free on your own?! I'm here to save you from that Kuyo creep.

(Name): Y-y-you mean suck my blood, and make me your slave!

Ko: Ms. Kokoa isn't going to enslave you whee, she want to apologize!

Kokoa: S-shut up batty!

Kokoa reach for Ko tighten her fist as her bat sweat and beg for forgiveness. Then more for Kuyo's goons appeared and Kokoa prepare for battle. However the monsters saw something and ran away.

Kokoa: Hey! What gives?

(Name): Something must of scared them away.

Kokoa: Look out!

Kokoa quickly push you aside and attacked that shadowy figure that was following you. The shadowy figure recover from the attack and it true form appears ( http://fav.me/d6a4hcd ).

Ko: For those of you wondering, this malevolent entity before Ms. Kokoa is known as a Shade. Shades are more likes ghosts then monsters since they are more resilient to the physical world, whee!

You stand back as Kokoa handle the shade. Kokoa swing her mace left and right to smash the shade, but as a ghostly being, the shade was able to slip through wall to avoid Kokoa's attacks and counter her with her blood red claws. If only if the battle was taken place outside so Kokoa would have more of a advantage. Then the shade dodge another attack and slash Kokoa back. Kokoa fell down and the shade was going to finish her off until you stop the shade by restringing her.

(Name): No! I won't let you kill her!

The shade manage to break free and tried to slash you, but were able to dodge it in time. Your back is at the wall, and the shade is going to kill you until...
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Meet up with Kokoa

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
The shade manage to break free and tried to slash you, but were able to dodge it in time. Your back is at the wall, and the shade is going to kill you until....it happened, You didn't how you did it, but you held out your hands and unleashed a powerful beam of light. Kokoa and Ko watched in shock as your power made the shade scream in agony. The light was so overwhelming to the shade that it was destroyed instantly. You looked at your hands with amazement and confusion.

(name) OK. What the heck just happened right now?

Kokoa: Holy crap! How the hell did you do that?!?

(name) You're asking me? How the heck should I know? I don't even know how I did it myself.

Ko: That was no ordinary beam. That was a holy purification beam. A beam that purify any evil force and anything filled with evil. And I'm pretty sure no ordinary human could pull that off.

(name) In any case let's keep moving. We have to find Kurumu. Hey Kokoa, you OK?

Kokoa: I-I'm fine. I am a vampire after all. I can take care of myself.

Ko: What Miss Kokoa's trying to say is thanks. Thanks for saving her life.

Kokoa: Shut it Ko!

She grabbed Ko and squeezed the heck out of him, making Ko whimper in pain. Then you, Kokoa, and Ko set off to search for Kurumu. You searched for everywhere, but didn't find Kurumu. You were just about to use hope when suddenly......
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: You strike it down with a your sealed power

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
Tsukune, and the others found you. You were glad that you were able to meet up with them, as well as Kokoa who is chasing Inner Moka as a loving sister. You told them that you, and Kokoa search the basement, but Kurumu nowhere to be found and were going to check the ground floor.

Tsukune: Ah, it's good thing we found you guys first. Yukari, and Ruby found a secret hallway that could lead to Kurumu.

Mizore: Or Kuyo for that matter.

You follow the newspaper club to the ground floor, up to a empty room that seem like a dead end. Yukari, and Ruby prepare to cast their spell and point their wands towards a plain wall.

Yukari and Ruby: Magic wand, reveal the hidden path!

And the path was revealed. You thank the two witches and they smiled for that. You walk through the hallway with everyone else behind you. You stop as you saw a large red door that looked very unique compere to the others.

(Name): Hmm, could this be it?

Kokoa: Out of the way!

Kokoa kicked down the door and ran inside. You, and the other enter the room that look very large like a school's gym room. You also notice a bottomless pit at the far left and right of the room. Kokoa was at the center with a hammer in her hand, ready for combat.

Kokoa: Come on out Kuyo, I can sense your monster aura in here!

Kuyo: Hmph, so you all came.

Inner Moka, Mizore, and Ruby ran by Kokoa's side as Kuyo appeared.

(Name): Grr, Kuyo, where's Kurumu?

Kuyo points toward the area behind him and you saw Kurumu hanging on the celling by chains. She looked you with a sad face but could speak with the tape over her mouth.

(Name): Kurumu!

Yukari: Hang on Kurumu, we'll save you!

Inner Moka: You got two choices Kuyo. You can release Kurumu and save yourself from most of the beating...

Kokoa: Or we can break you right now!

Kuyo: Hmhm, how sweet of you guys that you're all willing to give me an option, but unfortunately the time is growing short and I can't choose at this moment.

Mizore: Heh, we'll be happy to choose for you.

(Name): Kuyo, is all you care is about revenge for what the newspaper club have done to you?

Kuyo: Oh revenge isn't the only thing on my mind, after I burn you all to your bones, that headmaster will be next for humiliating me. Then I will be the master of Yokai Acadamy and I will burn all who oppose me.

The flames appear at the door entrance and the bridge to Kurumu. Moka, Mizore, Ruby, and Kokoa charge at Kuyo while Yukari create a barrier around her, Tsukune, and you.
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: The Final Room

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
Kuyo enter his true form and the battle begins. Inner Moka starts it off by trying to land a powerful kick on Kuyo. He dodges the attack but Kokoa surprises him with a wrack from her hammer which causes Kuyo to fly to a wall. He retaliates by wall jumping and uses his Vortex of Fire attack damaging all the girls at once. Ruby channel her power into Mizore in which her ice claws turn into a bow of ice. The yuki-onna aim and fire one ice arrow in which it quickly turn into many arrows where Kuyo is force to use his fire on them but a few arrows manage to hit him.

Kuyo: Hmph, you all improved sense last time.

The battle lasted for about a minute where fire, ice, magic, and weapon clash each other. Until Kuyo launches a ball of fire at Kokoa in which it hit her, then exploded knocking her out cold. Everyone notice this and Kuyo laughed.

(Name): Kokoa! No!

Ko: No, Miss Kokoa you can't die here.

Inner Moka: You bastard!

Inner Moka went all out on Kuyo with Mizore throwing ice daggers at him. Ruby was charging up her next spell while Kuyo was distracted. After the spell was charged she launches many magical attacks at Kuyo, and once the attack was over Moka follow it up with a kick that knock Kuyo off the ground and into the bottomless pit. The flames disappeared and Yukari lower the barrier. Tsukune, and inner Moka ran over to Kokoa, she was just unconscious so Tsukune carry her on his back.

Ruby: We did it, everyone!

Mizore: We defeated that nasty Kuyo.

(Name): Let's go!

You ran to Kurumu to free her, as soon you release the chains, she hugged you like there was no tomorrow.

Kurumu: (Name), everyone! You came for me! Thank you all!

(Name): Heh, what can we say. Whenever you're a human or a monster. You're always a friend to us.

Yukari: Let's get out of here. Kokoa needs to get back to good health.

Tsukune: Yeah, you're right Yukari, we should get going.

Then... *BOOM*
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Vs. Kuyo

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
You looked behind you and saw Moka on the ground with many burn scars on her.

Tsukune: MOKA!

Yukari: NO!

(Name): What? No everyone!

Everyone looked at where the battle was fought, and Kuyo with Keito by his side was standing there, still alive.

Kuyo: Haha, that was a close one Keito, remind me to give you a bonus.

Keito: Anything for you master, as long revenge is achieved.

Tsukune, and Yukari was hugging Moka with tears in there eyes. You thought to yourself, ...this can't be happening...

Kuyo: Now then, where were we?

Kuyo then launches another ball of fire at Tsukune, but Mizore quickly ran in front of the attack with her arms spread out.

Mizore: Watch out! (If I can summon...)

The attack connected and blew up Mizore to oblivion with her scream echo through the room. You were on your knees, angry, scared, sad.

Kuyo: That useless snowflake knew the cost of getting in my way!

(Name): Ku... yo! I never thought... you would be this ruthless!

Kuyo: I think the witches should go next.

Yukari got behind Ruby as Kuyo charge up his attack. Then something broke inside of you. Kuyo then felt an unknown aura from you as you got back up on your feet. Then your body starts to glow and the area was flooded by a blinding light. Once the light died down a little, white feathers were slowly falling down as you descent from the air with angelic wings on your back.
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Angelic Awakening

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
You landed on the ground with newfound powers and knowledge hidden from you. Everyone notice the angelic aura pulsing from your body, realizing the seal is now broken.

Kuyo: W-What the hell? What is this? I thought you said you were a weak human.

(Name): Kurumu, Tsukune, Yukari, Ruby... grab Moka, and Kokoa and get out of here. I'll deal with Kuyo myself.

Yukari: What?! You serious?

Tsukune: You sure you can win?

Kurumu took a closer look at you and realizing something.

Kurumu thinking: (What moment, those wings, I read of this from somewhere. Now I know what Ruby meant a few days ago. (Name) is a child of an angel, wow this is the first time I see something like this. Maybe he really is my destined one.)

Ruby: Kurumu! Come on! We're going.

Tsukune pick up Moka as Kurumu pick up Kokoa, and lefted the area with Yukari, and Ruby. Kuyo didn't want them to leave so he was getting ready to launch another attack.

Kuyo: Heh, you think you will all get away that easily?

Then you instantly flew and landed in front of Kuyo, which cause him to jump a little.

Kuyo: Wha!

(Name): You hurt my friends and blackmail the students of the academy that you were responsible to protect! You're nothing more then a power-hungry imbecile, and I sick of it! And because of you... Mizore is gone!

Then before Kuyo had a chance to attack, you slash at Kuyo with a blade made of that holy aura, and follow it up with that beam you used earlier. The blast was so strong, it blew Kuyo right outside of the building. You flew outside to search where Kuyo is and found Keito using some sort powerful healing medicine on her master.

Keito: Come on, get up!

Kuyo: Grr, Keito! Run ahead and kill the remaining club members!

Keito: Right!

(Name): Oh, no, you, DON'T!

You gave Keito a heavy punch to her stomach that launched her to the sky!

Keito: YAAAAAAA-HOO-HOO-HOO-HOO-WEEE!

Kuyo: Tch, your hidden powers don't scared me. My strength has increased 10 fold thanks to that medicine!

(Name): Then let's settle this... right here... RIGHT NOW!

You and Kuyo got to your battle stance, and the final battle... begins...
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Child of an Angel

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
You were staring at Kuyo as he made the first move. He threw a fireball at you and landed a direct hit.

*BOOM*

But as the smoke slowly vanish you were unharmed and the attack was fruitless. Kuyo notice this and threw three more fireballs at you.

*BOOM* *BOOM* *BOOM*

Kuyo: ...No!

You used your wings to create a strong gust to cast away the smoke. You realizes it's your turn to attack, you slam Kuyo to the air with a punch, then you flew behind him and kick him to the other direction, and finally your channel you angelic energy to your being and smash Kuyo with a powerful pillar of light from the heaven's. Dealing heavy damage and nearly knocking Kuyo unconscious.

Kuyo: Damn... that wasn't bad. I guess I have no choice, I was hoping to save this for the headmaster.

Kuyo then focus his monster energy and turned into his ultimate form with 9 tails of power surging through him.

Kuyo: Here it is my ultimate form! And what no better way to have 9 tails with me! This is it (Name), this is your end! Your succubus will weep before she dies with the others!

(Name): (Tsukune... Moka... Yukari... Mizore... Ruby... Kokoa... Kurumu... I must protect them!) You will pay Kuyo!
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Vs. Kuyo -2nd Fight-

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
Kuyo throw fire punches, clawes, and other fire-based attacks as you strike him with a mixer of holy projectiles, angelic strikes, and even some lightning attacks here and there. He have more power then you in his new form, so you had to use your speed to avoid some of Kuyo's stronger attacks.

Kuyo: There!

Kuyo landed a hit with his claw which cause some of your feathers to shatter in the air.

(Name): Payback!

You snap your finger and the shattered feathers turned into arrows of light and shot at Kuyo.


--Meanwhile, Front of Hideout--

Kurumu and the other manage to escape the hideout with Moka, and Kokoa barely alive. Tsukune, and Kurumu stopped and thought about helping you for a moment, but they knew the vampire sisters need medical care ASAP.

Kurumu: Dammit! Why does it have to my (Name) or the sisters?

Tsukune: Wish we could be by his side, but Moka...

Ruby: We can only hope (Name) can win.

????: (Name) can do it, we just need to have faith in him.

Yukari: ...That voice! ...Could it be?


--Battle against Kuyo--

You and Kuyo were both trading blows with each. Kuyo slams you with his elbow, you attack him with a 3-hit combo by summoning a divine sword, he tries to burn you with a flaming tornado, you shock him by calling down lightning strikes.

Kuyo: Almost there, you're just a few hits away from your death!

(Name): I will defeat you Kuyo... there's too many people that I care so much, I can't let you have your way.

Then...
1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.title: Hope and Faith

1211211112211212121111222112111112212111.content:
Kurumu: ...I was pretty sure I heard Mizore voice... guess it wasn't.

Then Inner Moka, and her sister Kokoa, open their eyes, and moan in pain a little. Wondering what happen.

Tsukune: Easy there Moka, you took a good blast of that attack earlier.

Inner Moka: Where's (Name)?

Yukari: He's fighting Kuyo by himself! He's a child of an angel!

Kokoa: No way! An ang... owowow!

Kurumu: Don't talk you two, you need to save your strength. Come on everyone it's getting late.

As soon they took one step a large group of monsters appeared. Each wearing the Security Enforcement outfit.

Minion A: Well, well, well. Is the newspaper club leaving early?

In the end everyone said that until they find Kuyo they have to have at least be in groups of two. Moka and Tskune, Yukari and Mizore, and you and Kurumu. From then on you all would stick to each other like glue so that if anyone gets seperated that would mean Kuyo would be making his move. After that everyone was on high alert.

Soon after the day passed you went back to your room with Kurumu following next to you. You werevery worried if something happened to her. And you knew Kuyo would try and go after her firs the moment he would start keeping true to his word about what would happen if you told them.

"(Name) can I ask you something?", asked Kurumu.

"Sure anything.", you replied.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Tell them what happened

choices: You wake up and you're late for class.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
(name) Sure I don't mind, Let's sleep and get some rest. Tomorrow's gonna be a big day.

Kurumu smiles and kisses you.

Kurumu: Yeah. Can I sleep in your arms?

(name) Heh does a vampire suck blood?

You and Kurumu get into bed together and you hug Kurumu tightly but gently. Even though you were in bed with Kurumu you felt dreadfully nervous. After all you were facing Kuyo one of the most powerful yokai ever. You couldn't help but tremble in fear. Kurumu noticed you were trembling so placed you hand in hers to help you relax.

Kurumu: Are you scared?

(name) Yeah. I mean I'm scared that someone"s gonna get hurt or worse.

Kurumu: I know, but we have to stop Kuyo. If we don't will?

(name) I know, but......

Kurumu: I got it. I'll make a promise. If we get out of this alive, I'll........ give you my virginity.

When you heard that your face blushed crimson red.

(name) Are..... are you serious?

Kurumu: Yup. I promise. Sucubis honor.

You still felt scared but you felt a little better.

(name) Thank you Kurumu.

Kurumu kisses you passionately and smiles.

Kurumu: Your welcome. Just remember we'll always be there for you no matter what. Now let's get some sleep we got graduation and Kuyo to face tomorrow.

(name) Right. Good Night Kurumu.

And you went to sleep knowing that if there was gonna be any trouble you'll always count on Kurumu and the gang to help you every step of the way.

The next morning.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Being together while we can.

choices: Yes. I'll join you. (O_0 Dude if you choose this option good luck)
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You woke up early. The sun was barely out but you didn't have time to look at the scenery. You knew today was the day when you had to face Kuyo. You think about his request and then you think about Kurumu and your friends. You felt lucky having good friends like them who'll have your back no matter what. Then you made a decision.

(name) Right. I have to face Kuyo alone. I can't put my friends in danger anymore. I may be a human, but there's no way I'm gonna let them get hurt because of me.

You get dressed and you were ready to go. Before you walk out the door you look at the sleeping Kurumu. You walk over to Kurumu and kiss her without waking her up.

(name) I'm sorry. Kurumu.

And so you left heading for the northern tunnel outside Yokai Academy. You walked outside the school and was just about to go through the front gates when you heard a voice.

(voice) And where are you going whee?

You look and there on your shoulder was Ko. Kokoa's bat.

(name) Ko! What are you doing here?

Ko: I'm just flapping around whee. What I wanna know is what are you doing?

(name) I'm going to face Kuyo.

Ko: What are you crazy?!? That guy's a S class monster just like Ms. Kokoa and Moka! He'll kill you faster than you can say boo!

(name) I don't care. I have to go. And don't you go telling either.

Ko: Well okay it's your funeral. Not exactly a way to go on graduation.

And with that Ko flew away. As for you: you pass through the front gates and walk through the forest. You recall the first time you came to this academy. How you met Kurumu Tskune and the others. You also remember your first kiss with Kurumu. So much has happened since you came here. You didn't think you were going to have friends when you came to this school, but now you do and you were going to protect them no matter what. Soon you arrive at the tunnel where you and Kuyo were supposed to meet. You look but didn't see any sign of Kuyo anywhere.

(name) Kuyo! Where are you?!? I know you're here! Come on out!

Suddenly a giant flame appeared at the entrance to the tunnel and out stepped Kuyo. He wasn't alone he had a gang of monsters with him including Keito.

Kuyo: So..... I guess you had guts showing up after all. I commend you on your courage.

(name) Of course I did. I can't just stand idly by while you hurt my friends! This is between you and me got it? And I wont let you hurt them anymore!

Kuyo:Heh. intriguing. So have you made a decision? Will you join us and get power? Or will you stand against us and be killed?

Even though you were against odds and Kuyo was way more powerful the answer was obvious.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: You wake up early

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"I expected more from you.", Kuyo said. He then sent out bursts of flame right toward you and was about to scortch you alive. Then you leaped out of the way, barley dodging the attack.

"This ends here! Kurumu is counting on me to end this ounce and for all. And by god I will not disappoint her!", you said.

"Then get ready to die. Allow me to show you the ultimate power in the world!", Kuyo yelled firing three heat blasts from his fists and mouth. "Now I'll show just how pitiful you inferior lifeforms are!", Kuyo stated as he rushed towards you.

You stood your ground and readied for what ever it was you he had coming at you.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: No way!

choices: You were suddenly lifted into the air
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Kuyo: Take this!

He fires 3 fire balls at you, you dodge the first two, but the third scrapes your right arm on your clothing. You quickly take off your shirt before you catch fire. Kuyo's followers were cheering for Kuyo saying "Kill that worthless human!" or "Destroy him!" You dodge and dodge, but you could only dodge so much. You began to get tired and weak. Kuyo laughs evily and charges another fire ball to throw at you.

Kuyo: You look so pathetic right now. All you can do is dodge. I almost feel sorry you.

You didn't say anything for you were out of breath and could hardly move. It took all your energy just to dodge the attacks. You knew you had to attack him or at least do something

(name thinking) I gotta think of something quick but what do I do?

Kuyo: I'll tell you what because I'm in a good mood I'll let you go if you surrender and you renounce your love for that sucubis.

(name) What did you say?

Kuyo: Yes. Need I say it again? Renouce your love for that sucubis and I'll spare you and her miserable life. Although I'd much rather rape her just for spite. She's watsed on a boy like you. After all your a lowly human who can't even fight back and your nothing, more but the scum on my shoe just like that slut of a sucubis.

All of Kuyo's gang laughed loudly. The laughter echoed in your ears and you processed what Kuyo just said. Then you completely lost your temper. You charged at Kuyo trying to punch him, but every punch you threw Kuyo dodged. Then Kuyo gave you a hard punch in the gut, knocking the wind out of you. Then he gave you a powerful kick to face. You were sent flying and you crashed right into a rock.

Kuyo: Heh too easy.

Keito: (laughs) Well done great leader.

The monsters cheer and Kuyo raised up his right hand for victory. You were beaten up pretty bad blood gushed from you arm and head. It looked like you were dead, but you remembered Kurumu and your friends lives were on the line. Hell Yokai Academy was at stake. You struggle to your feet coughing up blood as you used all your strength to stand.

(name) I.............(cough) won't let.....you hurt my.....frirends.......(cough)........especially....Kurumu.

Kuyo: You're still alive are you? I'm impressed. I thought you'd be dead by now. You know since you've got spirit I'll give you one last chance. Join me or die.

(name) Screw you! You.... bastard of a..... bitch....I'd rather die...than join you!

Now Kuyo was mad by that comment.

Kuyo: Very well. I'll just kill you.

He surrounded himself in flames and turned into his true form. A 4 tailed fox demon with tails made off flames. They spin around and made a giant ring of fire and fires it at you.

Kuyo: Now die by my vortex of fire!!!

You look at the attack coming at you and you realise that you can't move because youre hurt to badly. You close your eyes and waited for the end.

When......
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Final Battle (Alone)

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You had no clue as to why you were suddenly lifted up in the air but then you noticed long fingernails around your arms. "Kurumu!"

She managed to save you just in time before Kuyo annialated you. "Never do that again (Name)! I nearly lost you just now!", she said angrily.

"I'm sorry. I won't leave your side again. And thanks for saving me that was way too close.", you replied.

"Hahahahaaa! Your weak just like the rest of your friends! They don't deserve to stay here in this world. In MY WORLD! Now prepare to face oblivion!", Kuyo said.

Kuyo fired five simoultaneous fire blasts aimed right for you and Kurumu. She managed to avoid all of them but one of her wings got singed. She then landed on her feat carrying you safley away from Kuyo.

Kurumu then charged at Kuyo's demon form and then tapped into her inner strength as a succumbus. She felt the intense love you and her shared and the more she felt it the stronger she grew.

"You got this Kurumu! I know you can do it!", you cheered.

The cheering only made Kurumu stronger and soon a purple aura surrounded her body. She then flew even faster and then she reached out to the middle of Kuyo's demon form to try and impale his body.

She then went directly passed the 4 tailed fox blaze and managed to grab Kuyo's body piercing his chest in doing so.

Kurumu then retracted one of her hands out of Kuyo saying to him,"Never again will or yours threaten my loved ones!"

Kuyo coughed up a gallon of blood and slowly was on the brink of death. "(cough)....(cough)... You just a lovestruck ignerant girl...(cough)...who thinks she loves a human..in the end you will know that we are supirior to them.... we were never meant to cooexsist......", he said as he died.

Keito was furious and was about to stab Kurumu in the head!
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: You were suddenly lifted into the air

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Keito nearly had the knife she drawed right in Kuumu's head when you redirected Keito's attack and it hit your left shoulder. You you clenched your teeth in pain but you were more than willing to suffer more if it meant saving Kurumu.

Kurumu turned around and saw what you did. She then grabbed Keito by the throat and she slammed Keito's face in a hard pile of rocks 5 times!

Keito was completly wiped out but wasn't dead. Kurumu then rushed over to you and got the knife out of you.

"(Name), you saved my life...", she said.

"Guess I finaly returned the favor. I'm just happy that your safe...UGH!", you grunted in pain.

"Hold on just lay still help will come. Ko has to have alerted everyone by now.", she said.

"Go on. I'll be fine, it'll be faster this way.", you suggested hoping to get medical attention asap.

"No. I'm not leaving you. Not now, not ever. That includes you promising to do the same.", she said.

"I promise. I'll never leave you again, I love you with all of my heart Kurumu Kurono.", you confessed from the bottom of your heart.

"I love you too (Name). With every heartbeat that pumps my blood it will always keep in time with yours.", Kurumu said from her deepest feelings.

Then you both floated up in the air surrounded by a pink light. You then rose out from the cave and were suddenly at the graduation ceremony. Everyone saw you two in that beautiful light seeing that it represented the beauty of your love for eachother.

You then hugged Kurumu and she embraced you gently but firmly. You two floated down and right on the stands in front of thee school. You noticed your wound healed while in that ball of light, "Well thats conveinient.", you thought.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Take the hit!

choices: The most arbitrary time to stop doing it! (Someone shows up)
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You and Kurumu cellebrated your victory against Kuyo and acknoaleged you true love towards each other.It was one of the happiest moments in both of your lives. You were inside your room making out together letting yourselves express how deeply in love you both were.

You two stopped and took a breath,"I wish we could spend everyday like this. Just us together, it's all I want.", said Kurumu.

"I feel the same way my love.", you replied.

"Wait. (Name) remember when I said I'd let you take my-", you cut her off by putting you finger on her lips.

"Let's do it tonight. Right now, nothing else can make me think otherwise that you and me are perfect. I love you so much my lustful succumbus.", you told her.

"And I love you my handsome and very direct human.", she replied.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: After the ceremony

choices: Save Kurumu with a power you somehow discover
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Suddenly a shockwave of energy redirected Kuyo's attack away from you.

(name) What the...

Then you heard a familiar voice.

(voice) Giving up already? You silly boy.

Then a familiar red haired girl landed in front of you.

Kuyo: What?!?

(name) Kokoa!

She wasn't alone. Tskune and the rest of gang came to the rescue. Yukari hand her wand ready and Mizore's ice claws were ready to fight. Kurumu swooped down and landed next to you. You were quite surprised to see them.

Kurumu: (name)! Are you ok?

(name) I'm fine ,but what are you guys doing here?!?

Kurumu: We should be asking you the same thing! Why did you go on own like that!?!?

(name) I......I..... I didn't want to be a burden anymore! I was scared that you'll get hurt because of me! So I.......

Tskune: (name). We knew that we gonna get hurt or die, but it's ok we'll always have you're back.

(name) I don't understand why...? why would you go so far? Just for me?

Yukari: You need to ask? We're friends aren't we?

Mizore: whether you're a human or a monster there's always room for friendship.

Moka: We'll never abandon you and we'll always protect you no matter what.

(name) Thanks guys. (sniffs) I don't know what to say.

Kuyo: Well well well if it isn't the newspaper club. You saved me the trouble of tracking you down so now I can kill all of you at once!

Tskune: You're just as ruthless as you were before Kuyo. We beat you before and we'll beat you again!

Kuyo: Heh I'd like to see you try. Get them!

All of Kuyo's monsters charged at us but the gang was ready.

Tskune: Kurumu! Get (name) out of here! We'll take of this!

Kurumu: Right! Be careful!

She picks you up and flies you to safety. She didn't stop till she flew on top of the rooftop of one of the school building.

Kurumu: Are you ok? You're hurt pretty bad.

(name) I'm fine but we gotta do something! We gotta tell the Headmaster!

Kurumu: You're right. Let's go!

Just then Tskune and Moka burst through the door running toward the you and Kurumu. They both looked frantic and they were screaming about something, but you couldn't tell what said until they got closer.

Moka: (name)! Kurumu! Run!!!!!

Tskune: Kuyo's heading this way!!! Run!

Then you turned around and saw a flame arrow heading straight toward Kurumu.

What do you do?!?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: We are friends.

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
(name) KURUMU!!!!! MOVE!!!!

You push Kurumu out of the way and the arrow pierces you in the stomach and engulfs you burning your body completely as you fall to the ground. Kurumu, Tskune, and Moka look in horror as Kuyo appears, but this time he wasn't a four tailed fox. He was human except his body was cloaked in blue flames, retained his 4 tails and his hair was longer.

Kuyo: Heh Why would that human sacifice himself to save the sucubis? Good riddance. At least I took care of one little bug.

Tskune: No.... (name)......Wake up! (name) please!!

Moka: Please.....No......

Kurumu stared at your body in horror then she screamed with horror/despair so loud that it echoed throughout the school.

Kurumu: DAMN YOU KUYO!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Then Moka screamed too and in a explosion of raw power she transformed to her true vampire form without Tskune removing her rosary.

Moka: You bastard! I kill you!

Moka and charged at Kuyo hungry for revenge. Moka gave Kuyo a hard and devastating punch that sent Kuyo flying, but he regained his composure and landed safety.

Kuyo: Oh. I guess I made you mad huh? Don't worry you'll join your pathetic friend soon enough.

Meanwhile Kurumu and Tskune were still trying to wake you up, but to no avail. Just then Yukari, Kokoa, and Mizore arrive.

Yukari: Hey everyone! We're here to help!

Mizore: We finally took care of Kuyo's goons.

Then they see you. Yukari screams for horror, Mizore covers her mouth in horror and Kokoa stands there shocked.

Kokoa: What the hell happened!?!

Tskune: Kuyo somehow found and ambushed us and.....

Kurumu was crying like crazy and hugging your seemingly lifeless body.

Kurumu: He....(hic) sacificed himself to save me......(sob). He saved my life. And now he's dead....

Then Kokoa was shrouded with a purple aura and she was pissed. Then she entered the fray

Kokoa: That bastard's gonna pay!

Kuyo: Get mad all you want it's too late. Your human friend is gone.

It looked hopeless for you, but then......

Yukari: Hey look at that!

Everyone looks at where Yukari was pointing. She was pointing to your finger. It was twitching.

Mizore: If his finger is twitching then....

Kurumu: (name)'s still alive!!!

Tskune felt your arm and his face brightened with hope.

Tskune: I've got a pulse! (name)'s still alive, but just barely. We have to do something and fast,

Yukari: But what do we do Tskune?

Tskune: i can only think of one way to save him.

Kurumu: Please tell us Tskune!

What is Tskune's idea?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: You take the hit. (D= gasp!!!)

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"There may be a way to save him. Moka could inject her blood in (Name) allowing him to recover enough so we can get him to the infirmary.", suggested Tskune.

"No! If we do that (Name) won't be human anymore! He'll never be human again. What would he think if he woke up to never be the same when he saw his own family and they saw him as a monster?!", Kurumu protested.

"We have no choice. He won't make it unless he somehow had superhuman strength or recovery! Since he can't that means an injection from another monster is the only option!", said Tskune.

"Then what about me? I'll inject my blood in him. At least then he'll have someo one he trusts to confine to his trama?", said Kurumu.

"I'm not sure if that will work.", replied Moka.

"Listen both of you we have to do something or (Name)'s not going to make it! We either let Moka or Kurumu inject their blood in him. It doesn't matter who does it!", said Tskune frantically.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Inject vampire blood in you

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"OK Kurumu we'll let you inject your blood in him. Hopefully it will buy him time till we can get the medical staff and save his life.", Tskune said.

Kurumu then pulled out the medical kit they had for the injection and took a sample of her blood so she could inject you with hers. You began to have a slower pulse rate and you were on the verge of death.

Kurumu then injected you with her blood sample and from that moment on you were no longer human. Kurumu's blood was now in your veins and you became a succumbus. Your bloods metabolism was accelerated to where your wounds began to heal but you still needed to get to the medical wing.

You passed out with Kurumu flying you over to the medical wing praying that you would make it.

About an hour later you awoke with Moka greeting you. "Oh your awake now. The nurse said you were going to make a quick recovery.", she said cheerfully.

"Tell me how many times this year I wound up in here this year? Because I swear I am not doing this on purpose.", you joked.

"Hey in all seriousness why do I feel so different? My body feels stronger and my back is aching.", you said.

Moka reluctantly explained but she knew you had to be told the truth. "You were hurt very badly. In fact you were close to death to the point where we truly thought you died in Kurumu's arms. But you were still alive but we had to do something drastic.". Moka explained.

"We had to inject you with Kurumu's blood in order to save your life. She knew it would mean taking away your life as a human but Kurumu did what she could to save your life. Her blood turned you into a Succumbus.", she confessed.

You were blown away by the news anger, frustration, and saddness hit you all at ounce. But you still were calm about it despite the circumstances. You knew how drastic your life would change, but it meant that you and Kurumu were now one.

Her blood was coursing through your veins and now you were part of her race now. What would have devastated anyone else you found the lighter side of it. You were going to be apart of your girlfriend's race but also truly part of her family.

You were now permenantly connected to her with nothing to possibly break it. "I don't know what to think but, I'm not angry about it.", was all you said.

Kurumu was laying on your bed with her head on your legs hoping you were alive. She then noticed movment from the covers and wok up. Sh cried but not tears of joy about your recovery but you losing your humanity forever.

"Oh god I am so sorry (Name)! We couldn't think of any other way. Forgive me! Please find it in your heart to forgive me!", Kurumu begged.

"You have nothing for me to forgive you for. Because of this now I can cross over to your world. Now I can be part of your family, we can live at your home, you can teach me how to control my newfound power. But most importantly I can finally protect you now.", you said.

"(Name) you idiot, you protected me without any power or skills. All you had was our love and now it's made it stronger to where we will never have it destroyed. I love you (Name) and promise me never to leave my side again.", Kurumu ordered.

" I promise Kurumu. And I love you too, even if we are miles or worlds apart I'll always feel you in my heart.", you said.

You two kissed passionatly and embraced each other feeling like you two would be together forever...
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Kurumu

choices: You get to her home (But something is still not right)
The bus makes it to Kurumu's world (But Kuyo is stalking you guys secretly)
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Even though you were moving with Kurumu one thing was still unresolved that troubled you while you were packing your things. Kuyo just vanished right in the middle of all the insanity. You probably just missed something or it all happened while you were unconscious but something was not right.

Kurumu came by and kissed your cheek asking if you were ready to leave. "Hey Kurumu what happened to Kuyo while I was out of it? I mean last thing I remember was that he was still fighting you guys while I was incapacitated.", you asked her.

"He escaped while the others held him off while I took you to the infirmary. I thought you knew already?", she answered.

"Oh good. I just was wondering.", you were still a bit concerned about his current status but it wasn't like him to just leave from a fight while you were vulnerable. Something seemed like it wasn't really the truth but maybe it was you being paranoid.

Kurumu walked over to the bus stop where everyone was there about to say goodbye. Tskune bro hugged you while the other girls hugged Kurumu. You all said your goodbyes and you and Kurumu left for her home.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: You move to Kurumu's home

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You make it to Kurumu's homeworld to see that it is very nice and scerene. It almost appeared to be like home only with a edge of supernatural to it.

You hug Kurumu glad to be with her but something was not right. Kuyo's defeat didn't seem like it was a total one. And there was that strangness in the back of your head telling you it's not right.

"(Name)? You all right? You've been on edge even before we left.", she said.

"I'm just nervous is all my love.", you ansered her.

"Well don't worry because my mother is really nice. But she may embearess us to a considerable degree. Probably expects that we already had sex by now.", she mumblled to herself.

You blushed hearing the last sentence and wished you two could get intiment but not yet.

"Hmm I'm glad were together at last. I am just so much in love with you I don't want us apart ever.", she said dozing off.

"I love you too Kurumu. I won't leave you ever.", you answered.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: On the way home

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Tskune: Yukari you can heal with your magic right?

Yukari: Yes, but there's no way I can heal him with his condition. My powers are too weak.

Tskune: What if you all combined your monster energies? That way Yukari's healing spell can be twice as strong.

Mizore: That's a good idea, but will it work?

Kurumu: It has too! (name)'s life depends on it!

Kuyo: I don't think so! If you think you can bring that human back to life you can go ahead and try!

Tskune: Moka! Kokoa! We need you two to stall Kuyo while we bring (name) back!

Moka: OK! We'll do what we can! Let's go Kokoa!

Kokoa: Right! Big Sister!

They both charged at Kuyo and Kuyo fired his fireballs at them. Meanwhile Yukari focused and began casting the healing spell.

Yukari: Okay everyone place your hands on my wand and focus!

Everyone placed their hands on her wand. The wand's spell eveloped your bod, but your body slowy began to heal.

Yukari: It's working! Keep going!

Tskune: Come guys! We have to bring (name) back no matter what!

Mizore: Please (name)! Please be okay!

Kurumu was giving it all she had most of all. She wiped her tears and focused with everything she had.

Kurumu: Please (name)! I need you! I can't imagine life without you! Please come back! (name)! (name)!

Meanwhile deep in your mind everything was white and you fast asleep then you heard a voice.

(voice) Wake up. Wake up (name).

(name) Who's that? Who's calling me?

You open your eyes and look around then you hear the voice again.

(voice) (name) you must get up.

You get up and look around and in front of you was a man that looked just like you, but older. At first you didn't know who he was, but then you recognise him.

(name) D-d-dad? Is that you?

(your dad) Yes my son.

(name) B,but how are you...... How are you here?

(your dad) There's no time to explain. You must wake up. You have to defeat Kuyo and save your friends.

(name) But how? I'm just a human. Even if I do have powers I can't even protect my friends from danger. Not even Kurumu.

Then your dad placed his hands on your shoulders and looked at you with calming eyes.

(your dad) I believe in you son. I placed you in Yokai academy for a reason. To help you understand that as long as you have a bond you can do anything. Besides you do have a special power and humans and monsters can live together in harmony.

(name) What? I do? but if I have powers why didn't I.......

(your dad) I had your power sealed away so the human's wouldn't suspect. I wish I could tell you more, but there's no time. You have to hurry! Your friends need you!

Then your dad began to disappear.

(name) Dad! Wait! Don't leave! I don't even know how to.......

(your dad) Protect your friends and believe in yourself. I'm counting on you son.

(name) Dad!

But it was too late as soon as your dad disappeared everything began to fade to black. Then you heard a voice and a voice you knew all to well.

Kurumu: (name)! (name)! Please wake up!

(name) Kurumu!

You look around in the darkness trying to find Kurumu. Then you see a bright light you ran towards it. It grew brighter, and brighter. Meanwhile Moka and Kokoa were still fighting Kuyo. Kokoa was dying and all you do was watch. Then you another vision flashed before your eyes. The same woman that was holding the baby gave the baby to a man by the portal.

(woman) Take our son and go all hold them off.

(man) But..

(woman) Don't worry. I've got no intention of dying, I promise to protect you. No matter what.
(vision ends)

(name) That's right. I made a promise. A promise to protect my friends. I'll protect them. I won't let them die!

Your body began to glow with a red aura. Then you broke free from the webbing.

Keito: What!?! How'd you break free?!?

(name) I won't let you......... I'LL WON'T LET YOU KILL MY FRIENDS!!!!!!!

Your body exploded with a powerful red aura, your left eye become red, but it was slitted. Your right hand transformed into a red claw and your teeth turned into fangs.

Keito: what the hell?!?

(name) Keito!!!!

You appeared before Keito and gave her a powerful punch slamming her into the wall. Keito coughed up some blood and looked at your new form with fear.

Keito: what the hell just happened? He's completely different now His eyes are filled with bloodlust and he's got a powerful monster energy within him. Where the hell did this power come from?

You then let out a powerful and demonic roar that echoed throughout the town reaching the inn. When Tskune and the others heard this they gasped.

Tskune: What the hell was that!?!

Moka: I don't know. Whatever it was it sounded like a monster!

Kurumu: It came from the direction where (name) was headed!

Moka: Then let's go! He might be in trouble!

Meanwhile you were beating the bloody hell out of Keito! You slammed her in the face with the wall, dragged her on the ground and sent her flying. Keito threw up a gallon of blood and struggled to get up.

Keito: I'm......done for......please help me.....mistress.....

You stood over Keito and let out another roar and prepared to strike her with the final blow. Then a green flame appeared before you and was about to strike you but you dodged it by jumping out of the way. Then a woman with a powerful staff and a crow appeared.

Keito: Mistress Tsubaki! You've come to save me!

Tsubaki: So you're the boy I've heard about.

Keito: Mistress!

Tsubaki: Shush Keito! It was your fault for provoking this boy. Besides he can't even control himself right now. Let's go. Let's leave him be so he can go on his rampage. I've got plans for him that will come into fruition soon enough.

Keito: Yes mistress.

You didn't know what was going on, but you wanted to get to Keito before she got away. You threw a powerful punch, but it was too late. Keito and the woman called Tsubaki disappeared. You roared with rage by letting them get away. Then you looked at the blood on your hands. You had a strange feeling. A rush of adrenaline went through your body. You felt the need to kill to kill everyone in your path. Then you saw Kokoa. She was covered in blood. It was intoxicating to you. You felt drawn to her blood. You wanted her to spill more blood. Kokoa opened her eyes and se when she saw you she was scared.

Kokoa: What the....(name) stop! You're freaking me out!

You didn't stop. You raised your claw about to kill Kokoa when.......

(voice) (NAME) STOP!!! WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING!?!?!

You turned around and you saw......
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Refuse

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content: Will you have Tskune, Kurumu, and the gang knock some sense into you to stop or try to have Kurumu calm you down?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Fight you or calm you down?

choices: Wake up (With Kurumu watching you recover)
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You were seething with rage and anger, your body felt numb and you wanted to destroy everythng in sight it felt like. Then you saw every stare at you and saw what you were at your worst.

You weren't fazed by it but then Kurumu walked up to you slowly but didn't show fear, but sadness. Tskune tried to get her away from you but Moka stopped him and managed to let her try and calm you.

You looked at her with your undivided attention fixated on her. Your face showed pure anger and even your mind was on fire. But your heart was feeling tempered.

You saw the look she gave seeing you like this and she held out her arm and garsped yours. She drawed you into a hug where she let you feel the gentle embrace. Your eyes then shed rivers of tears and as the hug grew tighter the more you returned to normal.

You placed your arms around her accepting her embrace with open arms. Your eyes stopped glowing and you stayed in her arms until you felt like you would pass out from the exhertion.

Everyone else gasped in relief and let you and Kurumu have your moment. "I'm sorry Kurumu...", you said passing out from the exhertion of transforming. Kurumu picked up your body and took you back to the academy.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: A tender act

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Later back at the academy you woke up, but you were all by yourself.

(name) Where......?

Then you remember what happened. When you went berserk after Keito tried to kill Kokoa, and then you almost tried to kill Kokoa. You looked at your hands. They were both shaking. You can almost smell the guilt and blood on your hands. You punched on the bed and began to cry in anger.

(name) What the hell is wrong with me!?! Not only did I lose control of myself I could've hurt Kurumu and Kokoa!

You remember the look she gave you and that made you upset even more.

(name) Kurumu probably hates me. And I can't blame her.

You tears of anger continued to flow. You screamed at yourself "What are you a baby? Stop crying!" ,but the tears didn't stop. Then you heard a knock on the door. You wiped away the tears as best you could so you wouldn't look like you were crying.

(name) Come in.

The door opens and in comes.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Wake up (Nobody there yet)

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
The door opened and in came Kurumu. She came in with a relieaved yet sad look on her face. Possibly in response to what you were feeling.

She sat by you holding your hand which helped you stop heding your tears. You hugged her without muttering a word to her, you were just unbelivably greatful she had not a scratch on her due to your transformation.

"Kurumu, I am soooo sorry. For everything. I almost killed everyone...I almost killed you! How can I be with you if I could snap at any moment?", you asked crying like a child to her mother.

Kurumu held you tighter but allowing you to cry, "Shhh, it'll be fine (Name), I promise you.", she said.

"I can't live with myself knowing I could kill you without even knowing what I'm doing. You deserve better...", you said thinking being with her wasn't worth the risk.

"Don't say that! I have all I need...the best boyfriend anyone could ask for.", she replied.

"A boyfriend who could sparatically rampage across the world at any moment?", you answered.

"NO! I love you (Name)!!! I love you even with that. (Name), loving somebody..I mean to REALLY love someone so much, means to see past their problems. All hey can do is help them cope with them and improve upon it. I don't care how dangerous it is. But I won't live with myself if I broke up with you because I was afraid of you..when I love you more than life itself. You always never doubted me, and I will never doubt you.", she said.

You cried even more than earlier, you tried to be a man but her words were so sincere and beautiful that it broke down your resilience.

"I love you Kurumu...I love you with all of my soul...I won't let you go ever...", you said.

In that moment you two claped your arms around each other and Kurumu laid on top of you. You two made love together but it was unclear as to the details...
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Love ones flaws

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"I don't get it? How has (Name) been able to do any of that?", asked Ruby.

"My guess he's had it since birth. Except it's shown itself now. Maybe he's inherited it from his mother.", Moka thought.

"Yeah but jeez how he tore up the street and how he acted... I didn't know what to do if we had to fight him.", Tskune commented.

"Maybe he's yet to have control over it. Perhaps training with a monster could be practical."< suggested Ruby.

"Kurumu?", Tskune thought.

"No, that won't work, those two are inserperable and can't disipline each other. We need someone strong, cold, and a trustworthy friend.", Moka said. Then Tsukne turned toward her and looked at her rosary.

"Oh god...really? Is it a little too dangerouse?", Moka responded.

"It's our only option. Inner Moka can deal real punishment and she won't rip (Name's) head off. She's our only option.", Tskune said.

She didn't like it but it was an elegant soultion in order to whip your powers into proper shape. As dawn broke you and Kurumu woke up together naked. She got up and went to get dressed. You felt really steallar from the night you had, though you were too relaxed to even care.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: What to do with you?

choices: Yes I'll do it on one condition.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
When Inner Moka came in you were surprised.

(name) Moka! Why are you in super vampire mode?

Inner Moka: You. Come with me.

She grabbed you by the back of your collar and dragged you outside.

(name) Hey! Moka! What are you doing!?!

Inner Moka: I'm going to train you to control your monster energy. When I'm through with you you're gonna the toughest monster on the planet!

(name) Hey! You could at least be more gentle!

Inner Moka then let you go when you and her were outside. Then she threw a mean punch at you, but you barely dodged it.

(name) Moka!! What the hell!! Are you trying to kill me!?!

Inner Moka: This all part of your training so stop your whining and fight me!

She kept punching and and kicking you and you kept dodging and dodging. Meanwhile Tskune, Kurumu, and the gang were watching from afar.

Mizore: Wow. Inner Moka sure knows strange ways of training.

Yukari: That's for sure.

As Kurumu looked on she began to worry. Tskune placed his hand on her shoulder to reassure her.

Tskune: Don't worry Kurumu. (name)'s gonna be fine.

Kurumu: I hope you're right Tskune.

Rubi: Besides this is the only way we can think of to help him. He has to gain control over his powers or the next time he goes berserk he could really kill someone. He almost killed Kokoa so its for the best. You understand that right.

Kurumu: Yes. I know.

Yukari: Speaking of which how is she?

Rubi: Kokoa? She's fine, but she's suffered multiple wounds from Keito. What scares me is Keito was strong enough to take down a S class monster like Kokoa.

Tskune: I know. After Kokoa told us what happened when she fought Keito, I've been getting a bad feeling. If this mistress of hers gave her that power then.....

Mizore: We might need to be prepared to fight.

There was a long silence and Kurumu clenched her fists. Then they all heard a yelp and you fell flat on your back.

Inner Moka: Come on is that all you got?

(name) Can you blame me?!? I don't even know how to use my powers ok?!?

Inner Moka: Enough! Back on your feet! Or do you want put Kurumu in harms way again!?!

As soon as you heard these words you began seeing flashes of Kurumu being hurt before your eyes. You couldn't bear seeing Kurumu hurt again and that made you get the same feeling you did when you fought Keito.

(name) No....I won't let that happen. I WON'T LET THAT HAPPEN!!!!!!!!

Once more your body exploded with a red aura and you transformed.

Tskune: Holy crap! It's happened again!

Kurumu: Moka pushed him way to far! We have to stop him!

Rubi: No Kurumu! Stay put!

Yukari: But Rubi....!

Rubi: It's for his own good! He has to master his powers remember?

Kurumu: Rubi.....!!

Then Kurumu looked at Rubi's hands they were clenched and shaking. She then realised that Rubi was trying her best to be strong, because she knew that this was for the best. Meanwhile Moka prepared herself to fight you as you were in the same state as before.

Inner Moka: OK. Come and me (name).

In reponse you let out a huge demonic roar that made even Moka sweat with fear. You charged at Moka claw raised and were about to attack when an intruder stepped in between them. It was the old woman you met before , but Tskune and the gang didn't know this yet.

Inner Moka: What the....

Kurumu: Who is that?

Tskune: I don't know.

When the old woman saw you she shook her head.

Old woman: Goodness. It would seem you still have a lot to learn boy.

She appeared in front of you and touched your forehead. Suddenly you returned to normal.

Mizore: She just.....

Yukari: Stopped (name) with one finger!

Inner Moka: What are you doing?

Tskune and the others ran up to her and you snapped out of it. When you saw the old woman you were...... well.....

(name) Hey! It's you again you old woman!

Kurumu: You mean the old woman who knows about your mother?

(name) What do you want this time? Another riddle?

Old woman: I'm here to help you boy. For it seems you need it.

Inner Moka: I don't know who you are, but we were doing just fine training thank you.

Old woman: By making it worse you mean? If you keep awakening him like this he'll be consumed by his own energy and he will become a ruthless monster.

Kurumu: Really?

Old woman: Yes. That's why I'm here. Let me help you boy. You need all the help you can get.

(name) And why should I trust you?

Old woman: Because I know what monster you are and I know how to control it. And I'll tell you a little about your mother.

(name) My mom?

Old woman: Yes. So what do you say? Will you let me help you?

You pondered about this until you say......
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Training

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"You tell me who you are and were all friends here.", you said.

"Believe me you'll know me soon enough. But I can tell you I was very close to your father and mother for a very long time. And your father..was speacial to me at the time you were born.", she answered.

"You knew them when I was born?", you asked.

"Yes... I was a different woman at that time, and your mother was welll kept in my thoughts.", she said.

"Alright, that's enough. Let's start with the training shall we?", you said in excietment.

"Good let's begin!", she yelled.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: A friend of the family...

choices: Fight a monster made from the negative emotions in your heart
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
(name) OK! Let's control this thing!

Old woman: Now hold on young man. You're not ready for that yet.

(name) Why not?

Kurumu: Yeah!

Old woman: Well for starters let me show you something.

She held out he hands and a orange flame generated from her hands and became a sword.

Tskune: Whoa!

Rubi: A sword made of flames?

Yukari: That's awesome!

Old woman: This technique is well known through your family. Your mother was the master of thi s technique.

(name) Seriously?

Old woman: Yes and since your her son you must learn this technique.

(name) But how can I do that? I can't even control my own power let alone make a sword thingy like that.

Old woman: Remember what I told you about conquering your inner hero? To conquer this inner hero you must have a will of steel, a courage that burns flames themselves and control the power that flows through your body. If you do this conquering your inner hero should be do trouble at all.

At first you doubting yourself if you could do this, but then Kurumu put her hands on your shoulders.

Kurumu: (name) don't worry were all here for you.

Outer Moka: Yeah you can do it!

Mizore: We all got your back.

Yukari; Yeah!

(name) Thanks guys.

Old woman: The training will be difficult. Are you ready?

You looked at the Old woman with determination.

(name) Let's do this.

Old woman: Very well the training starts now.

Meanwhile someone was watching all of you from the shadows. It was the crow that was on Tsubaki's shoulder. When it heard enough it flew all the way back to Tsubaki's castle. Tsubaki was waiting on her throne.

Tsubaki: Ah my pet. What news do you bring to me?

The crow cawed and she looked amused.

Tsubaki: I see. Keito! Come!

Keito appeared in front of Tsubaki.

Keito: Yes mistress?

Tsubaki: The boy we seek is being trained to control his power.

Keito: What!?!?

Tsubaki: Yes by a member of his family.

Keito: We must stop them! I'll go and......

Tsubaki: No Keito. It's fine. Everthing's going according to plan.

Keito: What is your plan mistress?

Tsubaki: My goal is to take revenge on the boy's mother by killing her own son.

Keito: Mistress. Didn't you say his mother disappeared?

Tsubaki: Yes,but I know exactly where she is.

Keito:Where?

Tsubaki: I'll just say she is a lot closer to the boy than you think she is. In any case is everything ready?

Keito: Yes. The trap is ready.

Tsubaki: We'll wait till the boy masters his powers, then you take care of the girl.

Keito: and the boy?

Tsubaki: Leave him to me. Just make sure the gets her just deserts or so they call it.

Keito: Yes mistress.

Tsubaki: Soon...... very soon I'll have my revenge for what you did to me...........Akane.

Meanwhile........
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a0UbXrvj... (Son of Man by Phil Collins)

For the next few days you trained and trained. Whether it controlling your energy or doing physical exercise. Every time you failed at a part of training you got right back up and didn't give up. It was very difficult at first, but after a while you got stronger and stronger. Until eventually you were able to conjure a flame sword of your own.

(Song ends)

Old woman: Well done! I wouldn't expect anything less.

(name) Thanks....whew

Kurumu: Ohhhh! (name) I knew you could do it!

She gave you a big hug and a kiss on the cheek.

Outer Moka: So I guess trainings over huh?

Old woman: Not just yet. Now comes the hard part of training. Taming the inner monster.

(name) Bring it on! I'm ready!

Old woman: Before we begin I should warn you. This part of the training is so difficult many have perished.

Tskune: You mean......they died?

Old woman: Yes or they couldn't control their powers and they went berserk. Only a few were able to control their monster side.

(name) And my mom was one of those few right?

Old woman: Yes. She was the most talented. In any case remember many have tried and failed with the exception of your mother. Do you still want to go through with it?

(name) You need to ask? Bring it! If my mom could do it then so can I!

Kurumu: That's my (name)!

Old woman: You've got guts. Just like my son.

(name) You have a son?

Old woman: Ahem...never mind. Anyway now comes the hard part. Here we go!

She waved her arm and you were all transported to a dimension.


OK Let's take a break! To conquer your inner monster do you......


Fight your evil self? or Fight a monster made from the negative emotions in your heart?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Developing plans

choices: try to reason/analyze your evil self
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Tskune: Whoa.

(name) Where are we?

Old woman: We are in an alternative dimension for the final part of your training.

Kurumu: How is this gonna help my (name) tame his inner monster?

Old woman: Like most people in our family we all had trained to tame their powers using this method. Many have failed because the darkness in their hearts was too overwhelming.

Yukari: How scary.

Old woman: Yes. (name) there will be two possible outcomes for you by going through this training. If you successfully complete this training will gain full control of your powers.

Moka: But.....what happens if he fails?

There was a long silence then the old woman spoke.

Old woman: If he fails he will be overwhelmed by his dark side and will become a monster.

Mizore: What!?!

Rubi: That's too risky!!

Old woma: I'm well aware that's why I need to give you all a warning. If (name) does get taken over by the darkness you all must kill him.

Kurumu: WHAT!?!

Moka: You can't be serious!

Old woman: You must if he fails he'll be a ruthless monster that'll kill everyone and everything in his path.That's why you must kill or stop him by whatever means necessary. I'll ask you one more time (name). Do you still want to go through this training?

You were silent throughout the whole conversation. Then you spoke.

(name) I'll do it.

Moka: But (name)....

Tskune: Are you nuts!?! You could go crazy and kill us! Or everyone else in your path.

Rubi: There has to be another way!

Kurumu: And I couldn't bear it if we had to resort to kill you if that happens! Please (name)! There has to be another way!

She began sobbing hysterically, but then held her chin and lifted her face up to your eyes.

(name) guys I understand all of the risks Kurumu. I get it, but you forget there's a bigger threat out there. Tsubaki. I have get to stronger not only beat her, but to protect all of you. You all done so much for me. Hell you guys even protected me and I'm truly grateful. Tskune, Moka, Yukari, Mizore, and especially you Kurumu. You've all protected me now it's my turn to protect you. and don't worry until I can see my mom, and until the day we can live at peace and be rid of Tsubaki, There's no way I'm gonna die!!!

Everyone stared at you in wonder at your speech and awesomeness. Then you looked at Moka.

(name) Moka. If i ever go berserk I need you to transform to your other self and kill me got it?

Moka hesitated and then she nodded.

Moka: OK. I will.

(name) Tskune. Everyone. If I don't make it. Take care of Kurumu.

Everyone but Kurumu; Right

You looked at Kurumu and gave her a passionate kiss on the lips.

Kurumu: Promise me you'll be alive.

(name) I promise.

You turned to the old woman,

(name) OK old woman. Ready when you are.

Old woman: Very well. Let's get started.

Then a person appeared in front of you. It was an exact duplicate of you only it was more evil.

(name) OK. Here goes.

What do you do first?

Fight? or wait and try to reason/analyze your evil self
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: To become stronger

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
He approached you and greeted you formally, "Hello (Name). Finally realized what you are?"

"Ive only come here to become one with myself. I don't plan on using vilonce unless you force me to.", you replied.
