"Well if were here to talk then let me tell you something. You are lost, the stench of the light fills the air. It makes you weak. Only by accepting the darkness, the full bestial side can you achieve real power.", he explained.

"I have no desire for power. I have all that I want.", you answered back.

"You mean those friends of yours? Sooner or later you'll live them all out. Besides your above them all. You could wipe them out if you let me take over your body.", he offered.

"You mean the same way you did in almost murdering Kurumu and Koaka? Not an option.", you responded.

"Look back on that night. If it wasn't for me you'd have been captured by that servant of that mistress she follows. Were it not for me you both would've died. You can't deny that my power can be used to your ends.", he pointed out.

"True, but look on everything else. I have lots of powerful friends. Loved ones, and I have complete control over the power I have already. And you had no hand in any of it. Do you deny that the light inside has its perks?", you pointed out.

"I'll admit the power you have is formidable but my power alone could challenge them. If you embrace that power then what you have already is meaningless.", he said.

You tried to find a way to out think him, but then you had an idea. "Maybe your right. Maybe you should join with me.", you told him.

"So you admit my power and methods are better than yours.", he said.

"No, my way is better, but you also have a valid point.", you replied.

"Enlighten me."

"Your right, without you I'd have lost to Keito. And I'd be her puppet, however that doesn't mean that you should have complete power over me. If we unite, your power coexistent with mine we'd be unstoppable.", you explained.

"You mean I merge with you and I lay dormant inside unless of moments of extreme distress, but I have no power over your actions and yet my power is fully accessible at will? You must be stupid to think I'd accept that!", he answered.

"Hold on. Think for a moment, if we fight then you will be gone forever, never to return, but take my offer and allow yourself to survive and have your power known throughout the world. If were going to be the shining example of the two worlds then we should coexist.", you explained.

"Your light will overshadow mine. What kind of existence is that?", he responded.

"The kind where you survive. If we collide as one then we'll strike real terror in our enemies. It's you they'll fear the most. And they will never see you coming. If your brought out, then they have nothing to stop you from you tearing them apart. You are my negative emotions as well. I don't have it in me to kill part of myself. And I doubt you have it in you too because you are part of me.", you exclaimed.

He stood by in resentment and pondered you argument.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Two Halfs of a whole

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"You have proven your way is credible. I will merge with you but will have no control over your actions.", he said coming towards you. He walked to your body and merged his essence with yours.

"We are one now, you are now fully connected to your monster side and human. Your power has increased and so has our goal. With this you now have the power to strike your enemies and bring and end to this battle.", your darker side said.

"Farewell, I pray we don't meet again like this.", he said leaving your mind.

You were brought back to reality to see Kurumu looking tentatively at you. You smiled to see her and you got up to see everyone worried but glad you came back.

"Did you defeat him?", the old woman asked.

"Better...", you explained everything.

"That's impossible! No one has ever had both light and darkness dwell inside him and still stand living! You should have killed it!", she said.

"No, that would've been the easy way out. But if I'm the future of monsters and humans co-existing in peace then that should be how I handled it. Besides it's over.", you replied.

"I gotta say that's unreal! You have all that power inside you now. How did you manage to do that?", Kurumu asked.

"Easy, I asked him politely and he said yes.", joking though true from a certain point of view.

"There is nothing my (Name) cannot do/", Kurumu said kissing your cheek.

Then she placed her hand over her head like she felt dizzy but she shrugged it off though you felt concerned. Kurumu left for the restroom in hurry to which Moka followed her.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Balance inside

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Moka came inside the restroom seeing Kurumu vomit near one of the toilets like she was sick. Moka came to her side concerned about what was making Kurumu so sick all of a sudden.

"I'm fine really. I just feel a little feverish.", Kurumu tried making an excuse.

"You and I both know there is more to this. You look terrible right now, and I saw you watching (Name) while constantly having food stuffed in your mouth the past couple days. Ever since he started training you have been feeling worse by the day. What's wrong?", Moka pleaded.

"Moka...don't tell anyone because I'm not certain yet....especially (Name). I've started being sick after that night before that woman came and you tried training (Name). And......", she told Moka why she's most likely like this and the look was both shocking and happy.

The two exited the room letting Kurumu deal with the problem with her guiding her through it.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Girl to Girl Talk

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
The next day back at the castle Tsubaki's crow just came back from it's early flight and it reported to Tsubaki what happened yesterday.

Tsubaki: So..... The boy's finally mastered his powers eh? Now is the perfect time to strike. Keito!

Keito appeared in front of Tsubaki in a flash.

Keito; Yes mistress?

Tsubaki: The time has come to put my plan of revenge in motion.

Keito: Yes! Finally! I get to get even with that stupid bitch of a succubis!!

Tsubaki: yes now is the time. The girl is feeling weak, now is the opportune time.

Keito: Mistress are you sure this plan will work?

Tsubaki: Just make sure she gets this.

She waved her hand and a serum needle appeared.

Tsubaki: This serum contains a spell will put the girl in a deep and ageless sleep. No one will be able to wake her.

Keito: It shall be done mistress.

And with that Keito left. Meanwhile Tsubaki summoned up an army of little demons and prepared to leave.

Tsubaki: Now. Vengeance will be mine Akane. You will pay! HAHHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!

Meanwhile you woke up feeling very pleased with yourself and who could blame you? You mastered your powers and you got to make peace with your darker side. Then you remembered Kurumu looking sick the day before and you couldn't help but worry.

(name) I hope Kurumu's OK. She seemed kinda sick. I'd better look for her.

You got dressed and looked around the academy for Kurumu, but she was no where to be seen. Then you saw the old woman.

Old woman: So how are you boy?

(name) I'm fine. I was just looking for Kurumu.

Old woman: I see.

She paused and then she spoke.

Old woman: You did good on training boy, but you picked a difficult path. Making your dark side join forces with you was unthinkable, but i have confidence that you'll be fine. Your mother did the same thing.

(name) She did?

Old woman: Yes. If that doesn't make you her son I don't know what will.

(name) Thank you old woman. I'll see you later I gotta find Kurumu.

As you left to find Kurumu the old woman's expression changed. She was now worried.

Old woman: He may have mastered his powers, but that doesn't change the fact that he's and his friends are still in danger. Tsubaki hasn't even attacked yet and I bet she want's revenge for what I did her to her years ago. If I wasn't under this curse I could tell him who I am, but the only way to be rid of the curse is that Tsubaki herself must be destroyed. But for now all I can do is watch over you and look out for you. Just be careful.......my son

You kept looking for Kurumu, but you still couldn't find her. Then you saw Moka. if anyone knew where she was she knew.

(name) Hey Moka!

Moka: Oh hey (name) what's up?

(name) Have you seen Kurumu anywhere?

Moka: well.....

Then she remembered what Kurumu said. She blushed and she looked away.

Moka: Who me I don't know..... hahahh

(name): are you sure?

Before Moka could answer a voice called out to you two. You both turned around and there was a young woman who looked like a teacher at Yokai.

(woman) Excuse me if your looking for the girl she was heading for the classroom.

(name) Got it thanks.

Moka was glad that you went away, because she didn't want to tell you what Kurumu told you at least no yet. Then she noticed something the woman that was just talking to you disappeared. Moka was puzzled. One minute she was there and the next she was gone.

Moka: That's strange.

Then Moka's rosary began to glow and the Inner Moka's voice came out of it.

Inner Moka: Hey! Be on guard. I'm sense a big monster energy.

Moka: What? Where?

Inner Moka: I don't know, but you better check on Kurumu on (name). I have a feeling they're in danger. Hurry!

Moka: Wait! What's going on?

The rosary fell silent. Now Moka was worried and she raced off to find Kurumu.

Meanwhile in room where the newspaper club meetings were held, Kurumu was still feeling sick. She was pale and her stomach felt like it had a tornado. Yuakri and Mizore were trying to comfort her and feel better, but no avail.

Yukari: Kurumu? Don't you think you should go see a nurse?

Mizore: Yes. You look a little pale.

Kurumu: Don't worry. I'm fine. Just ate something bad.....

Then Rubi came in.

Rubi: Hey wht's wrong Kurumu?

Kurumu: Geez..... I'm fine don't worry....ugh...

Rubi: You know I have something that might help you feel better. Could you come with me?

Kurumu; I guess. I have nothing else to do.

After Rubi and Kurumu left Yuakri and Mizore were trying to figure out what was going on.

Yukari: I'm starting to smell something funny.

Mizore: Yeah Kurumu was way to sick to have an upset stomach.

Yukari: Something's gotta be going on.

Just then Moka burst in panting.

Moka: Yukari! Mizore! Where's Kurumu?

Yuakri: Moka! What's wrong you look like you seen a ghost!

Mizore: Did something happen?

Moka: My rosary spoke to me! It said there was a powerful monster energy here!

Mizore: Really?

Yuakri: Are you sure?

Moka; Yes! That's why I have to make sure that (name) and Kurumu are okay!

Yukari: Kurumu just went with Rubi to get something to fix her stomach.

Mizore: By the way Moka, do you know why Kurumu's been acting sick and weird lately?

Moka blushed a little; flustered by the question. She tried to deny it.

Moka: Um....uh no reason. Just ate something bad?

Yuakri: Now I know something's fishy!

Mizore: You DO know what's going on do you?

Moka: Um uh hi!

Moka was about to freak out when Tskune and Rubi came in.

Tskune: Hey guys what's going on?

Yuakri: Tskune! Moka's got a secret and she won't tell us about it!

Moka: No! It's not like that!

Mizore: Anyway Rubi how's Kurumu? Did she take a medicine or something?

Rubi: Huh? What are you talking about?

Yukari: Don't play dumb. You just left with Kurumu to give her something to ease her stomach problems.

Rubi: No I didn't. I was with Tskune the whole time. I swear.

There was long silence. Then the old woman burst through the door. She was worried.

Old woman: Where is the boy? I can't sense him anywhere.

There was a long silence then they all heard a scream down the hall and everyone knew who it was.

Tskune: That sounded like Kurumu!

Moka: and it came from the classroom!

Everyone raced to the classroom and barged through the door. Everyone gasped for the person standing there was Keito.

Moka: Keito! I should've known you'd be here!

Keito: aww don't get a hi Moka? It has been a while though.

Yukari: Where's Kurumu? You jerk!

Keito: Hehehe you want her? Here she is.

She stepped aside and there lying on the floor unconscious was Kurumu. Everyone gasped in horror.

Tsukune; Kurumu!

Mizore: Oh no!

Keito: Hehehe my work here is done. Farewell losers!

And with that Keito disappeared. Everyone rushed to Kurumu's side and tried to wake her up, but to no avail.

Moka: Kurumu please wake up!

Tskune: Its no good. She out cold.

Yukari: You don't think she's.....

The old woman stepped forward and felt Kurumu's cheek.

Old woman: Don't worry. She's under a spell a powerful spell.

Yukari: If its a spell I can break it!

Old woman: No. It's a powerful one. It can't be broken that easily.

Mizore: Do you know how to break it?

Old woman: Unfortunately I don't.

Yukari: What'll we do?!?

Old woman: Tsubaki had begun to make her move. If she targeted this girl she'll be after the boy next. Does anyone know where she went?

Moka: He was heading for a cottage looking for Kurumu.

Old woman: No! We must get to him before its too late!

Meanwhile you headed for the cottage where the young woman told you to go. At first you just wanted to find Kurumu, but then you had a bad feeling. You walked into the cottage and it was empty.

(name) Hello?

No sooner than you said those words you were suddenly ganged up on by a bunch of demons and they tied you up and cuffed you and gagged you. You tried to break free, but for some reason your power wouldn't activate. Then you saw Tsubaki. She chuckled and smiled.

Tsubaki: well this certainly is a surprised. You've grown so much boy.

You wanted to say something back to her, but you couldn't because you had your mouth stuffed with cloth and then you were blind folded.

(name) Now. Away with him -but gently my pets, gently. I have plans for our guest.

After a while due to lack of oxygen and you were gagged you feel unconscious. When you wake up you were in.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Trouble starts!

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You woke up in a dungeon which was pitch black. You couldn't see anything but then a torch was light and in came Keito. "Hmm how I have waited for this! Just what I wanted, you tied in chains and my revenge on your girlfriend is complete.", she cackled.

"What do you mean?!", you said angrily.

"I placed a spell on her that will make her sleep permanently! She can't be woken up and it was all too easy. Her morning nausea made it easy to administer the spell, what a shame. She's have made her mother proud.", she said.

"What?", you wee confused by what she was insinuating but you had no idea what she was talking about.

"You don't know? Aww so sad, I'd cry about it if...you know I cared for you two. But I despise you in every way possible. Tarnishing my reputation, humiliation, and forcing me to go as far as to become an errand girl! If she was alive I'd take pleasure in making you my slave. But no, there's no point to it now. Your girlfriend is dead and soon my mistress will be done with you soon.", she said.

"Enjoy the isolation while you can, because you'll be dead by the time midnight strikes.", she said/ She stopped for a second the came rushing towards you.

"Oh screw it.", she kissed you on the lips to humiliate you even further. "Already after some other girl? You disgrace her memory.", she said leaving you in shame.

"SHE ISN'T DEAD! Your just an eight legged psycho for hire!", she left and the only source of light extinguished. You held your head down and said to yourself, "I'm so sorry Kurumu...I wasn't there to save you...please be alive...", just as you said that you felt a heart beat.

You knew then that it had to be Kurumu alive and well or at least alive enough to still have a heartbeat during that spell. But the only thing was...the heart beat didn't belong to Kurumu...
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Lowest Point

choices: Keito. She wants to torture you some more. (oh crap)
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Meanwhile back at the Yokai the gang was lifting Kurumu on a bed and set her down gently. Everyone was feeling worried, sad, and angry at the same time.

Moka: Oh Kurumu. and (name).

Mizore: At least (name) is well. We don't even know if Kurumu's gonna wake up or not.

Yukari was crying, but was trying to hold back her tears.

Yukari: but still (name)'s gonna be heartbroken when he finds out.

Tskune: Guys.....

Then the old woman snapped everyone out of it.

Old woman: Everyone listen! We're not gonna get anywhere by crying. We have to hurry and find (name) before its too late. I understand you care for the girl, but we must hurry. There may be a way to save her.

Everyone stared at her as soon as they heard these words.

Moka: Are you serious?!?

Tskune: Tell us how!

Old woman: I can't tell you why, but (name) may be the only way to save her.

Moka: Why is that?

Before the woman could answer Rubi flew through the window and landed in the room.

Moka: Rubi. Did you find (name)?

Rubi looked very solemn as she held out a piece of you're clothing. Everyone knew what it was.

Rubi: It traced (name)'s energy, but this was the only thing I could find.

Mizore: No....

Old woman: Tsubaki.

Moka: (name) was taken!

Tskune: But to where?

There was a long silence, then the old woman spoke in an ominous tone.

Old woman: At the forbidden castle beyond Yokai.

Tskune: Then let's go!

Old woman: Hold on boy. The forbidden castle is not only Tsubaki's strong hold, but it's a dangerous place. Everyone that has gone there has never come back alive.

Tskune: I'm still going! (name)'s in danger as well as Kurumu. I want tosave both of them because they're my friends!

Moka: If you're going then I am too!

Yukari: That's makes three of us!

Mizore: Count me in too!

Rubi: Yes. I will go as well.

Old woman: Are you sure? There's a possibility that you could all die! Tsubaki is ruthless and she wouldn't hesitate for a second to kill you!

Tskune: We're still going! (name) and Kurumu are our friends!

Moka: and we'll do whatever it takes to save them!

The old woman stayed silent and then she spoke.

Old woman: OK If you're going to save them you'll need a guide. I'll take you there.

Moka: You do?

Old woman: Yes. I know that place very well. I'll take you there, but i can't protect you so I can't guarantee your safety.

Tskune: We're still going. Besides if what you say is true...

Mizore: (name) may be the only one to save Kurumu.

Yukari: We want them to be safe more than anything because they're our friends!

Old woman: Very well. Let's go save my son!

Moka: what?

Old woman: Um huh.... nothing ahem. I meant let's go save the boy.

Later the gang arrived at the castle. It was ominous and spooky looking. There were demon's everywhere, but the gang managed to sneak past them. There many more in the throne room, they were dancing around a bonfire celelbrating their victory. Tsubaki was siting on her throne petting her crow with Keito by her side.

Keito: A glorious day for victory right mistress?

Tsubaki: Yes,but what a pity (name) isn't here to enjoy the celebration.

Keito: Yes. Too bad. He must be sad in that dungeon.

Tsubaki: I'm going to cheer him up. Stay here to..... enjoy yourself.

Keito: Yes mistress.

Then Tsubaki went to the dungeon where you were being held with the gang following her close behind. Meanwhile you sat in the dungeon chained and sad. You struggled to get free, but for some reason you couldn't. Then the door opened and in stepped in Tsubaki.

Tsubaki: Don't bother. Those chains have a spell on them that prevents you from using your powers.

(name) What do you want? and what did you do to Kurumu?!? and what do you intend to do with me?

Tsubaki: Oh come now (name). Why so glum and angry? A glorious future lies before you - you, the destined hero of a charming fairy tale come true.

She waved her hand on her staff and a picture of Yokai Academy appeared on the tip.

Tsubaki: Behold - Yokai Academy. And in yonder classroom, the succubis Kurumu sleeps in an ageless sleep.

Then a picture of Kurumu appeared. She was still in asleep in the spell

Tsubaki: Yes. Indeed for a monster like her she is indeed, most wondrous fair. Her hair, blue like the ever blue sky, lips that shame the pink rose. In ageless sleep, she finds repose. The years roll by, but a hundred years to a steadfast heart, are but a day.

Then a picture of you coming out of the dungeon appeared, but you were different. You were old and weak and you looked like you were 60.

Tsubaki: And now, the gates of a dungeon part, and our prince is free to go his way. Off he rides, on his noble steed, a valiant figure, straight and tall! To wake his love, with a kiss from a boy bearing the burdens or both monsters and humans. And prove that monsters and humans can co-exist! Hahahaha

At this point you knew what she wanted to do with you. She was going to keep you were for a long time until you were old and ruin the relationship you had with Kurumu. You sturggled with your chains trying to get to her so you could kick her ass, but to no avail the chains held.

(name) Why you....!!!

Tsubaki: I've had my amusement for today. I'll leave you with these.....happy thoughts.

And with that Tsubaki left leaving you angry and struggling with your chains. After that Tsubaki went to her chambers to rest.

Tsubaki: For the first time in years, I shall sleep well.

Meanwhile you still couldn't get free. You tried calling to your dark self,but he wasn't answering either.

(name) The chains must be blocking him too. Damn what am I gonna do?

Things looked very bleak for a moment, but then you heard a voice.

(voice) Giving up already? That's not like you at all.

You look up and see......
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: "Happy thoughts?" Yeah right!

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
She came from above a hole in the wall and quietly dropped down to free you. "Who said I gave up? I was just trying to figure out how to get out of here. WAIT how is Kurumu?", you asked urgently.

"She's fine but that old woman said you have to get to her soon.", Moka answered.

"No...no she's not fine. Her heart beats gets slower by the minute. I got to get to her now and break the spell!", you told her.

"Wait? You can hear her heartbeat?", she asked.

"It's gotta be! Who else in the world would I be hearing?", you asked sarcastically.

Moka put two and two together ans immediately assumed what it was. But then you heard the guards coming so she grabbed you by your collar and threw you up in a hiding spot.

The guards were walking toward your cell but weren't aware you escaped yet. The hiding spot was a little crammed in for your tastes but at least you had your back away from Moka for it to be sexual. (Or at least less)

"I'll distract them you go and head to her (Name).", Moka said.

"What? Hell no I am not leaving you here. Tskune would never leave you and neither will I.", you replied.

Moka threw you out the way she came in and blocked the path so you couldn't get to her. You could still see her, "What the hell Moka?! They'll kill you!", you responded.

"I distract them while you escape to help me later. They need you (Name). Save Kurumu then come back for me!", she told you.

"Dammit Moka you know I can't just leave!", you persisted.

"If you stay here that heart beat will fade (Name), don't let it for the love of god don't!", she said. She left to fight off the guards. You reluctantly ran off and with all your super speed, thanks to your monster half, made it to Kurumu as fast as you could.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Make it back to your loved one

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You ran up to Kurumu's room where everyone awaited your return. You saw her lying in her bed with not a single scratch on her body as it laid motionless. You slowly crept toward her face and with great care placed your lips on top of hers.

Life it seemed to return to her body as she opened her eyes in joy. She saw your face happier than ever relieved to see her alive. She grabbed your face and smothered you in a large passionate kiss like she was making up for lost time.

"(Name)! I knew you would come! I knew you would be there for me!", she said overjoyed.

"Just as I would be there for you, you would do so for me...and you'd have done it far faster than me.", you joked. "I could hear your heart beat while you were unconscious, I thought I was going to lose you.", you said.

"But she had no pulse while she slept. ", Yukari said.

"I heard it. I could hear it in my head like if I had a migraine!", you said.

"(Name)...she is right. I know what you heard...", Kurumu said.

"What?", you asked. Kurumu asked everyone to leave the both of you alone for a bit until you were done talking to each other.

"(Name)....something incredibly wonderful has happened...I...I'm..pregnant.", she said. It was one of the hardest things she ever said to you. As the news hit you everything made perfect sense. Her morning sickness, the heartbeat, her awkwardness for the last few days... it all fit.

You sat down on her bed speechless, your face showed tears of joy, then fear, then shock, and then back to fear again. You were happy but at a time like this made you stricken with fear. And the thought of parenthood was just jaw dropping, and again the fact that your enemies were on the move and have yet to know about this regardless shook you to the bone.

"That's.....beautiful...", you finally said.

"It's OK everything will be fine. We'll take care of this later. Now we have to end this for our child's sake.", Kurumu said.

"We have to go back...Moka is still there! And it ends here tonight! Were putting an end to this insanity! And so help me we will not fail!", you told Kurumu earnestly.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Miracles

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
(Warning Violent descriptions in this chapter)

You gathered everyone to the hill where you were held captive and where Moka was. "Guys this will be the fight of our lives here. But tonight we aren't monsters or humans. We are a group of people going to finally end this long drawn out battle. Today we no longer set our future, here we make history. From this moment on this will be a shining example of how far humans and monsters can go to co-exist!", everyone was moved by your speech and you gave the go ahead to storm the hideout.

Keito saw everyone head for the main gate, she called all the guards yelling at them to get into battle positions. She left to warn her mistress and grew even more angry toward you. The Old lady managed to open the gate and you entered the compound with little time to waste.

"Tskune! Follow me to the dungeon! Ruby, you too! Everyone else distract the guards while we go after Moka.", you told everyone.

"Wait!", Kurumu said holding your arm. She kissed you passionately before you left, "Don't be too long.", she said.

You stroked her cheek and went with Ruby and Tskune to find Moka while they faced the guards head on. The three of you made it to the dungeons where you expected Moka to be. But she was nowhere to be seen.

"Moka isn't here where is she dammit!", Tskune yelled.

"I don't know she was here last time I-", before you could finish you fell through a trap door separating you from the others.

You couldn't see anything since it was pitch dark. And you could feel your arms hanging above. You heard a rattling sound but you knew who it was.

"Could be me but you must have a crush on me if you want me alone with you so much Keito. But your notgoing to have me eating our of your hand. Kurumu is alive, and you can't harm her anymore.", you gloated.

"Maybe not her. But you...your torture has scarcely begun.", she held out a lipstick with a pink glow around it. "Know what this is?", she asked.

"A glow in the dark crayon?", you joked.

"This is an aphrodisiac. But if I add this little drop of organic poison mixed with a highly addictive supplement know what will happen?", she asked putting on the lipstick.

"Kurumu savagely beats you to death along with your mistress.", you joked more though you struggled more aggressive now.

"After you slowly die by lusting for me. She'll see you die in my arms after a hot little kiss, and more with your dying breath begging to be kissed by me and not that slutty little monster girlfriend.", Keito said.

"Hey Keito, you make even the most sexually driven succumbie in the world look like a saint compared to how you treat your love interests. But seriously don't do this! Because I'm really getting mad and you don't want me to get mad. You might bring out the worst in me.", you warned.

"One kiss and hate will be turned into love. Oh (Name) just lower your guard down and seal your fate...with a kiss.", as she finished she grabbed your head and pulled you in for a long passionate kiss.

You could feel the toxin burning through your throat and your blood. It felt like it was on fire and your body was fired up like it was cooking your insides. Then as she stuck her tongue in you it was the most pleasurable yet repulsive taste you ever felt. Now the toxin made the pain even worse.

You struggled to break free, and you were in constant agony from the poison. Your other more bestial side was coming out and he was furious. Keito believed the pleasure overtook the pain but she was dead wrong.

(Music as you turn into your monster form: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f0E6WSOrK... )

Your eyes turned red and you bit into Keito's lip forcing her to break away. She backed off and saw you break the chains dangling you over. You walked toward her slowly as your body morphed in to a terrifying beast. Keito knew now you had to do quickly so she shot out sharp spikes of her silk from her mouth laced with that same poison.

You still kept on walking as the pain didn't even bother anymore and you fully turned into your true monster form. You ran toward her clawing her belly where her legs were connected and slashed a few off in one swipe. You slammed her against the walls over and over an had her against it and wanted to rip out her throat.

"Screw you! F&^%$ing monster....", she said.

You wanted to kill her but even through all the pain she forced upon you...you couldn't kill her.

" Yes I'm a monster...but I'm human too! And no matter how much I want to...YOU WILL NOT MAKE ME KILL YOU!! I'm nothing like you or that crazy bitch! Besides the pleasure of killing deserves to be given to somebody else.", you then broke both her legs and removed all of her spider ones. You walked away to leave her in her pity.

"HA! What's going to finish me? The old witch?", Keito taunted.

Then a shadow loomed over her, with a ponytail. "Keito...this is for trying to kill (Name), seduce him, and kill me...", said Kurumu beating Keito bluntly with a crowbar.

"But this last one is for doing the worst deed of your existence...almost MURDERING MY VERY UNBORN CHILD!", she yelled smashing Keito's head in.

You ran up to join the other where they vanquished the guards and taken most of the castle. "Where is Ruby and Tskune?", you asked the others.

"I dunno.", Yukari said.

Then a boasting voice echoed through the highest tower. ( Transform Music: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rdspri0B... )

"All of you pathetic fools prepare to face oblivion!", Tsubaki yelled throwing Moka and Ruby and Tskune on to the ground.

You grabbed all three with your monster body and saw her cast lightning to the sky. The tower exploded and the fire became alive comprising into a dragon body as well as Tsubaki turning into a dragon herself. The fire grafted on to her skin and after it was over she let out a monstrous cry that echoed through the whole monster world.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Battle of the monsters

choices: for you guys to fight with me.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
(name) and what do you want Keito?

Keito: Hehehehe Since your girlfriend is gonna be dead soon, I figured I could at least give you a good time.

This time she was holding a needle.

(name) What? Are you gonna put me to sleep too?

Keito: Hahahaha Do you know what this is?

(name) A spell?

Keito: hahaha Not just that..... it's an aphrodisiac.

Your heart stopped for you knew what that meant.

(name) Are you sick?!? As if I'd do it with a 8 legged bitch like you!

Keito: You'll be singing a different tune when I inject this in you.

She got closer and prepared to inject the spell in you. You struggled and struggled, but to no avail.

(name) No! Stay the hell away from me!!!

Keito wasn't listening she grabbed a hold of your arm and got ready to inject the spell in you. You closed your eyes and looked away. You silently screamed from someone to help you, but you knew that no one was coming. A single tear dripped from your cheek.

(name) Kurumu......I'm so sorry....

Keito: Hehehehe Now your'e mine.....

Just when all hope seemed lost: a washtub appeared out of nowhere and hit Keito on the head knocking her unconscious.

(name) I know that trick!

You look up and there in front of you were the old woman, Tskune, Moka and the rest of the gang. You were about yelp in surprise, but the old woman stopped you by covering your mouth.

Old woman: Shhh. Quiet. There's no time. Hurry.

Yukari and Mizore broke the chains of setting you free. Then Tskune and Moka brought you up to speed about what was going on. (not the part of kurumu being pregnant yet)

(name) So where's Kurumu now?

Old woman: She's back that the academy, but we have to hurry there's not much time. Kurumu's life force is dwindling away.

(name) Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!

Moka: OK, but be careful we have to sneak out of here before we're caught.

So you guys sneaked out of the dungeon and all was going well as we made your way to get out of the castle until......

Battle with the forces of evil
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWsdd3Zg...

Tsubaki's crow appeared and as soon as it saw you all it started cawing up a storm and flew away around the corner.

Rubii: Oh crap! That crow was Tsubaki's!

Tskune: Now what?

(name) This way!

I point down a hallway and raced down to it with the others close behind you. Next you all went down a flight of stairs. Then halfway down the stairs, came trouble. You all saw Tsubaki's crow again this time it had buddies. Demon buddies!

Tskune: Oh no!

Moka: Run!

We raced back up the flights of stairs with the demons hot on our heels. We tried to find an exit, but every exit we went to was blocked by more demons.

Mizore: Damn! Should we fight them?

Old woman: No! We have no time to deal with them! We must get to Yokai!

Yukari: But we can't keep running forever!

Then I see a window. It was a perfect escape, but it was a long way down. I cooked up an idea.

(name) Mizore! Can you make a ice slide out this window?

Mizore: I'm way ahead of you (name)!

She jumped out the window and made an ice slide while she was falling with all of you following close behind. As soon as you all make it to the ground safely the demons followed, but Mizore had other plans.

Mizore: I don't think so!

She punched the ice slide and it turned into a snake of spikes knocking every demon that dared cross it. Then we kept running then.....

Moka: (name) look!

There on the upper wall was a whole army of demons firing arrows with fire. It was like a swarm of meteors. Then Yukari stepped up.

Rubi: Don't worry guys We got this one!

She waved her wand and turned the arrows into flowers.

Tskune: Good job Yukari!

Then the crow appeared again, this time it knew it was in trouble, so there was only one thing the crow can do: get Tsubaki. It flew off in the direction of Tsubaki's tower.

Moka; Oh no! If that crow gets to Tsubaki it's all over!

old woman: Leave it to me!

(name) old woman?

Old woman: I may look old to you, but i got a trick or two up my sleeve.

She held up her hands like she was holding an arrow and a flame arrow appeared in her hands. She pulled back and released the arrow the crow barely landed on the perch where Tsubaki was and the arrow hit it! The crow was in flames and then it turned to stone. You all stood there dumbfounded.

Tskune: Nice shot.

Moka: How did you...?

Old woman: Come on! We have to hurry! Tsubaki's bound to be awake by all that commotion!

(Name) Right! Let's move!

You all continue to run and you all ran and ran until you all run out of the castle. Meanwhile Tsubaki woke up to all the racket and going to tell the demons to simmer down. Then she saw the crow in stone and then she saw you guys running out side the gate escaping the castle!

Tsubaki: No!

Meanwhile you and your friends knew Tsubaki was awake and she was not gonna let you all of that easy. Using her staff she fired endless thunderbolts at you all, but you all dodge them all. Yokai Academy grew closer and closer.

Tskune: Oh great! Now's she's shooting lightning bolts at us!

(name) Just keep running Tskune! We're almost there!

(thinking): Don't worry Kurumu were coming for you!

Then Tsubaki raised her staff and began a spell.

Tsubaki: Send these fools straight to their doom. With thorns made to be their tomb! Now round Yokai and cast my spell, Go now my curse serve me well!

Then a black cloud appeared over Yokai academy and rained. Then a forest of thorns erupted from the grpund and surround Yokai Academy and blocked your way.

Moka: What the.....

Tskune: What is this?

Old woman: Tsubaki's most powerful spell. Almost nothing can get past these thorns.

Mizore: We'll see about that!

She fired a couple of icicles, but they bounced off the thorns like they were nothing.

Mizore: What?

Moka: Not even Mizore's ice can break past them.

Yukari: How are we supposed to get to Kurumu now?

Off the distance I could hear Tsubaki laughing. Laughing with triumph because she won. You racked your brain to figure out what to do. Then the old woman spoke

Old woman: I know a way to break through.

Moka: How?

Old woman: Only a powerful person with a strong monster energy can break through these thorns. and he's standing front of us.

She looked at you with grim and worried eys. Right there she knew she was reffering to you.

Moka: What? (name)? Why......

Old woman: (name) is the only one who can cut through those thorns. Because he as the power to do so. Only if he awakens the power inside of him.

Mizore: But what if he goes berserk again?

Rubi: Yes. He could kill us and be just what Tsubaki wants.

You wracked your mind trying to figure out what to do. Then you'll take a deep breath and

(name) I'll do it.

Tskune: (name) are you crazy? You could go bererk!

(name) I know, but I'm not doing this for me. I'm doing this for the future of human's and monsters to coexist in peace. Most of all I'm doing this for all of you. All this time I've been protected by you guys. Now it's my turn to protect you. Especially Kurumu.

Moka: (name).......

Rubi: You are just.....

Everyone was inspired by your speech. The old woman smiled and nodded.

Old woman: Well spoken.

(name) I do have one request though. I would......

What do you say?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Keito. She wants to torture you some more. (oh ...

choices: Ask you dark side for help
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Moka: What!?! You can't go alone! It's too dangerous! and,,,,,

Tskune: Moka.

Moka places his hand on her shoulder to quiet her and he shakes her head.

Tskune: It's okay. Let him go. He has to do this.

Moka: But Tskune.....

Rubi: Let him go. He's the only one who can save Kurumu.

Yukari: She's right.

Mizore: yeah.

Moka looks worried, but then she nodded.

Moka: Okay, but promise you get back here safely with Kurumu!

(name) I promise.

Then you faced the thorns, closed your eyes, and focused.

(name) Don't Kurumu. I'm coming.

Then your body exploded in an aura, but the aura was different. Instead of a red aura it was orange. Then a flame sword appeared on your right hand and a sheild on your left. You had a cape of flames and your aura turned into armor (making it look like this but red imagine ok? http://www.deviantart.com/art/Red-Eyes-B...) and both of your eyes turned slitted and gold. Everyone was amazed. Then using your sword you slashed your way through the thorns. You thought you slashed through a whole mile, then you saw Yokai Academy up ahead and the path was clear. You toward the academy determined to save Kurumu. Meanwhile Tsubaki saw the whole thing and she was furious!'

Tsubaki: NO! I won't let this happen!!

She waved her staff and turned into a bolt of lightning and was headed straight for you. She flew right past the rest of the gang making them alarmed.

Rubi: That was Tsubaki!

Yukari: She was headed straight for (name)!

Moka: We have to go!

Old woman: No! There's nothing more we can do. All we can do is pray.

Moka looks at the old woman and she can see that she was worried about you as much they were.

Moka: Why is she so worried about him? She's acting just like his mom. Wait.....could she be......

Meanwhile you headed straight for Yokai Academy. At first you thought it was gonna be smooth sailing from here, but then a lighning bolt struck in front of you and Tsubaki appeared in front of you.

(name) Tsubaki! Get out of my way! You've lost!

Tsubaki: You've done well to make it this far boy......

She raises her staff, you brace yourself and stay on gaurd.

Tsubaki: but know you deal with me....and all the power of MY HATRED!!!!!!

She slammed her staff down and she exploded in flames. You look up in shock as the flame grew bigger and bigger until a dragon emerged from the flames. It wasn't just me that was in shock, the gang saw the dragon from where they were standing.

Moka: What....what is that thing?

Rubi: That must be.....

Old woman: Tsubaki's true form

Yes the dragon was big, but you didn't back down. You let out a battle cry and charged at Tsubaki. Then Tsubaki fired a blast of fire from her mouth. You managed to block it with your sheild, but just barely. The force from the blast was so strong it knocks you flat on your back. Then she fired another blast again. She was gonna try to take you out while you were down. Luckily you rolled out of the way just in time. You then took a giant jump and hid the forest of thorns and waited. Then you saw Tsubaki's dragon head slowly come toward you. She doesn't see you so you wait till she was close then you struck! Using your sword of flames you slash Tsubaki over and over managing to cut her place a little. Then you hide in the forest trying to do another sneak attack, but then Tsubaki fired a blast of flames not at you, but the forest.

(name) Damn! She's trying to smoke me out! I have to get to higher ground!

Using your strength you leap from the burning forest and lannded a rock, but Tsubaki was hot on your heels as she snapped her jaws trying to kill. You fought back slashing your flame sword at her to repel her attacks or you being killed. Then you tried to fly away, but Tsubaki uses her claw to slash at your wing severely cutting it. It didn't hurt, but you couldn't fly anymore. Then when you took a step backwards you felt nothing, but air you almost fall and you realize that you were trapped. You had no where you run and you couldn't get away, but you stood you're ground. Then distaster strikes; Tsubaki blasted another blast, but this time the force was so strong that it knocks your sheild away. You lost your only defence and know the only thing you had left was your sword.

(name) Damn it! Now what do I do?!?

Tsubaki got ready to finish you off as she charged her firebreath one more time. You screamed at yourself the same question over and over again in your head. what do I do? Then you have an idea. You remembered your dark side and its power.

(name) I could use my dark sides power for help and end it, but then again I could just use my sword and end it that way so I won't have to go berserk.

What do you do?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: like to go alone.

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
You focused on every bit of power you had within your flame sword. You closed your eyes and your flame sword grew bigger as soon as you looked at it you had an idea. You remember how the old woman fired that flame arrow. You figured you could give it a try. You put your hands you with your flame sword in one hand and it grew bigger as you prepared to aim. Tsubaki saw what was going on and fired her biggest dragonbreath of all. As soon as she did......

(name) This is the end! Flame sword from my body! Make this evil fall! End this battle once and for all!!!!!!!

And then you fired your flame arrow with all your might and it flies straight at Tsubaki. It cuts through her flame and pierces her straight at the heart. The dragon roars in pain echoing through out the land even reaching where Moka and the others. The dragon staggers and then she falls straight toward you with her mouth open. It was obvious she was trying to take you with her, but you dodge her attack just in time,The dragon falls over the cliff and with a defining boom. You look over the cliff and see nothing else but a pile of ashes and your flame sword. You breathe a sigh of relief for you knew the battle was over. The thorns slowly disappeared along with the flames. You turned toward Yokai Academy and clenched your fist.

(name) Hold on Kurumu. I'm coming.

You ran toward the academy and ran through the halls looking for your love. Then as soon as you opened the next room to the infirmary there was Kurumu. She looked lifeless as you approached her quietly. You touched her skin which was very cold. That's when you realize you were too late. Tears begin streaming down her face as you hugged her body.


(name) No.......please.......Kurumu.....I'm so sorry. Even if I have all this power I failed......I failed......

Then with great care you kissed her passionately and you lie face at the foot of your bed and cried. As you were crying all the color returned to Kurumu's face and she slowly opened her eyes. When she saw you crying she was surprised.

Kurumu: Hey. (name) Why are you crying?

(name) Because...sniff.... you're dead Kurumu.......sniff.....wait....WHAT!?!

You look up and you see Kurumu sitting up looking at you like you were crazy. When you saw this you cried tears of joy and hugged and cried Kurumu like crazy. Everyone else showed up in the room and when they saw you hugging and crying Kurumu they can only smile.

(name) WAAAAAAHHHHH! You're OK! You're OK! I can't believe you're OK! WAAAAHHHHHH!!!!!!!

Kurumu: Geez! (name) What're you crying for?

Moka: Thank goodness.

After a while you all explained what happened to Kurumu and she was shocked at first, but when she heard you defeated Tsubaki and saved her. She hugged you like mad and was screaming how proud she was for being your lover.

Kurumu: (name) You are the best boyfriend in the whole world!

(name) Thank you. Id.....do.. anything for.....

Then due to weakness, exhaustion, and stress on the body you faint.

Then the next morning you wake up and Kurumu and the gang as well as the old woman were by your bedside.

(name) What happened?

Kurumu: You fainted.

Tskune: Hey (name) you always faint under pressure or are you always wishy washy?

(name) Hey!

Everyone laughs while you blush with embarrassment. Then the old woman and Kurumu have serious looks on their faces. Then they both speak at the same time.

Kurumu: (name) there's something I need to tell you.

Old woman: Boy. there's something I need to tell you.

(name) Whoa one at a time.

So which you do you want to listen to first?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: You use your flame sword

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"I'll need to talk to you first Kurumu. Before all of this you've been acting strangley the last few days.", you said.

"That's what I want to say. (Name).....your...going to be....a father.", you fell to your knees and couldn't believe at first what she just said.

You placed your hand on Kurumu's belly and felt like you had a new reason to live. "I become...father?", you said blankly due o the shock of it all.

"Yes (Name)...we have a child now...I can already feel it moving around.", she said patting your head gently.

You rested your head on her belly and you swore you could hear it. You cried again and hugged Kurumu softly. "I never imagined....Kurumu?", you started to ask.

"Yes?", she replied

"Let's get married."
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: The most beautiful thing

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"Hold on the both of you! Your way too young for this kind of thing.", the old woman interjected.

"What gives you a say in this?!", you said angrily.

"I trained you, helped you beat Tsubaki, and that makes me responsible for you! I'm trying to make up for all thosse years of abandonment!", she slipped in her rant.

"Abandonment? Wait...you can't be...", you said unable to finish.

Realizing she exposed her identity she then transformed from an old woman into a young adult woman. It turned out the old woman the whole time, was your mother!

"Hello..my son.", she said smiling with tears flowing from her eyes.

"Mom?....", you paused. The mixed feelings came rushing through your mind, anger, love, resentment, sadness, but in one single act you did one thing. You hugged your mother tightly as you could.

"HOW?! How have you been hiding this whole time?!", you asked.

"Everywhere...listen (Name) I wanted to be there for you but I couldn't. The headmaster help clear some of the facts by now?", she asked so she wouldn't be repeating what you already knew. You nodded to her question.

"When I was forced to leave you it tore me apart. I fell into a long depression after that. Spent a long time alone for a while. I tried to see you on occasion but it was always a risk. But I didn't care, it just ripped me apart not being able to see my own son.", she stroked your hair like a mom comforting their child.

"But when word got to me you were enrolled at the school, I tried to think of a plan to see you without anyone knowing it was me. But before I could, I saw that Tsubaki was planning to kill you. And since that spider monster was working for her then she'd know I would be putting you in only further turmoil.", she continued.

"I had to find a way to help you, so I changed my appearance and finally got too be close to you. I only wish I could have been there all these years but...", she couldn't continue.

"Mom..it's alright. Your here now...and now you have a grandchild to take care of soon.", you said sweetly.

Kurumu approached your mom humbled, "I'm deeply happy to have met your son. He's the best of my life. For now until our baby comes." she said hugging you tenderly.

"I'm sorry (Name). I didn't mean what I said earlier. But I hope your marrying because you love each other and not because of the baby.", she said sternly.

"Mom after today and almost losing her I couldn't think of anything else to do. She's all I need, and all I want. I love her an we'll make you proud.", you told her.

"Then (Name), Kurumu I give you my blessing.", she said hugging the two of you.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Family Reunion

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
A few weeks later it was the biggest day of yours and Kurumu's lives. The day of your wedding. Everyone you and the gang knew was going to be coming including the headmaster. You and Kurumu were in separate rooms getting ready. Although there was a little trouble. On the girls side......

Kurumu: Oh crap, oh crap, oh crap,oh crap!

Yup Kurumu was panicking. Frantic actually. She was running around all over making sure she was perfect and freaking out if she'll threw up (due to the fact that she's pregnant by three weeks), and she was worried that you'd ditch her at the altar. Moka and the girls tried to calm her down, but Kurumu kept panicking. Moka had no choice, but to grab her shoulders and shake her (not to hard) to calm her down.

Moka: Kurumu! You have to calm down!

Yukari: Yeah you're turning into a nervous wreck!

Mizore: More like a nervous breakdown.

Kurumu: I can't help it! What if he leaves me standing in the alter?!? What if.....WHAT IF......?

(voice) That's quite enough Kurumu!

Everyone turns around and there standing in the doorway ws your mother Akane.

Moka: Ms Akane.

Akane: Hello everyone.

She looked at Kurumu.

Akane: Getting the wedding jitters Kurumu?

Kurumu: Please don't tease me!

She was adjusting her hair in the mirror and trying to fix it. Then Akane calmly walked behind Kurumu and began fixing her hair.

Akane: Here. Let me help.

Kurumu stopped being frantic and finally relaxed.

Akane: If it helps any I understand how you feel.

Kurumu: Really?

Akane: Yes. I was the same way when I was marrying my husband.

Moka: Really? You?

Yuakri: A monster as powerful as you are?

Akane: Yes. I was in the same state as you are right now Kurumu. Hahaha I was a nervous wreck. But then I realized my husband loved me for who I was and I loved him back. And that's why you should believe that too Kurumu.

Kurumu: Thank you Ms. Akane...I mean mom.

Akane: No problem.

She gave her a hug and Kurumu felt better. Then she began thinking about how you were doing. Actually you were just as worried as she was. You were shaking like a leaf and you were thinking of the exact same thing as Kurumu was.

(name) What if she doesn't like me anymore?!? What if she leaves me hanging?!? WHAT IF SHE DOESN"T THINK I"M WORTHY!?!

Tskune: (NAME) GET IT TOGETHER!!!!!

This makes you stand straight like a solder at attention.

Tskune: You listen here! Kurumu loves you no matter what! Why do you think she stood by you?

(name) But......

Tskune: No buts! Do you love her!?!

(name) Yes?

Tskune: You want to be a good husband?!?

(name) Yes!

Tskune: Do you want to be with Kurumu forever!?!

(name) Yes!

Tskune: Good! Now get your butt out there and show her what a man you really are!!!!!!

(name) Sir yes Sir!

You salute and you march out of the room.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3grMB5wB... (We are one Lion King 2)

Later you stood at the alter waiting for Kurumu you were a lot calmer, but you were still nervous. A few minutes passed and then as soon as the clock struck 11 there was Kurumu. She was wearing a white gown and had a red rose bouquet. Her eyes twinkled like a pair of stars and her smile was so dazzling you would have to get a pair of sunglasses. When you saw her she looked so beautiful you thought you jump out and kiss her like crazy, but you kept your lust in check. You gulp and told yourself to focus. She met you up in the alter looking deeply into your eyes with both of your hearts racing. The priest said his piece and it was time to say your vows to each other.

Kurumu: (name) You've done so much for me. You loved me, you protected, me and you've been there for me and I've been truly grateful. There were times when I thought when we'd be separated and I felt you'd dump me, but now I realize that you love me with all your heart and you've showed me more than one occasion. And I see that you love me with all your heart and I only have one request......please take good care of me and......(sniff) I love you!

At the end of her speech she was in tears, but they weren't tears of sadness. They were tears of joy. You did your best not to cry, but the tears streamed down your face. Now it was your turn.

(name) Kurumu. When I first came to Yokai I never would've thought I'd be going on a wild a crazy adventure. And I never would've guessed that I would run into an amazing girl like you. Sometimes I feel like I'm not worthy to be the husband of a girl so pretty. You cared for me, you cried for me, and what's more you protected me with your life. Also you helped me find my real mom and now I feel like the luckiest guy in the world. I have a mom again, great friends, and most of all, I have the greatest girl the whole world. I don't know what the future lies in store for us, but I'm sure of one thing: We'll always be together and I'll always love you now and forever.

At the end of your speech tears of joy streamed down your face. Tskune and the other in the crowd were crying a little as well. Especially your mother.

Akane: (sob) That's my son...sniff....what a man my son tuned out to be!

Moka: There, there, there, Ms Akane....sniff.....I'm happy for him too.

Priest: (name) do you take Kurumu as your lawfully wedded wife?

(name) I do.

Priest: Kurumu do you take (name) To be your lawfully wedded husband?

Kurumu: I do.

Priest: Then by the power vested in me: I now pronounce you man and wife.

You lifted Kurumu up bridal style and you both gave each other a long and tender kiss. Everyone cheered and Kurumu threw the bouquet in the crowd and surprisingly Moka caught it. One thing's for sure this wedding was the best wedding you and Kurumu ever had.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Cut to the Wedding

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
A few weeks after the wedding, you all celebrated with a party. You then told everyone the good news about Kurumu being pregnant. At first everyone was shocked, but then they were happy because they would soon be uncles and aunts (more or less). Then you realized that you and Kurumu didn't exactly find a place to live yet so your mother had Kurumu live with you until they could find a place. Your father was in a surprise when he saw you with Kurumu. You forgot your father didn't know you and Kurumu were married, so you were a little worried that he'd be mad. Not to mention that you got Kurumu pregnant. But he smiled and was very happy. He was proud that not only did you get a girl, but he was also gonna have a grandchild.

A few months later Moka and Tskune and gang decided to check on you and Kurumu so they decided to pay you a visit.

Moka: Man It's been a while since we've seen (name) and Kurumu.

Yuakri: I know. It's practically almost been a year since we've seen them.

Mizore: I wonder how they're doing.

Rubi: I've heard things have been going great. (name)'s parents got back together and are spending a lot of time together.

Tskune: Have you heard from (name) and Kurumu Rubi?

Rubi: Well It has been almost a year now. I'm pretty sure they're fine.

Soon the gang reached your house. It was technically your father's and mother's place, but they went away on a trip recently so you and Kurumu were by yourselves. So you called your friends over to your place so you could pay you and Kurumu a visit. Moka rang the doorbell and you opened the door.

(name) Hey! Glad you could make it guys come on in.

You led everyone to the living room and prepared some tea.

Moka: So (name) how are things?

(name) Just great Moka! My parents are happy and so are me and Kurumu. And you?

Moka: Just fine actually.

Tskune: So hows Kurumu?

(name) She's fine. She just went to get dressed. She'll join us pretty soon.

Just then you all heard a familiar voice. The gang saw who it was, but they couldn't believe it.

Kurumu: Hello everyone. Looks like the gangs all here.

(name) Hey Kurumu. How are you feeling?

Kurumu: I'm fine just a little tired.

It was Kurmu, but was completely different. Her belly was huge! She was about nine months pregnant and she was wearing a blue maternity dress. When the gang saw this they just stared her blankly.

Kurumu: Hey what's wrong everyone?

(name) Yeah you look like you seen a ghost.

Mizore: Can you blame us?!? Kurumu! You're huge!

Yuakri: Not to mention your tits are even bigger than before!

Kurumu: Hahahaha well duh That's what's supposed to happen when you're pregnant.

(name) Hahahaha Yukari that comment was a little perverted dontcha think?

Yukari blushes and bows
Yuakri: I'm sorry!

Kurumu sits down on the couch next to you.
Kurumu: Hahaha It's okay. You have nothing to be sorry for.

Mizore: It's just kinda shocking seeing you.......well....pregnant.

Kurumu: Hahaha I know. I mean who would've thought right?

Moka: So how many months are you?

Kurumu: I'm about 9 months. The final trimester actually.

Everyone gasps when she says this comment, then the girls squeal with joy and surrounded Kurumu. They were completely excited and began asking Kurumu a whole bunch of questions.

Moka: That means the baby's gonna be born soon!

Kurumu: That's right.

Yuakri: Do you know what it is yet?

Kurumu: No not yet.

Mizore: Is it gonna be a monster or a human?

Kurumu: Well since (name)'s Half human half monster and I'm a full monster I guess that probably makes the baby 3/4 of a monster.

(name) Easy everyone don't overwhelm her.

Tskune: Can you blame them? (name) you lucky dog! You're gonna be a father soon!

(name) I know. I can hardly believe it either.

Yukari: Kurumu? Can I touch your belly?

Kurumu: Hahaha sure. Go right ahead.

Yukari gently placed her hand on Kurumu's belly and giggled.

Yukari: Wow. It's hard to believe there's a baby inside of you Kurumu.

Kurumu: Hahaha. I know. I still can't believe it either.

Mizore: I wanna feel too!

Then Mizore place her hand on her belly too.

Kurumu: Wow Mizore. I expected your hands to be cold, but it's surprisingly warm.

Mizore: I may be a snow witch, but I can control my temperature.

Moka wanted to feel too, but she hesitated.

(name) Moka what's wrong?

Moka: I've seen this on TV. Every time someone rubs the belly that causes the person to go into labor! I don't wanna be the cause of that!

You all stared and then you all laugh.

(name) Moka. You've been watching too many dramas.

Tskune: Besides it's just a myth.

Kurumu: It's okay it's not gonna bite you.

She took one of Moka's hands and placed it on her belly. Moka at first was nervous, but then she relaxed a little. Then she felt something in her belly move.

Moka: Hey! I think I felt a kick!

Yukari: Really?

Mizore: No way!

(name) Hahaha see? The baby likes you.

Then later everyone settled down and you decide to talk to Tskune alone. You told him a little about your parents getting back together and you and Kurumu thinking of names for the baby if it was a boy and a girl. Then you and Tskune stared into the sky.

Tskune: (name) You're lucky. You're married, you're gonna have a daughter or a son soon. Man. I'm a little jealous.

(name): Hahaha Don't worry Tskune. Soon you'll be married to Moka and be having kids before you know it.

Tskune: Heh thanks. I wonder what my kids will look like?

Before you could answer Mizore bursts through the door.

Tskune: What is it Mizore?

What does Mizore say?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Oh baby!

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Choose between these choices.

Twin girls or you choose.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: A choice

choices: (Continue to where you see the Grils grow up)
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
The instant you heard those words you bolted for Kurumu and took her up in your arms. She screamed out in pain as you carried her to your moms car. You had little experience of driving but didn't care. You drove through several 4 way intersections, went passed a one way street, and nearly got in ten car accidents on the way.

How you managed to get to the hospital in one piece is a miracle in of itself but you carried Kurumu to the emergency office as the doctors huddled around her. "She's going into labor!", you yelled. The doctors took her to a room so she can be taken care of properly. You wanted to go with her but they suggested you to sit and wait.

"I'm her husband dammit let me in!", you demanded.

"You can't we need to prep her and keep her from losing the baby wait here.", said one of the nurses.

The agony of the patience took one hell of a tool on you since you shook in your seat like it was sub zero. You stared at the clock hoping it to go by fast, but not too soon. Too soon would mean something bad, while too late would mean something bad. You noticed whatever the case you were terrified.

A calm hand over your shoulder tapped you and you instantly panicked for a moment. It was only Tskune and the others who made it a few minutes later. "Excuse me? Who brought the young lady in?", a doctor asked.

You rose up and answered him, "I did sir. She is my wife. Is she.."

"She is fine, the babies are fine.", he said.

"Babies?", Moka asked.

"She had twins the whole time. Both girls, you can all come in and see her now.", the doc said.

"Moka, Tskune come with me.", you asked them.

They walked with you and you entered the room seeing Kurumu with your children. Kurumu smiled as you three came in. "Come meet your daughters (Name).", she said.

"They are perfect...just like their mother...", you kissed Kurumu on the cheek.

"Moka, Tskune, we were thinking it for a while and we want the both of you to be their god parents. If there is any other couple we'd trust with them..it's you two.", Kurumu told them.

"Kurumu, were....honored to say the least...", Moka said crying. Tskune hugged Moka seeing the two newborns wrapped in their blankets.

"Thankyou.", Tskune said.

You held one of your daughters in your arms and thought of a name for her. "Who do you want her name to be?", Moka asked.

"For her...Jin. As gentle, and soft as her mother and caring as her dad.", you answered.

"And the other, we'll name Ty Lee. Calm as her father in times of pressure and beautiful as her mom.", Kurumu replied.

"Those are lovely names. Can..I..", Moka wanted to hold one of them in her arms, to which Kurumu lent Ty lee over to Moka.

"Awwwww...you are just the most adorable little thing. So much love in your family. You'll have a great life little one.", Moka told her.

Soon the others entered to see the kids and they did what you'd naturally expect them to react. The night passed and the twins were in perfect care. You were by Kurumu's side throughout the whole night and dreamed how the girls would one day turn out.

You cried tears of joy in your sleep to which Moka saw when she checked on the both of you and wiped them off without waking you almost as if she were doing it for her own child. Around that night Moka knew from them that she wanted a baby with Tskune but time would tell for it to be right.

As you and Kurumu slept on through the night, the newest chapter in your lives began from that point on.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Calm and Beautiful + Tenderness

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
It's been 17 years prior to you and Kurumu having your twin daughters, they have enrolled in the same school you went to and are beginning their first year there. You wake up to see your wife in bed next to you smiling like the happiest woman on earth. You knew today was the day where your two best-est girls would start their lives.

A couple hours later it was time to say goodbye to them.

"All right, have you packed everything Jin. You always forget one thing everytime you pack for the long term.", you kidded.

"I swear I have my things. And dad stop treating me like a kid, next thing you know you'll try to marry me off.", Jin replied.

"You always tease us about us finding our destined ones dad. But that won't happen, maybe from Jin but not me. I'm too esteemed for that stuff.", Ty Lee stated.

"Young lady if you are MY daughter you know that is the worst lie you ever made up.", Kurumu responded.

"But mom there's too much knowledge to soak in. And too many things I want to do, I don't have time for that stuff.", Ty insisted.

"Were monsters young one, we live a real long time. And if your me, you will savor each moment you have with your mate of fate forever till you both die in peace. (Name) my darling, you are that perfect mate.", she said kissing you.

The twins both complained in unison, "Moooooom, Daaaaaaad, not in front of us."

"Sorry, oh holy smokes your bus is leaving soon get over there pronto! Goodbye my angles.". you said as they left for the bus feeling embarrassed by your goodbye.

"Tormenting them until the end?", Kurumu asked.

"Down to the last goodbye. Now we have a looooong year alone but ourselves.", you answered.

"Oh you sly devil you.", Kurumu grabbed your head and kissed you passionately. You closed your front door and made love to Kurumu.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Like the cycle of the seasons

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
(The music as follows: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Id7AiR0DO... )

(From now on the focus will stay on Ty Lee and Jin they will be the main characters)

Ty lee and Jin head to the bus eager to begin their first day at school. Jin was hoping to make lots of friends while Ty lee wanted to learn about her heritage and monster world. On the bus they made a pact.

"From here on out we stick together and we have each others back. Never alone, always together.", Jin and Ty Lee said together.

They were ready to tackle the whole thing and thought nothing would distract them. As the bus dropped them off they walked to see the academy in all its glory. They saw their peers and a whole crowd doing their thing. Jin couldn't wait to befriend as many as possible, male or female.

Ty lee, wanted class to begin and have the day go by as slowly as possible, wanting to soak up ever piece of info she could digest. Though not a bookworm, she was in heaven having her favorite topic the soul premise of this schools learning agenda. She would occasionally accompany her sister in some antics to let people know she's still a fun girl to hang with.

"Well here we are Ty, our lives begin here.", Jin said inspiring her a bit.

"I have a feeling we will be in for the best year of our lives." she replied to Jin.

They walked inside the school and went to their respective classes Jin went to her English class and Ty went to her monsters 101. They sat in their seats and waited for their teachers to arrive. They were so excited in one way or another and couldn't hold in their excitement.

Then as the door opened their teachers arrived beginning their journey...
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: The walk to class

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty made it to class without dilly dallying. She wanted to remain focused and was eager to learn about the heritage of her monster powers. She excitedly awaited as her teacher entered the room with her giving out all the pleasantries. She gave everyone the syllabus and what they would cover, to everyone it was boring but to Ty Lee it was making her ecstatic!

She couldn't wait to get started, but unfortunately the period ended and she had to go to her next one. But she was approached by some kind of female student.

"Hi! My name is Yuki. I have heard about you and your sister! Oh my god your parents are legends! They com[letly changed my life!", she said.

"Uh hi? I'm-"

"Ty Lee daughter of Kurumu and (Name) has her mothers inherited gifts as a succumbus! She was sooo beautiful! You look so much like her!", she came off a bit creepy but she was genuinely nice and was more of a fan if any.

"How-"

"Sorry about this. When I heard about you and your sister coming here I had to meet you. I'm just a little excited is all.", she said cooling down.

"Alright. Listen I appreciate your kindness but I have to get to class.", Ty lee said.

"Oh not a problem. I know theres a lot to cover the first day. See ya!", she ran off.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Start with Ty Lee

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
At the next class Ty Lee saw Yuki again this time she was a little more calmer. At first she thought she was gonna get annoying again, but surprisingly she stayed focused on her class. Needless to say Ty Lee was a little disappointed for some reason, but at the same time she was a little impressed.

Ty Lee: Wow. Here I was thinking she was a fan girl, but she can be focused if she wants to.

After class Ty Lee went to see Yuki.

Yuki: Oh hi Ty Lee.

Ty Lee: Hey. You didn't tell me you were a bookworm.

Yuki: Haha well I may be your parent's biggest fan, but I can work hard if I really wanted to.

Ty Lee: Hey. You wanna walk home?

Yuki: Sure! I live a few blocks down anyway.

Ty Lee: Sweet!

While they walked home Yuki told a little about herself and Ty Lee did the same. They told each other interests, favorite class, etc. Soon they came to Ty Lee's place.

Yuki: Wow. So this is where you live huh?

Ty Lee: Yup. Home sweet home. Where do you live?

Yuki: I live at house over there.

She pointed to a white house that was a few blocks down.

Ty Lee: I see. Yuki?

Yuki: Yes?

Ty Lee: You know... You're pretty cool. At first I thought that you were an obsessed fan girl, but you're pretty nice and a hard worker. I think we'll be great friends.

Yuki: Yup me too.

Then something swooped down from the sky right past them and landed on the ground.

Yuki: What was that?!?

Ty Lee: Don't worry it's just......
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Next Class (Yuki is there)

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"Ty! What a coincidence! I was just on my way to see somebody here when I noticed you and your friend over here.", Kurumu said.

"Oh mom, this is Yuki. Yuki this is my mother, Kurumu Kurono.", Ty introduced.

"Pleasure to meet a new friend of my daughters.", Kurumu said.

"Oh my god. Your so much like your mom Ty! You are such an inspiration for me! I can't thank you enough!", Yuki said shaking Kurumu's hand.

"I don't know how I inspired you but I am happy I did.", Kurumu replied.

"Mom why are you here?", Ty asked.

"Oh nothing honey. Just have to run a small errand. I'll be home when you and Jin get back.", she said flying off.

"She is so nice! She's the shining example of Succumbie. I always wanted to be like her, be an example of my race's greatness.", Yuki said.

"Mom just fell in love with my dad. Nothing to praise about that...", Ty replied.

"I beg to differ. She faced against monsters that were very powerful and she is among the few who married their mate of fate. Which I wonder...haven't you found yours?", Yuki asked.

"I don't have time for love. Besides I never believe that who ever does fall in love with me is just blown away by my body. Love is scarce. I don't deny it's existence but I only find it in family. Finding it while making one of your own is something else.", Ty confessed.

"I think you will find it. You just haven't met the right person yet.", Yuki insisted.

"Yeah, like mom always tells me.", Ty said back.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Kurumu (my mom)

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Meanwhile Kurumu was flying around searching for a certain shop. Then she spotted it. She swooped down and landed safely on the ground.

Kurumu: Here we are. This the place.

She walked inside the store for a few minutes and then she came out with a little box.

Kurumu: Oooh! Ty Lee is gonna love this!

Then she took off into the evening sky. But little did she know she was being followed. A dark figure saw her take off and then it flew after her. Meanwhile Yuki and Ty Lee were talking and chatting about their first day. Then Jin came home. She was humming a little tune when she came in.

Jin: Hey sis! Who's your buddy?

Ty Lee: This is Yuki my new friend. Yuki, this my twin sister Jin.

Yuki: Oh my gosh! It's an honor to meet you Jin! (shaking her hand)

Jin: Likewise I'm sure. So how was your day sis?

Ty Lee: Pretty normal. I met a few friend and classes were great. You?

Jin: Pretty much the same. I saw a cute boy in my class though. He reminded me of dad. Hehe

Ty Lee: Jin. You shouldn't be worrying about boys all the time. You should stay focused on your school work.

Jin: Oh come on sis. Don't be such a downer.

Yuki: Is your dad here? It'd be awesome if I could meet him!

Jin: Hmm. Now that you mention it I haven't seen him.

Then all of a sudden all three of them heard a swooping noise and thump outside.

Ty Lee: Oh! That must be dad now! Come on Yuki!

All three of them went outside and there walking toward the three of them was....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Back to Kurumu

choices: Yuki talks to you and Kurumu
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
As Ty, Jin, and Yuki came to see you Yuki was taken aback by an enormous dragon landing on the back yard. A loud roar echoed through the winds and then it began to shirnk to normal size and transformed into you. "Daaaad, you really need to show off right now?", Ty said.

"Wasn't my intention but sorry if I came across as such.", you replied.

"Yuki this is our father (Name). Dad this is Yuki, she our new friend. We met in class today, she's a fan of our family history.", Ty introduced.

"A pleasure to meet you.", you said to Yuki trying to be formal.

"Sqweeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Oh my gosh this is such an honor, no privilage, no just flat out phenominal to meet you Mr. (Name). I have read so much about your adventures at Yokai. And your wife is my hero. Wait, tell me I didn't say that last part out loud.", Yuki said finally ceasing her fan-girlish nature.

"Well...it's nice to have a fan of our family. Speaking of Kurumu, where is she?", you asked Ty and Jin.

"Inside dad.", Jin answered.

"Thankyou you little wee one.", you joked.

"DAD! I told you to stop calling me that! You know I hate it when you do!", Jin yelled annoyed by her father's joking habits.

"He only calls you that because you act like the youngest one.", Ty interjected.

"I was born the same time as you!"

"I matured faster than you. As evident by your hunt for your mate of fate.", Ty said acting like she was better than Jin.

"Hey! That's private! And where do you come off as all fancy and proper? You know as well as mom knows you'll be dying to have at least some guy eatting out of your palm.", Jin replied.

"Well at least I never sexually assaulted one, at 10 years of age.", Ty said sparking a fury in Jin.

"GRaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!Take it back! Take it back!", Jin yelled grabbing Ty Lee's hair.

"Both of you stop! Your sisters, don't fight. What's gotten into you Ty?", Yuki yelled breaking up the fight before it got worse.

"Sorry...I....need a minute alone.", Ty said leaving for her room.

A few minutes later Yuki entered Ty Lee's room wondering why she was acting rude to her sister. Yuki kindly knocked on her door and Ty allowed her to come in.

"I'm sorry about that. Jin's always been my mom's favorite and my dad's pride and joy.", Ty explained.

"I don't think they treat you any differently than Jin.", Yuki replied.

"No, it's not that they don't love Jin more than me. No...it's, mom see's herself in Jin as if she is looking in a mirror. And it sucks when I'm the same type of monster as her and yet I seem to be repressing it. Dad always thought Jin was more lively and fun. I just sit around and read about things they probably don't even care for. They try and connect with me when I'm feeling down and it is almost like Jin is the favorite but deep down she is, and I can't seem to get their attention that often even when I'm being the responsible one.", Ty said opening her heart out.

" I'm sorry. I had never expected..."

"You can go home, I'll see you in class tomorow. I just want to be alone for the rest of the night.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Good Parents

choices: A ruby shapped like a dragon fang with magic
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Yuki had just left the Ty Lee alone. When she went out she found that there was someone standing beside the doorway. It was you.

Yuki: Gah! Mr. (name)! What are you doing here?!?
