(Name) Nothing special. Just thought I'd hang around.

Yuki: OK. Um.....I got to go home.

She nervously walked by you and headed out the door.

(name): Hey Yuki. Don't worry about Ty. I'll talk to her.

Yuki: What? You mean....you heard everything?

(name) Yup.

Yuki: How much did you hear?

(name) I heard enough. But don't I'll talk to her. After all what kind of father would I be if I didn't care about my own kid? Leave it to me.

You gave her a thumbs up and a wink. When Yuki saw your gesture, she felt reassured. She smiled and bowed politely.

Yuki: Thank you Mr. (name)! I leave it to you.

(name): No problem. By the way, you can stop the formalities. You can call me (name) if you want.

Yuki: Okay! Mr......I mean, (name)! And thank you!

With that, Yuki went home. As you for you went to Ty's room. You found her lying on her bed with her face in her pillow.

(name) Ty? Are you okay honey?

Ty: Hi dad.

(name) Got into a fight with your sister huh?

Ty didn't say anything. You calmly walked into Ty's room and sat next to her on her bed.

(name) You know, I happened to overhear everything you said. And I wanted to tell you everything you said is wrong. Please don't think we like her better than you or anything. We like you for who you are. You're a very special girl.

Ty: Really? I don't feel special. I feel like I'm overshadowed all the time.

Then you got up and left the room for minute and then you came back into the room carrying the same box that Kurumu got in the shop. Ty looked and saw you with the box.

Ty: What's that?

(name): I asked Kurumu to get this for you. I was saving this for later, but now would be a good time.

You opened the box and what was inside shocked Ty to the bone. Inside was.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Yuki goes home

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"Dad..that's mom's only link to you.", Ty Lee said.

"Your mother and I were given that to me by my mother after the wedding before we had you and Jin. She said it keeps the bond between two lovers close together even when far apart. This one is yours, Jin will earn hers when she's ready. But you need it more right now, so that when the day comes when you find the one for you it will keep you and him together.", you explained.

"Dad, I know I'm not like Jin as you and mom hoped. I just want to make you proud."

"Of course were proud of you Ty Lee. Your doing what YOU want to do and it's all we want you to become. We may not have the same interests but you and me always stuck together when Jin or Mom got on your nerves when they teased you. Your not the love sick puppy your mom was in her highschool years, but you do have her heart and brains. And theres nobody else in the world who would be any better a sibling to Jin except maybe you. You two bikker time to time but you'll both be around to take a bullet for each other without thinking."

"I know, Im sorry for what I said about you and mom."

"I know baby. But trust me when I say your mom's pride and joy and mine too. And no matter what it will NEVER change.", you swore.

Ty hugged you and you returned her hug. "Ah dad, you always know what to say for these things."

"It's a talent, like your knowlege of monsters and things I would fail in if it was on a test.", you joked.

"Ha ha, daaaad. Your, just the best.", Ty said as you let her be.

Ty Lee wraped the fang around her neck and it made her feel like she was connected to herself more than ever. She seemed to accept her Succubi half and that it will bloom when it's ready as she is. She found comfort in having her father understanding her as well as his trust with such a personal gift given to his mother. To Ty Lee this was her most cherished possesion ever given to her father, and she would take care of it.

Meanwhile...

"How'd it go with Ty?", Kurumu asked.

"She's better. I wonder...are we..not doing enough for them? Like are we not being there for the both of them equally?", you asked.

"I don't know, but I do know were not being terrible parents. I know you and I are doing our best for our children. And I know we'll find a way to put it right.", Kurumu said.

"I love you Kurumu. I can't ever imagine any part of my life without you in it."

"I know, and your the best of my my life, but not better than Jin or Ty Lee. They'll always take higher priority over you."

"A little harsh huh?"

"My children mean more to me than anything else like a mom should. But you mean alot as well and I'd be just become destroyed if anything bad happened to you."

"I know my love, but don't worry. Life is good here and our lives are peacful."

"I hope your right...I just worry."

"Take relife that if anything happens, they should know not to mess with me. Come here you!"

You grabbed Kurumu and tried to tackle her, she struglled and got out of your grip and tried to run but you dove into her and playfully rolled around the living room. You stopped to look at each other and slowly you both smiled. You kissed passionatly on the lips together and gently bumped your foreheads together as sign of your love.

"We'll always be together right?"

"Right."

Then Jin and Ty Lee saw you two together in the back watching you. Jin spoke up and asked, "And we'll all be together right?"

"Right", Kurumu answered.

"Girls let me tell you something that my mother told me. 'No matter what is shown in front of you, just remember that your heart will always be the best thing to guide you. And so your loved ones.", she finished.

You all huddled in for a group hug and embraced eachother like a family.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: A ruby shapped like a dragon fang with magic

choices: The ruby dragon fang began to glow
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
The very next day it was the same as usual. Both sisters attended school and lived their school life to the fullest. Jin became one of the most popular girls in the entire school. She was also great at sports. In fact she was even better than the boys. Ty Lee however stayed focused on her studies. She was focused on researching on her heritage on her powers and she loved every bit of information that she could find. She soon became well known as the smartest girl in school that rivaled Yukari Sendo. Later that day, Jin, Ty Lee and Yuki were now all having their lunch period together.

Jin: Mmmmmm!! (stretching). Man! What a day! Being one of the best girls in sports can sure be tiring. The boys are no challenge at all.

Yuki: That's because they're either gawking at you or trying to get you to go out with them.

Jin: Why me? Why am I cursed to being so beautiful and having all the boys in school fall at my feet?

Yuki: (sweatdrop). I think you may be stretching the truth a bit.

Then Yuki looked over at Ty Lee. She was in her own little world reading a book.

Yuki: Hey Ty Lee. Whatcha reading? A dating book?

Ty Lee: Very funny. No, just a book on dragons. I'm trying to see what powers and abilities they have and see if I have those abilities and powers. I want to be as strong as my dad after all.

Yuki: Oh come on Ty, you should be trying to find your mate. After all, you are part succubi and part dragon.

Ty Lee: Like I said before I don't have time for love. It's scarce and I don't want any part in it. Besides boys are in it for the looks and I'm not that good looking.

Jin: Oh come on sis, you're putting yourself down girl! You're really good looking.

Yuki: Yeah! You have a very pretty face and you got nice eyes and ooh! you have a nice butt and a big pair of....

Ty Lee: OK let's not go there Yuki. Look I don't want to fall in love right now the only thing I'm focused on right now is finding out my abilities.

Then Ty Lee returned to her book and Yuki and Jin shrugged their shoulders and went back to talking about boys. As Ty Lee read her book, she thought about what Jin and Yuki had been saying about finding her mate.

Ty Lee (thinking): Yeah right. Me? Getting a mate? Not gonna happen besides I don't even know if I'm strong or good enough to get a mate. Now if you don't mind, I have to keep trying to figure out my powers.

Then she remembered the necklace that you gave her last night. She looked at it and glistened in the sunshine.

Ty Lee: I wonder if this necklace dad gave has some sort of secret? Maybe it can help me with my powers.

She looked to see if the ruby had some kind of secret, but it looked like a plain ruby dragon fang. Then.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Continue

choices: Ty lee and Ronin talk casually
Ty lee and Ronin talk about how to lift the curse
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
The book began to go through the pages and went to an empty page. Then the page began to write itself saying, "Hello there."

"You can...talk?"

"Not verbally but I can hear you. Don't tell the others, It might draw the wrong attention. "

"Who are you?"

"A friend. "

The book closed and sealed itself shut. Jin and Yuki waved over Ty lee as if nothing was wrong but in reality, things may be devestating.

Ty lee returned to her room after school and opened the book. The page then began writing itself again. "My name is Ronin. I'm actually a human trapped in the pages of this book. You heard of the ancient dragon?"

"No."

"Well, suppose I can explain. Nope there's too much let me sum up, the mighty dragon Sozin nearly burned down a great city. The only way to stop him was sacrificing myself in exchange the gods smite it from creation. So now I have spent the last 1000 years in this book. So naturally I'm an expert in dragons. But your name escapes me."

"Ty lee."

"Turn the page to 24601.", she did so revealing the eyes of Ronin himself. "I see that the gods blessed me with a most lovely figure. "

"You've been trapped for 1000 years? Is there a way to free you?"

"Yes. But doing so would resurect Sozin. However, I imagine that there's a way to free me without revivng the dragon now that magic and science has evolved no doubt."

"I'd be happy to free you."

"You can call me by my other name, Inigo."

"Unreal! You are THE Inigo Ronin! The master of 4 elements and the dragon lord?!"

"That last part wasn't my intended name for my legacy but yes. Now I need you to keep me a secret from your friends and family. If I am not mistaken your father is half dragon. And his mother is too?"

"Yes why?"

"Because, most half dragons view me as a dark magic weilder. But I use dark magic for peace not conquest. I'm misunderstood, like you Ty lee."

She blushed, "Your secret is safe with me."
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: A dark secret

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ronin: So tell me. What's life like now that you've found me after all these years I've been sealed away?

Ty Lee: Well....I guess a lot has changed after a thousand years.

After that Ty Lee began telling you about how you and Kurumu and the rest of the gang saved Yokai Academy from certain evil and how you and Kurumu ended up together and many other things.

Ronin: Amazing. So not only your father is half human and half dragon, but your mother is succubi as well?

Ty Lee: Hahaha. Yeah. More or less.

Ronin: Amazing. That would make you one fourth human, one fourth dragon, and half succubi.

Ty Lee: Well....yeah. Pretty much.

Ronin: Incredible. That would explain why you're so beautiful.

Ty Lee: (blushing) Th-thank you.

Ronin: And you also have a twin sister named Jin right? She sounds like a nice person.

Ty Lee: I wouldn't go that far.

Ronin: What makes you say that?

Ty Lee: Well, she may be my sister and she may have her moments, but there are some things that she does that drive me off the wall! She can be stuck up, over confident, and she thinks about nothing, but finding her destined to be. It's so annoying.

Ronin: She seems the perfectionist type of girl. Aside from the over confident and stuck up parts isn't it natural for a succubi to find her destined to be? You and your sister are succubi after all.

Ty Lee: I know, but there is such a thing as restraint. Besides I'm not really interested in finding a boy.

Ronin: Why not?

Ty Lee: Well because.....I don't think anyone would be interested in me. I'm not like my sister. She's the one with the good looks in the family. I mean she's got every single boy at her feet. Me? All I ever do is read my books. I don't think I deserve to meet my destined one.

Ronin: That's not true. You're a very beautiful girl. And personally I think you deserve to meet your destined to be. You should be more confident in yourself.

Ty Lee (blushing): R-really?

Ronin: Really. And if I may venture in opinion, you read to find out more about your powers and your heritage right?

Ty Lee: Yes. More than anything.

Ronin: I can teach you some things if you wish.

Ty Lee: Really? You can?

Ronin: Yes. I can teach you everything there is to know about dragons. After all, I am an expert on them.

Ty Lee: And........you think I'll become strong enough to get you out of that book?

Ronin: I can't promise anything, but I can guarantee that you will understand your potential and your powers.

Ty Lee: Thank you. Um.....Ronin? Can I ask you something?

Ronin: Of course. Ask me anything.

Ty Lee: Well....do you think I'm....weird?

Ronin: Why would you ask that?

Ty Lee: Well.....I.......I'm not like other succubi.....I'm a bookworm and all I do is read. Doesn't that......make me strange?

Ronin: Strange? Weird? Hahahaha. Certainly not. Ty Lee, you're the best thing that's ever happened to me in a thousand years. Yes, people like us are sometimes misunderstood about our craving of knowledge, but I feel that I can understand you when I talk to you and that is my most sincere feeling.

Ty Lee: Yeah. Me too. I feel the same way.

Then Ty Lee let a short yawn and she covered her mouth with embarrassment.

Ty Lee: Oops sorry. I guess, I'm getting a little sleepy.

Ronin: Don't worry. It's late and you should sleep.

Ty Lee: OK, but will you still be here when I wake up?

Then a page came up from the book and turned into a paper rose bookmarking the place where Ronin's page was.

Ronin: I promise. Sweet dreams my princess.

The book closed and sealed shut once more and Ty Lee went to sleep hugging the book in her arms.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Ty lee and Ronin talk casually

choices: Skip to Ty lee trying to lift the curse
Jin tries to hang out with Ty lee
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ronin and Ty lee started their private tutoring after school the next day. She passed each trial to near perfection every time on her first attempts. And with each lesson completed she grew closer to not only freeing Ronin but grew closer to him emotionally. "Remember what I said about your sister as a perfectionist, I take it back."

Ty lee giggled at his joke. "Your the best friend I ever had. Even my god parents can't beat how much fun we've been having. "

"Does trying to lift an ancient curse seem fun to you? I think I'm safer in the book."

"Hahaha! Now that was funny. What did you use to do for fun?"

"Well aside from the pursuit of knowlege I also took a pursuit in the art of fiction. "

"Your a writer?"

"Never could keep myself away from books back then. Now look at me, I am one."

"Hehehe, what was it about?"

"Science. "

"You mean alchemy? "

"Your modern science actually. That character? What's his name? Lock something?"

"Sherlock Holmes?"

"YES! I love the idea of the best of mans intellect against evil."

"Well when your free what say we...uh...write it together? Just us?", she asked blushing.

"I'd love to. Though remaking a character from that idea might be tricky. Oh well back to it then. Now let the energy flow through your body. Your it's guide, not it's master."
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Connection between master and student

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
A few days had passed and Ty lee was now ready to attempt breaking Ronin out of the curse. It took rigorous training, but the results were worth it. At least she hoped. "Remeber, concetrate only what you need, not desire. When your mind is detached it can acomplish wonders."

"I'm getting there Ronin. You'll be alive again yet."

"How many times must I ask you call me by my first name?"

"I like Ronin more than Inigo. "

"Who prefers to be called by their last name? It's like being called Lee instead of Ty lee. "

"Ty lee is my full first name. It's like being called Ron- then stopping."

"See your point. Now the circle is complete, have you poured the right ingredients?"

"Everything."

"No, there's something missing. A lock of hair from a beautiful girl.", a piece of Ty lee's hair came off and dropped in the ingredients. Ty lee wasted no more time and began the spell. For a while it was working, the book glowed, the pages flew off, and Ronin felt being lifted out of the book.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Skip to Ty lee trying to lift the curse

choices: There was a knock on Ty Lee's door
Inigo begins teach Ty Lee spells and how to bend.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
The pages of the book flew in all directions then the converged in one spot, then slowly the pages began to form a person. The page with Inigo's eyes were the last to fuse with the body and there Inigo stood in a body made of paper like a mummy.

Ty Lee: I......I did it!

Inigo: Yes you did. Thank you.

Ty Lee: You're welcome. So....did it work?

Inigo walked toward Ty Lee and flexed his arms testing them. Then Ty Lee reached out to touch him as did he, but then his hand fell apart.

Ty Lee: Oh no. Your hand! What happened?

Inigo: Oh silly me. Of course this would happen. I remain bound to the book.

He walked toward the book and then his hand reformed.

Ty Lee: The curse must still be in effect. I'm sorry. I guess I wasn't strong enough to break the curse.

Inigo: No. It's OK. You did nothing wrong. At least you were able to get me out of the book. But now that if I ever want to be truly free, we'll need magic from a greater power. But the problem is where to find such a source.

Ty Lee: I can do it! You can teach me the spells. I want to do everything I can to help!

Inigo: Ty Lee. Are you sure?

Ty Lee: Yes. I want to learn. Please teach me.

Inigo hesitated for a moment to think, then he held up his hand and unleashed a blinding flash of light. Ty Lee was blinded by the light for a moment. Then when her eyes cleared and the light dissipated she gasped in wonder. Everywhere around her room there were stacks of books. Then one by one the books began to float and fly all around her and Inigo.

Inigo: To break free from this curse, you're going to need to learn more than just a few spells. I must teach you everything I know. Everything from The book of Nord to The Versium Chronicle is at your disposal. More than 6,000 pages full of charms, incantations, and spells.

Ty Lee: That's a lot of reading.

Inigo: I know, but I have full confidence that you will learn everything in no time. I've learned everything from the most powerful spells to the most advanced bending techniques.


Ty Lee: No way! Can you teach me how to bend elements too?

Inigo: Yes. All four of them if you wish, but the training and teaching may be difficult. Are you sure you'll be able to handle it?

Ty Lee: I can do it. I don't have the brains in my family for nothing. Don't worry I can do it.

Inigo: Very well. I'll begin teaching you everything I learned and soon you'll become a powerful master.

Ty Lee: And we'll be able to break the curse right?

Inigo: Yes. Don't worry. We'll cross that bridge when we get there. For now, let's begin.

Then....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: It mostly worked

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"To start your training you must learn the elements as what they are and not what you can do with them. Water is change, it's always changing form and shifts direction. Earth is substance, it is diverse with life and is strong and it's enduring. Fire is energy and life, it breaths and grows and is the most unstable when not weilded with care. But used properly it can show new colors of life like you with your knowlege. Air is freedom, it blows wherever it desires and nothing stops it from moving.", Ronin explained.

"Why tell me the elements like this?"

"Because it is the combination of the 4 elements that makes a master like me so powerful. Even without bending them, they can make you more powerful too. First you should work with water."

"Why not fire or earth? "

"Because learning the calm and collectivness of water will make you more prepared for the training ahead. Fire is done last for most of us masters because of how dangerous and wild it can be. So we'll take it slow and start with water. "

"You should know don't you? You must have felt eager to try fire early yourself? "

"I did. Nearly burned my own house down."

"I trust you Inigo, with my heart."

"I'm flattered, Ty lee you impress me with your wisdom. Normal apprentices I took on didn't heed their sensei's warnings. One of the few things I love about you.", he said.

"You...love?", she blushed.

"Well...not entirely romantically to say but...oh crap. I'm not very good with modern day small talk."

"No it's...I've never been complimented like that from another boy before."

"Now that's flattery from my era. I'm over a thousand years old yet you refer to me as a man your age."

"Hehehe, your so funny. "

"Right now to begin. You need to learn telekenisis, the key to weilding the elements. Ounce mastered, you will bend the elements. "
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Inigo begins teach Ty Lee spells and how to bend.

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ronin was just about begin teaching when there was a knock on her door making both of them jump. Then you both heard a familiar voice from behind the door.

Jin: Ty Lee? Ty you there?

Ty Lee: Oh crap! It's my sister!

Meanwhile Jin was outside Ty Lee's room. She had noticed that Ty Lee wasn't acting like herself lately and she felt that she should check on her.

JIn: Hello? You there? You've been in your room a lot lately and I was checking to see if you're OK.

There was silence, then Ty Lee opened the door.

Ty Lee: Um..hi sis. What's up? Hehehe

Jin: Hi. I was just checking on you. You've been in your room a lot lately. Are you feeling OK?

Ty Lee: I'm fine. In fact I'm better than OK. I'm great.

Jin: But...I thought I heard voices. Are you talking to someone?

Ty Lee: What? Who me? No. Just me and a good book. A really good book.

Jin: OK....if you say so. Well, I let you get back to your book. See you.

Ty Lee: OK see ya!

With that, Ty Lee hastily shut the door leaving Jin completely baffled and confused.

Jin: What's with her? I've seen her engrossed in a book before, but never this much.

Curious as to what was going on, Jin put her ear on the door and tried to hear what was really going on. Then she heard Ty Lee talking again.

Ty Lee: Sorry about that Ronin. She won't bother us again.

Jin: Ronin? Who's Ronin?

Then Jin had a thought.

Jin: Wait. Hiding in her room? Looking flustered when I talked to her? Talking to someone? No way. There could be one logical explanation.......Jin's got a boyfriend! EEEEE!!!!!

Ty Lee: What the.....Is someone there?

Before Jin could get caught standing in front of Ty Lee's room, she dashed all the way back to her room.

Jin: This is so cool! Ty Lee's finally got a boy! I didn't know she had it in her! That sly vixen. I gotta find out more about this guy she's seeing! What was his name? Ronin? Hold on.....

Then upon hearing Ronin's name, Jin began to get a little concerned.

Jin: Wait a minute. Ronin? I've heard that somewhere before. But where?

Jin thought and thought till she couldn't think anymore. Then she decided to get some research, but where should she go to get the research?

Should she ask you or Kurumu or look up some research in the library (for the first ever)?

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Jin decided to go to the Yokai library to see if she can find some research on Ronin. She went to the library and looked for any info on Ronin. So far she didn't find anything. She searched and she searched, but she couldn't find anything about Ronin.

Jin: That's strange. I can't find any info on Ronin at all. Man! I'm not used to this sort of thing! How does Ty Lee do this?!? (sigh) I cant give up now. I have to find whatever info I can find.

Jin continued to search. She looked on every shelf and she looked in every history book, but sadly she couldn't find any info on Ronin anywhere.

Jin: Man. I can't find anything about Ronin. What's up with that? Grrr! This is so frustrating! How am I supposed to find info about Ronin if I can't even find a single book about him?!? (sigh) Oh well. I'll check one more time. If I can't find anything, then I guess I'll have to ask either mom or dad.

She checked again. As she was looking through the books, she still didn't find anything. Then she saw a strange looking book. It was red and the label read "Four or Nine"

Jin: What the....? That's a strange looking book.

She reached out and touched it. When she did, the book began to glow and some of the letters disappeared and now the book said "Ronin" Then the book case next to her opened and inside there was a secret tunnel.

Jin: What the heck? A secret door?

Jin followed the tunnel until it led to a room that was filled with books that Jin had never seen before.

Jin: Whoa. I never seen this room before. This place must be packed with books about Ronin! But, where do I begin?

Then she saw a book sitting on a pedestal titled.....

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Jin began reading the book illustrating who Ronin was exactly. It read, "Long ago the monster realm was being threatened into chaos by a sorcerer named Sozin. However a master of not only magic but the four elements. He brought an end to Sozin's terror but that is part of his legend."

"Inigo Ronin started off as an apperentice to the great warlock of his time. Under his master's wing Ronin spent years perfecting the magic his master instructed and in 12 years he surpassed his old master. It's unknown as to who the master was or how close they were but without his teacher he would never become what he turned to be,"

"Ounce he became a respected wizard among the realm he discovered how certain monsters had natural weaknesses to certain elements. Fascinated he studied the elements but without even seeking it, he discovered how to bend them to his own will. While digging into his studies he learned of ancient techniques that used the elements like never before. He learned of a wise master who was presumed to be dead, but turned out to be alive, who mastered all the elements. "

The more Jin read the more she became worried for her sister, "Soon he became what experts call today, an dragonborn. A being so powerful and had much wisdom, nobody would oppose them. Thus he earned the name, The Dragon of the four elements. "

"Holy...is this who Ty is hooking up with? Oh god I hope he isn't looking like an old man. But seriously, why is he in Ty Lee's room? And why the secrecy? Only one way to find out! Read whatever she's reading and sneak in her room."

To keep things simple, Ronin and Ty Lee were passing a ball of water back and forth like they were playing ball. Ty Lee at first was having trouble, but she was getting it little by little.

"So then for a whole week, Jin would not stop tailing the first crush she had in the first grade."

"I'd imagine the antics that followed."

"Wrong. She would try snuggling, kissing, and I'm not even kidding humping the poor kid for a solid week. Her succubus side came before she even knew what she was doing."

"Among your kind I imagine that occurs often among children of powerfull succubi. You cant be innocent of that either I know it."

"Nope your wrong."

"Oh come on Ty Lee I know you had to have had some flare in your flame of passion and youth. Come on what was your dark childhood secret? "

"Argh ok. I never told my parents this but I ounce made out to a cute boy when I was only 6. And Jin was a witness since she made me do it on a dare. Said I had to know how to kiss well if I wanted my destined one to like me."

"Strange? You seemed to be close to Jin back then."

"Hell we were a pair back then. We were the same at one point, we'd talk about our destined ones and how to ensare boys. But while I tried for the subtle and quiet type approach, It made me turn into a bookworm. Now here I am talking to, a book so to speak. "

"You should spend time with her. I bet she misses those days."

"I do too to be honest. I mean, aside from the being the best succubus in the world I miss the bonding and fun we had."

"This is off topic but you had your first kiss because of a dare?"

"Yeah, in fact because the boy was so 'satisfied' by it, Jin swore never to tell our folks. Hehehe, why do you ask?", Ty asked with a bit of herself hoping he would ask her to do it.

"Uhh no specific....reason."

Ty Lee took Ronin by his hand as he faced away from her. She felt around his face with his skin all but paper and ink. "Inigo if only I could , make you human again. I'd...", before she could finish she heard her door knock.

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"Hey Ty Lee, do you mind if I come inside? I know you don't want to hang out with me a lot recently, but can we please talk?"

Ty Lee opened her door and let Jin in her room for the first time in ages. Ty Lee hugged her sister, and was glad she wasn't feeling angry about her being isolated in her room. "Hey Jin, look I'm sorry I've been creepy and been acting like a hermit. "

"Oh please, you'd have to steal my boyfriend in order to make me pissed at you. Not that I have one yet."

"Well I'm just happy your not angry with me. Plus I want to trust you with a big secret. And no telling mom and dad."

"Is it that you've snagged a cute boyfriend you sexy girl you?"

"He's not..I mean...were just frrrr..oh shut up."

"I knew it! You had him sneak in your room all this time!"

"Well technically I've never left her room so sneaking isn't accurate.", Ronin said. Ronin reformed himself and introduced himself, "I am Inigo Ronin, the dragon of the four elements."

"It figures that the first boy Ty Lee falls for is a guy made from a book.", Jin joked.

"Hahaha! I find that rather amusing since your sister is a genius and quite intelligent."

"Soooo, yeah your over thousands of years old and beat that Sozin guy right? How come your in that book?"

One explaination later...

"I get it now. So man Ty, you scored the Jackpot!"

"Shut it Jin. "

"Well hey how far are you from getting him out?"

"Just about a day or so from doing so but Jin don't go reading any of the books they're very dang-"

Jin went on to look through the last page that was bookmarked to both Ronin and Ty Lee's horror. Before they could stop her Ty Lee and Jin were sucked inside the book!
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Yes (wants to reconnect with her twin sister ag...

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Suddenly the sisters were in what looked like a castle and it appeared that everyrthing except them was black and white. The instinctivly talked to the first person they saw. "Excuse me, can you tell me what's going on?", asked Jin. It turned out to be Ronin when he was not in the book."Ronin? Hey what's happening? Can you hear me?"

"Jin it's a memory, no one can see or hear us.", Ty Lee said.

Ronin saw a body being taken to a morgue when someone called his name. "Inigo! Come."

"Sozin, what is it?"

"It is not wise to wander at this late hour Inigo. "

"I had to see if the rumors were true."

"I'm afraid they are Inigo, they are true."

"About the the castle as well? Old friend reconsider."

"I have no choice. "

"What if the one responsible was caugt? Would you reconsider your decsision then?"

"Is there something you wish to tell me?"

"No Sozin, nothing. "

"Very well then, goodnight Inigo. "

Ty Lee and Jin saw Ronin leave and followed him growing curious as to Inigo's shady nature with Sozin. Ronin went deep in the old castle's catacombs and caught someone in a secret room. "Evening Takagi. I know you meant well, I don't think you meant it to kill anyone."

"No! You don't understand!"

"The least I can do is see the thing that murdered that woman is slaughtered!"

"It wasn't him, Caro never killed no one!"

"Stand aside, Takagi! "

"No!"

"Ceysamatherium!", a white blast of light lite the cave revealing the beast. It was a dragon! "

Ty Lee reached out calling Ronin's name but her and Jin were being pulled back out of the memory. Soon the book flung open and Jin and Ty Lee landed on the floor to Ronin's relief. "Holy shit.", the twins both said seeing what they saw.

"Ronin, what was that? With the dragon? What were you persuading with Sozin about? And why is it me asking all the questions and not Ty Lee? "

"Inigo.....why didn't you tell me? Caro....."

"What Ty? "

"That dragon is our ancient ancestor. Of dad's mother."

Jin gasped and starred at Ronin. He lowered his head in shame, "It wasn't my fault I swear."

"Why? Caro was a peacful dragon?!"

"It was Sozin! Listen, it's complicated but there's a reason why I was hesitant about being revealed to your parents. I was partly to blame for Caro's death. I mistakenly assumed he murdered one of Sozin's subjects but I learned the beast that did it was one only Sozin could control. Sozin discovered what I found out and that started the battle between me and him. We were argueing over who would be the one to be the one to help raise Caro's next and final son. But the newborn couldn't leave it's nest until it was at least a year old. Castle was it's nest, and since Caro was blamed for the murder Sozin prepared to burry the dragon egg. Unless Caro was found there was a risk his kin would be just as dangerous."

"So you allied with Caro to kill Sozin while Takagi cared for the dragon baby. ", Jin pieced together.

"Takagi was Caro's nurturer. He saved Caro's son before Caro passed away due to both the injuries both I and Sozin inflicted upon him. I'm so sorry for keeping it from you Ty Lee. "
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Ronin's dark secret

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty Lee was shocked. She didn't know what to say or what to do. She was completely overwhelmed by what she had seen and what Ronin had just told her. There was a long silence. Then Ty Lee spoke. Her voice was shaky and she sounded like she was on the brink of tears.

Ty Lee: I......I.......I........I need to be alone for a minute.

Before Jin or Ronin could say a word Ty Lee exited the room and left.

Jin: Wait Sis! Come back!

Jin was gonna go after her sister, but Ronin stopped her by placing a hand on her shoulder.

Ronin: Let her go Jin. It's OK.

Jin: But Ronin, she's........

Ronin: It's fine. I don't blame her for being upset. After all, I helped do an unspeakable thing. I wouldn't be surprised if she started hating me by now. I was consumed by revenge and hatred. Tell me Jin. Am I a horrible person?

Jin: Well, that 's hard to say. For one thing, you took part in killing my ancestor, but you didn't know the truth back then. Also, let me ask. Do you regret for what you did?

Ronin: Yes. I did. I almost single handedly killed your bloodline. I've been trying to make amends ever since.

Jin: Then it's OK. Sozin was the real bad guy here, not you. You made up for it by helping Caro. If you hadn't done that, the generations after that would never have been born including me and sis. That's more than enough to show that you're a good person.

Ronin: Thank you Jin. That means a lot to me. I just hope that Ty Lee can forgive me.

Meanwhile, Ty Lee was walking aimlessly around town. She didn't care where she went. She just wanted to be alone to collect her thoughts. She could still remember the image of Cara and Ronin. Every time she remembered that, she felt a twinge of pain her stomach. She kept walking and walking until.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: other

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"Daughter of (Name)?", said someone.

Ty Lee looked to face who spoke to her. A middle aged man in a trench coat came up to her non aggressivly and calmly introduced himself. "I bring no violent intentions I swear. Come with me."

Ty Lee kept a safe distance from the stranger and wondered who was he and why? They walked to a path along the ocean and then they stopped by a familiar location. "Who are you?"

"Not yet. Why spoil the mystery?"

"I won't go any farther unless you tell me what is going on!"

"It's to do with your daddy. Unfinished business as it's called. "

"Wait? Can't be, Saizo!", Ty Lee unleashed her full succubus powers but was frozen in place when her ears were bombarded by the melody of an exotic creature. She fell entranced and ceased her hostility. Hiding from the water was a mermaid singing and was an old student from the academy.

"Take her to the island. I have a message to send."

The mermaid pulled Ty Lee over to her through her song and took her under water. From there she was taken to a remote island to Saizo's pleasure. He then went to your home where he intended to bring a warm welcome.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: An old enemy

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Meanwhile you were on your way home. You had just gotten off work and were looking forward to seeing your family. You greeted Kurumu at the door.

(name) Kurumu honey! I'm home!

Kurumu: Hi honey. How was work?

(name): You know same as usual.

Kurumu: Well I'm glad you're home honey. Come on in and you can tell me your day.

You were just about to walk in your house, but then you sensed danger. You felt an energy that made your hair stand on end.

Kurumu: (name). What's wrong?

Suddenly a giant boulder came flying out of nowhere and came crashing at your front door. There was nothing, but smoke. When the smoke pulled clear, you were holding Kurumu in your arms safe and sound. Your hands and feet had turned into dragon claws and your wings shielded you and Kurumu from the debris.

(name): Kurumu? Are you OK?

Kurumu: (cough) I'm fine. But that the heck was that?!?

(name): I don't know, but get inside. You'll be in danger out here.

Kurumu: But (name)....

(name): Go! Hurry! Make sure our daughters are safe!

Kurumu hesitated at first because she was worried about your safety, but then she understood and rushed inside. Now you could focus on the fight without
worrying about Kurumu.

(name): Come on out! I know you're there!

There was a moment of silence. Then Saizo stepped out and camly walked toward you. You attacked him with your fire sword, but Sozin calmly stepped out of the way and then he water bended two swords from his hands. You two engaged in a sword fight and you tried to tail smack him with your tail, but he grabbed the tail and gave you a rock fisted punch in the face and sent you flying to a car. Then you quickly got up and unleashed a breath attack of fire. Saizo countered by taking a big breath and unleashed a giant breath of air. The collision of attack caused a mighty explosion. Smoke billowed everywhere. You took advantage of the smoke to attack Saizo using your senses. Saizo sensed you coming and earth bended a wall to protect himself. That didn't stop you. You crashed straight through with kick and gave Saizo a powerful punch in the gut. Saizo was sent flying to a tree and hit it with a mighty crack. Then Saizo got up and brushed off the dust like the attack was nothing to him.

Saizo: Impressive. I'd expect nothing less from you (name).

(name): What the hell do you want Saizo? You got some nerve attacking me in broad daylight like that! And when the heck did you learn how to bend?

Sozin: None of your business and Just to make sure I got your attention. After all you are a powerful dragon.

(name) How do you....?? Just answer my question! What the hell do you want?!? Answer me right now! Otherwise your gonna get a royal beat down!

Saizo: Now, now. Don't be so hasty. You know as well as I do that we were to fight here, many innocent lives would be in danger. And you don't want that now do you?

As much as you hated to admit it, you knew Saizo was right. If you and him started fighting, many lives would get caught in the crossfire, especially Kurumu and your daughters.

(name): Fine. What do you want?

Saizo: You know what I want. The location of the Crimson Fang.

(name): What? The Crimson Fang? How do you know about that?

Saizo: I did my research. Legend has it that the crimson fang was from Caro before she died. They say she passed some of her power into that fang to protect so that the power wouldn't be used for evil. So the fang was passed on from generation to generation and over time the fang accumulated power from all the dragons that received the fang. Also let me ask you, do you know about the four elements in the world?

(name): Yes. Water, fire, earth, and air? So what?

Saizo. Based on my research, I've learned that Caro and the dragons that came after her son were masters of one of these elements. Over time those who inherited the fang had a piece of their power implanted into that fang. In other words whoever wears that fang will have the power to control those elements and have the power to kill a dragon.

(name): Say what?!?

Saizo: That's right. Ever since I learned this truth, I've made it my mission to find the fang. If I had this power, I'd be able to destroy every thing and everyone in my path! I've scoured the world looking for dragons that might have had it and I got nothing. Which lead me to one more dragon. You.

(name): Me? What the hell are you....

Saizo: You ancestor was Caro after so you must have received the dragon fang so I know you have it.

(name): Even if I knew where it was I still wouldn't tell you! I'm not gonna give you something that can kill my own race!

Saizo: I see. So you can't be reasoned with. Very well. I shall leave for today, but I get the feeling you'll give me what I want whenever you like it or not. Because if you don't your family will suffer for it starting with your daughter Ty Lee.

When you heard the mention of Ty Lee's name your face went pale. Then your face turned red with rage.

(name) What did you say!?!? What did you do to my daughter Saizo!?!?

Sozin: My, my. How scary. Don't worry. She's safe for now, but if you don't bring me the fang. She may be.....well I'll let you think about it for while. Later loser.

You charged toward Sozin in a rage. Your hand became a giant dragon fist and punched at Saizo with all your strength making the whole ground shake. Sadly the Saizo you punched was nothing more, but a mud clone. Then you heard his voice echo in your head.

Saizo: Bring me the fang (name). Or your daughter pays with her life.

You sank to your knees and punched the ground and you screamed with a deafening roar of despair.

(name): DAMN YOU SAIZO YOU BASTARD!!!!!!

Then tears slowly trickled down your face.

(name): No. Ty Lee's gone. And it's all my fault. She's in danger because of

me. Damn it!

Meanwhile back with....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Saizo attacks your home!

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"(Name)! What happened?", Kurumu rushed outside.

"Where's Jin? ! Oh god please tell me Jin is ok!"

Then Jin came outside and went to hug you. She was worried about you, "Are you allright dad?"

"Honey where is your sister? ! Where is Ty Lee?!"

"She ran off less than an hour ago."

"What? Jin why did she?", Kurumu asked.

"Mom, Dad....I think you should know the reason why Ty Lee has been alone in her room for a while. "

Jin took them to see Ronin. Jin opened the door and revealed the mighty Inigo Ronin. "Jin? What are they doing here? What's going on?", Ronin asked worried.

"Who are you?", you asked.

"Inigo Ronin, I see you are Ty Lee's father. "

"How do you know so much about her and why are you here?"

"Let me explain. No there is too much let me sum up, Ty Lee has been my apprentice the past few weeks and has been trying to release me from my prison in this book. We bonded and now she's mad at me I think, because I nearly murdered your ancestor Caro."

"The legend your mother spoke of darling?", Kurumu replied.

"Yes. And I won't lie, I'm not happy about the secrecy or that you got her captured!"

"Ty Lee? No!", Ronin said in distress.

Kurumu and Jin were shocked with Kurumu determined to get her daughter back. "We gotta go after that bastard!", she said.

"No! We need the fang, it's what Saizo wants or else he'll kill her.", you replied.

"The crimson fang?! That is the last piece of the puzzle for the spell to release me from the book.", Ronin said.

"You will do nothing until we get Ty Lee back.", you said.

"But I can help. I'm useless tied by the book. But free, I can stop Saizo and save Ty Lee all at ounce!"

"That's the problem. Ty Lee has it.", Kurumu replied.

"Saizo would'nt bargain unless he doesn't know. ", you figured out.

"Then bring me with you. Ounce we find her I'll restore myself and save Ty Lee. ", Ronin inssested.

"Trust him dad. He's a good guy and besides, Ty would want you to accept him.", Jin pleaded.

You were reluctant but decided you needed all the help you could get since Ty Lee didn't have much time.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Kurumu rushed outside

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty Lee woke up trapped in a pool with the mermaid deep under water. If she made any move the siren like song would stop her from escaping. Saizo entered the room to see Ty Lee pissed about her current state. "Don't mind the pool, thought it would be better than being shoved in a cell. Tamera is special isn't she? Beautiful voice and a strong mermaid even for her kind."

"Why are you after my father? "

"Early in the year after Keito exposed his human identity, I was teaching him a lesson. But your mother stopped me and your old man broke my legs when I triggered his premature dragon form. So petty revenge is all I am here for."

"I'll take both of you on! I'm (Names) daughter and your not-", suddenly a lovely voice echoed the room causing Ty Lee to cease her aggression.

"You know baby you should work on getting her to obey you. She's our ace in the hole when they come for her."

"I can attract them to me babe. That's a skill only succubi ans lamia have."

"I thought you could get her to obey your will!"

"Well if you gave me time alone then maybe I can get something but no promises."

"It's essential to the plan. Do what you need to but make sure she's ready before they find us."

Tamera sang a love song to entranced Ty Lee to obey her.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Saizo speaks with Ty Lee

choices: The Crimson Fang begins to glow/other
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty Lee could feel Tamera's love song beginning to overpower her, but she resisted with everything she had.

Ty Lee: No! I.....won't....let you.......control me!!

Tamera continued to sing, but this time she sang louder making Ty Lee's resistance grow less and less.

Ty Lee: No.....I......have......to.....stay.....strong.......

Ty Lee was slipping away and her body began to relax and just when she was about to be overwhelmed by her spell......
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Ty Lee resists

choices: The Crimson Fang begins to glow
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content: The Crimson Fang begins to glow or other?
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: The Crimson Fang begins to glow/other

choices: Ty Lee finds you and the others
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
As her will began to fall for the song Ty Lee then thought back on Ronin's teachings on mind control. "There are beings who can bend the will of others. But if you can bend the elements, then you can counter someone drilling into your mind. But this skill is only bestowed on the purely gifted and ones who naturally have a talent for it. Being a succubus, despite not accepting it much, may allow you to redirect a mind enchantment."

It was a long shot but Ty Lee then focused and began to redirect the love song. Ty Lee then started to sing the same song as Tamera and opened her eyes using her allure ability. Tamera was unprepared for Ty Lee's counter attack but still kept trying to seduce her into submission.

Ty Lee noticed Tamera advancing her seduction but still kept a cool mind. Ty Lee releaseed her succubus wings and tail to enhance her allure. Tamera starred in awe of her hidden beauty and her power subsided. Now Tamera was the one under control. "Good girl Tamera. Now help me escape.", Ty Lee ordered.

Tamera obeyed and took Ty Lee down into the water where they swam outside through an under water passage. With the sky in view Ty Lee left a mental command to leave for Tamera. "You will tell Saizo I escaped on my own. But when I return and wink at you three times you will return to this state of obedience."

"Yes Ty Lee my mistress."

Ty Lee flew off in search of her family.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Mind shielding

choices: She ends up being captured again.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty Lee flew in search of her family. So far she saw nothing or no one, but she didn't give up. She kept on looking.

Ty Lee: Oh dad. Where are you? I gotta find you before that jerk Saizo finds me, but how am I gonna find them?

Ty Lee thought about what to do. Then she had an idea. She remembered another part of Ronin's training.

(flashback)
Ronin: OK then Ty Lee. I'm going to teach you seismic sense. This skill can help perceive your surroundings and sense vibrations. Be strong like the stone. And feel the vibrations around you.

Ty Lee landed on the ground, closed her eyes and focused. She stomped her foot on the ground and felt the vibrations around her. The sound wave of her stomp spread throughout the area. At first she sensed nothing. Then she felt four pairs of footsteps from the vibrations. She recognized footsteps anywhere.

Ty Lee: Toward that way! That's gotta be Dad! And Jin and mom too! And......oh my gosh! The last one's gotta Ronin! I gotta get to them!

With that Ty Lee, flew off toward the direction of the vibrations. She saw nothing, but trees. Then she saw them. There on the trail far below her was you, Kurumu, Jin, and Ronin.

Ty Lee: There they are!

She flew straight toward them and was about to call them.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Ty Lee finds you and the others

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
"Everyone i'm ok!", she yelled. You went right for her and hugged her tightly with Kurumu and Jin getting in.

"Oh thank god your ok sweetheart. I was so scared when I found out."

Then Ronin reformed his paper body to show off his joy upon this development. Ty saw him but with a more forgiving look. "Ty Lee I'm so relived you made it out on your own. I was as worried as your father. "

"Thanks to your teaching I'd never got out or found you guys. And I forgive you of your past misdeeds Inigo Ronin. You have made up for them through honesty and protecting Caro's ancestry.", she said.

You were surprised by her trust in Ronin but if both your children trusted him then you knew he had to mean well. Ty Lee bowed in respect alongside you. Ronin bowed in return feeling more happy than he was for a thousand years. "Ty the fang!", Ronin spoke out. "It's the key to restoring my body and it's what they were after. ", he explained.

"The fang? Mom's keepsake! Of course how come I missed it?! We need to perform the ritual back at the house. Everything I need is there!"

"But Saizo will be coming for us soon as he finds out.", Jin said.

"We need to get back and let Ty Lee do it. Ronin is the only one who could tip the scales. Me and Kurumu aren't as in our prime like we used to in terms of fighting but Ronin and the twins will be all we need. Saizo probably has a lot more to throw at us than just him and a mermaid. So Ty Lee, do your thing.", you planned.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Nothing

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Later everyone raced back to the house. Then Ty Lee, Ronin, and Jin went to Ty Lee's room so she could perform the ritual. When you and Kurumu entered into Ty Lee's room, they were amazed.

Kurumu: Whoa. That's a lot of books.

(name): You ain't kidding.

Then Ty Lee looked through all the books in her room until she came across the book to Ronin's resurrection.

Ty Lee: OK! Here it is! The spell that can break you free Ronin.

Ronin: Very good. Do you have the dragon fang still?

Ty Lee: I got it right here. (pulls out fang on her chest)

Ronin: We have all the pieces of the puzzle. Now we must make haste before Saizo comes after us.

Jin: Is there anything I can do?

Kurumu: Yeah. If there's anything, tell us.

Ronin: I'm afraid not Ms. Kurumu. To do the resurrection spell, we have to draw the magic circle and Ty Lee's the only one who can draw it.

Jin: Come on! There has to be something we can do!

Before Ty Lee or Ronin could answer, there was a deep rumbling that rang throughout the house making all of you jump.

Jin: What the heck was that?!?

Ty Lee: I don't know, but it doesn't sound good.

Ronin: It must be Saizo. He must have found out we have the dragon fang. Damn and at a crucial time too. We need time to draw the spell.

Jin: What'll we do?

There was a long moment of silence, then you spoke.

(name): Leave it to me. I can buy you guys the time you need.

Jin: Dad no! It's too risky!

Kurumu: (name)! You said so yourself. You're not the fighter you used to be! You could be dead if you go!

(name): I know, but I'm willing to take that risk. Besides, I'm the one that Saizo wanted in the first place because he thinks I have it. If I make him believe I still have it, that should give you the time you need to complete the spell.

Ty Lee: No dad! You can't dad!

Ronin: I have to agree Mr. (name). It's too dangerous.

Then you gave Ty Lee, Jin, and Kurumu a loving hug.

(name): Don't worry. I can handle it. I'm the son of a dragon remember? I'll be fine.

Jin: But daddy.....you can't......(sniff)......don't go....

Jin started to cry. You gently held her face and wiped her tears.

(name): Jin please don't cry. I'll be OK. I wouldn't call myself a loving father if I didn't protect my kids and my wife. I told you before. I'll do whatever it takes to protect my family. No matter what. Be strong.

Jin: (sniff).....OK daddy.

(name): Ronin. If I don't make it back, take care of my daughters and my wife. Especially Ty Lee.

Ronin: I understand. You have my word.

Ty Lee: No! Dad! You can't do this!

Ty Lee ran toward you and embraced you tightly crying. You gently returned her embrace and looked at her.

(name): It's alight Ty Lee. I'll be fine.

Ty Lee: (sob).....How can you be sure? How will you know you'll come back?

(name): I know because you're my daughter. The granddaughter of my mother who was a dragon. Because you're a descendant of Caro, our ancient ancestor. I believe in you because your my daughter. I know you won't fail. Now make me proud. OK?

Ty Lee: Yes. I won't let you down dad.

Then as you were leaving, you saw Kurumu. She was completely calm.

(name): Kurumu. I.....

Kurumu: Don't worry. I'm not worried. I know you'll be OK. You are my husband after all. Just please be safe.

(name): I will. Well........here I go. I'll be back.

With that you went out of the house and stood outside ready to fight. Then you were welcomed to sight of....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Ty Lee begins the ritual

choices: Meanwhile back with The resurrection Ceremony.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
There Saizo stood with an army of mud clones. You were clearly out numbered, but you were ready to fight. Saizo stepped out from the army and stood there confident and calm.

Saizo: Well, well. Look what we have here. Looks like someone's ready to die today.

(name): The only one that's gonna die today is you Saizo.

Saizo: Heh. Nice comeback. Now then. I'll be blunt. Have you come here to hand over the crimson fang to me? Or have you come here to die?

(name): Let me think. I'd say neither. I'm here to kick your ass so you don't hurt any more people. Especially my family! Let's settle this!

Saizo: How unfortunate. I guess I'll just have to kill you with my army!

The army roared menacingly, but you were unfazed.

(name): You really think you can defeat me by numbers? Please. And what about the people? You know as well as I do that if we fight, a lot of people will get involved.

Saizo: Oh don't worry. I took the liberty of setting up a barrier so that we can fight to our hearts content.

(name): How charitable of you.

Saizo: And don't underestimate my army. These golems are stronger than the one you fought before. I'll ask you one more time. Hand over the crimson fang or else I'll have to kill you.

(name): I said before and I'll say it again. I'll never give the crimson fang to you! You'll have to kill me first!

Saizo: Very well. If you want a death wish, then I'll be happy to oblige! ATTACK!!!

At Saizo's command the army of golems charged at you ready to attack.You burst into a golden flame and transformed into your dragon form and let out a ferocious roar and charged at Saizo's army, ready for battle!
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Saizo with an army

choices: Back with Ty Lee, Ronin, and the others
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Both sides charged at each other. They grew closer, and closer until they both collided. You let our a ferocious roar and made your first move. You swiped your claw and took out a few dozen golems. The golems retaliated by using bending skills. Those who used earth bending and fired giant boulders at you. Those who used water bending froze the water into ice spears and fired them at you. The boulders were big and the spears were cold, but they didn't do a thing to your hard scales.

(name): Please! Did you think those pebbles would hurt me? Don't make me laugh!

You gave a mighty swipe of your tail and you took out about even more golems. The golems kept firing boulders and ice spears at you, but they still had no effect. You kept slashing with your claws and swiping with you tail and took out golem after golem until the golems were beginning to diminish. Meanwhile, hidden from the battlefield Saizo kept himself out of sight so you couldn't see him.

Saizo: That's it you fool. Just keep tiring yourself out.

(name): Come on Saizo! Is this all you got?!? Come out and face me you coward! Your army is just about done!

Saizo: That's what you think.

Saizo then made a couple of hand signs and cast a spell. Then from where you were fighting, more golems began to appear.

(name): What the.... There's more? Oh well. Guess I'll have to keep beating them!

You went on the attack again, destroying every golem that came in your way. Destroying the golems was easy enough for you. The problem was that every time that you destroyed a couple, more kept popping up. You were beginning to get overwhelmed.

(name): Damn it! This is starting to get annoying! How about this?!?!?

You took a deep breath and unleashed a power burst of flame from your mouth. The flame incinerated every golem that made contact with it. Smoke and flames billowed everywhere. When the smoke pulled clear, there was nothing left but ashes.

(name): Looks like I won. Whew. Man that was tiring. I don't know how much longer I can keep fighting. Even in my dragon form, I'm getting tired. I guess I wasn't as strong as I used to be. In any, I have to find Saizo and defeat him before anything else happens.

No sooner than you said those words, you felt something rumbling in the ground. Then more golems began coming out of the ground. Only this time there was ten times more of them than before. You couldn't even count how many there were.

(name): No way! You gotta be kidding me! There's even more of them than before! But I can't give up now! I have to keep fighting! I have to protect them no matter what! Even if it means having to fight till I die!

You attacked one more time slashing with your claws and slashing your tail, but now your attacks were starting to lose their power. You took out golems, but they kept coming back for more. Every time you took out a dozen, few dozen more took it's place. Then things grew worse, one of the golems launched an boulder in the shape of a spear and hit you square in the eye. You roared in pain and recoiled from the attack.

(name): Arrggghhh!! Damn it! My eye!

While you were holding your eye in pain, the golems used water bending on the ground and made an ice floor. When you stepped on it, you slipped and you lost your balance and you fell flat on your back with a giant boom! The ground thundered and shook. While you were dazed from your fall Saizo finally came out of hiding and looked upon your fallen body.

(name): Now my warriors! Make sure he doesn't escape!

The golems obeyed. The golems that used earth bending make tall stalagmite like braces on your limbs and tail immobilizing you. The ones that used water bending got the water on your body and turned it into ice freezing you to make sure that you wouldn't break free. You snapped out of your daze in time to see that you were up to your neck in ice. You couldn't move and you couldn't attack. All you could was roar in frustration. Then Saizo stepped out from the army and looked you square in your eye.

Saizo: Heh. How the mighty have fallen.

(name): Saizo you bastard! Let me go so I can rip you in half!

Saizo: I'd rather not. You see you're gonna be a problem if I let you roam around free. So I'm gonna make sure you don't get in my way. Golems. Make sure he doesn't follow us.

Saizo turned around and head toward your house where Ty Lee and the others were. You tried to break free, but the ice and stone held you down.

(name): NO! Get back here! Saizo when I get out of this......!!!!

Before you could finish, the golems finished encasing you in ice and stone. Now you were frozen solid and unable to move. Saizo laughed in triumph as he walked toward your house.

Saizo: Now that fool is out of the way, I can get the crimson fang from that little brat. She may have escaped me once, but now there's no where to hide. HAHAHA!!!!
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: The battle begins!

choices: Someone comes to her rescue and backs her up.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Meanwhile back with Ty Lee and the others, the ritual was halfway done. Ty Lee was finished with the circle and was now doing the incantation. Jin sat next to where the ritual was taking place. Sadly all she could do was watch. Then Kurumu came into the room to check how things were going when suddenly, they all heard a rumbling noise of footsteps again.

Jin: Hey. Do you guys hear that?

Ty Lee: It's that same sound again. The sound of footsteps.

Ronin: Oh no. They're still coming! We need more time.

Ty Lee: Damn it. Now what?

Suddenly Kurumu sprouted her wings and tail and her claws extended.

Kurumu: Keep going! I can buy you more time! Just stay focused on the ritual Ty.

Ty Lee: Mom! Wait!

Jin: Not you too! At least let me go with you!

Kurumu: It's okay! I'll be fine! Just hurry with that ritual! Jin. I'm sorry, but you stay here. Don't worry. I'll be okay. Besides I know what I'm doing. But.....just in case if I don't make it, I just want to say that.....I love you both and I wish you happiness. Ronin, take of my daughters.

Ronin: Of course Ms. Kurumu.

Then Kurumu flew out the window and headed toward the golems. All Jin and Ty Lee could do was watch their mother fly away to battle.

Ty Lee: Mom......be careful.

Ronin: Focus Ty Lee. I understand you're worried, but we must hurry.

Ty Lee: Right.

Jin: Man. This sucks! I wish there was something I could do! I feel so useless!

Then Ty Lee went back to the ritual. Meanwhile Saizo and his team were marching towards the house. Things were going smoothly, but then something swooped past him and sliced a lot of golems to bits.

Saizo: What the....!! Who did that?!?

Voice: Up here ugly!

Saizo looked up and there a few feet above him was Kurumu. She swooped down again and landed in front of Saizo and his golems blocking their way.

Saizo: Well, well, well. Kurumu Kurono. How delightful to see you again.

Kurumu: Wish I could say the same.

Saizo: Heh. Still the feisty one I see.

Kurumu: Where's (name)? What did you do with him?

Saizo: Oh he was heating things up around here, so I decided that he needed to chill out. Hahahaha.

Kurumu: Grrr! Damn you.

Saizo: Hahahaha. Hey you know what? I have an idea. Why don't you forget about that loser (name) and join me? If you do, I'll see to it that you're treated like a queen and I'll even let you keep your daughters.

Kurumu: Forget it sicko! (name)'s the only man for me! I won't let you get to my daughters.

Saizo: What a pity. You've would have made a fine queen. But now I have no choice, but to kill you! Get her!

The army of golems charged and began the attack. Kurumu remained unfazed prepared to fight, but then.....
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Back with Ty Lee, Ronin, and the others

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Then out of no where, a giant washtub fell from out of no where and smashed some golems to bits. Then ice spikes began coming out of the ground and destroying more golems, and in the crowd some golems began flying out of the into the air and came crashing to the ground. Soon Saizo's army of golems was no more and Saizo was all alone. Saizo seeing this was a little shocked.

Saizo: Wha.... What the hell is going on here?!? Who's doing this?!?

Kurumu seeing what was going on smiled. She knew exactly what was going on.

Kurumu: Hey Saizo! You can't win! You better give up while you still can!

Saizo: What the hell are you talking about?!? I don't know who made those attacks, but you're still done for! I can take you on all by my self. Besides there's only one of you!

Suddenly a giant ice pillar appeared behind Kurumu. Then a certain someone who made that ice pillar jumped down and landed right next to Kurumu. She looked just she did before, but her hair was much longer.

Mizore: Make that two!

Saizo: The snow witch?!?

Then a giant card flew from behind Saizo and another person jumped down from the card and landed next to Kurumu. She was a lot taller than she was before, but was still the cutesy witch that everyone loved.

Yukari: Three!

Saizo: The little witch too?!? Wait. Hold on. If those girls are here.....don't tell me that.....

(girl's voice): That's right Saizo. We're here too.

(boy's voice): Guess that makes four and five.

Then from behind Kurumu came out the last two. A girl and a boy. The boy was pretty much the same except his eyes were a red color. The girl standing next to him was the same as she always was. Tall, long gray hair and eyes as red as the boy's were.

Saizo: Moka Akashiya. Tsukune Aono.

Tsukune: Sorry we're a little late. We'd had a little trouble getting here.

Yukari: You should be thanking us that we came here to save your sorry butt. After all that's what we're here for right? My big titied rival.

Kurumu: Still going on with that eh? Heh. Reminds me of the good old days

Mizore: You know you sound like an old lady when you say that right?

Kurumu: Watch it snow skank.

Mizore (looks at Saizo): So I see Saizo hasn't changed at all.

Yukari: Yeah. He looks just as ugly as I remember.

Kurumu: Yeah, but don't underestimate him. He's gotten a lot stronger the last time you saw him. In fact, he was strong enough to stop (name).

Tsukune: Speaking of (name) where is he?

Kurumu: I don't know, but I'm worried. I hope he's OK.

Yukari: Don't worry. I got someone looking for him as we speak. Until then, we're gonna have to deal with Saizo first. Kurumu? How strong is he?

Kurumu: I'd say about as strong as Kuyo, maybe even more

Inner Moka: Interesting. If he's as strong as you say he is, I'm looking forward to making him know his place.

Saizo: (laugh) You called these losers here? They can't save you! Don't think you can beat me just because you brought your friends here.

Tsukune: Hey Saizo! I'd watch yourself if I was you!

Yukari: Yeah! If you mess with our friends, you mess with us!

Mizore: And if you mess with us, then you're gonna get hurt!

Saizo: Ooh I'm so scared. I've had enough of all this crap. It's time to finish you all. Oh and Kurumu, don't worry about your little girls. Once I'm done with you and your friends they're next. I'll be sure to send you all to the depths of hell.

Kurumu: I've had enough of your crap Saizo! As far as I'm concerned, you made two mistakes! The first was messing with me and no one threatens my daughters!!!

Yukari: I've heard that sister! Let's do this!

Mizore: It's time to cool them off!

Tsukune: You ready Moka?

Inner Moka: Always Tsukune. Let's kick his ass!

Kurumu as well as the rest of the gang charged at Saizo and eager to make him pay.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Someone comes to her rescue and backs her up.

choices: Ronin and Jin vs The Golems
Kurumu, Mizore, Yukari, Tskune, and Moka vs Saizo
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty Lee was nearly finished the ritual and Ronin's paper body began to fall apart. "Oh no! Somethings wrong!", Ty panicked.

"No! I can feel it! Keep going!", Ronin reassured.

The paper arms began falling off him then down to his lower body. Soon his upper body was all that remained. "Now Ty! You must do it now! Say the final words!"

Ty Lee then used all of her succubus power to finish the ritual, her wings and tail grew out with her eyes glowed in pink. "With the love of this succubus the pages now, hold no longer this dragon trapped in thou, part human, succubus, and dragon grants thee, this wizard's freedom FOR ALL ETERNITY!" Then Ronin's face fell apart and for a moment nothing. Then all of the pages and scraps that made up Ronin's body circled around the book and Ty Lee and Jin. Then a beam of light shot out of the book. In a blinding flash out came a man. A man of pale white skin and blue saphire eyes, his mouth covered by a mask and cloths mixed of knight armor and robes. He opened his eyes and for the first time in ages felt the fresh air in his lungs, and smell of the room from his nose. Ronin at last escaped the book. Ty Lee and Jin lowered their arms after the light dimmed allowing them to see the man in the pages. But he was no older than either of them.

"DAMN! Ty, forget what I said about you finding a hot guy for your mate, this guy is sexier than moms best description of dad in his youth.", Jin reacted.

"Shut up Jin!"

"Ahhhh, it's feels great to have a body again that isn't made of paper and ink. Flattery aside we got a job to do. Ty, rest until your stregnth returns, doing that ritual took much out of you. Jin come with me, were going to help your mother and father."

"BOOYAW! I'll go stomp my foot right in that lizard guy's tail and swing him around like a lasso.", Jin ran out to go help but Ronin stopped Ty Lee from coming.

"I have to help mother."

"You did phenomenally already Ty. Now let me worry about the rest."

"But Saizo- UMPH!", unexpectedly Ronin kissed Ty Lee through his mask refusing to lower it but was in a terrible rush to start contributing to the battle.

"Waited so long to do that. I can't explain how lovely you looked when your wings and tail sprouted out. Summarizing it would take just as long so just stay here and I'll sum up later after we deal with Saizo.", Ronin ran to help with Ty Lee blushing and smiling like a school girl. Phoenix Wright Cadenza 10 - Investigation ~ Cornered courtesy of kevkane101
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CHPd-uLs...)

Meanwhile the battle against Saizo had finally began. Everyone charged at him at once thinking about using the numbers game strategy against him, but Saizo proved to be an even match. Everyone scattered and attacked. Mizore was on Saizo's left and Yukari was on the right. Yukari waved her wand and magic cards appeared all around her and then she fired them at Saizo. Mizore unleashed her chilling aura making almost everything around her turn to ice. She waved her hands and unleashed a powerful blizzard attack. The two attacks were strong, but Saizo gave a powerful stomp and made a wall protecting himself from the attacks.Then Kurumu swooped in and tried her luck. She slashed and clawed at Saizo hoping to land a blow, but again Saizo dodged the attack. Then Saizo was backed to a tree, Kurumu seized the opportunity to attack, but all she did was slice the tree like it was butter. Then Saizo countered attacked Kurumu by using earth bending to lift boulders and fired them at Kurumu. Kurumu retaliated by using her nails to slice through the boulders. Saizo used that to his advantage by slipping through the boulders and giving Kurumu a powerful punch in the gut sending her flying in the air. Luckily Kurumu regained her composure and used her wings as parachutes and landed safely on the ground. Moka and Tsukune attacked him last using their close combat skills and their brute strength. They kicked and punched with all their strength, but Saizo parried every blow and knocked them back. Tsukune swung hard and gave Saizo a powerful punch, but Saizo stopped it with ease and unleashed a powerful current of air using his fist. Tsukune tried to stand his ground, but he was sent flying through the air. Just when he was about to hit the ground Yukari used her magic to make a chair appear making Tsukune stand in the chair with a soft plop. Moka retaliated with a flurry of kicks and topped it off with one of her signature roundhouse kicks and hit Saizo square in the face hard. Tsukune and others cheered for Moka scoring a hit, but to their shock Saizo was unfazed by the kick. He didn't even flinch.

Saizo: Is that all you got? Let me show you what a real kick looks like.

With that Saizo gave Moka a powerful kick in the gut that almost went straight through her. Moka was sent flying and crashing straight into a line of cars.

Kurumu: Oh crap!

Tsukune: Moka no!

There was nothing but smoke and metal rubble. Then Moka stepped out from the rubble. She had a line of blood on her face from a cut on her forehead. Her clothes were torn and she had a lot of cuts and scrapes, but she was alive. Kurumu and the others rushed to her side to make sure that she was okay.

Tsukune: Moka. Are you okay?

Inner Moka: I'm fine. But I must admit, Saizo's powerful. More powerful than before.

Mizore: He's stopping every attack we throw at him.

Kurumu: Even when Moka kicked Saizo, she still didn't hurt him.

Inner Moka: Oh no? You might want to take a look on his cheek.

Everyone looked at Saizo to find that Moka was right. There on the side of Saizo's mouth was a thin line of blood. Saizo wiped the blood and looked at it on his hand. When he saw it, his eyes gave off a different look. Then he spoke in a low voice.

Saizo: You....actually drew blood from me?

Yukari: What's wrong Saizo? Realized that you're not as tough as you figured?

Then the air turned tense like something had changed in the air. Saizo was now giving off a menacing air and had an angry look in his eye.

Saizo: Big mistake. You now have made me very angry. I will make you pay for that. And know just the way to do it. I'll crush you with my full power! Prepare for something from your nightmares that will make even the strongest vampire tremble in fear!

Yukari: Typical. Does every bad guy have a final form? I mean come on Saizo, we all know that your form is an orc.

Saizo: Heh. Think again brat. You may be aware that my form is an orc, but in truth........I have another transformation that's even more powerful than that!

Inner Moka, Tsukune, Kurumu, Mizore, and Yukari: What?!?

Saizo: You should feel honored. You'll be the first to see my new monster form. First you will see it, and then you will die!!

Then Saizo began a undergoing a transformation. First his eyes glowed in an eerie color. Then he started to grow in size. Ten feet, fifteenth feet, twenty feet and he was still growing. His hands and his feet bulged and transformed into giant black claws. His muscles rippled and began to expand in size. His skin hardened and turned into brown scales and spread throughout his body like an infection. From his butt a giant tail sprouted and slammed the ground. His face stretched and became a reptilian like snout. His teeth grew long and sharp like daggers. Finally to top it off, his eyes glowed an eerie gold and he let out a ferocious roar. Saizo had transformed into a giant lizard.

Tsukune: Holy crap!

Kurumu: He's.......he's gigantic!

Yukari: I hate to admit it, I know that I said that it's an old cliche of what Saizo did, but that's a pretty effective one.

Mizore: His monster's energy is off the charts!

Inner Moka: Damn it......I think we're in toruble.

Saizo laughed in a voice that sounded way different than before and looked down at the fighters at his feet.

Saizo: Yes! Time to die!

Then Saizo attacked. Meanwhile.....

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
From afar they could see Saizo fighting against Kurumu and the others. Ronin and Jin were on their way to join them when they starred at Saizo's giant lizard form. "Since when could he do that? He was just a punk back when my parents were in high school."

"I don't know. Least now we know where they are now, fly ahead and help them, I'll...", then he noticed you still trapped in ice.

"Not enough time to bring you to full strength. Just in fighting shape. So soon as your ready go and help them.", Ronin said.

"I'll be right behind you.", Jin offered.

"HEY! I'm no older than when you and mom decked that same slimey nute. I'm helping and that's final!"

"Me and Jin are helping and it's high time we fought for the same things you and mom did. So don't lecture me on whatever it is you'll argue for that will get us to stay behind, cuz were doing this."

"Ok ok ok. Your stubborn as a blasted mule."

"Were the daughters of a dragon succubi couple, it comes with the turf.", Ty Lee replied.

"OK that's it. Now with your permission sir, I have a strategy for beating Saizo. Jin you back up your mother, (Name) fight Saizo head-on, me and Ty Lee will begin to form a trap. We'll need at least 10 minutes at least before were ready.", Ronin explained.

"You know what he's planning sweetheart?", you asked.

"Aye-aye sis.", Jin complied.

"Eh I may have teased you in the past but you defiantly got more of mom in you, if you snagged a hot guy like that this early in your life."

"I love you sis."

"Stay safe you two.", you hugged your girls and then transformed into your dragon form.

Meanwhile back on the battlefield, everything was going horribly wrong. Everyone was beaten to a pulp and were almost to weak to move. Saizo on the other hand had hardly a scratch on him and he was loving every minute hurting Moka and the others.

Kurumu: Shut up you monster!

If you all beg for your life and ask for my forgiveness, I'll spare you and your friends. Also, if you get down on your knees and swear to give up on your wimpy boyfriend I'll even let your daughters live.....as my concubines!! Then at least you'll have some of your family together.
