Hearing this, Kurumu began shaking with anger and her eyes were burning with rage. This time Saizo had gone too far. Her monster energy soared and her hair was standing on end. Inner Moka: That idiot! She's gonna get herself killed!

Kurumu: I......I can't.....

Tsukune and the others tried to get up to help Kurumu, but they were still feeling weak after being beaten before. Kurumu couldn't even move herself. She struggled as she tried to get up, but she was still feeling dazed from getting hit. Suddenly a giant shadow cast over her. She looked up to see Saizo's giant lizard foot hovering over her.

Saizo: Now then, I'll squash you like the puny insect you are! Any last words?

Yukari: Yeah, you big bully! If you hurt her, you'll be sorry!

Saizo: Ooh, I'm so scared. Now then Kurumu, where was I? Oh yes. I was about to stomp you into oblivion!

Kurumu shut her eyes and waited for the end. Then a ferocious roar echoed throughout the the battlefield making everyone freeze.

Suddenly a large tail whipped around and smacked Saizo square in the face, sending him reeling and crashing into a building. Then someone picked up Kurumu and quickly flew her to safety.

(name): No one threatens my wife and gets away with it!

When Kurumu opened her eyes and saw that Jin was carrying her, she was surprised and happy to see them.

Mizore: (name). In case you haven't noticed, we don't stand a chance against Saizo.

(name): I know, but don't worry. All we have to do is stall time. Besides, I'm fighting with you guys this time. Now go! Saizo is gonna up any second and this is about to get ugly.

Everyone was silent, but then Kurumu spoke.

Kurumu: OK. We understand. Be careful (name).

Inner Moka: You too Tsukune. We'll be back soon.

Tsukune: Don't worry Moka. We'll be OK. Hopefully.

Jin: Don't worry! We'll be back Dad! We promise!

Then with Jin leading them, Moka and Kurumu went with her to meet Ty Lee. Saizo was back on his feet. When he saw you, he couldn't believe his eyes.

Saizo: What?!? (name)?!? Impossible! How are you here?!? I froze you solid!

(name): Sorry to disappoint you Saizo, but it's gonna take a lot more than ice to bring me down!

Saizo: Heh. It doesn't matter anyway! It just means I can take you down in front of your girls!

(name): Just you try it! You're gonna pay for hurting my wife and endangering my daughters you bastard!

You let out a ferocious roar and charged at Saizo and Saizo did the same and then the battle began!

Then you swung with your tail and whipped Saizo square in the face again. This time Saizo took the hit, but then he snapped his jaws and bit you on the neck. You roared in pain and slashed Saizo on his side trying to make him release his grip, but then Mizore came flying from the sky and fired her icicles at Saizo's face making him let you go in surprise. Tsukune: Yeah. I'm fine, but at this rate we'll never be able to hold out!

(name): I'm fine. We dragons are a lot tougher than you think. Now then, let's keep going! We have to keep fighting so if you got time to talk, then you got time to fight!

Then you charged at Saizo again with Tsukune, Mizore, and Yukari backing you up. Meanwhile Kurumu, Jin, and Moka were flying in sky (Kurumu and Jin carrying Moka of course) in search of Ty Lee and Ronin. It wasn't long till they saw Ty Lee and Ronin. They were busy setting up a magic circle for their plan.

Ty Lee: Jin! You found Mom and Aunt Moka!

Seeing Ty Lee, Kurumu flew immediately toward her daughter and gave her a tremendous hug. She had completely forgotten that she was helping Jin carry Moka.

Kurumu: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!

Ronin: Hold on Ms. Kurumu! I understand that you want to help your husband, but we have to stick to the plan.

Ty Lee: He's right Mom! Besides, you didn't stand a chance against Saizo by yourself! He could kill you!

Kurumu: But we can't just stand by while Saizo beats the crap out of (name) and the others! We have to do something!

There was a brief silence. Then Ronin.....

But you need to grab his attention. Your allure will make him interested and then when he sees everyone else he'll come crawling over to you. "

"Soon as he gets close enough the spell will activate and he'll be long gone. Soon as he starts coming right for you without hesitation you should back away from the area. It might engulf you guys if your not careful."

Ty Lee: Okay! Now!

He dug his claws into the dirt and fought back. He whipped his tail and knocked down Kurumu, Jin and Yukari while they were in the air. Then Moka and Tsukune and Mizore came sailing in to attack, but Saizo sent them flying with a swat of his claw. You staggered back and then Saizo gave you a mighty tail swipe. He hit you so hard that you transformed back into your human state and fell sprawling into the crowd. Ronin: I won't let you hurt her Saizo! You have to get by me first!

Then Ty Lee gave Saizo a seductive wink. Saizo now had hearts in his eyes and began walking towards the portal. Ty Lee was using everything she had to control Saizo, but her control was slipping. Saizo was acting like he was at war with an alternative personality, but it was working. He was slowly but surely going towards the portal.

Saizo: No I won't! Yes! No! No Yes! Yes! I WON"T GO INTO THE PORT-!!!!

These were Saizo's last words as he stepped one claw into the portal. He upper body was sucked in and he had no way of escaping. He tried to get out, but it was already too late. With a loud boom and a giant pulse of energy, Saizo's body disappeared into the portal. The portal disappeared and then there was utter silence. Saizo was defeated. Everyone else got up and ran toward Ty Lee and Ronin's location and cheered. The chains from Ronin disappeared and he was able to get up.

Ty Lee smiled and went toward Ronin and they wrapped each other with a loving embrace. You and the rest of the gang watched as Ty Lee and Ronin had their moment.

Back with Ty Lee and Ronin......

Ty Lee: No. We did it. If it wasn't for your teachings, I never would have gotten to this point.

Ty Lee: Really?!? You mean it?

Kurumu and Moka covered both you and Tsukune's eyes and Mizore, Yukari, and Jin blushed in surprise and shock. Looks like Ty Lee's first step in her relationship with Ronin is off to a rocky start.
1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.title: Saizo's defeat

1211211112211212121111222121211111111121.content:
Ty Lee and Ronin were off to take an extended vacation away from home after Saizo's defeat. Ronin and Ty Lee started off to be a very loving couple despite the aftermath. As Ronin saw how the world changed he was both fascinated and confused all at ounce. With everything that happened Jin decided to enhance her own Succubus powers after seeing her twin surpass her. She was even more determined to find her destined one and fall in love. And as for the old couple...

"Mmmmmm......beautiful night outside isn't it?", you said to Kurumu.

"The view right next to me is better. At least I can cuddle up warmly with you.", she replied.

"Hmm hmm. I love you."

"I love you too handsome. Sigh.......seemed like so long ago we started this adventure huh?"

"Yeah. I saw you out of nowhere and we just hit it off and we've been together ever since. Now we have two very strong and very beautiful girls."

"First time I saw them I couldn't believe I had just gave birth to them. I watched them cry for the first time and then they reached out for me and calmed down. Then they were even happier when they saw you. They knew who they're daddy was."

"Kurumu, I've loved you since the moment I laid eyes on you. And now that Ty Lee and Jin are growing up, what's that mean for us?"

"I don't know, hope they have as happy lives as we did and when they need us we'll be right there. But I know one thing, you get to have at this sexy body for the rest of your life.", she teased.

"Kurumu! Stop it.", she began to undress to your half-discomfort.

"Don't deny your feelings, no matter what I'll always love you and I'm yours. You gave me true love, a family, and a good life. The best I could ask for. And now were going to watch it end here."

"I don't want it to end."

"Neither do I. But let's make it last huh?"

"Until the end."

"Come here you.", she made out with you and lovingly felt up you body slowly savoring the moment.

"I love you."

"I love you too."

Epilogue:


Jin eventually found her destined one and became one of the most beautiful and seductive succubi in history alongside Ty Lee. They were so powerful and legendary it was debated over who was the stronger monster. Ty Lee and Ronin married 3 years after the battle with Saizo and Ty Lee became a teacher at Yokai. However many of the male students constantly sexually harassed her so she made her classes female only. But she was so attractive that she even needed precautions for some of her own female students. Jin was a more wild spirit and set out around the world looking for her destined one until she found a unique boy who knew of the monster world yet had absolutely no monster blood in him. Tskune and Moka's family lived on happily as did Mizore and Yukari. As for Kurumu and yourself, you enjoyed the remainder of your long and happy lives with your daughters and friends.

Fin.

(This is my final addition to Rosario Vampire and it has been fun working on this for the last two years. Been a great ride.)

You went with your mom to the backyard where you two could be completely alone.

Akane: I'm proud of you son. You're defeated Tsubaki and know have two baby girls to carry on the next generation. You truly are my son.

(name) Thanks mom. I'm proud to be your son.

Your mom smiled and you hugged her for the first time in your life. At first she was surprised, but then she returned the hug. A tear streamed down her cheek.

Akane: I'm so happy and proud of you that......that....sniff.

(name) Mom....sniff...you're gonna be make me cry.

You both stood there crying happily and hugging. Kurumu and the gang watched from the shadows and listened to your whole conversation.

(name) Mom? Can I ask you a question?

Akane: Anything son.

Your mother smiled.

The gang hearing this tensed up and listened closely not saying a word. Your mother took a deep breath and then she spoke.

Akane: Very well. I was planing to tell you sooner or later. OK. (name) You're part human part.....

"Dragon.", Akane finished.

"Holy hell... I thought I was part wolf for a while.", you responded.

"The older you get the more your form matures into a dragon. That's why it is difficult to know what kind you are right now since your still a teenager. The scales and tail wont come until when you turn twenty.", Akane told you.

"Wow...I'm almost scared of having succumbus blood mixed with dragon now.", you said.

"They might enter in a new breed for my kind. But if I had to guess they probably will embrace more of their succumbus side more than their dragon half.", Akane thought.

"You never know.", you shrugged. You hugged your mother one more time and went back to your wife and kids. Kurumu saw Ty Lee fidgeting with her blanket indicating she'll be the more hyper active one.

"Suppose we got our hands full.", Kurumu told you.

You took Ty Lee from Moka and sat next to Kurumu while she was holding Jin. You stared at them lovingly and cried seeing you two little girls together. You then set your sights over to Kurumu and said, "I love you Kurumu."

"I love you too.", she said back.

You raised you girls to be the nicest little monsters they could be while Kurumu taught how to keep their succumbie powers in check. You told them of their dragon powers on their 18th birthday and taught them the same way Akane did.

While the girls went to the academy Moka and Tskune's son befriended them and were inseparable. Eventually He grew close to Jin and became a couple. Ty Lee didn't pursue in any romantic relationships while at the academy trying to not repeat the mess her mom and dad suffered in their days there studying the monster world. However she went on to marry a kind human male who wasn't completely stunned by her looks and live a happily married life.

Ty Lee and Moka's son married around the time you and Kurumu had moved to a secluded spot alone for the season while your daughters were away at school. The wedding was held there and was the most romantic wedding you ever seen, almost topped your own.

Soon life went on and you and Kurumu lived until you the moment you both would be at peace.
The half human + Succumbus

The End

12112111122112122.content:
“…Sorry, sir… but I can’t stay here…” you said after what seemed like hours of contemplation. “It’s not just about my safety, but everyone else’s as well. If my staying here puts the Newspaper Club in any sort of danger, then I think it would be for the best if I left.”

“I understand, (name). But perhaps, before you leave, you should talk to the members of the Newspaper Club and tell them how you feel.”

Although the Headmaster did raise a solid point, you shook your head. “I know that if I went and spoke to them now, I wouldn't be able to leave. I know that I’ll regret leaving, but if I put anyone in danger, I’ll regret that more.”

“Very well. I’ll call your father and notify him of your decision. Go back to your dorm and collect your things, the bus should be arriving at the bus stop very soon.”

You nodded. “Once again, I’m sorry…”

“I’m not going to try and make you stay, (name). You do what’s best for you. I only ask that, like your father, you do not judge all monsters on the actions of a few. And I will make sure that this kind of situation, where you have to choose between staying and leaving, never occurs again.” The Headmaster got up out of his seat and walked over to you, extending his arm out to you. “I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.”

“Thank you, sir.” you said, accepting his handshake, before walking out of the Headmaster’s office. Unbeknownst to you, Mizore had been spying on you and the Headmaster through an open vent and heard your entire conversation with him. With haste, she went back up the vent and hurried back to class to alert the other members of the Newspaper Club…

* * * * * *

Although you didn't want to face Kurumu and the others for fear of losing the will to leave, you knew that you couldn't just leave the school with no explanation. So after getting together all the things you brought with you, which admittedly wasn't very much, you wrote a farewell letter addressed to the group and left it on the desk, knowing that when class was over, they’d come to your dorm to look for you.

Yes, it was a selfish thing to do, to not give a proper goodbye to the girls who let you into their group saved your life on more than one occasion. You’d have been the first to admit that, but you also knew that they wouldn't have had to do that if you never enrolled at Yōkai Academy. It was indeed a twisted way of thinking, but in a way, it all made sense. You only hoped that your father wouldn't be angry that you for passing up a ‘once-in-a-lifetime opportunity’.

“I hope they’ll all understand…” you muttered, bag on your back as you looked over at the Yōkai Academy building. You turned away and willed you body to move through the forest towards the bus stop.

You moved quickly, eventually breaking into a run as you let your thoughts run freely until you made it to the bus stop and caught sight of what was there waiting for you…
12112111122112122.title: Explode!

choices: Later that day, back at Yōkai Academy
121121111221121221.content:
The bus. Your heart skipped a beat as you moved quickly towards it. The doors were open and it was as if the thing was inviting you in.

The bus driver looked at you through the rear vision mirror. "Had enough, eh?"

"Y-yeah…"

"That's okay. Yōkai Academy isn't for everyone."

You gave the bus driver a nod as you walked to the back of the otherwise empty bus, plonking your things down beside you.

Unbeknownst to you however, Mizore had informed Ruby, Yukari and Kurumu of your decision to leave, and were all now heading towards the bus stop to try and convince you to stay.

"I can't believe (name) would just up and leave like that! We have to find him!" Yukari shouted, but Kurumu didn't need to be told.

The four girls came upon the bus just as the doors closed and the bus started to take off. You'd put your earphones in, leaning back against the seat.

"We're too late…" Mizore muttered.

"No we're not…!" Kurumu grimaced, before turning full Succubus, revealing her long nails, tail and batwings. Kurumu took flight, charging after the bus.

"Kurumu, what are you doing?!" Ruby asked.

"I can't lose (name)! I just can't!" Kurumu called back.

Kurumu caught up to the bus easily, but instead of opting to fly out in front of the bus and make the driver stop, she pounded on the glass near where you sat in an effort to get your attention.

"(name)! (name)!" Kurumu called, but of course you didn't reply. Whether the windows were reinforced or Kurumu was holding back her strength, you couldn't even feel her pounding on the glass.

The bus driver smiled, noticing Kurumu still keeping up with him. The bus driver increased his speed, the bus getting ever closer to the tunnel back to the human world.

Kurumu was getting desperate. She couldn't lose you! Increasing her speed, Kurumu flew around to one of the side windows and charged through it, pinning you to the floor of the bus.

"Kurumu?! What are you doing here?!" You shouted.

"What am I doing here?!" Kurumu asked, almost as if your question caused her great offense, "What about you?! How the hell could you even think about leaving us?! Leaving me?!"

You shifted uncomfortably beneath Kurumu's well-endowed body. "Kurumu, I'm sorry, but this school just isn't for me. I've been here less than a week and I've already been bitten by a bloodthirsty vampire. But not only that, I put you in danger. I just can't do it."

"Yes you can!" Kurumu told you. "You have friends! Me, Yukari, Mizore, Ruby, Moka, Tsukune! We'll protect you!"

"I'm sorry, Kurumu, but this is my decision."

Suddenly, Kurumu's tear-filled eyes started to glow and you felt yourself inexplicably drawn to her. "Tsukune broke my heart once, and it was like I almost died…" she whispered. "I can't go through that again…"

Kurumu leaned forward, pressing her lips to yours and kissing you softly. Your eyes widened.

Your first kiss.

In spite of the utter bliss you felt from Kurumu's warm lips, you started to feel as though you were less and less in control of yourself. What you didn't know however, was that Kurumu had charmed you and kissed you, effectively make you her slave.

Kurumu continued to kiss you, holding your head in her hands, being incredibly careful about her claws. She hadn't even realized that she'd enslaved you with her kiss, your body now nothing more than an instrument for Kurumu to satisfy her whims.

Kurumu broke the kiss, smiling down at you, before realizing what she done, seeing your eyes almost devoid of life. "(name)…" she whispered, quickly turning to the bus driver. "Stop the bus!" She yelled, cradling you in her arms.
121121111221121221.title: Desperate Times

choices: Ruby and Kurumu talk with The Headmaster
Tsukune and Moka tell the others what happened
1211211112211212211.content:
Kurumu led a trail of tears from the bus stop to the Newspaper Club, clutching at your arm as the two of you walked.

It was all you could do on your own. That and breathe, but if Kurumu asked you to stop breathing, you’d hold your breath until you passed out. You’d do whatever she asked. You’d do anything for her.

Kurumu arrived with you back at the Newspaper Club, the young succubus barely able to hold back tears as she entered the room, pulling you along with her. Ruby, Moka and Tsukune turned from their seats to the door.

“Kurumu-” Ruby stopped, gasping at the sight of you and the glazed over, empty look on your face. “What have you done…?” Ruby asked Kurumu softly.

“I…” Kurumu stammered. “I-“

“What have you done?!” Ruby snapped, Kurumu bursting into tears.

“I-I’m sorry!” She cried.

“You’re sorry?! Sorry’s not going to fix this!” Ruby dashed over to you. “(Name), can you hear me?” She asked you. But you wouldn’t respond, not unless Kurumu told you to. “(Name)?”

“Answer her, (name)…!” Kurumu pleaded with you.

“I can hear you…” you replied, but your voice was slow and inflectionless.

“Mizore told us you were planning to leave, (name). I’m glad you changed your mind.” Tsukune smiled, getting up from his seat.

“He didn’t change his mind, Tsukune! Kurumu changed it for him! Look at him!” Ruby snapped. “She turned him into her slave!”

“Her slave?” Tsukune asked.

“I-I didn’t mean to…!” Kurumu insisted. “I panicked, a-and before I even knew what I was doing, I just…” Kurumu shook her head. “I didn’t want him to leave!”

“Well we can’t let him go back now, not like this!” Ruby sighed, cupping your face in her hands and looking you over. “You’ve really done it…”

Tsukune shifted his hands into his pockets. “I don’t think this is as big a deal as you think it is, Ruby. I mean, Kurumu charmed me back in our first year. All we have to do is wait for it to wear off-”

“It’s not going to wear off, Tsukune! Kurumu kissed him! Can’t you see that?! This is different. If a succubus kisses someone they’ve charmed, there’s a good chance they…” Ruby trailed off, removing her hands from your face and retreating her arms to her sides.

“You mean… this could be permanent?” He asked. Ruby nodded.

Moka’s hands hovered over rosary, shaking, hearing her inner self speak to her. “That’s what Kurumu had planned to do to Tsukune during our first year here…”

“Is there anything we can do…?” Moka whispered.

“No…” came the voice, echoing inside Moka’s head. “We just have to hope that Kukumu’s enslavement will wear off eventually, but there’s a strong possibility it never will.”

“I’m sorry! I’m really sorry!” Kurumu blubbered.

“Don’t bother apologizing to me! Apologize to The Headmaster, to (name)’s parents! You know, this whole arrangement, (name) enrolling here officially, was to prove that monsters and humans can coexist! (name) getting bitten by Kokoa is one thing, but getting enslaved by you?! You’re supposed to be his friend! What does that… what does that…?” Ruby was shaking, absolutely speechless. “I don’t know what to say.” She said quickly. “The Headmaster needs to know what you’ve done.” Ruby quickly started gathering up her things.

“The Headmaster?” Kurumu asked, shivering.

“That’s right. You and (name) will have to come with me, especially since he’ll only listen to you now.”

“Alright,” Kurumu nodded shakily, rubbing your arm. “(Name), let’s go see The Headmaster, okay?”

“Yes, Mistress…” came your reply, stilted and robotic.

“‘Mistress’…” Ruby nearly gawked. “You’ve really done a number on him, haven’t you?!”

121121111221122.content:
The most recent sensation you had since Kokoa sunk her fangs into you before falling asleep in Kurumu’s arms was the feeling of lukewarm water running down from the top of your head and across the side of your face. You opened your eyes, but as soon as you did, water fell into them. You slowly brought one of hands up from under what felt like a bed sheet, reached up and felt around your face, noticing that there was a damp flannel covering your eyes, which was probably the source of the water. You slowly pulled the flannel off of your face as your eyes adjusted to the new surroundings.

Sunlight streamed in from the window and across your face, causing your eyes to water slightly. “How long have I been out for?” you thought, glancing down at your body, which was indeed covered by a white bed sheet. It was at that point you realized you were in a bed that was propped up against the wall in a similar fashion to how the bed in your dorm-room was set up. Without moving your head, you cautiously looked around the room in the hopes that you would be able to indentify an object that would tell you whose room you were in. You were too focused in trying to figure out whose room you were in that you ignored the most obvious answer.

In order to continue your observations, you were forced to turn your head. It was then that your eyes met that of a young, blue-haired girl’s who was sitting in front of you, watching you with a look of both concern and relief on her face. You could tell by her expression that she was glad that you were now awake.

“Kurumu...” you mumbled.

“Shhhhhh.” Kurumu hushed you as she caressed your cheek. “Save your strength.”

You complied, turning back and facing the ceiling, smiling weakly as Kurumu continued to brush your check with her hand. Both you and Kurumu remained silent for a while, the only sound was the sound of your breathing, which slowed itself to mimic the rhythm of Kurumu’s fondling of your cheek. “Thanks for rescuing me.” you eventually spoke up, although now the thought occurred to you: “Why didn’t Kurumu take me to the infirmary?”

“Not a problem, (name), but if you’re wondering why I didn’t take you to the infirmary,” Kurumu began, causing your eyes to widen “Is she psychic too?” “I was going to take you to the infirmary, but seeing as I wouldn’t be able to stay there all night and I was worried that Kokoa might come back for you, I took you here instead.”

Just hearing Kokoa’s name seemed to send shivers down your spine, as your breathing became more erratic. It was as she had left you in a state of constant fear for your life. You knew that if Kokoa told anyone at this school you were a human, even the teachers, then your life would be in danger. Beads of sweat trickled down your body. “Don’t worry, (name). Kokoa won’t get you. I promise.” Kurumu said, using the flannel to wipe up your sweat.

Both of you didn’t say anything else for quite some time, as you were focused on how content Kurumu seemed with looking after you. “I have to let her know that I appreciate this.” you thought.

“Seriously Kurumu, thank you so much for protecting me and looking after me like this. You don’t know how much it means to me that I was able to meet someone as kind and beautiful as you on my first day here.”

“(name)...” Kurumu blushed at your compliment.

“I know it sounds sappy, but I mean it.” you smiled. “Both times when Kokoa bit me, I thought I was a goner. But both times, you saved me. To tell you the truth, I was afraid of coming here. I thought that if anyone found out I was human, I’d be hunted down and killed simply because of that reason. But you and the others accepted me regardless.”

“Whether you're a monster or a human, there's no difference in the value of someone's life. The fact that you’re a human doesn’t matter to me.” Kurumu stated matter-of-factly as she began to run her fingers through your hair.

You were deeply touched by Kurumu’s statement, and you were overcome by the sudden urge to be close to her. You both stared into each other’s eyes silently, before you began to lean closer to her, ignoring the pain in your neck. Just as your lips were about to touch hers, she pulled away. “I’m sorry...” you muttered. “I just thought that-”

“It’s not you, (name). If I kiss you, then you’ll become my slave.” Kurumu explained. “I don’t want that to happen. I can’t let that happen. You’re my...” Kurumu trailed off, her voice now wavering. To you, it seemed as though she was close to tears.

“I’m your what?” you asked softly.

Just as Kurumu was about to answer you, a knock at the door caused her to silently stand up and walk over to the door. Kurumu shot you a glance as if to say “Lie down and don’t make a sound.” You did as Kurumu’s look suggested as she turned the doorknob and opened it slowly.

Who’s there?

And more importantly, what do they want?

12112111122121.content:
(Both, You and Kokoa)

"Headmaster!!!", you both said, surprised, in unison.

The Headmaster looks at the both of you and quickly understands what's going on.

"Shuzen Kokoa, get off [name] now.", he said, as he gestured with his hand for Kokoa to get off you.

"But, but...!"

"Now, Shuzen Kokoa.", he said with a more firm tone of voice that made both, you and Kokoa tremble a little.

"Yes, sir!", said Kokoa, getting off you as quickly as she could.

"Are you alright, [name]-kun?"

"Yes, sir."

"Good. Now, both of you sit at the table, I need to talk to you both.", he said in a calmer tone.

"Yes, sir."

"Um, sir?"

"Yes [name]-kun?"

"Would you like something to drink? Maybe some tea?"

"Yes. That would be nice. Thank you [name]-kun."

"Don't mention it.", you said with a smile of your face. Glad that the Headmaster had saved you from Kokoa's clutches.

"What about you, Shuzen-san?"

"HEY!!! Why did you called me like that? It's not like we're strangers, you know?", she said with an angry and annoyed tone.

"Actually, we ARE strangers. I met you today. And I don't know anything about you, other than you are Moka-san's sister and that you have an obsession with my blood.", you said with a calm tone.

"Hmph!!! Fine, whatever!!!", she said, getting angrier.

"Anyway, do you want tea or not?"

"Fine, fine. Give that tea."

As you start preparing the tea, the Headmaster begins to explain, to Kokoa and you, why you're here. You didn't knew why you were here either. The only thing you knew was that he had begun an exchange program and that your old man and him were friends.

"Now, Ms. Shuzen, what [name]-kun said about the exchange program and about my friendship with his father is true. I'm planning to make it so that the Yokai Academy becomes a shcool for both, humans AND monsters."

"WHAT?!", you and Kokoa shout, in unison.

"Why would you do that?! Most monsters don't like humans!"

"She's right, sir. If this school were to become a school for humans and monsters, it could be disastrous, to both sides."

"Maybe. But I believe that, despite the risks of creating conflict, this situation could also create harmony between monsters and humans. To proof my theory, look at Aono Tsukune. He has befriended two vampires, actually three vampires, given that Akashia Moka is two persons in one body, a succubus, two witches, a werewolf and a yuki-onna. And so have you, right, [name]-kun]? Except for two of the three vampires and the werewolf."

You remember your meeting with Kurumu and the others and blush.

"Yes, sir. I have."

"See? Both, your and Tsukune's cases renwewd my hope. I can't say for sure if I will make the school accept both species yet, tough. I'll be watching and monitoring how you relationship with Tsukune and the others goes and I'll inform you and the others of my decision by the end of the school year."

"The others already know this?", you ask.

"Yes, they do. And they have agreed. Well then, I'll take my leave, and you Ms. Shuzen, come with me. We have to discuss you punishment."

"P-punishment?! For what?!", she says, fear evident in her voice.

"One, for trying to, harm and enslave another student. And two, because you know well that girls aren't allowed in the boys dorm and that boys aren't allowed in the girls dorm, unless they are a couple. Like boyfriend and girlfriend. Have a good night [name]-kun."

"Good night to you Headmaster. For you too, Shuzen-san."

"Shut up!"

1211211112212112.content:
The decision ultimately wasn't up to you. You weren't the Headmaster of the academy and you didn't really know what the Headmaster was thinking. Sure, you were worried about your safety, as well as the possible problems that could arise from Yōkai Academy becoming a true coeducational school, but it wasn't really your place to speak up. You thought it would just be best to let the Headmaster deal with everything and just have you focus on trying to fit in to Yōkai Academy and maintain friendships with the wonderful people whom you had met on your first day.

Somehow, in spite of the batshit insane day you had just been a part of, you were able to relax and fall asleep. You felt your consciousness drift as you found yourself floating in the middle of the ocean, facing up towards the sky. Not a cloud could be seen as a gentle breeze pushed you along the water. The warm temperatures served to ease your mind and calm your soul as you became one with your surroundings. You were alone in the vast unbroken blue, but you didn't care. You closed your eyes once more and let the sounds of the ocean drown out all the fears and worries you still had.

Your relaxation in the water was brought to an end when you felt a light dab on your forehead. You screwed your nose a little and paid no heed to the feeling as you tried to return to your state of tranquility, unfortunately to no avail. Every so often you would feel a light touch of water on your face, arms, legs, hands or feet. Without opening your eyes, you brought your hands up and wiped away the liquid… the slightly sticky… slightly salty liquid…

You opened your eyes just as more liquid dripped down into your eyes. You frantically wiped the rainwater out of your eyes as you were taken aback by its color and texture. Either there was red food coloring in the rain, or it was raining blood! You looked around and saw that the uninhabited ocean was now swimming with human corpses, the water now a murky black.

You did what anyone in this bizarre situation would do. You turned onto your stomach and began to swim as fast as you could, away from the floating mounds of rotting human flesh. The rain was pounding on you now, running down your body and mixing with the dark murky waters.

A stone cold hand grabbed your arm and you fought back the urge to scream as you pulled your arm away from whatever was grabbing it. The horrible nightmare ended as you turned to see your dad – a terrifying zombified version of your dad, complete with maggots and worms moving in and out his open eye sockets – giving off a low pitched moan as he once again latched on to your arm and dragged you deep under water.

* * * * * *

You woke with a start, drenched in a cold sweat. Despite knowing that it was dream, you were the most frightened you had ever been in your entire life. Your chest felt a little bare. You looked down, and sure enough, the academy uniform that you had gone to sleep in was now slashed and torn, although you yourself were completely unharmed. It couldn't have been Kokoa. Kokoa wouldn't slash your shirt so neatly, so fine… so… “Is that someone’s initials?” you asked yourself as you realized that ‘FT’ was engraved into your shirt. Okay… this DEFINITELY wasn't Kokoa! She would just drink your blood and go on her way. Something in the back of your mind was telling you that there was someone more sinister out there, and for whatever reason, they didn't like you!

Getting bitten by a Vampire was one thing! But you weren't expecting to be mind raped until at least the end of the week. There was no way in Hell that you were gonna just brush this off and go back to sleep. You’d had bad dreams before, but this was something else entirely! You needed help! But you weren't sure where you’d be able to get help from, especially at this ungodly hour! Well… you DID… but you weren't sure you’d be able to. After all, you couldn't rely on the Headmaster to bail you out of every situation you got yourself into. At the same time though, this was something you knew you couldn't face on your own. You needed answers, so you knew what you had to do.

Tidying yourself up, you made a mad dash out of your room and went to find…

I would advise you to keep that in mind as you go about your life here at Yōkai Academy...”

You wanted to tell Kurumu that you were a human, but you weren’t sure how she would react. And plus, the Headmaster did say not to let anyone know that you weren’t a monster. You didn’t know what kind of monster Kurumu was, and for all you knew, she could hate humans with a passion and kill you without a second thought. Who’s to say that telling her would be the right decision?

But that smile... With the way that Kurumu was looking at you, her violet-colored eyes staring deep into yours, you knew there was no way in Hell that someone as kind and gentle as Kurumu could be anything terrifying or evil.

“(name), are you okay?”

After they became friends, Tsukune was more than willing to tell Aria all about himself. She then told you the full story of his time at the academy and encouraged you to follow his footsteps and enroll as well during your sophomore year, which you readily agreed to in order to be back with your childhood friend.

A month had passed since that time, and you were just getting ready to head to your first day at the same monster school as Aria. As you ran toward the front gates of the school, you were greeted by an excited tackle-hug from Aria.

"[name]! It's so good to see you again! You have no idea how lonely I've been without you around!" She said as she rubbed her face into your chest.

"Jeez Aria, calm down! I'm glad to see you too, but don't you think that a greeting like this is a little too intense for the first day of school?!" You said while laughing at your friend's display.

"Awww, but [name]... I missed you so much!" she says, letting go of you and putting on a pouty face.

"I missed you too, Aria. But didn't you tell me that you got a boyfriend while you were here?"

"Oh yeah! That reminds me! I have to introduce you to my friends! Come on, I'll show you the way!" Aria said as she grabbed your arm and dragged you into the school.

You simply laughed to yourself the whole time. Aria hadn't changed a bit since junior high. Before you knew what had happened, you found yourself standing in a clubroom with two other boys and six different girls. Aria proceeded to introduce you to them all.

"[name], I'd like you to meet my new friends. The girls are Moka Akashiya, her little sister Kokoa Shuzen, Yukari Sendo, Kurumu Kurono, Ruby Tojo, and Mizore Shirayuki. This is my boyfriend Ginei Morioka, and the plain looking guy over there is the one I told you about, Tsukune Aono." she said, pointing to each of the people as she said their names.

Ginei stepped up to you first. He reached out to shake hands with you, and you accepted the gesture.

"So you're the childhood friend that Aria was telling us all about. Nice to meet ya! The name's Ginei Morioka, but you can just call me Gin. So, I've been curious about this since Aria told me about you... What kind of monster are you?"

"Ummm, I'm not a monster... I'm a human." you respond.

Everyone in the room (other than Aria) gasps in shock. You and Aria simply look around confused before Aria speaks up.

"What, didn't I tell you? [name] here is a human, just like Tsukune!" she said.

"Wow! I never expected that! Why didn't you tell us sooner, Aria?" Yukari asked.

"I could have sworn I told you guys before..." Aria responded, sounding somewhat embarrassed that she forgot to bring up an important detail like that.

"It's no big deal, Aria... But wow, I can't believe that we've got another human at the academy! Isn't this great, Tsukune?" Kurumu said.

"Yeah, I'll say! But [name], are you sure you know what you're getting into here? I almost got killed when the school found out that I was a human..."

"Don't worry about it. Aria told me all about what happened with you, so I think I know what to expect if my secret gets blown. If anyone asks, I'm a wizard who never learned to use any magic. That should work as an excuse, right?"

"I suppose, but even the most talentless witches and wizards should be able to use at least basic level magic... You'd probably get made fun of by any of the others at the academy." Ruby said.

"Yeah, well I'll be fine as long as a few insults are all that they throw at me. Aria wasn't exactly the most popular girl back in the human world, so I was already made fun of for being friends with her." you replied.

Gin started laughing as he heard this, and Aria began to blush.

"[name]!!! Why did you have to say something like that! You're totally embarrassing me in front of my friends!" she pouted.

"Hehehe, sorry about that Aria... I was just-"

At this point, Kokoa let out a loud groan and interrupted you.

"Ugh! I am so bored with this! Why do I have to be here with you losers anyway?! And seriously, the last thing we need at this school is another worthless human cluttering up the halls!" the young vampire girl complained before storming out of the room.

"Kokoa, wait! You shouldn't say such rude things! Come back!" Moka yelled as she chased after her little sister.

You simply looked over at Aria in confusion.

"What's her problem?"

"*sigh* Oh, don't take it personally. Kokoa always acts like that. She's really pretty nice once you get to know her, though." Aria answered.

"Well, if you say so... Hey, Mizore was it?" you turn your attention to the purple haired girl who was standing in the corner.

Mizore immediately looks up at you and begins to blush. Little did you know it, but she had thought you were pretty cute when she first saw you.

"Y-yes? What is it?" She asks nervously.

"Um, I was just wondering why you hadn't said anything yet. Are you shy around new people or something?"

"N-no, it's just that... I, um..."

Before she can even respond, the bell rang to signal that you had to go to class.

"Oh, look at the time! Gotta go!" she says as she runs out of the room.

Everyone else looked at eachother in confusion, having never seen Mizore act like this before. She herself was sure of it by now; she had fallen in love with you at first sight. As you and the others head to class together...
141.title: A New School + A Snow Woman

1412.content:
As you walk to class with everyone, you feel something wrapping around your stomach. Looking down, you see that there is a large shadowy tentacle wrapping around you. You normally would have freaked out, but this wasn't the first time this had happened, and you knew exactly what was going on. In an instant the tentacle pulls you away from the group and back into the clubroom. The door then shuts behind you, and you look up to see Aria in her true monster form.

Well, being a doppelganger, she didn't really have a true form. She would usually just take the form of your ideal woman, but her "monster" appearance was simply a shadowy version of that feminine figure. This form had no color to it; its skin, hair, and clothing were all pitch black, with the only thing that stood out being her glowing red eyes. Her shadow form served as the in-between for her transformations, and it was in this form that she could manipulate her body into any shape she wanted to. As the tentacle released you, it morphed back into Aria's right arm. Without saying a word, you walk up to her and bop her on the head.

"Dang it Aria, how many times have I told you not to do that?! If you wanted to talk to me in private, then you could have just tapped me on the shoulder and asked me! What if someone say you do that?!"

Aria simply giggled before speaking, her cheerful voice echoing a bit in her shadow form.

"Are you forgetting already [name]? We're in Yokai Academy now! Everything you used to keep me from doing in the human world is perfectly fine here!"

"Oh yeah, sorry... I guess I for-Wait a minute! Didn't you say that there was a rule about not revealing your true form on the school grounds?!"

"*giggle* Yeah, but nobody ever bothers to follow that rule. Didn't I tell you about how many times students would use their real forms to attack Tsukune and Moka before?"

"Ummm... I think I remember something like that. To be honest, most of the stuff you tell me just goes in one ear and out the other. Hehehe..."

"[name]! You're so mean!" Aria says while lightly hitting your chest.

You simply laugh.

"I'm just kidding, Aria. You know I always listen to you."

Aria simply turns her back to you and makes a pouty expression again.

"Hmph, well you're still not forgiven for being so rude!"

"Yeah, whatever Aria. So do you intend to tell me what you dragged me in here for? Emphasis on 'dragged'..."

Aria immediately turns around and looks at you again, her brilliant red eyes staring deep into yours.

"That's right! I had something important to tell you about this school before class starts!"

"Really? What?" you ask, curious.

"It's something about..."
1412.title: Aria's explanation

1413.content:
As you and the others are walking to class together, you feel a chilling breeze blow over your shoulder. At first you just shrug it off as nothing, but soon you feel the cold increasing. Before you even realize what is going on, a snow-cold hand touches your shoulder and your body stops moving. You look down to see that your feet have already been frozen in place, but before you could call out to the others, another icy hand covers your mouth and freezes your lips shut!

As this point you were beginning to panic, and the ice covering your feet was slowly creeping up your legs. In almost no time at all, your entire body is frozen from the neck down. It is at this point that your attacker makes herself known. Stepping out from behind you is Mizore, whose hair and hands have transformed into formations of ice. Standing in front of you and placing her frosty hand on your cheek, she begins to blush. She then melts the ice off of your mouth before speaking to you.

"Hello there, [name]. I'm sorry I had to do the so drastically, but I couldn't think of any other way to get you alone."

"It's okay Mizore, but what did you want? Can't it wait until after class?"

"No, I'm afraid it can't. I'm sorry, but I really like you [name]. I just wanted to spend the day alone with you."

"But Mizore-"

Mizore cuts you off by tracing her index finger over your lips, freezing them shut once again.

"Now now, [name], don't be like that. I'm just asking for one day with you... Please?" She says.

You would have let out a sigh and said alright, but her ice was sealing your mouth off, so you simply nodded. Mizore simply smiled at you and defrosted you before grabbing your wrist and running down the hallway with you. She then takes you to...
1413.title: Skipping class with Mizore?!

He is much cuter than I had expected."
142.title: Chaos + Snow Woman

1421.content: The next day, Mizore woke up very early so she could catch you at school. She got dressed and went to the school. But right outside the school, she saw you again and began to run towards you. But before she could call out your name, you jumped into the air and landed on the roof perfectly. Mizore was very impressed now. She raced up the stairs and made her way to the roof. When she got to the roof, she saw you and was too shy to walk up to you, so she looked at you through a crack of the door. Soon she heard you say "I know you're back there. Come out." Mizore was surprised, but she walked over to you and asked if she could sit next to you. "Sure." Mizore sat next to you and started to relax. "So, you know my name, but I don't know yours." She blushed and said "My name is Mizore Shirayuki." "Please to meet you Mizore." "So, why were those guys attacking you?" "They said they had a problem with me being a human with powers, so they told me I had to leave. I told them they could try to force me to leave and you saw the rest." Mizore was surprised at the facts as well, but she loved you too much to care. "So, you're a snow woman huh? In that case..." you said as you used the power of the light blue chaos emerald. You raised your hand and said "Chaos Ice." Just then, a blast of ice shot out from your hand and you created an umbrelly made of ice. She asked how you did that and you said "I was born with the power of the chaos emeralds. They are seven gemstones of great power. They are divinded into there elements; Earth, Fire, Wind, Water, Ice, Lightning and Darkness. The attack you saw yesterday was called the Chaos Spear. It didn't need any emerlds to use." Mizore was amazed by your power, and smiled at you. You and Mizore relaxed there until.....

And I see you have a new friend. Care to inroduce us?" "Leave her out of this Hannable. Your battle is with me." "Now I will not fight her until you're dead." But most of all, I must use my powers to protect the one I hold closest to me; Mizore." Mizore gasped a little when you said that and an ice replica appeared before you. 1421111111.title: Later

choices: A huge chunk of ice is coming at me (semi-canon)
A girl on a bike crashed into me
145.content:
For so long, I'd read fantasy book, played video games, watched TV shows... Every time, secretly hoping that one day, I would find proof that magic exists. For 15 years, I waited and hoped, constantly seeking for the supernatural, but 3 years ago, today... I finally found it, though I had no idea at the time.

It was the beginning of autumn, the end of summer break, and after yet another move, I found myself having to adjust to yet another new environment. New people... New places... New school...
I'd been through it several times before, so I'd grown used to it, but also tired of it. My parents, that morning told me they'd finally gotten me signed up for a new school, but it was a private school with a dorm. This excited me, as I had never lived in a dorm before and I was eager to try something new. The catch to this was, I'd have to leave that afternoon to move into the dorm. Fortunately, most of my stuff was still in boxes, so it didn't take much to get everything ready. They had spoken with the staff at the school and it was agreed I would take just a few suitcases with me at first and the rest would be shipped later.

The bus stop I was supposed to wait at, was a bit far, but I didn't have to wait long before it arrived. I deposited my things in the bus' storage compartment and hopped on. I thought it odd that I was the only one on, and the bus driver gave me some weird vibes, but I didn't care overly much. The trip was a little long and it was just after entering a tunnel that I noticed something was off. I was looking out the window and noticed that, instead of pitch black, as I'd expected, I saw a view similar to the warp tunnels in various movies. It freaked me out, but it excited me in a way.
I had finally found the magic I'd been searching so long for. I watched in awe for what seemed like forever before the view changed and I saw a haunted looking forest. The bus driver bid me farewell with an odd grin once I had pulled everything out.

The forest seemed to go on for quite a ways, but the school building was clearly visible, even from where I stood. So I started forward, eager to see what else awaited me in this new life. However, my journey was brought to a quick halt when...
145.title: Other (Reserved for: Ignorance)

1451.content:
A huge shadow cast itself over me, and I looked up to see what might have been a glacier about to fall on me. I could literally feel the huge sweat drop falling down the back of my head. I heard someone shout "LOOK OUT!!!" just before being launched out of the way. I hit the ground just as the ice hit the ground. The area shook with the force of the impact and I reached up to cover my face (I'd landed on my back), only to feel something soft and hear a gasp. Another sweat drop fell down my head as I quickly let go of what I'd just touched and kept my eyes closed. "Uummm... Sorry... Bout that... but could you maybe get off? So I can see?" I managed to say.
"Oh! Yeah... Sorry bout that." She replied, or at least, it sounded like a she. I opened my eyes to see a girl shifting off me and sit to the side. I groaned in pain as I attempted to get up. "Aw, man, that hurt... You ok?" I looked over to see the girl looked rather unharmed and a bit ashamed.
"Yes, I'm alright... You aren't hurt bad, are you?" She replied in a quiet, reserved voice. "I'll be ok. I've had worse. Although I should thank you. It not every day one nearly gets crushed by a giant block of ice." I answered, jokingly.
She cringed at that. "Sorry. I came out here to practice some techniques and I didn't think anyone would be around here."
My eyes bulged. "That was you? Oh! Wow! That was awesome! I wish I could do something like that. Most I've ever made was a snow fort, which isn't really ice."
She laughed at that. "Well, I'm glad you weren't hurt. Oh! We haven't introduced ourselves, have we? My name is Mizore. I'm a snow woman." She smiled. I was starting to like those.
"Well, I'm Riku. I just got here a few minutes ago..." I paused, remembering my suitcases. "OH CRAP!!! MY STUFF!!!" I ran over to where I had been and saw that, while not crushed under the ice, the suitcases had been torn in some places and covered in dirt and rocks. "Well, at least they didn't get crushed..."
"I'm so sorry about that." Mizore said as she walked up.
"It all looks mostly intact. I'll probably need to wash my clothes, but otherwise, I don't think anything is too bad." I said, reassuringly, as I began gathering everything together.
"Well, so long as everything is ok, I'll take my leave then." Mizore said, bowing before turning away.
"I'll see you later then." I waved as I made my way to the school.

Note from the author: I appreciate, and would like to encourage others to add to my story. I find it fun and challenging to work off of someone else's chapters, as well as my own. Feel free to add something you think would be appropriate, or just throw a wrench in there for kicks. XD
1451.title: Meet Mizore, the Snow Girl

"Geez, for the longest time possible I have been searching for the supernatural, and now I'm having second thoughts?" I smirk.

I signed and finish unpacking my stuff and change to the clothes that the academy send to me. I leave the dorm and make my way to the campus to start the day until I was...

You are Sasuke Uchiha, a student who failed the entrance exams for high school. But you were a bit of a loner anyway. But you were not exactly normal. You were born with the power of Chaos and you knew how to use Chaos Control and Chaos Spear, but you were still learning how to use the other powers. But I have to admit, this place is giving off some kind of aura. I guess I was right. This could be interesting.” you said to yourself. You then started to walk to the academy building.
1511.title: Chaos + A New Begining

15111.content:
(Moka)

As you were walking towards the academy, you began to hear some kid of noise, but you ignored it for a while. You then noticed the noise getting closer and closer. You looked behind you and saw a bat flying in the air. “Ah, only a bat.” But then, you were run over by a bike and you ended rolling with the rider. “Ouch.” you said trying to get up. But you ended up placing your hand on a woman’s thigh and she gasped a little. “Uh-oh.” you thought. “Sorry. My eyes went blurry because I’m anemic.” she said. You saw her face and you thought to yourself “Cute…!” The woman pulled her skirt down an ended up taking your hand with it. You quickly pulled it back and said “Oh, sorry. Sorry, I….” you then ended up having a nosebleed. “Oh no, blood is…” she said pulling out a handkerchief to wipe the blood away. But when she got to face-level with you, she started to tremble for a moment. “Oh no…this scent… My body is…” “Scent?” you smelled the air and thought to yourself “The scent coming from her hair is nice.” You were then surprised when she gently grabbed your face and said “Sorry, because I’m a…vampire.” she said as she gently bit your neck and sucked your blood. She quickly snapped out of it and said “Sorry. I…” “My blood…” you then looked at your neck and saw what looked like a lipstick stain. “What? There’s nothing.” you thought.She then walked over to her bag. “Are you also from Youkai Academy?” “Yeah, though I’m a freshman.” “That’s great. I’m a freshman too!” “I-I see.” “Um…do you hate vampires?” “She’s joking right?” You thought before standing up. “What’s wrong with that? Aren’t vampires individualistic? So it’s interesting that you ran into me.” “I’m so happy!" She said jumping up and hugging you, causing you both to fall. “Then, will you be my friend?” “Sure.” “I’m really glad… I don’t know anyone here and I was feeling worried. Oh, I’m Moka Akashiya.” “My name is Sasuke Uchiha.” You then thought to yourself “Spending the semester with a cute girl like this. I’m quite lucky.” You then told Moka that you would see her later. She waved bye to you for now. Later on, you were told by the teacher that the entire school was for monsters. And any human who enters will be killed on the spot. You were extremely surprised b this, but you knew with your powers, no one would suspect you to be a human. But what was more, Moka entered the class and saw that you were in the same class as her. She ran up to you and said “It’s Sasuke! We’re in the same class? I’m so happy!” she said while hugging you. “What have I gotten myself into this time?”
15111.title: A New Friend

151111.content:
(Saizo)

After Class, you were walking through the school, with Moka hanging on your arm and thought “Okay, calm down. So long as no one finds out that you’re human, you’ll be fine.” You and Moka went to a vending machine and you got yourself a soda and Moka some tomato juice. You accidentally touched hands and you quickly backed off. “Sorry, I…” Moka just smiled and said “Geez Sasuke!” she said giving you a playful shove. Though being a vampire she had quite a bit of power in that shove. “What ridiculous strength.” you thought. You and Moka just sat down on a bench and enjoyed you beverages. But then, a classmate of yours named Saizo came from behind a pillar and grabbed your neck. You could barely breath. “What is a beautiful girl like you doing with a guy such as this?” he said as he threw you into the vending machine. “Sasuke!” “Don’t bother with that trash. Come play with me.” She batted his hand away and said “I’m with Sasuke.” she then ran up to you and asked if you were alright. “Yeah, somewhat…” You and Moka then went on the roof of the academy. “That was scary…are you really alright Sasuke?” “Yeah, I’m alright Moka.” You then thought to yourself “But that was some throw. Is that the power of the monster?” You looked at Moka. She then began patting your back “Sasuke is wired. It’s like this is the first time you’ve seen a monster.” “Uh…” “Oh that’s right. What kind of monster are you? Oh wait, telling me that would be against the school rules.
