You then noticed electricity flow through your hand. “Looks like lightning is under my control as well." “At the rate your power is increasing, you and I will have to spar one day Sasuke.” “I think I might enjoy that.” you said as you handed her the rosary. She changed back to normal and you knew you would have to learn how to fully control these powers. The next day, you and the other handed out the paper with the facts. Though as you were talking to Moka, you ended up seeing her panties and he said “No, you cant look up yet!” She then ended up hitting you with her ankle. As you fell over, the girls of the school were chasing Gin and Moka ran up to you as you were in a bit of a daze. “I’m sorry Sasuke! Are you alright?” she said lifting the front half of your body off the ground. But then she could smell the blood from your nose. “It smells so good…” “You can’t do that Moka!” “That’s right Moka-san!” “I…I can’t resist anymore!” she said as she one again bit your neck. You woke up to find this going on. “Moka…”
151111111111111111111.title: Power of Lightning Awakened

1511111111111111111111.content:
(Mizore)

The next day, you and the others were handing out the latest issue of the school newspaper. It didn’t take long for every single copy to get handed out. Not to mention that you let Gin’s past actions go. You became friends rather quickly. “Yay, all the newspapers have been distributed!” “Yahoo, the news report critics are good this time too.” “Hey, how about we hold a celebration? Like bringing snacks and such?” “That’s a great idea Moka.” “Agreed!” “Hey where did Gin-senpai go?” “He was just here a second ago..” “He probably went to harass more female students.” “I think its okay if we don’t invite him.” “He’s the enemy of all women!” As you and the others talked about the party, you had a sudden chill down your spine. Just then you heard a female voice talk to you all from behind. “You guys sure get along well. The newspaper club that is…” You turned around and saw a woman with long purple hair and her own outfit. “Getting close with one another....I don't really understand that.” “Hey! What’s that supposed to mean?” “Newspaper…” “Huh?” “Do you have one left?” “Yeah, though it’s a bit tattered. I hope you don’t mind.” you said walking over to her and handing it to her. She then looked at you for a moment. “What is it?” “So you’re Sasuke-kun? You’re cuter than I thought.” “Huh?” “By then.” she said walking off. “Sasuke, who was that just now?” “I have no idea.” “Well she kind of pissed me off!” “Yes, yes.” “Now now. What do you say we party hard after school?” “Yeah!” Later during class, you noticed the girl from before and that her name was Mizore Shirayuki.
1511111111111111111111.title: The Next Day

15111111111111111111111.content: After class, you and the others were discussing the party and even though Kurumu tried to seduce you, again, Moka got her off you and the two of them went to get ready for the party. “Oh brother.” you thought to yourself. You then got the feeling you were being watched, so you turned around and saw someone hide behind the pillar. “Who’s there?” and from behind the pillar came Mizore. “Hi…” “Mizore…Anything I can do for you?” you said as she walked up to you. She then handed you back the newspaper you gave her. “I read it; the news that you wrote is interesting as usual.” “As usual?” “Look.” she said handing you a small booklet. “When I was away from school, I always requested Nekonome-sensei to send me copies of Youkai's newspaper. I've been gathering your articles into this scrapbook.” “Oh I see. I’m glad you like them…” you said opening the book. What you saw in there was a but over the top. Lots of little notes written there. “How is it? I even wrote some comments about them.” “Oh boy, I think this might be a problem.” you thought to yourself. “I love the news reports that you write. You always write from a weak person's view, which I can relate to. Your personality and way of thinking is just like mine.” she said as she held onto your arm. “W-wait…” “You must be lonely, right? I know how it feels…” Somehow you found yourself at the lake where you met Kurumu.
15111111111111111111111.title: What Have You Gotten Yourself Into?

151111111111111111111111.content: At the lake, you and Mizore were skipping stones for a little while. Mizore just gotten quite a few skips on her stone. She said as you applauded her “Did you see that Sasuke? The stone just skipped nine time.” “Umm…Mizore…I have to return to the clubroom soon.” you said walking away. But Mizore hugged you from behind and stopped you. “No! Your throwing is too bad that you still can't make it skip more than four times right?” You thought to yourself “It’s already time for the party, and Moka and the others are waiting for me…” “Do you still want to go back to that collusive club of yours?” “Huh?” “No, rather, you just want to see Moka Akashiya, right? If you were to go, I don’t now what I’d do to that woman.” she said as the chill around you got stronger and stronger. “What the hell?” you thought. “Mizore.” “All you need to do is just me mine, Sasuke.” meanwhile, Moka was being attacked by an ice doll of Mizore, but Luckily Kurumu bailed her out just in time. You were having a tough time yourself. You were sliding on the frozen lake and thought to yourself “Damn it, if I had ice under my control, this wouldn’t be a problem.” Mizore walked towards you and as she did, Ice spikes rose from her sides in the path she walked. “This is…” She giggled a little. “I won’t let you run away.” “You are…!” “I’m a snow woman, and I can freely control ice.” “One thing we would have in common if I had awakened that power yet.” “I have heard you can control the power of most of the elements. I kind of like that.” “This is not good.” you thought to yourself. Just then, ice rose from below you and you were trapped. “What the hell?” “Sasuke, we were destined to meet. Because we are both loners, fate brought us together. We will definitely understand each other. We’ll warm our cold hearts.” she said as she walked towards you and the ice continued to surround you. “Damn it!” Soon she stood right in front of you with one of her ice claws almost touching your nose. “You sure are persistent, but as long as your body is frozen, there's nowhere you can go. When that happens, you'll be all mine.” “If this continues…” you thought as you almost encased in ice. “Sasuke…!” You noticed Kurumu carrying Moka and they were both coming to help you. “Do not hinder me!” she said as she made the spikes rise. They ended up crashing into you and you were free of the ice. Mizore was walking towards Moka to finish her, but you got in her way. “Mizore, you have to stop.” “Why?” “I know you think I’m alone, but I’m not.” “Are you rejecting my feelings?” “What?” “SASUKE!” she said as a blizzard came from out of nowhere and she vanished. The ice began to crack t that point and you all fell through the ice. As you and the others warmed up, you heard that Mizore attacked a teacher, but you had a feeling that there was more to this than meets the eye, you had faith that Gin would uncover the truth.
151111111111111111111111.title: A Snow Woman

1511111111111111111111111.content: As you searched for Mizore, you found her at the cliff near the ocean. “Mizore!” “Sasuke…” “Look, most of the school thinks you attacked one of the teachers, but I need to hear your side of the story.” “You’re too much Sasuke.” “Huh?” “I thought that only you would be able to understand me…” You gasped a little and you knew it was what you said at the lake that made her think this way. “Nobody…” she said as she started to cry. “Nobody understands me…Why? Why, why?! WHY?!” she yelled as a huge blizzard surrounded her. “Her emotions are running wild!” you thought. “Sasuke…!” “Moka.” “This isn’t good, Mizore didn’t do anything wrong!” “In fact, the teacher tired to do something despicable to Mizore, she was just trying to defend herself.” "I knew it. Mizore!” “Stay away…Stay away!” she said as wave rammed against the cliff and the water froze. Images of Mizore appeared on the ice and they began to speak of how she was alone. “This must me Mizore’s inner voice.” “Everyone should just be buried under pure white ice!” she said as most of the cliff began to freeze. “What a terrible chill!” “I have to do something!” you thought. Mizore laughed from the pain inside and you then noticed the cliff was starting to fall apart. She then started to fall. “MIZORE!” you said using all the speed you could call upon to get to her. You managed to grab her hand just before she was out of reach “I got you Mizore!” “It’s fine Sasuke.” “What?” “You can let go, you don’t understand-” “Shut up and listen!” Mizore gasped for a moment. “You didn’t let me finish at the lake. The only reason I’m not alone is because I made such precious friends, and I want you to be my friend as well Mizore.” She gasped again and the ice puppets came from behind. “I can’t control them anymore Sasuke!” “I am not going to let go!” You then felt another power awaken inside of you. You felt that the chill became less and less of a problem. “Oh now I can control ice!” “Looks like we have that in common after all…” “Sasuke!” Moka said as she ran towards you. You ended up removing the rosary one again.
1511111111111111111111111.title: Power of Ice Awakened

15111111111111111111111111.content: Moka looked at what was going on and saw you holding onto Mizore. “Sorry for the wait.” “Moka.” She then grabbed the back of your shirt. “Quit getting me involved!” she said as she pulled you and Mizore up. The ice dolls were about to attack, but thanks to the force of Moka’s presence, she was able to dispel them. “Thanks Moka.” “I will not thank you.” Moka got a little ticked when she said that, and landed a powerful kick which sent her sliding. “You ungrateful snow brat. If you want to kill yourself, why not fulfill something in your life first?” Mizore passed out shortly after that. “Well, I have got to learn how to use these powers of mine.” “You better.” “Huh?” “I will not spar with you if you do not even know how to use those powers of yours.” You chuckled a little and said “Point taken.” You handed her the rosary and she placed it back on her chest, returning her to normal. The next day, everyone but you were trying to warm up. “Sasuke, how come you don’t have to try and warm up like us?” “I guess when I got the power office, I got used to the cold instantly.” You then felt the same chill down your spine as before. “Mizore.” “Can I join the club?” “Huh?” She then walked in and you noticed she cut her hair. “Wow, that suits you suite well Mizore.” She blushed as soon as you said that. “Yes and it is pretty photogenic, let me take a picture.” he said as he snapped a shot of her. “Oh yeah, the accusations against Mizore wouldn’t have been cleared if it weren’t for you Gin. Good work!” He laughed and said it was his duty as the chairman of the newspaper club. But then, more pictures of women changing came from his pocked and Kurumu and Yukari taught him a painful lesson. But then, Moka said that she was thirsty now that she was relieved. “Don’t tell me…” she started to wrap her arms around you. Mizore was watching. “Don’t look!” you said as Moka bit your neck. But you also knew that the battle for your heart continued.
15111111111111111111111111.title: Now This is Just Rediculous!

151111111111111111111111111.content: After a couple of days, you have learned how to control your powers quite well. But what was the biggest surprise for you was that the newspaper club would be taking a trip to the human world. “Oh, I got a bad feeling here.” you thought. You arrived at the bus stop the next morning in your casual outfit, which was not too different from your uniform. Moka was the first to arrive after you. “Did you wait long?” “No, I just got here actually.” You then saw Moka in her casual clothes. “Moka…” “You're really early, there's still thirty minutes until the arranged meeting time.” “C-Cute. Moka looks pretty good in casual clothes too!” you thought. She noticed you staring and she asked if it looked weird. “It really suits you!” “Really?” “Yes, yes!” You thought about what you said for a moment and thought to yourself “Real smooth there Sasuke.” As you and Moka were waiting for the others, you were both talking about returning to the human world. “I am a little nervous. It’s been a long time since I was last in the human world.” “Don’t worry Moka. I got your back.” “I’ll be counting on you Sasuke.” she said leaning up against you. You ended up looking at her chest for a brief moment. But then the others arrived and you all got on the bus. Once you were all in the human world, you all went to the beach.
151111111111111111111111111.title: A Trip to the Human World?!

1511111111111111111111111111.content:
(Skipping ahead a bit) (Ruby)

Later that night, you somehow got into a battle with a witch named Ruby. She said all humans who enter the Witches Hill would die. You knew you were in danger of being exposed, but you had other things to worry about. The many sunflowers on the hill turned into man-eating plants and threatened you and the others. The true Moka was helping out quite a bit with ruby, but the flowers were a major problem. You somehow managed to fight most of them off, but you knew that what she was truly protecting was in that mansion on the hill. After some investigating with Chaos Control, you told Ruby that the master she had been obeying was dead. “N-No. No, NO!!!!” She said as she used a forbidden spell and hanged into some kind of monster. “Moka-san, you have to destroy the wand, she might return to normal after that. Just please help her!” “I will do what I can!” she said as she attempted to get to Ruby. You helped her out by keeping her attention off Moka. “Return to your normal self!” she said as she destroyed the wand. Once it was all said and done, darkness was under your control as well. But back at the academy, the chief of the Public Safety Commission was investigating you. He had suspicions that you were a human. You were in for the fght of your life.
1511111111111111111111111111.title: Power of Darkness Awakened

15111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Kuyo)

As you and the others returned to the academy, you spent the next couple of days investigating the Public Safety Commission. Three days went by and you had no solution. But you and the others were soon interrogated. But Kuyo, the leader had been talking to you personally. He then made you watch one of his men splash Moka with water. “No! Leave her alone!” “Or what? Even if you have powers, you are still a human aren’t you? If you confess, I will release her.” You saw that she was in pain and you knew if you fought back, they would kill her. “Alright! I am a human!” He smiled and snapped his fingers, and the girls appeared behind you, hearing everything. “Why Sasuke? Why did you reveal yourself to save me?” Kurumu then slapped Moka. “You knew all along, didn’t you Moka?” “Kurumu-” “Stay away from me!” You gasped and looked down. “Release them. But take Moka to a cell for hiding the truth.” “What that wasn’t part of our agreement!” “What are you going to do about it?” You lost your temper and charged at him with the power of lightning flowing through your hand. But in an instant, he punched you in the gut and you fell over in pain. “Time for a public execution!” “NO SASUKE!!!” Moka screamed as she was being taken away. Later that day, you put on a cross and tied to it. He was going to burn you in front of everyone. As you were on the cross, you thought to yourself “I guess there’s nothing I can do. If I fight back, my friends will still be in danger.” But to your surprise, Moka, Kurumu, Mizore, Yukari, and Ruby helped you get out of there. But as soon as you thought you were safe, a spear made out of fire appeared and struck your heart. The fire flowed through you and you fell to the ground. “Sasuke!” “M-Moka…I have one last request.” “No, don’t talk like that!” “Listen to me. Mizore, Yukari, Ruby, Gin, everyone in the newspaper club, protect them…and as for the other Moka, I’m sorry I couldn’t keep my promise of sparing with her…” you said as you faded and pulled off the rosary. “Sasu-ke? SASUKE!!!” she said as she transformed.
15111111111111111111111111111.title: Exposed!

151111111111111111111111111111.content: As the true Moka stood before him, Kuyo said in a smug attitude “So this is the powerful vampires true form eh?” “You…YOU!” she said as she landed a powerful kick and sent him into the school. Yukari and Mizore arrived and saw you on the ground. “No…!” “It can’t be true.” “I’m sorry. Even though we were with him…” “Move aside, there's still a little bit left of Sasuke's life. If I do this now…” she said picking up the front part of your body. “What the hell can you do?!” “Inject my blood into Sasuke.” “Indeed, the blood of a vampire, which possesses incredible power said to grant immortality…” “Will that save Sasuke?” “The chances are low. But there’s no other alternative now.” Just then Kuyo appeared in the form of a fox demon, which can control fire. “I am impressed, to make me transform after one kick is no small feat to say the least!” He attacked and Gin got in the way and saved everyone from the first attack, but he nearly died doing so. Ruby said that she and the others would cover Moka as she tried to save your life. “Forgive me.” She said as she stood up. “Now, who’s next?” “Everyone, we cannot let him take one step forward.” “We know.” “We must combine our powers!” “For the sake of our precious friend, Sasuke…” they said blocking Kuyo’s path. As the did this, Moka was getting ready to save your life. “Sasuke…accept my blood.” she thought as she bit your neck and injected her blood into you. “Sasuke…” She noticed no change. “Is this amount insufficient? Please revive Sasuke.” Meanwhile Mizore and the other continued to hold Kuyo back. But with the combined efforts of Ruby and Yukari, they managed to do some serious damage, but then he started to change again. “You should feel honored! You are the first to ever see this form!” Moka then appeared in front of them. “What about Sasuke?” “There is nothing more I can do, we must hope that it worked. And as for you!” she said charging towards Kuyo and attacking him with a barrage of kicks, but she realized she gave too much blood to revive you and could do almost nothing. He then attacked with a barrage of punches and sent her sliding right next to you. “Now, burn and perish!” he said as he sent a powerful fire attack at Moka. It appeared to make contact with to the others. “No way!” “Moka and Sasuke are…” “Look!” They then saw you standing on the top of the roof entrance and holding Moka. “Impossible! My attack should have burned him to the core!” “Hey Moka.” “You sure took your time waking up, you sleepy head.” she said as she flicked your forehead. “I really should thank you Kuyo!” “What?” “Thanks to you, fire is under my control as well. My true power has been awakened.” “Show me this power!” “With pleasure.”
151111111111111111111111111111.title: Chaos Awakened!

1511111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Both)

Kuyo was still very pissed off about the fact that he didn’t kill you the first time. He then sent a powerful fire attack your way and the others told you to get out of the way. You then told Moka to hang on to you for a second. She did as you asked and you raised your free hand and the fire went around the two of you and hit the ground below. “What?!” “How does it feel?” “Huh?” “How does it feel when your attacks can’t even touch the human’s you despise so much?” You were getting into his head and he continued to attack. You then made all of the fire attacks stop before they could reach you and you absorbed it. “No way!” “Face it, you are out of your league.” “Why you-” he was interrupted when Gin came up from behind and held him in place. “When did you?” “Never underestimate the speed of the werewolf! Now attack while you have the chance!” “Moka?” You then gently set her down and she stood up. “You cling on to your unsightly masquerade and rampage with your Public Safety Commission buddies. You have no right to talk about protecting the school's peace!” “What did you say?” “Care to lend a hand?” “Sure. Gin, let him go for a second.” “Why?” “Just trust me!” He quickly jumped back and you quickly used your powers to make shackles out of energy. “Impossible!” “You have only yourself to blame for my new degree of power.” You and Moka both jumped up into the air and both came down at him with a powerful kick. “KNOW YOUR PLACE!!” you both said as you sent him through the school at an incredible rate. Once all that was done, Moka put the rosary on and changed back. Moka spent the last few days in the infirmary. But with your powers, no one would have believed you to be human. So all charged against you were cleared.
1511111111111111111111111111111.title: The Final Battle

15111111111111111111111111111111.content: A few days later, Moka woke up to a bouquet of roses. “Sasuke?” “Sorry to worry you Moka. It was all my fault you got injured to suck a degree.” “Thank goodness.” “Huh?” “It seems you are alright.” “Moka…” you said with a slight tear in your eye. “No crying.” she said as she flicked your forehead. And in that moment, you remembered when the True Moka did that and your heart began to race. You saw the other Moka for a moment when you were looking at Moka in the bed. “Why is my heart racing? Could it be that I have fallen for the other Moka?” you thought. “No, if you keep staring at me like that. Sa…su…ke…” You blushed and you slowly proceeded to kiss her, but just before you could Kurumu and the other came in the door and you quickly backed off. Kurumu jumped over the bed behind you and said “What were you doing just now?” “N-nothing.” “Continue doing it with me…” “No continue with me!” “No with me!” “With me!” they all leaned in forward to kiss you but Moka got in front of you and said “No Sasuke, do it with me!” And you ended up having all five girls kiss you, though none of them made it to the lips. “All five of you?!” And for the next semester, you had to deal with this. But you knew even at the end of the year, this was far from over.
15111111111111111111111111111111.title: What a Year....

15112.content:
(Kyouko)

After a nice summer vacation, it was time to return to Youkai Academy. You were excited to see Moka and the others. You have also learned how to control your powers to a degree like never before. Your cousin greeted you before you left. “Hey Sasuke!” “Hey Kyouko.” “Heading off for school?” “Yeah, I’m excited to se my friends.” “And you told me they knew about your powers?” “Yes. They don’t mind.” you said as you began to walk away. “Well, try not to show off for the girls!” You nearly fell over when she said that. “Kyouko!” “I’m just messing with you. Have fun!” “Will do.” you said as you made your way to the bus stop. As soon as you arrived in the bus, you gave a sigh of relief to go back to Youkai Academy. “Hey boy.” “Huh?” “It’s been a whole year since you enrolled at the academy. You nervous?” “Not at all, just excited. Now that everyone knows what I am, I have nothing to hide.” “Well, that is a good thing. Try not to have too much fun.” he said as you arrived. “Thanks.” he then drove off and you said to yourself. “Yes, I’m back.”
15112.title: It Begins Again

151121.content: After a weird encounter with an orange haired girl in the same forest where you met Moka, you finally made it to the Academy. “Well, I wonder how the others are doing.” you thought to yourself. You then noticed Kurumu and Yukari being swarmed by freshman females. You were surprised to say the least. “What the hell are you doing?!” Yukari was the first to try and run up to you, but Kurumu ended up knocking her over. “Sasuke! You still remember me!” she said jumping towards you and ended up having your face in-between her breasts. “Kurumu, Kurumu, Kurumu. Don’t forget the cute Kurumu!” “Kurumu, I can’t breath…” “Stop it.” she said as she threw a kunai made of ice and hit her dead center in the forehead. “Are you trying to suffocate my Sasuke, you big-breasted devil?” “Hey stalker, how dare you try to interrupt out lovely reunion!” she said changing a little. “If you want to fight, bring it. The one to get Sasuke, will be me!” “The first battle of the year is between a succubus and a snow woman.” “You two. Long time no see. Don’t start fighting as soon as you see each other.” “Moka!” “Sasuke!” The two of you dropped your bags and stared at each other for a moment. “I missed you, Moka.” “Me too, Sasuke.” she then fell over a little. “Moka?” you asked catching her. “It’s been such a long time.” “Don’t tell me Moka.” “I am a vampire you know.” she said as she gently bit your neck. “This is the second time today this has happened!” “Second?” she said removing herself from your neck. But then all of the freshman girls went crazy for Moka and you ended up getting trampled. Moka was practically carried into the school by those girls. “Geez, what is with them? A moment ago they were going nuts for me!” “Are you alright, Sasuke?” Mizore just kind of poked your face. “Yeah, I’m fine. A little sore, but fine.” You said getting up. “Here. A little gift for each of you.” you said calling upon the power of ice. You then made three gems which looked like the chaos emeralds and each one had the name of the girl you gave them to carved on it. “Sasuke…” “I learned how to control my powers to an all new level this summer. This is no trouble for me.” “Thank you!” “I will keep this forever.” You then thought to yourself “I think I might have made the stalking thing a bit worse now.” You then made one for Moka and you all went inside. You gave it to her when you had the opportunity and you all went off to your homeroom, which you all shared the same one. And with that, the new year was ready to begin.
151121.title: The Reunion

1511211.content: After class, you all went to your school mailboxes and Kurumu, Yukari and Mizore had a few fan letters from the freshman girls. Moka on the other hand had a hug pile of letters. But there was one that quite concerning. It said that the one who wrote it would take her life. At first you thought it was an empty threat, until the next day where Moka looked extremely tired. “Moka, what happened to you?” “I was too scared to sleep, plus I kept receiving more and more letters from the same person every ten minutes.” “Who could be doing this?” But then, you and Moka heard some kind of commotion in the gym. You and Moka rushed off to see two monsters chasing someone. But it got out of hand really quickly and you ended getting hit by one of the folding chairs and ended up falling backwards. But in the process, you ended up removing Moka’s rosary.
1511211.title: What a Start to the Year

15112111.content:
(Kokoa)

As she stood before you for the first time in a while, you ended up blushing in front of her. “Mo…Moka.” “It’s been a long time, Sasuke. Happy to see me?” You ended up blushing even brighter. “No need to say anything.” she said walking towards the two monster causing the commotion. “This is annoying.” The two monsters began to tremble and most of the freshman girls did as well, for a moment. But then the were running towards her like they did with the other Moka. “You girls…” she said getting their attention. They stopped dead in their tracks at that moment. “You're already high school students and, you're still so irritating. Can you act more maturely?” she said sending two powerful kick towards the monsters, but instead of kicking them directly, she ended up creating a force of wind with the power from them. When it hit, a massive gust filled the gym. Moka was spinning in the air and she then jumped backwards and landed on the stage and picked up the microphone. “Understood?” All of the freshman agreed in a way freshman would with a senior idol. Once all that was said and done, you walked up to Moka and said “It is good to have you back, Moka.” “Thanks. I’m glad to see you as well. Don’t forget, you still owe me a match.” “I haven’t forgotten.” You handed her the rosary and she returned to normal. But shortly after that, you and the others finally met with the one who was writing those letters to Moka. And much to your surprise, was the girl you met before in the same forest you met Moka. “Her again…” you thought. “K-Kokoa!” “Kokoa? That’s her name Moka?” “I have come to claim your life, sister.” “Huh, sister?!” you, Yukari and Kurumu said at once. Moka began to tremble and she said as she ended up biting your neck and sucking your blood. “Save me Sasuke!” “Why must you suck my blood in these situations?”
15112111.title: Sister?!

151121111.content:
(Bat)

"Now you die!" she said as she jumped into the air and used the same kind of kick Moka does. You and the others got out of the way and she went through four trees. "She's strong!" "This is definately the power of the vampire." Just then, that bat showed up and said "As expected of Kokoa-sama. She has the power to make one's heart jump!" "That bat is Kokoa's minion?!" "I thought he was just the narrator!" Kokoa picked up one of the trees and said walking towards Moka "What's wrong? You know your life is in danger, so fight me, the way you did long ago!" she said swinging that tree around. You and the others were arely able to dodge. Mizore stayed out of this by getting bbehind a tree away from Kokoa. Moka continued to run and Kokoa then threw the tree at her like a spear. Before it could hit, you got i front of it and thrusted your hand forward. Using the power of fire, the tree was incinerated in an instant. But to your surprise, she grabbed a chair right after she threw the tree and ended up hitting you on the head, causing you to bleed. "Sasuke!" Kokoa could smell your blood. "I dicovered this sweet smell before..." she said licking some of the blood off you. Kurumu hit her with a char and sent her flying a little while saying "What are you doing to my Sasuke?" Moka was about to check on you, but like Kokoa, she was affected by the smell of your blood. Kurumu batted her away like she did Kokoa. "The way they both react to Sasuke's blood, they are definately sisters." Kokoa got angry and was about to strike back, but luckily, a teacher showed up to intervene. But it was the one who jumped Mizore last year, so both you and her didn't like him much. Kokoa retreated for now and the girls took you to the infermary.
151121111.title: Powerful Sister

1511211111.content: As you were being patched up in the infirmary, you asked Moka what the deal was with Kokoa. She then began to explain her story and Kokoa's. "So in order to chase you, she enrolled in Youkai Academy." "She is quite persistant." "We can't let her do what she wants." "Kurumu..." "I don't care if Moa dies, but how can I let my Sasuke get injured again?" "How dare you cal Sasuke yours." she says extending the length of her claws. But before a conflict between the two could begin again, the bat showed up an gave away your location. Kokoa jumped in through the window and told the bat to come to her while her hand was in the air. It turned out that the bat is able to chage its shape and size. He became some kind of hammer and you and the others got out of there fast. You and Moka thought you were safe, but the bat gave away your hiding spot again. As he transformed into some kind of spiked bat, before she could attack, Kurumu and Yukari distracted her. Mizore tried to help, but they ended up getting hit. "Now for you, sister." she said turning around. "I don't think so! Chaos Control!" In that moment, a huge flash of light came from where you were standing and when it faded, Kokoa saw that you and the others were gone. You were all hiding in the gym inside some kind of barrel. "What just happened?" "I used Chaos Control. I use it to either make a quick escape, or if I want to go on vacation." "What an amazing power!" "Yeah. But unfortunately, it uses a large amount of my strength. IfKokoa attacked us now, I wouldn't be able to block her attacks." You all heard something and you remained silent. By focusing energy into your eyes, you could see if Kokoa had left or not. Luckily she didn't stick around long. Moka then got out and decided to confront her. As she did this, Koka was about to kill her but didn't. Moka asked why and you gae the answer you thought was correct, but boy were you wrong! She was absolutely about to kill her, but you jumped to Moka and it appeared to crush the both ofyou. "No way!" "Moka and Sasuke have been crushed!" But then, the voice of the true Moka came from under the weapon. You managed to remove the rosary just in time.
1511211111.title: She Does Not Give Up!

15112111111.content: "To think my own little sister would hate me to suck an extent..." The weapon began lifting upwards due to Moka. "Well, whatever. Whoever bares their fangs at me will just have their fangs broken. Even if you're my little sister, I won't hold back. Know your place!" she said sending her flying into some graves. "Moka!" "Stand back Sasuke." "Huh?" "Kokoa is also a vampire, she would not have been defeated so easily." And in that moment Kokoa's rage seemed to grow and she had an aura around her. "This is nuts!" "That's it, come Kokoa." You and everyone else thought itwould be a battle to the death, but once again you were wrong! Kokoa started to cry and hugged Moka. "Sister! My big sister! I missed you so much!" "What the hell?!" you, Yukari, Mizore and Kurumu said at once. "Kokoa...I thought you wanted to erase me." "Yeah, that's because that cowardly Moka Akashiya could never be the real Moka-oneesama! Please don't turn into that loser again!" "So in other words..." "That girl Kokoa..." "Wanted to see the Moka from her childhood..." "And hates the current Moka." Moka pushed her back just a little saying befre giving her a kick "You're annoying!" "Ah, Moka-aneesama's kick...it's really the best!" "Unfortunately, the sister you once knew is no longer here." "No way!" "Give it up." she said walking towards you and putting the rosary back on. You caught her as she passed out and the others ran to you both. "It's because Moka-oneesama is surrounded my that warm-hearted bunch, that she's... Fine then! I'll gather information and someday I'll get the real Moka-oneesama back with my own hands-" She said as she passed out as well. Her bat was checking to see if she was alright while you carried Moka back to the acaemy. As you were walking, you thought to yourself "To think Moka had a little sister like that... but..." you stopped walking fr a minute. "What's wrong Sasuke?" "You better hurry up and take her to the infirmary." "Right. Sorry." you then thought to yourself "If the Moka from Kokoa's past was the Inner Moka, who is the outter Moka?" You then noticed Moka starting to wake up. "Sasuke, you smell nice today too..." she said as she once again bit your neck. "You're still going to suck my blood when you're half-asleep?!"
15112111111.title: What the Hell?!

151121111111.content:
(Tsurara Ageha)

As you were walking to school the next day, you had found out that it was parent day. Though Moka wanted to meet your mother, you had a feeling that she might have a little trouble dealing with the fact you go to a school for monsters. And it wasn't until Mizore showed up just as Moka was about to suck your blood again things really got wierd. "You know that elicate acts on school grounds are forbidden right?" "What about you stalker?!" Mizore froze Moka for a moment and said "Sasuke, I need you to come with me, my mother has been bugging me about meeting you." "Your mother?" You then noticed her staring at you by hiding behind a desk. "She was here the whole time and was hiding using a desk! She really is Mizore's mother after all!" you thought. "Here he is mother, my boyfriend." "Eh? What is with that introduction?!" "Oh yeah, can you pretend to be my boyfriend for a it? I kept telling her that you and I were together." "Oh man, if Mizore did this, I can imagine what Kurumu said to her mother." you thought to yourself. "Nice to meet you. I'm Mizore's mother, Tsurara. You must be Sasuke-san right?" You kind of looked at her for a moment and thanked god that she was a nice mother. However, you could feel Moka get stunned in a pissed off way. "And who is this?" "Oh she's-" "She's a suitor. She keeps folowing Sasuke around. She's a stalker." You were just stunned at the role reversal here! Kurumu came out of nowhere and hugged you. "Sasuke, I've been looking for you!" "Hey hold on a second..." "He's over here! Sasuke, this is my mother, Ageha." "Nice to meet you. You must be Kurumu's fiance." "This time it's fiance?!" you thought. And you had a feeling Moka thought the same thing. "Is this girl a suitor?" "I got intorduced as the suitor again." She then gave you sort of a combonation of a hug and a headlock. "What the hell? These fell even better than Kurumu's!" you thought as she had your head against her breasts. "My daughter..." "Huh?" you said looking up. "My daughter, even though she looks like that, she actually has no experience. What I mean is, until now, she has never had any experience which is unacceptable." "Huh?!" "You can become her king." You started to have a nosebleed right there and then. The instant you got out of that head-lock, she grabbed her hand and placed it on her breast. "Let's have dinner sometime huh? I can teach you how a boy and girl make love to each other." Your nosebleed got worse when she said that. Most of the day was like this, but when Tsurara and Ageha looked at each other, it's like a long lost rivalry was up and running again. So for most of the day, Kurumu and Mizore obeyed their mothers orders on how to make you theirs. Mizore even froze you at once point. But when it was luch time, things got really chaotic. The two of the mothers began to fight each other and trashed most of the school. They then talked about how the other was the ause as to why neither of them got the man they loved when they attended this school. The battle made part of the school fall apart and you ended up removing the rosary around Moka's neck.
151121111111.title: Parent Day?

1511211111111.content: As the true Moka appeared, she saw what was going on and was about to step in. "Even though you're adults, you have gone way past the line." The two mothers turned around and saw her. "Moka..." She then charged towards them. "What are you trying to do small fry?" "You wanna fight?" She was getting ready to attack and so were they. "You little devil." "I'll beat you away!" They both got ready to attack as well. But before any of the attacks could connect (they attacked close range) you appeared in front of them in an instant and said "That is enough!". You blocked Moka's attack with your right arm and you blocked both Ageha's and Tsurara's attacks with your left. All three of them were surprised you were able to do this. "All of you calm down now!" you demanded. Moka backed down and so did they other two. "Look, I have no control over the actions you two decide to do, but you both need to quit fighting each other. Your daughters may hae lied to you, but they were just trying to impress you." Kurumu and Mizore looked at the ground. "Despite what you may or may not think, I am not some proze to be won. Your daughter's realize that, why cant you?" The two mother reflected on htis and agreed to stop the fist fight, but they still considered this a competition. You gave a big sigh with the fact that nothing you could say or do will change the way they think. Once it was all over, you gave toe rosary to Moka. "I must say I'm impressed Sasuke." "Huh?" "You managed to block all of out attacks at once." She then smiled a little bit. "You continue to fascinate and amaze me." "What?" you asked as she put the rosary on. Thanks to Yukari's prents, the school was repaired in an instant. Once everyone had left, you and Moka were alone. "Sasuke, you must be a bit tired." "A little, but I guess the reason those two acted like that today is because they love their daughters and they want what's best for them. I guess it's how parents are." "Sasuke..." "Moka..." You both leaned in to kiss, but Moka bit your neck instead. "I knew it! I knew she was going to do that!" you thought to youself

You raise your hand and your mark glows for a second. After this you are suddenly on the other side of the room. Exactly where Corvo was pointing."good, now use Dark Vision to see anything alive or dead through the walls." Corvo instructed. You did as you were instructed. Your vision becomes darker and you see monster students. Some in their human form, while others are in their monster form. " Good now tell me what you saw." Corvo asked. 15122111111211122.content:
You begin to dream. Your dream took place on a floating structure​. A fancy table with chairs was in the middle of the floating structure. In one of the chairs sat a plain-looking young man with short brown hair and black eyes, wearing a brown coat, blue pants and black boots. "Well hello there (name) it's so nice to see you again." Said the mysterious man. "Hello Outsider, it's been awhile since I seen you." You replied back. The Outsider motioned his hand to the seat next to him. "Would you like to sit down?" Asked the outsider simply. "Alright." You answered as you walked to the chair and sat down.

"(Name) do you remember how you met Corvo and me?" The outsider asked. You looked at the outsider seemly unemotional​ face. You only seen the Outsider express a few other emotions but that was a rare sighting to see. "Yeah I remember."

*Flashback time*
A few years back you were just became a teen. Funny thing was you were a normal teen until you meet the Outsider and Corvo. You meet them during the summer, while you were exploring a seemly abandoned building with an old fashion design. When you walked in you see decaying​ floors, broken walls and a stairway. After deciding to move on you slowly made your way to a hall which had three rooms, one completely destroyed and caved in. The second one empty and covered in dust. While the last one had it's door closed and blocked. You tried to remove the boards nails onto the door to no avail. You then remembered the stairway and decided to see if you can find something to help remove the boards. You walked back to the stairs and walked up unfortunately there was a gaping hole in the floor. Your turned good when you noticed the hole lead to the room! You slowly jumped down and found a room with a werid altar with a mysterious vibe. You walked to the altar and looked at it with interest. Suddenly out of instinct you moved to touch something floating on the altar... Some sort of charm... You touched and a dark void consumed your vision.

*End flashback*
"You were quite the curious​ teen (name)" outsider said amused. "I always liked super natural things." You explain to the outsider. "That will be all for now we will continue next time." The Outsider told you. "Why did you ask me about how I met you and Corvo?" You asked. "I'll tell you next time we meet and Corvo will be here as well." The Outsider answered. The Outsider waved you a simple goodbye as your vision begins to fade.

154.title: Tamao Ichinose (the Mermaid)

1542.content:
(You Tamao)

You were a student at Youkai Academy and you quickly became friends with Tsukune and his friends. You explained to them that your powers are what got you there in the first place. One day, the temperature was at a height of 100 degrees. You then decided that it was time to make a visit to the school pool. Once you changed into your trunks, you sat in the shallow end of the pool to relax in the heat. “That feels nice.” you said as you closed your eyes. You then heard the slightest splash. You opened your eyes and quickly jumped into the air. Just then, something came out of the water from behind and tackled you, sending you into the pool with it. Thanks to the power of water, you could breath underwater. You searched for the creature that did this to you. You were then struck from behind and you turned to find nothing. You were struck again and again with the same result. But the odd part of this was that the strikes didn’t hurt. It was like someone was just pushing you around playfully. And then, you felt something from behind and you turned your head and saw a woman with beautiful green eyes and ocean blue hair. You then noticed the lower half of her body was that of a fish and you knew what she was, a mermaid. You knew this was bad. She could easily bite and suck the life energy from you. But to your surprise, she started to rub her hands all over you in a sensual manner. “My, you are quite handsome. You seem to be very well built. I think you and I should get to know each other a little better. My name is Tamao Ichinose.” She said as she slowly swam in front of you while keeping eye contact. All you could do is watch, because for some odd reason you couldn’t move at all. And once she was in front of you, before you knew it, she kissed you full on the lips! You were extremely surprised by this, so much so that you could move again and you called upon the power of wind to push her back a little and shoot yourself out of the pool. Even though you had a slight blush on your face, you used the power of fire to dry off and walk away. “Man, what is up with that chick?” you said to yourself. Once you changed, you had to get past the pool. You then jumped to the other side of it with such speed, not even Tamao could keep up. As you walked away, Tamao rose to the surface and said to herself while waving her tail playfully in the air “That was Sasuke Uchiha. I plan to have a lot of fun with him.”

15533211.title: Normal

155332112.content:
You will be know as (name).

You were a boy named (name). A typical nineteen year old boy. You went to school, got good grades, and did your best to be the good student you were expected to be. You were going to be a second year high school student, well at least that was the plan. You see back when you were in your previous school you got into a fight. You saw a bunch of bullies picking another boy and beating him up. You couldn't stand by while that was happening, so what did you do? You ended up getting into a fight with all of the bullies and beat the ever living snot out of them. By the time the teachers got on the scene you were covered in bruises and blood. You looked like you committed a murder. The teachers took you in and they thought you were the one that caused the fight so sadly you were held back a grade. To make matters worse, all students in your school were scared of you when they found out the news. When you were in the room in class you could hear them talking about how you were covered in blood and how you enjoyed beating them up and were given the nickname "The Bloody Warrior". Because of that you never spoke to anyone or made friends. Then after you completed your first year, your parents decided to send you to a private school so you could have a fresh clean start. And so you were on a bus on route to a private school called Yokai Academy. As the bus drove through your town, you gazed out the window looking at the passing buildings and cars.

(name) thinking: Man. What a drag. Those teachers just had to hold me back a grade. Not mention everyone thinks I'm the scariest thing on the planet. Oh well. At least I can have a fresh start. Who knows? Maybe I'll be able to make some friends, if my reputation doesn't catch up with me.

Then the bus driver spoke to you in a throaty voice.

Bus Driver: Hey boy. You a new student at Yokai Academy?

(name): Yes. I am.

Bus Driver: Then you'd better be wary boy. That school can be a scary ass place if you're not careful.

(name): Don't worry. I think I'll be OK. It's just a private school right? How scary can it be?

Suddenly you looked out the window. You were shocked to see a change of scenery. You were welcomed to the sight of a red ocean and the endless forest of trees. The bus stopped and you departed still blown away by the sudden change of scenery.

(name): Whoa. Where the heck am I?

Bus Driver: Remember boy. Watch your back and don't get eaten alive now.

And with that, the bus driver drove away back into the tunnel and disappeared. You looked around and saw nothing, but the ocean and the trees. Then in the distance you saw a building that looked like a castle.

(name): I wonder if that's the school? If it is I better get going. I wouldn't wanna be late.

So you walked through the forest of dead trees in search of the dorms. The trees were tall and were filled with crows and bats. You couldn't help, but feel a little scared.

(name): Man. This is getting a little scary.

As scary as it was you pressed on trying to ignore the crows and the bats. Then you heard a squeaking sound. It was a quiet sound at first, but you could hear the squeaking get closer and closer.

(name): What the.... Am I.....being followed?

Feeling a little more scared you walked a little faster. The squeaking sound got closer and closer. Now you were sure that something was following you. You quickly turn around and looked. There was nothing there. Then you saw something swoop by your head. It was a little bat. You let out a sigh of relief.

(name): Whew. It was just a bat. For a minute there I thought I something was.....DAAAAH!!!!

Suddenly from out of nowhere, a young girl with orange pair with pigtails riding a bike (AKA Kokoa) came crashing straight at you, sending the two of you flying. When you regained your senses after that crash, you got up. As you were your right hand felt something soft and you heard a moan. When you opened your eyes you saw that you were right on top of the girl who crashed into you and were grabbing her chest!

(name): Oh my gosh! I'm so sorry!

Then you look at her face. When you two locked eyes you thought she was the cutest girl you ever laid eyes on. Her white skin and her emerald green eyes totally blew you away. Then the moment was ruined by the girl's sharp tone.

Kokoa: Hey! Watch where you're touching creep!

Then she gave you a mighty kick sending you off of her and slamming into a rock. Needless to say you were a little pissed.

(name): Hey! What the hell's your problem?!? I said I was sorry!

Kokoa: Pervert! You felt me up!

(name): Not on purpose! Besides you didn't have to kick me!

Then you felt a sharp pain on your cheek. You felt it and there was a little blood on your hands.

(name): Aw great! Now look what you....Dah!

You yelped in surprise for now the girl was now close to you face.

Kokoa: Oh wow! I believe I'm saying this, but you smell really good!

(name): I what?!?

Before you could say anything else the girl leaned in and gently licked your wound making you blush heavily in embarrassment. Then when the girl realized what she was doing she gave you another kick. This time in the face.

(name): OW!! Damn it! What the hell was that for?!?

Kokoa: You were gonna grope me again!

(name): As if I would! Why would I want to grope a little kid like you anyway?!?

Kokoa: Excuse me?!?!? For your information I'm eighteen years old you bastard!

(name): You sure could've fooled me you little brat!

Kokoa: What'd you say?!?!?

(name): You heard me!

You two stared each other growling like a pair of dogs, but then the girl suddenly remembered something.

Kokoa: Oh crap! I don't have time for this! I gotta get back to the school and meet big sister!

And with that she ran off.

(name): Hey! Get back here you brat! I'm not finished with you!

Kokoa: We'll settle this later! I don't have time to deal with you so drop dead you pervert!

(name): What's you say?!?!?

Before you could stop her the girl raced off down the road, leaving you alone and pissed off.

(name): What the hell is that girls deal?!? First she kicks me, then she licks me on the cheek, and then she kicks me again! Damn it! Now I'm in a bad mood! Oh well. I can't worry about that now. I gotta get to the Yokai before I'm late. Hopefully I won't run into that little brat again.

When you thought about Kokoa licking your cheek the thought of it made you blush again. Then you decided to put it out of your mind for a while and you set off toward Yokai Academy
155332112.title: Plot 2

1553321121.content:
Soon your first class was already in the middle of the period. You weren't sure but you knew that something would spark a fight this year one way or another. Class ended but that girl from this morning walked by and you were pissed. "Hey you!", you yelled. "I bet you think your funny with kicking me around this morning."

"Look here buddy let me give you a good piece of advice, back off.", she replied in a cold threatning tone.

"I won't let it slide, not without either an apology or I stomp your face in with my foot."

"That's how you would treat a sweet girl like me?"

"Oh your many things but sweet isn't one of them."

"Guess you suffered brain damage, because everyone knows fighting me is a deathwish. Must have kicked you so hard that thick skull of yours cracked like an egg."

"OH NOW YOUR ASKING FOR IT!", you swung at her but then you felt like you were blown across the entire hallway. She shoved you so hard you went flying. You slid on the floor slowing down your momentum and got back up. "What the hell just happend?", you thought.

But it wasn't over when she tackled and wrestled you getting you into a full nelson. "Had enough?"

"Not even close! ", but you grew to eat those words when she threw you over the staircase. "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!", you landed on your back over the wall. Thank god she didn't throw you in the center otherwise you'd be dead. Instead she threw you across from it.

"Ok how's it your so damn strong? You don't have any muscle on you."

"Easy, I'm an S class monster. And now I'm done toying with you!", before she could lunge her sister Moka intervened.

"Kokoa enough!"

"He started it! He was being fresh with me this morning and groped me!"

"Your crazy! What do you mean fresh? ! You knocked me over with your bike and kicked me twice in the head! And you licked me for no reason! "

"Kokoa is that true?"

"Yeah because he felt my chest! Besides he got in my way while I rode my bike."

"Ok clearly your both at fault so I'm brining an end to it. Both of you shake and move on from that incident. "

"No way sister I'm-", Moka death glared Kokoa and got her to change her mind, "totally going to do as you say."

If that girl gave Kokoa goosebumps then you better follow her lead. You and Kokoa agreed to put the incident behind you and start fresh. But neither of you weren't liking the idea. "Hey if I come around and drinking your blood, that's just me getting some food ok. I'm not trying to kill you.", she explained.

"Your a vampire? "

"Duh, it's a school for monsters."

Suddenly it made sense, her unbelivable strength, the castle for a school look, and all the work from class , made sense now. You knew you were a human in a world where monsters aren't fond of humans.
1553321121.title: Later in class

15533211212.content:
The following night, you sat in your room thinking about everything that happened on today.

(name): Oh crap! It's bad enough that my parents sent me to a private school, but now I find out that the school is for monsters? Damn it!

Then you remembered Kokoa. Just the thought of her and her attitude totally made you mad.

(name): Damn it that stinkin little brat! Who the hell does she think she is?!? Especially since it was her fault that we both got into that mess! I mean come on! It's not like I grabbed her chest on purpose! Not to mention she licked my cheek because she wanted my blood!

The thought of Kokoa licking your cheek suddenly snapped you out of your rage. You remembered how Kokoa looked when you were on top of her grabbing her chest.

(name): Now that I think about it, she did look kinda.....cute. No! (shakes head) Snap out of it! Why would I think a girl like that is cute?!? Especially since she kicked me in the face twice and she called me a pervert! I don't care if she is a S class monster or whatever! I'm gonna kick that girls ass just you wait!

And with that, you went to sleep. Meanwhile as for Kokoa.....

Kokoa: Why that stupid perverted bastard! Who does he think he is talking to me like that! That stupid little pervert! Not only did he get in my he also grabbed my chest! The little perv.....

Then Kokoa began remembering how you were grabbing her chest.

Kokoa: His hand. It......was so...... DAH! What the hell am I thinking!?!? That little perv grabbed my chest and no one grabs my tits and gets away with it! Not while my name Kokoa Shuzen! Just you wait you little brat! I'll show you why you should fear a S class vampire!

It would seem that the both of you were in each others thoughts, but not in a good way. Anyway you both went to sleep eager to face each other tomorrow. Then the next day.....
15533211212.title: The follwing night

155332112121.content:
"I'm telling you you can kill her if you just do it the right way."

"Your kidding me right? She's unbeatable, she'd snap our necks and have our blood as her champagne!"

"No dammit Tskune If you have a poison dart laced in weed killer an alurane will die and you take her petals for the potion.", you explained.

"But they're all female and use us as slaves. They use our bodies to fuel their natural floral scents."

" That's why you hide it in your sleeve. Your not defensless from their pheromones, you just have to act dumb enough to make them not have to use them."

"Why do we have to do this?"

"So we don't fail the project. We need something to use for our potion that's from the forest and aluranes are spotted frequently across the inner forest here. Trust me we'll be fine."

"Why'd I end up as your lab partner? Because you slept in class and I was the only one without a partner."

"Good point."

Soon as the students began to leave the same girl from yesterday with the pink hair showed up looking for Tskune. "Oh there you are Tskune! I was looking for you.", she said kissing his cheek.

"Wait a minute? She's your girlfriend? ", you asked Tskune.

"He's your lab partner? ", Moka asked Tskune as well.

"You two met?", he asked both.

"Long story, c'mon we gotta reach the forest before sundown.", you replied.

"I'll be back later tonight Moka, don't worry.", Tskune reassured Moka.

Rock

Rock

1553321121211.title: Two out of three?

155332112122.content:
It was another day at Yokai Academy. You attended class as usual and it was after school, but this time you were trying not to draw attention to yourself. You didn't want anyone to find out that you were a human in a monster school. You could well remember what Ms. Nekomone said to you the other day in class.

(flashback)
Ms. Nekonome: Good morning students and for those of you who are new welcome to Yokai Academy. I'm Shizuca Nekonome and I'll be your teacher. To start with as you're all aware, Yokai is a unique school that is for monsters. Currently the planet is under the control of monsters so in order for monsters like you and me to survive, we must learn how to coexist with them. Which brings me to our first rule, except for special circumstances as long as you're on the campus you have to remain in human form.

(name) thinking: Well that'll be easy to do because I'm already a human.

Ms. Nekonome: Rule number two. Never, ever reveal your monster identity to another student. Got that?

Then a boy sitting next to you spoke in an annoyed tone. (AKA Saizo)

Saizo: Feh. What a bunch of boring rules.

Ms. Nekonome: Hmmm. Let's see. (looking through roll call) Ah! Saizo Komiya.

Saizo: If I do see a human why not just eat it? That's what I would do.

Then Saizo's tongue eerily snaked out of his mouth and licked his lips making you cringe.

Ms. Nekonome: Now Saizo. There's no chance of that happening because everybody at this school is a monster including the teachers, so no exceptions K? You see the school is surrounded by a secret barrier, so there's no chance of a human getting in. And even if a human were to go through it somehow and made it here. they would be killed immediately.

When you heard Ms. Nekonome make that statement, you felt your heart leap and you gulped. This made Saizo give you an odd look as if he heard you, but you pretended not to pay attention.

Saizo: Whatever you say teach, but I've been smelling human this whole time.

Ms. Nekonome: In any case, just make sure you follow these two rules. Got it?

Class: Yes.
(flashback ends)

Ever since then you've been on edge, thinking about what your teacher said.

(name): Man. This sucks.I guess my teacher was serious about this school being for monsters. What the hell have I gotten myself into? Not only is this school filled with monsters that hate humans, but if someone finds out I'm a human, I'm as good as dead! I can't let anyone find out. Especially that stupid jerk Kokoa. If she found out she'd totally kick my ass. Well, at least it;s not that bad. As long as I don't reveal I'm a human I'll be OK. All I have to do is keep a low profile and I should at least survive right? How hard could it be? And If all else fails......

As you were thinking about your predicament, you bumped into someone hard. Unfortunately, that one person turned out to be Saizo.

Saizo: Hey! Watch where ya going punk!

(name): Ow! Sorry. I wasn't watching were I was going.

As you tried to walk away Saizo blocked your route and he didn't look very happy.

Saizo: Hey. You think you can just bump into me say your sorry and walk away?

(name): What's your problem? I said I was sorry.

Saizo: Sorry's not gonna cut it pal. You owe me.

(name): What do you want from me? A freakin trophy?

Saizo: I want you to get on your knees and beg for your forgiveness.

You didn't want to deal with this crap, but then again you didn't want to get into a fight with Saizo. What do you do?
155332112122.title: other

1553321121221.content:
(name): Look bub. I don't know what your problem is, but if you don't mind, I got somewhere to be so leave me alone would ya?

Then you walked past Saizo and you expected him to leave you alone after that, but then a giant shadow cast over you. You looked behind you and you practically almost had a heart attack. Saizo was now standing behind you in his monster form. An orc. He charged straight at you in a giant fit of rage.

(name): What the freakin hell?!?

Saizo: You little shit! No one talks to me like that and gets away with you little shit!

Meanwhile Tskune, Moka, and the gang had just gotten off of class and were sharing news.

Tskune: Whew. I'm glad that's over.

Kurumu: Oh come on Tskune. Class was a breeze today.

Yukari: Probably because that you've been asleep half the class.

Kurumu: Shut it brat.

Tskune: So, I heard that parents day is coming soon. Are any of your parents gonna be here?

Kurumu: Yup. You can definitely count on my mom being there.

Mizore: And mom too. She especially can't wait to be there to see you Tskune.

Tskune: I'm...sure.....(sweatdrop)....

Yukari: Don't worry Tskune. If Kurumu's and Mizore's moms cause trouble again, my parents will back you up K?

Tskune: Um.....thanks.....what about you Moka? Same as usual?

Moka: Yeah......

Moka was lost in thought for some reason. She was still thinking about you and Kokoa fighting the other day.

Kurumu: Hey Moka. You OK?

Tskune: Yeah. You look like you're thinking about something.

Moka: No don't worry I'm fine. I'm just thinking about Kokoa that's all.

Mizore: Why would you be worried about that little brat?

Then Moka explained how she found you and Kokoa fighting the other the day.

Suddenly Kokoa from out of nowhere and kicked Tsukune square in the face sending him flying to a bunch of desks.

Moka: Tsukune! Are you OK?

Kokoa: I don't need your charity! Don't even think about coming to my classroom otherwise you'll meet the end of my foot!

Kokoa: Oh shut up! Just being with you guys just pisses me off! Oh by the way shrimp, I don't like that stupid pervert got it?!?

Yukari: Eep! You heard that?!?

Kokoa: Shut up! Like you're one to talk! Anyway the day I like that stupid pervert is that day that I get hit by lighting!

Kokoa regained conscious, she opened her eyes to see you lying on top of her. To make matters worse your hand in a face that if shouldn't have been. Kokoa's thigh under her skirt. When she saw this, Kokoa turned as red as her hair. Needless to day, she wasn't the only one who was shocked.

Kokoa: WH-WH-WH-WH-WHAAAAA?!?!?!

Moka: It's him! That's the boy who was fighting with Kokoa!

Kurumu: And look where his hand is!

Mizore: Oh wow! how scandalous! and so bold!

Yukari: Mizore, wipe that weird grin off your face!

(name): Ouch! Why that little....! Now he's pissed me off!

You were completely oblivious that you were on top off Kokoa and your surroundings. The only thing that you cared about was kicking Saizo's ass. You got off of Kokoa and jumped out from the window and gunned for Saizo. Tsukune and the others watched as you went back to fighting Saizo. Kokoa however was seething with anger after what just happened. Not only did you grab her in the chest, but now you had practically grabbed her panties.

Kokoa: That......little......prick.........!!! He's......a dead man!!!!!

Meanwhile back to you and your fight with Saizo, you were trying at least get a hit on him. Sadly you weren't having much luck. Saizo was too strong and you were bruised and your body was screaming in pain. Whenever you tried to get a hit on Saizo, he would dodge and then hit you back. All you could do was dodge.

Saizo: Come on. This fight's getting boring. If you're gonna fight me, at least transform to your monster form first. That way I'll at least have some fun beating you.

(name) thinking: That'll be hard to do because I'm human. Damn. I have to figure out a way to beat him, but how?

You looked all over Saizo and thought of a way to beat him. Then you had an idea.

(name) thinking: Maybe I just need to catch him off guard and then when I at least stun him I'll escape. And I know just the way to do it. (aloud) Hey ugly! Don't flatter yourself! I don't need to transform to beat you! You're not even worth the trouble!

Saizo: What did you say?!?

(name): You heard me! Or do you need to get your ears checked?!?

Yukari: This guy's either brave or crazy!

Kurumu: I'd have to go with crazy.

Saizo: Why you little....!! Now you're gonna pay! Prepare to die!

(name) thinking: All I have to do is get him while he's flying into a rage. When he attacks I'll get in the stomach and stun him. Then I'll get the heck out of here

Saizo gunned straight at you and was ready to kill you, but you stood his ground and readied yourself for his attack. Then Saizo attacked, but you were able to dodge and then you threw your right fist with everything you had at Saizo, but then.....
1553321121221.title: Walk away (Saizo attacks)

15533211212212.content:
you had an unexpected surprise. Just when you were about to attack, out of nowhere Kokoa came decked you square in the face sending you crashing to the ground.

Tsukune, Yukari, Kurumu, and Mizore: What the heck?!?

Moka: Kokoa!

(name): OW!!! What the......!!! Hey! It's you again Koko! What the hell was that for?!?

Kokoa: You're the one that started it you punk! Who do you think you are pulling a sneak attack like that!

(name): Bullshit! I was busy fighting this bozo until you showed up! (points at Saizo) I was gonna kick his ass until you came in and kicked me!

Kokoa: You? Fighting that guy? Hah! How pathetic! I knew that you were weak before, but if you can't even beat this guy you must be so weak that you couldn't even fight out a paper bag!

(name): SAY WHAT?!? You wanna start something you little brat?!?

Kokoa: Bring it on you perverted maggot!

(name): Sissy vampire!

Kokoa:Whiny dickwad!

As you and Kokoa continued your little game of insults everyone looked on in complete and utter shock. Even Saizo flabber was gasted.

Tsukune: What the hell...?

Kurumu: I don't know which shocks me more. The fact that they're fighting over something stupid or...

Yukari: The fact that they are completely oblivious as to what's going on.

Mizore: No kidding.

Saizo: Um excuse me. Would you two cut the crap already and stop acting like a married couple?

(name) and Kokoa: We're not a couple and butt out ugly!

Moka, Tskune, Mizore, Kurumu, and Yukari: Perfect sync!

(name): Hey! Stop coping me you pigtailed jerk!

Kokoa: You're the one coping me you horny toad moron!

Once again you went at it yelling at each other. Now Saizo felt completely dissed after being ignored. He charged straight at both you and Kokoa in a raging fit.

Saizo: I'm not gonna sit and be ignored! Now I'll kill both of you!

Tsukune: Oh no! If they don't stop arguing Saizo's gonna get them!

Moka: Kokoa! (name)! Look out!

Upon hearing Moka, you and Kokoa looked and saw Saizo coming toward you. Then you both drew your fists and both punched Saizo in the face at the same time.

(name) and Kokoa: WE TOLD YOU TO BUTT OUT ALREADY!!!!

You both punched Saizo so hard, he went flying into the sky until he was nothing more, but a sparkle in the sky.

Moka, Tskune, Mizore, Kurumu, and Yukari: Perfect sync again!

(name): Hey! Stop coping me I said!

Kokoa: You stop coping me!

Then you and Kokoa had a growling and intense stare down. Then....

Kokoa: OK! That's it! KO!!! Get over here!

Suddenly a little bat flew from the sky and landed on Kokoa's shoulder.

Ko: You called Miss Kokoa?

(name): Holy crap! A talking bat!

Kokoa: I need your help! Hurry and transform!

Ko: Right away Miss Kokoa whee!

Kokoa grabbed a hold of Ko and then Ko transformed into a giant mace!.

Kurumu: Oh crap! I think Kokoa's taking this seriously now!'

Yukari: She's gonna totally mop the floor with him!

Moka: Kokoa! Please stop this!

(name): Hey! That's no fair! You can't just wield a weapon like that!

Kokoa: Shut up! Like I care about playing fair! Just hurry up and die already!

Then Kokoa swung her mace like crazy trying to score a hit while you kept dodging trying to stay alive. Unfortunately the fight with Saizo has left you weary and you couldn't dodge her attacks forever. You had to think of something and fast. Then you had an idea. You stopped running and took a fighting stance.

Tsukune: Oh man! I think he's gonna fight Kokoa!

Moka: He can't! Kokoa's too strong for him!

Kurumu: If he fights her, he's got a one way tickets of being sent to a grave!

Kokoa: Hah. So you're finally gonna stop running huh? Then I guess you've made your peace and decided to die.

(name): Not really girlie! I stopped because I decided to stop playing around. It's time for me to get serious! It's time to unleash my trump card! The all powerful (name) secret technique!!

Kokoa, Tsukune, Moka, Kurumu, Mizore and Yukari: The (name) secret technique?

(name): That's right! Now get ready because now you're going down! Prepare yourself!

You charged at Kokoa with your fist raised and Kokoa readied her weapon and brought it down to hit you, but at the last moment you dodged it and then....

(name): Charge your opponent (crouch down) face away from the opponent and.......RUN AWAY!!!! (races off)

There was a long silence as you raced away. Everyone had a look of complete and utter shock.

Tsukune: That was....

Moka: the all powerful......

Mizore, Kurumu, and Mizore: (name) secret technique?

Kokoa was dazed and confused for a moment, but then she exploded in anger and chased after you in hot pursuit.

Kokoa: WHAT THE HELL?!?!?!? GET BACK HERE YOU COWARD!!! COME BACK HERE SO I COULD KILL YOU!!!!

Meanwhile as for you, you ran and ran until you made it to the one place that you could at least get some rest. Your room in the boys dorm. When you got into your room, you lied on the bed and let out a deep sigh of relief.

(name): Whew. I can't believe I managed to get away. If I hadn't run away, I would've gotten my ass beat.

Then you felt a twang of pain of your right arm. You looked and you saw a little bit of blood coming from a gash on your right arm.

(name): Shit! I guess I must've gotten it when I was fighting. Ow that hurts, but I feel so weak I can hardly move. Damn not now! Not when I've got a maniac after me. I need to.....go and....treat this...wound.....

Before you try to get up, you vision began to get blurry. Your eye lids grew heavier and heavier until you fell unconscious. Then a few hours later you wake up....
15533211212212.title: Something else happens

155332112122122.content:
You woke up in your bedroom and saw your wound was all bandaged and cleaned. You didn't know anyone who would help you out like that which begged the question. Who was it? You were too tired to do anything and just went back to sleep. But as soon as you got in your bed you found a note with a heart on it.

A love note? Motive for who healed my wound was solved but who was it was still a mystery. You opened the letter to read what it said. "I am in love with you. Find me.", that's it. For a love note it's very dumb seeing it says kinda what it implies. Find me? How the hell do you do that without any clues? But you noticed something on the side of the note.

It was a picture of Moka, Kokoa, Kurumu, a girl with purple hair in the back, and Mizore. That explains why it was so blunt seeing it had a picture of who sent it. Obviously Kokoa didn't send it but you never have seen that girl with purple hair before. The others caught your eye earlier when Saizo threw you around.

Your plan was to see who gave you the note and sequecially figure out who took care of your wound.
155332112122122.title: Secret crush

1553321121221221.content:
As you made your way to class, you couldn't stop trying to figure out who sent you that letter. You looked around to find any possible suspects, but none looked like it.

(name): Man. This is nuts. Someone sneaks into my room bandages my arm and then leaves me a letter saying that she loves me and tells me to find her? How the heck am I supposed to do that if I don't even know where to look? The only clues I have is this letter and the photo.

You pulled out the letter from your pocket and looked all the girls that were on the photo.

(name): Hmm. Maybe my crush is on the photo, but I don't know most of these girls on the photo. One things for sure. Who ever sent me the photo and the note is someone who knows me and Moka and the others and whoever likes me is on the photo. It's definitely not Kokoa! That little brat could never like me! (looks at Moka). Hmm. Moka might be a possibility, maybe I should ask her if she knows anything. Anything's better than wondering.

And so you went to find Moka. You looked for her all around the school, but you couldn't find her anywhere. Then you see something. You saw a young boy (Tsukune) talking to one of the girls who happened to also be on the photo. And that girl was.....
1553321121221221.title: continue

15533211212212211.content:
You saw Kurumu talking to Tskune. Him and her were just chatting about stuff but it sounded like nothing. At least until Kurumu abrubtly ended it and stopped to talk to you. You had no idea what she'd say but it made you blush seeing her very attractive body. "Hey I was looking for you .", she greeted.

"Uhh you were?"

"Oh yeah. You know why that little love letter I gave you while you were asleep.", she replied.

"You gave me the letter? So....you have a crush on me I guess?"

"You've figured it out. I'm just head over heels for you. It's sudden but so is love.", she hugged you tightly and kissed your nose. "Haha, thought you'd be getting your first kiss from me huh?"

You just blushed like a cherry and had no idea what to say or do. You weren't sure if you liked her back even. "Uh..."

"Shhhhhhh. Don't spoil the moment, no more talking. Only lip locking. ", now she seemed serious but then she put her hand over your mouth faking out again. You had enough of this and wanted what's going on.

"Stop! Are you who really made me the letter?"
15533211212212211.title: Kurumu confesses her love?

155332112122122111.content:
