"I figured out you had a love letter because one of Moka's pictures was swiped from her scrap book. Being a succubus, I knew it was taken for that purpose. And because I wanted to see how'd react if I was the one who made it. Just being playful. "

"I bought it for a bit until you kept intentionally stopped from kissing me."

"I'm a heart breaker. What can I say? If I did make that letter than what would you say?"

"I barley know you so what can I see. Errr say!", Kurumu noticed your slip up of you noticing her sexy body.

"Well all this aside, I'm Kurumu.", she finally introduced herself offering a handshake.

"(Name). Nice to meet you. A bit too personal I must admit.", you replied and returned her handshake.

"Promise won't happen again, unless your interested in hooking up.", she flirted.

You rolled your eyes and went to class with Kurumu waving goodbye. You walked down the hall when you saw...
155332112122122111.title: "Nope I'm just messing with you."

choices: A girl with purple hair emanating a cold aura Mizore
1553321121221221111.content:
You walked down the hall when you saw Moka.

(name) thinking: Hey. There's Moka. Maybe she can shed some light on this situation of mine.

You were just about to call to her, but then you had a thought. What if Moka was the one who sent you that love letter? After all, Kurumu did say that the photo belonged to Moka. She was also one of the the first people that you met when you first came here.

(name): I wonder. Could Moka be my secret crush?

(fantasy)
(name): Hey Moka. Can I talk to you for a minute?

Moka seeing you blushed and then tried to run away, but you stopped her by grabbing her arm.

(name); Wait. Why are you running away?

Moka: Because.......I know why you're here......you're gonna ask me about the love letter you received right?

(name): Y-yes. How'd you know?

Moka: Because.....I.....I......I was the one who wrote that letter.

(name): What?!?

Moka: Yes. It was me. I was the one who wrote that letter. I couldn't tell you right away because you were fighting with Kokoa. And back when you were fighting Saizo, you were so gallant and brave. Ever since then I've been in love with you. I love you so much that......that.....I want you to be my boyfriend.

(name) blushing: Are you serious?!?

Moka: Yes. So will you.....um......will you please be my boyfriend and hopefully in the future have babies?!?

(name) takes Moka's hands: Yes. Of course I will!

Moka hugs (name): Oh thank you (name)! I promise you won't regret it! Let's have 30 babies together!

(name): Yes my darling Moka.

Then you and Moka were both carrying babies in your arms and they looked like Kurumu.

Moka: Oh (name). You've made me so happy.

(name) And that's ditto for me honey bun.
(fantasy end)

By now you were completely red in the face and steam was coming out from your head like a teapot.

(name): What in the freaking hell made me dream that up?!?!? And why do our kids look like Kurumu?!?!?

Then you felt someone tap your shoulder you turn around and you see Moka right behind you.

Moka: Um, excuse me. Are you OK?

(name): DAH!!!!!

Moka: Oh! You're the boy that was fighting with Kokoa the other day.

(name): Um....yeah....hehehehe.....I didn't formally introduce myself before. My name is (name).

Moka: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Moka Akashiya.

(name): I know. You're pretty well known around here. Wow. You're that same scary girl from the other day? You seem so......nice.

Moka: Hahaha. Well....that's because that's the other me you saw.

(name): Other you?

Moka: Yes. The other me was my true self. You see because of this rosary I keep on my chest, it keeps my monster energy under control. If my rosary would ever be taken off, I would become what you just saw. A powerful and terrifying vampire.

(name): That makes sense. You were so scary the other day it's no wonder Kokoa got scared.

Moka: Speaking of there's something I need to talk to you about.

Then you heart skipped a beat. And then you began to get nervous. You knew what what coming. (or at least what you think is coming)

(name) thinking: Oh crap! This is it! She's gonna come clean! What do I do?!? Should I turn her down or accept her?!? Oh my gosh I'm not good at these situations!

There was a long and awkward silence then you and Moka spoke at the same time trying to break the silence.

Moka: I'm sorry for Kokoa's behavior!

(name): OK! I'll do it just go easy on me!

There was another pause and then you spoke.

(name): Pardon?

Moka: I said I want to apologize for Kokoa's behavior. I know she's a bit mean, but she's my sister. She's a sweet girl once you get to know her. So try to get along with her.

You knew that Moka was wrong, but you decided to be respectful listen to her. Especially since she's the sister of another vampire and you didn't want to feel the wrath of two vampires.

(name): It's OK Moka. Don't worry about it. I'll try to get along with her.

Moka: Thank you. I appreciate it. By the way, didn't you say something before?

(name) blushing: Um.....nope! I didn't say nothing! You're just imagining things! Hahah!

Moka: OK.....anyway, if you need anything just let me know and I'll do whatever I can to help. I gotta go. I have to meet Tsukune for a study session.

(name): Is Tsukune a friend of yours?

Moka: Oh yes. He's one of my best friends in the world. I'll introduce you sometime. Gotta go. Bye (name). It was nice meeting you.

(name): You too Moka.

As Moka began to walk away, you suddenly remembered that you were going to ask her about the photo. You were about to call her back when you felt a sudden chill go down your spine. Then you began to get the feeling that you were being watched.

(name): What the....? Someone's watching me, but where are they?

You looked around and then you see someone hiding behind a pillar down the hall.

(name): Hey! Come out of there! I know you're there!

Then the person who was watching you stepped out which turned out to be.....

"Stalking. My crush.", soon as she said that you hoped that she didn't make that letter. She looked cute, very cute even but stalking is just never a good thing.

"Um you wouldn't happen to know about a letter that was placed in my room would you?", you asked.

"I know about it."

"Did you make it then?"

"If I tell you what will you do?"

Walking away was the first thing to come to your head but you tried to think of something else. "I won't run away if that's what you were thinking."

"Good because it would be impossible since your feet are frozen in ice."

"What?! What the hell!"

"I was stalking you, your my crush. "

"You made me the letter? "

"No someone else beat me to that. I was the one who healed your wound from before. Your strong willed, I like it. With us together as one we'll have a long happy life.", the ice encased itself around you slowly up your body. You tried to move but it was no use. But then another girl came and shattered the ice freeing you. It was....

155332112122122111122.content:
"Stay away from my man!", you recognized her from the picture. That girl with purple hair made the letter, she must have been spying on you the same way Mizore was but missed eachother while they snuck in your room. Classic love triangle.

"Keito, head of the school safety commision. You have no business here. (Name) is mine."

"At least he knows what I feel. Instead you hide and hope he just notices you."

"I nertured him back to health like a true girlfriend instead you wasted time stealing from Moka's scrap book and took too long to express your feelings."

"Will both of you stop this petty quarrel! I'm the one being fought for so doesn't what I say count in this?", you tried defusing the situation but they both answered, 'NO!'

"Back away from my man Mizore! "

"Keep your legs away from him!"

Looked like a fight was inevitable.
155332112122122111122.title: Keito

1553321121221221111221.content:
First Mizore's hands extended and turned into claws of ice and her hair turned to ice as well. Keito stomach bulged and eight spider legs sprouted out and her face morphed into that of a spider. The sight of all this made you cringe in fear.

(name) thinking: Holy crap! Are these their monster forms?!?

Then the fight began. Mizore fired multiple icicles at Keito, but Keito dodged them by jumping using her long spider legs. Keito landed on a wall and fired webs at Mizore enveloping her completely. At first it seemed like Keito got her, but then the webs began to freeze and crack. Then Mizore burst free from the webs and gunned for Keito with a right hook. Keito countered back with a left and then the two of them began to punch back and forth with neither side giving in an inch. You wanted to stop the fighting, but for some reason you were still frozen due to seeing them in their monster forms. All you could do was sit and watch. The fighting went on for a few minutes until both Mizore and Keito were battered and tired. But they were far from unbeaten.

Mizore: You're pretty stubborn you know that?

Keito: I could say the same about you.

(name): Come on you guys! Would you two stop before someone gets really badly injured?

Mizore: No way (name). I'm not gonna let this eight legged bimbo take you away from me.

"Yes I did.", Kurumu answered.

"I'd never want to rob you of your first kiss. That's something you should initiate not me. I'm a total stranger. But I was just teasing youand wanted to see how you'd react. "

"I don't know if to thank you or just walk away from a crazy girl. "

"I am a little nuts truth be told when I fall for someone. But how about we start off fresh. I'm Kurumu and it's a very special pleasure to meet you.", she said and looked very hot. She suddenly had sparkles around her and the hall faded to pink. She was hot and you were blushing beat red.

"I....I...I...", was all you could form.

"It's ok, lots of guys are a bit stunned when I really try and get their attention. So do you uhh...want to be my boyfriend? "

Your head was as hot as a train engine with steam coming out of your head like a whistle. You didn't know what to say but wondered if she was also who bandaged you up? "Hang on when you came into my room did you bandage my cut?"

"Uh huh. I was worried so I grabbed a first aid and took care of you. I was too embearesed to tell you what I felt so I made you the letter in hopes I'd have the courage later to tell you. At least if you had an idea how I felt it would be easier."

"Well...I don't have much experience with relationships, but I guess I see no harm in trying. Alright I'll be your boyfriend. "

"YAHOO YAHOO! I can't believe it! I could kiss you for real!", she stopped herself and took down her excitment.

"It's ok. I don't mind if it's from someone I like. Lay it on me."

Kurumu was so happy she was just bursting with it. She took you by the head and made out with you. It felt wonderful. She had so much passion in her kiss you couldn't even return any of it. Ounce you two broke it off you two laughed for no real reason. But the enjoyment came to a halt when someone shoved you both out of their way.

"HEY WATCH IT YOU JACKASS!", you yelled. Kurumu was surprised to see that it was...
155332112122122112.title: Your first girlfriend (what a twist)

1553321121221221121.content:
"What did you call me?", he said.

"Oh you must forgive me. What I meant to say was, sorry good sir I neglected to notice your eye sight is piss poor and you should see a doctor about it. After they fix the rest of you if I don't hear an apology.", you threatened.

"No (Name) stop. He'll kill you.", Kurumu warned.

"I won't have anyone push me or you around without a fight. Bring it ass wipe!"

Saizo charged at you and you did the same. You gave him a good right hook but he hit you in the gut. You both took a second to recover but you came at each other roughly the same time. Kurumu intervened and helped defend you and shoved Saizo a few feet. She stood in front of you and then her nails grew and wings streched out her back.

"Keep away from him Saizo!", she sneered. Saizo was about to neglect her advice but noticed a teacher headed this way. He let you go this time, but the next they'd meet he wouldn't hold back. Kurumu went back to normal and hugged you in relief. "Don't go picking fights like that (Name). I was worried about you."

You couldn't help it even if you wanted to. You couldn't change getting into a fight ever since back before you arrived here. You hoped being with Kurumu could temper your anger and make others not be so afraid of you anymore. Maybe with time...

You walked down to the social center of the school where Kurumu planned to introduce you to her friends. They were shocked to see not only you but with Kurumu holding hands of all things.

"Hi guys.", Kurumu greeted.

"Wait, Kurumu that's-", Moka was so shocked she was cut off by Kurumu.

"Kokoa's hated enemy I know. But well...he's really cute and he agreed to be my boyfriend. So far we seem to be doing well, right?", she asked you.

"Yeah, were off to a positive start at least.", despite the sarcastic tone you did mean it.

Kurumu pecked your cheek in response. "Well (Name) over here are the two love birds Moka and Tskune. The kid is our lovable but annoying little Yukari. And we have over here is Mizore. ", Kurumu introduced.

"Nice to offically meet everyone. Wait? Wheres that meat head Kokoa?", you asked.

"Hey don't talk about my sister that way!", Moka hissed.

"I'm sorry. I just haven't been on good terms with her in case you haven't noticed. "

"(Name) easy. Were going to change that starting now. So don't talk about Kokoa rudely anymore. I don't care if she makes it difficult, you need to start getting along with her if you want to stay with me.", Kurumu explained.

Despite the bad blood between you and Kokoa, you heeded Kurumu's plead. From now on you had to not try and antagonize Kokoa anymore. You promised Kurumu to make sure to her you got the message. "I promise Kurumu. I'll do my best to try and not get under her skin. But I won't just let her get under mine if she does."

"Moka and me will deal with her if she does. Please do this for me. Moka is a real friend to me and she loves her sister despite her behavior."

"Alright Kurumu. "

"See guys he's already looking like a keeper. Soon we'll be a huge gang that'll be famous in the school for years to come."

"Well (Name) tell us about yourself. ", Tskune started with the small talk.

For the next couple hours you chated with the others and got to know them. You started to warm up to them and vice versa. Then....
1553321121221221121.title: Saizo

15533211212212211211.content:

"(Name) and me had a fight."

This shocked the two vampire sisters but kept listening. "Go on Kurumu, why were you fighting? ", Moka said.

"Sniff, I wanted us to go steady. And he wasn't sure about it and that we were moving too fast. I told him how I felt and he told me outright he loved me. So I thought why wait and just make it official. ", Kurumu explained.

"And that's bad?", Kokoa asked bluntly.

"Well Kurumu I'm inclined to agree with (Name). I mean you guys make a great pair but it hasn't been that long. I mean going steady takes a long time to develop. Usually years until both people consider it. I think you need to match his speed and wait for him to know for sure. Your very aggressive Kurumu, it's not surprising you take things so quickly. ", Moka said.

"Your probably right Moka. Maybe I did get caught up in my own romance I overlooked his feelings."

"Not overlooked, just jumped the gun a bit. Go back and talk to him Kurumu. ", Moka suggested.

"Uhh wait ... I wanted to talk to (Name) for a bit. Maybe you could cool off and explain tomorrow?", Kokoa insisted.

"You can get to know (Name) later, right now his girl needs to explain herself and apologize for her attitude. "

"Sis c'mon back me up. They both need time to chill from each other right. I'll soften him up for Kurumu then in the morning she'll come in for the kill and they'll kiss and make up happy ending."

In truth Kokoa only wanted to talk to you so that she could see if she was developing a crush on you. But she couldn't know for sure if you were back with Kurumu. She was counting for Moka to help her win this tiny scuffle between her and Kurumu.
15533211212212211211121111111112.title: Kokoa hears Kurumu run by

choices: Kokoa totally flakes out and runs away
Kokoa talks to you and confirms her feelings
155332112122122112111211111111121.content:
Moka: OK Kokoa, talk to (name), but try to take it easy on him OK? Kurumu. Let (name) be alone for a while just to get his feeling in check OK?

Kokoa: Thank you Moka.

Kurumu: OK. I understand, but there's one thing that confuses me. Kokoa, I never thought you'd be the one who would help in these situations.

Moka: Yeah. It's a surprise to me too.

Kokoa (blushing): What are you talking about?!? I just wanna check on him and that's that! I mean...it's not like I care about that dork anyway. I just can't stand seeing Kurumu cry and stuff. Gah! You know what? I'm going to go see him. Good bye!

And with that Kokoa walked away leaving Kurumu and Moka looking puzzled.

Kurumu: OK. Am I going crazy or is Kokoa acting stranger than usual?

Moka: She is acting strange. I wonder why.

Kurumu: One things for sure, she never usually asks to help us with anything. She definitely being weird.

Moka: But in a way, I'm glad. It means she's being nicer.

Kurumu: I guess so.

Meanwhile back with Kokoa, she walking to her room with her thoughts rushing a mile per minute.

Kokoa thinking: What the hell is wrong with me?!? I've got this weird feeling all over my body. Why do I even care about that dork and his girlfriend? I mean, it's not like I care or anything. But one things for sure, my hearts been beating like crazy ever since he saved me.

Then an image of you looking kind and gentle flashed in her mind making her blush even more.

Kokoa thinking: GAH!!! Stop it! Don't think about him! Just go in talk to him and soften him up for Kurumu! That's it! Nothing more, nothing less.

Then Kokoa stopped at the front door and was about to go inside, but she hesitated. Her heart began to beat again.

Kokoa thinking: Damn it! Calm down Kokoa. You're just going to see him! Why the hell are you so nervous?!? Just do it!

Then Kokoa gripped the knobb and went in.

How does it go?
155332112122122112111211111111121.title: "Ok Kokoa,  talk to (Name)"

1553321121221221121112111111111212.content:
"Uh hi (Name)...", Kokoa said shyly walking in.

You weren't expecting Kokoa of all people to come in but she was a welcome change of pace after your spat with Kurumu. "Hi Kokoa."

"Uhh do you mind if I um... sit next to you?", she asked.

"It's fine. ", you answered plainly.

"My hearts beating so hard! I feel so weird right now and I don't know why! So why is it that now I'm feeling like this?", Kokoa thought. She sat next to you and looked at you while you were watching the fire. "Wait? I remember this feeling....when I first met him and I smelled his blood. No wait....AFTER I licked it! Could it mean this whole entire time?", Kokoa slowly put together.

"Is something wrong Kokoa? You don't look like yourself. ", you noticed her acting more like a school girl and less of her confident abrassive attitude. But she looked cute like this.

"I never understood until now. I....have a crush....on (Name). From the moment I laid eyes on him. But I treated him like I hated him. I didn't know what to feel about it that I just did what I thought was easier. Oh (Name) if you only knew...", Kokoa began to blush wildly.

You didn't know what was with her. She was just looking at you and that's it. Finally she spoke, "(Name), I didn't know how to express it. I....I......"
1553321121221221121112111111111212.title: Kokoa talks to you and confirms her feelings

15533211212212211211121111111112122.content:
Out of nowhere Kokoa pulled you by your head and kissed you full on the lips! You were speechless both cuz your mouth was against hers and because you were not expecting it! It came right out of left field! Kokoa broke the kiss and blushed so red that she was a cherry. Upon realizing what Kokoa just done she felt incredibly nervous. She meant to express her feelings through words not action.

You both just stared at each other both wondering why did that just happen? You never would have guessed Kokoa secretly liked you that way in a million years. But now it seemed possible. Kokoa then spoke, "I'm sorry! I should go!", she said running off. Her heart raced a thousand times a second to her. But she felt her lips and recalled her action. "It was nice. Awkward on every level but, now I know...I like him. Just as big sister said."

The night passed and you were asleep still wondering why did she kiss you? More importantly how did you feel? Wrong, right, sweet? You had no clue. It was so sudden. But then you thought of Kurumu. Did you still want to be with her? If so were you going to bring it up? Wait no that's a bad idea, you let her find out through the gossip. Then you admit it so that you prove your trying to stay with her. But did you want to?

"UGH I AM SO CONFUSED! Why did she kiss me?!", you thought. Eventually you fell asleep and would think of a plan in the morning.
15533211212212211211121111111112122.title: other

155332112122122112111211111111121221.content:
Kokoa was lying in her bed staring up at the ceiling recalling what just transpired today. She was still remembering when she kissed you. Whenever she thought about the kiss, her cheeks turned red and her heart beat like a drum. Suddenly Kokoa had realized something. She had just kissed you when you were (technically) in a relationship with Kokoa.

Kokoa: Oh crap! If Kurumu found out I kissed (name), she'll totally hate me! Oh man. On the other hand if I don't tell, then she won't have to know. Oh man! I can't believe I kissed him. Not to mention, that was my first kiss. It was so.....warm and.....I felt connected to him. This must be how Kurumu must feel when she kisses him.

She turned over on her bed with her face on the pillow. She began to imagine you and her together. You two grew close and then you kissed. French kissed that is.

Ko: Oh (name).....I love you so much,

Then a voice snapped her out of her thoughts. It was Ko.

Ko: Miss Kokoa. Miss Kokoa. What are you doing to your pillow whee?

Kokoa: Huh? DAH! Um Ko! I uh..... I was just.....uh.....just practicing sucking blood! Yeah that's it! Just practicing sucking blood!

And she bit on the pillow to prove her point.

Ko: Well....whatever you say Miss Kokoa. I'm gonna go to sleep. Night Miss Kokoa.

Kokoa: Um......yeah, Night Ko.

Then Ko flew to the ceiling and hung over the fireplace and went to sleep. Kokoa stayed awake for a while, but soon she fell asleep too with her head filled with dreams of you. Then.....
155332112122122112111211111111121221.title: Back to Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211.content:
When every one got back to school you didn't know what to do in regards to Kokoa and Kurumu. But the best way to settle this was by talking to Kokoa privatly. So after your classes end you needed to speak with her. Later class was over and it was time to track down Kokoa. But then you ran into Kurumu, "Oh (Name) I found you! Look I'm sorry for the way I acted last night. It wasn't fair of me to put you in that spot.", she said.

"Uhh listen Kurumu, I need to be somewhere right now so can we talk later please.", you asked.

"Uhh sure.", you thanked her and left to find Kokoa.

You figured she'd be with Moka so you asked Tskune where she was. "Hey Tskune, have you seen Moka? "

"She's with Kokoa in the courtyard.", he answered.

"Thanks man."

You quickly made your way to it where finally you saw Kokoa. You guessed she'd want to talk about it too so getting alone with her wouldn't be a problem. "Hey Moka do you mind if I borrow Kokoa to myself for just a few minutes?"

"Go ahead I need to meet with Tskune anyway. See you sister. ", Moka said leaving you and Kokoa alone.

"Soooo about the kiss.", Kokoa started.

"Yeah, um why?"

"(Name) I have been in love with you since we met."

"Odd way of expressing it."

"Well I didn't know what those feelings were and what to do. I thought it was making me weak but it was just simply making me feel nervous because well you stole my heart."

"So when did you figure it out?"

"When you saved me and I wasn't able to get mad I felt the feeling I had when I was around you. And when we kept eachother warm it was even stronger. And it made me realize I liked you a lot. So.....I have to ask do you feel the same way?"

You didn't know what to say. But you tried giving an answer. "Well, when we weren't at our throats I did think you were cute I'll admit. But I'm with Kurumu at least I think. And I really like her, she's made me feel like a better person and I owe her so much. But if I wasn't with her....I'd consider going out with you."

"Well...what are you gonna do?"

"Talk to Kurumu and see what happens."

"Wait before you go can I know one thing? Did you like it when I kissed you?", she asked.

"All awkwardness aside I thought it wasn't that bad. It was sweet. ", you replied. You went off to go and face Kurumu to see where your relationship with her would lead.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211.title: Later back at Yokai

15533211212212211211121111111112122111.content:
After talking to Kokoa you felt conflicted between Kurumu and Kokoa. Did you feel the same way towards Kokoa or did Kurumu still hold your heart as before or maybe it was both? The only way to understand things was to just talk to Kurumu and find out ounce and for all. It didn't take long to find her since she already was looking for you.

"(Name) there you are. What's the matter?", Kurumu said.

"Kurumu....I don't know if I feel the same spark we had in the begining. "

"You mean? You don't love me anymore?"

"I'll never say that. I mean maybe I feel something....like I...were not as good a pair as we might have thought. I think I like someone else."

Kurumu was on the brink of crying but held it in, "Who is it?"

"You won't believe me but, I think I feel something towards Kokoa. As crazy as it sounds she had a crush on me the entire time we met. And maybe we were only fighting because we didn't know what to do about it. It wasn't fair to love you so much and yet for me to just say I never exactly meant it."

"(Name)...if you choose her over me I'll die. Not like I'll kill myself but because succubi rely on the love of their destined one's. If you love another then the heartbreak will eventually kill me."

"Kurumu I'm just so sorry for everything I put you through. But maybe I'm wrong and maybe I still feel that same spark we first had. But...I won't be sure until I have one more kiss from you if you'll let me."

"If there's a small chance that I'll still be able to have you then go ahead and kiss me as long as you need. If it answers what's going on in your head then let me help."

Kurumu and you dove into eachothers arms and had one passionate kiss that was your best one you had with Kurumu. Your mind flashed and you finally knew which girl you loved.
15533211212212211211121111111112122111.title: Continue

choices: You tell Kurumu you love Kokoa (get ready for the tissues)
Three guys come up to you and tell you that kissing is against school rules
155332112122122112111211111111121221111.content:
Your mind flashed and you finally knew which girl you loved. Kokoa. Unfortunately you would have to break this news to Kurumu. You were hesitant on telling her because you didn't want her to die because of you. Then again you had to be honest. No matter what happens you had to make a decision. Then you two stopped kissing and Kurumu looked into your eyes.

Kurumu: Well (name)?

(name): Kurumu I.....

Then.....
155332112122122112111211111111121221111.title: Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
"Sigh.........I'm so sorry Kurumu. ", you broke down trying to pull yourself together but tears began following down your face. "I'm such....a terrible.....person. I killed you."

Kurumu knew what you meant and felt shocked like her heart was hit by a dagger. Yet she managed to contain her tears but barley. "You didn't kill me (Name) you hear me? Your as far from terrible as possible. We just fell in love hard for each other that's all.", Kurumu said trying to make it less painful.

"Why did it have to be you? Why did I love you first? Had I known that I could kill you from no longer returning those I'd have...oh god Kurumu I don't want you to die please tell me that there's something I can do. I didn't see this coming. I didn't count on liking anyone else.", you begged and pleaded hoping it would save her from her broken feelings.

"Either you love me or not. There's no middle ground.", she answered.

"But I do! I still do but it's different now, I know Kokoa and don't look it but there's something that links us like we were always meant to be. You just got mixed up in my mistakes. Please tell me it's ok."

"(Name) don't look at this as killing me ok. If anything there's always a chance that there's a way to extend a succbie's life or maybe we'll get back together. But even if that never happens, I'll live a long happy life before then. So do me a favor ok? Don't ever look back as this being a horrible deed ok? It's just life. I need you to be strong for me because......I'm only moments from bursting into tears myself. Can you do that? ", she asked.

You wipped away your tears and hugged Kurumu tightly and kissed her face. "I am real glad to have been with you Kurumu."

"It's a blessing to just be friends with you. I love you. I hope it doesn't change our friendship."

"Never. ", you quickly replied.

Kurumu cried in your arms feeling both heart broken and heartfelt to have you in her life. Your compassion and understanding were traits she loved about you. And you loved everything about Kurumu yet why Kokoa? Well if you were going to find an answer you'd need to find out the old fashioned way.

"Love you (Name)", Kurumu said finally calming down and ending your relationship.

"I love you too."
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You tell Kurumu you love Kokoa (get ready for t...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
After you left, you went to go find Kokoa. You tried to find her, but she was nowhere to be seen. Later you walked around campus trying to get your mind off of things, but sadly you still had lingering thoughts about Kurumu.

(name): Damn it. I know she told me not to worry, but....I still feel like crap. Is there something wrong with me?

Suddenly you heard a voice that made you jump.

(voice): You better believe there's something wrong with you!

You turned around and three boys walked up to you and they were not happy. These three boys are the members of The Cute Girl Fan Club Coalition, comprised of Kozo Kasahara, Kubasaki Nagai and Bosaburo Taira.

(name): Um...excuse me, but can I help you with something?

Kozo: You're him aren't you? (name) right?

(name): Yeah that's me. And.....

Kubaski: We're fed up with you!

(name): And why is that?

Bosaburo: Because you're the enemy of all women and you're our number one enemy!

(name): Say what? What do you mean enemy of all women? And why am I your number one enemy?

Kozo: You don't know? Then allow us to explain! Ready! Go!

Then all three of them took of their shirts and then they were all wearing pink vests each having different names of a different girl.

Kozo: And.....start! Give me a M, give me an O, give me a K, give me an A! What does that spell? Moka!

Bosaburo: Kurumu, Kurumu, she's my girl, mess with her I'll make you hurl!

Kubaski: Y! U! K,A,R,I! Yukari! Yukari! Yay!

(name): Uh.......why are you cheering for the girls like that? Wait, you guys must be....

Kozo: That's right! I'm the leader of the Moka Akashiya fan club, Kozo Kasahara!

Bosaburo: And I'm the leader of the unofficial Kurumu Kurono fan club, Bosaburo Taira!

Kubaski: And lastly, I'm the leader of the Yukari Sendo private fan club, Kubaski Nagai!

Kozo, Bosabura, and Kubaski: And together we are......The Cute Girl Fan Club Coalition!

There was a long awkward pause. Then you started to walk away.

(name): If you guys are gonna waste my time, I'm outta here.

Kozo: Hold on! You're not going anywhere! Not after what you did!

(name): And just what exactly did I do?

Kubaski: We saw what you did to Kurumu! Dumping her like that! It's despicable!

Bosaburo: Yeah! How dare you do that to my beloved!

When you heard them mention your break up with Kurumu, you felt a slight pang in your heart.

(name): You don't know what you're talking about. Besides it's none of your business.

Kozo: You better believe it's our business! When our girls get hurt, we hurt too!

Kubaski: Yeah! Especially, Bosaburo! When she was crying, he was too!

Bosaburo: Yeah! You're gonna pay for what you did to Kurumu! It's time for some retribution!

(name): Look, I don't want any trouble. If you wanna fight then.....

Before you could finish, Kozo and his lackeys whipped out wooden sticks and started beating you.

(name): Ow! Hey! Cut it out!

Bosaburo: Take that! And this! And that! A pathetic heart breaker like you doesn't deserve to have a girlfriend, you pantywaist!

Kozo: Come on! I know he's in human form, but he's a real wimp!

Kubaski: Yeah! It's like he's a real human or something!

You continued to be beaten on and you were getting really annoyed. Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Continue

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You continued to be beaten on and you were getting really annoyed. Then who should come to your rescue, but the person who you were looking for.

(name): Kokoa!

Kokoa: Hey! What the hell are you guys doing?

Kozo: Who the hell are you?

Kubaski: I gotta admit it though, she is kinda cute.

Bosaboro: Maybe we should make a fan club of her too.

Kokoa: Ugh! As if freak!

Then Yukari, Moka, Mizore, and Tsukune came right behind her, ready to help you.

Kozo: It's my sweet Moka!

Kubaski: And my beloved Yukari!

Moka: Stop it! Why are you being so mean to him?

Kozo: Sorry my love, but this is his divine punishment.

Tsukune: Divine punishment? Just what did he do exactly?

Kubaski: That's none of your business! Right now, we're gonna give this guy what he deserves!

Bosabora: Yeah! Because of him, he made my lovely Kurumu cry!

Mizore: He did what now?

You felt another pang of guilt by Bosabura's words. What he said was true and you couldn't help, but feel bad.

Kokoa: You don't know what the hell you guys are talking about! I'm gonna kick your ass for messing with (name)!

Then Kokoa leaped into the air and was about to land a powerful kick, but then you stepped in the way trying to stop her.

(name): No Kokoa! Wait! It's fine, I'm.....

Before you could finish, you met the receiving end of Kokoa's foot sending you sprawling on the ground.

Kokoa: Oh crap! (name)!

Tsukune: Oh man! That had to hurt!

Moka: The poor guy.

Meanwhile, The Cute Girl Fan Club Coalition took advantage of the situation and managed to get away, but not before saying a few words before they left.

Kozo: This isn't over yet! We're gonna make you pay for what you did!

Kubaski: Yeah! Prepare yourself for retribution!

Bosaburo: Yeah! After what you did to Kurumu, you don't deserve to have a girlfriend! Get ready for your punishment!

As for you, everyone else came to check on you to see if you were alright.

Kokoa: Oh (name)! Are you OK? I'm so sorry!

(name): Rrgghh! It's OK. I've taken harsher kicks than that.

Moka: Are you sure? You got hit pretty hard.

(name): Don't worry. I'm fine Moka. Don't worry.

Mizore: What was with those guys? They sure seemed mad at you. I wonder why.

(name): Yeah I know. And personally I don't care.

Kokoa: By the way did something happen?

(name): What makes you say that?

Kokoa: For one thing, they mentioned something about you making Kurumu cry.

Yukari: There's no way that's true. Right (name)?

(name): Um...yeah. Yeah.

Tsukune: (name). Is something wrong? You look upset.

(name): No. It's nothing Tsukune. I'm fine.

Tsukune: Are you sure? If you need to talk. we're here to help.

Mizore: Not mention those guys said they'll be back. Maybe we should take you back to the nurse.

Kokoa: Yeah. After all it's my fault.

(name): Guys. Don't worry. I'm fine. I'm just gonna go to my dorms and rest a bit.

Then you walked away to your dorm to get some rest. Later, you made it back to the dorm with an ice pack on your cheek. You were still remembering what The Cute Girl Fan Club Coalition said about you. You couldn't help, but feel like those words were true.

(name): Man. I feel like crap. Now I'm not so sure if I should tell Kokoa how I feel. Maybe they're right. Maybe I don't deserve a girlfriend after what I did. After all, I'm weak and I'm love with an super all powerful S class monster. She's way too good for me.

You took off the ice pack and lied on your side for a while. Then you heard a knock on the door. You walked over to the door and you see.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Someone comes to save you

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You opened the door to find Kokoa standing in front of it. "Hi (Name), um may I come inside?", she asked. You let her in and sat down across from her to know why she was here. "Did you break up with Kurumu because of me?", she asked getting straight to the point.

"It wasn't your fault Kokoa....it's.....", you were going to say that you also fell in love with her but you stopped yourself.

"Kurumu is very sweet and come on she's rocking a body nobody can compete with.", Kokoa said trying to fix your relationship with Kurumu but to no avail.

"Kokoa, were probably not getting back together. I....", you wanted to say you liked her the same way she did too but the words weren't coming out.

"It was wrong for me to just say I really liked you! I broke you two up and it wasn't fair to confuse you like that. I still like you more than a friend but I'd want you to be happy more than being with me. That is....do you like me that way?", Kokoa asked.

".....", you said nothing. But you bucked up and tried saying it to her.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
(name): I.....I.....Uh.....Kokoa......I......uh.......

You tried to tell Kokoa how you felt, but you couldn't get the words to come out. You were like a robot who was having a malfunction.

Kokoa: Um....(name)? What's wrong? Just come out and say it.

(name): Duh......I......uh.......I......can't say it.

Kokoa: Why not? Are you rejecting me?

(name): NO! It's not that! It's just.....I can't give you an answer. Can you give me time? I promise! I'll tell you tomorrow.

Kokoa was silent for a moment, but then she understood.

Kokoa: OK. I'll wait till tomorrow. Just make sure you tell me tomorrow.
`
(name): OK. Thank you for being so understanding Kokoa.

Kokoa: You're welcome. I'll.....see you tomorrow.

(name): OK. Later.

After Kokoa left you sighed with exasperation and sat on your bed.

(name) thinking: Oh man. Why the heck didn't I tell her? Is it because I'm weak? Because a guy like me doesn't deserve to have a girl like Kokoa? I wouldn't put it past her. I am a human and she's one of the most powerful monsters in the academy. Not to mention she's got a big sister who's just as powerful as she is. Will she really accept me even though I'm a human? (sigh).

You thought and you thought about what you should say to Kokoa. Then you made a decision.

(name): OK. I'll tell her how I feel for now. I'll tell her I'm human another time. Now I better get some sleep.

Then you went to sleep. Meanwhile in a classroom filled with nothing but giant cutouts of Moka and the others, The Cute Girl Fan Club Coalition were busy trying to think about your punishment.

Kozo: Man! We have to get that guy no matter what!

Bosabura: Yeah! I say we give him the beat down he'll never forget! I wanna make him pay for what he did to my beloved Kurumu!

Kozo: Easy Bosabura. Don't you worry. We'll make sure he pays!

Kubaski: Sorry to question you boss, but how do we do that?

Kozo: Uhhhh.......I don't have a clue.

All three of them sigh at a loss of what to do, then they heard the door open. There in the doorway were three other boys. The one in the middle was the class president Tadashi Wanibuchi and the other two were his lackys.

Kozo: Mr. Wanibuchi! What brings you here sir?

Tadachi: I couldn't help, but overhear your predicament and me and my boys want to help you get this man.

Kozo: Really?

Tadachi: Yes. We have a reliable witness that personally told us that he has broken a few school rules and we have to make sure that he's punished.

Tubaski: Wait, I don't wanna sound rude or nothing, but why should we let you help us?

Tadachi: I understand that it sounds a little hard to believe, but in return we'll let your have all your lovers to yourselves.

Kozo: What?!? You mean you'll help me get my sweet Moka?!?

Tubaski: And my darling Yukari?!?

Bosabura: And Kurumu too?

Tadachi: Yes. So what do you say? (holds out hand)

Kozo took Tadachi's hand and shook it like crazy.

Kozo: Yes! You got yourself a deal!

Bosabura: I'm gonna get with my beloved Kurumu!

Tubaski: Yukari! You'll soon be mine!

Kozo: Oh Moka! We will be together come tomorrow my love!

Tadachi thinking: Perfect! Get ready you little brat. I'll show you who's the boss around Yokai.

Kozo: So now that we're working together, do you have a plan to get that guy?

Tacdachi: Yes. Listen very carefully and do as I say.....

Then Tadachi told The Cute Girl Fan Club Coalition his plan to get you punished. Then.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: other

choices: You told Tsukune and the others about you , Kurumu, and Kokoa
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
The next day back at the school, you were on your way to class trying to figure out what you should tell Kokoa. You were at a complete loss and you were nervous like crazy.

(name) thinking: Man! This sucks! Why can't this be easier when I told Kurumu I loved her? I just wish telling her how I feel wasn't so hard. Not to mention when Tsukune and the others find out I chose Kokoa over Kurumu, they'll never forgive me.

Just then, Tskune, Moka, Mizore and Yukari came up to you. They all looked a little worried.

(name): Hey guys. What's wrong?

Moka: Listen (name), we need to ask you something.

(name): OK.....

Tsukune: Listen, has something happened between you and Kurumu?

When you heard Tsukune's question you felt your heart skip a beat. You didn't want to bring anymore drama and you didn't want your friends to get mad at you. So you decided to play dumb.

(name): Um....uh....nothing. What makes you say that?

Mizore: Don't play dumb. We know something's wrong. Kurumu seemed really depressed yesterday and she keeps telling us that she wants to be alone.

Kurumu: Oh! So now you listen us! Any other time you just totally ignore us, but now all of a sudden you listen!

Meanwhile as for you, you tried to shake Kokoa off, but thanks to her vampire strength you couldn't.

Kokoa: I'm sorry (name). I can't help myself! You smell so good!

She bared her fangs and bit you in the neck hard. This made you snap out of it completely.

(name) OW!!! Hey! Kokoa! What the hell are you doing?!? Get off me would you?!?

You pulled Kokoa off of you and you held your neck trying stop the bleeding. Kokoa regained her senses and gave you a big hug.

Kokoa: Hey! (name)! You're back!

(name): Back? What do you mean? What happened to me?

Kurumu: Wait. You don't remember anything?

You tried to remember what you did and what transpired, but you couldn't.

(name): Nope. Nothing. All I remember was fighting off those goons, getting hurt and then....nothing.

Tsukune: Are you sure? You don't remember beating up Tadashi and the others?

(name): Wait what?

You looked around and saw a bloody beaten up Tadashi and his goons. When you saw them, you were shocked.

(name): What the hell.....? Did I do this?

Yukari: Yes. You were about to be eaten by those jerks, but then you went crazy and started beating them up. You even almost killed Tadashi.

(name): Oh no.....not again.

Kokoa: Again? What do you mean?

Then you felt your vision get blurry and you were staggering. You had lost too much blood when you were fighting. You tried to stay awake, but you couldn't and you fainted. A little later you woke up.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The gentle way

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You woke up to see Kokoa's face showing concern for you, a sight rarely seen by even Moka. She became relieved when she noticed your eyes open after a couple hours. "Your alright (Name) your back in your own room.", she said.

"Uhh. Kokoa....", seeing her look so much like Moka reminded you of what made her seem human. "You look nice like this.", you blurted out.

"I... uhhh just....was only a little worried. Moka would be disappointed if I let you off like that earlier.", she replied hiding her embarresment.

"Kokoa, stop trying to hide what you feel about me. Alone, you can say what you want around me and it never leaves outside of that bond of trust.", you said.

"I...just.....why? Why you? Why did I fall for someone like you?", she asked herself.

"I don't know. Maybe because, that's what love is, it's unpredictable.", you answered.

"Are we meant for each other then? I can't change myself to be your ideal person. "

"And you don't need to. For now that will do. Let's just maybe take it one step at a time? Then we'll find the answer."

"(Name), whatever you do. Promise me that no matter what, never change a thing about yourself for me. Because it was all those things that made me fall for you in the first place ounce I got to know you.", she said.

"I promise Kokoa.", you answered.

"Good. ", she leaned next to you and gently bit your neck and licked off the blood. "I guess I'll need to practice how to properly show affection until next time were alone.", she admitted.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Don't change for me

choices: Tsukune and the girls were right there in shock
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile back in class, Tsukune and Moka had just left the classroom and was on his way to see you to check to how you were doing. On the way, they ran into Mizore, Kurumu, and Yukari.

Yukari: Hey Tsukune. Hey Moka.

Tsukune: Oh. Hey guys.

Kurumu: Where are you headed?

Moka: We were going to pay (name) a visit.

Mizore: He's still hurt huh?

Tsukune: Yeah. He was in pretty rough shape. Even though we took him to the infirmary, the nurse said that he should rest for a little while.

Moka: So we thought that we could pay him a visit to cheer him up a bit.

Kurumu: Hey. Mind if I come with you? I want to see if he's OK.

Mizore: Me too.

Moka: Sure. Of course you can. You coming too, Yukari?

Then Moka saw Yukari. She had a troubled expression on her face. Everyone else noticed this too.

Moka: Yukari? Is something wrong? You look sad.

Tsukune: Yeah. That's not like you at all. What's wrong?

Yukari: Well, it's just that.....I don't think I should go see (name).

Kurumu: Why not? If you're worried about making me jealous, don't worry about it. The only person you have to worry about is Kokoa.

Yukari: I don't mean that! I mean.... I don't think I should see him because it's my fault that he's hurt in the first place. If I hadn't gotten involved in the fight I never would have gotten captured and he would never had.....

Yukari began to tear up and she was about to cry, but Moka gently gave Yukari a hug.

Moka: Yukari. It's OK. It's not your fault. (name) won't blame you for anything.

Yukari: But.....(sniff)....but I......

Mizore: Besides you saved his life. If you hadn't stepped in (name) would be in worse shape than he is right now.

Kurumu: Yeah. And you were pretty brave back there going against those guys all by yourself.

Yukari: Really? You think so?

Tsukune: Yeah. So don't worry about it. I'm sure (name) doesn't blame you for anything.

Yukari: Yeah. Thanks guys.

Mizore: Speaking of those guys what happened to Tadashi and the others?

Kurumu: I've heard they were taken to the infirmary and were punished for causing a disturbance. I've heard the Fan Club Coalition was involved, but I haven't heard what was going to happen to them.

Tsukune: What I find surprising was that (name) was able to take them on all by himself. He must be one powerful monster.

Mizore: Yeah. He didn't even need to use his monster form to beat them. Unless he's a vampire like Kokoa.

Yukari: I don't know about that.

Tsukune: What do you mean Yukari?

Yukari had a serious expression on her face. Then she spoke in a quiet tone.

Yukari: It's funny how I never realized it before, but (name) never once showed his monster form even once. In fact, he should have transformed when he was in danger and when I was being eye raped by those goons.

Moka: Maybe....he's committed to following the school rules?

Yukari: Maybe....maybe not. Maybe it's something else. Maybe he didn't transform......because he couldn't.

Tsukune: Wait a minute. Yukari....are you saying that.....(name).......could possibly be......

Yukari: Yes. It's possible. but I'm starting to think that (name).....is a human.

Everyone gasped at this sudden revelation.

Kurumu: Yukari! That's crazy! There's no way a human could get in to Yokai!

Yukari: Oh yeah? (points to Tsukune) Need I remind you that this human got into Yokai.

Kurumu: Oh. Well.....there's no way a human could get into Yokai.....again! Besides we don't know that for sure! He probably has his own reasons, Calling him a human is just crazy!

Tsukune: Crazy as it is Kurumu, it does make some kind of sense.

Moka: And that would explain why Kokoa acted weird when she smelled (name)'s blood.

Tsukune: Well...there's only one way we can find out for sure. Ask (name).

Yukari: Wait! We can't just ask him right out of the blue! He'll flip out!

Tsukune: Don't worry. I'll talk to him. Just let me talk to him.

Moka: Are you sure Tsukune?

Tsukune: I'm sure. Now let's go see him. Be sure not to say anything about what we talked about OK?

Everyone, but Tsukune: Right.

Then they all set of to your room. Unbeknownst to them, someone was watching in the shadows. Whoever was watching them, they had heard every detail from the conversation. The firgure watched Tsukune and the girls walk to your room and then the figure disappeared. Meanwhile you were resting in your room on the bed. Kokoa had just left to get back into class so you were by yourself. As you were lying down on the bed, you were thinking about Kokoa and your feeling for her.

(name): Man. Why the heck is it so hard to tell her how I feel? Is it because I'm scared to tell her because I'm a human? Damn it! Why am I so scared to tell her?!? I mean...what if she doesn't like me because I'm a human? But then again, I do remember what she told me just now.

(Flashback) -credit goes to kevkane101
Kokoa: (Name) whatever you do, promise me that no matter what, never change a thing about yourself for me. Because it was all those things that made me fall for you in the first place once I got to know you.
(flashback ends)

(name): Maybe...she loves me for who I am. Yeah! It doesn't matter if I'm a human. I'm gonna tell her how I feel! But.....how should I do it?

Then, you began to come up with crazy ideas as to how you were going to tell Kokoa how you felt.

(name): Mademoiselle Kokoa. Will you do me the honor for accepting my feelings and be mon amour? Nah. Too frenchy. Kokoa, Be my love please? (sigh) Too whiny. Be my love for else?!? No, too demanding. Man, this is hard! Oh I know! Kokoa, I.....

Before you could finish and when you turned around.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Continue

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Tsukune: (name)? What are you doing?

(Name): Ummm.....I was......uh......I.......

There was a long silence. Then one by one everyone began to laugh except you. You blushed beet red for being seen.

Yukari: Hahaha. (name) what the heck are you doing? You look so silly.

(name): You don't need to laugh you know.

Moka: We're sorry, but we're glad that you're feeling better.

Tsukune: So how are you feeling?

(name): Well, I feel a lot better. My scars still hurt a little, but I'll be OK.

MIzore: So were you doing? Before we rudely interrupted you?

Kurumu: From the looks of things, it looked like you were practicing saying I love you to Kokoa.

(Name) blushing: Dah! Well.....I......I....

Yukari: Heh. Looks like you hit the nail on the head Kurumu.

Moka: Hold on. You haven't told Kokoa your feelings yet?

(Name): I.....I.....(sigh) Yes. I haven't.

Tsukune and the gang were surprised at your sudden confession. Especially since you and Kokoa had been together for a while and it was obvious that you two loved each other.

Kurumu: I don't get it (name)! If you like her so much, why haven't you told her that you love her yet?

(name): Kurumu, it's that simple. You see I......well....let's just say that I'm scared OK? I'm scared that she won't accept me for who I am. Especially since.....you know, when I went berserk.

Tsukune: That wasn't your fault. Besides Kokoa doesn't care. She likes you for who you are. I just know it.

(name): Really?

Moka: Yeah. In fact, you changed Kokoa's life. Ever since she met you, she's grown nicer and for the first time ever she cares about another person.

Kurumu: Yeah. Even though you were dating me at some point, I could see that you and Kokoa had a real connection. It was obvious that you and Kokoa were meant to be together and I mean that from the bottom of my heart.

(name): Guys.....

Yukari: Yeah! So be a man and just go for it!

(name): But Yukari.....I don't even know where to begin. How do I being it up?

Mizore: Well, what I would do when I try to tell someone how I feel. I would stalk them everyday and then I freeze them from head to toe and then I have my way with them.

Everyone looked at Mizore and sweatdropped at her idea.

Kurumu: Um.....Mizore. I'm pretty sure that's what you would do.

(name): Yeah. Besides if I did that Kokoa, I would just make her pissed off at me. Any other ideas?

Tsukune: Well....how about you take Kokoa out on a date or something? That way you two could spend some time together.

Moka: That's a great idea Tsukune!

(name): Yeah. Not a bad idea, but where should I take her? I don't even know the first thing when it comes to dating.

Yukari: Take a look at this!

Yukari reached in her cape and pulled out a book. The cover said; "Dating for Dummies. How to set up a good date."

(name): A book about dating?

Yukari: Yeah. This book gives you tips like where a good meeting spot is, where to go to have fun and lots of other things too.

(name): Hm. Interesting. OK then. I'll give this book a try. Hopefully it'll give me some pointers. Thanks guys.

Yukari: Don't mention it.

Moka: And if you ever need some advice on Kokoa, don't be afraid to ask me or any of us OK?

(name): I will.

Moka: Well guys I guess we better go. It's getting a little late I could use a bath.

Kurumu: Yeah me too. See you (name). Good luck with Kokoa.

Mizore: Yeah. Break a leg.

(name): Um. Yeah. Thanks again guys.

After that Moka and the girls left leaving you and Tsukune alone.

(name): Tsukune? What's up?

Tsukune: (name). I need to talk to you about something.

All of sudden Tsukune was now serious with a hint of worry.

(name): OK....what is it?

Tsukune: Listen. You know that this is a school for monsters and by monsters right?

(name): Well...yeah. Of course.

Tsukune: And you also know that if a human is found in Yokai, they'll be immediately put to death right?

(name): Yes. So?

Tsukune: Listen. I heard from Yukari that during your fight with Tadashi, you didn't change to your monster form even once. Not even when Yukari was in danger. Why didn't you?

You gulped at Tsukune's question. You quickly came up with a lie.

(name): Um.....well.....I.....didn't want to break the rules. Yeah. I wanted to obey the rules that's all. Hehehe. Besides I couldn't transform because I was not feeling well. Hehehe.

Tsukune looked at you with a "you really expect me to believe that" face making you sweat a little.

Tsukune: (Name). Listen. I just want you to be honest with me. I can tell you're lying. Any monster would transform to save a friend, even if it means breaking the rules. I'm starting to get that you didn't transform because you wanted to follow the rules, but it was because you couldn't. Which brings me to my question.

You heart was now beating like a jack hammer and your body broke into a sweat. Then Tsukune asked you the question that you were dreading to hear.

Tsukune: (name). Are you a human?

There was a long silence. Then you.......
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Tsukune and the girls were right there in shock

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
(name): OK Tsukune. I admit it. I'm a human.

Tsukune: I knew it.

(name): But please don't kill me. I understand that you're a monster with pride and stuff, but......

Tsukune stared at you, then he laughed.

Tsukune: Hahaha.

(name): Hey! What's so funny?!?

Tsukune: Sorry, but what you said was totally stupid. I don't even have the power to kill anyone. After all I'm just like you.

(name): Just like me? Wait a sec. Tsukune are you meaning to tell me that......

Tsukune: That's right. I'm a human too.

(name): Huh?!? Are you playing me?!?

Tsukune: Nope. I'm a definitely a human.

Then Tsukune began telling you how he came to Yokai Academy and how he met Moka and the others and you told him how you got to Yokai.

(name): So your dad found a packet from Yokai and now you're enrolled here?

Tsukune: Yup. Of course, I wish he wouldn't have taken that packet in the first place, but if he hadn't, I never would've enrolled here and I ever would have met Moka and the others. Anyway, you were sent to this school because of you getting into a fight?

(name): Yeah. I don't talk about it much. It happened when I was in my first year of high school. Some bullies were picking on a kid and.....I don't know I just lost it. One minute I was running toward them, the next minute I was standing over them covered in blood. Ever since then everyone's been keeping their distance from me and calling me "The Bloody Warrior." My parents decided to transfer me here so I could make a fresh start and hopefully make some friends.

Tsukune: Looks like you did just that and even got yourself a small crush at that.

(name): That is assuming that she doesn't hate me.

Tsukune: Why would she hate you?

(name): Hello? I'm a human! She's a S class vampire! That isn't exactly a normal relationship!

Tsukune: Well...Kokoa is a bit of a prideful vampire. Not to mention she kinda thinks that vampires like her are high above everyone else and.....

(name): Tsukune. You're not helping things here.

Tsukune: Sorry. Well I guess that explains why you haven't told Kokoa how you felt yet.

(name): Yeah. I'm really scared that when she finds out I'm a human, she's gonna totally hate me. Or even worse, kill me. -sigh- What'll I do?

Tsukune then placed an arm on your shoulder.

Tsukune: Don't worry (name). I'm sure that won't happen. Trust me. Love works in strange and mysterious ways. Take it from me. I felt the same way when I first met Moka.

(name): Really?

Tsukune: Yeah. When I first met her, I made friends with her immediately. I even liked her, but when she told me that she didn't like humans very much, I had some second thoughts. Then I learned all Moka wanted was a friend human or monster and I became that friend. Ever since then, me and Moka have been friends ever since. So don't worry about it. I'm sure Kokoa will accept you for who you are. She may be a little stubborn, but once you get to know her, she's a kind person.

(name): Thank you Tsukune. That means a lot.

Tsukune: And don't worry. I won't tell anyone that you're a human. That last thing we need is the whole school going crazy for another human getting into the school.

(name): Thanks Tsukune. You're a great friend.

Tsukune: Anytime. Now I gotta go. I'll see you tomorrow in class OK? Good luck with Kokoa.

(name): Thanks. I'll need it.

After that Tsukune left leaving you alone.

(name): Man. Tsukune's one heck of a guy. I'm glad I got him as a friend. He's right. I should just go for it and ask Kokoa out on a date.

You looked at your clock and you realized it was getting late.

(name): -yawn- I better get some sleep. I got a big day tomorrow.

You snuggled in your bed and you went to sleep.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Admit that you're a human

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Kokoa was brushing her fangs while she was thinking about you. "(Name) must be a powerful monster to do what he did earlier. I'll bet he's part of a strong line of werewolf or even vampire from all that blood he covered himself in! He's hot when he's blood lusted. But...I like him better when he's calmer. He's more charasmatic and honest. At least I can be like a "normal" person around Moka even if she's not really there. (Name) sigh what ever you turn out to be, please don't make me regret falling for you. I don't know how I'd react if you were something like a human! I'd be disgusted. Or...no! I'm a vampire, if he's my enemy or food I can't treat him differently. Ohh, (Name) please don't be human. It would kill me choosing between being in love or eating you.", Kokoa thought.

Kokoa washed her mouth and got to bed and fell asleep. Before she fell deep in her sleep she wondered a very good question that helped her know what to do if she found out your race. "If Tskune is human then why hasn't Moka eaten him? Is what I'm going through the same as her dilemma? Is that really love? "
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Facing the inevitable

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
The following morning, you woke up, got ready for class,and got ready to go for another day at school. You understood that you loved Kokoa no matter what and you were still thinking about telling Kokoa that you were a human, but you decided to wait until that day comes. The problem was that you wanted to take Kokoa out on a date, but you didn't know where. The guidebook that Yukari gave you had a lot of tips, but none of them had much interest to you. You walked in thee halls in thought thinking of where to take Kokoa. Then you ran into Mizore and Moka.

Kurumu: Hey there (name).

Moka: Oh. Good morning (name).

(name): Oh. Hey Moka. Hey Mizore.

Moka: What's up? You look deep in thought.

(name): Oh nothing. I was just thinking of a good place to go for me and Kokoa.

Mizore: Didn't Yukari give you that book to help you get some ideas?

(name): Not really. It just gave me tips about where are good romantic spots for you and your date. I'm not really good at being romantic. Hey Moka, Kokoa's your sister. You have any ideas?

Moka: Well.....let's see.....

Moka thought and she thought until she had an idea.

Moka: Here's an idea. Why don't you take her to a movie?

(name): A movie?

Mizore: Hey. That's a good idea. It is a Friday today. You can go to a movie with her this weeked. Oh! And make it a scary movie. That way when she gets scared, you'll be there to comfort her.

(name): Come on Mizore. That's the oldest gag in the book, but I will agree that taking her to a movie sounds like a good idea. It's simple and original. Yeah. I'll ask her when class is over. Thanks you guys.

Then the bell began to ring signaling you all to head for class. You all rushed to the classroom not wanting to be late. Meanwhile unbeknownst to you, the shadowy figure who was watching you before was watching again from the shadows. Then a cell phone rung in the figure's pocket. The figure pulled it out of her pocket and spoke to the person on the other end.

Figure: Sir. Yes? Yes. He hasn't told her yet. Yes. I understand. I'll keep a close eye on him. Yes. Understood. I'll keep you posted. Goodbye sir.

The figure hung up and disappeared into the darkness. Later after class, you decided to go find Kokoa and finally ask her out. Although you were really nervous.

(name): OK. Here goes. I"m gonna go up to Kokoa and ask her out. Simple as that. Damn it. Why am I getting so nervous? OK. Calm down. Just come right out and say it. OK. Just go for it! You can do it!

Then you hear a voice.

Voice: Hey there. What are you doing?

The voice made you jump a little. You turned around and you see....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The following morning

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
"Ah! Kokoa I was just uhh...", she was smiling very cute and innocent it was impossible to lie to her. "Want to go out to a movie with me?", you asked point blank.

"I'd love to. Ohhh we should see a horror one. I love the blood effects.", she said with much enthusiasm. To your surprise she wanted to go see a horror movie when you assumed otherwise. Then again she was hardcore for a vampire so it made sense. Although how were you going to handle it? Then Kokoa kissed you on the lips for a solid thirty seconds and said, "Looking forward to it."

You froze from the kiss and felt like in a perpetual state of bliss. Kokoa's lips were soft and sweet. And her lips pressed against yours felt heavenly. You really fainted for a few minutes from the shock but soon Kurumu who was passing by woke you up. "Hey lover boy wake up."

"Oh Kurumu. "

"A vampire's kiss often leads to their prey being motionless but don't take it to a new level.", Kurumu shrugged.

"Sorry I never expected it and she's-"

"No need to say. I'll just go. Hey how come you never passed out when I kissed you when we were together?!", she teased.

"I have no idea.", you replied.

"Good luck. ", she said.

You then spent the rest of the day planning and getting prepared for your date with Kokoa.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
The next day on Saturday you got ready for your date with with Kokoa. You and Kokoa had arranged to meet at the bus stop and you would take a trip to the human world. You were a little nervous about a lot of things, mostly because you were going to see a horror moviebut you were excited about going on a date with Kokoa. Not only that, but it was the first time in a month that you were going to the human world. You were currently in the shower shampooing your head thinking about your big day.

(name) thinking: OK. I gotta be calm. This is my first date and it'll be the first time in a while that I've been to the human world. I gotta remember to keep it discreet. Man I'm nervous. I just need to be calm about this. Yeah. I can do this! Go for it (name)!

After that you hopped out of the shower and dressed casually. Then you headed for the bus stop and waited for Kokoa. As you waited for Kokoa you wondered what she would be wearing and how you and which movie you and her were gonna see. Then you heard a rustling sound in the bushes. You looked to find out what it was, but you didn't see anything.

(name): That was weird. I thought I saw someone. Oh well. I'm sure it was nothing.

Sadly it wasn't because in the bushes, some certain characters were watching in the bushes. Tsukune, Moka, Kurumu, Yukari and Mizore to be exact.

Tsukune: Ow! Moka! Watch it!

Moka: Sorry Tsukune.

Kurumu: Moka. Explain to me why are we doing this?

Moka: Well I uh......

Tsukune: Well, you see Moka was worried about Kokoa because (name) finally asked her out and this'll be both their first date. So she wanted to watch over her to make sure that she was OK. And she didn't want to do it by herself so she dragged us along with her.

Moka: Tsukune You didn't have to put it that way you know

Yukari: Look Moka. I know that you're worried about Kokoa, but we shouldn't be spying on them. I feel like Mizore when she's stalking some cute boy.

Mizore: Hey! Watch it brat!

Yukari: It's the truth isn't it?!?

Moka: Keep it down you guys! (name)'s gonna hear us!

Back with you, you were still waiting for Kokoa. Then......
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The following morning

choices: had just arrived at the theather
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Just then Kokoa arrived, but when you saw her (and Tsukune and the others watching in the bushes) you could not believe your eyes. Kokoa was looking absolutely gorgeous! She was wearing a pink summer dress that looked beautiful and her hair was the same, but she was wearing hair barrettes with tiny bats on them. When you saw her, you felt your heart leap. When Tsukune and the girls saw Kokoa, all they could do was hang their mouths open and stare. Kokoa noticed you were staring at her and she blushed.

Kokoa: Is....there something wrong?

(name): No. It's just......you look wonderful.

Kokoa: Th-thank you.

Then the bus pulled up ready to transport you and Kokoa to the human world. You and Kokoa boarded the bus and were on your way to the human world. Tsukune and the gang watched until the bus was out of sight.

Yukari: Did you guys see what I just saw?

Mizore: Kokoa wearing a dress and looking cute? Yes.

Tsukune: Man. She looked absolutely cute in that dress! I wish I was on a date with Kokoa.

Moka in response gave Tsukune a nudge on his side.

Kurumu: Wow. That's the first time I've ever seen Kokoa in a dress before. Did you help her on that one Moka?

Moka: No. It's news to me. I didn't even know she had that kind of dress.

Yukari: One thing's for sure, that dress made her look smokin hot! Even (name) loved it!

Moka: (sigh). I just hope Kokoa will be OK.

Tsukune: Don't worry Moka. I'm sure she'll be fine.

Kurumu: Tsukune's right. Besides, she's got (name) protecting her.

Moka: Yeah. I guess so.

Meanwhile you and Kokoa.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kokoa (Looking absolutely cute!)

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile, you and Kokoa had arrived at the theater. You and her waited in line to purchase the tickets. There was a lot of people there mostly couples which you a little nervous and excited.

(name) thinking: Oh man! This is gonna be awesome! I'm actually going on date! I'm actually on a date with Kokoa! OK calm down. I gotta show her that I'm a cool guy. Gotta be a brave guy! After all, it is a horror movie. I gotta be a man so I can do this!

You imagined yourself sitting next to Kokoa and Kokoa getting scared. You put your arms around her and smiled at her.

(name): Don't worry Kokoa. I'm here for you my sweet.

Kokoa: Oh (name). You're so manly. Hold me tight my love.

You didn't realize it, but while you were imagining holding Kokoa, you had a stupid grin on your face. Then Kokoa tapped your shoulder snapping you out of your daydream.

Kokoa: Hey (name). We're next. Snap out of it!

(name): Oops! Hehehe. Sorry. So which movie you wanna see?

Kokoa: You need to ask? That one!

She pointed to a sign that had a picture of a man wielding a chainsaw with a bloody hockey mask chasing a woman who was screaming in terror that said "The Chainsaw Psycho Massacre." The sight of it made you gulp.

(name): Th-th-that one?

"And why should his mundane affairs concern me?"

"Because if she injects her blood with his. He will reach a level high enough that he will serve as your key to freedom. And the one he is courting has a fiery history of having a temper much like his."
