(name): Geez. I never thought it would be this insane. They must be in line for the love potions.

Kokoa: Yeah. Makes me glad that we're going out for the weekened.

Just then Moka, Tsukune came. They were the only couple that was not being lovey dovey.

Tsukune: Hey guys.

Moka: Morning (name). Kokoa.

(name) and Kokoa: Morning.

(name): What brings you guys here?

Moka: Well since Tsukune and I don't need love potions because we got each other, we figured we'd go along with you guys and see you off.

Tsukune: Yeah. Especially since every female monster is trying to get a boy using those love potions. Good thing we're all already taken.

(name): I'll say.

Kokoa: By the way big sister, where are the others?

Moka: Well.....Mizore's definitely in line getting her love potion, but I haven't seen Kurumu or Yukari.

(name): Kurumu's probably going nuts today considering Valentines is tomorrow. This holiday is right up her alley.

Kokoa: If you ask me, I just hope that she doesn't cause any more trouble. I'm still a little annoyed when she pulled that prank on us.

Tsukune: Oh yeah. I heard. So you find out what I meant the hard way huh?

You and Kokoa shuddered. You two could still well remember what Kurumu did and the thought of it made you two a little uncomfortable.

Moka: Please don't think too bad of her you two. She was just trying to help you two get closer. Although she did kinda went over the top.

(name): I'll say she did.

Kokoa: The thought of it still freaks me out.

Then the four of you arrived at the bus stop. Unbeknownst to you all the there was a certain succubus who was keeping an eye on the four of you through the bushes with Yukari right next to her.

Yukari: Kurumu! What the heck are we doing here anyway?!? Haven't you forgotten what happened the last time we tried to help (name) and Kokoa?!? Not to mention we got totally punished for it! My heads still pounding from being upside down.

Kurumu: No I haven't. I'll admit it that the plan from then was a misfire, but this time it's full proof! As the woman of love, I'll will not rest until I complete my mission!

Yukari: (sigh) So what's the plan this time?

Kurumu: That I can't say Sidekick Yukari. All I can tell you is that this plan will definitely work. Now put this on so they won't recognize us.

She threw Yukari a huge overcoat, a hat and sunglasses. Then she dressed with the same pieces of clothing.

Yukari: Why the hell do I have to wear this stuff? And how many times have I told you not to call me that?!?

Kurumu: Hurry up! The bus is pulling up! It's time to commence "Operation Cupid"!

Yukari: (sweatdrop) Why me?

Then the bus pulled up, You, Kokoa, Moka, and Kokoa said your goodbyes and you and Kokoa boarded the bus. As you both boarded, Kurumu and Yukari snuck aboard the bus when Moka and Tsukune weren't looking and then they sat in the front of the bus so you and Kokoa wouldn't notice them. Then they were on their way to the resort. Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You warn Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
A little later you and Kokoa arrived at the resort with Kurumu and Yukari close behind. When you and Kokoa saw the resort, you were both amazed. The resort was even bigger and even more amazing than you both thought. It looked more like a theme park than a resort. The building was huge and looked like a palace from a far away country.

Kokoa: Whoa! This place is amazing!

(name): No kidding! It's a good thing we got a discount before we came here otherwise we never would have been able to afford this.

Kokoa: How did you get the discount?

(name): Let's just say I know my sources for discounts. Besides, it's for you Kokoa. You're my girlfriend and my girlfriend deserves the best.

You held Kokoa's hand and kissed her on the cheek. This made Kokoa smile and she clung to your arm.

Kokoa: Oh (name). You always have to be so wishy washy. But I love it when you're wishy washy.

(name): Hahaha. Shall we get going? We gotta set up our room.

Kokoa: Yeah! Let's get going!

After that you and Kokoa get off to your hotel room. Meanwhile Kurumu and Yukari who were still wearing their disguises had just gotten off the bus saw you and Kokoa heading to the hotel. They followed you and Kokoa, but kept their distance so you and Kokoa wouldn't detect them.

Yukari: Well, I'll say this for those two, they picked a pretty swanky resort to be alone together. An expensive one at that.

Kurumu: I know. It's the perfect place for a couple to be alone together. Stay on them.

Yukari: Um Kurumu, can't we do something about the disguises? It's starting to get hot in these things.

Kurumu: Not yet Sidekick Yukari. If we take them off now, we'll look suspicious.

Yukari: Don't we look suspicious enough? I mean come on. I wouldn't be surprised if people didn't start staring at us.

Kurumu: Just hang in there! I bought a change of clothes for both of us. The moment we confirm where (name) and Kokoa are, we'll change. Until then, hang in there Sidekick Yukari.

Yukari: How many times have I.....oh why do I even bother?

With that Kurumu and Yukari continued to follow you and Kokoa to the hotel. A little later you and Kokoa got your room key and went to your room. It was a big room and looked like something from a private suite. In the center of the room there was a giant bed that had blue blankets and big fluffy pillows.

Kokoa: Whoa! Look at this place! It looks amazing!

(name): I know! It looks like a room fit for a king!

Kokoa jumped and plopped down on the bed to test the softness while you set your stuff down. Then you saw a booklet on the table. You looked at the booklet and it a list of all the events happening on the resort. There was boat rides, a steam bath, a spa, the indoor bath and even a theme park. You knew that you had to save the indoor bath for last so you had to choose another thing to do.

Kokoa: Ahhh! This bed feels soooo good!

(name): Yep. I gotta say this rooms pretty nice. Out of all the dates I've been on, I'd say this one tops them all!

Kokoa: So what should we do today? We got all day for fun.

The booklet had a lot of choices, but should you choose or should you let Kokoa choose?
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Later at the resort......

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content: Go out to eat or hang out by the swim area?
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You choose

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
(name): How about we get something to eat? It's almost lunch time. After that we can do a little sight seeing.

Kokoa: Yeah! That sounds great. I am getting a little hungry.

(name): Well then, shall we?

Kokoa: Yeah!

And with that you and Kokoa left in search for a restaurant to eat at. You looked around and tried to find a place to take Kokoa. It had to be a place that served good food, but wasn't like a fast food joint. You both took a look around and then you saw a restaurant. It looked fancy and had the words that made you and Kokoa mouths water a little. "All you can buffet."

Kokoa: Hey! It's an all you can eat buffet over there! Let's go (name)!

(name): OK, OK. Hahaha. It's not gonna go anywhere.

Kokoa: Who cares! An all you can eat buffet is perfect for us! We can eat till our hearts content! Come on! Come on! Let's go! (grabs your arm and yanks you along)

(Name): Yai! Slow down Kokoa!

And with Kokoa dragging your arm, you and her went to the restaurant to eat. Meanwhile....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: food

choices: You were both went sight seeing
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile, two certain figures in their disguises walked into the room that was about two doors down from you and Kokoa's room. As soon as they walked in, they took off their disguises and Yukari plopped down on the bed while Kurumu sat in a chair.

Yukari: Whew! It's great to be out of those crazy disguises!

Kurumu: Yeah. At least we have a place to crash thanks to yours truly.

Yukari: The only reason why we were able to get this room was because you used your succubus powers to seduce that guy for giving us the key.

Kurumu: Regardless, now we have a base of operations and I can work on my plan.

Yukari: Speaking of which, shouldn't we be following (name) and Kokoa? I mean....

Kurumu: No need. Those two are going out to eat and sight seeing. They won't be back till later. Besides I need to work on the key thing to make this plan work.

Kurumu then rummaged through her bag and pulled out a few bottles and a few spices and pulled out a big bottle with a heart on the top.

Yukari: What the heck is all that stuff?!?

Kurumu: The ingredients for the key component to my plan. Without this there's no way that this plan will fail.

Yukari had no idea what the ingredients Kurumu bought with her, but then she looked at the bottle with the heart on it and immediately recognized what the bottle was.

Yukari: Kurumu! Isn't that the love potion from school?!?

Kurumu: Indeed it is Sidekick Yukari.

Yukari Oh come on! Kurumu that's the oldest trick in the book! Besides (name) and Kokoa are already in love with each other. Why would you...

Kurumu: Cool your jets Sidekick Yukari. I'm well aware of all that. That's why I brought these extra ingredients along.

Yukari: Wait a sec. Why would you need all that? Unless.....oh no. Don't tell me you're gonna....

Kurumu: Now you're catching on. I'm going to change the effects of the love potion to make (name) and Kokoa go crazy for each other. Once they get some of this potion, they'll be all over each other like crazy and their cherries will definitely be popped! Hahaha! I'm a genius!

Yukari: Are you sure that's a good idea? I mean there's no telling what would happen if you modify the potion.

Kurumu: Come on Sidekick Yukari. Have a little faith. I'm a succubus. I've got lots of experience with potions. Especially the love kind. Hehehe. This is gonna be great! This plan is definitely gonna work! Operation Cupid will succeed! Hahaha!

Yukari: Oh boy. I've got a bad feeling about all of this.

Meanwhile back with you and Kokoa......
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kurumu and Yukari......

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile back with you and Kokoa, you both just had left the restaurant with full bellies. (Kokoa mostly)

(Name): Man. That food was great.

Kokoa: You're telling me. I can't believe I ate all that food.

(name): Well yeah. You ate about like seven plates. I'm surprised you haven't gotten sick from eating all that food.

Kokoa: Well, it was an all you can eat buffet. Hahaha. I was hungry.

(name): Well now that we've eaten, shall we do some sight seeing? We've got all day to have fun.

Kokoa: Yeah! Let's go! I wanna go to the theme park! Let's go! (hugs your arm and pulls you along)

(name): Hey! Hahaha, Here we go again.

Kokoa Shuzen Shiroi Honoo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZNPE5dEp...

Then you and Kokoa went to the theme park. You both had fun going on different rides and playing different games. You both went on roller coasters, bumper cars, and played some games too. In a game you won Kokoa a prize by knocking over the bottles. The prize was a giant stuffed bat. Kokoa squealed with glee and she gave you a big hug. Later you and her took a walk around the resort and saw the sights. The resort even had a gift ship which Kokoa had to shop in. There were knick knacks, accessories, and even clothes. Kokoa took some clothes and modeled for you. The ones that you liked she bought. Then she picked some clothes for you to put on and wanted you to model some clothes too. At first you declined, but then Kokoa convinced you convinced you to try some on and you modeled some clothes Kokoa. Whatever outfits that Kokoa liked she bought. A few moments later you and Kokoa came out with bags.

(music ends)

Kokoa: Whew! That was a lot for fun!

(name): Yeah. We sure did a lot today.

Then you looked up at the sky and saw that the sun was setting meaning it was getting late.

(name): We should probably get back to our room. It's getting late.

Kokoa: Awww come on. Let's do one more thing before we go back. Pretty please? With sugar on top?

Kokoa made the cutest pleading face. Not even you could resist something that adorable.

(name): OK. OK. Hahaha. How could I say no to that face? What did you have in mind?

Kokoa looked around. Then she saw it.

Kokoa: There!

You looked to where Kokoa was pointing at and there in the corner on the gift shop was a photo booth.

(name): A photo booth?

Kokoa: Yeah! I want to commemorate this moment with some photos. That way I can show big sister and so I can remember this date.

(name): OK then. Let's do it.

Then you and Kokoa went inside the booth together and took some photos. First you and Kokoa took one of you two hugging, then making funny faces, and then another one with you two with your best smiles.

(name): OK.I think we have more time for one more.

Kokoa: Let's make this one really special!

(name): OK. Get ready.....3, 2, 1, chee....

Before you could finish, Kokoa surprised you by kissing you on the cheek as the camera took your photo. Needless to say, you were surprised. You felt your cheek from where Kokoa kissed you and blushed beet red.

(name): K-kokoa.....did you just....

Kokoa giggled and stuck out her tongue mischievously.

Kokoa: I told you this one would be special. (winks)

(name): Hahaha. Since when have you been so assertive?

Kokoa: Since now.

After you and Kokoa got your pictures, you both headed back to your rooms. When you both got back, you both plopped into the bed exhausted.

Kokoa: Whew. (name)? I've been on a lot of with you.....well not many dates, but this one has been the best date ever so far.

(name): Yeah me too. I had a lot of fun today too.

Kokoa: Can't wait till tomorrow. What should we do tomorrow?

(name): Well......let me think. Well....how about the pool? We could always go swimming.

Kokoa: Um......I don't think that's a good idea. I'm not to thrilled about pools.

(name): Why not? Do you hate swimming or something?

Kokoa: No it's not that. It's just that.....pure water can hurt me. You see vampires are weak in water. Water has an adverse effect on vampires so I can't swim in water.

(name): Oh. I'm sorry. I didn't know that.

Kokoa: But don't worry. I can be in water as long as I put this in.

Then Kokoa went through her bag and pulled out a big bottle of shampoo that smelled like herbs.

(name): What's this? Some kind of shampoo?

Kokoa: You should say that. This is filled with medicinal herbs that allows me to go into water, but I can't just go putting my herbs in a public pool and stuff. People would think I'm crazy or something and they'll figure out about me being a vampire.

(name): Well, you're a little off on the "figuring out about the vampire" thing, but you're are right about the "putting the herbs in the pool" part.. OK then. We can skip the pool, but we have to find somewhere to go tomorrow. But where?

You sat up trying to get an idea what to do for tomorrow. Then you saw something on the table. It was a flyer that had large letters that said: "Feeling tired and want to relax? Try our indoor bath and spa for couples!"

(name): Hey. How about this?

You showed Kokoa the flyer and when she saw it, her eyes lit up with excitement.

Kokoa: Oh yeah! The indoor bath! We can do that!

(name): And we can be by ourselves and you can use the herbs so you won't be in pain.

Then Kokoa gave you a big hug and a kiss.

Kokoa: Thank you (name)! Thank you for being so understanding. You're the best! The bestest boyfriend I ever had.

(name): Awww shucks Kokoa.

You hugged Kokoa back and petted her head. Then you heard Kokoa yawn and you yawned as well.

(name): Sounds like we both a little sleepy.

Kokoa: Yeah. Let's get some sleep. You mind if I sleep with you?

(name): Well....there is one bed and since were a couple....why not?

Then you and Kokoa got dressed in your PJs, got into bed and went to sleep. Meanwhile...

Yukari  asks about that picture of you to Kurumu the next morning
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
"It's ready sidekick Yukari! The potion is ready and by now the flyers will have enticed them to make it on to their to do list. Those two love birds are going to be hitting the beds faster than they can say 'where first'."

"Stop calling me that name already. Now we just need to wait till tomorrow and then they can get feisty."

"But there's only one problem...we need someone to take a single drop to be 100% it works. It'll send the drinker to a quick but sexy frenzy of pure lust with whoever they see. But we forgot the test subject on our way here.", Kurumu said.

"Don't look at me I'm too young.", Yukari suggested.

"Ugh! No way, wait wheres Tskune and Moka?"

"Not here doofus. How about you do it? See a random cutie and just go crazy you'll work fast in more ways than one."

"I don't think that's wise it might last longer on me being a succubus and I won't screw a kid."

"Well how about a picture? From our old yearbook hows that?"

"A picture would suffice for the drinker but again I won't drink it it's too dangerous."

"C'mon you made it you'll be fine.", Yukari took a tiny teaspoon and tried feeding it to Kurumu.

"Yukari no stop!", Kurumu backed away.

"Hang on here's a picture of some guys none of them are here and I'll tie you down. Now take your medicine like a good girl.", she went through a few random pictures and saw the boys section on the year book. She stopped at a random page and using her magic from a foot away forced the teaspoon down Kurumu's mouth.

"Yukar-mmph!", she gagged after swallowing the potion.

"See someone you like?", Yukari looked down to notice a picture bookmarking the yearbook.

"(Name)?"

"(Name)? Oh shit nuggets.", Yukari looked to see a picture of (Name) being the book mark.

"(Name)! I want you inside me! I peeked into your heart I know were meant to be I'll prove myself to be your lover just release our sexual tension my darling.", she ranted. Yukari used her most powerful spell of containment on Kurumu and it held her. Yukari managed to restrain Kurumu and she wasn't very resisting despite her lust. In fact she mis-took it for sex. "Ohh trying to punish me oh yes do it more I'm getting sooooooo horny."

"Hopefully it's not as effective on them. Kurumu's reaction is exaggerated but at least it works." A half hour passed and Yukari managed to stop Kurumu until the effects wore off.

"Huh? Yukari?! What the hell?! I nearly went after (Name)! You nearly ruined everything.", Kurumu said back to normal.

"Well we know it works so lets get some shut eye and argue in the morning. Good night and pleasant wet dreams Kurumu."

"Ha ha.", she replied sarcastically. In her head Kurumu now felt suddenly attracted to you after having taken that potion. She spent the rest of the night trying to block you out but hoped it was just the potion playing tricks on her still as a side effect.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kurumu completes her love potion.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
The following morning Kurumu and Yukari woke up and began making preperations for your special bath. They got up early to make certain they spiked the bath at the correct time. They went on stakeout starting around 7 thinking that you two would be awake soon. An hour and a half passed and Yukari was bored so she decided to make small talk. "Hey Kurumu why do you have a photo of (Name)?"

"Uhh no reason."

"Liar. You still like him don't you?"

"No I don't. I want him with Kokoa."

"But you DID like him before. C'mon you have to. And what was that about looking in his heart?"

"Ugh fine. I admit I still like him a lot and I keep the picture because he was my first boyfriend. But I want him with Kokoa and nothings compelling me to ruin that for them. OK me and him are done end of story. I wanted you not to do that but you shoved it in my face last night. And about looking in his heart...I ounce used my charm on him. But only for fun cuz he was curious of how it felt."

"OK OK I get it. Yeesh a girl can get tired of all the lovey dovey stuff. When this is over I'm moving to Germany."

"Oh please it's so much more interesting and you'll appreciate it one day."

"I think I'll be sick of it by the time my boobs get big enough."

"Shhhhhh I think they're coming.", they hid beside a rack of towels and peeped to see who was coming through the door.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Yukari  asks about that picture of you to Kurum...

choices: A woman who was doing maintinance
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Kurumu and Yukari waited from behind the rack of towels ready to use the potion. They expected to see you and Kokoa, but unfortunately it was another couple. A young man and an older woman walked past as they entered the bath.

Kurumu: Huh? I thought for sure that (name) and Kokoa would be here by now.

Yukari: I wonder where they are.

Kurumu suddenly remembered and when she did she face palmed herself.

Kurumu: Aww crap! I forgot! (name) and Kokoa are going to the spa! They're gonna save the bath for last!

Yukari: Oh man! What do we do?

Kurumu: What else? Go to the spa and get them there! Come on Sidekick Yukari!

Yukari: Hey wait for me! And stop calling me that!

Kurumu raced out of the bath with Yukari close behind. Meanwhile back with you and Kokoa, you both had left your room and were heading toward the spa. Both of you were excited.

Kokoa: Ooooh! I can't wait! That spa is calling my name!

(name): I know. I'm pumped too! I wonder what should we try first when we get there?

Kokoa: Who cares? I'm gonna try every single thing there! Come on (name)! The spa is just up ahead!

(name): Hahaha! OK, OK! Just don't drag me again!

You and Kokoa went inside and were blown away by the inside. It was illuminated and spacious with brown and maroon red tones. The floor was tile and the were sofas the size of beds. There was also the sound of music that you and Kokoa couldn't make out, but you both felt relaxed hearing it. Then you were both greeted by a group of women wearing kimonos. Needless to say, you and Kokoa were a little surprised. A woman from the group stepped forward.

Woman: Welcome. I welcome you to our spa.

You and Kokoa bowed back in respect.

(name) and Kokoa: Thanks for having us.

Woman: A party for two? Right this way.

She led you both down the hall as you both examined the interior of the spa. You were blown away by how beautiful it looked.

Kokoa: Wow. This place is amazing!

(name): You're telling me. I've never been to spa before, but even I see that this place is terrific!

Then the woman in front of two rooms and gave you both keys.

Woman: Please change in here. The girls room is to the right and the boys is to the left. I will wait for you both outside.

You and Kokoa both went into the separate rooms to change. When you both came back you were wearing a black bathrobe and Kokoa red.

(name): Man. I've never worn a bathrobe before. It feels so comfy,

Kokoa: Yeah. It's like a I'm wearing a fluffy cloud.

Woman: Please come this way. The spa is just right this way.

You and Kokoa followed eager to get the spa trip started. Unbeknownst to either of you, our two characters were spying on the both of you as you both left.

Kurumu: OK. We found them. Now all we gotta do follow them and when the moment strikes, we spike em with the potion!

Yukari: But how are gonna do that without them catching us? I thought we were supposed to get them to drink it.

Kurumu: That's true, but it can also work through skin contact. Think about it. Since we can't get the potion to them through drinking it, we're gonna put the potion in Kokoa's herbs instead. Since (name) and Kokoa are gonna be bathing together, they're gonna get covered with the potion.

Yukari: I get it! But how are we gonna get to the herbs? Kokoa's probably got them locked up or something.

Kurumu: That's were you come in Sidekick Yukari. You'll use your magic to unlock Kokoa's locker so we can get her herbs.

Yukari: Are you sure this'll work? I mean what if we get caught?

Kurumu: Don't worry. We won't now come on, before (name) and Kokoa get back.

Kurumu and Yukari then sneaked into the girls side. They looked around to make sure no one was around. Luckily there was no one to be seen. Then they looked at the lockers trying to find Kokoa's locker. After a few minutes they found it.

Kurumu: OK Sidekick Yukari. Do your stuff!

Yukari: Would stop calling me....oh forget it.

Yukari waved her wand, chanted a spell, and Kokoa's locker unlocked. Then Kurumu took out the love potion bottle and Kokoa's herbs. Then she poured potion into the herbs. The herbs at first changed color from green to pink and emitted a puff of smoke. The smoke changed into a heart and then color of the herbs returned to normal.

Kurumu: Yes! We did it! Mission accomplished! Now all we have to do is let the potion do it's magic!

Yukari: Now let's beat it before Kokoa comes back.

Kurumu quickly put the herbs back and Yukari relocked Kokoa's locker using her magic. Then they both raced out of the locker room when suddenly, they heard footsteps coming towards them.

Kurumu: Oh crap! Someone's coming!

Yukari: Quick hide!

Kurumu and Yukari looked around to find a hiding place. Then Kurumu saw an open locker. She immediately grabbed Yukari and pulled her into the open locker. They hid inside and held their breath. They see the person who came in which was.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: False alarm

choices: the entrance to the indoor  bath....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
It was a woman doing maintenance. She was making sure that everything was in good order and neat and tidy. Kurumu and Yukari stayed in hidden so they wouldn't get caught. Kurumu shifted to try to get herself comfortable, but then she accidentally stepped on Yukari's foot. Yukari was about to scream in pain, but Kurumu shoved her face in her chest to muffle the noise. Luckily the woman didn't hear her. After the woman was done she left, leaving Kurumu and Yukari in the clear. They stepped out of the locker and breathed a sigh of relief.

Kurumu: Whew. That was close.

Yukari: Geez! Kurumu! You're giant milk jugs almost suffocated me in there! Not to mention you stepped on my foot!

Kurumu: Sorry, there was no time.

Yukari: So what do we do now? Since we managed to put some love potion in the herbs?

Kurumu: Now we wait and watch.

Yukari: You mean we have to stalk (name) and Kokoa again?

After that Kurumu and Yukari left the locker room. Meanwhile back with you and Kokoa, you both being lead by the hostess of the spa to an area where there were many places to relax.

Woman: Now this is where I leave you both. Feel free to relax and let me know if you need anything.

(name) and Kokoa: Thank you very much.

After that the hostess left leaving you and Kokoa alone.

Kokoa: Oh wow! There are so many things here!

(name): It's hard to tell what to go for first. I don't know which to choose.

Kokoa: They even have a jacuzzi in here! Too bad I can't use it.

(name): Don't worry. We'll save anything water related later. Hey look! They have masseusses too!

Kokoa: Wow! I could use one of those! My shoulders have been feeling stiff all day.

(name): Well then, how about we stop staring and let's starting relaxing already?

Kokoa: Yeah! Let's go!

Then you and Kokoa's escapade for relaxation began (with Kurumu and Yukari watching from a distance). You both headed from the massuesses first. They had you lie on your backs and they massaged your backs. At first it hurt you a bit since you never had a massage before, but then your tension went away like magic. Kokoa on the other hand sighed happily as the masseuse massaged her back and her calves, Next you both tried spa masks. At first you declined because you thought the spa mask was a bit to feminine for you, but Kokoa talked you into it. You both had masks all over your faces and sat in chairs letting the masks do their job. Then Kokoa had her hands massages and her fingernails painted. You sat in the chair while you had your legs massaged and had your shoulders massaged.

(name): (sigh) This feels good. Who would've thought a spa mask would feel so good?

Kokoa: I told you you'd like it. (sigh) I feel like I'm in heaven.

"I mean it's not impossible to fix just give me a few days and you guys can decide to go back to normal."

"Dammit Kurumu! So what now?! We stay in separate rooms?"

"Wouldn't matter you'd draw each other like magnets to metal until you stuck to each other. We'll watch you guys overnight so you don't go crazy."

"Good cuz I'm not ready to go on having moods swings, an attitude, and getting angry at nothing all the time!", Kokoa said.

"You mean you were expecting a child all year?", Yukari joked.

Kokoa threw a lamp at Yukari with Yukari running away to go try and get started on the potion. "I'm really sorry guys I was only trying to help you.", Kurumu apologized.

"Save it. Just let us get some rest while you guys fix this mess.", you said.

"I'll just wait in the bathroom and come out if I hear you two, you know."

"Yeah we get it.", Kokoa said.

As soon as Kurumu left you whispered to Kokoa, "You think maybe we wanted to do that but we just were too scared to try it?"

"Maybe. Honestly I don't think I'd have minded them doing what they did that much if it hadn't led to us being forced to do it against our will now. But I don't agree with them doing at all in the first place either."

"I was thinking the same thing almost. But Kokoa, do you think about having one day..."

"Yes. But I don't want to go there yet. I'm too full of energy to settle down right now. I'd die a little inside even though it would be wonderful. But some day, not today (Name)."

"Your right. Goodnight."

"Goodnight."

You two slept back to back so you wouldn't feel more tempted to have sex. For the next six hours Kurumu kept you two from doing it simply by unleashing her succubi charms forcing you both to sleep in order to please her. It was only a temporary solution as her charms while powerful couldn't last. Every time you two would try she'd come out of the bathroom used her charms and you two would be head over heels for her and sleep as she commanded. Kurumu got very tired but morning came and Yukari was actually almost done. Faster than Kurumu predicted, she was only a few minutes away from finishing an antidote and called Kurumu to tell her the good news.

"Hey I'm almost done. Should be ready within the hour."

"Oh thank god. I can't take it anymore."

"Don't worry sidekick Kurumu just hold out a bit longer and your blunder will be annulled."

"Ha ha.", Kurumu laugh sarcastically.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
A little later, you all were heading for the bus on your way back to the Yokai. Yukari had finished the antidote and you and Kokoa were back to normal. You and Kokoa were still a little mad at first, but you and her realized that Kurumu had good intentions so you both forgave her. When it was time to leave, you all packed up your things and left the resort. Meanwhile back at Yokai Academy, a certain pair had just arrived for the bus eager to greet you and Kokoa at the bus stop.

Moka: I can't wait! (name) and Kokoa are coming back today!

Tsukune: I know! I can't wait to hear how their trip went.

Moka: Yeah. I wish Kurumu and Yukari were here with us. I wonder where they went?

Tsukune: Who knows? Hey. Maybe they hitched a ride to the resort and decided to play cupid with (name) and Kokoa again. Hahaha.

Moka: Oh dear. I sure hope those two aren't causing trouble.

Tsukune: Come on Moka, you worry too much. I was just kidding. Besides what are the odds of that happening?

Moka: Yeah you're right. Hahaha.

Then Moka could see the bus coming. The bus pulled up and you and Kokoa came out of the bus. Moka and Tsukune welcomed them back with open arms.

Moka: Oh Kokoa! I'm so glad you're back.

Kokoa: Hi big sister!

Tsukune: Welcome back you two!

(name): Thanks Tsukune. It's good to be back.

Moka: Complications?

Tsukune: What do you mean?

You and Kokoa pointed behind them and Tsukune and Moka looked to see Kurumu and Yukari who came out of the bus smiling awkwardly.

Tsukune and Moka: WHAAAAATTT?!?!?!?!?

Then as they headed back to the dorms. you and Kokoa explained what happened.

Tsukune: Oh man. So those two decided to play cupid again?

(name): That's pretty much the sum of it.

Moka: Oh dear. I guess Tsukune called right on the dot about Kurumu and Yukari.

Tsukune: Man. You two never learn do you?

Kurumu and Yukari: We're sorry. For the umpteenth time we're so sorry.

Moka: Well there's one good thing that came out of it.

Kokoa: What's that big sister?

Moka: You and (name) are now even closer than you both were before. Not to mention you finally got experience what "it" felt like. Right?

You and Kokoa both looked at each other and blushed bright pink.

Kokoa: Well....um....yeah. I guess we did.

(name) Although I wish we weren't under the influence with the love potion to do it.

Tsukune: I agree with Moka. You both were so scared when you found out what "it" was, but now it's different. (name), I think you've become more manly these days.

(name): Really? You think so?

Tsukune: Uh-huh. I know so man.

Then as you walked past the gate entering the school, Kokoa tugged at your sleeve to get your attention.

Kokoa: (name)? Can I ask you something when we have a chance to be alone?

(name): Why can't you ask me now?

Kokoa: Because I don't want big sister or anyone else to overhear us. The last thing we need to have two certain people to be playing cupid again.

(name): Good point. I'll see you soon OK?

Kokoa: K. See you in class (name).

Later everyone went back to their dorms to get ready for school. You went back to your room to get your stuff in order. When you got back you placed your stuff at your desk and plopped down on the bed.

(name): -sigh- It's good to be back. Course it sucks that I have to go back to school and stuff. Oh right. I gotta make sure everyone gets their souvenirs when I get back to class today.

You looked through your bags trying to find the bag with the souvenirs you got for Tsukune and the others. As you went through them you pulled out an envelope. It contained the pictures you and Kokoa took. You chuckled as you went through them. Then you stopped at the one where Kokoa was kissing you on the cheek. You couldn't help, but smile and at the same time blush from seeing that photo. You also remembered what Tsukune said about you being more manly.

(name): Hahaha. I guess have become more manly haven't I? I sure am lucky to have a girl like Kokoa.

Then you got dressed in your school uniform, got your bag with souvenirs for Tsukune and the others and went to class. Unbeknownst to you, the figure appeared again. It watched as you headed to class with a smile on your face. Then it disappeared in the darkness.

You looked at the letter having a sense of worry and dread swirling inside you. You opened the letter and inside were two items. One was a letter and the other was the keychain that you gave to Kokoa on your first date. The letter said only said these words. "I'm sorry. Don't look for me." You stared at the letter in shock and we're at a complete loss for words. That letter could only mean one thing. Kokoa was breaking up with you and she didn't want to see you anymore. Moka seeing the look on your face got a feeling what the letter was about.

Moka: Guys. Let's leave (name) alone for a bit. Let's go look for Kokoa in the meantime.

Tsukune: But why Moka?

Kurumu: Yeah. I was gonna stay with (name) a while....

Moka: Kurumu.

Moka spoke in a sharp tone that wasn't like her. She gave everyone a serious look and shook her head. Everyone understood what Moka meant. Then they all left the room leaving you alone. You held the letter and the key chain in your hands and you squeezed them tightly.

(name): I knew it. I knew it. I didn't want to believe it, but I knew it. I actually thought I had some hope that Kokoa would accept me for who I am, but.....I guess not. And now.....I'll never see her again.

Music begins
Be as one by W-inds
( Japanese https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qFriMHoJ...
( English Fandub https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qFriMHoJ...)

Flashbacks of you and Kokoa ran through your mind. You remembered back to when you first met her. Then the time you and her went on your first date together. The time that you and were trapped in the cave in your coat. You even remembered when you two had a great time at the resort. But the one flashback you remembered that made you so sad was when you were lying down with Kokoa back when you were recovering from your fight with Tadashi and his goons.

-Flashback- (Credit goes to kevkane191
Kokoa: (Name), whatever you do. Promise me that no matter what, never change a thing about yourself for me. Because it was all those things that made me fall for you in the first place ounce I got to know you.
-Flashback ends-

(Music at 1:22)

Remembering that made you even sadder. The flashback alone made seem that Kokoa had lied to you, but you knew it was your fault. As you sat there feeling sorry for yourself a single tear fell from your face and landed on the key chain.

(name): Why Kokoa......why? I though that you said that you loved me for who I was? But.....I guess......I'm just a human in her eyes. I'm pathetic.

Tears streamed down your face as you fell into despair. You put your face in her hands and cried. Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Tsukune gives you Kokoa's keychain and a le...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Then Slave came out from the shadows. He had seen the whole thing and thought that it was the perfect time to take advantage of you in your vulnerable state.

Slave thinking: Now to begin phase two.

Then Slave waved his hands and he changed his face using his magic so you couldn't recognize him. He had taken the attire of an old man. Meanwhile you were still crying. You were sad because thanks to you being a human and not telling Kokoa right, you would never see Kokoa again. You wanted her with you again. You were willing to do anything to see her and make her love you again, but you didn't know how to. Then you heard a voice which belonged to Slave.

Slave: Poor boy. Poor poor boy. Looks like you have a very serious problem. I wish there was something I could do. In fact, there is something.

You looked up and when you saw Slave, you couldn't help but feel a little scared.

(name): Who....who are you?

Slave: Don't be scared. I saw everything that transpired and I couldn't help but feel sorry for you. I represent someone who can help you. Someone who can make all your dreams come true. Someone who can make your former lover fall in love with you again. Just imagine, you and your vampire girl. Together. Forever.

(name): I.......I don't understand.

Slave: Don't you see? The solution to your problem is simple. The only way to get what you want is to become a monster yourself.

You gasped at this sudden realization.

Slave: Come with me and me and my master can make it happen for you. All you have to do is say yes.

Slave did have a point thought. If you became a monster, Kokoa would love you again. But it seemed too good to be true so you turned him away.

(name): Me? A monster? I....I....no....no I couldn't. Get out! Leave me alone!

Then you threw the key chain at Slave, but he caught it with fast reflexes.

Slave: Suit yourself then. It was only just a suggestion.

Slave then put the key chain on the desk next to you and began walking out of the room. You looked at the key chain and thought about Slave's offer. Even though it was a crazy offer, you were willing to do anything to be with Kokoa again. This could be your last chance. You thought about it then you made your decision.

(name): Wait.

Hearing your voice, Slave smiled evilly to himself and turned around.

Slave: Yes?

(name): Can you really help me? Can you and this master of yours really turn me into a monster so Kokoa can love me again?

Slave: Yes. I can.

(name): I'll do it. Please take me with you.

Slave smiled. His plan had worked. He extended his hand and you shook hands with him to seal the deal. Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The power of temptation

choices: Moka and the others were still looking for Kokoa.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
As soon as you touched Slave's hand, you felt really weak for some reason. Your vision began to get blurry and you couldn't stand up. You fell to your knees trying to stay on your feet.

(name): What's......going on......feeling.......very........weak......

Slave: Do not worry yourself. Just sleep for now.

Then you fell over unconscious. Slave returned to his normal form and laughed with triumph.

Slave: I finally did it. The boy is ours. Now I just have to get him back to the hideout. Unfortunately I used most of my magic so I can forget teleporting back to the hideout. I better do it the old fashioned way. It may take longer, but at least it'll get the job done. Please be patient master. Your resurrection is almost at hand.

Slave hoisted you up and put you over his shoulder. Then he quietly opened the window and jumped with you on his shoulder. Surprisingly he was able to lift you with ease. He landed safely on the ground and headed for the forest.

Meanwhile....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Slave knocks you out

choices: She sees Slave carrying you away
She heads for your room to find that you weren't there.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile Moka and the others were still looking for Kokoa. They split up and searched at the school hoping that she hadn't left the school yet. They searched high and they searched low, but they couldn't find any sign of her anywhere. Kurumu and Mizore stopped to rest by the hall near the vending machine.

Kurumu: Man. This sucks. We couldn't find her anywhere.

Mizore: Yeah. It's like trying to find a needle in a haystack.

Then Inner Moka, Tsukune, and Yukari came up to them.

Tsukune: Hey you guys. Any luck yet?

Mizore: No. And we pretty much looked everywhere around the school.

Yukari: Man. I don't even know if Kokoa's in around Yokai anymore. She probably....

Yukari didn't finish her sentence, but everyone else knew what she was going to say. Kurumu let out a groan of exasperation and anger.

Kurumu: Grrr!! Kokoa that stupid idiot! When I see her, I'm gonna give her a piece of my mind!

Tsukune: Kurumu take it easy. I understand you're upset, but you need to calm down.

Kurumu: Calm down?!? Tsukune, Kokoa did something totally messed up and what's worse she practically gave (name) a break up letter!

Mizore: I'm with her on this one Tsukune. She did kinda do something messed up.

Yukari: Poor (name). The guy's probably feeling depressed broken heart right now.

Inner Moka: Enough. Standing here feeling worried or angry isn't gonna do anything. If you got time to chat, you got time to look. Keep looking. We have to find her so I can get some sense into that idiot of a sister.

Kurumu: OK. OK.

Mizore: Guess we should keep looking then,

Yukari: In the meantime, I'm gonna go check on (name) to see of how he's holding up.

Then Kurumu, Mizore, and Yukari went back to search some more, Tsukune was about to follow suit, but Moka stopped him by grabbing his shoulder.

Inner Moka: Tsukune. Come with me.

Tsukune: But Moka weren't we gonna look for Kokoa?

Inner Moka: We are.

Tsukune: Wait a minute. You know where she is?

Inner Moka: Just call it sister's intuition. Now come on.

(name): OK then.

Then Inner Moka and Tsukune set off to find Kokoa. Back with Yukari, she was on her way back to your room to try and comfort you. Or at least try to cheer you up. Before she went to your room she bought a canned tea to make you feel better.

Yukari: I just hope (name) likes peach tea. I sure do.

Then as soon as Yukari bought some tea for you.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Moka and the others were still looking for Koko...

choices: Kurumu and Mizore come in the room.
Yukari sees Slave carrying you outside the window
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Yukari had just arrived in your room. She quietly knocked on your door just in case if you were sleeping.

Yukari: (name)? You thirsty? I bought you some tea.

There was no answer. Yukari knocked again.

Yukari: (name)? I know that you're still feeling sad about what happened, but you gotta to try to cheer up.

Still there was no answer. At first Yukari thought that you were sleeping, but then realized something. It was quiet in your room. Not just any kind of quiet. Deathly quiet. She slowly reached for the knob and prepared to enter the room.

Yukari: (name)? I'm coming in.

Then she opened the door. When she looked in she looked to see if you were alright. She came into your room to find that it was completely empty. The window was open and the only thing that was even a little dischevled was your bed. And to add to that, you were no where to be seen.

Yukari: What the..... (name)? (name)? (name)? Where are you?

She looked around, but she couldn't find you anywhere. Then she looked on the floor and saw your keychain. She picked it up and began to worry.

Yukari: (name)? (name)? If this is your idea of a joke it's not funny.

No one answered.

Yukari: Oh no. (name)'s gone! Did he run away? Or was he kidnapped or something?

Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: She heads for your room to find that you weren&...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Then Kurumu and Mizore came into the room.

Kurumu: Hey Yukari. (name)? You guys in here?

Mizore: We thought that we come in and....

Then they stopped. They surveyed the scene that laid before them.

Mizore: What the hell?

Kurumu: What's going on here? Yukari where's (name)?

Yukari turned to look at Kurumu and Mizore. She looked like she was on the brink of tears.

Yukari: Guys......(name)'s gone.

Kurumu and Mizore: Gone?!?

Kurumu: What do you mean he's gone?!? He was sitting in this room wasn't he?

Yukari: I don't know. I just came here and I found his room like this. The only thing I found was (name)'s keychain to Kokoa.

Kurumu: OK. Calm down Yukari. Stay calm. Maybe (name) left the room to go use the bathroom or something.

Mizore: I doubt that.

Yukari: Wait a sec. Let me check something.

Yukari took out her wand and waved it on the floor. A magic symbol appeared on the floor and then the room was filled with a glowing blue light on the floor. Then footprints began appearing on the floor. It looked like something from a crime scene in a detective show.

Kurumu: Yukari what are you doing?

Yukari: I'm using a spell to show the footprints in the room. If someone really kidnapped (name), we'll find their footprints here.

Mizore: I get it. That's a pretty smart trick kid.

Kurumu: But how will we know which foot prints are which? There's a ton of them in here.

Yukari: Don't worry. My wand can also detect which footprints are a friend's and which one's are an enemy's. So if someone came in here we'll find their footprint.

Yukari let her wand hover around the footprints. Most of the footprints were their own footprints and a few were the nurses, but then Yukari's wand began to glow and then the footprint it was on changed from blue to green.

Yukari: Aha! My wand got something!

Kurumu: Really?!?

Then other footprints that were just like the one Yukari found began changing colors as well. The footprints lead across the room and led out the window to the ground below.

Yukari: Oh no. It's just as we feared. Someone took (name). And whoever took was pretty sneaky.

Kurumu: No......we gotta go and look for him!

Mizore: Yeah. We should go outside and look to where the trail leads.

Yukari: Hold on you guys. Moka and Tsukune are still looking for Kokoa. Shouldn't we tell them what's going on first?

Kurumu: OK. Here's what we'll do. Yukari, you and Mizore follow the trail of footprints and see where they lead. I'll fly around and find Tsukune and Moka. Hopefully they found Kokoa by now.

Mizore and Yukari: Right!

Kurumu then sprouted her wings and took off into the sky to search for Tsukune and Moka in the sky. Back with.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kurumu and Mizore come in the room.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Back with Moka and Tsukune, they were walking just outside the school and heading for the bus stop.

Tsukune: Moka. Are you sure you know where Kokoa is? I doubt that she would come over here.

Inner Moka: Like I said Tsukune. It's sisterly instinct. Just trust me on this one.

Tsukune: OK. Whatever you say.

Then a colony of bats flew past them. As they flew by, something hard and metal landed on Tsukune's head.

Tsukune: Ow! What the...!

Inner Moka: Tsukune? What is it?

Tsukune: It's nothing. Something just landed on my head that's all.

Tsukune to see what hit him. To his surprise, there lying next to him on the ground was a can of tomato juice.

Tsukune: What the...? Moka! Look what fell.

Tsukune picked up the can and showed it to Moka. When she saw it, she raised one of her eyebrows in surprise.

Inner Moka: A can of tomato juice? Where did this come from?

Tsukune: I don't know. This landed on my head when that colony bats flew by earlier. I wonder where that came from?

Tsukune and Moka looked around to see where it the can came from. Then Moka saw something. There was a bat flying in the sky, but it was carrying a bag full of something. It was a miracle that the bat even high in the sky carrying the bag. Inner Moka. When Tsukune saw the bat as well, he nearly fell in surprise.

Tsukune: What the heck?!? What kind of bat carries a bag like that?!?

Inner Moka: Only one bat I know. Tsukune, Get ready to catch.

Tsukune: Wait. Moka what are you....?

Suddenly Moka gave a powerful kick. The air pressure came straight at the bat and scored a direct hit. The bat lost control and began losing altitude. It tried to stay in the air, but the bag was too heavy. Tsukune immediately ran toward the bag with his hands open. The bag and the bat fell closer and closer until Tsukune managed to catch the bag and the bat landed right on top of it.

Tsukune: Whew. That was close. Moka what the heck did you do that for?

Inner Moka: Because that bat is going to help find Kokoa.

Tsukune: Why is that?

Inner Moka then grabbed the bat and when Tsukune saw the bat he gasped in surprise. For the bat turned out to be Kokoa's faithful friend, Ko.

Ko: OW! Hey! What's the big idea whee?!?

Tsukune: What the....! Ko?!?

Ko: Huh? Mister Tsukune? What are you doing here whee?!?

Inner Moka: We should be asking you that bat.

Hearing Moka's voice made Ko jump. Then he turned around. As soon as he saw Moka's intimidating face, he began to freak out.

Ko: Oh crap! It's MIss Moka wheeee!!!

Tsukune then looked at the bag to find that the bag was filled with cans of tomato juice.

Tsukune: Ko. What are doing with all these cans of tomato juice? And shouldn't you be with Kokoa?

Ko: Oh! Um.....you see.....uh......I was uh.....going on a trip! Yeah! That's it! Whee! I was going on a trip away from Koka and I needed all these cans for the trip whee!

Inner Moka: You expect us to believe that crap? You're Kokoa's faithful servant. You wouldn't take a trip away from Koka if she gave you one. Not to mention that you're carrying tomato juice. It wouldn't happen to be for Kokoa would it?

Ko: Um.....uh.....

Tsukune: Ko listen. We're looking for Kokoa. We can't find her anywhere. If know anything about where she is, please tell us.

Ko: Umm.....I don't what you're talking about whee. I don't know anything whee.

Then Moka gave Ko a deadly glare. It was so terrifying that it would even a tough monster crack under pressure.

Inner Moka: You're a crappy liar. You know where she is don't you? If you don't tell us right now, I'll gut you and turned you into a stuffed animal!

Ko: OK! OK! I'll talk! I'll talk! I know where Kokoa is! Just please don't kill me whee!!!!!!

A few minutes later, Ko led Moka and Tsukune past the cliff where it was looking to the ocean. They walked down a path next to the cliff and followed the path until it lead to a cave that was below the school.

Tsukune: What is this place? I don't remember this being here.

Ko: Is this a cave that leads to a secret passage to the school catacombs whee. Miss Kokoa usually treats the cave like a secret hideaway whee.

Inner Moka: And you're sure that she's here? Because if she isn't....

Moka gave Ko another death glare which made Ko hide behind Tsukune's shoulder.

Ko: Dah!! Stop looking at me like that whee!!! I told you everything I know! I swear Kokoa's here! It's the truth! Just please don't kill me whee!!!

Moka and Tsukune walked into the cave and looked around. It was very quiet inside. Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Moka and Tsukune.....

choices: They heard you scream within the catacombs
Heard a loud gathering of monsters within the cave
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
As soon as they entered the cave Moka heard the sounds of tearful crying from her sister. They saw Kokoa in a corner crying in a crouching position after walking into the cave. Tskune went to comfort her, but Moka felt it better she did the talking. Inner Moka walked toward Kokoa and rested her arm around Kokoa's shoulder. "Big sister?", Kokoa asked.

"I'm here."

"Am I cursed? To be a disappointment?"

"No Kokoa. Your young, and love hurts at this age. Frankly more physically than most relationships."

"A human big sis, I mated and fell in love with a human."

"Well then welcome to the club, because your older sister had both those things happen to her."

"That was your weak willed version of you. You wouldn't love Tskune or even let him be in the same bed."

"Wrong.", Inner Moka answered.

"What?"

"I do love him as much as Outer Moka. And I had my first time with him, both forms. And I couldn't be any happier that I loved someone like him. Most humans are cruel, narrow minded, and selfish. (Name) doesn't fit that bill and nor does my Tskune. You could see that and your crying because you know you can never stop loving him."

"Big sis....why do I love him? He's a human."

"Your human and your destined one. It surprised me at first when I knew Tskune was human but Outer Moka made me see just how even though he was a bit of a duntz he was loyal and truly loved me and Outer Moka. I've seen (Name) while he was with you and believe me he loves you just as Tskune loves me. Race doesn't matter. After what he gave up and sacrificed to be with you, tell me right now is he worth less than any random monster boy?"

"No! He's twice as strong, twice more loyal and lovable, and is more than half the worth of every male student in this school. Oh my god, (Name) what have I done to deserve you after nearly letting you die."

"C'mon let's go find him and bring you two love birds back together again.", Moka said picking Kokoa up from the ground when suddenly....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: They find Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Suddenly there was a noise coming from within the cave. It sounded there was a bunch of monsters inside the cave.

Tsukune: Hey. You guys hear that?

Kokoa: Yeah. What is that?

Inner Moka: I don't know.

Suddenly there was the sound of footsteps coming from outside the cave and it was coming towards them.

Tsukune: Oh crap! Someone's coming!

Inner Moka: We have to hide. Kokoa you too.

Kokoa: OK.

Everyone quickly hid behind some rocks in the cave. The footsteps came closer and louder and soon they could see the source of the footsteps. It was a squad of golems like the ones Slave had summoned before.

Tsukune: Wait a sec. Those are the golems that attacked the school earlier. What are they doing?

Kokoa: I don't know, but it looks like they're heading deeper into the cave toward the source of the noise.

They watched the golems walk away, but then Moka started following them.

Kokoa: Big sis! What are you doing?

Inner Moka: What's it look like? I'm following them.

Ko: But why?!? I say we get going while getting's good whee!

Inner Moka: Will you think about it bat? If those golems are here then that man from before can't be too far away. This is a good opportunity to that bastard. When I find him, I'm gonna teach him to know his place.

Before Tsukune and the others could stop her, Moka went deeper into the cave and followed the golems. Soon the golems led them to the deepest part of the cave which was in the school catacombs. Moka and the others were now in the hideout of Lord Saber. There was a gathering of golems and not only that, but there was some monsters there as well. They hid behind a tall stalagmite so they wouldn't be seen.

Tsukune: Oh man. I've never seen so many monsters in one place! I think we stumbled upon some kind of revolution!

Ko: Man! I wanna get out of here whee!

Inner Moka: Damn. There's so many. I don't think even I could take on this many monsters at once.

Then the orb in the middle of the room began to glow and the face of Lord Saber appeared.

Kokoa: Big sister, who is that?

Inner Moka: I don't know, but I think we're gonna find out.

Then Lord Saber's voice boomed throughout the catacombs.

Lord Saber: My loyal army! Monsters and Golems alike! The time is nearly upon us! As we speak, the key of my resurrection is on it's way here and when it arrives, begin the ceremony as soon as possible. Our revenge against Bloodriver will finally be fulfilled and I will rule the monster world!

Tsukune: Bloodriver? Isn't that the name of yours and Kokoa's mother Moka?

Kokoa: Yes, but why does he have grudge against our mother?

Moka said nothing. She was trying to listen in on what else that Lord Saber was saying. Suddenly a magic window appeared and Slave face appeared.

Kokoa: Hey! It's that guy from before!

Lord Slave: Slave? What news do you bring to me?

Slave: My Lord. I have successfully captured the target. I am on my way back as we speak.

Lord Slave: Were you seen?

Slave: No my lord. I was able to knock him out and no one saw me. I also took the secret route back to the catacombs so they wouldn't suspect.

Lord Slave: Very good my slave. Now hurry back. We'll commence the ceremony as soon as you get here.

Slave: Yes my lord.

The window disappeared and Lord Slave spoke to his monster army once more.

Lord Slave: Now my monster army! Prepare for my revival! Lord Saber is coming home!

The monster army cheered. Moka upon hearing Lord Saber's name gasped in shock.

Inner Moka: What? Lord Saber? No.....it cant be!

Tsukune: Moka? What's wrong?

Kokoa: Do you know who this Lord Saber is?

Inner Moka: I'll tell you later. We need to get out of here. Now!

Before Tsukune and Kokoa could ask what was wrong with Moka. she was running straight toward the exit to the cave. Tsukune and Kokoa, (and Ko) followed close behind. When they got to the exit.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Heard a loud gathering of monsters within the cave

choices: Kurumu cuts in and tells Kokoa what happened with you
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
When they got to the exit, they found two golems waiting for them at the exit.

Tsukune: Oh no! We're caught!

Inner Moka: Tsukune! Get back! Let us handle them! Kokoa! Take out those golems before they alert the others!

Kokoa: Right big sister!

Just when Kokoa and and Moka were about to attack, suddenly something slashed the golems each in two in an instant. Then they heard a flapping of wings and saw a familiar figure flying towards them and landed in front of them.

Kurumu: Geez it's about time I found you guys! And you found Kokoa too. Awesome!

Tsukune: Kurumu! How did you find us?

Kurumu: Well, it's a long story. Wait hold on, Kokoa. There's something I need to tell you....

Inner Moka: Tell it later. Right now we have to get out of here! Let's go!

Kokoa: Big sister? What's wrong? You're acting weird.

Inner Moka: I'll explain later. We have to get going right now! Those golems are probably all aware of us being here by now. If we stay here, we won't stand a chance against them. We have to regroup! Move!

Before anyone else could ask any more, Moka ran straight ahead using her powerful vampire speed.

Kurumu: Hey! Moka! Hold on! What's with her?

Tsukune: I don't know, but she is right. We have to regroup at Yokai and plan our next move. Come on!

Then everyone ran back toward Yokai before more golems showed up. Meanwhile back in the cave, Saber was smiling to himself. What Tsukune and the others didn't know about was that Saber was already aware of their presence. He just pretended not to notice. The golems were about to go and deal with them, but Saber stopped them.

Saber: No my loyal servants. Don't pursue them. Let them go. When they come back, it'll be too late. Soon I will be reborn and not even those accursed vampires will be able to stop me and my revenge will be complete! HAHAHAHA!!!!

Back at Yokai, Tsukune and the others made it back to Yokai in one piece and they were all resting in a classroom.

Tsukune: Whew. Well, I guess were safe for the time being.

Kurumu: OK Moka. What the heck is going on here? You're usually never the type of person to run away from a fight.

Kokoa: Yeah. That's like you at all big sister! What's going on? You freaked out as soon as you heard the name Saber.

Inner Moka stayed silent and then...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kurumu found them

choices: Kurumu relunctantly tells Kokoa what had happened with you
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Moka stayed silent. Then she spoke in a grave tone.

Inner Moka: OK. I'll tell you. To be honest, I know who Saber is.

Tsukune: You do? How?

Inner Moka: I've heard stories throughout my family back when I was little. At first I thought it was just rumors, but I never thought those rumors would turn out to be true. The story was that a few years ago, Saber was an a major enemy to my family. Especially to my mother.

Kokoa: Your real mother big sister?

Inner Moka: Yes. It was when your father and my mother met Kokoa. When they met, she made a few enemies. Saber was one of those enemies. He never approved of Father and Mother being together ever since he saw her. He vowed that he would rid of her no matter what. Due to his hatred toward my mother, Father kicked him out of the house. Saber enraged waged war with the Shuzen house. They both clashed and it was a never ending battle, but Father and Mother proved superior in power and utterly defeated Saber. After he was defeated, Saber was then banished from the family. But Saber swore revenge. Somehow, someway, he would come back and take his revenge and destroy the vampire race. Then to make sure that Saber would never wage war with our family again, Father had his body destroyed and had his soul sealed inside a red orb never to be seen again.

Tsukune: So Saber was an old enemy of your family huh?

Kokoa: How come I didn't know about this?

Inner Moka: Mother and Father didn't you and our sisters to worry so they kept quiet about it. I only found out because I happened to overhear from different members of the family.

Tsukune: So how the heck did Saber get into the catacombs of the school anyway?

Inner Moka: I don't know. Someone must have found the gem where he was sealed in and brought to the school. My guess is that puppet master who made those golems attack the school was the one that found it. I do know this. If Saber is resurrected, we're in for trouble.

Kokoa: But big sis, Father sealed him inside that gem thing. There's no way that he can be brought back right?

Inner Moka: Unfortunately, there is a way. You see, Saber can resurrected through one way. He has to take over a human body.

Then Kurumu froze. As soon as she heard the words ":human body" your face immediately came into her mind. She soon realized the reason why of your disappearance.

Kurumu thinking: Oh no......it can't be......

Tsukune: Kurumu what's wrong? Your face looks pale.

Inner Moka: In fact, didn't you have something to tell us before?

Kurumu: Well.......uh....you see....I....

Kokoa: Actually Kurumu, I wanted to ask you Kurumu, Now that I think about it, do you know where (name) is? I want to apologize to him for the way I acted.

Tsukune: Wait a second. Now that I think about it, weren't you supposed to be with (name), Yukari, and Mizore?

Then......

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Kurumu stayed silent and then she calmly spoke.

Kurumu: Listen guys. I'm hate to bring up more bad news, but.....about (name)......he's gone.

Tsukune: What?!?

Inner Moka: What do you mean he's gone?!?

Kurumu: I mean.....that we don't know where he is.

Kokoa hearing stood there in shock for a minute. Then she rushed toward Kurumu and began to shake her.

Kokoa: Kurumu! Please tell me you're joking?!? Tell me you're joking!

Kurumu: How could I joke about something like that? I'm telling you, (name)'s been kidnapped. I'm sorry.

Kokoa gasped and then she sank to her knees and pounded the floor in anger and sadness.

Kokoa: No! No, no, no! It can't be! He can't be gone! He just can't be!

Tsukune: How did this happen? When did it happen?

Kurumu: I don't know. When we split up, Yukari was gonna heading back to (name)'s room to cheer him up while me and Mizore looked for Kokoa some more. After that we decided to head back to (name)'s room to check up on him. When we came into the room, all we found was this.

Kurumu dug into her pocket and pulled out the keychain that you had given Kokoa. When Kokoa saw it, she hugged to her chest and began to cry a little.

Kurumu: I'm sorry Kokoa. But if it helps any, Mizore and Yukari are looking for him as we speak. Yukari found some foot prints in the room and they're following them to find (name) and whoever took him.

Kokoa: It's my fault. It's my fault that (name)'s gone. If I hadn't done the stupid thing and let my vampire pride force me to break up with him, none of this would have happened.

Inner Moka then wrapped her arms around Kokoa and embraced her in a tender hug.

Inner Moka: Don't be stupid. This is no time to be blaming yourself. No one could have predicted something like this could happen. We'll find him. So don't cry.

Kokoa: -sniff- Thanks big sis.

Inner Moka: Do you have any idea who took him if he was kidnapped?

Kurumu: No idea. Your guess is about as good as mine. We won't know til Yukari and Mizore get back here. I haven't seen them since I left to find you guys. Let's just hope that they make it back soon.

Tsukune: Yeah. I just hope that they're okay.

Just then they all heard a very familiar voice. When they heard, they looked to see two very familiar faces.

Yukari: Aw thanks Tsukune. Glad you were worried about us.

Tsukune: Yukari! Mizore! You guys are okay!

Mizore: Of course. Why wouldn't we be?

Yukari then saw Kokoa crying in Moka's arms and got a grasp of what happened.

Yukari: So you told her right?

Kurumu: Yeah. She's taking it pretty hard.

Inner Moka: Did you find anything when you followed the footprints?

Yukari: Even better. We saw the person who took (name).

Hearing this Kokoa immediately sat up and rushed at Yukari and grabbed her by the shoulders shaking her like mad.

Kokoa: Where is he?!? What did he look like?!? Was he tough?!? Is (name) OK?!? Tell me?!?

Tsukune: Kokoa! Take it easy! You're gonna rattle Yukari's brain!

It had to take both Kurumu and Mizore to get Kokoa off of Yukari. After getting Kokoa to calm down, Yukari continued.

Yukari: From the looks of things (name) was fine, but he was knocked out. Whoever took him, wanted to make sure that he was alive.

(flashback)
Yukari and Mizore were following the footprints in the forest. Then they heard footsteps ahead of them.

Yukari: You hear that?

Mizore: It sounded like it was coming from up ahead. Come on.

Mizore and Yukari followed the footsteps while keeping quiet so they wouldn't be found out. Then they caught up to the source of the footsteps. There walking ahead of them, was Slave carrying you over his shoulder like you were baggage.

Yukari: Oh crap! That must be who kidnapped (name)!

Mizore: Then let's get him!

Mizore was about to rush to Slave and rescue you, but Yukari stopped her.

Yukari: Wait a sec! We can't just go rushing into this! We don't even know what we're up against!

Mizore: We can't just sit here either!

Yukari: Mizore I know you want to help (name), but if we just bust out there (name) might be in danger. Just wait and see what he does.

Mizore didn't like waiting, but she knew that Yukari was right. Back with Slave, he shifted your weight onto his left arm and then made a sign with his right hand. A magic window of some sort appeared and in that window was the face of Saber.

Mizore: That must be that guy's boss.

Yukari: No doubt. He's definitely got that freaky evil boss vibe.

Lord Slave: Slave? What news do you bring to me?

Slave: My Lord. I have successfully captured the target. I am on my way back as we speak.

Lord Slave: Were you seen?

Slave: No my lord. I was able to knock him out and no one saw me. I'm also taking the secret route back to the catacombs so they won't suspect.

Lord Slave: Very good my slave. Now hurry back. We'll commence the ceremony as soon as you get here.

Slave: Yes my lord.

Then the window disappeared. Slave waved his hand and a magic circle appeared. The circle glowed brightly and then transformed into a portal. Slave stepped through the portal and then the portal closed.
(flashback ends)

Kokoa: So the guy that kidnapped (name) was that Slave guy? You're sure?

Mizore: Yes. We saw it with our own eyes.

Yukari: Why? You know what's going on?

Mizore: And who's this Saber guy?

Tsukune: To put it simply, he's an old enemy in Moka's family that wants revenge against all the vampires.

Kokoa: What I don't understand is why (name)? He hasn't done anything to him! It's us he wants!

Kurumu: Maybe it's just one of those bad guy things?

Inner Moka who kept silent up till know was trying to figure out Saber's plan. She thought about Saber, then Slave and then about you. Suddenly, it all clicked in her mind.

Inner Moka: No.....he wouldn't....he just couldn't....

Tsukune: Moka what is it?

Inner Moka: I think I figured out what Slave is up to and it's not gonna be pretty unless we stop him.

Kurumu: Well what is it? Tell us.

Kokoa: Yeah. Tell us big sister.

Moka paused dramatically then......

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Inner Moka: Saber's true plan.........is to use (name)'s body to resurrect himself.

Everyone stared at Moka in shock.

Kurumu: What?!?

Yukari: You can't be serious are you?!?

Inner Moka: I which I wasn't being serious, but I'm sure of it. Saber's intends to use (name)'s body as host to resurrect himself. If he does that, he'll be brought back and will attack Yokai.

Tsukune: Wait! If that's true, then what'll happen with (name)?!?

Inner Moka: I hate to say it but......if that happens, the (name) we all know and love will be gone forever. Doomed to be Saber's body suit forever.

Kokoa: No! We can't let that happen! We have to save him!

Kurumu: Yeah! Let's go over to where Mizore and Yukari found that Slave and bust in there and save (name)!

Inner Moka: Hold on. We really can't do much of anything right now.

Kokoa: Why not big sister?

Inner Moka: Take a look.

Inner Moka pointed outside a window and everyone looked. The sun was rising over the horizon and the gates to the school were beginning to open. Meaning that it was another day for school.

Mizore: It looks like the school is beginning to open.

Kurumu: Crap. That means all the students are gonna be coming pretty soon.

Kokoa: So what? I say we still go! (name) needs us!

Inner Moka: Kokoa! I understand that you want to rescue (name) more than anything, but we can't do much of anything in our current condition. We need to save our strength. Besides I need to rest myself. I've been out for too long and you'll need me at full power if we're gonna save (name).

Tsukune: Moka's right Kokoa. Let's take this opportunity to get ready. We'll go through school just like any other say and then we'll go to where Mizore and Yukari saw Slave and then we'll go and rescue him.

Kokoa didn't like having to wait, but she knew that Tsukune and Moka were right.

Kokoa: Tsk. I guess you're right. But still.......I'm worried about (name). I just hope he's okay.

Kurumu: Don't worry. I'm sure hes fine. He's a human, but he's tough. (name)'s gonna be A-OK. You'll see.

Yukari: Also, I think we should keep this a secret from the students and teachers. We don't want to start a panic around the school.

Inner Moka: In that case, I'll see you guys later. And Kokoa, hang in there alright? I know it's gonna be hard, but try to push through. OK?

Kokoa: OK big sister......I'll try.

With that, Inner Moka took her rosary and place back on her choker and she turned back into Outer Moka. Then everyone went back to their respective dorm rooms so they wouldn't get in trouble with the teachers. As Kokoa headed back to her room, she dug into her pocket and pulled out the keychain that you had given her. When she saw it, she clenched it tightly and looked up in the sky filled with worry.

Kokoa: (name).....please be safe. I'll be there to rescue you soon. I promise.

Meanwhile.....

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile back with Slave who was still carrying you, made his way back to the dark chambers. Soon he made it back, but was greeted by a very impatient Saber.

Saber: Slave! What took you so long?!? I grow weary of waiting.

Slave: I'm sorry master, but I managed to get the boy.

Slave gently lifted you off of himself and gently placed you on the ground in front of Saber. As soon as Saber saw you, he immediately stopped complaining. He was delighted.

Saber: Well done Slave!! You've finally brought him!

Slave: Sorry for the wait my lord. I had to fool the boy thinking I was going to help him with his little love problem. It was the only way I could get him to let his guard down.

Saber: Good. Now we can begin phase three. Begin preparations at once. I'd like to be resurrected sometime soon.

Slave: Yes my lord. By the way if I may ask, what about those vampires you detest so much? Won't they come to rescue him?

Saber: Let them come. At least until I get into my new body that is. I've been waiting for years to exact my revenge and once I get my body, I want them to be the first ones I destroy before I conquer this world. If they come, stop them by any means.

Slave: Yes my lord.

Saber: Now hurry. We must complete the final phase before tomorrow.

Slave: At once my lord.

And with that Slave set off to get everything ready. Saber looked at your sleeping body and chuckled to himself with triumph.

Saber: It's almost time. My vengeance is almost at hand. And you're gonna help me do it boy. Hahahhahaaha.
