1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_EYJNTQ_...

You saw only darkness. You thought for certain you were dead. You wondered what awaited you in the afterlife, but then you heard someone's voice calling you, "Come back to us (Name). Don't give up." Then you saw a glimmering light and walked towards it. Then the voice got louder and then when you were in the light you felt like you had an out of body experience. You vision was blurry at first, but it cleared and you saw the lovely face of Moka watching over you. You could talk but you couldn't feel your own body.

"(Name)? Can you hear me?"

"Yes Moka.", you answered her. "Where am I?"

"The infirmary, you got hurt very badly and Kokoa is still in shock. She's in her dorm room processing the truth."

"I need to see her."

"Now isn't the time. She won't see anyone, talk to anyone, or even look at anyone. Totally isolated."

"What happened last thing I remember was you kissing my neck."

"I didn't kiss it, I bit it. (Name) forgive me but...I had to transfuse my blood into yours. It was the only way to save your life."

"No...no no no no no no no no no no NO!"

"(Name) calm down."

"God dammit I can't move my body and now I'm a vampire! You robbed me of my life! I'd rather have died!"

Then Moka's rosary forced Inner Moka out. "Listen buddy I did you a favor. Sure it might take some getting used to and you can't do certain things anymore but it's better your alive. And it's what you wanted, right? To be able to protect Kokoa? To not let her think your a weakling? Your one of us now and nothing will change it. The only reason you can't move your body is because my blood is coursing through your body and is changing you. You'll be back up by morning."

"Moka...I'm sorry. I over reacted."

"Hmph at you have the decency to admit when you've been proven wrong and apologize. Kokoa's lucky to have you."

"I'm not sure if she even loves me anymore."

"She's stubborn and I won't lie can be full of shit but trust me you can handle her. And you were human in the beginning, now she won't stand against you."

"Why?"

"I'm stronger than her and my blood is in your veins now."

"Heh."

Music should be playing at 2:10

Outer Moka then returned and placed her hand on your forehead. "Just take it easy and rest now." Her soothing and gentle voice lulled you to sleep. As you drifted off to sleep you had a dream of you and Kokoa going on your date and all the other great times you had before. Then in the middle of it all of the memories of Kokoa transitioned into having memories of things that never happened, with Inner Moka. In them you two were starting to fall in love and you two were happy. It was nice, "Why bother?", you thought in your dream. Then you saw Tskune and Kokoa waiting over by a bus. You waved them over and saw Slave driving the bus. You were concerned but then you saw Kokoa and Tskune waving goodbye and Kokoa left behind her key chain you gave her.They went on the bus and it was driving off into the tunnel. You saw Kokoa leave her key chain and then behind the bus Kokoa waved goodbye. Then the tunnel was morphing into something, you knew it wasn't good so you ran after them. But the bus was too fast you barley could catch up and then the tunnel morphed into a demon where the tunnel was it's mouth and the portal was it's fiery breath. You reached out to her as you ran but to no avail.

Then the memories flashed back to the good and to when you were dying earlier today. You screamed out in desperation begging for them to come back. You kept on running but soon the bus had begun to cross through the portal. "No!", you yelled. The memories flashed back to when you were a kid and you went into a rage and when you attacked Yukari. the pain overwhelmed you and began to consume you. But then as the bus passed through the demon closed it's mouth and you lost them. You screamed out in depression.

You woke up immediately and your eyes were blood shot red with yellow irises. Your nails long and sharp and your muscles were bigger and stronger. It was midnight and Moka and the others were already asleep but Moka woke up when she heard your growling. She came to you trying to calm you down but it was no use. You got out of bed and ripped off your shirt. The others woke up to the sound and were terrified. You couldn't speak only growl and roar, nothing of rational thought was crossing your state of mind. You jumped out the window and ran away.

"(Name)...", Moka said worried.

"Where's he going?", Tskune asked her. Then Moka forced Tskune to take off her rosary so that Inner Moka could handle the situation.

"Split up. Kurumu, Mizore, and Yukari you search the forest, me and Tskune will check the tunnel.", Inner Moka ordered.

They didn't argue with her they just did as they were told without question. Inner Moka grabbed Tskune and almost flew off into the night.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You wake up in the infirmery

choices: Moka, Mizore, Yukari, or Kurumu find you
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Your mind had no coherent thought. You just ran and ran and ran until you thought of something that you felt safe in. Home. Your home in japan, was your sanctuary, a place where no one would harm you. You knew the way, it's been embedded in your memory by now. You rushed there but ran like an animal on all fours. You saw the tunnel, at first you were terrified because of the nightmare, but you realized it was no monster so you proceeded in.

You went through until you crossed over to the human world and saw the city light up. You were confused but the way home was fresh in your mind. You just wanted to go home. You leaped across the rooftops finding your home. You did your best to stay hidden, knowing it would bring harm. You stealthily hid under the cloak of night like a predator and silently scurried home.

An hour later you at last made it home. No one was around, no neighbors, no family, all quiet. You walked inside and busted the door open with your new found strength. You went up to your room, the place where you would be safe. Where you would be alone. Safe. You opened your door and in your room was the memorabilia of a time when life was simple.

You crawled under your bed where you rested trying to escape and hide from everything. You don't know why. You just wanted to be left alone.

Meanwhile...

Inner Moka and Tskune finally made it to the tunnel where they hoped to cut you off but there was no sign of you. Moka looked around hoping to hear you coming but Tskune noticed a print on the ground. "Moka look."

"Were too late. He's already gone through."

"Where do you think he's headed?"

"My guess. His home. He doesn't know what he's doing, he's just acting on instinct. But he's no killer. He probably went there to hide from us."

"Why? Were his friends."

"He's confused. He doesn't know what to do. In fact what we just saw was his true vampire form. He's got the mind of a child like that, he needs proper guidance. We have to find him and bring him back to me so I can get through to his true form."

"What about Kokoa?"

"Until she copes with the fact that she loved a human, she can't help him. Unless she's willing to."

The Inner Moka called up the others and bribed the bus driver to take them through the tunnel. From there they split up to find where you were. Through their own various methods of tracking you it wouldn't be long until someone found you. Question was, was it the right people?

Moka and Tsukune were searching for you around town hoping that they would find you before you got into trouble. You both went with Moka's hunch and went straight to your house. When they got there they saw the busted down door which meant that they were on the right track.

Tsukune: Looks like you were right Moka. If this doesn't mean that (name)'s here, I don't know what is.

Inner Moka: Let's go in. But be careful Tsukune.

They slowly went inside the house and looked around. Luckily there was no one there so they were free to look around. The house was a little messy due to your recent rampage. They looked around, but they didn't find you in the living room or the kitchen.

Inner Moka: Tsukune. Any sign of him?

Tsukune: Nope. Man where could he be?

Inner Moka: Don't worry Tsukune. We'll find him. You check (name)'s room and I'll check the rest of the house.

While Moka looked through the other rooms, Tsukune went up stairs and looked into your room. Unbenknownst to him, you were still hiding under the bed. You had just woken up to find Tsukune entering your room. You hated your home being trespassed. Then your vampire instinct began to kick in and you began to crave one thing. Blood. And Tsukune had a lot of it. He reeked of the scent which made it intoxicating to you. While Tsukune was looking for you, you slowly crept out of your bed and snuck up behind Tsukune. Then just when you were about attack Tsukune to suck his blood...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Just before you could bite into Tskune's neck Inner Moka shoved you into a wall saving her boyfriend. "Tskune call the others!", she yelled. Tskune left the room in haste not wanting to be killed. You shrugged off Inner Moka's assault but then you looked on to Inner Moka with innocence. To you as you were in this feral vampire state she was a goddess, beautiful, empowering, perfection. You dared not attack her, so you kneeled down in awe of her. "(Name)? Can you understand me?", she asked.

You couldn't speak and could not understand her. Moka looked at you and saw how saving you was a mistake. Your eyes were devilish and your teeth were sharps a swords. She kneeled down and held her hand on your cheek. You stared at her wondering why she graced her presence toward you. "I'm sorry for doing this to you (Name). Look what I've done to you."

Then Tskune called out saying the others were coming. Moka knew the best way to subdue you was to just hold on to you until they came back. She moved your head to her heart calming you. Your blood-lust was forgotten for now. "Shhhh it's ok. It's ok. Were going to get you help ok."

You didn't know why she was doing this. You heard her heartbeat. The sound was like the beat of a thousand drums. The bloodshot eyes of yours were toned down, you were starting to slowly transform back. Moka saw you transform to normal with much relief and glee, "That's it (Name). Good. Just relax, think calm thoughts. Think of Kokoa.", that last suggestion got a unique reaction out of you.

Your feral vampire side remembered how you felt about Kokoa but now they seemed directed at Inner Moka now. Your transformed back into your feral vampire side and stared right into Inner Moka's eyes. Inner Moka was taken aback by this sudden action. You exposed your neck signaling her to bite into it. For Inner Moka this was an act that was only done by a vampire's mate. She quickly realized what you were doing. She pinned you down with one arm and sternly acknowledged two things, "Tskune is my mate. And Kokoa is supposed to be yours (Name), I know it."

You were confused why did she not bite me? Then without warning Yukari came bursting in thinking all was well. "NO YUKARI RUN!", Inner Moka yelled. You saw her and viciously attacked her in defense. You scratched at her face and was about to chomp her neck in one bite, but Kurumu intervened and flew into you right out of the house.

"(Name)! Look at me.", she said sternly. Kurumu knew how dangerous you were right now and thought her charm would subdue you. You were too strong for it and tried biting right into her face. Kurumu dropped you out of fear and you fell right into a park.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You were unconscious and couldn't fight back after being dropped several feet in the air. However lurking in the shadows as you laid down in the ground was Slave. Slave smiled as he saw you like this, both with the fact that you were a vampire and that you would put up no resistance. Slave carried you on his back and took you back to the chamber.

By the time Kurumu figured out where you landed it was far too late. She pulled out her cell phone and called the others, "Guys. I lost him he's nowhere in sight."

"Dammit! We have to find him, before sunrise. He'll be too sensitive to sun light and attack anyone he sees as a threat so look around and find him.", Inner Moka said. She hung up with a large amount of fear and frustration. Inner Moka checked on Yukari to see if she was ok. "Hey, how are you?"

"That was so scary. But I'm fine. But if these scratches become permanent I'll not only kick his ass when were done I have to cook up a potion to remove scars so that I can get laid when I'm older."

"Least your toughness hasn't left. Just be glad he didn't bite you."

"Why did he do that?", Yukari asked.

"Yukari it's not his fault. He's like a newborn baby. He doesn't know what's happening or who are his friends. All of that vampire power is surfacing at ounce and he's adapting to it as fast as his body can manage.", Inner Moka explained.

"Then why did he seem ok with you?", Tskune asked with an angry tone.

"I gave him that power so maybe I'm like a mother to him.", she deduced.

"He exposed his neck Moka. I know what that means for vampires.", he said harshly.

"Don't be so dramatic Tskune. I made it clear your my man. I won't leave you for him even when he's also like me.", she said comforting him.

"I'm sorry Moka. I just got worried."

"Don't sweat it. But anyway I have to call Kokoa, she could help us find (Name).", Inner Moka said.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Kokoa was in her room, she was asleep dreaming about you and her. But every moment when she remembered the most wonderful times you had, it made her sick to know you were a human. It made her remember how fun it was to treat you like crap when you first met and how pathetic you were. But yet while she focused on those memories she still felt a twinge of attraction and love for you as she combed through her memories. She pictured the idea of seeing you again you were still human and she was in a vampire blood-lust. To her you were prey, she dove into you her mouth connected to your neck. She dreamed of biting your neck and sucking every drop of blood. But as she pictured it in her head she wasn't biting she was kissing your neck. "Huh?", she said in her dream.

"I love you Kokoa.", you said in her dream.

"No no no no no no! I don't love a human."

"I love you Kokoa."

"Stop saying that! I don't love you! I never did! I used you!", she lied terribly.

"I love you Kokoa."

"No you don't! You......you.........you loved Kurumu this was all a scheme to get back at her! I don't love you (Name)."

"I love you Kokoa."

"ARRRRRRRRRRGH!", she tried biting your mouth clean off like a rabid animal but in her head it pictured her making out with you in her dream. She wanted to maul you but she still saw herself loving you like before.

"I love you Kokoa, I always will.", you said in the dream.

"Ohhhhhh (Name) I hate you for being human but I will never stop loving you regardless. I can't lie the fact that we were......are meant to be. Your both a blessing and a curse on my life. Come back to me and just give in to-", Kokoa's cell phone beeped loudly waking her up from her dream. "WHAT THE HELL IS THE MATTER WITH YOU?! CAN"T YOU SEE I'M DREAMING OF GETTING BACK WITH MY BOYFRIEND!", she screamed into the receiver.

"Your "boyfriend" is lost Kokoa. Something happened to him so-", soon as Kokoa heard that she hung up got half dressed and bolted out the room and used all of her skills as a vampire to look for you.

On the other end Inner Moka smiled knowing Kokoa has come to her senses. "Guys I think Kokoa just learned she loves (Name) regardless of being human. Even though that won't matter now cuz trust me she'll fall head over heels now the way he looks.", she said.

"Jeez those two are predictable, Kokoa mostly. (Name) is a loose canon.", Kurumu said.

"C'mon let's spread out and look for (Name)."

As Kokoa ran a marathon around the school grounds looking for you she noticed coming from the main entrance someone carrying another person. She thought it was you and happily had her arms wide spread and was going to smoother you with kisses. "(NAME)! OH SWEETUMS I WAS SO STUPID! GIVE YOUR HONEY SOME SUGAR!", she yelled. But she was repulsed to see Slave being the one sneaking about. Slave was caught off guard by Kokoa's loud announcement, he ran for it knowing he couldn't stop an S-class vampire. Kokoa took a second to realize you were on Slave's back. "YOU SON OF A BITCH GIVE ME BACK MY MAN!", she screamed.

She tackled Slave causing him to drop you to the ground. Slave kicked her off sending her back a ways. Slave stood in a fighting stance ready to fight, Kokoa let loose all of her vampire power wanting to get pay-back for what he did to you and her. "Ohhh you better hope you got some skill cuz I'm going to mess you up.", Kokoa threatened.

"Empty words from a prissy school girl.", Slave snarled back.

Kokoa lunged at Slave scratching his rib-cage. He dodged in time to where she peeled the skin and he bled but still wasn't out of the fight. Slave kicked her in the gut and and uppercut-ed her in the jaw. Kokoa was stunned but as Slave went in to capitalize on his opening Kokoa used the reach to try and bite Slave square in the neck. She managed to bite right into it and sucked his blood ferociously. Her jaw grip was like that of a pit-bull, she would not let go unless she wanted to. Slave was in pain and felt like a chainsaw was cutting through his neck, but he grabbed Kokoa's sharp teeth and with great effort opened it wide enough for Kokoa to open release her jaw.

Slave blew out a garlic powder that forced Kokoa to back away and gag at the scent. Slave covered the wounds on his neck but it all went worse when you got up and saw him and Kokoa. You roared at them with your hair tingling menacingly. Kokoa saw for the first time your feral vampire form. She was so shocked she didn't believe it at first until you attacked her.

You thought she was trying to take you away from your goddess Moka. She wasn't worthy. She must die! "(Name)! It's Kokoa. Your girlfriend!", she said trying to convince you. You couldn't understand her and instead just attacked, but Kokoa was far stronger than you and knew your weakness, her. She held your arms apart and you snapped at her face with a series of threatening bites and growls. She closed her eyes and when you needed a moment to catch your breath she kissed you on the mouth. Her tongue exploring your sharp maze of teeth felt the rigid edges and strong firm structure. She leaned in more to your face and exposed her neck. Your eyes were open the whole time she kissed you, you saw her expose her neck.

This made you angry and the first thought was to slit her stomach open and watch her guts pour out. But instead your hand moved upward and felt her titillating breasts. You felt calmer and Kokoa looked good, great, perfect like Moka. In the end there was one iron-clad rule to the both of you. You loved each other so much neither of you can physically harm the other out of pain or harmful intent.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kokoa finds Slave

choices: Inner Moka and the others find Kokoa
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Slave slowly got up still reeling from the attacks and saw the scene before him.

Slave: Damn it! I've had as much as I can take of this! I won't let her take him! Not when Lord Saber's resurrection is close at hand! I didn't want to do this, but I don't have a choice!

Slave closed his eyes and using his powers began to mentally communicate with Saber back at the chambers.

Slave: Lord Saber! I need your help! Lord Saber!

Saber: What is it Slave? Surely, you have captured the boy by now.

Slave: Yes sir, but we have a situation. I've been spotted. By the vampire.

Saber: Which vampire?

Slave: The girl who has mated with the boy. Kokoa Shuzen.

Saber: The sister of Moka eh? You're having trouble with her? Pathetic. Well, since we're so close to my resurrection, I suppose I'll help you. Besides, I want to see this girl face to face.

Back at the chambers, Saber's stone began to glow. Then Saber's spirit flowed out of the stone and headed straight toward to where you, Kokoa, and Slave were. Back with you and Kokoa, you both were still making out. You didn't what was going because you were still acting like a beast, but you felt safe being with Kokoa and Kokoa felt safe knowing that she was with you again. Suddenly, something flew right past you and Kokoa and headed right for Slave. It was Saber. You instinctively began sensing danger and began to growl. Saber circled around Slave a couple of times and then entered his body through his mouth. Slave was motionless for a second, then he opened his eyes. His eyes turned violet like and it seemed like there were cracks on the sides of his eyes.

(http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121...)

Kokoa: What the hell?!?

Saber: Well, well, well. So this is the vampire who's been giving you so much trouble?

Slave (in his mind): Yes my lord.

Saber then looked at you and when you two locked eyes, you began to growl and hiss like a cat.

Saber: And what happened to the boy? Wasn't he supposed to be human?

Slave (in his mind): Yes my lord, but to save the boy's life from his injuries, a vampire named Moka Akashiya bit him and injected her vampire blood into him. Now he's undergoing the transformation to becoming a vampire.

Saber: Interesting. Hahaha. Even better than I hoped. Now I understand why you were having so much trouble. Fear not, I'll take care of this for you.

Slave (in his mind): Thank you my lord.

Saber slowly began walking toward you and Kokoa. Kokoa stepped in between both you and Saber, ready to protect you. Then you leaped out from behind Kokoa and attacked Saber with your fangs barred.

Kokoa: (name) no! Come back here!

She was too late. Saber simply raised his hand and released a powerful blast of magic energy at your stomach while you were still in midair. You were sent flying to a tree and slammed into it so hard, that the tree snapped in two and fell over with a loud crash knocking you out cold.

Saber: Too easy.

Kokoa: (name)! Grrrr! YOU BASTARD!!! HOW DARE YOU HURT MY (NAME)!!

Kokoa using all of her vampire strength attacked Slave/Saber enraged that you were hurt. She swung and she kicked, but Slave/Saber dodged all with ease. Then Kokoa connected with a kick in the face, but Saber/Slave didn't even budge. Kokoa gaped in horror as Saber/Slave had a look disgust on his face.

Saber: Weak. You call those attacks? Let me show you how attacks should be like.

Slave/Saber then gave Kokoa a powerful kick in the gut. It was so strong, that it almost went right through Kokoa. Kokoa gasped having the wind knocked out of her. Then Slave/Saber gave Kokoa an uppercut to the jaw, then two punches on each side of her cheeks and then one more powerful kick in the gut sending Kokoa flying to a rock. Upon impact the rock crumbled and was know nothing but rubble. Kokoa was now bloody and covered in bruises. Every part of her body rung in pain as she tried to get up. Saber/Slave seeing as Kokoa was no longer able to fight went over to you and picked you up.

Slave (in his mind): Well done my lord! You subdued them quite easily.

Saber: Save your praise. Let's back to the chambers. I can't stay in your body forever, but first....

Saber/Slave went over to Kokoa and stepped on her chest making her yelp in pain.

Saber: Hey girl. I know you're awake. I want you to give Moka Akashiya a message for me. When you see her, tell her that Saber is coming for his revenge and she will be the first on my list.

And with that Saber/Slave left. Kokoa tried to get up, but she couldn't. She could only watch as Saber/Slave carried you away. She reached to try and stop him, but she fell unconscious.

Then....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Slave recovers and attacks you both with Lord S...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Saber left Slave's body and eagerly awaited to reborn. The golems all crowded around your body as Slave placed you in the center near by the statue on Lord Saber's head. The water around the chamber seemed to come alive as the time drew near for Lord Saber's resurrection. Slave began casting the ritual, "The first stone upon this prison, shall be the first key to his freedom.", Slave took a stone from the chamber and crushed it with it's dirt and dust resting on your body. "Payment of the follower, shall be paid in blood.", Slave then cut his palm and let the blood drip down on your fresh bite mark from Moka. "And the vessel of the enemy, shall be the host for the master,", Slave came near the statue head and said, "BREAK THESE CHAINS THAT BIND THEE!", raising his left arm then turned back to you. "The Master shall arise, AGAIN!", your eyes opened with the same dark pink pigment as when Slave was possessed. You screamed in pain as you felt your soul being taken away, removed from your body and seeing nothing but darkness.

The statue mouth opened releasing a black smoke that flew around the chamber. It circled the entire room until it rose to the ceiling and then nose dived into your body. The smoke hit your body and as it entered your body convulsed in reflex and rejected it. But in less then a moment it was now host to Lord Saber. Your mind and soul were gone. Lord Saber took your body and smiled in glee. "Free at last. This body is incredible! The sister would not even come close to this! The true Akashiya girl was the perfect one to fuel this body."

"Welcome master.", Slave bowed.

"You have served me well Slave. To honor a bargain is one thing, but to go above the call of duty is a greater honor and yields a greater reward.", Lord Saber said with your voice.

"Don't hold out on me! It's time for my payment.", Slave said wasting no time.

"Of course. Your freedom. From the cursed fate of being a servant of Alucard. Instead you now..", he touched Slave's forehead and Slave's body burned and suddenly his body was decaying, "Are free from the bonds of life itself."

"NO! AHHHHHHHHHHH!", and with his last breath Slave was gone. Lord Saber's cruelty was feared. Slave's past failures and un-hasty progress left Saber to dispose of him now that he outlived his usefulness.

"Warriors! March! Bring me the monsters, let me judge who will serve me to kill the Akashiya family or perish. Kill any who resist but leave the two girls to me. I will handle them personally."
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Saber/Slave returns to the chambers

choices: The school is overrun with golems with Saber taking charge
The others meet up with Inner Moka and Kokoa
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Kokoa started coming around as she felt a strong surge of numbness and pain rushing from her injuries. "Owwww.", she groaned. Her pained sounds caught the ear of her sister causing Inner Moka to rush over and see what happened.

"Kokoa!", Inner Moka cried.

"Ugh my face. I can't breath.", Kokoa mumbled.

"Who did this? (Name)?", Inner Moka asked worried about your condition.

"No. Slave.", she breathed heavily. Inner Moka then felt great horror as she knew what it meant.

"Where did he take him?! Where?!", Inner Moka shook Kokoa.

"I don't- LOOK OUT!", a golem suddenly formed and Kokoa just barley saved Inner Moka from being impaled by a spike. The golem swung it's other arm, with a mace as it's hand, right at Kokoa. She got her second wind and dodged it in time. Inner Moka karate chopped the golem in two with a single kick and brushed her hair of the dirt from the golems dead body.

"Good reflex. You may be as strong as me when you turn 500.", Inner Moka joked.

"HA HA! Well all things considered why did that thing pop out of nowhere?", Kokoa asked. Then an echo invaded everyone's thoughts in a psychic message across the school.

"Future of the monster race, I have messages for you all. To the vandals and delenquints who thrive to punish and inflict violence. Have your fun and you may join me in my first generation of the superior monster species. To the cowards and weaklings who will pray for their saviors to come and protect them, you will not be spared. And to the Akashia family, I have already won: taken control of this stronghold with a few golems and a single bite of your fangs. That's but a small taste of how easy my revenge will be exacted. And when the dawn comes, when your family name is burned to the ground and I turn my gaze to the world beyond, the legend of Akasha Bloodriver and her family will be worth nothing at all."
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Inner Moka finds Kokoa

choices: An army of students lead by Moka and Kokoa
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Just then Tsukune and the others arrived.

Tsukune: Moka! Kokoa! Thank goodness we found you guys!

Inner Moka: Well, looks like the gang's all here.

Mizore: We're we too late Has (name)......

Kokoa: I'm sorry. I did everything I could, but that bastard was too strong. He took (name) away.

Yukari: Oh no.

Mizore: (name)......is gone?

Kurumu: Damn it. Now what? There has to be something we can do to save him!

Inner Moka: Well for starters as much as I hate to say this, we can't worry about (name) right now. For now, we have to get back to school and stop Saber.

Kokoa: But Big sister....

Mizore: What are you saying?!? We can't just abandon him!

Inner Moka: Listen! As we speak, Saber's heading straight to Yokai. When he gets there, he'll slaughter everyone in sight. Everyone we know and love will be in danger. I can understand that (name)'s a valuable friend, but we have to stop Saber. We're not abandoning him, we just can't save him right now. Plus I'm willing to bet that Saber's got him with him. If the to rescue (name) opportunity rises we'll take that opportunity. For now, let's head back to the school and warn the others.

As much they wanted to object, Tsukune and the others knew Moka was right. Kokoa more than anything wanted to rescue you, but warning the school and saving all the innocent monsters inside came first. All she could do was hope for your safety. So they ran toward Yokai to warn the students. Meanwhile Saber in your body and is army of golems were marching toward Yokai preparing to attack the school. By now Saber was only a few yards away from the school and he was preparing himself for battle.

Saber: All these years.....I've waited for this moment. All the years suffering from that accursed vampire family will now come to an end. HAHAHAHAHA!!!!

(inside your mind)
You were alone curled up in a ball in what a room of darkness looking like you were asleep. You felt lonely. You were scared. You wanted to get out of this dark room, but you didn't have the strength to. Then you opened your eyes and you uttered these words.

(name): Help me......someone.....please help me....

(outside your mind)
Saber: Now my noble warriors! Today's the day we exact our revenge! Destroy everything that dares cross our way! Now go and destroy! Kill them all!

The golems roared and charged at the school. Then suddenly an explosion came from in front of the army of golems destroying a few of the golems. Smoke billowed everywhere.

Saber: What?!? Who dares to stand in my way?!?

Then when the smoke cleared there standing in the way of the army was...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The others meet up with Inner Moka and Kokoa

choices: Saber v.s. Inner Moka and Kokoa
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
"Did you really believe I would be killed so easily?", said a familiar voice.

"Ah so you survived. I must admit you surprised me, I notice that mark inscribed on your helmet, Bloodriver's seal. I see you were planning on betraying me since the start Slave.", Saber boasted.

Slave came out from the smoke with a scythe in hand. "I dedicated most of my life and faithfully served you. I never failed and yet you were going to dispose me like a piece of trash?! She gave it to me out of pity. I never ounce thought of needing it until you betrayed me."

"Like your name suggests you are and always have been a slave. I found you and taught you all you know. Who was it that gave you your very freedom?"

"You merely let me on a longer leash but I was still a servant. NEVER AGAIN! And this is the consequence of treating me like the dirt under your nails.", Slave held up a small tablet and raised it toward Saber.

"The soul binder?! I ordered you to destroy it!", Saber staggered back in fear holding his arms in defense.

"I did. But I made sure to study what it was made from, in case I needed it in case you double-crossed me. Bloodriver gave me everything I needed."

"That clever woman. She always was ten steps ahead of me. She knew I might destroy it and she had a contingency plan in any event. How did she en-trust it to you?"

"The same reason why your host will be out of your grasp within only moments. En tri'ees soba nuoier...."

"No! I will not lose this body!", Saber reached out and went in for the kill but his arm halted and was thrown across the field. Saber saw Inner Moka and Kokoa side by side. "I won't have your family deny me my vengeance!"
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Other

choices: Slave reappeared and activated the tablet.
Saber suddenly stopped and began losing control of his body to you
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Slave: Moka! Kokoa! I need you to two to stall while I complete the incantation!

Moka and Kokoa: Right!

Saber: Damn it! Get out of my way!

Inner Moka: It's over Slave! You can't win now.

Kokoa: Yeah! So do yourself a favor and give (name) back you bastard!

Saber: Do you really think that I would give up so easily? Although I must admit that you surprised me by teaming up with my ex slave over there. How were you able to get him to join you anyway?

Inner Moka: Wouldn't you like to know? Now we'll ask you again, get out of (name)'s body or we'll kick your ass!

Saber: HAHAHAHAAHAHA!!!! You little fool! You can't even touch me! After all, you couldn't bear the thought of hurting your precious (name) can you? Then again your sister over there probably couldn't care even less.

Kokoa: (name)! Come on! Snap out of it! Don't let this freak control you!

Inside your mind you were still curled up in a ball in a room of darkness. Suddenly, you heard someone calling your name. You couldn't tell who it was, but to you it felt familiar.

(name): Who's there? Is someone calling me?

You got up and walked around in the darkness trying to find out who was calling you. Then you saw a tiny light. You walked toward that light trying to find out what it was. Then you were close enough, the light showed an opening. When you looked through it, you could see Kokoa and Moka. Through that crack you could see through what you should be seeing, but Saber was in control.

(name): It's Kokoa. And Moka. Have......they come to help me?

Then Saber spoke through your body.

Saber: Heh. Try all you'd like brat, but (name)'s mine! After all it's thanks to you and your sister that I got this body. All (name) wanted was for you to love him for who he was even though you flat out rejected him because he was a human. You vampires are all the same. Clinging to your so called monster pride and thinking that everyone is below you. Personally he's probably better off being my vessel.

Inner Moka: You little bastard!

Moka charged at Saber and attacked with a flurry of kicks, but Saber was able to block them all with ease. Then Saber attacked right back and punched Moka in the gut knocking the wind out of her and sending her sprawling to the ground. Moka rebounded and tried to attack again, but this time Saber punched her in the face, kicked her in the side, and kicked her repeatedly until Moka looked like she was floating in the air. Then Saber gave a powerful kick sending her flying to a rock. Saber then headed towards Slave trying to stop him from removing him from your body, but Kokoa jumped in between them and intercepted him. She attacked Saber with a roundhouse kick, but Saber blocked it. Then Saber countered with a powerful punch, but Kokoa was able to dodge and left Saber open for an attack. She was about to land the punch, but then she stopped with her fist inches away from hitting Saber in the face.

Inner Moka: Kokoa! What are you doing?!? Get him!

Kokoa: I......I can't! I can't do it.

Even though it wasn't you that she was fighting, Kokoa couldn't bring herself to hit you. Saber took that opportunity to knee Kokoa in the gut knocking the wind out of her and then gave her a powerful slap in the face sending her to ground.

Slave: Oh no!

Saber: Oh yes Slave! Now you're next!

Before Slave had a chance to react, Saber appeared in front of him and knocked the tablet away from his hand. Then Saber went punched Slave in the gut and sent him flying to a tree. You watching through the crack gaped in horror.

(name): No! Kokoa! Everyone!

Saber: Ah. So you finally woke up huh? Don't bother. Your friends can't even hear you now. But don't worry, I'll make sure to torture your friends so you can get a good show. And I'll think I'll start with your little girlfriend.

(name): NO! Leave her alone!

Saber walked towards Kokoa who was still wincing in pain from getting hit in the stomach. Then Saber stepped on top of Kokoa's stomach hard making her scream in agony. Moka tried to get up, but she was still wracked with pain from being beat up. All you could do was sit and watch as Saber slowly wring out the life of Kokoa.

(name): Please.....stop......I'm begging you.

Saber: How pathetic. A proud vampire like this losing all because she can't hit a boy he rejected. Pathetic.

Kokoa: Sc-screw you.....bastard.

Saber: Hmm? Oh. So you actually the strength to speak do you?

Kokoa: You monster......give me back (name).......right now.....

Saber: Tell me something girl. Why do you care so much about this boy? He's a human, the sworn enemy of all vampires and monsters and yet you want me to give him back. Why?

Kokoa: Because.....I love him..........I love him for who he is. When we first met, I'll admit it I hated him the moment I saw him. But as time went on, I started noticing how he's..........different from other boys. He was always kind and gentle......and even though he was scared at times (name) always plucked up courage and...saw through something till the end. I'll admit that......that I was a little upset when I found out that he was a human, but......I don't care anymore! It took me a while to realize it sooner, but I love him! Even if he's a human, (name) is (name)! And I love him no matter what! SO GIVE HIM BACK TO ME RIGHT NOW YOU BASTARD!!!!!!

Inner Moka: Kokoa......

(name): Kokoa.....she.....she really does love me.

Inside your head you heard everything Kokoa said and you couldn't help, but tear up with joy and happiness. Moka who heard the whole thing smiled with pride. Suddenly Kokoa grabbed a firm hold of Saber's foot and began to force his foot off of her. You and Moka watched in surprise as Kokoa raised up Saber's foot little by little. Saber tried to step harder on her, but for some reason his foot was being pushed back by Kokoa's brute strength.

Saber: What the...? How is she getting so strong all of a sudden?

Then Kokoa pushed Saber's entire body off of her and punched Saber with all of her strength and might. Her fist hit Saber square in the face a dull and loud thud and sent him flying straight into the rocks with a mighty crash.

(name): W-wow!

Inner Moka: Heh. That's my baby sister.

It seemed that Kokoa won the fight, but then Saber stepped out of the rocks with a spectacular bruise on his right cheek. This time Saber was emitting a terrible aura and his eyes burned with rage.

Saber: You little shit! How dare you damage this body?!? I'll make you pay for that!!!

Kokoa: Come on then! I"m not scared of you!

Saber: You.....stinkin.....BIIIIIIITCH!!!!

Saber charged at Kokoa ready to kill her. Moka tried to get up, but even if she did she wouldn't make it in time. Kokoa gave everything she had to throw that punch so she couldn't move. It looked like Kokoa was done for when suddenly.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Saber v.s. Inner Moka and Kokoa

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You were trapped alone in the dark. Nothing. Then you saw a light at the end of a long tunnel. Were you dead? No, the light was taking shape and form. Into Kokoa.

"...", you said nothing. Your mind was a mess. Your feral vampire mind and normal mind were still conflicted but Saber was in control of both. You look to your right and see yourself as your Vampire side. "Who do you see?", your rational version asks to your vampire version.

"Moka, as her true self.", the vampire version replies.

"I see Kokoa, also as her true self. Why do you think we see these two?"

"Because we have a weakness for them. They're our mates."

"Right."

"They can set us free. But were conflicted. We have to love the same or else we can't fight Saber. Alone were broken and divided. But if we focus on them, the one that fuels our emotions, then we can expel him."

"OK. So let's agree who we both love. It's Kokoa."

"She isn't as strong as us. Moka is. She's our ideal mate."

"She might be able to tame you, but Kokoa is always herself all the time. Moka is like us, two people split apart."

"Exactly why I love her. Because she's like us. That's why my love for her is real."

"Kokoa is strong. We need her single mind to help fix ours. Moka is broken like we are. Two negatives won't equal a positive. Not in this case. Moka loves Tskune, and we also love Kokoa. We'll always be in flux with ourselves."

"Moka.....but............she's the only one who understands us."

"Sigh.....I know. She'd be a great lover in another life. But face it, were better off with Kokoa. She might not know what were going through, but she's the only one who can fix us. And you know it."

Your vampire version saw the image of Moka and saw her beauty. But knew that your rational mind was right. Kokoa loved you and will always be there for you. Moka's heart already belonged to Tskune. There wasn't any point in drawing it out hoping there might be a chance. "Goodbye. Moka.", then the image of Moka disappeared and reformed into Kokoa. As soon as it did your vampire version went from sad to almost complete joy. When he saw how special Kokoa was for him he knew she was the best choice.

Your mind was whole and strong enough to combat Saber's grasp but Slave still hadn't finished the spell. He needed more time to give you the opening you needed.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Inside your mind

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Saber fought the two vampire sisters in a ferocious slug-fest. Inner Moka was strong but combined with Saber's own spirit and your own vampire strength, Kokoa just managed to tip the scale to a full on deadlock. Slave was halfway finished the spell and Saber could feel his soul weakening. Realizing that fighting the sisters was buying Slave time he decided to stop wasting time. Kokoa tried to get a strong hit against Saber but he took advantage of her vulnerability and redirected her blow at Moka. Slave, seeing Saber gunning for him, was nearly finished and needed to chant the final verse, "In thine unholy embrace take thine soul from out thy body and banish it to it's past state being disembodied!", the spell was finished and Saber's soul exited your body. Saber's soul was lost and zig zagged all over the school but instead of returning to where he was trapped he entered Kokoa's body instead.

You woke up and saw Kokoa possessed by Saber. "Hmmm hmmmm hmmmeeeehehehehhee AHAHAHAHHAHAAHAHAAA! Slave...did you honestly believe I wouldn't have thought of a way to counter effect that curse in case it was used on me again? What may have worked all those years ago NO LONGER DOES!", then Kokoa grabbed Slave by the throat and began choking him to death. "I may have lost my ideal host, but this one will do nicely. She's got much more potential than I imagined. Even arguably stronger than (Name) and Bloodriver's offspring. Given time I'll be more powerful then I thought possible!"

Then inside Kokoa's head she resisted Saber's influence. "GET OUT OF MY HEAD!"

"Stop struggling. You don't have what it takes to break free of MY will. And you never will.", Saber mentally replied.

"I'm sick of your bullshit! GIVE ME BACK MY BODY!", Kokoa's resistance was so strong Saber released his grip on Slave's throat.

"Enough! I'm not letting you expelling me from this body! I've waited years to exact my-"

"SHUT UP! JUST GIVE ME MY BODY BACK!"

Then outside her mind Kokoa's body began spazzing out and convulsing. Inner Moka and you came to her and tried to calm her down. "What's happening?", you asked.

"Kokoa's fighting but I think it'll tear her own body apart. Their too evenly matched that it'll kill them both. You have to go in and help Kokoa."

"OK.", you laid next to Kokoa and Inner Moka allowed your mind to enter Kokoa's, you saw Saber and Kokoa fighting and it was incredible by both how strong she was and how relentless the two opponents were. You called out to her and yelled, "Kokoa!", she turned and saw you she paused in the middle of the fight, but time froze for a moment as you were the embodiment of everything to her. "(Name)?"

"Fuck him up.", you simply said.

The boost in confidence gave her the edge to expel Saber. "The only one who get to roaming around in my head and mess with my body, is that lying little handsome scumbag that I absolutely adore!", and with that she over powered Saber to his disbelief and she tossed him right out of her mind.

Saber's spirit escaped Kokoa's body and tried escaping the school grounds entirely but Inner Moka had other plans. She had Tskune take off her Rosary and Slave used the spell to trap him inside it. The force was so great that Saber couldn't pull away. His spirit was now trapped inside Moka's own rosary.

"Hope you like it here.", she joked.
