"See now it makes sense she's your girl (Name). You both already argue like your married so its natural your a couple.", your dad joked.

"Oh let me drink his blood pleeeeeeeaaaaaasssssseeee! Tell I can drain him dry! Pleeeeeeeeeaaaaaaasssssseeee!", Kokoa said angrily trying to do exactly that. But Moka kept her back and came with a quick reason for her oddly specific threat.

"Sorry Kokoa is a big goth fanatic, she can be too into her little world sometimes around adults."

"Moka.....what the hell is goth?", Kokoa asked still struggling a bit.

"(Kokoa shut up and run with it and don't drink my dads blood! Promise I'll......whisper.......just how you like it.)", you whispered. Kokoa snapped back from her fit of anger and relented.

"(Name) are you sure-"

"Mom trust me there's more than what she lets out initially.", you reassured your mom trying to quell her worries on who your dating right now. Kokoa is a bit childish but only acts like that when you offend her, which is easy to do.

"Well this calls for a big dinner then. I'll start up dinner and then we can get to know each other from there.", your old man said.

"Thank you.", said Kokoa.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kokoa comes down the stairs

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
A little later dinner was ready. Your mom and made one of your favorite dishes. A giant stack of chicken croquettes with rice and tea. When Moka, Tsukune, and Kokoa saw the giant stack of croquettes they were a little surprised of how much food there was. You however were drooling and ready to eat.

(name): All right Mom! You made your famous croquettes!

Your Dad: Oh yeah! I've been looking forward to this all day!

Your Mom: Oh you two. You're both too kind. Now then, I've made plenty of food so eat all you like.

Everyone: Thank you for the food!

Then everyone dug in and started eating. You, your father, and your mother snarfed down the food like there was no tomorrow while Kokoa, Moka, and Tsukune watched you all eat in shock.

Kokoa: Whoa....talk about no class.

Moka: Wow......they sure love to eat.

Tsukune: Are the croquettes really that good?

Then Tsukune took one of the croquettes and took a bite. His eyes went wide and he looked like he was struck by lightning.

Tsukune: Th-this is........the is incredible!!!!! This is a masterpiece!!!!

Then Tsukune stuffed his face with three or two croquettes and began to eat as fast as you and your parents. Moka seeing Tsukune decided to try one too. When she took a bite she had the exact same reaction as Tsukune did. Her pink hair almost stood up on end.

Moka: Oh my gosh! He's right! These croquettes are wonderful! Kokoa you have to try this!

Kokoa: Um....Big Sister?

Kokoa was a little freaked about everyone going crazy over the croquettes, but she gave in and decided to try one. As soon as she bit into it, her eyes turned heart shaped and her mind exploded. (not literally)

Kokoa: These croquettes......they're......so good!!!!! Seriously!? Ms. (name)! What the heck did you do to make this?!

Your Mom: Oh nothing special. Just cut some meat, add some potatoes, and a few other stuff and cook it.

(name): See I told you! My mom's the best cook in japan!

Your Dad: Yup! Not to mention that she's the best cook I've ever married!

Your Mom: Oh boys. Now there's plenty to eat so eat as much as you want.

Kokoa: In that case, don't mind if I do!!

Then everyone ate and ate until there was no more.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Dinner

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
After dinner, everyone took the time to get to know one another a little. You all talked a little about yourselves and your parents did the same. Then your parents showed some family pictures of you when you were a little kid, much to your embarrassment. At first, you wanted your parents to stop showing off your pictures, but Kokoa insisted on seeing them because she thought that you were cute as a kid. After a while, you all were having fun looking at all the photos of your childhood.

Your Mom: Aww! Look! Here's (name) when he was 6! Oh he was so cute!

(name): Mom! Come on! You've been saying that almost every single photo of me we've looked at.

Your Mom: But it's true! You were such cutie and were so adorable.

Kokoa: She's right you know. You do look cute.

(name): Kokoa...

Moka: You know, seeing (name)'s photo's make me want to see your photos Tsukune.

Tsukune: Uh... yeah! Yeah...

Tsukune blushed a bright shade of pink. You figured that he had some embarrassing pictures of himself as a kid as well. Then when your mom turned the page, there was photo of you grinning with a girl that was taller than you. She looked a little like you, but she looked a little younger.

Kokoa: Who's that (name)?

(name): That's my sister, Kurumi. She and I go way back. When I was little, she and I would do anything together. But after I started middle school and went to a different school, I haven't been able to see her much. Which is why I'm excited to have her come here. I've haven't seen her in a while.

Moka: What's your little sister like?

(name): Well... I guess you can say that she's a little like you and Kokoa. At times she was kind and sweet and sometimes she's a little stubborn and bratty. Overall, she's awesome.

Tsukune: Sounds like she's an awesome person.

Kokoa: Yeah. I'd like to meet her too.

Your Mom: Oh she'll love you Kokoa! Once you'll be best friends!

Your Dad: Yeah. You and her can talk about stuff like that goth thing you mentioned before.

Kokoa nearly snapped at your father's comment, but one look from you and she kept quiet. Afterwords, your dad and your mom decided to spend some time alone together while they waited for your younger sister to come home. Tsukune and Moka decided to do the same. As for you and Kokoa, you both hung out in your room and watched a little TV.

(name): (sigh) I wonder where Kurumui is?

Kokoa: Oh don't be such a worry wart. She's fine. She's probably just running late.

(name): Yeah.

Kokoa: Say (name)? Why did I have to let your parents think that I was a goth or whatever that is?

(name): Kokoa you know why. I can't exactly tell your parents that my girlfriend is a vampire. I mean... if they found out they'd totally freak out.

Kokoa: Still. I'm not a goth! What the hell is a goth anyway?

(name): It's basically someone who likes the darker side of life and wears black and listens to metal and punk music. Or at least that's what I heard anyway.

Kokoa: Sounds like my kind of thing. Maybe I should go goth.

(name): Please don't.

Kokoa: Oh. By the way, remember what you told me before when your dad said I was goth?

At first, you didn't know what Kokoa meant, but then you suddenly remembered.

(name): Hmmm. Oh! Yeah... I did... But Kokoa are you sure? I mean... my sister is gonna be here any minute and...

Then Kokoa seductively got in real close to you. So close that she was almost inches away from kissing you.

Kokoa: Come on. You said you'd do it just how I like it. Besides, it's just for a little while. We got plenty of time.

You instinctively gulped by Kokoa's advance and your heart began to beat.

(name); OK. But just for a little while. I don't want anyone seeing us.

Kokoa: Don't worry. We'll be fine. Besides, I've been looking forward to this.

Then you...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Later.....

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content: How about your sister comes home right at that very moment?
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Other

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Just then the doorbell began to ring. You and Kokoa immediately snapped out of your little moment.

"The doorbell again?" said Kokoa.

"Could it be..." you said taking a guess as to who it was.

Then you both heard a voice. A voice that Kokoa didn't know, but you knew the voice instantly.

"(name)! Where are you big bro?"

"It's Kurumi!" you whooped. "She's here! She's really here!"

You dashed out of the room and ran to the front door leaving Kokoa in the dust. When you got there, there was a girl that looked about your age. She had short blonde hair that went to her ears. Her body was athletic, her height as tall as your shoulder, her eyes were a bright blue, she wore a red tank top and a pair of blue short-shorts with a purple jacket. When you saw her, you immediately went straight to her.

"Sis!"

"Big bro!"

You both embraced each other in a big hug.

"Oh man Kurumi, It's so good to see you!" you said.

"Likewise Big bro," Kurumi replied. "You haven't changed much either. Still got the same wishy washy face from when we were kids."

"Hey! I haven't changed that much!" you grumbled.

Then Moka, Tsukune, and Kokoa came to the door.

"Oh. (name)? Is she who I think she is?" asked Moka.

"Oh yes. Moka. Tsukune. Kokoa. Allow me to introduce my younger sister; Kurumi. Kurumi, these are my friends from school Moka and Tsukune, and this is my girlfriend, Kokoa."

"Nice meet to you," said Kokoa, Moka, and Tsukune.

"Nice to meet you all as well," said Kurumi.

Then Kurumi came up to Kokoa and looked intently at her. She looked at her all over as if she was inspecting something.

"Um... What are you looking at?" asked Kokoa feeling a little creeped out.

"Are you really my bro's girlfriend?' asked Kurumi suspiciously.

"Um... yes." said Kokoa uncertain to what was going to happen.

You, Moka, and Tsukune looked on wondering what was going to happen. You were gonna assume that your sister was gonna get overprotective and say something about Kokoa not being good enough or something, but the exact opposite happened. Kurumi let a out a high and loud squeal that made you want to hold your ears.

"(name). You finally got yourself a girlfriend?! You sly fox! I didn't know you had it in you bro!" she laughed giving you a hard slap on your back.

"Hey! Take it easy sis! Geez. You're just as brutal as you were when we were kids."

"Can you blame me?" said Kurumi laughing. "My big bro's got himself a girlfriend now. I was thinking that you'd end being the 40 year old virgin with the way things happened."

"Hey! You didn't need to bring that up!" you said embarrassed.

Kurumi laughed again while you started pouting and sulking. Moka and Tsukune thinking that the whole thing was cute began to chuckle while Kokoa smiled.

"Those two certainly are close," said Tsukune.

"Well it's only natural," said Moka. "They are brother and sister."

Then Kurumi came up to Kokoa and held out her hand.

"Hey there. You're Kokoa right? It's nice to meet you and thank you for taking care of my big bro. Please continue to do so. He can be a little wishy washy."

"Hey! That's not true and you know it!" you said indignantly.

Kokoa chuckled and took Kurumi's hand shaking it.

"Don't worry. I'll take care of him. Even though if he's wishy washy."

You said nothing. You just crossed your arms and puckered your mouth in a pout.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Meeting Kurumi

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
A little after, everyone chatted and got to know each other more. You, Tsukune, and your father had some guy talk while Moka talked with your mother about some things. Meanwhile Kokoa had some fun talking with Kurumi. She may have first met her, but the more she talked to her, the more comfortable she felt. Pretty soon, it was like the two of them became best friends.


"Hahaha! No way! You're kidding!" laughed Kokoa.

"I'm dead serious!" said Kurumi chucking. "He was so freaked, he looked like that painting "The Scream."

Kokoa laughed. "Oh my gosh! Hahahaha!!! I'd pay to see that! Hahaha!"

Both girls shrieked with laughter holding their sides. Then after a while they calmed down.

"Hey. You know what Kokoa?" asked Kurumi.

"What?"

"You're a pretty awesome girl. Out of all the girls I've met in my life, you're the most funny and the most interesting."

"Really?" asked Kokoa.

"Yup," replied Kurumi. "You're probably not aware of this yet,, but you're pretty lucky to have my bro as a lover."

"Why do you say that?" asked Kokoa.

"You see, back when he was a kid, (name) was always a tenderhearted boy," explained Kurumi. He may be a little rough around the edges at first, but he's really a kind and gentle boy who always cared about his friends and family. In fact, he would always come and protect me whenever I was in trouble. Even when he got into that fight that got him kicked out, he only did it to help out that kid who was being bullied. It's a miracle that he came through all of that OK. He's a nice boy and he deserves to be with a great girl."

Kokoa looked at Kurumi curiously and then looked up at the ceiling. She thought back all the time she spent with you. When you first met, when you both were trapped in the cave, when you both went on your date, and even when you two fought side by side.

"You're right. When I first met him he seemed to be a bit perv and a jerk, but the more I got to know him, the more I realized what a kind man he is. I guess that's why I fell for him."

Kurumi looked at Kokoa and giggled which made Kokoa giggle as well.

"That's good. Keep on falling for him," said Kurumi. "Because he is gonna be your husband one of these days."

"M-my husband?!" said Kokoa blushing.

"Of course. Once that happens you'll probably end up starting a family, having kids..."

At this point, Kokoa was now a blushing so much, steam was coming out of her head. She then imagined herself and you living in a house with 4 kids and being happy which made her even more embarrassed.

"Wh-wh-what are you talking about?! I can't do something like that?! It's way too embarrassing...."

Kurumi seeing Kokoa getting flustered like this chuckled to herself.

"Hahaha. How cute..." she thought.

Meanwhile back with you, you were going into the kitchen to get a cup of water to quench your thirst after talking to Tsukune and your Dad for so long. As you were getting a cup of water, you heard the chime of the doorbell again.

"Huh? That's weird. I don't think we're expecting anyone else," you thought as you went to the door. You went to the door and opened it. And you see...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Later that night...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
He was a little taller than you, about your age if not older, had a slight muscular build, wore a black t-shirt with a red symbol that looked like a magic circle and a pair of blue slacks with white shoes.

"Oh. Hello there" the boy said.

"Hi. Can I help you sir?" you asked.

"Yeah. Names Jack King. I was wondering if Kurumi was home?" the boy asked.

"Kurumi? How do you know Kurumi?" you asked.

Before Jack could answer, your parents came.

"Hey (name)? Who's at the door?" asked your father.

"Some guy named Jack King Dad," you replied.

"Oh my goodness. Jack's here? Oh let him in, let him in. He's a friend (name)." said your mom. "Oh I better get Kurumi. She'll want to see him."

So your mom went upstairs to get Kurumi while you opened the door and let Jack in. Your father greeted him warmly.

"Hey how you doing Jack? Great to you see you kid."

"Likewise sir. By the way, is this man..."

"Oh. I forgot you haven't met him before. Jack, this is (name) my son and Kurumi's big brother."

"Ah. So your old man's second kid?. That makes you my brother in law."

"Wait, brother in law? What do you mean by that?"

Just then Kurumi came down the stairs with Kokoa behind with her. She had an excited look on her face.

"Where is he?! Where is he?" Kurumi asked. Then she saw Jack. The moment she saw him, she let out a loud squeal and her eyes sparkled. The boy also saw Kurumi and he gave the same reaction. You and Kokoa looked at the two of them puzzled as to what was going on. Your parents on the other hand stood off to the side and chuckled.

"Here we go," said your father.

"Jacky-poo!"

"Kuru-boo-boo!"

Suddenly Kurumi ran towards the boy in out the door and jumped straight at the boy. The boy caught her and twirled her around a little before embracing her in a hug. You and Kokoa stood there a little surprised. You especially because you've never seen Kurumi act so girly before.

"What... the hell?" murmured Kokoa.

"Um... sis? Do you two know each other?" you asked.

"Oh yeah! I forgot that you don't know him because you've been at school. (name), allow me to introduce one of the coolest guys on this planet, Jack King! My boyfriend!"

The moment you heard the word 'boyfriend' you felt that the entire world just froze around you. The room was silent. Then you broke out laughing.

"Hahaha. That's funny sis," you said. "It sounded like you just said that you had a boyfriend."

"Um... son?" said your father. "She did."

"WHAT?!?!" you yelled immediately getting into big bro mode. "When? How? Why? Is he nice to you? Did he bribe you?!"

"Oh my. I think he broke," said your mom.

A few moments of calming down later...

After a while Kurumi introduced Jack to everyone and explained that she and him had been going out together for almost a year now, When your mom and dad first met Jack, they were overprotective like you were, but they accepted Jack and treated him like one of the family. After that, Jack introduced himself to Kokoa, Moka, and Tsukune. You sat off to the side watching Jack getting along with your friends, but you still felt a little overprotective of Kurumi not knowing about Jack up till now. It may have been none of your business, but still. Then Jack came up to to you.

"Hey. Watcha doing over here all by yourself?" he asked.

"Oh um...nothing. Just...nothing," you said.

"Let me guess. You still feel overprotective about Kurumi am I right?"

"Well... I... Um..." you stuttered trying to think of an excuse, but you had nothing. He hit the nail on the head.

"Listen (name), I just wanna let you know that I love your sister and I would never do anything to hurt her. I understand where you're coming from, but Kurumi is a grown woman you know and you gotta to trust her and make her own decisions."

"I know," you apologized. "I'm sorry. It's just that she's my little sister and I was just shocked. That's all."

"That's understandable," said Jack. "You know I've really been wanting to meet you. Your sister talks about you after all."

"Really?"

"Yeah. So... if you're willing... I was hoping that we could be friends?" asked Jack.

He held out his hand giving you a friendly smile. You looked at his hand and looked at him, then you smiled back and shook his hand.

"Yeah. Sure. Let's be friends."

"Hey Jacky-poo!" Kurumi called. "I sure could use my man right about now!"

"Coming Kuru-boo-boo"

And with that Jack left to go spend some time with Kurumi. As you watched him go to Kurumi, you heard your vampire side in your head.

"Hey kid. Can you hear me?"

"Vampire me. You've been quiet for a while. What's up?"

"Listen. Watch out for that Jack guy."

"Huh? What do you mean?" you asked a little surprised.

"For some reason I'm getting a really bad vibe from him, like something about him isn't human. I also think that he's hiding some kind of strong power. I can feel it."

"Seriously? Then what should we do?"

"For now, do nothing. Just be extra careful alright? And keep an eye on your sister and Kokoa too."

You looked back at Jack who was talking to Kurumi. You felt worried about what your vampire side said.

"Could it be true? Is Jack that dangerous?" you thought. "Maybe my vampire side's being overprotective like I was, but... then again he's never lied to me before..."

"(name) are you okay? You look worried."

Kokoa's voice drove you from your thoughts as she came up to you.

"Oh it's nothing Kokoa," you replied. "I was just thinking that's all."

"OK then," said Kokoa. "In any case, everyone's gonna be going to sleep. Big Sis and Tsukune are gonna be sleeping in the guest bedroom and Jack's gonna be sleeping with Kurumi. I was gonna get ready for bed myself. You coming?"

"Yeah. Sure," you said as you followed Kokoa back to your room and got ready for bed.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: A man you didn't know

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
That night, the whole house was silent. Moka and Tsukune were sleeping in the guest bedroom, your parents were sleeping in their own bedroom and Jack slept on the couch. As for you and Kokoa, you both slept in separate rooms. You slept in your own room while Kokoa slept with Kurumi. Everyone was slept asleep except for you and it wasn't just because you were sleeping alone in your room. You lied in your bed wide awake still thinking about Kurumi and Jack and what your vampire side said.

"I know I shouldn't be worried about it, but... I still can't help but worry. I mean even if it was true, does Kurumi even know about Jack and if so how come my parents don't suspect about it? -sigh-"

All that thinking made you even more stressed about your sister's safety. Then you had the feeling to use the bathroom. So you got out of bed and headed for the restroom. You went washed up and headed back to your room. Then you passed by your sister's room. You saw that your door was slightly ajar. You couldn't help, but peek a little through the door. You couldn't see your sister, but did see Kokoa however. When you saw her, your eyes went a little wide. She was on a mattress on the floor sleeping peacefully wearing a just a t-shirt. You could see her panties glowing in moonlight. This somewhat erotic made you start getting a boner.

"Oh wow... It's almost a crime to watch Kokoa like this," you thought. "I know I probably shouldn't but... I wanna do her like this."

You carefully opened the door and were about to sneak into the room, but suddenly...

"What are you doing?"

You couldn't help but let out a scream from hearing your vampire side's voice, but you quickly covered your mouth. Kokoa stirred a little, but she didn't wake up.

"What the hell was that?!" you mentally screamed to your vampire self. "You nearly gave me a heart attack!"

"That was me stopping you from doing something stupid," replied your vampire self. "Come on man. I understand that you wanna do Kokoa, but come on. Have some restraint."

"I don't wanna hear that coming from the guy that said 'Do it! Do it! Do it!' when Kokoa was practiclly sick due to the shower!"

"That was one thing and this is other. I may be your other half that loves sex, but at least I have morals and know that there's a time and place for that."

"Shut up."

Just then, you heard noise. You immediately snapped to the direction where you heard the noise.

"What was that?"

"I don't know," your vampire side said. "It sounded like it was coming from downstairs."

You carefully made your way down the stairs not making a sound. The sound came again a little louder coming from the kitchen. It was the sound of clinking of some kind.

"It's coming from there," you said.

"Be careful," your vampire self said. "Be ready to switch with me if you have to."

"Right."

You tip-toed behind the corner towards the kitchen and peeked out. You could see the intruder in the kitchen by the fridge. After taking a few deep breaths, you jumped into the kitchen and gunned straight for the intruder.

"Hold it right there! Who are you and what are you doing here?!"

The intruder turned around surprised and carefully flipped the switch. The lights came on and you could see who the intruder was now. It was just Kurumi getting a cup of milk.

"K-k-kurumi?" you stuttered.

"Nice to see you too big bro," she said a little surprised herself.

"What the heck are you doing?!" you exclaimed. "I thought you were some kind of burglar!"

"I was just getting some milk. Sheesh. Can't girl get some milk around here?" Kurumi sighed. "Geez. I knew you were the tense kind of person bro, but I didn't think you'd go all copper on me."

"Well maybe you shouldn't be sneaking around like that!" you snapped.

You both glared at each other. Then you both chuckled.

"What the heck are we doing?" you said. "We're both acting paranoid."

"I'll say," said Kurumi. "So I take it that you couldn't get to sleep either?"

"Yeah. More or less."

"Want some milk? I'll help you fall asleep."

"No thanks. Besides that can be bad for your teeth you know."

"Whatever."

Kurumi gulped down her milk and sighed contentedly.

"There's nothing like a fresh cup of milk before you get to sleep," she said.

"If you say so," you replied.

There was a brief pause. Then Kurumi broke the silence.

"Hey (name)? Can I ask you something? How do you feel about Jack? I mean... I know it must have been a shocker to know that he's my boyfriend and everything, but... I really want you to accept us. I mean I really love this guy and I can't bear to be apart from him and..."

You raised your hand to stop Kurumi.

"Kurumi. Look, I'll be honest when I found out about you and Jack I was... surprised and yet at the same time worried about your safety. I mean you are my baby sister after all. I know that things are... rocky, but I'm willing to give Jack a chance. If you want my approval, you've already got it. You'll get no argument from me. Also I'll accept you no matter what. You are my sister after all."

"Oohhh! (name)! That's why you're the best big bro a girl can ask for!" squealed Kurumi as she gave you a big hug. "I knew you'd say that! Thank you!"

"Hehehe. It's nothing sis, but if Jack does anything to you, he'll have to answer to me."

"I know. Anyway, I'm gonna go to sleep now. Night bro."

"Night Kurumi."

And so Kurumi went back to your room. Leaving you alone in the kitchen. Your vampire side's voice came into your mind again.

"Willing to give Jack a chance huh?"

"What else could I say?" you replied. "It's true that I shouldn't trust Jack, but... I also want to believe Kurumi. I mean... she's my sister."

"Well... all I can say is to stay on guard," your vampire side said. "Whatever happens, I'm sure you can handle it and I'll be right here if you need me."

"I know and I thank you."

"Now let's get some sleep. We'll focus on Jack tomorrow."

"Right."

Then you went back upstairs to your room and went to sleep.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Later that night...

choices: You both heard a noise coming from your room.
You both ask your Mom and then go to look for Jack and Kurumi
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
The next day, you were lying in your bed sleeping in due to you staying up last night. You breathed slowly in and out sleeping soundly. Then you felt someone poke you and call your name. You paid no attention and continued to sleep. You were poked again this time a little harder. You murmured in your sleep and turned to your side. Then suddenly you were shaken like crazy and someone called your name even louder.

"(Name)! Wake up! (Name)!"

Your eyes snapped open and you sat up. You looked towards the person who woke you which turned out to be Tsukune.

"Tsukune...? What the heck are you doing? Don't you know what time it is?"

"(Name) we have a problem! If you knew what was going on you'd be freaking out!" said Tsukune.

"Oh come on. What could be so important that you have to wake me up?" you asked covering yourself up with the blankets.

"It's the girls! They're all gone!"

You sat up now completely wide awake. You immediately got out of bed and went straight to Kurumi's room. I opened the door to find that Kurumi's room was completely empty. Her room was neat and tidy, but there was no sign of neither Kurumi nor Kokoa. There wasn't even any sleeping bag.

"What... the hell?" you murmured.

"Yeah. I know," said Tsukune. "I couldn't even find Moka. She was right next me when I fell asleep, but when I woke up the next morning, she wasn't there."

Then you saw your Mom coming down the hallway.

"Mom? Where did everyone go?" you asked.

"Oh. Kurumi went with Jack to do some lovey dovey stuff together son," she said.

"And? What about Moka and Kokoa?" you asked. "Have you seen them?"

Your Mom looked puzzled. "Kokoa? Moka? Are those the names of coffee flavors or something?"

"No Mom. They're the names of my and Tsukune's girlfriends. You met them the other night remember?"

"Hmmm... I can't recall," said your mother as she walked down the hall. "I can't remember meeting Cocoa and Moka."

You watched your Mom walk away with a dumbfounded expression on your face.

"Told you," said Tsukune. "Don't even try asking your Dad because he gave me the same response."

"What the heck is going on here?" you asked. "It's like my Mom doesn't remember anything about last night."

"I don't know," said Tsukune. "One thing's for sure, something's definitely wrong. Moka, Kokoa, Kurumi, and Jack missing? Tell me that's not weird."

"No kidding," you said. "Wait... Jack is missing too?"

"Yes."

Then you heard your vampire self inside your head.

"Hey kid. You there?"

"What's up vampire me? I'm kinda in a situation here."

"I can see that. I think it's obvious what happened here. Jack has taken the girls for some unknown reason."

"You think?"

"Yeah. I sensed something was wrong with that guy the moment I saw him and this confirms it. He must have taken them while we were sleeping and then wiped your parents memories leaving ours intact."

"If that's true, then why didn't he wipe our memories?"

"He probably thought that we wouldn't be much of a threat either that or he screwed up and forgot about us by mistake."

"Hey (name)? What's up?"

Tsukune's voice snapped you out of your thoughts.

"Sorry Tsukune. I was talking to my vampire self," you said. "He was just telling me what was going on. He thinks that Jack is the one behind this."

"Jack took the girls?" asked Tsukune tightening his fists. "But why? Why would he do this?"

"I don't know," you said. "But we have to investigate this. We have to find him and rescue the girls."

"Yeah, but where do we start looking? I mean this isn't like Law and Order where we just find a clue at the scene of the crime."

"If only we had something or someone that saw what happened last night," you said thoughtfully. "Maybe then we pick up the slack and find Jack."

"Maybe we can ask your mom where Jack and Kurumi went," suggested Tsukune. "Then we can go from there and look for them."

Then...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The next day...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
"What was that?" you asked hearing the noise.

"It sounded like it came from your room," said Tsukune.

"Let's check it out!"

You both ran back into your room. As you both came into your room, you saw nothing out of the ordinary. Then you saw something moving on top of your bed. Something was tangled up in a mess of your blankets and sheets. You quietly motioned Tsukune to move next to the bed, so you both could catch the perpetrator. You both slowly creeped up on the bed Tsukune taking one side and you taking the other. Then you slowly reached out and gripped the blanket. You gently signaled Tsukune with a finger that you were gonna remove the covers and Tsukune nodded.

One...Two...Three!!!

You uncovered the covers and you and Tsukune were ready to attack whatever was on your bed, but then you both stopped. There lying on your bed was a frightened and slightly burned Ko.

"Please don't hurt me whee!!!" he squeaked.

"What the... Ko?!" exclaimed Tsukune.

Ko opened his eyes and when he saw the two of you, he flapped up and hugged you on the face.

"Oh Mr. (name) and Tsukune! Thank goodness I found the two of you!" said Ko.

"Glad to see you too Ko," you said as you peeled Ko off of your face. "Now what the heck are you doing in my room?"

"It's terrible!" cried Ko. "It's awful! They took.... They are... I think...!"

"Whoa Ko! Calm down," said Tsukune. "You're acting more batty than usual. No pun intend."

"Just take a deep breath and calm down," you said. "Plus we gotta get you fixed up. Tsukune get the first aid kit."

After that, you patched up Ko making sure that his wounds wouldn't get disinfected.

"Now then, have you calmed down Ko?" you asked. "And do feel any better?"

"It's OK. I'm fine now whee," said Ko.

"Now what's going on? Why were you freaking out earlier?" asked Tsukune.

"Oh yeah! I almost forgot! Mr. Tsukune! Mr. (name)! It's horrible! Ms. Kokoa and Ms Moka have been kidnapped!"

"What?!" said you and Tsukune at the same time. "Kidnapped!?"

"Yes! It's true! I saw it with my own two bat eyes whee! There was even another girl that I didn't know too!"

"Wait a minute Ko, did you see anything last night?" you asked. "If you did, you have to tell us everything you know."

"OK. It all started last night. I was flying in the middle of the night going to check on Ms. Kokoa whee. I had just got into the house and flying up towards upstairs, but then I heard someone coming. So I hid and then I saw it. Someone was carrying the three girls out of a room. The guy was wearing all black clothes and he was wearing a hoodie. He carried Ms. Moka, Ms. Kokoa and the other girl out of the house and put them in a car and drove away. After that, I followed the car. Eventually the car stopped at some kind of abandoned house on the edge of town and I saw the guy get out of the car with Ms. Kokoa and Ms. Moka, but..."

"But what?" you asked.

"I don't know how, but that guy must have noticed me," said Ko "He used some kind of crazy magic attack and shot me out of the sky."

"That explains your injuries, but how did you get all the way here?" you continued.

"It was difficult but I was able to fly a little until I eventually made it back," said Ko. "I'm so sorry whee. I should have done more. Then Ms. Kokoa and Moka wouldn't have been kidnapped."

"Ko it wasn't your fault," said Tsukune. "And you helped us more than you know."

"Really?"

"Yes. Thanks to you, we have a lead on where the guy took Moka and Kokoa," you said petting Ko's head. "You've been a big help to us. Good job Ko."

As you petted Ko's head, Ko couldn't help but smile a little.

"Wait Ko. One more thing," said Tsukune. "Did you see who it was? I mean did you get a good look of his face?"

"Unfortunately I didn't," said Ko. "The only thing I saw was his clothes. Black with some strange symbol on it and white shoes too."

"What was the symbol?" you asked. "Anything will help."

"Hmmm..."

Ko put a wing on his chin trying to remember what he saw. Then he remembered.

"Oh yeah! It was dark, but I saw it. It was a strange red magic circle."

Your heart jumped a little and you thought back. There was only one person you saw that had a shirt like that and Tsukune knew it too.

"(name). There's only one person who could have done this," he said.

"Yeah. Jack," you said clenching your fists. "Not only that... but he has to be a monster. How else would he be able to take the girls?"

"Yeah. I know."

"Damn it all!" you cursed punching your bed. "Why didn't I see it sooner?! Why didn't I realize it?!"

"Calm down (name). It's not your fault. Jack fooled all of us," said Tsukune. "Don't worry. We'll get them back."

"Yeah. I know. One thing's for sure. Jack's sure as hell gonna pay for this. No one kidnaps my girl and my sister and my girl's sister and gets away with it!" you growled.

"Damn straight!" said Tsukune.

"Ko. I know you're injured, but do you mind coming with us? We need you to guide us to that house you saw."

"I can," said Ko. "But do either of you two have a plan whee?"

"Isn't it obvious?" you said getting your shoes on. "We go in, beat Jack up and rescue the girls and call it a day!"

"That sounds something Kokoa would say," said Tsukune. "but it's better than nothing."

"All right then! Let's get to that building!" you said grabbing Ko and placing him on your shoulder "Let's go Ko!"

And so the three of you set off on a mission to save the girls and kick Jack's ass.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You both heard a noise coming from your room.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Eventually you all arrived at the house thanks to Ko's directions. It looked old and a bit run down, but it looked to be the perfect place for someone to hideout. The sun had also set and it was nighttime.

"There it is!" said Ko. "That's the house I saw that guy take the girls whee!"

"So that's where Jack is," said Tsukune, "He's right inside along with Moka, Kokoa, and Kurumi."

"Don't worry you guys. We're coming to save you," you said. "Let's go get em."

"Wait! Shouldn't you two come up with some kind of plan or something?" asked Ko. "You two could be walking right into a trap whee!"

"Oh there won't be a trap Ko," you replied. "Besides, screw making a plan. I'm going through the front door! I'm gonna give Jack an ass kicking he won't forget!"

You ran towards the house with Tsukune by your side and both of you burst through the front door and came into the house. There waiting for you be some stairs was Jack.

"Well, well, well. Look who finally decided to show up," he said flashing a sly grin.

"All right Jack! Where are Kokoa and Moka!?" demanded Tsukune. "We know you took them!"

"And so what if I did?" asked Jack coolly. "What are you gonna do about it?"

"Jack. Listen to me. I decided to trust you out of respect for my sister," you said. "But now you just screwed up that trust. I put my faith in you and this is how you repay me. However... even though you've done all of this, I'm still willing to give you another chance. Now please answer; do you know where the girls are? If so please return them."

Jack said nothing for a good few seconds. Then he spoke.

"Yes. I know where they are and I'm willing to tell you under one condition," he said.

"And what condition is that?" asked Tsukune.

Jack then smiled devilishly and spoke in a sinister tone. "I'll give them back in exchange for your lives!"

Your eyes widened in shock as every ounce of hop that you could reason with Jack was gone in an instant and that was quickly replaced with anger.

"Are you crazy?! There's no way that we'll do that!" said Tsukune. "If you won't tell us where they are then we'll just have to beat it out of you."

"Go ahead and try," said Jack. "It'll be the last thing you two will ever do!"

His eyes began to flash in a bright red color and he began to release an aura that was soaked with murderous intent. You and Tsukune immediately were on your guard.

"Incredible... his monster energy is off the chain..." said Tsukune.

"I know... it's making me get goosebumps," you said.

Then Ko squeaked on your shoulder. "Holy crap you guys! This guy's is a monster!"

"Um... Ko. We established that," you said.

"You don't get it whee!" said Ko. "This guy's not just any monster! He's a vampire just like Ms. Moka and Ms. Kokoa!"

You and Tsukune looked at Ko both of your eyes wide with shock.

"No way! Are you serious Ko?!" you asked.

"As serious as Moka's obsession with Tsukune's blood! This Jack guy is a vampire!" said Ko. "I can tell! His incredible monster energy is similar Ms. Moka and Ms. Kokoa! Only his is way more sinister whee!"

Then you heard your vampire side in your head. "He's right. I can sense it too. (name)! You have let me take over now! Otherwise this guys gonna mop the floor with you!"

"Tsukune! Get back!" you said aloud. "This battle is gonna be too much for you."

"But I wanna fight with you!" complained Tsukune. "I have as much as a right to fight as you do!"

"I mean it Tsukune. Get back," you said. "Besides... Jack's gonna pay for what he did. This is personal. I wanna fight him myself."

You punctuated your statement by releasing a powerful monster aura of your own and you began to transform to your monster form. Your muscles slightly bulged a little, your hair turned white and your eyes turned red. Tsukune and Ko were amazed from your transformation. Your vampire self glared at Jack who was a little surprised but amused at your transformation.

"Well what do you know. I never would have guessed that you would be a vampire as well (name)," he said.

"That's Mr. (name) to you bub," your vampire self said as he cracked his knuckles. "I hope your ready for a beat down because in case you didn't know you broke a rule. No one... and I mean no one takes my girl and my sister and my girl's sister and lives to tell about it."

Your vampire self gave Jack a glare soaked in murderous and hateful intent. Ko and Tsukune could even feel it.

"Oh man... (name)'s vampire self is like Moka's," said Tsukune. "Moody with a major power to match."

"No kidding," said Ko. "If you think about it, he could pass as Moka's brother whee!"'

Both vampires stared at each other daring for one to make a move. Then...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: At the house...

choices: Tsukune and Ko manage to find the bathroom
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Your vampire self leaped towards Jack your hands balled into fists and came swinging with a powerful punch. Jack crossed his arms blocking the sending a powerful shock wave that shook throughout the house. Jack then came swinging with a punch of his own, but he was able to duck out of the way making him miss. He then swung his leg in a powerful kick and Jack jumped back dodging the blow.

"You're pretty good," said Jack. "Just what I'd expect from a vampire like you, but you're gonna have to do better than that if you wanna beat me kid."

"Then how about I start doing better right now?!" your vampire self yelled as you launched himself straight at Jack.

You and Jack then entered in an all out brawl. The two of you went back and forth punching and kicking each other in an incredible speed. Tsukune and Ko watched the fighting unfold with wide eyes.

"Oh man! Those two are really going at it!" said Tsukune. "Am I glad that (name)'s on our side."

"Yeah, but I don't know if he's strong enough to fight that guy," said Ko. "We gotta try and help him out whee!"

"Yeah. And I think I know how," said Tsukune. "Ko. Let's see if we can find a bathroom."

Ko looked at Tsukune as if he had said something weird. "Tsukune! This isn't the time to take a whiz!"

"Trust me! I have an idea," said Tsukune. "Just help me look!"

And with Ko flapping behind him, Tsukune ran up the stairs. Meanwhile back with your vampire self and Jack, the two of you were at a standoff with each other. You had your fair share of scrapes and bruises as did Jack, but neither of one you were ready to back down just yet.

"Have you had enough or do you want some more?" your vampire self said.

"Actually I was about to ask you the same question boy!" growled Jack as he jumped toward him again throwing a punch.

Your vampire self managed to block it, but the force made you backpedal a little. He then countered by lifting his leg and throwing a powerful kick. The force of it created a huge shockwave of air. Jack leaped up and dodged it making the wave go right past him and crash right into a wall. Jack then retaliated with by diving straight for her with a kick of his own. Your vampire self blocked the blow but the force of it was too strong. He was forced back slamming into a wall. He winced in pain as a streak of blood dripped down on his face.

"Are you alright?!" you asked worriedly inside his head.

"I'm fine," he responded. "But this guy's tough. Even tougher than everyone else who we faced before. I gotta say it's quite the challenge."

"Can you beat this guy?"

"I thought I could, but now I'm not so sure. If we had some water maybe, but as things stand now we probably won't last much longer."

"Damn it..."

"What's wrong?" asked Jack. "You were so confident before. Running out of breath?"

"Please. I'm just getting warmed up," your vampire self said. "Besides you're looking a bit out of breath yourself. You sure you don't wanna take a break?"

"Heh. Really cute," smirked Jack. "But I didn't come here for games, I came here to kill your ass!"

Jack then lunged with an intent to kill and got ready to engage him in battle once more.

Meanwhile...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You made the first move...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content: How about Kokoa bites your neck and sucks your blood?
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: No. Something else.

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content: Well do they?
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Kurumu Yukari and Mizore finds you first then?

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content: Your family comes home!
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: No

choices: The mysterious figure appears and attacks......
a couple of golems appear and attack you and Tsukune....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Meanwhile, you and Tsukune were busy evacuating all the students to safety.

(name): Stay calm people and don't panic!

Tsukune: Head straight the gym and you'll be safe there!

Saizo: Man. This is so lame! Why do we have to run from a stupid army? And why should take orders from you two?

Tsukune: Two reasons. One, the teachers told us to make sure all the student are evacuated safely to the gym so we're pretty much in charge.

(name): And two, if you don't get your ass in the gym, I'll kick your ass like me and Kokoa did before! Got it?

Saizo gulped and reluctantly went to the gym. Apparently he didn't want to be reminded of the beat down you and Kokoa gave him. Soon everyone was in the gym and you and Tsukune headed for the Headmaster's office to warn him.

Tsukune: We gotta warn the Headmaster about this. He'll at least have an idea on what we should do.

(name): I hope so. We have to hurry. Moka and the others are counting on us.

You both turned around a corner and were almost to the Headmaster's office when you felt something. You didn't know why, but you felt the sense of impending danger.

(name): Tsukune hold up!

Tsukune: (name). What is it?

(name): I don't know. But I get the feeling that we're in danger. Something's here.

There was a moment of silence. You tried to find whatever it was that you sensed, but you couldn't see anything. Then suddenly.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You and Tsukune were evacuating the students.

choices: Your scream echoed throughout the battle field
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Suddenly a giant ball of energy appeared from out of nowhere and headed straight for Tsukune.

(name): TSUKUNE LOOK OUT!!!

You tackled Tsukune and got him out of the way just in the nick of time. The spear crashed straight into a wall. You helped Tsukune to his feet and checked to see if he was okay. Unfortunately you're tackle to save Tsukune had knocked out him out cold.

(name): Tsukune are you alright? Wake up! Tsukune!

Then you heard someone coming toward you. You looked at the source of where the attack came from and you saw it. There standing in the middle of the hallway was the mysterious figure.

Slave: Well, well, well. Looks like we finally meet face to face (name).

(name): Who are you? And what do you want?

Slave: Oh never mind that. Right now, why don't we have a little fun?

(name): What?

Before you had a chance to react, the mysterious figure appeared in front of you before you had a chance to react. Then he gave you a strong punch in the gut. The punch sent you reeling to a wall. You gasped as the wind got knocked out of you from the impact. You managed to stay on your feet, but you definitely felt the punch.

(name): -cough, cough- Damn....that really hurt...

Slave: Heh. You were sent reeling from that one punch? Come on. Surely you can do better than that.

(name): Why you....

You charged at the mysterious figure with a flurry of punches and kicks. The mysterious figure dodged every one blow. Then it disappeared from your sights and appeared behind you.

(name): What the hell?!?

Slave: Pathetic.

The mysterious figure this time gave you a powerful punch in the face so hard that blood came out of your mouth. Then he gave you a big kick in the chin sending you flying through an empty classroom and crashing to a chalkboard. Right now you felt that every part of your body was broken. You couldn't even get up.

(name): Damn....it..... he's...so strong......

Slave: Damn you're pathetic. From all the talk I heard about, I thought that you'd be stronger than this.If you don't taking this seriously, I'll have my army wipe out everyone here, including your little friends.

(name): What? Then.....you're the one...controlling the army.....why?

Slave: Very well. Since you asked I'll humor you. It's for you my boy.

(name): Me..?

Slave: Yes. You're the reason why I'm here. After all you're quite special.

(name): Me...? What do you...want?

Slave: Oh nothing much really. I just need you to do something for me. Something that only you can do.

You struggled when you tried to get up and your body seared in pain.

(name): Well forget it! -cough- I won't do anything you say.

Slave: What a shame. I really didn't want any bloodshed, but I guess you leave me with no other choice.

Then Tsukune began to wake up. The moment he did, the figure appeared in front of him and kicked him hard, making you gasp in horror.

(name) Tsukune!!

Tsukune screamed in pain as the figure started attacking him. You tried to get up, but your body was still reeling from the previous attack. All you could do was listen as Tsukune's cries of pain rang in your ears.

(name): Stop! Stop it!

Slave: Hehehehe.

The mysterious figure didn't listen. It continued to hurt Tsukune. Tsukune's cries rang in your ears and you hated the sound of them. This was the exact feeling you felt when Yukari was being attacked before. Then your body began to get hot and a new feeling began to take over your body. Anger. Rage. Hate. You couldn't stand to hear a friend of yours in pain. That same terrifying aura of yours overwhelmed your body and as you entered into your berserk mode once more. The mysterious figure saw what was happening.

Slave: Looks like I pushed it a little.

Then he tossed Tsukune aside. You looked at him with eyes filled with anger and let out a scream of rage, charged at the figure and unleashed a barrage of punches and kicks. This time they were a lot faster. The figure dodged them all at first, but them your fist barely scraped his cheek and then you punched him in the gut sending him flying to a wall. The wall crumbled and the rubble buried the figure. Thinking you win the fight, you snapped out of your berserk mode and you rushed over to Tsukune's side to check on him.

(name): Tsukune! Are you OK?

Tsukune: -cough- I'm fine. Just a little banged up. You sure beat the crud out of him.

(name): I guess so. Come on. Let's go.

You lifted Tsukune up on your shoulder and were about to walk away carrying him to safety, but then. There was a rumbling sound and then an explosion from where the rubble was and the figure emerged laughing with glee. He was also emitting a powerful aura filled with pure evil.

Tsukune: No way.... he's still alive?!?

(name) thinking: Oh shit! That aura.... It's so evil, I feel like I'm gonna be sick just by standing by this creep. I gotta get Tsukune out of here!

Then you limped in a run trying to escape. The mysterious figure however was right on your heels.

Slave: Hahahaha! That's it! That's what I was looking for! Hahaha! Although.....you made the mistake of hurting so.....I'm gonna have to punish you.

The mysterious figure's hand pulled out a blade and dashed straight for you and Tsukune. Meanwhile back with Kokoa and the others, they were still destroying the golems. Kurumu was flying around slashing the golems every time she swooped down. Mizore and Yukari were blasting the golems with ice and tarot cards. Moka and Kokoa were fighting side by side using their kicks and punches. The tide was turning in the girl's favor. Then suddenly.....
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: The mysterious figure appears and attacks......

choices: You closed your eyes and stayed strong
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Inside the chamber...

"The time has come master. The time to strike is now.", said Slave.

"You have served me well Slave, continue to please me and I shall return you what you have lost."

An army arouse from the ground in the form of lizards and ancient reptiles that roamed the sewer system. Slave walked in front and yelled, "Warriors, MARCH!"

Now that you and Kokoa were purely devoted to each other all that was needed was to have a big distraction then close in on you for the kill. All that was required was to injure you enough to force Kokoa to inject her vampire blood in you and then all tasks at hand would be cleared. The lizards crawled out through the pipes and within minutes the school was overrun by them. They attacked every student they found but Slave's goal was to find and simply cripple you.

When the lizards attacked you immediately ran trying to escape from them but you called out to Kokoa or the others hoping they might help get you and the others out of there. But they all had their hands full. You managed to hide in the courtyard in the bushes but the lizards inherit sense of smell made you and easy target, you ran for it as the animals chased you but they were baiting you into Slave's hands.

They chased you into the back of the main building where Slave was waiting. "I know you. In-"

"Your nightmares? I'm almost flattered. But now that your here I think we can make this easier than I thought. Call to your vampire friends or I will force them to come here themselves."

You thought he wanted Moka or Kokoa so you refused immediately, "Never!", then one of the lizards came by and began corning you to the wall.

"You see this one? He has a hidden talent that makes him quite viscous, it's quite gruesome. However if you don't I'll have him show you, first hand and it isn't very pleasant."

The lizards neck began opening up into a pair of fan with the edges poking out like spikes and the pattern it had was a series of reds and green in a threatening manner. The fans flapped as fast as a machine and made a horrible hissing noise terrifying you to death.
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Meanwhile.....

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You didn't want to get Moka or Kokoa so you shut your eyes tight and awaited whatever the beast would do. Then you heard a regurgitating sound and then followed by it was something hitting the wall next to you. It was a viscous black posion material that sizzled and had steam coming from it. "That was my only warning, next time it'll spit in your eyes and then you'll go blind. Ounce that happens he'll eat off your face and have you for her dinner. Now call to them now!"

After witnessing what that thing did you were shaking almost as fast as those flaps of skin that made that lizard so horrifying. You didn't want to but the sheer amount of terror you felt from the beast as it began looking to spit again forced you to yell out and say, "KOKOA!", you felt bad for doing it but the sheer fright of the creature made you give in even though you tried to resist Slave's demands.

A couple minuets went by and Kokoa ran to where you screamed her name and found you being held hostage by Slave. During those couple minutes you were beaten senseless and looked terrible. Your body ached and felt a serious amount of pain but called out to her saying, "Get out of here."

"Easy now. Depending on what she chooses will decide your fate today."

"Who are you and what do you want?"

"Give me your Lilith's mirror. Then you can save your boyfriend."

"OK OK! I'll do it."

"No don't he's baiting you!", you warned.

"I can't let you die (Name).", Kokoa flew off to take it from the storage and through all the chaos brought it back to Slave. "Now give him to me!"

"He doesn't have much time. If you want to save him extreme measures might be in order.", Slave cleverly ployed her to using her blood to save your life.

You were starting to lose your vision indicating your lose of life. You tried to stay awake but it was no use no matter how hard you tried. "(Name)! Stay with me don't go!"

"I'm trying but I can't see your face anymore.", you were fading and on the brink of death.

"Gasp! NO! I won't lose you. Not like this! I'm sorry (Name) but it's the only way I can save you.", she picked up your arm and bite into it injecting her vampire blood into your veins. Soon the lizards ran back to their domain where everything went as planned. You began to fall asleep from the shock of the pain and trauma, you looked at Kokoa believing she was the last thing you'd see. Then there was darkness...
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: You closed your eyes and stayed strong

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
Slave returned to the chamber where he met with his maser again...

"Where is the boy Slave?"

"Safe with his friends. And within only days your freedom shall come."

"If you fail me to bring him to me."

"That is impossible my lord. The key shall open your cage and you Lord Saber will smite the Bloodriver clan forever."

"Indeed they will be dealt with. Indeed they will be..."

"Just be sure to give me my payment when you send for him. I'll keep my end of the bargain."

"Now what would I be without being a man of my word?"
1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.title: Elsewhere...

1553321121221221121112111111111212211111.content:
You were unconscious for quite some time. All you could see was black. Then you began to wake up. The first thing you saw was all of your friends.

Moka: Hey you guys! He's coming around!

(name): Mmm.....what? What's going on?

Tsukune: (name)! You're awake!

Kurumu: Thank goodness! We were worried sick about you!

(name): Where are we? I don't recognize this place.

Yukari: We're in the nurse's office. We brought you here after we found you knocked out.

(name): What happened? The last thing I remember is Kokoa......wait. Kokoa! Kokoa where is she?!?

Yukari: Calm down. She's fine. She's over here.

You looked to see Kokoa lying down on a bed next to you, but she was unconscious. You rushed to her side immediately.

(name): Kokoa! Are you OK? Wake up!

Tsukune: It's no use. We tried waking her up, but she's exhausted.

(name): Damn it. This is all my fault. I should've been able to handle things on my own! But I had to call Kokoa for help! I'm such a coward!

Kurumu: (name), that's not true!

(name): Yes it is! If I was a lot stronger I would have beaten those guys! I feel so weak!

Tsukune: (name) come on. It's not your fault.

Kurumu: Yeah. After all, you're only a human. Oops!

Yukari: Kurumu shut up! (smacks her on the head)

When you heard what Kurumu said you felt your heart stopped beating.

(name): Kurumu what did you mean by that?

Kurumu: Um.....nothing! Hahaha! I was just rambling. Hehehe.

You gave Kurumu an serious stare which made her sweat a little and look away. Then you turned to Yukari who was also getting a little nervous for some reason.

(name): Yukari what was Kurumu talking about?

Yukari: Umm I don't know. (whistles)

You looked at Moka, Mizore, and Tsukune who looked away and pretended not to hear when you looked at them. Now you were getting suspicious.

(name): OK. What's going on? You're all hiding something from me aren't you?

Mizore: What are you talking about? We're not hiding anything from you. Right?

Moka: (name) it's alright. We won't tell anyone. The last thing that we need is the entire school finding out that you're a human.

(name): Well that's one less problem to deal with. -sigh- All this stress is bad for my heart. Can this day get any worse?

Then......

"This sucks! What did I do wrong? Ugh...dammit how did I let her slip from me? Was I wrong?", you said aloud.

"Kurumu I-", she placed her hands over your lips.

"It's ok, I understand now. If you want to take it slow and see what the future holds one day at a time then I'll wait for you. It was wrong of me to make you feel bad about it. If you think that I shouldn't be with you because of it then, I understand."

"You sweet angel. How come I was blessed to have been with you for only a short time? Listen tell me right now, do you like anyone else right now?"

You thought of Kokoa for a second but shook off that idea of her and you together. "No."

"Well, let's try and give us another chance. But I'll hold back with the affection for a while and we'll just start getting to know eachother personally. That way we can both be certain if we should still be together. But listen no matter what happens, I'll always love you."

"Me too.", you kissed her with tenderness. You broke away after a second and then you two would start getting to know eachother. Unknown to either of you Kokoa overheard your conversation.

"Yes! I'm not out of the game! I have a chance! Wait? Why am I saying that? And why am I so realived? Oh god! I think....I have a crush on him! No...I've had one from the start. I just didn't know what it was until I nearly lost him. (Name) I hope from now on you'll see me differently. Because now I'll try to win over your heart.", Kokoa swore.

1553321121221221121112112.content:
(flashback)
Kokoa as a little girl is fighting Moka. Kokoa gives her a kick, but Moka counters it easy and gives her a swift punch in the face and knocking her to the floor.

Young Moka: That's enough for today.

Young Kokoa: Wait a minute big sister! I can still fight! Don't leave!

Young Moka: You fight again until that bruise is healed. (points to the bruise on her cheek) You'll never be able to get a guy if you keep scaring and bruising yourself like that.

Young Kokoa: What do you mean? I don't need anyone much less a boy! All I need is you big sister!

Young Moka: Kokoa. That's sweet of you to say, but I won't always be around forever. There will come a time when you will need someone to care for. Someone who who help you find your way in the world. Someone to love.

Young Kokoa: I don't really understand what you mean big sister.

Young Moka: You'll understand when you're a bit older. Until then see you later Kokoa.

After that Moka left leaving Kokoa alone by herself.

Young Kokoa thinking: Just you wait big sis. I'm gonna get stronger and stronger. So wait for me.
(flashback ends)

Kokoa was unconscious for quite some time. Then she woke up with you sitting right next to her.

(name): You're awake. Nice to see you're OK.

Kokoa: What the hell? Where the heck are we?

(name): In a cave at the bottom of a ravine. I carried you here after I found you in the snow.

Then Kokoa got up and walked toward the entrance to the cave where it was blocked by snow and started to dig her way out.

(name): Hey! What do you think you're doing?!? You can't go out there!

Kokoa: If you think I'm staying here with you, you're sadly mistaken. I'd rather freeze to death than.....

Just then Kokoa was able to make a hole in the wall of snow. She was blasted by a freezing wind. Outside it was snowing like crazy. Even the most powerful monster could freeze to death out there.

(name): It's not good. When I came to, it was already turning into a blizzard. So you might as well sit tight until help comes.

Kokoa: Damn it! This sucks! Why do I have to be suck in this stinkin cave with a pervert like you?!?

(name): Hey! Look, I'm not to thrilled about this either, but we don't have a choice. So quit complaining already, would ya?!?

Kokoa: And why should I listen to a whinny pervert like you?!? It's your fault we're in this mess!

(name): My fault?!? You're the one that caused the avalanche you sissy vampire!!

Kokoa: You're the one who ran into me you whiny jerkwad!

(name): What the hell is your problem?!? Do you hate me that much?!? I'm actually trying to get along with you and hopefully be friends with you, but I'm starting to have second thoughts about that!

Kokoa: What the hell are you talking about?!? I don't need friends! Especially with crazy perverts like you!

(name): Excuse me?!?

Kokoa: That's right! You think that if your nice to me, that I'll be good friends with you?!? Well I'm sorry to disappoint you, but it's never gonna happen! There's no way in hell that I would be friends with a pervert like you!

At this point that was straw that broke the camels back. You were p.oed!

(name): That's it you little brat! You want a piece of me?!? I'll kick your ass right here and now!

Kokoa: Fine then! That's just what I was gonna say! When I'm done...you're......gonna wish...that....you.....never.........crossed me.......

Just then Kokoa fainted. You rushed to her side and felt her skin. It was icy cold.

(name): Oh no! She's suffering from hypothermia! I gotta find a way to warm her up and fast, but how?

You looked around the cave and then you see some logs and sticks.

(name): That's it! I can make a fire! But I better hurry. At this rate Kokoa's gonna freeze to death.

You gently set Kokoa down and took off your coat and put it on her.

(name): -shivers- Damn it all. Why the hell am I g-g-going through so m-m-much trouble just to help this b-b-brat? Sometimes I think I'm too n-n-nice. In any case I better sh-sh-shut up and make that fire.

It took a few minutes rubbing a stick on a log, but eventually you got a spark and soon you had a roaring fire. When you finished, you gently carried Kokoa close to the fire and placed her next to it. Then you sat by the fire to prevent yourself from freezing to death. More than an hour passed. Then Kokoa began to wake up.

Kokoa: What......what happened? What the....? Why am I wearing this thing?!?

(name): Oh st-stop it. I-I-I gave you m-m-my coat! At least thank me for saving you.

Then you saw something that you never seen before. Kokoa was blushing. Not to mention she didn't call you a pervert.

Kokoa: You.....you gave me your coat?

(name): Y-y-yeah. You weren't g-g-getting any w-w-warmer s-s-so it was the only th-th-thing I had.

Kokoa: (looks at the coat) But aren't you cold? You'll freeze even with the fire.

(name): D-d-don't worry. I'll b-be fine. For s-some reason, I'm m-m-more worried about y-y-you other than me.

Kokoa could see that you were freezing. Then she did something that shocked you. She took off the coat, wrapped it around both of you, and pulled you close.

(name): Wh-what are you....?

Kokoa: Shut it. You may be a perv, but even you doesn't deserve to freeze to death. Also......thank you.

(name): Um....sure. Anytime.

You weren't sure why, but Kokoa was being very nice. Up till now you never thought it was possible for Kokoa to being nice to you. A few minutes had passed and then.....

"Wait. There is something. Here,", you pulled your shirt down and offered her to suck your blood, "You can take some of my blood to get you going for a while. "

Kokoa was shocked to see you offer your blood if it meant to keep her alive. "I'll handle it for a few more hours. I'll-", another growlling noise echoed from her stomach, "Ok fine but I promise to take just enough to keep myself from starving to death. Hold still."

You let Kokoa suck your blood until she was refreshed for a time. She gently bit into your neck savored the flavor. She seemed to recognize the scent of it but there was no point in finding out now. Kokoa let go and felt rejuvenated. "Ahhh thank you I feel miles better than how I was when I woke up."

"Don't mention it. Ugh, I feel light headed."

"It'll pass, first time stings the most but you handled it better than big sister's piss ant boyfriend. He's a weakling and he's human of all things. If he didn't have that harem of girls protecting him I'd destroy him."

"Wouldn't you be breaking Moka's heart? I mean the real one?"

"She doesn't really love him. She does it because her fake personality makes her."

"Maybe you should talk to her directly without trying to kill her boyfriend. Maybe you could understand why she likes him."

"I prefer the hands on touch you can only get with a mace to the head, but I guess after 28 tries it wouldn't hurt to try another approach."

"28 tries you went on killing Tskune? "

"Yeah but you became my new person of disinterest. However I'm considering to your persistant attempts to befriend me when I have not made it easy for you."

"Only because I saved your life. But hell I'll take it."

"Here get closer, your lack of blood is going to make you colder. Keep next to me, but don't do anything you per- just don't touch me or look up my skirt."

"Thanks.", you both blushed without neither of you knowing. Kokoa finally began to lower her guard with you since giving her advice with Moka made her reconsider her initial impression. You both rested until someone would come. Then after another hour...

1553321121221221121112112111.content:
You woke up to cries of worry when you woke up to see people outside the cave. You tried calling out but you too cold to even yell. Kurumu and Moka actively searched for you two. With Kurumu being more worried. "Do you see them?!", Kurumu yelled.

"No! They may have been buried under the snow. Yukari clear it with Mizore and her mom!", Moka said.

"Please be alive (Name). I don't wanna lose you when we just begun to-"

"Hey! There's a light over there! It must be them!", Moka called out.

Kurumu and Moka ran over to see you and Kokoa freezing yourselves to death. Moka took Kokoa and Kurumu took you and ran quickly back to the cabin. They dumped you two in two heating beds and had a nurse look you both over.

"How are they?", Moka asked the nurse.

"Well good news is they're going to be fine. I'd reccomemd they stay warm for a few days. But the girl is suffering from what looks like a cold. It may upgrade to the flu if it continues but overall they'll survive. ", said the nurse.

Kurumu and Moka walked in to check on you two. Kokoa was shivering and was curled up in her electric blanket. You were just as cold but your shivering settled down when Kurumu placed her hand over your head. You opened your eyes to see her smiling about your recovery. You fell asleep letting the heat thaw you out.

1553321121221221121112112112.content:
Then after another hour you heard another growl, but it was louder than usual.

(name): Kokoa, Was that your stomach again?

Kokoa: How rude! That was not me! I'm pretty sure it was you.

(name): It wasn't me either.

Then suddenly the wall of snow exploded and on the other side of it was a giant white creature.

Kokoa: What the hell is that?!?

(name): Holy crap! It's an abominable snowman!

The abominable snowman growled and mumbled at you and Kokoa. Kokoa was about to stand up and fight it, but she was still a little weak due to the cold. Then you stood between her and the creature.

(name): Stay back you furry freak! I won't let you hurt her!

Enraged by your insult, the snowman attacked with it's giant fist. Luckily you leaped out of and gave the snowman a mighty kick in the face. It connected, but it didn't faze it. Instead it countered with a mighty swing of his arm. This sends you flying and you landed smack on the floor.

Kokoa: Are you OK?!?

(name): Don't worry.....(cough)....I'm fine. I've had harsher attacks than that.

Kokoa: Look out!

You look up and you see the snowman above you with it's fists raised. It was about to attack when suddenly, three giant icicles rained from the sky and blocked the snowman's attack. You knew that there was only one person you know that could make icicles and she was ice-boarding to the rescue.

(name): Mizore!

Mizore: (name)! Are you OK?

(name): I'm fine!

Mizore: Don't worry! I'll take care of this! You get out of here!

(name): But Mizore! I can't leave you!

Mizore: I'll be fine! Besides you got someone with you to take care of right?

You knew that she was referring to Kokoa. She may be a little better, but she was still weak. You knew what you had to do.

(name): Kokoa? Can you get up?

Kokoa: Yeah, but I'm still a little weak.

(name): OK then. I have no choice then.

Kokoa: What do you......Hey!

Before Kokoa had a chance to react, you lifting her up bridal style and carrying her to safety. Kokoa tried to get you to put her down, but she couldn't.

Kokoa: Hey! What are you doing?!? Put me down!

(name): I can't do that. You're in no condition to walk. You're still weak. So be quiet and let me carry you K?

All Kokoa could do was blush and let you carry her to safety. Then you hear the snowman behind you. Soon it would catch up to you and Kokoa.

(name): Oh crap! Now what?

Then.......

15533211212212211211121121121.content:
Then you hear three sets of voices. You look to the source of the voice and to see three familiar figures on a hill skiing toward you.

Moka: (name)! Kokoa!

Tsukune: Hey don't worry! We're here to save you!

Kurumu: Don't you worry (name)! I'm gonna save you and I'm gonna go it using my new skiing skills!

Moka: No Kurumu! Don't! You're still a rookie!

You looked at Kurumu with shining and adoring eyes eager for her to save you and Kokoa. Then Kurumu took off and she was skiing fine, but then she lost her balance and then fell over. She rolled and she rolled until she became a giant snowball. Finally she rolled until she hit a tree with a mighty boom. Everyone that witnessed this all had their jaws hung open in shock. Even the snowman couldn't believe what he saw. Kurumu dizzily got up and gave thumbs up.

Kurumu: Don't worry......I'm OK.......

Then Kurumu blacked out.

(name): What the hell.....

Moka: I tried to warn her! She's still having trouble skiing.

Tsukune: Although I gotta give her credit trying to look cool and all.

Then snowman roared and charged straight toward you and slammed his fist toward you. You were able to jump out of the way with Kokoa in your arms and Tsukune pushed Moka out of the way. Then a bright and red light began to shine from where Moka was. When she stood up she was completely different. She hair had gone from pink to silver and her eyes turned ruby red.

(name): What happened to Moka? She looks different and bit more fierce.

Kokoa: It's my big sister!

(name): What the...?

Ko: Allow me to explain whee. You see, Moka is an S class vampire just like Moka. Only in her case her power was so great that her parents seal it away using a rosary. And so whenever the rosary is removed Moka's innocent self disappears and her True vampire self awakens whee!

(name): Thanks....for the explanation. Although it was little random.

Inner Moka: Well it's been a while Tsukune.

Tsukune: Nice to see you too Moka.

Outer Moka: Alright then. Time for you to know your place.

The snowman roared and attack, but Moka dodged the attack with a jump. Then she charged and gave the snowman a powerful roundhouse kick in the gut, sending the snowman flying and until it was a sparkle in the sky.

(name): Holy freakin crap! She kicked it's ass with just one kick!

Kokoa: That's my big sister!

Then Tsukune ran up to you and Kokoa.

Tsukune: (name)! Are you and Kokoa OK?

(name): Yeah. We're just a little chilly. Although Kokoa could use a nurse.

Just then, Kokoa began reaching out to Tsukune's hand where the rosary was.

Kokoa: The rosary.....I need it....give it to me.....

(name): Kokoa? What are you doing?

Then Outer Moka took the rosary from Tsukune's hand.

Outer Moka: Listen Kokoa. I'm sorry to tell you, but I can't just leave it off and be unsealed.

Kokoa: But why? I need you big sister.

Outer Moka: I know, but you have to learn that I won't always be around. If you're worried about being lonely then don't be. You've gotten yourself a pretty nice friend. By the way, your name is (name) right?

(name): Y-yes ma'am.

Outer Moka: Do me a favor. take care of my sister for me would you? She's a bit stubborn, but she's a good girl once you get to know her K?

(name): Um...yes ma'am. Don't worry.

Outer Moka: Well....see you later Kokoa.

Before Kokoa could day anything Outer Moka placed the rosary back on and went back to the pink haired Moka. She fell over unconscious, but luckily Tsukune and Kurumu were there to catch her.

Kurumu: I swear. She always goes overboard all the time.

Tsukune: That's Moka for you.

(name): I gotta say. She's pretty incredible.

Suddenly there was a loud roar. You all turned to see the snowman had reappeared and he was mad.

(name): What the heck?!?

Kurumu: I thought Moka sent that thing flying!

Tsukune: Crap! And were totally defenseless right now!

Just then Mizore came along on her ice board and stopped the snowman.

Mizore: Wait! Calm down dad!

(name): Wait. Dad?

Kurumu: Wait could that be.....

Tsukune: Wait. Now I remember! That's Mizore's dad!

(name): Say what now?!?

A little later Mizore explained everything. It turns out that Mizore's mom had sent Mizore's dad to find you and Kokoa after the avalanche. He did, but you misunderstood and called him a freak. After the situation calmed down and after a lot of apologizing to Mizore's dad, you all headed back to the lodge.

Then.....
