15533221.title: Yukari Sendo

choices: Go get her out of there!
155332211.content:
It's never easy to say goodbye to an old home, old friends, and old life. But apparently youre too smart to live a happy normal life with your old pals and neighbors just cuz youre a little smarter than them. Or at least TOO smart for a kid your age that you not only have to be skipped a couple years ahead of your classmates, but you gotta go to one of those special schools for the 'gifted'!

You begged your mother not to ship you to one of those overseas private schools, but she always had it in for you... just cuz you like to tease her over her little fantasy psuedo-religious roleplay sessions she and her friends have in the basement and that you flat out refuse to be a part of cuz of how stupid you think it is... she couldnt WAIT to get rid of you! Thinks you might finally learn something of value, she says! Youre only a few years away from getting a PHD! What else of VALUE do you need to learn?!

You were shipped off to a place called the 'Youkai Academy'. You heard rumors about this special place, but mostly silly ones like it's a special school for monsters with monster teachers teaching monsters how to become proper monsters. Normally, you'd wonder why your mother would register you to a weird place like THAT, but consider the weird stuff she's in, youre not surprised.
Still, you got no choice but to get your belongings, get on the plane, and spend your time all alone in your big lonely hotel room until the day youre dragged onto that special bus to that special school with all the other 'monsters' sealed away from the outside world.

So there you sat in your lonely LONELY hotel room bored out of your skull. You watched tv, but nothing was on. Nothing worth watching anyway. You already read all 14 of your Dresden Files books who knows how many times. You already gotten 100% completion through Persona 3 and 4 and done practically everything you can do in them. With nothing else to do, you decide to go for a little walk outside. Sadly, the town youre in was pretty small and surrounded by gloomy dark forest full of feral wildlife that realizes theyre physically stronger than humans and are afraid to eat one should they leave the boundaries!
No mall, no bookstore, no arcade... and a LOT of gloomy dark forest!

The walk was very short and nobody all the townsfolk were locked up indoors for some reason. You couldnt see anybody out but yourself. You followed the path of street lights, curious to see how far they stretch which led you to a little park. You didnt get much of a view of the park cuz you dare not tread near the forest. All you made out in the light was a couple of park benches, a water fountain, and a big red glowing symbol of the occult on the ground.

BIG RED GLOWING SYMBOL OF THE OCCULT?!! Oy, the townsfolk are into this kind of crap, too?!
As if tonight wasnt bad enough, you spot someone lying unconscious in the middle of the symbol! A young short black haired oriental girl who looked about your age in what looked to be a schoolgirl uniform under a pinkish yellow cape with a cute yellow bow and a big purple pointy cap not unlike a witch cap.

Two things popped into your head: First was 'What the heck is that girl doing wearing such a ridiculous outfit at this time of night?' then 'OH MY GOD! Is that girl ok?!' in that particular order. Ok, so youre not exactly a saint, but c'mon!

"Oh dear," you sighed before running toward the circle and shouted, "Hey lady! Are you alright?!" She didnt so much as flinch in her 'sleep'. When you got close enough, you noticed she had a big nasty cut on her leg. The wound look so fresh, it was still bleeding. What coulda happened to her before she passed out cold? Eh, you'll have to give the third degree. You'd better get that poor girl to safety before that wound becomes something worse.

"Wha?!" as you moved closer, you had to suddenly stop moving instinct. You didnt know why, but you felt something. Something BAD. You didnt know how to explain it but there was something about that glow in the symbol that gave caution vibes to your brain, telling you to stay back!
Logically, it made no sense. But it too hard to shrug off the bad vibes coming from the circle. It almost ALMOST seemed as if someone or something was coming. Coming to get the girl, perhaps?! C'mon, that's just plain silly! Nobody believes in that garbage... except your mom, of course. And yet...

You began to shiver and sweat as you got closer, fearing the unknown. You didnt wanna leave the girl, but... something was up! What was it?!
155332211.title: Starting Anew

choices: She says she'll stick around for dinner.
1553322111.content:
Aw, who cares?! The longer you stand around being afraid of imaginary friends you dont know about, the worse the condition that girl in the funny hat's gonna be in. At least, that's what you told yourself, which thankfully was enough to make you suck in your gut and dash toward that circle.
You ignored the threatening vibes that were pounding on parts of you that you didnt even know you have and gently AND CAREFULLY picked up the poor unconscious girl. Fortunately, she wasnt very heavy as you carried her over the threshold, although it wasnt gonna look good for your back if you kept her like that for too long!

As you carried her away, you looked over your shoulder and noticed the glowing circle suddenly vanished. Like *POOF* nothing was there! And the scary vibes vanished with it.
"That was weird," you muttered to yourself as you headed back.

You carried the wounded girl back to your apartment and laid her on your bed, putting a towel under her injured leg so she wouldnt bleed on your blanket. You knew you shoulda called 911, but considering you have quite a knowledge in medical research than a lot of the adults you knew, you gathered up some first aid supplies and decided to treat her yourself.
It was a little nerve-wrecking examining the rest of her body for any other wounds without taking any of her clothes cuz youre a guy, but she didnt seem to have anything worse than the leg wound. Just a couple of very minor cuts and scrapes.
After careful examination of the wound, you concluded the tear came from some kind of animal bite judging by the grooves looking like teethmarks. Looked worse than a wolf or bear bite, but it wasnt venomous like a snake. It looked bad, but it wasnt deep enough to require sewing.

You mixed up a couple of medicinal herbs as you flushed out excess debris and gravel from the wound and disinfecting it with a little peroxide and a bit of neosporin. You ground the herbs into a paste, applied the paste around the bleeding gaps to promote faster healing, and waited for it to dry before applying pressure and wrapping the wound in a sturdy bandage. Then you put a washcloth over her forehead when you felt her head getting warm. The tinier wounds were easily treated with neosporin and some band-aids. The treatment took no more than a half hour and you felt pretty darn good about it.

"Unngh...uh..." and no sooner after did she start to wake up.
You leaned over her and whispered, "Easy... dont get up too fast."
"Uhh...w....what.... WHAT?!!!" her purple eyes widened and she suddenly woke up in a sudden jolt, "WHERE AM-OOOwww... owww..." and immediately, she grips her aching head in pain.
"Told you," you told her.
"Ow... owie..." she gave a cutesy painful expression as she her rubbed her forehead, "w... where am I? Where is that jerk? I swear I'm gonna turn him into a mouse and feed him to my pet snake!" As expected, she's still delusional.

"Youre in my apartment," you answered, "I found you lying in the park out cold so I-"
"KIDNAPPER!!!" she shouted in her ear and glared.
"K-Kidnapper?! I saved your-"
"So that red-headed coward couldnt take me on alone?!" she snapped, "he had to hire backup to keep this big bad witch from smearing him all over the pavement?!" Big bad witch?

Somehow, you had quite a lot of patience for this girl.
"I honestly have no idea what you are speaking of," you calmly said to her.
"Youre not gonna keep me her for long!" she warned you, "as soon as.. ugh... this stupid headache goes away, youre gonna wish you never been spawned!"
"I have some aspirin for that if you'd like," you kindly offered, "might want to get some food in you first."

The girl just sneered at you, as if your politeness only made her madder.
"I'm getting really sick of that goody-goody charade youre pulling," she then looked at her bandaged leg, "...and what did you do to my leg?!"
"I nursed it to health," you said as a matter of fact, "I would suggest not moving it too much or it might bleed like crazy again."
"Dont tell me what to do!" geez, why is she so damn ungrateful?

"Perhaps now is a good time to introduce ourselves," you changed the subject, "I'm [Yuri]. What is your name?"
"Like I'm gonna tell you who I am!" she crossed her arms and raised her chin, "a weakling like yourself doesnt deserve to know-"

"Yukari, eh?" you had already found her school ID in her purse, "that's a pretty name."
"HEY!! GIVE THAT BA...ow, geez..."
Then your eyes widened when you saw the NAME of the school, "YOUKAI ACADEMY?! You go to Youkai Academy?!"

She rubbed her head and gritted her head, "Duh... and I just happen to be the youngest, smartest, and most intelligent student enrolled there! What's it to you?"
"I've been enrolled there, myself!" you said with a bit of excitement, "what's it like there?"
"It's a lot better than shady kidnapping scum like you deserve!" Yukari answered, "I swear if you dont let me go and tell your red-headed friend to back off, I'm gonna give you the worst stomach cancer in your life!" Again with the 'red-head' stuff.

"I dont have a red-headed friend," you said.
"Dont play games, [YURI], if that is your real name!" she finally said your name, "I can easily feel the exact same dark aura coming off you. Plus, HE was a pseudo-doctor type too!" Dark aura? Psuedo-doctor?! "So what are you? A warlock? A black summoner? A necromancer?"

You squinted your eyes at her in disbelief, "I'm sorry... I do not believe in fairy-tale magic."
"Fairy-tale magic?!" she seemed insulted by that remark, "do you know how many Courts could have you executed for saying such a thing?!"
Now you were kinda having a hard keeping your cool and patience! "W-What in the... er... is your head feeling alright?"
"Mine's just fine," suddenly, she whipped out a cute heart-shaped wand and pointed it at you, "yours on the other hand's gonna be filled with maggots! HYAA!!!"

......

The cocky look on Yukari's face suddenly vanished. "Wh-What the?!! C'mon! Work!! Work, stupid thing!!"
You raised your eyebrow, "Um... what are you doing?"
"Trying to curse you! C'MON!!" she shook her wand around as if trying to shake magic out of it, "uggh!! I cant believe it! That jerk just sealed my magic! Damnit!!"
"O....k...." this was gonna be a long night, "I think you'd better lie down, Yukari."

"Shut up!" she snapped again, "no one seal's a high ranked witch's magic and lives to tell about it!"
Man... no medical journal warned you about THIS kind of head-trauma! Next time, you should just call 911!

No, you had to tell yourself to hang in there. Sometimes a doctor gets one of those stubborn patients that may be a pain to deal with, but is still in need of help. A true doctor sucks in his gut and treats his patient to the best of his ability!

"Look... perhaps your um... magic will come back to you after some rest," you try to play along with her game, "just relax, you'll be fine. The worst is over."

"What do you mean the worst is over?" Yukari whined, "without my magic, I'm as useless as an ordinary human. Just let me out of here and I'll pretend this kidnapping never happened."
You sighed, "Youre still hurt. You should rest first. Now please stay where you are. You mustve been out for a few hours, so you should at least have some food in you or else you might pass out again. I'm going to make us dinner."

For some reason, Yukari seemed a tad interested, "Um... what's for dinner?"
"I'm heating some hot pockets in the microwave," you answered, "meatballs & mozzarella. You interested?"

Yukari still stared at you in suspicion, but you noticed a little drool down dripping down her lip.

Finally, after almost a minute of silence...

You are a standard good looking guy age 18 kind of a rebel and hate when people abuse their power to get what they want. But now you have to repeat a school year in a new school. You had to spend a couple months in Juvenile hall because you ended up killing a thug that was trying to kidnap a little girl. It was not like you meant to kill him but you had to. And with that you were sentenced to 8 months in juvenile hall but you got out in 5 for good Behavior that's the legal system for you.
But sense you missed so much school in that amount of time you had to repeat the school year but your old school refused to allow you to return there so you had to transfer to a new school in the middle of nowhere called yokai academy.
1553322211.title: Normal.

15533222111.content:
You where in the bus that was supposed to take you to your new school you couldn't help but notice the strange looking man in the driver seat and since he is the only other one on the bus, You tried to start a conversation with the strange guy " so what's your story you don't look like any bus driver like I've seen before."

He just kind of chuckled and responded. "Trust me kid there ain't no bus driver like me you've seen before. But I could also say you are not like most students I've seen before either. with exception to one but that's another story." He looked over his shoulder to look at you he looked you in the eyes and said with a Stern tone. "Look kid this school your going to is a scary ass place so let tell you something. I now why you were kicked out of your old school. And I bet everyone you know has told you you just keep your head down and stay out of trouble. But at this school trouble has a way of Finding you." He spoke like he knew you inside and out.

You just looked at him and smiled. "Trust me what ever that school has I can take it and I can give it as need be. You said with confidence.

The man started to laugh. "Now that's the spirit kid, but any way I am supposed to tell you to go talk with your home room teacher
As soon as you make it to campus."

You sigh in response. "It's probably to give me a lecture about following the rules, or to make sure I don't bring a weapon to school or something like that."

The man chuckled again and said "I have a feeling it's about something else kid. But I do now about that hole making your own gun thing and everything hell before I came to get you some guy called me to tell me to search you for weapons. Don't even know how he got my number but he seemed like he didn't like you very much kid."

You got mad at hearing this. "I bet it was that dame principle at my old school, he has it out for me because I found out that he was avoiding paying child support to his ex wife by making sure his parole officer's kid got Straight A's and got recommended for a big fancy College how that man still has a job I'll never know."

" sounds like you got a bit of a grudge yourself kid. well doesn't matter were almost there the school is surrounded by a Forest so you'll have to walk the rest of the way" he responded.

And so you looked out the window to see school in the distance behind a Forest that looked almost dead
By the looks of it. " well time to start my new school year I suppose. You said wondering what awaits you at this strange place.

15533222221.content:
You will be referred to as (name)

You were just a normal everyday high school kid. Nineteen years old, an average Joe, pretty plain looking actually. You did well in high school, got good grades, but not to popular with people. You didn't talk to anyone at school for you didn't trust anyone. You see a long time ago when you were a little kid, you lived a happy life with your mother and your father. Everything was peaceful and happy until one day when your mother went out one day. You didn't know what was going on, but it was about making peace. Then your mother went missing. No one knew where or how she disappeared, but when the police were at the site where she disappeared all they found was her bracelet. This affected you greatly and ever since you never talked to anyone or bothered to make friends. You never had any friends or people to call friends so you were always by yourself. But then after you graduated your father decided it was time for you to have a change of pace. He enrolled you into a private school called Yokai Academy. At first you were gonna decline, but then your dad gave you the evil eye. So you were on the bus bound for Yokai Academy. The bus driver was really freaky to you, but you decided to ignore him Then the bus driver spoke to you.

Bus driver: Hey kid. You heading for Yokai Academy?

(name) So what if I am?

Bus driver: If that's the case then you better prepare yourself kid. Having a sharp tongue won't get you anywhere.

(name) What makes you say that?

Then the bus entered a tunnel. Everything around it was warping like you were going through a portal. Then when the bus got through you were surprised to a whole new and different world. When you got off the bus you looked around. Everything was ominous and creepy.

(name) What the hell? Where is this?

Bus driver: Hey kid. I'd watch my back if was you.

And with that the bus drove away and disappeared in the tunnel. At first you looked around, but then you headed for a tall building that looked like a castle.

(name) That must be the school.

As you were walking you saw some students that were just like you. You walked while looking at your surroundings like you were a tourist. Then you bump into something hard. When you get up you look and you that you bump into.......
15533222221.title: Your first day

155332222212.content:
Saizo: Hey punk! Watch where ya going!

(name) Sorry.

As you tried to walk away Saizo stepped in your way clearly trying to intimidate you.

Saizo: Hey you think you can walk away without giving me a proper apology?

(name) Look I said I was sorry. What more do you want? If you wanna fight I'm not interested. I've seen people like you before thinking they're all tough just because they pick on the weak. I'd rather not fight a wannabe coward like you who thinks he's tough just because he's picking on people.

Saizo: You little bitch! How dare you say that to me!

(name) If you don't like it then leave me alone.

You tried walking away again, but this time Saizo was pissed! He threw a wicked punch at your back hard! You were sent flying and fell flat on your face.

Saizo: You little shit! Who do you think you are?!? I'm gonna kick your ass for that!

You got up and wiped the dust off. Now it was your turn to get pissed. You took a fighting stance with both your fists raised ready to fight. Saizo saw this and laughed.

Saizo: You think you can take me? Bring it on!

He threw another punch, this time you dodged the punch and punched Saizo as hard as you could. Your expected that Saizo to be knocked out easily, but the punch didn't affect Saizo a bit. His skin felt hard as a rock and your fist was throbbing with pain.

Saizo: Huh Is that all you got? This is how you throw a punch!

He punched you hard in the stomach knocking the wind out of you and you were sent flying again this time you crashed straight into a trash can. You lied there gasping for air, you couldn't even move. Saizo slowly walked toward you smirking as he stood over you.

(name thinking) What brutal strength! I can't even hurt him! What is he? Some kind of monster?

Saizo: This was too easy. You're weak like a human.

He then grabbed you by your collar and lifted you up high. You were practically dead weight. Saizo raised his free hand and prepared to dish out one final punch. Then a voice cried out.....

(voice) Hey! Leave him alone!

Saizo turned and there was.......
155332222212.title: Trouble brews

1553322222121.content:
"Why if it isn't the ice queen herself. Standing up for this weak excuse for a monster?", Saizo gloated.

"Get out of here before the staff hauls you in detention for assault. You have other things to do rather than pick on him?", Mizore pointed out.

Saizo dropped you and left without saying a word and you got up glad she helped but didn't show much appreciation. "You ok?", Mizore asked.

"I'll live, and I appreciate the help but next time don't bother with helping me.", you answered coldly.

Mizore seemed to not mind the cold shoulder remark as she was used to it. She nodded and left you to go about your business.

You entered the school and got to class where you met somebody who you had to meet...
1553322222121.title: A kind gesture

choices: A huge chunk of ice comes from out of nowhere
15533222221211.content:
Rubi: Ah there you are (name). Your father said you'd be.....defiant.

(name) Yeah. Yeah.

Rubi: I heard what happened. You need to be more careful. Otherwise you'll get hurt. Or worse.

(name) whatever. This is a school. It's not like I'll die for being here.

Rubi: Actually you might if you're not careful. This a school for monsters.

(name) You're kidding right? Monsters? That's a good one.

Rubi: I'm serious! This isn't a joke!

(name) If this is a school for monsters then prove it.

Before Rubi can answer the bell rung signaling the next class was starting.

Rubi: You better get going. And by the way look for Tskune or Moka they'll help you if you need help.

After Rubi left you headed for the classroom and took a seat in the back of class. This makes you remember back at your previous school you sat alone the exact same way. All alone with no friends. As the classroom began to fill up Saizo entered the classroom. You remember how he kicked your ass and how he overwhelmed you. You wonder how he took your punch so easily, then you remember Mizore. The way she stood up for you for some reason got your attention.

(name thinking) That's the first time someone stood up for me. I wonder why she did that.

Ms. Nekomone took roll and called the students in alphabetical order.

Ms Nekomone: Shirayuki? Shirayuki?

Then Mizore entered the room. You immediately recognized her in an instant. When she saw you she waved to you. You blushed and pretended not to care and looked away. Your heart began to beat fast.

(name) What the hell was that? Why did she wave? And why is my heart beating so much?!?

You decided to forget about it by paying attention to Ms. Nekomone.

Ms Nekomone: Attention students. I'm your teacher Ms. Nekomone. This is Yokai Academy a school for mosnters and by monsters to learn to coexist with humans. As you know the number one rule is never reveal your monster identity under any circumstance on campus. Also never reveal your monster to other students whatsoever. Got it?

(name thinking) What? This can't be. It's gotta be a prank of something.

Then you think about what Rubi said about the school being for monsters. At first you didn't believe what she said, but there was something that made you change your mind. and that something was Saizo.


Saizo: What boring rules. I still say if I see a human I'll eat it.

Ms Nekomone: Now now Saizo. You know better. Please don't cause trouble. Besides this academy is surrounded by a holy barrier, so even a human got through they would be killed.

(name thinking) What!?!?!

Then you saw something really gross. Saizo's tongue was long and extended like a snakes.

(name thinking) What the hell?!?!!?

Saizo: say what you what teach, but I smell human.

This made you sweat a little and for the first time ever you were scared. You had an uneasy time throughout class. After class power walked all the way outside to avoid Saizo. Then you caught your breath and then you took a moment to process what was going on. You were in a school for monsters and if Rubi was right if they found out you were human, you'd be a dead man.

(name) I gotta get out of here! I gotta find a way out!

And you ran to the only place you can think of to get out. The bus stop. Unfortunately you ran into the last person you wanted to see. Saizo.

Saizo: Hey there punk. Glad to see me.

You didn't say anything you froze with terror and attempted to run, but Saizo caught you by the collar again.

Saizo: Now it's time to get some payback!

Then Saizo transformed into his monster form which was an orc. He threw you a punch that sends you flying to a tree. You cough a little blood and you struggle to get up.

Saizo: Pathetic! Are you a monster or a mouse? You're like a human!

He threw another punch in your face slamming you into a sign. It felt like every bone in your body was broken. and you couldn't move. Saizo stood over you ready to finish you off. Then you began to see your life flash before your eyes. You saw you with your mom before she disappeared, and then you saw the depression you went through. You were so alone and you had no one to call a friend. Then a single tear streamed from your face. You wished you had someone to come save you. You wished that someone could come and stop the pain and loneliness. Then Mizore flashed before your eyes.

(name thinking) Why am I thinking about her now of all times? She's not even my friend. She probably doesn't care like everyone else does. It would be better off if I died. That way I could be spared from the pain. Yet.....why? Why do I keep seeing her?

Saizo saw you crying and sneered.

Saizo: Huh Crying like a baby? Don't worry I'll make you stop!

Saizo threw one more devastating punch and you closed your eyes and waited for the end. When......
15533222221211.title: Spare me the pain

choices: Talk with Mizore as she works with the others
155332222212111.content:
Saizo was hung up by several icicles as the large one scattered around him in a spiral fashion. Saizo struggled to break free but couldn't. Then Mizore came up to you and held out her hand getting you up from the ground.

"Saizo leave him be! Unlike most monsters he follows the rules even in times of distress. He's more respectable than you'll ever be!", she yelled.

The two of you left Saizo to rot in humiliation and went to your next class.

"Thanks for picking me up back there. I don't know how to thank you.", you said.

"I know how you must be, alone, distant, no friends to have your side. It's thinking like that will kill you both out there and here. Us loners need people to have their faith in to. Trust perhaps not but faith makes them more like you expect them to.", Mizore said.

"Well thanks for your help. I guess having one friend isn't that bad. But it doesn't change anything.", you made clear.

"We don't need to hang out you just need someone to save your ass and vice versa. Trust me I will count how many times you leave me to get screwed by these punks like Saizo.", she warned.

"I may not be a people person, but I don't leave behind debts that aren't repaid. I owe you twice and hence I'm obligated to help you twice. Depending on whether or not I like to be around you as much is all speculation.", you replied.

"Fair enough.", she gave you and firm handshake which seemed warmer than you'd have thought but it was a friendly one never the less.

You two parted ways and went back to your classes. You were headed for you next one which was lead by Rubi herself. Later as class ended she asked you to walk with her to the newspaper club. "I want you to join this group so you can be acquainted with the students who are very friendly.", she said.

"Don't bother I don't play well with others. Besides reporting isn't my expertise.", you replied.

"You don't need to work you just have to show up and get to know some of them.",Rubi said.

You entered the room and surprisingly Mizore was there and was happy to see you, almost ecstatically..
155332222212111.title: Need people to rely on

choices: Rubi caught on to Kurumu's mind invasion
1553322222121111.content:
"Alright now everybody we have an important situation to address...", Rubi said having everyone sit in flat surfaced tables like a conference room. You sat next to Mizore since it seemed the most elegant choice but things got weird.

She inched her hand over to yours on the table which you noticed clearly and it creeped you out a bit. She didn't hold you hand she was just trying to barley touch yours to get a reaction you thought but ignored it. Then came in the girls right across from you. She had blue hair and a breast size impossible to measure! She gave you a flirty eye glance and you knew now things were going to be more crazy.

"Kurumu any suggestions? Kurumu?", Rubi asked.

The girl across from you was distracted from staring at you but she gave an answer acknowledging her identity to you now. She then starred at you for a while but soon you found yourself dizzy. You felt enamored by her face that you didn't know what anything around you was anymore.

Her eyes almost began to sparkle and made you want to look deeper. Even though it would lead to a dark yet shiny abyss you felt compelled to keep staring at her eyes as you felt your will being sucked into her eyes. But the more you noticed the more you began to think.

"What the hell is happening? What kind of monster is she?! And why do I feel so excited?", your thought to yourself.

You felt it the more your body felt like it was being pulled into her eyes. And when you began to fall in it was like you suddenly began to like her and develop a crush on her. It was all dark and Kurumu appeared with sparkly stars around her. She walked up towards you.

"Hi there. Handsome, strong, silent. Very attractive. I'll enjoy you as part of my harem.", she said noting your personality and body.

"I want he following people taken out of classes for this emergency search and rescue mission: Tskune, Kurumu, Mizore, Moka, and Deshiko. Tell them to meet me at exit 4d. Repeat exit 4d. Double time people! We got a student who needs our help and it's our job to get him back!", Keito ordered her people.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Back at the school

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
You awoke to a bright color of red and pink on a huge bed shaped like a heart. You had no idea where you were but you knew from the look of things Desire was behind this. You weren't chained up or had any restraints for some reason. You looked around to see Desire in a blood red gown and her hair in a pony tail.

"Your up at last. Like the setting? I had it arranged for this occasion."

"Why'd you bring me here?"

"Questions, questions, questions. How about action. Want a drink? Don't worry it's free of any drugs or potions."

"You expect me to buy that when you nearly had the air in my room sucked out leaving me to die."

"Oh please you think I wanted to kill you? Besides this is the point where you and I share this one moment free of anything surprising."

"Ok then. I guess I'll have that drink if it'll get some answers from you."

"Not what I wanted to hear but that's a start. It's a special wein from the succubi home world. They call it liquid love. Don't let the name scare you though it's taste is so good people keep it for moment of true romance."

You took her drink and took a sip. It was actually tastey and no traces of anything strange, she wasn't lying...so far. She sat by you on the bedand started to get closer to you.

"I must admit, you turned out more handsome than I preiviously imagined 19 years ago."

"Thanks?"

"Don't be shy (Name) it's a compliment. A woman admiring you makes you feel uncomfortable?"

You blushed at her remark and tried to answer, "No I just-"

"No need to be shy. Your alone with me now, and you can tell me anything you want. Your feelings, secrets, repressed desires of the body."

"Hey! Back off a bit lady Mizore is my girl and you want to know something? I'm going to be the father of our child and marry her. What do you say to that?"

"Nothing."

"Huh?"

"Nothing. You having a life before we reunited and it's consequences says nothing to me. But now that we are together leave it behind."

"Leave Mizore behind are you nuts?"

"(Name) I've watched you for so long, your heartbreaks, your trials, your entire life. I know you better than anyone in the world. AllI want, all I've ever wanted is your affection."

"You love me that much?"

"More than Mizore and all the other women from that school put together. Please (Name)..just this ounce let go of your attachment to the past. And if it's only for just one moment, even if you reject me...just have this kiss.", she said leaning into you.

You were so taken aback by her words of passion that you couldn't find a way to think straight regarding escape or anything. You looked as her eyes closed and lips came closer proximity to yours. Just one kiss is all she wanted? She's waited for this for so long...it would be a true shame to deny er this little request.

Within the last inch you closed your eyes and finaly moved toward her and returned her affection. Desire's soul felt like an array of fireworks. She felt so alive and free and the feeling was perfect for her. You simply felt like you were givng something to someone their last request in life. It didn't feel wrong or like you were cheating on Mizore. It was just something you had to do.

At first you thought of puling back and breaking away, but you felt like you didn't want to. You couldn't explain why but you didn't feel manipulated either. Desire continued to enjoy the kiss, each second felt like a minute for her. Time slowed down for Desire to engross herself in this moment for as long as possible.

Desire began to enter her tongue into your mouth, and you let her. She explored around and felt yours, both your tongues danced inside the bridge connected by your lips for a while and then stopped. But Desire wanted it to last just a bit longer, she placed her hands gently under your chin and pulled you deeper into her face.

You felt the rush of emotions that kissing made you feel while lip locked with Desire. It felt wonderful, and it felt innocent. Like a school girl giving a boy's first kiss who likes her but doesn't feel the same way, yet would be so kind enough to grant that boy one gesture of affection to show that she liked him enough to show that while it couldn't be, his thoughts about her beauty on the outside were now intertwined with her beauty on the inside.

Desire began to feel the need to breath, and while she despreatly wanted it to last forever she knew you as well had to take a breather now as well. So in her final moments she pulled back, but slowly, and felt the love of the only person she truely loved as her mate slip away from her lips until they broke apart.

You opened your eyes seeing Desire both sad and yet smile. She finally kissed her mate of fate, but to her that kiss meant more to her than anyting in the world except one thing that would set her soul at true ease. Apologizing to her best friend, your mother.

Neither of you said anything, unsure what to say to each other. You simple starred at eachother and wondered what the other was thinking. Desire wanted to say something but she couldn't say it even though it was true.

"I love you."

Those words came out of the one person who no one would expect to hear. Desire starred at you in shock and you repated what you said, "I love you Desire."

"(Name)?"

"I know you love me, and I understand now that you are the most special woman ever in my entire life. but if you really love me, you have to let me go."

Desire cried tears of joy and sorrow, but the moemnt wasd short lived when she coughed hard and so did you. You saw what looked like smoke coming from outside the room but it wasn't smoke. It was fear gas!

Fearsome had found you.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: A True Lover

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"Alright everyone the tracks are leading into the human world so be careful while we search for him. Hopefully they aren't that far.", Keito said as she drove everyone to Japan. A half hour later they managed to follow the tracks to a hidden house near the outskirts of Japan. It looked abandoned but there was no mistake that they were here.

Keito and the others looked inside and saw that there was a pink light coming from the basement. They went down ready for a fight but none was there. "This room looks like it's made for one hell of a good time. You think that women and (Name) did it in here?", Tskune asked.

Moka and Mizore both bitch slapped him on both the sides of his face in response. Mizore checked the bed hopeing nothing happened, there wasn't signs of sex but she felt their body heats from them sitting on there for so long. Mizore got curious as to why that was but maybe it might be something else. Just then all of a sudden someome was walking down the steps.

It was the same attacker who injected you with that serum! "I'm coming down in peace. I know your down there.", he said.

He slowly approached them and had his hands in the air. "Where is my boyfriend?!"

"They were taken by Fearsome. He found my mistress and took her and your boyfriend."

"Where did he go?! Tell me!"

"I don't know where! Fearsome dosed everyone with his fear gas and I hallucenated and found myself a ways from here. I don't have any idea how to track them.", he said.

"Did that bitch fuck my man?! DID SHE?!"

"NO! I didn't hear nothing!"

"What did you see?!"

"I don't watch people have sex."

"Why were they sitting on that bed then hmm?"

"I don't know Desire wanted their reunion private."

"Reunion?"

"Desire was his mother's best friend and his godmother. She was there with him the day he was born.", Keito explained.

"Oh god she's disgusting! When I find her I'll have her head on my icicle and lick that blood dripping fro her like an ice cream cone!", Mizore yelled.

"Hannibal Lector calm down there's still the matter of finding out where Fearsome took them. Is there something we have that might give us a clue were we can find Fearsome?", the attacker asked.

"Well I have an idea on where he set up shop. I know that Fearsome is a scientist so we just have to find a place where he can work in a lab in secret. All I have to do is have Moka, or rather Inner Moka and Kurumu fly around and see if they detect any chemical hot spots. Here I brought them in case there might be any aphrodisiac's involved so we could avoid being dosed by it.", Keito gave the detectors to Kurumu and Moka.

Tskune kissed Moka telling her to be safe before removing her rosary. Kurumu and Inner Moka flew out in search for Fearsome's hideout with Mizore praying you were alright.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Back to the Rescue team

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Nearly a full hour passed until Kurumu found something interesting, she noticed Kokoa near by the road back toward the academy. It seemed odd since she was out of class but around Japan at this time something wasn't right. Kurumu flew down to talk to her to Kokoa's worry, "Oh hey Kurumu.", Kokoa greeted mildly.

"What are you doing here? I thought your supposed to be in school?", Kurumu said.

"My classes ended.", she answered.

"You don't get out of class until around 2:30 it's 2:00 Kokoa.", Kurumu corrected.

"OK you got me. I skipped out since the school went into a frenzy so I felt like shooting the breeze.", she confessed.

"Really? Then why is it that your shooting the breeze here of all places? In fact why even do it at all? This isn't normally what are you doing here? ", Kurumu pressed.

Kokoa began to sweat and decided to to just to throw her cover being there would be no point to it. She planned on an allaby when she got back to school, not while headed on the way. Kokoa transformed into her true monster form and fought Kurumu.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Kurumu Finds a lead towards finding you

choices: Moka has a talk with Kokoa
Kurumu meets up with everyone at the school
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Kokoa spiraled into the air holding Kurumu in her grasp, Kurumu transformed into her monster form and started kicking Kokoa in the gut. Kokoa shrugged her blows and then threw Kurumu onto a bridge over a by the docks. Kurumu tried to slice Kokoa up with her claws but Kokoa kept blocking her strikes and kept on jabbing at Kurumu.

"Kokoa is an S-class Monster. She's almost more powerful than Moka since she embraces her vampire half. I need to find a way to get an opening, maybe trying something unpredictable.", Kurumu thought.

Kokoa hit Kurumu in the ribs which hurt but Kurumu didn't falter. Kurumu had an idea, she jumped onto Kokoa and landed on her head exposing her to Kurumu's nether-regions. Kokoa blushed and was distracted by Kurumu's attack but then before she could get her off of her Kurumu used a suplex and Kokoa had her head hit the ground which dazed her.

Kokoa got back up but her vision was blurred from the head trauma she just revived. Then Kurumu used her tail to choke Kokoa enough to get her to talk, "Where is (Name)?!"

"In the edge of the forest, there's an old-"

"It's empty Kokoa, somebody took him along with Desire."

"I don't know who took him. >gack<"

"What do you know about Fearsome?!"

"Who?"

"I know you know something Kokoa! Tell me."

"Desire said he was after (Name) and said she figured out where he might be in hiding."

"Where is he hiding?!"

">Gaaack< I don't know! She never told me. But she did mention that he had a hideaway in highschool. Said he'd always go there when h wanted to be alone. I think it's the catacombs beneath the school. He probably took them don there, it's how he's been getting his supply on chemicles this whole time."

"How do you know that's where he gets his supplies?"

"I noticed that the science wing was missing several ingredients that make up his toxins. They are barely used that you never wouldn't care to think about checking the manifest.", Kokoa passed out from the lack of oxygen but Kurumu let her go so to not kill her. Kurumu called on her radio and contacted everyone.

"Guys I think (Name) is somewhere beneath the school in the old catacombs. I interrogated the driver."

"Is it anyone we know?", Keito asked.

"Unfortunatly yes, it's Kokoa."

"What?! Is this a joke Kurumu?", Moka replied.

"No Moka, it's true. She's passed out now pick her up at the bridge nearby the docks. I'll meet up with the rest of you at Yokai.", Kurumu said.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Kurumu vs Kokoa

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Moka flew down and saw her sister lying on the ground gasping for air. Kokoa saw her flying down and looked away unable to face her, "Why? Why did you do this sister? Huh? Why?!"

"You think I've cared about what it is that you do or who you share your bed with? All I cared about is trying to finally be the most vicious vampire I can be! And since they don't feel for anyone, I don't care that I helped get your friend kidnapped. The only things that I care about is striving to be a better vampire than you and doing what ever the hell I want!"

"Your not making sense Kokoa. Your still only a child! You hear me a child!"

"Oh your one to talk! Fucking a human, playing with those "friends", and even holding back your true nature with that flase personality you have over your neck! I wanted my real sister back but got this timid, shy, school girl! And now that sister that I loved in the past is gone because your corrupted by what that rosary has done to you!", Kokoa yelled.

"Kokoa, if you continue down this path you will wind up in a cell. I don't want you to live like that."

"Well deal with it, because unlike you I'm not afraid of who I am. And what I am...is a monster."

Moka then planted specially designed vampire cuff on Kokoa's wrists and flew her back to Yokai where she would be brought on charges for aiding Desire in kidnapping (Name). It broke Moka's heart but there was nothing she could do.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Moka has a talk with Kokoa

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
You awoke in a dark setting surrounded by Bats hovering the walls of the cave. You looked to see Desire was awake too and she was struggling to break free. "Oh (Name) thank god. Are you alright my love?", she asked worryingly.

"Fine. Just where are we?"

"Hahahaha, why your here in my home. It's been a while Desire. My my you seem to be carrying some heavy baggage this time around.", said someone walking from the shadows.

"Oh shut up Fearsome! Your not taking the sphere! If you use it it might be too dangerous to control! Your toxin is far too dangerous as it is but mixing it with the source could even affect you!"

"All in the name of science. Besides I can't be affected by my own toxin, my mask will protect me. It both keeps me safe from it and also serves an an enhancement of it's potency. Scared are we?", he peered through the darkness to see that his mask was like that of a hangman and looked like a corpse.

"Let Desire go Fearsome! She's suffered enough!", you yelled.

"I am surprised by your sudden affection toward her. She didn't use her succubus power, although how could she when she lost those powers years ago. I am amazed you snagged him despite the setback Desire. Showing all those succubi that it is possible to be yourself instead of their allure. But there's no point in it now when I begin preparations. The school's water supply will be pumped with ounces of fear gas and poison everyone in the school! This will be the first in dozens of experiments!"

"Your crazy.", you said.

"Takes madness to understand it. HAHAHAHHAHAAHAHAAAA!"
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You wake up

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
After nearly an hour the everybody re-grouped at the entrance to the catacombs and prepared to head down to search for you. "Alright everyone, this is it. We split into pairs. Myself and Mizore, Moka and Tskune, and finally Kurumu and Deshiko. If anyone gets into trouble your on your own since our radio's can't work underground. You can try calling out or finding us but for the most part whatever happens down there your alone with your partner. You each have gas masks in case of emergencies and you will all be equipped with searchlights. We going to save our friend, so lets get down there and rescue him."

Everyone went down and took different paths in the catacombs. They all searched calling out to you hoping you would hear them but they weren't close by enough for you to hear them yet.

"Geez this place is creepy.", Deshiko commented.

"Aw great another fork. Which do you think we should take?"

"Uh my guts saying left."

"Fine then. So tell me how is it working with Keito?", Kurumu asked.

"She takes her job seriously and does it well. She can be hard on us at times but only if the situation demands it. Although ever since the whole Naga incident I see her looking at a picture she has of (Name) every day. She stares at it all the time at least once a day, so you can imagine how annoying it is when she has him on her mind.", Deshiko explained.

"I notice shes different around him in a good way. I sometimes think what it would have been like if (Name) and Keito were in fact a couple. Except you would have a headache since she'd act all lovey dovey 24-7.", Kurumu noted.

"Hehe yeah, but one has to wonder why Keito still loves him knowing full well he's beyond her reach."

"Looks like the trails heating up. You see anything?", Deshiko asked.

"Ah dammit, dead end. We better go back and try the other direction.", then suddenly a loud roar echoed through the caves.

"What the hell was that?", they both said.

"I think it sounded like a...a dinosaur.", Deshiko thought aloud.

"That's crazy dinosaurs are extinct. Oh wait! Put your mask on! It must be the fear toxins!", Kurumu yelled.

Meanwhile...

"(Naaaaaaaaaaaaame)! Can you hear me?!! (Name)!"

"Quiet! Not so loud, remember were dealing with Fearsome. we need to be careful if you want to save your boyfriend.", Keito said.

"I know you really like him Keito don't act like you don't care about him."

"Sorry, I'm just trying to stay focused."

"I always thought you would steal him away like I did when we met. But you let him try to come after me, why?"

"I love him as much as you do. So you can imagine how hard it is to have to let him go to be happy with who he thinks is the one for him. The only time I got to remotely have a chance with him was that dinner date I had with him, and then he respectfully turned me down. I hoped that maybe I'd have a chance with him later but...you two were perfect for each other."

"Keito...you are really a true friend to me and (Name)."

"Coming from you..it means a great deal to me."

"Wait I see something moving. What is it?"
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Continue

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
They shined their lights over by where they saw movement and saw this. ( http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110... )

"Lets get out of here.", Keito said.

Then suddenly they almost fell into a gaping hole that was right beside them, they saw an entire heard of dinosaurs eating meat. And they were the same species as the shadow that was creeping closer to the two. "Holy shit. There's so many. Fearsome couldn't have done this."

"I don't think so either. Come on we have to-", then suddenly a Carnotaur came out of nowhere and gunned after them nearly biting their heads off. Keito and Mizore ran for it with great haste while they both used their powers to try and out run them. But it was still futile since those things were built for speed. Mizore freezed the ground and had the Carnotaur slip and crash into the wall causing some of the rocks to collapse the way they just were. They panted heavily after having a heart attack.

"OK since when do dinosaurs roam under a monster school?", Keito asked.

"Your asking me? Those things were real. That wall didn't just collapse on it's own, somebody either was doing some sort of dino cloning or the monster world was a safe haven for the first breed of killing machines that roamed the planet!"

"We'll get answers ounce we find (Name) come on we gotta find him fast.", Keito said.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Dinosaurs? Really? Eh why not

choices: You meet with Moka and Tskune
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
You and Desire were alone while you two tried to get out of your restraints. "Desire, can you break free?"

"I can't."

"Well we need to do something! Maybe I could just-"

"(Name), the source is inside you! Try and focus and it will help you. I should know I helped create it.", she suggested.

"Well I'll try.", you replied.

"It will work (Name) I believe in you my love."

You concentrated on using the source to aid you but nothing was happening. You tried to think only of the source but still nothing. Then you tried thinking of your mother, but then you felt something. Thinking that it was working you focused only on your omther and soon enough you could see the sphere in front of you.

"I haven't seen one of my creators in some time. Hello Miss Desire. Have you been well?", it greeted.

"I've been better. But we need you to free us. Fearsome has gone insane and will use your power to do god knows what."

"I have seen what he will wrought. And therefor I must help you. A shame his brilliance turned into chaos, his assistance in my creation was quite vital.", it replied. It sent electric currents on your restraints and freed you both.

"I cannot leave your body for too long (Name). It is too dangerous to be out exposed with Scythe's obsession to use my irresponsibly."

"Scythe?"

"Fearsome had a name before that. It is a shame he went so crazy, he'd have made a brilliant professor.", Desire answered.

"Still kinda weird name for a guy who looks like a guy who recently went to the noose."

choices: Fearsome holding one of the girls to the throat with fear toxin
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Moka and Tskune almost mistaken you for an enemy but as soon as they saw Desire they were immediately hostile. "Wait! She's ok! She's not evil!", you explained.

"But isn't she the one who kidnapped you?!", Tskune asked.

"Long story but point is,she's on our side and she's cool. But trust me we got worse things to worry about. Wait? Where's Mizore?"

"We split up looking for you. And Keito's with her too last time we checked. But we heard some strange noises around the caves and it's getting shaky the past couple minutes.", Moka explained.

"Fearsome must have some secret plan underway. We have to reach the surface and warn the school to evacuate.", Desire said.

"After you answer for taking (Name)", Moka said.

"Listen guys, yes she did steal me away, but it's complicated. Believe it or not....I'm her destined one. For my entire life to be honest.", you admitted hoping to get them to back off of her for a short time until things were calmer.

"What? Oh hell, all things aside we gotta find Mizore and Keito. (Name) go find them, Tskune and I will go up and warn the school."

''Desire go with them. It might be harder if you and I go while trying to get Mizore and Keito to listen to reason while this place is on the brink of collapsing."

"Good idea. I love you, my turtle dove.", she said leaving you alone to find the others. Tskune and Moka looked at her in both confusion and slight disgust. But you were too busy running along the caves calling out to Mizore and Keito.

You searched for a few minutes until you found an unpleasant sight......

"Oh christ no!", you reacted seeing Keito's life being held in the hands of this madman.

"Oh yes. I will slit this pretty girls throat laced with my most concentrated dose of fear toxin. She'll have mere minutes to live before she succumbs to her deepest nightmares.", Fearsome threatened.

"Let her go you crazy bastard!", you yelled.

"I would be happy to, unless you give me the source."

"Not a chance. If you had it the entire world would plunge into fear!"

"Not the whole world, just humans. Monsters will thrive on the chaos, while I reap the benefits to handing the world over to the superior race.", Fearsome explained.

"I won't hand it over Fearsome!", you answered.

"If you don't then she dies. But what do you care. She isn't the woman you love, you fancy the snow witch. Unless of course you have feelings for this woman as well?", he threatened holding the knife closer to Keito's throat.

"Please don't hurt her for gods sake.", you reacted.

"Well I'll be damned, you DO! You love two women but only pursue one as your mate. Heh how trivial. But question is does she love you?", Mizore took it as heartbreaking, both for Keito's slim chances of survival and that you had legit feelings for Keito alongside her.

"Leave Mizore and (Name) out of this! Don't hurt him.", Keito pleaded.

"Unreal, she also loves you in return. Well then I see my only option is to do, THIS!", Fearsome cut Keito's throat where she tried to close the wound be subsequently being poisoned by the toxin laced with the blade.

"NO! Mizore get her out and save her!", you yelled in both outrage and worry. Fearsome escaped into the caves where he knew you would follow him. You wanted to chase after him but you checked on Keito.

"Mizore can't you do anything?!", you asked Mizore.

"(Name) I'm not a doctor. I need to get her up to the nurse now."

"Wait...(Name)...be careful...",Keito said before she began to convulse.

"Jesus, I have to get her up now! Go after him (Name)! I'll grab everyone I can to help you!", Mizore said running as fast as possible.

"Oh god, Mizore don't freak out shes-"

Tskune tried to stop her from tearing Desire apart. "Mizore, I agree with you! You should kick her ass but now is not the time! We gotta focus on the bigger picture here! We need to get these two down there and find Kurumu and the others!", he said trying to reason with Mizore.

"We'll talk about that later come on!", Moka said flying out of the room as Inner Moka with Mizore and Desire folloing her back down into the caves.

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
You pursued Fearsome only to see no sign of him. But suddenly you heard his voice, "I know what you must be thinking. Why?"

"Your just a disturbed individual. I don't know what your doing after this but it either ends with you dying or slowly dying in a cell. Either way, your future isn't too bright."

"I'm not afraid, but you are. Your lover Mizore. Your other love interest Keito. Your friends Tskune, Moka, Kurumu...shall I go on? You see with my plan, I'll create a race of monsters unable to feel fear. And they will take over the world."

"OF COURSE! Isn't that what all you villains say and want? Christ your as dumb as every other bastard I took down."

"Then may I ask you to compare something? Which is the more dumb person? The one striving for a new era in both monster kind ad fear? Or the one who goes after the person who managed to recreate an extinct species?!"

You nearly shit yourself when you saw Fearsome with a Carnotaurus behind him. "How on earth?"

"I found remnants of their DNA in these caves. I asked some of my old contacts to help me breed them but sadly they, parted ways after one or two nights with them without being careful. Now they obey me and they were a factor in supplying me with their blood which is a key ingredient to my toxin. They're blood's metabolism has an affect on the chemicals when they mix which triggers their bestial side which makes them less susceptible to fear. Reverse this affect with the same conditions and you become more susceptible to fear!"

"Sooooo your going to use them now for what?"

"I'll unleash them onto the school. I've deprived them of food for long enough. The caves will lead them to fresh meat! Starting with you.", Fearsome pointed at you and the beast charged after you.

You tried to run but then Kurumu and Deshiko caught you and began to try and out-fly that monster thanks to her wings. "Thank me later handsome we gotta haul ass! That thing's relentless!", Kurumu said.

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
The Carnotaurus chased you and Kurumu relentlessly. Kurumu flew up and high and low while she was carrying you, but the Carnotaurus was getting closer and closer. So close that Kurumu could flew it's breath on her tail.

(name) Waaaahhhh!!!! Kurumu! Can't you go any faster?!? That's things gonna eat us for dinner!

Kurumu: I'm flying as fast as I can! But.....I can't keep flying much longer!

You could see on Kurumu's face that she was getting tired and she couldn't be able to out-fly the carnotaurus much longer. You had to think of something and quick, but what? Then things took a turn for the worst. You and Kurumu were at a dead end. Now you two had nowhere to go. The carnotaurus saw you two were cornered and crept toward the two of you ready to finish it's prey.

(name): Oh crap! We're trapped! What'll we do?!?

Kurumu said nothing. She was trying to think about what the two of you should do. Then she decided. She slowly descended and set you on the ground. Then she stood in front of you and extended her claws.

(name) Kurumu! What the hell are you doing?!?

Kurumu: (name)! When there's an openign go on and get out of here! I'll hold off this thing for as long as I can. Just get out of here!

(name): Like hell I will! I can't just leave you here!

Kurumu: I said go!!! Don't worry about me! Just do as I say! I refuse to let you die! I promise I'll protect you!

Then Kurumu flew up and charged into battle at the carnotaurus. The carnotaurus tried to bite her, but Kurumu flew out of the way and slashed at it's hide. You stood there trying to figure out what to do. You could see that Kurumu's attacks were having no effect. You wanted to help, but all you could do was watch. You couldn't run away either, because you wanted to help Kurumu. Then Kurumu's voice made you jolt.

Kurumu: What the hell are you doing (name)! Get out of here! I said I'll handle this! Go!

(name) But Kurumu....!!

Then the carnotaurus swung it's tail and hit Kurumu hard. Kurumu was sent flying and hit the rock wall hard.

(name) Kurumu! No!

The carnotaurus stared at Kurumu, delighted that it scored a hit on it's prey. A thin line of blood trickled down Kurumu's face and her body was battered. You gasped in horror at this sight. Kurumu struggled to her feet and extended her claws again. Then you heard Kurumu's voice again.

Kurumu: I said go damn it! I said I can handle it. Get going! (cough)!

(name): Kurumu! Why damn it?!? Why are you doing this?!? You know you can't beat this thing so why?!? WHY?!?!?!?

Kurumu: You need to ask? (cough) You're my friend. I won't run away from a friend that's in trouble! I said I'd protect you and I meant it! What kind of friend would I be if I can't even protect you? Think about how Mizore would feel if you died. (cough)

(name) But.....there's no reason for you to risk your life for me! I won't leave you!

Kurumu: Please.....go......for me.....for Mizore,....Keito,......everyone.....

Then the carnotaurus opened it's mouth and prepared to finish off it's prey.

(name): KURUMU!!!!!!!!

It was about to be curtains for Kurumu when......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You try and out-fly the one chasing you

choices: Fearsome had placed the school under his fear toxin
The dunosaurs already started to attack!
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Then before it could eat Kurumu Inner Moka shoved the old fossil into the wall and caved in on the beast killing it in the process. Inner Moka flew to Kurumu and pulled her up. "Thanks.", Kurumu said to Moka.

"No problem.", Moka replied exhaustively since it took a lot of energy to kill that thing.

You ran over to hug Kurumu to thank her for saving your life. "Kurumu, you are the best. I can't thank you enough for saving me."

"I'll be honest...I thought I was done for. But I'd do it again."

"One might think that's a lot of loyalty for JUST a friend.", said Desire followed by Deshiko, Keito and Mizore.

You and Kurumu blushed after hearing that but Mizore slapped Desire for saying it since she had enough women interested in her man. As soon as you saw Mizore you ran over to her and kissed her passionately happy to see her again. "I thought I lost you.", she said.

"I did too. I'm just glad your alright.", you replied. You turned over to see Desire looking at you two in both happiness and envy. "Well Desire, does this change anything?"

"No matter how long it takes...I'll always try to make you mine. But for now when this is over I'll leave you to your icy lover.", she replied.

"And I'll be alongside him ready to defend our love.", Mizore replied.

"I don't approve of you being with my beloved. But I respect your love as you respect mine as proof of saving me."

"Ok now that the pleasantries are out of the way we need a plan to stop Fearsome.", Deshiko said.

"Right.", then the cave started to shake and the rubble from the carnotaur stared to spread like something was rising out of it. "Nothing can kill these things! Fine Inner Moka and I will keep it distracted while Deshiko and the rest of you get to the school. Save as many as you can.", Keito ordered

"She's right, when those things hit top-side. That school will be their buffet.", Desire commented.

"And what then? You guys get to play hero while we run for our lives?", Mizore protested.

"I ain't exactly crazy about this plan myself but it's all we got. Now move!", Keito ordered

The others left Moka and Keito to their upcoming battle while you and the rest made it back to the school to prepare for carnage. But by the time you all made it back to the school...
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Inner Moka, Desire, Mizore, and Deshiko come to...

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"Jeez! The entire school is clouded by that crap Fearsome uses! Everyone is attacking each other and tearing themselves apart since they're so terrified.", you assessed.

"The sphere should work just like last time. We just have to get you in the center of the chaos...", Desire said.

"And?"

"And hope something happens.", she finished.

"Well that is a brilliant plan.", you sarcastically replied.

"Don't worry (Name) we got your back.", Keito said.

"Nothing can stop three lovesick monsters from protecting the same handsome mate- I mean boy.", Desire reassured.

"I agree with you on that last part at least.", you turned toward Mizore.

"(Name) when this is over..."

"Shh, we'll both be fine. Have faith. We won't lose this if we just stay strong and stay cautious when were inside. We've done this before so we can't lose.", you said with confidence.

"I know...just...I was going to say when this is over...I love you no matter what happens or who you end up with.", she said.

"Mizore....you are all I ever wanted. I'd never want to give that up.", you replied.

"We can't waste anymore time on the lovey dovey stuff you two. Come on were going in. Mizore make ice masks for everyone and get ready to head straight for the center of the school. It should be in the courtyard, (Name) whatever you think will make the source undo all of this just do it.", Keito explained her plan.

"Everyone is ready Keito.", Mizore replied.

"OK then...GO!"

choices: You had a pair of wings made of ice
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Keito was on her way to see you when there was a loud commotion. Everyone was rushing around and then she heard a loud scream. It was coming from your room. Keito rushed to your room to see you thrashing on the bed in pain and three men were trying to hold you down.

Keito: What the hell is going on here?!?

Man 1: We don't know! We were checking on him and then he just started screaming in pain!

Man 2: We tried calming him down, but nothing works!

(Name) IT HURTS!!!! IT HURTS!!!!! IT HURTS!!!!!!

Keito:(name)!!! Calm down!!! What hurts?!? Tell me!!! I'll try to help you!!

(name) Everything!! Everything hurts!!! Make....MAKE IT STOP!!!

You thrashed around even more. Keito and the others tried to hold you down, but you thrashed too much. Then it happened. Your chest began to glow so brightly it filled the room.

Keito: What the hell is going on?!?

(name) YAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!

The light traveled to from your chest to your arm and your eyes turned a sky blue. The light grew brighter and brighter until the room was completely enveloped in light. Then the light slowly faded and the pain left your body. You finally stopped screaming and you began to calm down. You slowly opened your eyes.

(name): Keito......what's going on?

Keito: (name)! Are you o.......what the hell?!?

(name) What? Keito what's wrong?

Keito just stared at you with shock and couldn't speak. You looked at yourself and realized why she was staring at you like crazy. The reason being was.....
