1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Fearsome or The Woman makes their move

choices: You dreampt of yourself running around like a wild animal and destroying things
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Back with you and the gang Keito led all you to the security committee's headquarters. There was section that was just like a doctors office. Only it was bigger and there was a lot more like a lab.

(name): Whoa!

Mizore: This place is huge!

Keito: Here, we heal our wounds whenever we suffer from them and we check on our bodies to make sure they are in top physical condition.

Moka: Wow! This place is so cool!

Keito: Now then. (whistles) Deshiko!!

Deshiko: Deshiko reporting ma'am!

Keito: Have your squad check on my friend. Make sure his body is perfectly normal.

Deshiko: Aye miss! Mr (name) if you could please come with me.

(name): Um....I don't know.

Keito: Don't worry (name). Deshiko will take good care of you.

Kurumu: Wait a sec. Just what is she going to do to (name)?

Yukari (whispering): Probably something perverted! bet.

Keito: Don't worry. She's just gonna check (name)'s body if there's anything in his body.

(name) Um....uh.....There's no need to check. I feel fine.... ehehehe

You tried to walk away, but unfortunately Deshiko and Keito blocked your way.

Keito: No way. We have have to check if there's anything in your body or if the serum the attacker injected in your body has taken effect.

(name) Do I have to?

Mizore: Yes. Keito's right. You have to be checked out.

(name): But....I.....

Deshiko: Don't worry. We'll take good care of you.

(name) We'll? What do you mean by that?

As soon as you said these words a whole squad of doctors came out of nowhere and lifted you up. And before you could react they whisked you away into the office. Then after that everyone heard you scream with embarrassment then your clothes were sent flying and fell in front of them. When they saw this everyone blushed beet red, including Keito.

Mizore: Eeep!! (name)'s clothes!

Then from behind the doors, they could all hear you screamed and yelping with surprise. From the way it sounded it sounded like the squad was doing something raunchy to you.

(name): Hey! What happened to my clothes!?! Yah! Hey! That area's of limits! (moan)! No! Don't touch me there! Kyaaa!!! Hahahaah!!! No! Stop! That tickles!!! Waaaahhh!! Hey! Cut it out!!

Mizore: Just what the hell are they doing to him in there?!?

Keito: They're checking his body to make sure he's fine.......hopefully.....

Kurumu: Checking him?!? It sounds more like they're raping him to me!

Tskune: Man. I kinda feel sorry for the poor guy. and yet for some reason I envy him.

Moka: Tskune!

A few minutes passed by and soon the squad brought you back out and Deshiko handed Keito a clipboard. As for you, you looked dazed and looked like you went through a tornado.

(name) Rrrrgggghhhh......I like I lost my innocence.

Tskune: You don't have innocence.

Mizore: what did they do to you?

(name) I don't wanna talk about it.

Keito: So. What are the results?

Deshiko: The body's functions are perfectly normal and there were no toxins detected.

(name): How could that be? There has to be a mistake.

Keito: Are you sure Deshiko?

Deshiko: Yes. We even scanned his bloodstream and we couldn't detect anything. As far as we know, (name)'s healthy as a horse.

Keito: I see.

Moka: How strange. Are you sure you got injected (name)?

(name) Yes. How could I forget? Mizore saw the whole thing too.

Mizore: It's true. The attacker injected him with some kind of black stuff.

Tskune: So what'll we do now?

There was a long silence, then Keito spoke.

Keito: Well for now, (name) you and the rest of you go home and get some rest. We can't do anything about it for now, but hopefully we'll figure something out.

Kurumu: Are you sure?

Keito: Yes. But don't worry. My team and I will figure this out. Just go and get some rest, but if something happens to you (name), I want you to call me immediately.

(name) Yes ma'am.

After that you and the rest your friends went to their proper dorms and went to sleep. As for you, you stayed up a little and looked up at the ceiling. You thought about everything that happened today. A lot of thoughts ran through your mind. Especially when the attacker injected you with that black stuff. What was it that he injected you with? And why did he go after Mizore? Soon all the thinking made you sleepy and eventually you fell asleep. Then......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You. You in the committee being checked on

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
By the time you got back inside your room alone in your dorm it was nightfall. You sat on your chair in deep thought but suddenly your entire body was on fire, at least you felt like it.

"JESUS CHRIST! AHHHH I'M BURNING UP!", you screamed.

You ripped apart all your cloths and fell to the floor as your body tensed and grew agonizingly painfull. Your hands grew in size which hurt indescribably, and your hair grew like a large mane. Soon enough the heels of your legs streched and your spine rose inside you with its edges sticking out. Your teeth were sharper and your shoulder blades huntched your back and you stood on all fours. The last thing you remember was thedeafening sound of a howl.

Mizore, Keito, Kurumu, Moka, and Yukari ran over to the source of the sound in their pj's due to the urgency and suddeness of the howl. They all crowded your room wondering what the hell's happening. Moka knocked your door only to be welcomed by a large wolf bursting through the door nearly biting her neck off in a single bite.

Everyone ran back away in fear to regain their composure and wittness what they saw: A WEREWOLF.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Japanese or American? Which wolf is in Japan?

choices: You wake up not remembering what happened.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Moka: What the hell is that thing!?!?

Tskune: It's some kind of werewolf!

Yukari: Oh come on it's Gin! He's obviously trying to pull a prank on us!

Kurumu: Yukari. Something telling me that's not Gin!

Mizore: Everyone! Stay frosty!

Suddenly the werewolf attacked. It gunned straight for Moka.

Tskune: Moka! Look out! Quick!

Tskune knocked Moka out of the way and removed her rosary. This caused Moka to transform to her inner form and she was ready to fight.

Inner Moka: Time for this mutt to get fixed!

The werewolf wasn't intimidated. It gunned for Moka again. This time Moka was ready. He gave the werewolf a sharp kick. The kick connected, but it didn't faze the wolf. It regained it's composure and jumped out of the window.

Kurumu: It's getting away!

Yukari: After it!

Moka: I'm on it!

Tskune: Hey! Wait a minute!

Before Tskune could stop them, Moka and the gang jumped out of the window after the werewolf. Tskuen followed in hot pursuit. Then Tskune heard a piercing scream. He quickly rushed to the source of the scream. There laid a terrible sight. Yukari was unconscious by a tree, Kurumu was hanging by a branch, Mizore and Moka were still standing, but they were completely exhausted. The werewolf however was still ready to fight. As soon as it saw Tskune it went straight for him.

Inner Moka: Tskune look out!!

Moka jumped in the way and blocked the attack, but then the werewolf used it's speed to get behind Moka and gave her a sharp kick in the back of her head knocking her out cold.

Tskune: Moka no!

Mizore: Incredible! Even an S class monster like Moka can't keep up with this thing!

The werewolf was not done yet. He went after Mizore next. Mizore tried to freeze it and shoot icicles at it, but then the werewolf slashed through her ice and headbutted her in the stomach knocking the wind out of her and knocking her out cold from the shock. Tskune was know all alone. There was definitely no way he could fight off the beast on his own. Just when he thought he was gonna die. He heard a flurry of steps and then Keito and the security committee was there in a flash.

Keito: Stand down wolf boy! You're under arrest for disturbing the peace of this school!

The werewolf saw it was outnumbered so it had no choice, but to run. It dashed away into the forest.

Keito: On his heels men! Don't let the beast escape! Tskune are you OK?

Tskune: I'm fine thanks.

Keito: What the hell happened here?!?

Tskune: I don't know. One minute we were sleeping, and then we heard a howling noise and then were all out here.

Keito: I can't believe it. Even Moka's out? Men! Quickly! Get these people back to headquarters so they can heal!

Man: What about the beast ma'am?

Keito: Split into two teams! One team, take care of the injured! Other team, search for the beast! On the double! Move it!

Unknown to anyone on the scene they didn't know the beast was in fact you. They focused on taking care of the injured and searching for you.

The next day.......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: FIGHT!

choices: You and Deshiko see Keito. (keito doesn't know about who the werewolf is FYI)
Mizore and the others wake up
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
The very next day you woke up feeling refreshed for some reason. When you got up unbeknownst you, in the corner of your room, it was covered in ice. But you were feeling way to good to notice it.

(name) -yawn- Man! I feel completely great!! I feel like I slept like a log.

Then you heard a loud commotion outside your room. It was the sound of the students scrambling around the hallway like crazy. You peeked out of your room to see students left and right rushing around in a panic.

(name) What the hell is going on here?

You looked around and tried to find your friends. You looked all over, but you couldn't find your friends anywhere.

(name): That;s weird. I wonder where they could be?

Deshiko: Hey! (name)! (name)!!!

(name) Deshiko! What's going on here?

Deshiko: There's no time! It's an emergency! Come on!

Before you could say anything, Deshiko grabbed your arm and dragged you all the way to the nurses office. When you got there Deshiko led you to the nurse's office where a horrible sight awaited you. Moka, Kurumu, Yukari, and Mizore were in lying in their beds. When you saw them you felt like your heart stopped. Tskune was bandaged up and was sitting next to Moka.

(name) What.....what the hell happened here?!?

After a while Tskune explained everything to you and she finished her story you were completely shocked.

(name) Is that why the students are panicking right now?

Deshiko: Yes. Keito's doing everything she can to find the werewolf. That thing is strong.

Tskune: Yeah. It was even able to take down Moka in her true vampire form.

(name) No way!

Deshiko: Yes. Everyone's resting. Mizore's the one I'm worried about. She got messed up pretty hard. She should be fine as long she rests.

You stood next to Mizore and held her hand gently.

(name) I'm sorry Mizore. I'll make sure this monster is brought to justice. I'll make that thing pay for what it did to you! I promise.

Deshiko: (name)! I just got word! Keito wishes to see you immediately!

(name) But I...

Tskune: I know you're worried, but you have to go. Don't worry. I'll take care of them.

(name): OK Tskune. Please take care of them. Let's go Deshiko.

Deshiko: Right.

Meanwhile outside the attacker who injected the serum into you was listening to the whole thing. When he hear enough he took off into the sky.

Attacker: Interesting. I must inform the mistress straight away. She will be pleased when she hears about this.

Meanwhile.....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You wake up not remembering what happened.

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
After you and Deshiko left to see Keito, Mizore and the other girls one by one woke up.

Moka: What happened?

Yukari: Owie......my head.....

Kurumu: Oh man. I feel like my entire body needs an ice pack.

Tskune: Thank goodness you guys are awake.

Mizore: (moan) Where are we?

Tskune: You're in the nurse's office. You all were knocked out by that werewolf.

Kurumu: Seriously?!?

Moka: I'm so sorry guys. That wolf caught me by surprise. It was too fast. Even for the other me.

Kurumu: Don't be Moka. Just you wait! When I see that wolf again, I'll give him an ass beating it'll never forget!

Yukari: You said it sister! I'm with ya!

Tskune: Now now.

Mizore looked around to see if you were there, but you were no where to be found.

Mizore: Tskune. Where's (name)?

Tskune: Oh yeah. (name) went with Deshiko because Keito wanted to talk to him regarding the incident.

Mizore: I.....I need to talk to him.

Mizore struggled to get up, but her injuries kept her from even sitting up. Mizore winced in pain as pain shot through her body. Tskune quickly rushed to her side and gently forced her to lie down.

Tskune: Easy Mizore. You're hurt. The doctor said you got hit pretty hard.

Mizore: But Tskune....

Tskune: No buts. Nurse said you need to rest. That's goes for all of you as well.

Mizore didn't say anything and pouted, but she understood.

Tskune: Now. I have to get to class. You all get some rest and I'll come back to check on you guys later.

Then after Tskune left there was a long silence between the girls. Then Moka spoke.

Moka: Mizore is something wrong with you?

Mizore: Why do you ask Moka?

Moka: Don't try to lie. I saw it when we were fighting the werewolf. You're ice powers were weaker than usual.

Mizore: Well I.....

Kurumu: Come on Moka. Maybe Mizore was weakened during the fight with that werewolf.

Yukari: Yeah. It's not like she's sick or something.

Moka: No way. I saw it. Mizore's powers were definitely weak.

Mizore didn't know what to say or do. She didn't know if it was such a good idea to tell the others about her condition. On the other hand, they were her friends. They deserved to know. She took a deep breath.

Tskune and the others nodded and then Mizore said......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Mizore and the others wake up

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"Guys you all have to promise me you'll keep it from (Name).", everyone nodded and prepared for her confession. "Everyone, I am pregnant.", she said.

Everyone was shocked to hear her say that when they weren't fully aware that her and you had unprotected sex. Moka was the first to speak, "Oh my god Mizore why didnt you tell us that?!"

"I found out yesterday. You cant expect me to just say it first second I find something like that out!", she said.

"Well I for one think it's great that your going to be a mom! Oh my god you an (Name) will be terrific parents.", said Yukari.

"Congratulations you snowflake. Took his virginity and his bachelor rights forever, he now has massive responsabilities.,", Kurumu said.

"Thanks guys for your support. But now that I'm pregnant my powers are very weak. Again none of you are to say shift until I tell him myself, I mean you Yukari!"

"Promise I won't Mizore.", she swore.

Mizore rested along with the others until they regained their strength and recovered. Mizore couldn't help but hope you were safe. She wanted so badly to tell you but she couldn't now. First chance she had she was going to yell it to you so that the world could hear that you and her were going to have a family.

But then suddenly...
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Confession time

choices: Meanwhile the woman and the attacker meet
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Suddenly Mizore began to feel dizzy and felt like the world was spinning. She figured that she'd get some sleep after all that's happened So she closed her eyes and fell asleep.

Meanwhile you and Deshiko arrived to headquarters and inside it was crazy! Keito's subordinates were rushing around like crazy getting testimonies fro students, and looking for clues they found.

Keito: Damn it this is insane! How can a beast just show up and then disappear all at once?!?

Deshiko: Ms. Keito. I brought (name) as requested.

Keito: Good.(name) I'm sure you're well aware of the current situation.

(name): Well yeah. The entire school is talking about it.

Keito: Yes. This beast just showed up out of the blue and attacked Moka and the others.

(name) I know. Deshiko told me the details.

Keito: It's power is what worries me though. It was strong enough to overwhelm even Moka when she transformed into her true form.

When you hear this you gulped nervously.

(name) So....what are we gonna do?

Keito: I want you and Tskune to capture the beast and bring here.

(name): What?!? But this beast even beat Inner Moka! Not to mention Moka and the others can't be released from the nurse by tomorrow! How....

Keito: I don't expect you to fight it. I'm well aware about and the other girls conditions. I just need you to capture it so we can analyze it. I'm having a scientist come over and try to see what she can do to analyze that beast and what it's intentions are. Just focus on capturing it. Meet Deshiko and the others by the fountain in the evening. Don't worry. I'm having Deshiko assist you with a squad. Is that understood?

(name) Yes ma'am. We'll do everything we can. We'll capture this beast for you.

Keito: Good. Deshiko. I want you to help them in capturing this beast.

Deshiko: Yes ma'am!

After Keito dismissed you, you spoke to Deshiko alone.

(name) Are you sure this is a good idea? I mean having a scientist trying to figure out what a rampaging beast intentions are by wreaking havoc?

Deshiko: I don't know much either, but I heard the scientist exceptionally skilled and she's pretty smart. We'll just have to do what we can. Just get Tskune and we'll capture this thing.

(name): OK.....I'll go find Tskune and tell him the news. See you in the evening.

As you went to find Tskune you thought about everything that happened. You didn't know how you were gonna capture the werewolf, but you were gonna try. Then you eyes began to get blurry and you had another vision. You were in a room of light and there was no one around. Then you see a ball of light in front of you. It was the same ball of light that helped you before. Then you see the same pair of red eyes that you saw from before. Then a white wolf appeared before. It looked gentle and kind at first, but then the ball slowly started to turn black and the wolf began to get mean. The wolf growled and then it did the unthinkable. It blasted some kind of blizzard attack from it's mouth. You slowly began to get covered in ice. Just when you were about to be completely frozen, the vision ended.

(name) What the hell.....was that?

You stood there trying to process what just happened, but then Tskune came up to you snapping you out of your train of thought.

Tskune: (name)? Are you OK?

(name): Oh! Tskune. It's nothing. I'm fine. But there is something I need to tell you. It's regarding the werewolf. We have orders to capture it tongiht.

Tskune: Capture it?!? Why?!?

(name): I don't know. but Keito says some scientist is gonna take a look at it and see what's wrong with it or something. Besides, Deshiko is gonna help us too.

Tskune: I see. I'll don't know how we're gonna capture this thing, but I'll do what I can to help. Let's get that werewolf!

(name): Yeah.

(name thinking) Don't worry Mizore. I'll avenge you. That beast is gonna pay what he did to you and the others.

Next....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: The same guy from earlier kidnaps Mizore

choices: Keito and a squad of her team arrived.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Later Deshiko, you and Tskune as well as a squad of the security committee met at the fountain.

Deshiko: Good. We're all here. Here's the plan. I'll take one squad and cover the north and south. Tskune you and (name) take another squad and search the east and the west of here. If anything happens launch a signal flare and we'll come straight to you.

(name) Got it.

Tskune: Yeah. Let's go!

And so it went. Everyone searched high and low for the werewolf, but it was no where to be seen. You all searched for hours and hours and soon it was getting close to night.

(name) Tskune. I don't know about you, but walking in the forest at night is creepy.

Tskune: I heard that. But be on guard. We'll never know when that thing will attack. We covered the west side, but we still need to check the east. Spread out everyone.

So they did, but known to anyone the attack just happened to be passing by with Mizore in his arms. When he saw them he quickly hid in the trees. Then he pulled out a communicator.

Attacker: My queen. I have captured the target as planned, but we have a problem. There's a squad of security members in the forest. Searching most likely me. What shall I do?

Woman: Destroy them. I don't care who it is. Take them out and complete your mission.

Attacker: Yes mistress.

Then as soon as one of the members got close, the attacker began it's assault. Meanwhile Tskune, you and another squad were still searching when, a red flare shot up into the sky and Tskune's radio erupted with screams.

Radio: Tskune! Tskune! Do you copy?!?

Tskune: I'm here! What is it?!?

Radio: Someone is attacking us! Subject confirmed to be deadly and has a hostage! A girl with snowy hair!

(name): Snowy hair? That's Mizore!!!

Tskune: Where are you now?!?

Radio: 4 clocks west of here! Get here quickly! Before......Gah!!!!!

Then the radio emitted nothing, but static. Tskune and you raced with your squad toward the scene. They arrived in time to see the attacker holding up a student by his neck. He also had Mizore on his back knocked out cold.

(name) Mizore!!!

Tskune: You there! Who are you and what do you think you're doing with Mizore!?!?

Attacker: Nothing you need to be concerned about. I'll I can say is capturing her is my mission. And you're in my way.

The attacker charged at you and Tskune. You two prepared to fight, but the attacker ran right past you and Tskune and attacked your guy's squad instead. In a single attack he wiped them all out.

Tskune: N-no way!

(name): He took them all out in a single hit!

Attacker: Now then, as for you two.

The attacker slowly walked toward you and Tskune. You and Tskune stood your ground prepared to fight, but you knew you couldn't win. You had to come up with a plan to rescue Mizore. You quickly came up with a plan and whispered it to Tskune.

(name) Tskune. Listen up. I'm gonna distract him. When I do I want you to rescue Mizore and get help. Got it?

Tskune: Okay.

Attacker: Come on.

He set down Mizore and charged at you and threw a might kick, but you countered with a kick of your own and threw a punch. The punch connected to his face, but it didn't do much. Tskune quickly rushed to Mizore and carried her to safety. The attacker tried to stop Tskune, but you blocked the way.

Attacker: Damn it!

(name): You want her? You gotta get by me first!

Attacker: Rrrrggghhh!!

You and him continued to fight, but it was clear who was at an advantage and it wasn't you. You threw punch after punch and kick after kick, but to no avail. The attacker simply punch you in the gut and the punch was so hard it made you cough blood. You doubled over in pain.

Attacker: You're weak and in my way. Now disappear.

The attacker gave you a hard kick in the gut and sent you flying into the forest. The attacker laughed smugly and walked after Tskune calmly.

Attacker: Now to complete my mission.

Meanwhile Tskune was racing to find Deshiko while carrying Mizore. Then he heard a noise. At first he thought it was the attacker, but then out stepped Deshiko with her squad.

Tskune: Deshiko! Thank goodness!

Deshiko: Tskune what happened?!? We saw the red flare. and the heck is Mizore here?!?

Tskune: No time to explain. We have to call for help!

Deshiko: I'll call for headquarters right away! I'll send up a signal flare.

Deshiko fired a yellow signal flare that was so bright that anyone could see it. Then she and her squad, while Tskune was carrying Mizore rushed to get out of the forest. Then Deshiko realized something.

Deshiko: Wait a minute! Where's (name)?!?

Tskune: Dah! I completely forgot! (name)! He's.....

Attacker: Already gone.

Everyone jumped at the attacker's voice. Then out from the shadows the attacker slowly walked out from the darkness.

Tskune: You!?! Where's (name)?!? What did you do to him?!?

Attacker: Wouldn't you like to know? Now. Hand over the girl and I'll spare your miserable lives.

Deshiko: Never you bastard! You'll pay for hurting my comrades! You're under arrest! Seize him men!

All the squad members yelled a battle cry and charged at the attacker. Meanwhil as for you, you were in deep in the forest. You were beaten up pretty bad, but you were unbeaten. You struggled to get up and staggered to your feet, but you felt your consciousness fading. You fell flat on your back and then the last thing you saw was the full moon in the sky. Back with Tskune and the others, the attacker took out all the squad members except for Deshiko and Tskune.

Deshiko: What the hell is this guy?!? He's too strong.

Tskune: What'll we do?!?

Attacker: Only one thing you can do. Hand over the girl or die!

The attacker was about to kill Deshiko and Tskune when the was a piercing howl that rang throughout the academy.

Attacker: What the....?

Deshiko: That howl.....

Then suddenly a giant white wolf jumped from the darkness and attacked the attacker. He clawed and slashed him which made him scream in pain. Tskune and Deshiko watched in shock as the wolf attacked. The attacker punched the wolf hard, but the wolf regained its composure and blasted the attacker with a blizzard attack. The attacker dodged the attack and landed with ease.

Attacker: Heh! Too easy!

But the attacker couldn't move. He looked down and saw that his leg was frozen. The wolf saw his chance and bit him hard in the arm. So hard that his arm exploded in blood. Then the wolf lifted him up and threw him through trees with it's amazing strength. All Tskune and Deshiko could do was watch agape and in awe.

Attacker: Ggghhh. Damn it! He's even stronger than I thought! I'll......have to retreat.

He grabbed a smoke bomb and used it to get away. As for the werewolf it lost it's target and it had to find a new one. Then it saw Deshiko and Tskune. It began to growl and slowly crept slowly toward them.

Tskune: Crap! Now it's after us!

Deshiko: Tskune! Get back!

The wolf was ready to strike when the wolf heard something. Then it turned tail and ran away. The reason being was...
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: An assault

choices: Keito's squad finds you. (still don't know the wolf is you)
The attacker reports the mission to the woman. (attacker reveals his identity)
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
After the wolf left Keito and a squad of her members arrived on the scene.

Keito: Tskune! Keito! Are you guys OK?!?

Deshiko: We're fine, but we were attacked by some powerful monster.

Keito: Was it the werewolf?

Tskune: No! It was someone we didn't know. Whoever it was he tried to kidnap Mizore for some reason.

Keito: Kidnap Mizore? But why?

Deshiko: We don't know, but we managed to rescue her with help from (name). She seems to be unharmed.

Keito: Whew. Thank good....wait. Where is (name)?

Deshiko: We.....we don't know.

Keito: What?!?

Tskune: He was holding off that guy who was trying to kidnap Mizore. He told me to take her and run, but I haven't seen him since then.

Keito: Damn it!

Keito was now very worried. Where were you and were you okay? She turned to her solders and spoke in a loud booming voice.

Keito: Listen up! One of our comrades is still missing! I want you to find (name) as soon as possible! Don't stop till you find him? Understood?!?

Squad: Yes ma'am!

Tskune: We'll come with you. We want to help too!

Keito: No Tskune! You can't. You have to get Mizore back to Yokai immediately.

Tskune: But....

Keito: There's a possibility that the person who kidnapped her could strike again. I want you to take her back to the school with Moka and the others. That way she'll be safe. Besides if she finds out that (name) is missing she'll flip out. Don't worry we'll find him. Deshiko. Go with Tskune. We'll continue the search from here.

Deshiko: Yes ma'am.

Tskune hesitated at first, but then he realized that she was right.

Tskune: OK. I'm counting on you Keito.

After Tskune and Deshiko left to go back to the school, Keito turned to join her squad in the search.

Keito: (name).......please be safe.

Then.....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Keito and a squad of her team arrived.

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
The attacker hid in a secret location inside a cavern that seemigly lead to a laybrinth of tunnels. He removed his disguse and contacted the woman. "My mission was an absolute failure. I was unable to capture either the snow woman or the boy. What should I do?"

"Dammit! I specifically told you to grab the girl. What about (Name)? What happened?"

"He reached level three already. The white wolf form has already become his true form. The drug had rapidly accelerated his power. I managed to get away but he-", he was interupted when the news hit her.

"How DARE you attack (Name)! I toold you explicitly to not to harm him. And you somehow managed to get him to become the white wolf all because you couldn't follow one order?! Dammit, if you want revenge you will have to be paitent Saizo. I gave you the training to become what you are now keep your cover a secret and bring me Mizore. But above all, DO NOT HARM (Name)! You know what will happen if you disobey me again.", she threatened.

"Of course.", Saizo replied. He put back on his disguise and entered the cave and followed the secret path leading directly underneath the school. He had planned this out in case of any complecations which was resourcefull but his lack of subtlety was alot to be desired when doing his job.

Meanwhile...

You were still in wolf form, and while you weren't in control you still felt saddened and worried about Mizore. Visions of her flashed before you and the more recent memories of her made you howl in sadness. Keito heard your howling and rushed to the source. You kept on howling not sure of what to do, but then your beastly instincts kicked in when you heard Keito headed for you.

She found you and was ready to try and capture you but instead of you attacking her you instead starred at he wondering why she was afraid. Keito then shot a tranquilizer dart at you causing you to feel tired. You felt betrayed as you knew what it meant now that you couldn't stand anymore. Your eyes managed to tell Keito the pain as she looked into your wolf eyes.

Keito wondered why she felt so guilty but it all made sense when a startling metamorphisis occured. Your transformed back into your human self and fell asleep. Keito was so startled she forgot to even radio in what she just found. After a few minutes she called it in.

"Everyone...I...found (Name)..and..I found out...he IS the werewolf."

Who does the story continue on with?
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: The attacker reports the mission to the woman. ...

choices: You wake up in your bed
You wake up in the security committee's headquarters
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
As Saizo left the school he felt a twang on pain shoot up from his arm. He realized now he had to get his wounds healed. So he walked through the halls undetected by anyone and walked into the nurses office.

Saizo: Mako! Mako! Are you here?!?

Then a woman stepped out from the darkness. She is Mako Yakumaru. She works as a nurse in Yokai Academy. No one knows much about her or what monster she is, but she was well known for her cures and one thing in particular. The serum in her finger. One prick and she could do anything she wanted too.

Mako. You wanted to see me Saizo.

Saizo: I need your needle to heal my arm.

Mako:My, my, my. How did that happen?

Saizo: I got into a fight with someone. He managed to rip my hand off. Could you fix it?

Mako: Sure. but just so were clear I'm not doing this just for you. I'm doing it for her majesty.

Her finger turned into a needle and then she pricked at Saizo's stub were his hand was. Then with a grunt of pain Saizo's stub was replaced by a new hand.
He thanked Mako and then he left. He started back toward the hide out to get ready for school.

Saizo: I don't care about this light ball or whatever I'm gonna kill that guy and make him pay for what he did to me! I just hope that my mistress knows what she's doing by pretending to be a teacher here, just so he can get close to that boy. Not only that I don't see that point of getting that snow girl too.

(flashback)
Saizo: You want me to capture Mizore?

Woman: yes. If we capture Mizore, the boy is sure to follow and the serum will taint the light ball inside him even more. Then we the moment comes we'll trap him and extract the ball from his body and then we'll harness the power inside the ball and my ultimate dream will be realized!

Saizo: I don't understand why we don't just kill the bastard after what he did to me.

Woman: Saizo! Do not kill him! If you do I'll kill you!

Hearing the sharpness in her tone, Saizo jumped with fear.

Woman: Just make sure you capture the girl. Besides she could be the key to his powers. And I need her alive.

Saizo: A key?

Woman: Nothing. For now,it's time for me to see my love. Hehehe. I'm coming my love. Saizo, make sure no one finds out my plan and keep an eye on the boy.

Saizo: yes my queen.
(flashback ends)

Saizo: Man. I hate this. Not to mention that girl is completely in love with that bastard. No matter. I'll have to make sure no detects that my mistress is in the school. Until then....I will fulfill my mission. You better prepare yourself......(name). For my revenge!

The next day as for you.....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Saizo

choices: She tells you you're the werewolf.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
The next day you woke up in your bed feeling refreshed once again. Then you realized that you fainted from the battle from the attacker last night. You also remembered that the attacker tried to kidnap Mizore! You wanted to know that she was safe, but you didn't know how. So you thought the first place to look. The security committee's headquarters. You quickly got dressed and raced to the headquarters. When you got there everyone was racing around as usual, but this time something was different. When you came into the room everyone stopped and stared at you. You didn't know why, but everyone stopped and stared at you with fear in their eyes. At first you didn't know why they were so scared of you, but you didn't pay any attention. You focused on finding Keito to see that Mizore was safe. You burst through the door of Keito's office to find Keito sitting at her desk.

(name): Keito. I need to speak with you. It's an emergency!

Keito: I need to talk to you as well

(name) Where's Mizore?!? Is she alright? Where'd the attacker go?!? What.....

Keito silenced you by placing a finger on your mouth.

Keito: (name). Slow down. I"ll explain everything. But you need to sit down.

(name): OK.....

Then Keito explained what went down when the attacker destroyed the squads and about the werewolf fighting it.

(name): Damn. So the attacker got away and he almost kidnapped Mizore huh? Whew. and Mizore's safe and sound?

Keito: Yes. We sent her back to the nurses just in case.

(name) Whew. Well that's a relief. Well now that I know that she's safe, I guess I better get ready for class.

You were about to leave, when Keito stopped you.

Keito: (name). There's........something else I need to tell you.

(name): What is it Keito?

Keito: Look....before I tell you, you have to stay calm and don't tell anyone what you're about to hear. It might shock you to the core.

(name) OK......what is it?

Keito: It's about the werewolf.

(name) What about it? Did you find out what it wants or something?

Keito: No.But we know who it is.

(name) That's great! So.....who is it?

Keito: I......I don't know how to say this.....

(name) Come on tell me.

Keito: OK. I warned you. Here goes.....

Keito took a deep breath and.......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You wake up in your bed

choices: Mizore tries to tell you she's pregnant
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Before she could answer the door slammed open and Mizore came in diving right into you pecking you with kisses realived that you were allright. She spoke in between them how woorried she was and how she didn't want you to go off into danger again.

"Oh my god...(Name)...I thought...I...nearly lost you....don't ever do that to me again... you here me?!", she said still kissing your face.

"Ok I get it! Haha now please let me go so I can talk to Keito. She knows who the werewolf is for crying out loud. You bursted in just as she was about to explain it, you have the worst yet conveinyent timing.", you joked.

"Well come on Keito spit it out who's that werewolf?", Mizore said now acting serious.

Keito couldn't say it now, with Mizore in the room. She would be devastated plus (Name)'s own reaction might be hard enough to deal with as it is.

"I can't say it here (Name). Maybe when things are more quiet. But trust me were fine as long as everyone stays out of trouble. So follow you girlfriends orders and don't go off playing hero again understood?"

"Yes madame!", you said in a goofy solider imperssion.

"Very funny, now get your butts back to your rooms. I'm sure theres stuff you guys need to discuss about like who cooks the breakfeast in the morning when you tie the knot."

"Pffft hahahahahahhahahahaaaa ahahahahahhhhhhhhaaaaaaaaaaa! Oh for christ sake ahhahahahaaaa you lost me there Keito.", you replied laughing uncontrolably.

"Come on (Name), theres something I DO have to say to you.", Mizore said walking with you to her dorm room.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Something interrupts the moment

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
(name): What is it you want to tell me Mizore?

Mizore: Listen, (name).....I.....uh.....

She tried to get the words to come out, but all that came out was uhs.

(name): Um Mizore....are you OK?

Mizore: I'm fine! Just listen!

(name): OK! I'm listening!

Mizore saw you staring at her giving you your undivided attention. When you did she blushed beet red and started fidgeting. She took a deep breath and was just about to blurt out her secret when....

Kurumu: Yo! (name)! Kurumu!

Mizore: Gah!!!

Mizore was so surprised at Kurumu's greeting, she face faulted right on the ground. (if you don't know what a face fault is,,,,http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Ma...) Moka, Kurumu, and Yukari walked up to you and Mizore.

(name): Hey! Girls how are you all feeling?

Moka: Much better! Nurse just let us out this morning.

Kurumu: Yeah! I was getting tired of getting stuck at the nurse's.

Yukari: You said it sister!

(name) Glad to see you guys feeling better. Where's Tskune?

Moka: I don't know. He went somewhere and I haven't seen him since.

Just then, Tskune ran up to everyone out of breath.

(name) Yo Tskune! What's up?

Tskune: Hey guys! Did you hear? We have a new teacher in our next class!

Moka: A new teacher? Oh crap! I forgot! We need to get to class! We're gonna be late! Come on guys!

As you all raced back to class, you stopped and looked back at Mizore. She looked disappointed for some reason.

(name) Mizore? Are you OK? Didn't you need to tell me something?

Mizore: Nothing. I'm fine. I'll tell you later. Let's get to class.

With that Mizore and you raced back to class. Then you managed to get to class on time. The classroom was a abuzz about the new teacher. Soon the bell sounded and then......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Mizore tries to tell you she's pregnant

choices: The green haired woman meets Saizo
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Just as soon as the bell rung the teacher came in. She was a very attractive woman. She had beautiful long green hair and very fair skin. Her eyes were a deep golden color and all the boys were staring at her. When you saw her you felt something odd about her. Like you had seen her somewhere before. You just couldn't put your finger on it. When she came in she smiled at the whole class.

Woman: Hello class. My name is Ms. Mitsuki and I will be your substitute teacher for your math class.

All the boys as well as the girls were ogling her like crazy. Everyone except you, Mizore, Kurumu, Moka, Yukari, and Tskune. After that the class began. She began by teaching basic algebra.Then a little bit more of the advanced stuff. A You weren't paying much attention. You had a lot of things on your mind. The werewolf, the attacker that tried to kidnap Mizore and that other vision you had about the werewolf. You wished you knew more about what was going on, but you weren't gonna get any answers by worrying about it. So decided to pay attention to the lesson. At first you thought you got it, but then the problems began to get more and more confusing. Soon you were completely lost and you didn't get it at all.

(name thinking) Oh crap! How was I supposed to do this?!? I don't understand this at all!!!

Ms Mitsuki: Now then I need someone to solve this problem for me.

She looked all around to pick a student. You picked away praying that she wouldn't pick you. Sadly you would only jinx it.

Ms Mitsuki: Yes. Mr. (name).

(name): Y-y-yes ma'am!

Ms Mitsuki: Could you please solve this problem?

You looked at the problem on the board, but sadly it was nothing but a bunch of squiggly lines to you.

(name): Um....I.....don't know.......how.........

You're answer would only make things worse as the whole class laughed at your response making you blush beet red. Mizore and the others looked in worry, feeling sorry for you. You looked down on the ground in shame, but when you looked up Ms. Mitsuki was all of a sudden close to your face. She spoke in a seductive,but stern voice.

Ms Mitsuki: Bad boy! You're supposed to be listening not day dreaming. Do it again and I'm afraid you'll have to be in for pun-ish-ment.

Boy: Hey! You can punish me any time Ms. Mitsuki!

Boy 2: Yeah! Me too!

(name) Are you two crazy?!?

After class you packed your things and got ready to leave. You managed to get a glimpse of Ms. Mitsuki. When she saw you she gave you a wink which made you blush. After that she left. Then Tskune and the others walked up to you. Mizore on the other hand was hopping mad.

Mizore: Hey! (name) Who was that girl?!? and why does it seem that she's flirting with you?!?

Yukari: Yeah! Doesn't she get that you're off the market? Unless you want to have two girlfriends?

(name) No way! As if! You know Mizore's my number one girl! Besides I don't even no that girl!

Moka: But Ms. Mitsuki does seem to know you.

Tskune: The question is how?

Kurumu: Who knows? For all we know she's probably another cougar just like Ririko.

Moka: Please don't even say that Kurumu!

Just then a subordinate from the security committee came up to all of you.

Surbordinate: Mr. (name). Keito would like to see you.

(name) Is that so? I'll be right there.

Moka: I wonder what Keito wants?

Tskune: It must be important. Let's go see her.

Then everyone went to see Keito. Meanwhile.....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: The new teacher walked in

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
When the room was empty and Mitsuki dimmed the lights Saizo appeared from the shadows finally able to meet with her again. "This better be good for all the trouble you had me go through to get what you want.", Saizo said.

"Don't forget you owe me. Now, here's what I need you to do. Plant these cards into their designated lockers, they all are programmed with hypnotic suggestions that will keep (Name)'s friends occupied while I get one on one with him.", she said handing them to Saizo.

"Will any of them be able to resist any of it? And what's to say they will o off without anyone noticing?", Saizo asked.

"They are more subtle and they suggestions are not out of character so it'll appear like things are normal. And they all have to wear the small ear buds linked to them so that only they can hear what the suggestions say."

"What about the snow girl?"

"She's going to get suspicious if anything comes her way while her boyfriend's alone. I've taken care of it. After I'm done with (Name) here, go to the hideaway and take out your anger if you wish but not too rough. I'll lure him in with charms he's never known before he'll be naive enough to fall for we'll have him within the hour. I have my subtle little ways.", she explained.

"Alright, Tskune and Moka, Kurumu, Yukari, Keito, and Deshiko. All of whom will recive these priavte letters inside their lockers and think nothing is wrong with them? While your fool-proof plan with Mizore will keep her away from you as you privatley talk to (Name)?"

"Exactly. Mizore would think anything that will distract her from her boyfriend is suspicious, but not if that thing is a fake visit from her own mom. Make the call to the office first then place the letters in the lockers. Leave the last part for me."

"As you wish. But don't let your affection for him cloud your plan."

"I'm sorry did I say you could call out?", she said as her eyes glowed and Saizo fell to his knees in pain.

"NO! My mistress ahhhhhhhhh! Stooooooooooooooooooooooop!"

"Good boy, now run along."
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: The green haired woman meets Saizo

choices: Everyone finds their letters in their lockers
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
As everyone walked in Keito was a bit surprised by the fact everyone showed up, "Oh hey guys. I was only expecting (Name)."

"So whats the deal?", you asked.

"I found something you might want to see. This article might be enlightening.", she answered haning you an old newspaper. It was about the sphere of light that you encountered a while back and it was talking about what it can do.

"What's it say?",asked Kurumu.

"Says that a few scientists found a way to increase and decrease a monster's power. One scientist said that it's potential is high, but the risk is even higher. If it fell into the wrong hands the monster race could be extinct.", you answered.

"Look here, another said it can be used to unlock a monsters true form along with curing any illness of any monster. That thing seems really flipen powerful.', Tskune pointed out.

"We need to understand it more and figure out where that thing is. It might be a clue to what's been happening lately.", Mizore said.

"Ditto. Thanks for the info Keito, your the best of the best.", you said.

"Ah stop I'm blushing. Your too cute for you own good. See you guys around, it's the end of the day so get your things and enjoy the day.", Keito suggested.

"Yeah, except (Name) has to suffer another round of math with the new hottie. Lucky bastard.", Tskune replied.

"Shut up.", everyone walked out with Tskune being pulled by the ear by Moka after calling the new teacher a hottie which was very funny. You wanted to say bye to Mizore before you left, "I'll be back later Mizore. i promise I'll get a chance to talk to you soon in privet."

"Be back soon because I need to tell you something very important...and I..I love you (Name).", Mizore said.

"I love you too, my angel."

"How sweet, your just oozing with cuteness these days. Get you grades together and hurry back baby.", Mizore said kissing you on the lips before you left.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Everyone sees Keito

choices: back to everyone else recieving their letters
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
You walk into her class wanting to get this over with. However as you walk inside you find that the room is dimly light leaving you wondering if this teacher is trying something. However she has a work packet and a textbook out on your desk and she's on her desk reading. "Well? Get to work, your punishment is do that packet, while showing your work, and including that final one and following all of it's directions.", she said.

"Oh jeez, can you cut me a break I have had alot o my mind lately and it's quite important."

"Well talking to a teacher about your problems isn't a bad thing. Tell me what's on your mind?", she asked kindly.

Moka: Wait what are you talking about? and what do you mean that (name) and Mizore are in danger?!?

The rosary fell silent. Moka was now very worried. She thought about you and Mizore and wondered how much danger you were in. She didn't know what to do. Then she decided to......

Moka decided to take action and followed you and Ms. Mitsuki back to the security committee's headquarters. She had to know what Inner Moka meant and see how much danger you were in. She silently tip toed as she followed you and Ms. Mitsuki undetected. As for you, you followed Ms. Mitsuki to headquarters where Keito was waiting for you.

(name) Tonya? Is that your real name?

(name) Wow. That's a nice name.

Keito: Really? Who is it?

When Keito heard this she stared at you with shock. Even Moka hiding in the shadows gasped with shock.

Keito: (name). Are you sure?!?

(name) Trust me. I'm in the security committee. I know where I find my information. Apparently the werewolf's been showing up at every incident. I'm pretty sure it's no coincidence.

(name): Also there's one more thing. I think I the werewolf and Saizo are working together.

Keito: What?

(name) Think about it. Wherever Saizo was, the werewolf was too. If we can just capture the werewolf then we can find out who Saizo works for and.....

Keito: That's enough!

Keito's sudden change of tone in her voice made you (and Moka) jump.

Keito: I did, but now I don't know if I should tell you.

(name) Why not?!?

Keito: You just can't OK?!? It's for your own good!

(name) But Keito.....

Ms Mitsuki: Keito. You should tell him.

Keito: But Tonya....!

Ms. Mitsuki: It's OK. Why do you think you called me here? You called me to find a cure for the werewolf as well as assist you in the werewolf case. Besides it's clear that (name)'s got something to do with it and he's bound to find out sooner or later.

Moka listened intently while the conversation continued. Keito stayed silent for a moment, then she took a deep breath.

Keito: (name). Before I tell you...you have to promise me that you won't overreact or freak OK?

(name) OK....I don't know why I would freak, but I can take it. Tell me.

There a long silence. Even Moka hiding in the shadows held her breath not daring to make a sound. She got closer and closer until she was closer enough to hear everything. Then Keito took a another deep breath and......

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Keito: (name). The werewolf...........is you.

When Keito said these you stared at her with shock. When Moka heard this she gasped with shock and covered her mouth with shock and so she could keep quiet. She could not believe what she was hearing. There was a long silence, but then you finally spoke.

(name) Keito. Please tell me you're joking. Because if this is a joke it's not very funny.

Ms Mitsuki: I'm sorry, but she's not joking. It's the truth. You are the werewolf. She knows because she saw you turn back into yourself when she shot you with a tranquilizer.

(name) What?!? You shot me with a tranquilizer!?!?!

Keito: I didn't have a choice OK?!? You scared me half to death and it was self defense! Anyway, yes it's true. You're the werewolf. I tried to tell you before, but then Mizore came and....I didn't want to tell her in front of you.

You sank to your knees completely shocked. You could not believe what you were hearing. All this time you were trying to help find the werewolf that hurt Mizore. Then you realized something that made you go pale in the face.

(name) Wait.....wait a minute.....If I'm the werewolf.....then.....then.....I was the one that hurt Moka and the others including Mizore!!!

Keito looked away and slowly nodded her head with tears in her eyes. When she did you eyes widened in horror. Then images on Moka, Mizore, Yukari, and Mizore looking injured flashed in your head. Your eyes filled up with tears and pounded the floor in anger at yourself. You couldn't believe and you didn't want to believe it, but the fact was you hurt your friends including your own girlfriend.

(name) What have I done!?!? How could I do such a thing!?!?!

Keito: (name) please. It's not your fault....

(name) Yes it is!

Your sudden outburst made Keito jump.

(name) It's all my fault! I hurt my friends! I even hurt my girlfriend! I'm the reason why everyone's been suffering! I'm the reason why everyone got hurt! I'm a monster!

Keito: (name)..!!!

Before Keito could stop you ran out of the office with tears in your eyes. Keito could only watch as you disappeared. Keito slumped down onto her chair and covered her face with her hands.

Keito: Damn it. What have I done? I shouldn't have told him in the first place.

Ms. Mitsuki: Now Keito you know that's not true. he was bound to find out sooner or later. You did the right thing. Besides why do you think you hired me to work here. To find a cure for him.

Keito: I guess you're right. But still...

Ms. Mitsuki: Don't worry I'm working on a cure as we speak. And if it makes rest a little easier I'll go talk to him for you if you.

Keito: Thank you Ms. Mitsuki, but just in case... Deshiko!

Deshiko: Yes ma'am!

Keito: I want to you to find (name). Also don't let anyone find out about his problem. Not even Moka and the others. The last thing we need is to have Mizore worried sick.

Deshiko: Yes ma'am.

And with that Deshiko left. Ms. Mitsuki also disappeared to go look for you. As for Keito she continued to work on finding a cure for you. Moka on the other hand was long gone from headquarters. She ran all the way back to class looking for you before she knew it, it was time for her next period. She knew one thing, she had to keep it a secret from the others. Especially Mizore.

Moka: (name)'s already brokenhearted as it is. I don't want to make it worse. I'll have to wait till class is over.

Meanwhile.....

Ms. Mitsuki had just left the security committee's office and made sure that she was alone. Then she pulled out her phone and talked to Fearsome.

Kirche: Fearsome. It's me.

Fearsome: Ah Mistress! How goes it?

Kirche: You were right about waiting. (name) just found out that he is the werewolf that hurt Mizore. There is no doubt in my mind that he's close to the breaking point. I should capture him now.

Fearsome: No. Not just yet. He needs one more push. Something that will will make him so devastated that the light ball inside him will no doubt be completely overwhelmed in darkness and the boy will be yours forever. And you will be free of your curse!

You were sitting all by yourself upset with everything you were told. You didn't want to believe it, and you wished it was a dream,but it wasn't. The fact was that you were the werewolf, and you were the reason your friends were hurt. As you sat there, tears of anger streamed down your face.

(name) Damn it! (sniff) I'm acting like such a baby. But.......how could I do that? I'm the reason everyone got hurt. I hurt Moka. I hurt Kurumu. I hurt Yukari. And.....I even hurt Mizore. I'm......I'm a monster.

You punched the ground in anger and kept punching until your knuckle was completely bruised. When you got tired of punching the ground, you sat there on the cliff for a little longer and tried to figure out what to do. If you told Mizore what was going on with you, you thought for sure that she would hate you. There was no way you were going to tell her. Not unless you wanted her to dump you. You wracked your mind on what to do. You wanted someone to help you. Someone to stop all this pain and depression that was going on. You screamed out to sea in anger and depression.

(name) DAMN IT!!!! JUST WHAT THE HELL AM I SUPPOSED TO DO!!!!!!!!!!

Then you heard a voice. A voice filled with compassion and understanding. A woman's voice that made you calm down a little.

Voice: (name)? Are you feeling OK?

You turn around and you see.....

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"Oh Ms. Mitsuki...I.....I'm sorry. It's just I don't think my friends are going to take kindly to the fact I tried to eat them."

"Oh nonsense. That power inside you is making you strong, your the strongest. I can see it now...(Name), the lone wolf. Your name echoed in the night, leaving your lineage to any lucky woman you come across. Let me guide you...let me kiss you.", she wrapped her arms around your neck and nearly touched your lips but you pushed her away.

"Jeez! Whats your problem lady? You were taking one step over flirtation and into perversion!"

"Oh whats the harm with a little kissing? Isn't it good? You've kissed women your age, but ever kiss someone older who's pretty attractive?"

"No and I don't want to find out."

"Lips?", she persisted.

"No.", you replied annoyed.

"Neck?"

"No."

"Cheek?"

"NO!"

"Oh come on, teens always want to do stupid stuff that they know isn't reasonable, you can't tell me your the least bit curious? Come on (Name), I mean you just can't help but wonder what these lips taste like. Or how they'll make you feel? It'll make you feel great."

"I've been given talks like that in the past and it's always bitten me in the ass every time. A Naga's hypnotic gaze, an aphrodisiac, and now a kiss from...what monster are you anyway?"

"Succubus to be honest. My kiss back in the day was like receiving a gift from a god. Except it made men and women fall in love with me to the point that they started a religion around me."

"And why is this selling me on this point? You know what screw this I'm going back and forgetting this conversation ever happened."

"I know what WILL get you to share one little kiss, where your mother is."

You paused and instantly wanted an answer. "What do you mean you know where she is?"

"She will die unless you do as I say, first pucker up."

Kirche wasn't giving you any choice, a kiss in exchange for your mothers survival and location! Anything was worth it if it meant you would see her again alive! You went over to Kirche and french kissed her to make certain she wouldn't drag the bargain any farther. Then you wanted to pull away but you couldn't. An intoxicating rush of euphoria and love raced in your head. You kept going and groped her chest a bit, and held her tango style.

She broke the kiss and you finally stopped, yet oddly enough you had your self control again. "Now listen to me (Name), if you want to see your mom alive, bring me Keito. Take her with you alone by this area in the forest, wait there and tell her and everyone nothing. Do what I say and you will see your mother unharmed.", she said handing you a map leading to her specific location.

You had no choice, you had to do what she said or else your mother will die...

Keito: (name)? Are you OK? You've been silent ever since we got here.

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Keito nudged herself closer to you admiring the sunset. "Beautiful isn't it? I could stay this way forever and not give a care in the world."

"Why's that?", you asked as you blushed.

"I'm watching the beauty of this world with someone I love. You...know I still love you right? Even though your with Mizore."

"Keito....your an amazing women and if things were different...I'd have gone after you the same way I would for Mizore. In fact I still would even regardless of that fact. You mean a great deal to me."

"But you don't love me the same way I love you."

"Honestly...I think I do.", Keito's heart stopped upon hearing those words. "When I see you and we get along, when you flirt with me, or even when we just talk I feel the same sort of feelings I feel around Mizore. And it has to count for something even despite that were not together.", you admitted.

"So...you love...me?"

"I know what love is Keito...and I know that I do love you."

"Then....>sniff< because I know you'll be better off with Mizore...I'll always be there for you two. I love you enough to let you be happy with whomever makes you feel that way. Weather it be me or Mizore or any other woman."

"It makes me feel guilty for not being with you."

"NO! Even if...we make a great item, we shouldn't. I'd be better off finding a new person who I feel this way towards. I need to learn to let you go. And I know that your supposed to be with Mizore because no matter what you do to yourself or others, nothing would get you to let her go. You two share an unbreakable bond that's never going to break."

"Keito...I'm sorry for making you fall in love with me..."

"I'm not, but could you do me a favor?"

"Anything."

Keito kissed your cheek and whispered, "Stay true to your heart." The sun had set and dusk engulfed the sky, the stars lighting the moment. You hugged in a warm embrace but soon enough it was short lived.

(name) Keito! Look out!

You jump and knocked Keito out of the way, just as the boulder crashed where you two were.

(name) Keito? Are you OK?

Keito: Y-yes. (cough) I'm fine.

Saizo: Aww. I'm so sorry. Did I interrupt the moment?

(name): Saizo!

(name) Shut up! Where's my mother!

Keito: (name) what's going on?!? and what do you mean "where's your mother"?

Kirche: I wish I have time to chat, but I have something to do and you're in my way. Saizo! Get em!

With that Saizo attacked you with a flurry of punches. You barely managed to dodge them. Keito tried to help you, but Kirche blocked her route and standing in her way.

Keito: What?!? You and Saizo are in this together Tonya?!?

Kirche: That's right. And Tonya's not my real name. My real name is Kirche. But that doesn't matter because you're gonna die! Saizo! Make sure you capture the boy!

Saizo attacked and you dodged all of his attacks. At this rate Saizo was gonna crush you with his overwhelming body. You couldn't even transform into a werewolf without the moon. The moon hasn't even appeared in the sky. At the way you were you were in trouble. Saizo then gave you a sharp kick in the gut sending you fly into a tree. You gasped as the wind knocked out of you and you fell flat on your face.

Keito: (name)!

Kirche: Don't worry about him. Worry about yourself!

Two fights were about to break out. But which one will you tune in?

(name) Shut up!

You threw a punch back at Saizo, but he blocked it with ease and threw you with all his monster strength. Sending you flying to rock and you got hit so hard you coughed a little blood.

Then you heard another scream from Keito and she landed hard on her back. Kirche stepped on her chest like she conquered something.

Saizo: What the.....

Keito: Oh no! (name)!

You muscles bulged and rippled. Your skin turned into black fur. You teeth became pointed and sharp and it became a muzzle. You eyes glowed red and you gave a deafening howl that echoed throughout the forest. You were mad and you were ready to attack. You didn't care what was in your way. you to had to destroy and kill. Saizo: Damn it. You're a real slave driver you know that? But whatever.

Flashback

"Kirche your very pretty. How come your like that?"

"I don't age. But you wanna know something? It means when your old enough, we can start dating."

"Oh...well? That's nice."

Kirche leaned in and was ready to kiss you and you slowly went in as well. You were so nervous that you had no idea what to do. But soon enough you both pressed your lips against one another. "You know something (Name), I love you."

"More than them combined. I want to be with you forever. Not just these late night meetings we have."

"Then let's swear on it. This way that love won't die and still be around no matter where we go. I (Name), Promise that one day me and Kirche will be with together forever even if I die trying. How's that?"

"I Kirche, promise that one day me and (Name) will be together forever even in death. Perfect. Now how do you think we should seal the deal?"

"I think a deal this special needs more of a romantic feel to it. Maybe another kiss?"

You both pressed your lips together a bit hard since this was a very big deal you two were forming. You didn't force yourself to kiss her that hard because you wanted to out of affection but rather like a firm handshake, only through your lips. Kirche did it out of affection and nothing more.

"(Name) I'm sorry. But you are no longer in love with Kirche.", your mother planted a memory wiping spell on you and you blacked out. You saw your mom and Kirche fighting over you as a result.

(aloud) You little brat! You're a vampire aren't you?!?

Fearsome: Don't get cocky you little punk. Just because you were able to make me spit a little blood doesn't mean you'll be to beat me. Now I'll show you what real power is!

Then Fearsome began radiating an aura of his own. Only his aura was way stronger than Tskune's and the ground began to tremble. Tskune's squad began to tremble with fear. Even Tskune began to sweat a little, but he refused to back down. He threw a barrage of kicks and puinches, but Fearsome dodged them all. Then he punched Tskune in the gut making him cough up a lot of blood and then charged all of his energy into his hand and unleashed all of it in a powerful beam. The force of the beam even sent all of Tskune's squad flying. When the smoke cleared bodies lied everywhere. Fearsome was standing next to Tskune and stepped on his head. He was feeling very pleased with himself.

Fearsome: Hahaha! Pathetic! I only used my full power for a moment and this is all you are? I expected more from a vampire.

He was walking away when Tskune grabbed him by his leg, determined to keep fighting to stop Fearsome.

Fearsome: Oh? You're still alive are you?

Tskune: Screw.......you......you.......monster! I won't.....let you......conquer......our school......I'd......rather die.....than.....to see you.......win.....

Fearsome: Is that so? Very well. Since you want to die so badly who am I stop you? I'll even help you.

He charged his energy and aimed at Tskune about to finish him off. Tskune closed his eyes and waited for the end.

Tskune (thinking): I'm sorry Moka. (name). Mizore. Everyone. I wasn't strong enough. I guess, I'm going to die here.

Fearsome was about to fire his energy blast to kill Tskune when......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: I'll play with you

choices: Have everyone lend you some of their monster energy and you fight Fearsome alone
You and Mizore fight Fearsome together
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Suddenly a powerful force knocked Fearsome back and sent him flying away from Tskune. Then a big gust of cold wind blew toward him and was beginning to freeze him. Fearsome knocked the wind away by making his own wind. Then someone flashed by Fearsome picked up Tskune and carried him to safety.

Fearsome: Who did that?!?

(name): I did Fearsome!

Fearsome looked up in the sky and there you were carrying Tskune in your arms safe and sound. The armor you were wearing grew wings and you were filled with power. When Tskune opened his eyes, he saw you. He thought you were the most awesome sight he had ever seen.

Tskune: (name)....Moka....everyone....you're here....I can't believe it.....

(name) Easy Tskune. You should take it easy and rest.

You descend from the sky and landed safely on the ground. When Fearsome saw you, he was most annoyed. To make things even more annoying for him, you weren't alone. From the sky Inner Moka and Kurumu carrying Yukari flew from out of nowhere and landed on your right. Then Keito swung from a tree using her threads with Deshiko following close behind her, Mizore slid in using her ice powers and Kirche appeared on your left.

Fearsome: So I see you're all still alive. Including you Kirche.

Then Yukari and Keito checked on Tskune on his condition.

(name) Yukari. Keito. How's Tskune?

Keito: He's fine. He is a little beaten up though.

Yukari: He'll be fine. He just needs a healing spell and some rest.

Inner Moka looked at Tskune and saw how beaten up he was. Then she looked at Fearsome with anger in her voice.

Inner Moka: You bastard! You did this to him didn't you?

Fearsome: So what if I did? He was weak. I guess all you vampires are always weak.

Inner Moka charged at him ready for a fight, but then you stopped her by blocking her way with your arm.

(name) Moka! Don't fight him! I know he hurt Tskune, but that's what he wants. He's just goading you to a fight. Calm down.

Inner Moka then calmed down and listened to you. Fearsome then roared with laughter.

Fearsome: Hahahaha! Pathetic! You people are all the same! You put stupid feelings and love above everything else. I've never heard of anything so ridiculous!

Yukari: What did you say you big bully?!?

Kurumu: What's your problem?!? What's wrong with being in love?

Fearsome: Everything! It's pointless, needless, and causes more pain. Kirche should know about that more than anybody. Right my dear Kirche? After all your just like me.

Kirche: What are you talking about? I'm nothing like you!

Fearsome: You know very well what I'm talking about. I've heard about your little obsession with your boy toy. I've heard about how much you "loved" him. Personally it's pathetic. You were willing to do whatever it took just to be with him. Even killing innocent people. And all because you wanted to be with you "destined" one and cure your....um...condition. We're alike you and I. We both want power to accomplish our goals and we will do anything necessary to get them. The way I see it. We both also have done unspeakable things, so unspeakable that they can no one can ever EVER forgive us for our actions. I'm surprised that your so called "friends" haven't killed you or deserted you yet. No wonder the boy's mother separated you from him.

Kirche couldn't speak after that. She remembered all the things she did and she felt bad about them. Fearsome's words hit her pretty hard and tears began to form in her eyes. Fearsome smiled with glee. You and the others felt sorry for her.

Fearsome: I'll tell you what Kirche. I can save you. I can help you take away all your pain. All you have to is say the word.

Kirche at this point didn't know what to do. You could see that she was on the breaking point. You were about to stop her, but someone else beat you to the punch and that someone was Mizore.

Mizore: Shut your mouth you stupid old man! You don't know anything about her! Kirche may have done some things in the past that were unforgivable, but there's one thing that makes her different from you! She has a loving heart!

(name) That's right! She may have committed a lot of crimes, but at least she's trying to make up for them! She realized what she did was wrong and she's got us! Unlike you!

Keito: Yeah! She also loves (name) as much as we do! And she was willing to sacrifice her life to save us! That proves more than enough that she's a good person!

Kurumu: And she's got us! We'll never let fall to the likes you!

Yukari: Yeah!

Kirche: Mizore.... (name).....everyone.....

Even Moka had to agree what you all had to say, but she was to stubborn to admit it.

Fearsome: Feh! Who cares?!? It doesn't matter anyway because your all gonna die! And once you're all out of the way, I'll take over Yokai Academy and then the human world! HAHAHAHAAH!!!!!

The final battle was about to get underway and you knew that the battle was gonna be intense. Then Keito spoke to you in a hushed voice.

Keito: (name). Fearsome's monster energy is off the chain!

(name) I know, but I can take him. Keito, you and the others get out of here and take care of the wounded. I'll handle Fearsome

Mizore: Hold on. You may be stronger (name), but i don't know if you'll be strong enough. I'm staying with you. We'll fight him together.

Kirche: Wait Mizore. That's too dangerous. I have an idea. The armor that (name) is wearing should be the key to winning this fight. The armor's power makes whoever is wearing it stronger if the wearer absorbs monster energy, but there's a possibility that the person could lose control.

Keito: That's even more risky! If (name) loses control Fearsome will win!

Kurumu: Come on guys! We gotta make a decision now!

What should you do? Should you all fight together or have everyone lend you their monster energy for you to fight Fearsome?
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You and the girls come to the rescue and save T...

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
(name): OK Mizore, but just stay close to me OK? I don't want you getting hurt.

Mizore: Yes. Let's kick his ass!

Keito: No way! If Mizore's gonna be fighting with you then I will too!

Kirche: Yeah! Me too!

(name) No. Keito, you and Kirche have to clear everyone in the area. Get all the students of here and make sure everyone is safe. Please.

Mizore: Yes. Get everyone to a safe distance and leave this to us!

Keito: No way! It's my fault your in this mess to begin with. It would only....

Then Keito felt Kirche's hand on her shoulder.

Kirche: Keito. We should go. Do as he says.

Yukari: But Kirche! Fearsome's super strong and I don't know if they can beat them on their own.

Kurumu: Yeah! It's practically suicide!

Kirche: I know how you all feel, but we'd only get in their way.

Inner Moka: She's right. This a battle even a S class vampire like me can't get into. Besides, you should all have a little faith. After all, love conquers everything right? Or whatever that sayings supposed to go.

Keito looked at Kirche and could see that Kirche's wanted to stay too, but she knew she couldn't and she knew that Moka was right. She stood up and called out to all the people that were around so they could hear her.

Keito: Everyone! If you're still able to move retreat and help the injured! Get back to Yokai where it's safe!

Everyone student hearing Keito's words all moved toward the academy. Those who were injured were carried by other students who still had the strength to move. Keito and Kirche were about to follow, but then Keito and Kirche turned around and they each gave you a kiss on the cheek. Mizore nearly face-faulted for what she just saw and you blushed beet red.

Mizore: Hey! What the hell are you two doing kissing my man?!? (name)'s mine!

Keito: Just giving (name) a good luck charm. And to give you a little extra motivation Mizore. Right Kirche?

Kirche: Yup. That's right Keito. Hahaha.

Mizore: Grrrrr!!! When this is over I'm gonna freeze you two to death!

Mizore was annoyed, but then she smiled and laughed and Keito and Kirche did too.

Keito: Don't you die on us Mizore. We're counting on you to take care of (name).

Kirche: We all love him very much. So make sure you protect him and kick this guys ass.

Mizore: I will. Don't worry. I won't even let him lay a finger on him.

With that, Kirche and Keito followed the others back to Yokai. You, Mizore and Fearsome were now the only ones left.

Fearsome: Are you finished with your little display? If so then I would like to defeat you two now.

(name) The only one who's gonna get defeated is you! You ready Mizore?

Mizore: Yes! Let's do it!

Then you held Mizore's hand. She suddenly felt power welling up inside of her and she could feel her monster energy increasing. Her clothes became ice armor and she had ice wings. She then realized that you had transferred a little bit of your power to her.

Mizore: What is this? My power! It's overflowing!

Fearsome: What the hell?!? Why are you giving that girl your power?!? And how is this happening?!?

(name) Isn't it obvious? We're lovers. And lovers share everything together. When two lovers fight together and when they have something to protect, there's nothing that they can't do or accomplish! Something that a madman like you that's obsessed with power and taking over the world could never understand! Let's go Mizore!

Mizore: Right! Let's show this bastard the power of our love and our bonds!

As then, the final battle began......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: You and Mizore fight Fearsome together

choices: attacked Mizore, but take the hit and save her. (or other)
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
The Final Battle began. Fearsome gunned straight at you and Mizore with both of his fists filled with monster energy. He was hungry to kill the both of you, but you and Mizore were ready for him. You both dodged the attack by taking off into the sky. Fearsome's impact was so powerful the whole ground shook. Then Mizore fired a storm of icicles with a wave of her wings. Millions of icicles rained down on Fearsome, but he defended by unleashing a barrier to protect himself. You swooped down and broke through Fearsome's barrier with a powerful punch and launched a powerful kick at Fearsome. Fearsome deflected the kick by using his arm, but his arm rung in pain from the impact.

Fearsome: Grrr. You're more powerful than I thought boy!

(name) I'm not the only one who's powerful here! Go Mizore!

Mizore: Right!

You suddenly jumped out of the way and Mizore swooped in with her right hand turned into an ice punch, nailed Fearsome right in the face. Next you hit Fearsome with a series of kicks and then hit him in the gut with a powerful punch. Fearsome was sent flying to the forest. He hit a couple of trees, but he quickly regained his composure. You and Mizore followed close behind in hot pursuit. Then when they saw Fearsome getting up from the rubble of trees, they automatically attacked from the sky. Mizore took a deep breath and unleashed a powerful blizzard breath attack. You gathered all of your energy into your hands and unleashed a powerful beam of energy. Both attacks hit Fearsome with a mighty explosion. So big and so powerful that everyone back at Yokai Academy felt the tremors inside the building. Everyone was safe and sound, but your friends were worried. Especially Keito and Kirche. They prayed that you and Mizore would defeat Fearsome and get back safely. Then in the after effects of the explosion Fearsome stepped out of the destruction, but he was hurt. His clothes were in taters and he was a little bloody. By now he couldn't believe it. Two kids were actually beating him.

Fearsome: Damn it! This is impossible! How can these two brats be beating me?!? I have the supreme power! I should be stronger than them!

(name) You still don't get it do you? No matter how much power you have, power doesn't win in the end.

Mizore: Love, friendship, and conviction win. Things that a creep like you will never understand.

Fearsome: Grrrrr!!!! I won't accept this! I refuse to accept this!!!! If you care about love so much, then I'll make you weak by killing one of you!!!!!

Then Fearsome went off the deep end and fired a shower of energy attacks. You and Mizore dodged them all, but then Fearsome took advantage of the attack and then.......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: The Final Battle

choices: Attack Mizore, but you take the hit and save her
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content: Does he attack and you take the hit to save Mizore? Or other?
