choices: you wake up in the infirmery
You wake up in the security committee
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Fearsome took advantage of the attack and tried to attack Mizore, but you were ready for it. You dived in and stopped the attack before he had a chance to hit Mizore.

(name): Oh no you don't!

Then you sent him flying with a punch to the face. Suddenly you felt a little weak. You staggered and then you fell on one knee. Mizore quickly rushed to your side to check to see if you were all right.

Mizore: (name)! Are you okay?

(name) Yeah. I'm fine. I just felt a little weak for a second.

Fearsome: Well, well. Looks like your suffering the after effects of the armor.

(name) What are you talking about?

Fearsome: Hehehe you fool. You put on that armor even though that I practically drained you of your power? That armor serves as an amplifier and increases whoever has powers. You shouldn't have been using it all willy nilly since I drained you of all your power. Actually I'm pretty surprised that you still have some energy left. No matter. Pretty soon you'll run out of power and then killing the both of you will be all the more easier.

(name) Damn it.

Mizore: Are you sure that you're OK?

(name) Yeah, but we need to finish this quickly. If we don't, I'll run out of power and we'll never be able to defeat this guy.

Fearsome was right about one thing, the armor may have amplified your powers, but since your sphere was extracted there was no way that you would be able to last much longer. You felt weak and you felt that you wouldn't be to last much longer. Even Mizore having received some of your remaining power, wouldn't stand much of a chance fighting Fearsome either. You had to think of something fast otherwise Fearsome would win. But how? Then you had an idea, but you and Mizore had only one shot to pull it off.

(name) Mizore. There's only one way that we can win, but we both need to work together. Also don't do anything until I give the word Understood?

Mizore: Hold on! If what Fearsome said was true, then you could be in danger if you use your powers again. And if we lose here, both worlds will be in danger

(name) Don't worry. I'll be fine. Just trust me OK? Only you and I can do this together. All right?

Mizore hesitated at first, but then she nodded.

Mizore: OK. Just don't over do it. I don't want you to get hurt.

Fearsome: It doesn't matter what you do. In the end you'll both die!

Mizore: Shut up bastard! You're the one that's going down! Let's do it (name)!

(name) It's time to end this!

Then you and Mizore held hands once again and your energies mixed together and both of your powers began to increase. Fearsome wasn't going to stand there and let you two do this. He put his hands together and began charging all of his power into his hands. A giant ball of energy formed into his hands and prepared to fire at you and Mizore. Mizore was about to try and dodge it, but then she remembered that you told her not to move. She didn't know what you had planned, but she decided to trust you and stayed put. Then Fearsome finished charging his energy and prepared to fire.

Fearsome: HAHAHA! Now then stay there like a giant bull's eye and DIE!!!!!

At that moment Fearsome fired his attack with all he had. The beam hit with a deafening boom and there was nothing, but a cloud of smoke.

Fearsome: HAHAHAHAAHAHA!!!!!! I won! I won! I finally beat those two little brats!!! Now with them out of the way I can take over Yokai! And after that I take over the human world! I will destroy everyone in my way! Like I did with those two brats!

Suddenly the smoke cleared and you and Mizore were still standing and both of you were in the still standing and holding hands. Both your enrgies were still on the rise and were getting stronger and stronger. When Fearsome saw this, he was shocked.

Fearsome: Impossible!!! They're still alive!

(name) Here we go Mizore! Do it now!

Mizore: OK! Here goes!!!

(name) Fire on the right...!

Mizore: Ice on the left....!

Mizore and (name): Put them both together and you get..........BLAZING BLIZZARD STORM!!!!!

Both you and Mizore fired both of your attacks at the same time. The fire and ice attacks mixed together and made one giant attack aimed straight at Fearsome. All Fearsome could do was gape and stare with fear and shock. He tried to stop it, but it was too overwhelming. The attack overpowered him and he was hit full force with the attack. The attack was so powerful that the beam shot past Yokai Academy and looked like it was tearing the sky apart. Everyone that was at Yokai saw the beam and they were amazed. Soon the beam dispersed and all was quiet. When the smoke cleared Fearsome was still standing, but his clothes were burned and frozen and he was completely knocked out. The battle was over and you and Mizore had won the fight. Fearsome was finally defeated.

Mizore: Yes! We won!

(name) Yeah. I guess we did.

Mizore: It's finally over. We did it. We really did it.

Then you both heard cheering. Then Kirche, Keito, Moka and the rest of the gang were running toward you two congratulating you two on your victory. Suddenly you felt really dizzy and then you fell unconscious. Then......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Other

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
You woke up to see Kirche looking over you admiring your handsome face. She realized you finally awakend and sought to express her joy by kissing you. But she stopped herself knowing it wouldn't be fair to make things awkward for you. "Oh god I am so glad your alive my beloved."

"Yeah except my spine, a few ribs, and maybe everything else is broken. In fact if you had put the moves on me, my mouth would hurt like hell."

"At least I didn't. Besides, I now realized that....we're not meant to be. I thought you were but perhaps my time is not now. And I would be dragging you down with me in shame. I am still guilty of what I did to make you my mate."

"So that means..."

"When I leave it will be our last moment. "

"Cant you stay?"

"No. I would only be blocking your life with Mizore. We can never see each other again. But you will always hold a special place in my immortal heart. But I ask still, do you love me?"
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Kirche says goodbye

choices: Keito stops by to check on you
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"I do. Even despite everything you did, I still fell in love with you."

"Not because of what I did recently but because of the time we had together. We truly were in love you and me. I guess if it was different we may have been one."

"You were the first woman I ever loved. But Mizore and I are..."

"Say more, your reasons for loving her are yours alone. I just wanted to know if what we were wasn't fake."

"Goodbye..Kirche. I hope you find peace. "

"I already have. I love you, (Name)."

Kirche left the infimary letting the results of her choices sink in and left feeling content with herself. You eished she had a happier resoluton, but at least she was free from her torment. You glanced behind to see Mizore sleeping by your bed. Knowing her she stayed there the whole time you were asleep. You kissed her gently on her lips and whispered, "I love you, my snow Angel. "

Mizore smiled in response but didn't wake up. Instead she dreamed of you and her jusy laying side by side never to let anything break you two apart from your warm embrace. She whispered back, "I love you and I won't leave your side, (Name)."

You let her rest in your lap and drifted off to sleep.

Meanwhile...
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: yes

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
As Kirche walked to her new sense of purpose she was stopped by someone who she recognized all to well. "Are you so hell bent on love that when it's in front of you that you just blindly do whatever it takes to seize it?"

"Impossible..."

"My son seems to attract those who prove that theory right. Hello Kirche, it's been some time."

"You no longer need to protect your son from me. I have moved on and would rather see him happy with his true love. But that doesn't mean i'll never cease loving him."

"I know. And I wanted to tell you I was wrong."

"What?"

"I should never have come between you two. You two sincerely loved one another and I ruined your happiness."

"But you weren't all to blame. It was wrong of me to keep it from you. I should have come clean and told you. Then maybe we'd be together but we're not. You were right to suspect me of something. Hiding your son away with me was a terrible idea. I wish I wasn't so embearessed."

"I wish I could make it up to you old friend. So here take this."

"What is it?"

"This necklace will give you your deepest wish. As long as you wear it it will give you whatever you want without trapping your mind in illusion."

"Why?"

"I thought giving you a chance with my son was the least I could do. If you wish to be with him, then he will be there with you. But not entirely for real. He'd be no different than Moka's rosary personality."
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Second chance?

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Kirche put on the necklace and then it began to glow and then a copy of you appeared next to her. When she saw him she smiled and gave copy you a hug.

Kirche: It's perfect! Even though it's just a copy of (name) it's just like him! Thank you for this, and for forgiving me for my sins. I don't deserve such kindness.

(name)'s mom: You're wrong about that. You may have done some things that were unforgivable, but you're atoning for those sins. You helped my son and his friends stop Fearsome and his evil plans. For that I'm grateful, my friend.

Kirche: Thank you for giving me a second chance. Well then, I better get going. I can't do any more damage around this popsicle stand. Come on (name). I mean Copy (name). Let's go home.

Copy (name): Yes Kirche. Let's go home.

And with that Kirche and Copy you disappeared. Your mom was left alone in her thoughts. Then she reached in her shirt and pulled out the light orb.

(name)'s mom: I'm lucky that I was able to extract this out of Fearsome before Keito took him away. The real question is what should I do with this? If I put it back inside of his body, there's no doubt that Fearsome or his followers will try to take it from him again.

Suddenly she heard a voice from behind her.

Voice: Hey! Who are you? And what are you doing here?

Your mom turned around and there standing behind her was......
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Kirche takes it

choices: Use the sphere to connect the monster and human world
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"Oh my god... Your my son's girlfriend, Mizore right?"

"How do you....wait son? Your (Name's) mother?"

"I took the orb from Fearsome. But now I must decide what to do with it now. Perhaps, you could make a suggestion?"

"Well...after being with your son. I can't even begin to think where I would be without him and what he's done for me. Maybe humans and monsters weren't , meant to live apart? What if it's a mistake to live in secret from them?"

"I thought that before when Kirche and I made it. But now I'm think it's better to hide it where nobody will ever find it."

"Wouldn't it be better to take a leap of faith? If you hide it then eventually it will happen all over again. Let it do what it was made for. Itswhat (Name) wwould want. "
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Mizore

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Mizore: Please. I believe that monsters and humans can live to together in peace. Just take a look at me and your son and Moka and Tskune. Two different types people from different worlds. Monsters and Humans. When he first came here and I found out that he was human, I never thought I'd love him. Especially his snotty attitude. But then he began to open up and eventually he came to love me and I came to love him. I want everyone else in the world to experience that feeling. And I'm sure that's what your son would want too.

Your mom was silent, listening to Mizore's speech. Then she spoke.

(name)'s mother: Hmm. That's going to be a quitea gamble. To use the sphere's power to connect the human world and the monster world. Maybe monsters and humans aren't meant to kept secret from each other. And you do have a point. If I hide it again, the same result will happen. I can't promise anything, but I'll think about it.

She began to talk away, but then Mizore stopped her.

Mizore: Wait a minute. Don't you think you should see your son? I mean he's been wanting to see you all this time.

(name)'s mom: I can't.

Mizore: Why not?

(name)'s mom: Because he'll resent me for all the things I did. I left him alone, I separated him from Kirche, and I implanted the sphere inside him. I'm surprised that he doesn't hate me. It's better if I didn't.

Mizore: That's not true. He's your son. He could never hate you. He loves you deeply and he really wants to see you more than anything else in the world. Please go see him.

Meanwhile as for you, you were resting on the bed in the infirmary, looking up at the sky.

(name): Man. A lot of crazy stuff happened, but I'm glad it's over. We were able to stop Fearsome and saved Yokai Academy. Heck we saved the world and the best part, I'm back to my old self again.

You looked at your hand and flexed it. When you did, a small pang of pain shot up your arm.

(name): Well, I guess that's that best part. The worst part about it is, I have to deal with all the pain being human.

(name) thinking: I can't believe it's all over. But, I wonder........what happened to the sphere that Fearsome had? I guess it really doesn't matter. I'm just glad that it's over and everything is back to normal.

Then you heard a knock on the door.

(name): It's open.

The door opened and in stepped.....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Use the sphere to connect the monster and human...

choices: The truth is, your mother is outside right now
She took the sphere and made a clone of you for herself
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"Hi."

"Hi. Now that it's over, what should we do now? "

"I want you to move in with me (Name). I want you with me as long as I possibly can. And I want to raise our child where we can be ourselves."

"Your pregnant? For real?!"

"Bad timing I know but better late than never. I want our lives to start right now, I want a family, and I want you with me as long as humanly possible. Figurativly speaking."

"I can't imagine starting any better time than now. And if you want, we could have another baby."

From the bottom of my heart, thank you.

Tskune: Hey. You're welcome. But you did all the work by opening your heart. You're surrounded by friends and loved ones. Just know we'll always be there for you because we're your friends as well as your family.

(name): Yeah. I do have one regret that happened to me though.

Tskune:What's that?

(name): I wish....I didn't have to let my mom go. I wish I could see her again. In fact.............I wonder if she's watching me and I wonder if.......I made her proud?

Tskune put his hand on your shoulder and smiled.

Tskune: Don't worry about that. I'm sure she is. Mothers really have a habit of loving their sons no matter what. I'm sure she's proud.

You looked at Tskune and smiled.

(name) Thank you Tskune. I appreciate it.

Then..........
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Mizore's Mom shows up to check on her daughter

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"(Name)! Mizore's water broke!", Moka yelled.

You ran inside to see Mizore leaning against Keito trying to get up and hurry to the car. "Oh my god! Get her in the car I'll drive!", you said to Keito.

You got into the car and started it and drove as fast as possible ignoring any and all traffic laws in order to get to the hospitable. You helped walk her inside the emergency room and talked to the nurses saying she is in labor.

The doctors got huddled around her and prepared to help deliver the baby. You walked in with them since you were the baby's father, they gave you doctor scrubs and you helped keep Mizore calm. You held her hand but she squeezed it tightly and she was freezing your hand solid. "It's ok Mizore, your going to be fine."

"Gaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!", she screamed.

"Ok I need you to push now!", said one of the doctors.

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"

After that last scream the doctors managed to take the baby out. But tragedy struck...it wasn't moving. You saw it and was heartbroken at the sight of seeing your own child die during the birth.

But then it coughed and cried after a moment. You and Mizore both took a sigh of relief seeing your child be born healthy and living. It's hair was white as snow and it's skin was palish. The doctors gave the baby to Mizore and she was crying both from the pain and the joy. "Congratulations ma'am it's a boy.", said the doctor.

"He's so beautiful...he's perfect."

"Well done. He looks just like you darling."

"He's going to be a little heart breaker when he's older. The girls will be all over him."

"Not sure if now's the time for thinking like that yet."

"Awww, he has your eyes."

"No, they're my mothers eyes. That shade of blue makes them look greenish you see?"

"Oh, yes your right. He has your mom's eyes. I wish your mother was here for this.''

"It doesn't matter Mizore, I love you with all my heart and we now have the perfect child. They don't make them any better than him. I can feel it in my bones."

"I love you too (Name), if I could go back in time before we met, my life would feel so empty without you. You complete me, and our child."

"What are we going to name the boy then?"

"Well I was hoping to go with Nora since I was hoping it to be a girl, but I heard Keito give a decent boys name. Zuko."

"I love it, it's unique like him."

Soon enough the others started coming in. "Oh...Mizore he's just beautiful.", he mother said crying. Mizore gave him to Tsurara and she cradled him.

"Congrats Mizore, he's just so adorable.", Moka said seeing the baby.

"What's his name?", asked Keito.

"Zuko. Our little Zuko."

"That name would be better fit if he inherited fire powers.", Yukari said.

Kurumu slapped her upside the head saying, "That a great name, it's unique and dramatic. Something that his parents share. I love it."

"So do we.", Tskune replied holding Moka by his side.

"Keito, Tskune we thought about it for a while and decided you both to be the baby's god parents.", Mizore said.

"But..wouldn't it be better if Moka was the god mother? I'm...not sure-", Keito reacted.

"We know you would guard this baby with your life if you a to. You were our ideal choice.'', Mizore replied.

"Thank you both so much.", Keito cried.

Tskune thanked you and Mizore too for letting him be the godfather. It was a long day but soon you and Mizore were alone with Zuko, with Mizore and the baby sleeping in bed. You watched as they drifted to sleep and felt unbelievably happy. You thought earlier if this was a dream but it was reality no mistake about it. You petted Mizore on her head stroking her softly.

"I love you Mizore, and I can't thank you enough for changing my life for the better.", you whispered.

Unbeknownst to anyone, your mother was actually the doctor who delivered your son and watched over you three in the hospitable room through the night. She cried seeing your life change and seeing her grandson for the first time. It was the best day of your life, and you didn't even know how perfect it was.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Moka bursts through the door saying that Mizore...

choices: Later that day......(dont end the story yet)
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Ten years had passed since Zuko was born. He had grown to a happy 10 year old boy. You and Mizore were proud of the way he was growing. And Tskune and Keito had grown very fond of him too. Keito taught him how to read, count, and many other things. Mizore and Tskune taught how to use his ice powers, and eventually he learned how to control his powers, but only to a certain degree. He can do simple things like freezing objects and firing little icicles, but couldn't really make them as strong as his mother's. That didn't matter to Zuko. All he cared about was being with his family. You all lived together peacefully in a town in the human world next to a park. One day Zuko was playing a game of catch with you in the park. You two were throwing a ball back and forth testing each other to see how hard you could throw it. Meanwhile Mizore and Keito were doing laundry and hanging clothes on the clothes line.

Keito: Wow. He's grown so much.

Mizore: Yes. Our little Zuko has grown to a fine young man. And my (name) has grown to be a fine father.

Keito: Yes. You're lucky to have a husband like him.

Mizore: It's not just me. You and Tskune and all the others have been a big influence on Zuko. I knew making Me and (name) have made the right choice by making you two Zuko's godparents.

Keito: Hahaha Cut it out Mizore, you're making me blush. Speaking of Tskune how is he?

Tskune: He's gone to spend time with Moka. Other than that he's doing fine.

Keito: I figured so. I can't believe it's been ten years already. To think that (name) was once all alone and he and I were enemies. Now we're living together and he's a loving father with a loving family.

Mizore: Yeah. If only his mother can see him now. She'd be so proud of him.

Keito: Call me crazy, but I think she already is wherever she may be.

Mizore smiled and chuckled.

Mizore: Hahaha. You may be right.

Meanwhile back with you and Zuko's game of catch....

(name): (whew) Not bad son. You sure can catch.

Zuko: OK! Try this one daddy! This my super duper pitch!

Then there was trouble. Zuko threw the ball to hard and it went past you and disappeared behind the bushes.

(name): Holy cow!

Zuko: Whoops. Sorry dad. I guess I threw it too hard. I'll get it.

(name): Now hold on son.....

Before you could say anything Zuko disappeared behind the bushes in pursuit of the ball.

(name): Oy vey. Mizore! Keito! We'll be back! We lost the ball and Zuko went after it!

Mizore: K. Just don't go too far!

Keito: And be careful! Watch out for Zuko!

And with that you followed behind the bush to follow Zuko. Meanwhile as for Zuko he was searching for the ball he lost. The bushes grew thicker and Zuko was getting more and more lost. Soon he had no idea where he was and he was getting scared.

Zuko: Daddy? Where are you? Daddy?

Sadly no one answered. Zuko was now getting scared. Then he heard something. A pleasant sound like a flute drifted through the trees. Zuko followed the sound curious as to what the sound was. Soon he found a young woman sitting on a log playing the song. The song was so inviting and relaxing Zuko couldn't help, but listen. The woman saw Zuko coming towards her and she smiled.

Pokemon Lugia's song flute cover. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nTzGoZEg...)

Woman: Well hello there child. Are you lost?

Zuko: Yes. I was looking for my ball and I got lost. Oh who are you? I'm Zuko.

Woman: I'm Mira. I see you've taken a liking to my song. Would you like to hear more?

Zuko: Oh most certainly ma'am. I mean Ms. Mira.

For a few minutes the woman played a couple songs for Zuko. Zuko loved hearing the woman play. It made him feel so relaxed that he completely forgot that he was looking the ball and had to get back to you. Then he heard you calling out.

(name) Zuko! Zuko where are you?

Zuko: That's my daddy! I forgot that he's looking for me!

Woman: You better get going then. Oh yeah, you'll probably be wanting this. (pulls out ball)

(name): My ball! How'd you find it?

Woman: I found it while I was walking. Oh by the way, give your father and your mother this message for me OK dear little Zuko?

Zuko: Sure. What is it Ms Mira?

Woman: Tell him his mom always loves him. And take this to him as well.

She handed Zuko a little music box. Zuko looked at the box confused and then when he looked back up, Mira was gone.

Zuko: Huh? Ms. Mira? Where'd you go?

Then you pop out from the bushes.

(name): Zuko there you are! I was looking for you!

Zuko: Daddy! I gotta show you something! I gotta show you something to mom as well!

(name): Really? Well then, we better get out of this forest then.

Zuko: Yeah!

As you and Zuko left, the woman watched from afar and she smiled happily. And with that she disappeared into the forest playing the flute as she walked.

And then.....
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: Continue

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
"There you are you two. Where were you?", asked Mizore.

"Lost the ball, but we found it and got this too!", Zuko showed the music box and it played the tune. You recognized it as your mothers lullaby.

"Zuko...where did you get that?"

"Ms.Mira gave it to me. She said, your mom always loves you."

You started to cry but Mizore placed her hand on your cheek to calm you down. "Honey, you o.k.? "

"Yeah. Yeah I'll be fine."

You walked away from them to let out your tears privatley. You remebered her from your childhood, how happy she made you, how she made you laugh, and how she made you feel good. It reminded you of the pain you went through in the past. But then Mizore replaced your thoughts. Your moms love never left, but took form of new love. Zuko and Mizore more than filled the gap she left behind and you knew somewhere she was watching you.

Mizore came behind and picked you off the ground. "You ok now?"

"More than I have been in the last 10 years. Mizore I want you to know that when I first realized you would be there for me, I knew no matter what...I couldn't let you go. And more than one occasion I gave you a reason to leave me."

"But I never did. Because I knew who you really were. You messed up but so what? Nobody is perfect. And I may be more forgiving than most other women. But you deserve it, trust me. Look what we have done together. We have a son that's so beautiful, and stopped a pshycho group of monsters from ruling the world. You, are my hero (Name)."

"I love you so much Mizore. "

"Me too."

Soon Zuko grew up and surpassed Mizore's powers and would later marry Kurumu's daughter. Moka and Tskune had four kids, all female, and would start to join the student safety commision as the new leaders which would grow to become a special task force to prevent world threats.

Keito would go on to live a happy life as a single mom with her adopted son. Lastly you and Mizore had one more kid before Zuko began highschool and would have another son named Wayne. You two lived happy lives from then afterwards and loved eachother till the very end.
1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.title: The love we have for each other is never gone

1553322222121111222111212222111112211211.content:
Mizore saw the band on your uniform and wondered why you suddenly joined the Saftey committee. She knew you would only do it if it was for a good reason but she seemed more sucpicious than serious about it for the moment. However she thought for only a moment that maybe you were thinking of going out with Keito but she instantly kicked that idea out of her head realizing you and her have been through far too much for you to just cheat on her. Even if you were going out with Keito she knew you'd tell her directly instead of trying to have Keito and herself. But aside from it why were you having it on your uniform, after her small deliberation inside her head Mizore asked why you had that band on.

"(Name) why are you wearing that?"

"Oh! The band, trust me Mizore it's important that I keep it private. But trust me on this alright I promise this is only temporary.", you tried explaining without telling what you saw a minute ago.

"OK (Name) I trust you. But promise me one thing?", Mizore asked

"What?"

Mizore pulled you into a quick yet passionate kiss. You were surprised by her gesture but welcomed it undeniably. She broke it off whispering, "Do what you need to do fast, because I want you back safely, and soon." You nodded in response to her promise and directed your attention at the teacher.

After the school day ended it was a while before Mizore mother had to leave which gave you some time to bond together before she left.
What do you do?

When you inhaled the gas, nothing happened. You were completely normal and were not feeling any effects at all. Needless to say you were a little surprised.

(name) Um....s'cuse me, but didn't you say that whoever inhaled the would go super crazy with fear Keito?

Keito and the everyone else stared at you with surprise and shock.

Keito: No.....no way!

Mizore: (name). Are you sure you feel okay?

(name): I know this may come as a shock, but I feel fine. No effects whatsoever.

Moka: Well that's good news.

Tskune; So...wait! (name) isn't affected by the gas at all?

Keito: It would seem so. I wonder why.

(name) So what now Keito? Now that we know that I'm unaffected by the gas, how can we use it to our advantage?

Keito: I don't know. Now that we know that (name) is unaffected by the gas we should us this to our advantage. But we should plan it carefully.

There was a moment of silence. Everyone was trying to think of a plan, but the silence was killing you.

(name) Oh come on! We can't just sit here and do nothing! I say I go and change the air and shut down the gas.

Mizore: No! (name)! I love you, but it's too dangerous!

Moka: Mizore's right! You may be unaffected by the gas, but it's still dangerous!

Tskune: You wouldn't last a minute out there!

(name) But I can't just sit here while innocent lives are at stake!

Keito: (name)!

Keito's voice made you jump in surprise and this made everyone else stop and look at Keito.

Keito: You're all right about one thing, what (name) saying is dangerous, but at the same time he's the only one who is unaffected by the gas.He can't just rush out there. At least not with out a plan.

(name): You have an idea Keito?

Keito: I don't just have an idea. I have a plan, but only if you're willing to go through with it (name). You're the only one who can do this. Are you up for it?

You reached the gym but nobody was there at least for at first glance. You looked around for anyone but saw somebody hanging above the gym and you couldn't believe who it was!

"Ugh...(Name)..."

"No way....mother?!"

"So nice to finally see you again my darling."

"You can't be the one behind this!"

"No...he trapped me in this thing...this cursed spell that uses my powers against my will. The lamia that he creates serve him.."

"So the lamia are what? Clones? Un-natural births?"

"They are mere humans who were re born as lamia. But the only way I could get yoou to help me was through her..."

"Keito...she figured out you were related to me. She was trying to get me to figure this out and when her boss found out he tried to cover all of it up."

"So that's why the boss wanted her alive but where is she?", Mizore asked.

"Oh she is right here. I must say, you all have been formidable adversaries. Ounce I control all of you, I'll have you as my oersonall body guards...except perhaps the women.", the boss said in shadow.

"It seems convenient to run the school and have something this big hidden from everyone especially if your the one running the school...headmaster.", you called out.

"Very good (Name). But you haven't caught me, I've caught you!"

Soon the stands had a bunch of lamia hiding in camoflauge and were ready to call on the headmaster's orders.

"Youre a fraud! A liar! And scum! Only someone as twiated as you would kidnap my own mother! But why?!"

"She isn't a lamia but her power over humans and monsters is the strongest I have ever witnessed. I decided to put it to good use."

"You used that power to lie, make yourself look like a respectable person, but when I started making trouble around you sent Keito to make me look ike a two-timming man hoar to force me out of here!"

"That's a nice little story. But all will be forgivien ounce your all droolling from your little naps. Lamia! Now!", he ordered.

Soon the lamia activated their hypnosis and started to try and have everyone hypnotized. The jumbo-tron on the ceiling made it nearly impossible to have anyone not look in the direction of hypnotic bliss. Mizore was caught in the deadly gaze along with Keito. But you and Kurumu still were left standing as you closed your eyes. And even though the others were made to serve Kurumu's wishes and have deep infatuation with her, the massive hypnosis made it unclear and confusing for them to follow any commands.

"You cannot win. No one can resist my will. Akane! Persuade these two to open their eyes and see the world order I will make one day.", the headmaster ordered.

(Yes I mixed the gym with the auditorium in the last chapter by accident. My bad but the idea wouldn't be much different aside from the gint tv it's a projection on say a stage in the auditiorium. Any way back on with the story.)

You tried to focus on anything but you felt no idfferent. In fact what was your mom suppossed to do? But you heard Kurumu yelling in agony like she was having a migrain. You tried to fake it and try to figure out a plan. What was it you could do to stop the headmaster? Without your mom he's nothing. So you opened you tried a crazy idea. You attempted to jump off the stage and run out of there.

The lamia restrained you and held you up making you look at your mom. You looked and figured out that the only way to free her was by removing that glowing object around her arms which was also keeping her hung above the ceiling. You then yelled out to Kurumu, fly up and claw as far and quick as you can!"

Kurumu while in pain of resisting yiur mom's mind rape did as you told her and managed to break one of the chains holding your mother up. "Get the other one on your left!", you yelled. And with tht Kurumu managed to free your mother. She fell to the floor but Kurumu grabbed her and landed safely on the ground.

"You...saved me......take care of my son....", she said. She then disappeaerd for some reason but then the lamia all seemed to transform into humans again and they were all knocked out. The headmaster displeased by this tried to run for it but Keito held him by the neck.

"As the leader of the school saftey commission I hearby place you under arrest for kidnapping, attempted murder and brainwashing of multiple victems, and ruthlessly trying to undermine the rules of our world and the human world.", she said as if reading his rights.

"This is the last time I try and hire a self absorbed- ugh", Keito hit him in the face sending im flying out of the room and all the way into the school courtyard.

"Thank you Keito...for everything. I'd have never even found out what happened to my mom if it wasn't for you.", you thanked.

"I know...but hey I get the fact that you and Mizore are a thing. And I respect that. But I'll always have a special place in my heart for you. I'll rememberyou fondly. But my duty is to my job here and my work is never done. And just so you know, your mom would be proud of you. Really.", Keito said.

You both hugged each other and you seemed to reach an understanding. But Kurumu came up to you and said what happened to your mom.

"Is she dead?!"

"No. She's just gone. I don't know exactly but she's out there and she is free thanks to you (Name). Soon you'll be reunited with her I promise you that."

"Thank you Kurumu. Ya know, you are a real friend and seriously. That guy you are searching for will find you. And maybe your thoughts on the lovey dovey stuff won't bother you as much.

"Aw shut it. And thanks you cutie. But hey your last chance to be my boyfriend."

"I'm sorry but Mizore and I share something that I can't deny. But were cool right?"

"Yeah you cute guy. Were cool, but let me give you just one little thing just for the hell of it because this is my last chance I will get to do this.", she pulled you in and quickly kissed your cheek hard deliberatly missing your lips. "Good luck with Mizore, she's the sensative one.", she said.

Moka and Tskune came by thnaking you for freeing them.

"Hey in the end what are friends for?"

"You are a terrific friend (Name). And we'll have your back when you need it.", Tskune said.

"Thanks you guys I appreciate it."

Lastly Mizore came by starring at you.

"You sir are one hell of a guy. You took on the headmaster, beat the crap out of another monster student, and you took on a whole army of lamia. You are the most interesting guy I have ever met. So...think you can handle a single date with me? Tonight at my place?", she offered.

"At this point I'd obviously say yes. Point me in the direction you give and I'll follow it till my feet bleed.", you replied saying yes in an over the top manner. You two hugged tightly and couldn't wait for the date. After all this insanity you deserved some down-time.

The date began with you in a large penthouse to which you were gazing out the window. You were pulled into this party by Mizore since it was something she wanted to do for some sort of occasion regarding the students. Something about their write of passage? But you didn't care as long as you were with her along for the party, but she wasn't around yet for some reason.

Suddenly you got pulled to the dance floor by three lovely young ladies. Each had their turn before Tskune rescues you by distracting them with some orderbs. You dove into a nearby elevator but when you reached your floor, you see none other than Mizore at a safe, taking a large diamond. She then pined you to the wall while she finishes robbing the safe, and made her escape. You break free, and headed after her.

You found her leaping the Japanese rooftops like this was all fun and games. You caught up to her but she dove several dozen stories below into traffic, breaking her fall with a banner and swinging onto a tour bus. She poses for some pictures until you made it on the bus.

You jumped on a gas truck tanker but Mizore randomly freezes the tanker and breaks it apart separating you from the truck. The truck spins off, but you manage to get after her by jumping on the back of the truck with her laughing. Thankfully the tanker didn't explode or cause much damage.

Then as Mizore jumped off the truck she landed on a train, where, while going into a tunnel, you lose her, only to see her trail leading into a cosplay convention. Expectedly, she had detoured through the anime groups and tries to hide from you in plains sight. She escapes through the back of the convention while she tries to run away.

You finally corner her against the gates of the of the building holding the convention. She notices your aggravation and leans to kiss you. You push her away at first wondering why she did all of this and she appears hurt.

But seeing her drop the diamond for the authorities to reclaim she said that it was just a game to make herself feel alive. You then sweeps her into his arms and kiss her.

The cops arrive, and Mizore looks around, concerned. But you carry her off leaving the diamond letting this off the hook. You look through the window at the party, watching the cop cars fly past. Then, Mizore in her party dress leans in and asks if it was fun for you as it was for her.

You simply smile at her and hug her nodding. While the entire thing was entirely stupid and wreck less it was just a bit of teenage nature. Just something they did without any normal reason but had to do it for themselves. She swore never to do that thing again seeing how it drew too much attention but felt that it was worth it.

"OK Mizore. I'll stay for you.", she blushed after hearing your comment but kept it to herself.

She dragged you over to the couch where she wrapped her arms around your neck and seductivly sat on your lap. She itched her way to your face making her way toward your lips. You came closer until you two lovingly made out for a solid minute and cuddled in each others arms. "(Name)..do? Do you love me?", she said.

"Well...I don't know exactly what it is to love another person who isn't your family. But I do know that I'd be there for you. And I will never give upp on you, EVER. Right now that's all I know.", you answered.

"You're serious aren't you?"

"Dead serious. You know what to do right?"

"Yeah but-"

You grabbed her arm and starred at her with a serious look in your eye...

"Fine, I mean we've never argued. Well not yet but were fine."

"You know what I noticed? Mizore became more aggressive when she's aroud you (Name) have you noticed?", Mka brought up.

"Yes, I have to be honest. Why do you think that?"

"Mizore is very shy and a great hider. But around you she's almost a different person. I think you just seem to light a certain fire in her that melts away the shyness she ounce had back in the old days.", Moka said.

You had your arm around her cuddling with her and nudging your head next to hers.

"Ha ha stop it your making this too sweet.", Mizore said in response to your head nudging.

"Come on I know you like it. It's nothing like me sayyyy this!", you started to tickle her and she busted out laughing.

"Noooohaaahoooo stoooop! Hahahaha pleeeeeeaaaaassssss! Hahahahahaaaa!", she begged.

"But the tickle monster wants a kiss. Promise to give him a kiss and he'll stop.", you said trying to keep it going a bit longer.

"Alllrriiiiiiiigheheheheheheeet!", Mizore said.

You stopped tickling her and you leaned in close to her face. She wrapped her arms around your neck and kissed you hard on the lips.

"Hows that?"

"I think the tickle monster seems satisfied. Now I want one."

"You greedy little...cute jerk.", she replied kissing you again.

"Now?", Mizore asked.

"I just want to lay down next to my girlfriend watching the sunset.", you answered.

"Ok. But I'm going to get my way and not just when were on a date but when when you least expect iit and you HAVE to do as I say.", she said.

The next day at school everything was quiet. As you walked by everyone that saw either looked at you and looked away. Obviously they all must've heard what you did to Saizo. But for some reason you felt that your stomach was in a knot. As you walked into the classroom everyone either looked away or pretended not to see you. You sat in your seat in class and looked out the window. You began thinking about what you did to Saizo and what Mizore said to you.

(name) Monster huh?

You looked at your hand and stared at it. You remembered back when you were a kid when your mom disappeared. It was hard. You were always alone and you wanted to be alone. Everyone treated you like you were an outcast. After school whenever you left you saw all the kids with their moms. You envied them so much and you missed your mom so much. You also remember when you were little you got into a fight because a kid was picking on you and he said something about your mother that made you mad. Then you got in trouble by the teacher and she called your dad. You expected your dad to be dad, but he wasn't just disappointed. He simply gave you a hug and said.....

Your dad: Listen son. i know your angry and sad about not having a mom, but you can't just go and do that to people. Hate and loneliness is like a plaque. It spreads more and more until it completely destroys. Besides your mother wouldn't want you to do this would she? I know you feel alone, but being alone and taking your hatred out on others is not what you should do. Your mother would have wanted you to apologize and move on.

This hit you hard like a sack of bricks and hearing your father say that made you cry so hard. Your father held his embrace and stroked your hair and soothed your pain. Remembering that made you feel even worse. Now you felt guilty. You had to apologize to Saizo. Even though he was a bully you owed it to him to say sorry. After class you decided to find Saizo and apologize to him. You looked all around, but you couldn't find him. Unfortunately you found someone else. Keito.

Keito: Hello again. Good to see you.

(name) It's you again. Look I already said I'm not a people person so.....

Keito: Now now. I just came to deliver a message. It would be wise for you to read it.

She hands you a note and with that she left. You opened the letter you gasped. The letter said that Saizo had Mizore, and it said if you didn't show up at the bus stop he'd kill her.

(name) No. This is my fault. If I hadn't have gone and been an ass none of this wouldn't be happening. I have to stop this.

You ran to the bus stop. As you were running you ran right past Tskune and Moka. At first they wanted to ask you why you did what you did to Saizo, but you didn't have time to chat. You raced past them and headed to the bus stop. Through the forest you looked for the bus stop. What you didn't realize was that Mizore was stalking you. She was a bit mad at you still for what you did, but she was curious as to why you were frantic. Then you saw the bus stop when you ran to it you looked to Saizo and Mizore.
