(name): Why didn't I think of it before? It's the perfect hiding place. All this time I was focusing on finding a good hiding place. It never ocured to me that she could be hiding at the place where I started.

You got back to the place that you first started out. You looked around to find Yukari. At first you didn't see her, but then...
155332222221111122112111212111112122111.title: Find Moka (have her help)

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Soon as you went back to where it all started you looked around seeing where she was hiding exactly. It took you a little bit to figure out where exactly she was hiding but you noticed a witch hat sticking out from the trees. "I found you Yukari!"

She came out and levitated down with a smile on her face. She was pleased by your success but looked forward to the reward she promised you a lot more. "You did it (Name), I was worried you'd never find me for a second.", she said.

"Clever place to hide but please don't do it again.", you asked.

"Oh don't worry I won't. I love you way too much to just up and sneak away. So, about that kiss. Thinking of doing it now?", she asked seductively.

You blushed at her question and how she wrapped her arms across your neck. You decided to just give in and leaned toward her face and kissed her gently on the lips. She kissed you back hard and really pulled you in like she was making up for lost time. Soon after a minute she broke it off and started laughing. "What's so funny?", you asked.

"Nothing, I just love you. Your so handsome.", she complimented.

"Thanks, you look nice too.", you replied.

"(Name) I want you to sleep with me."

"Wait what?", you reacted.

"Every night we sleep with each other and cuddle and make love. It's how couples living in the same place should sleep.", she said.

"Oh well I guess that's fine.", you answered.

"Wait a minute? (Name) do you know aboooooout?"

"About what?", you were still too young to know or fathom the concept of sex. You didn't even realize what she meant by having you do this.

"Nevermind your better off finding out when were older. Juuuuuuuuuuuust trust me."

"OK fine Yukari. I don't know what the big deal is really. It's only me and you sleeping together in the same bed. What's the big deal?"

"Hmm hmm you are cute when your oblivious to things (Name). Seeya back in the room hot-stuff.", she kissed you quickly on the lips and left but instead of enjoying the kiss you were thinking of something else.

"Hot-stuff?"
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: You see her witch hat sticking out from the trees

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
A little while later back in your room, you were lying in your bed still a little confused about what Yukari said.

(name): Cuddle? Make love? What the heck did Yukari mean by all that? Did she mean new ways to hug or something? Hmmm. Oh well, I guess it doesn't really matter. Well, anyway I better get some sleep. I've got a new day tomorrow and then hopefully I'll get some more training done. After all, I'm trying to be a full fledged wizard. Or warlock. Hopefully it won't be as difficult as the test was today.

As you were changing into your sleeping clothes, you were thinking about everything that happened. When you first met Yukari and when you came to Yokai.

(name) thinking: Oh boy. I've had one heck of a time so far. Not to mention Yukari being my girlfriend.

Then you remembered when you kissed Yukari. The thought of it made you blush.

(name) thinking: That's right! I kissed Yukari. I (name), seventeen and a half years old, witch fanatic extraordinaire has had his first real kiss with a witch! I'm the luckiest man alive! Not to mention that she's the smartest girl in the school to boot. I wonder she got so smart for her age? For that matter I wonder how old she is? I know that she's in the same grade as me, but she doesn't look like a high schooler. Hmmm. Well she is a witch so she must be older than she looks right? Or maybe her age is in human years? Hmmm. Maybe I should ask her about tomorrow. Until then, off to sleep.

And so, you pulled the covers over you and went to sleep. Then.......
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Back in your room

choices: It was a vision of the future
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
You were in a green house that was filled with a pinkish smoke. Yukari was on a tree vine naked and reached out towards you pleading for you to be one with her. You leapt for her and made out like crazy. Then it all went away and cut to a ferris wheel cart with Yukari under your arm. She was eating a piece of cotton candy that you fed her and ate it like a cat. "Mmmm it tastes great. But I'll bet you taste better. ", she said. This time she was on top of you and initiated the make out.

For the most part of your dream it was all just vague and random scenarios of you and Yukari being romantic. But a certain feeling hit you when this one played in your mind. "I can't wait for us to be husband and wife!", Yukari said in the dream. In her typical Yukari fashion she laughed and hugged you around your chest. But this gave off something familiar. Like it wasn't a dream. A vision of the future perhaps? Maybe, maybe it wasn't a vision but a memory. You tried to remember where it took place but it just faded from your mind.

In fact it altogether faded from your mind in a blink. It came and just left.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: You began to dream

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
When you woke up it was already morning. You felt Yukari's breath behind your neck and turned over. She was asleep like a baby and smiled so cutesy and in her sleep pulled you closer towards her. You chose not wake her up and enjoyed her embrace. You gently stroked her forehead and lightly kissed it. "Good morning Yukari. ", you whispered.

"Mmmmm little longer please. Too tired. ", she replied half awake.

You waited for her to wake up while she still had you in her arms. You liked being like this, with Yukari in a nice cozey bed cuddling. But then your thoughts flashed back to the dream. You knew it was familiar, hell you distinctly recall something but you couldn't put your finger on it. You knew something about it was familiar, but why did it? What was being said?, "Husband and wife", was all that you remembered last night outside of having the dream altogether. But why those words. You didn't know anyone from your old school who said that. Not even your family.

But you knew you heard those words before from someone. As soon as you started really trying to think of an answer, Yukari started waking up. She moaned and smiled seeing you, "Hi (Name). Sorry for just sleeping next to you without permission. I just couldn't help but ...", she said.

"That's o.k. I didn't even notice.", you answered.

"Well today I'm taking a break from testing and teaching so for today. I want us to go out, like you know as a couple."

"Well uhhh I suppose. I mean I've never done it before. "

"(Name) have no fear. I've read enough manga to know how an easy date can play out. Except for the tentacles, they always have that kinda stuff in them and it made no sense.", she said.

"What about -"

"Never mind you don't want to know. Fragile mind of yours might break if I explained it.", Yukari replied.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: A forgotten memory

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Somewhere outside of Yokai a young woman was sitting across from a good friend of hers as they enjoyed a lovely diner while exchanging words over the concept of loyalty. One was a girl dressed in pink and had long black hair with eyes of emerald green. The other was a guy dressed in blue and gray who sat on his feet instead of his rear.

"Well obviously undying loyalty is the best relationship of all. Loyalty like that comes rarely these days.", the girl said.

"People who devote themselves to people have nothing to live for. I find that to be an illusion. However I don't deny that it exsists.", he replied.

"Your such a pessemist Jahn."

"Your the optimist."

"Well if you think that undying loyalty exists how about my undying loyalty to my future husband?", she said.

"There's a difference between obsessive infatuation and that. I happen to think the former is your case. Besides I doubt he'd reciprocate the feeling Kaguya.", Jahn replied.

"Hmph. No wonder you'll never get married."

"Honestly I find that concept to be weak. If a couple really loves eachother that much then they shouldn't need to be bound by law. It makes it stronger if you think about it."

"Well it was nice seeing you again old friend but I think now is finally time to see my future husband.", Kaguya said.

"Isn't it odd choosing now of all times when you could have seen him after you turned 10? You realize were being hunted down by monster families of the highest ranks.", Jahn warned.

"Like I said, undying loyalty to my husband.", Kaguya retorted.

"Just steer clear of them. Particuarly the vampires. Although if you need to draw attention to any monster species don't hesitate to show off against the succubi.", he asked.

"You've always thought they were beautiful Jahn."

"It can't be helped I'm a guy with basic desires and they represent the embodiment. I mean if you had a weakness to any monster wouldn't it be obvious that it would be one that plays with your emotions and hormones? Which there are a few from what I've been told."

"None would compare to (Name). He's all I need.", Kaguya said with pride.

"Interesting. Well do be careful Kaguya, if he's at that school for monsters it will be hard not to be recognized.", Jahn said as Kaguya left.

"I'll be fine Jahn. I'll call you if I need any help."

"Ohh you will.", he said with a smirk around his face.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Meanwhile

choices: Yukari comes out of nowhere and hug attacks you.
A young and beautiful woman walks by you and Tsukune (Kaguya)
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Back to you, you had just gotten out of class and were heading back to your room to make plans for your date with Yukari. You were excited and a little nervous at the same time.

(name): Man. I'm so nervous. This'll be the first date I've ever been on. I wish I knew where to take her. I don't even know where to begin to take Yukari. Should I take her to a movie? Or maybe a trip to the amusement park? Hmmm. Maybe I can ask someone for advice, but who?

Then you saw Tsukune.

(name) thinking: Hey Tsukune! Perfect! He's practically dating Moka, so maybe he can give me some ideas.

You quickly ran after Tsukune and called him.

(name): Tsukune! Wait up!

Tsukune: Hey (name).

(name): Listen. I need your advice on something. It's really important.

Tsukune: What is it?

(name): Listen. I'm going on a date with someone and I have no idea where to take her. You have any ideas?

Tsukune: Well......I'd usually go to where the girl wants me to go, but usually I would take her to the mall of the movies?

(name): The movies or the mall huh? OK. I'll pick one of those places. Thanks Tsukune.

Tsukune: Anytime. By the way I forgot to ask you. Who's the lucky girl?

(name): Um....well.....

You were gonna tell Tsukune, but then....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Back to you

choices: "I came here to see you again" (Acts like a friend)
"I came here to take you home with me and marry you." (She comes out with it)
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Soon as you were about to say who it was Kaguya had just walked passed Tskune but then her mind and heart ran wild as she saw your face for the first time in years. She nearly cried from the overwhelming happiness that consumed her being but remained calm. With one small step she walked over and went to grab your attention.

"It's Yu-", before you finished answering you noticed Kaguya walking towards you. Then something clicked in your mind like you knew you had seen her before but you don't know where. But everything was about to be clear ounce she began talking to you.

"Hi (Name), it's me Kaguya.", she said shyly.

As soon as the name rang through your ears everything was clear. Kaguya's family was friends with your own and you remember all the time you spent as kids for one summer. It was so long ago you had forgotten her as time went on. Believing she was a monster you assumed she was in no danger when it was the exact opposite. But you greeted her with a big hug and laughed at how joyous your reunion was.

"Oh my god it's been a whole other lifetime! How've you been Kaguya?!", you said with a big smile that lite like a candle in a dark room.

Kaguya wasn't certain of what to say or do seeing how she was experiencing the excitment of reuniting with you but with also what you were thinking of her. However she didn't wish to spoil the moment and simply treated it as a friendly meeting. "It's so wonderful to see you again (Name). I've missed you and thought about you for a long time.", she said.

You couldn't tell from her tone that she meant it in a romantic sense but you replied, "It's good to see you again Kaguya." Tskune was wondering what was going on so you decided to explain the context of this reunion. "Tskune this is Kaguya, my childhood friend. We spent an entire summer together while her folks lived in Japan for the summer season."

"Hi I'm Tskune it's a pleasure to meet you.", Tskune said extending his arm to Kaguya. She accepted his kindness and maintained a sense of kindness around your friends. She wasn't prejudice against monsters but it was tough to maintain cover from a place like this.

"(Name) means a great deal to me. I hope you were watching his back.", she said.

"I have. But he's been working overtime with Yukari. He's her new apprentice."

"Oh how nice of her. Is she a teacher?", she asked.

"Actually she's a student but is a genius. And I'm spending the year in her room.", you replied.

To Kaguya this was a shock to her as she had assumed you thought about her as much as she did of you. She never expected to have competition let alone to this much of an extent. She kept her frustration inside herself and hoped it wasn't as bad as she feared. Maybe it would be best to have time alone to catch up with you and remind you of all the romantic times you had as children. You already wanted to talk with Kaguya alone so you kindly asked Tskune to leave which he did replying, "Nice meeting you", with a wave goodbye.

"Wow it's been forever you look great.", you complimented her.

"Well (Name) you look just as stunning. In fact I was blushing as soon as I realized it was you."

"Hehehe you flatter me. But really wow! I didn't know you enrolled here."

"I don't. I'm not even a monster (Name). In fact I need your help."

"What?!"

"Listen to me. My family is being hunted one by one and it's dangerous for me to be here. But I had to come for you (Name). I had to. You mean a lot to me.", she said in earnest.

"Kaguya do you want me to guard you or something? Because with a little more time I can do that with all the spells and magic I'm learning from Yukari. Oh man you'd love to meet her. She is a lot like you, and between you and me.", you whispered in her ear, "I think I like her a lot."

Those seven words had nearly broke Kaguya's poor heart. For so long she waited for you but now this Yukari had undone her heartstrings and now knew she needed to save you. She teared up but quickly hid it from you not wanting to tell you how she felt just yet. But the urge was so powerful she felt that if she didn't it would lose you. "Well listen (Name) I came here because well..."
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: A young and beautiful woman walks by you and Ts...

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
The moment she said it your heart raced and your mind went numb. "(Name) there's no point in hiding it other than trying to please your current state of life. But in my eyes you have always been the one for me and I wish for us to be together. You remember what I said back then?"

Of course you did. The dream that night was a memory of her anxious to be your wife. She was head over heels for you back then and even now she still hasn't changed her mind. Yet with the passage of time you had already begun falling for another. "Kaguya, I am so sorry I didn't mean to say that about Yukari in front of you."

"No. I know you didn't mean to hurt my feelings otherwise you'd never say it to me at all if you knew what it would mean. Our family had to leave in order to go into hiding from the monster families we angered. They claimed we betrayed their trust and so we were forced to flee, myself included. I wanted to stay with you but my parents couldn't risk it. So I waited and hoped for us to reunite and get married. But now I see that perhaps I held on to a dream that was out of my reach.", she said.

"Oh Kaguya.", you didn't know what to say to her now. All of what could have or might have been played out in your head but you needed to focus on what IS. Yukari and you were starting to become very close but not to a point of no return. No matter which way you turned you would be breaking a girl's heart.

"(Name), I was hoping you would come with me. But it's your choice. I would want you to be happy where you wanted to stay. I'll be in the ladies dorm for one night and half a day more but after that I will leave. I can't stay any longer than I need to."

"Kaguya...", you just said her name but nothing else left your mouth. Before she left she hugged you tightly and listened to your heartbeat, "You still have a strong heart (Name). Listen to it.", she said before leaving.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: "I came here to take you home with me and m...

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
After Kaguya had left, you were left all by yourself. So you walked around the campus by yourself to try to sort all this out. You had no idea what you should do. Either way it would lead to a broken heart.

(name) thinking: Damn it. What do I do? Should I love Yukari? Or should I love Kaguya? Man!!! OK. Let's review. On the one hand Yukari's cute and everything and she's really awesome and she's the very thing that I've wanted to meet and date with, a witch. But she's a little young for me and I don't want anyone to know that I'm dating a little kid. On the other hand, Kaguya's been my best friend for a long time. Not mention that she's been dreaming of being my wife for all these years and it's been rough. Hmm. What do I do? I can't say no to either of them! I don't want to hurt either of them, but......rrrghhh!

As you were pondering through what you should do, you walked aimlessly through the whole school until you were by the cliff outside the grounds. You looked out to the calm red sea listening to the waves crashing against the shore.

(name): (sigh) Man. I never thought I'd get stuck in a love triangle like this. Well one thing's for sure, I can't let Yukari know about this. The last thing I need is for her to find out about Kaguya.

Then......
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: What to do?

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
"What's eating you (Name)?", Kurumu out of nowhere asked.

"Oh hey. Just thinking...", you replied.

"Uh huh. Seriously though you look stressed. And I don't think it's Yukari's tough love tutoring.", Kurumu said.

"Your right about that."

"Then c'mon tell me. What's the matter? Promise I'll keep my mouth shut.", she swore.

"Well...theres this girl I knew I long time ago. I like her alot but I like Yukari too. I'm kida in the middle of this. If I don't do anything I might end up losing both of them. But if I choose to stay with one I'll hurt the other.", you said.

"Hey I'm a succubus and I follow the only thing that has any say in my actions. My heart. So follow yours.", she suggested.

"That's the problem I don't know which one I like more. Maybe they both are on the same...oh whats the point? How could I figure it out when I only have a night to think it over.", you said in frustration.

"Hold the phone there. I think I can help you, I can just simply pry the answer out of your subconciouss and you'll have an answer.", Kurumu offered.

"You can do that? For me?"

"Hey I'm a friend and servant to love itself."

"Thanks. Wait a minute what were you doing here anyway?", you asked.

"Ohhh nothing special just the usual.", she lied.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Someone comes up to you

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
(name): So uh.....how are you gonna look into my subconscious? I mean you have some kind of power?

Kurumu: Yup. Should be an easy one. I'll just looking around in your mind and then your subconscious should respond and give you an answer.

Kurumu then placed her hands on your head and concentrated.

Kurumu: OK (name). Stay still. This might feel a little strange.

(name): Wait a sec. What are you...

Before you could finish, you felt a little fuzzy and you and your mind was beginning to swim. You began to see images of your childhood with Kagura. All the times you played with her and the time you and her were together when she asked you if she could be your wife. Then you saw images of Yukari. You remember how much you loved witches and how much you wanted to date and marry a witch. You also saw images of you going under Yukari's training and finding her. Next you saw her and Yukari scrubbing each others backs and Yukari saying that she loved you and then sharing a tender kiss. All these images of Yukari and Kagura flashed by in your head. The images flashed by faster and faster making you feel dizzy. Then they began to slow down until they stopped and the girl that popped into your head was.....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Continue

choices: She locks herself in her room
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Kaguya appeared in your mind, she was who you loved deep down. In your heart you just felt the same connection Kaguya kept alive in herself all these years. But now that you knew this, did that mean you had to leave Yokai? Leave your friends behind? Couldn't she stay? Kaguya had to understand that you had a life here now. At least she could stay here with you for the rest of the year and then move with her. This was all stuff you needed to talk to her about so as soon as you came back to reality.

Kurumu let go of your head and breathed a little heavily, "You know who you love now?", she asked.

"You didn't see who?"

"I can't see who that person loves (Name), its so that I don't alter the answer. But you don't have to tell me. Whether it's Yukari or this other girl you knew, I'll back you up.", she said.

"Thanks. Listen I have to go, I'll see you tomorrow.", you said leaving for Kaguya's room.

You went to her room and knocked on her door quietly to make sure nobody heard you. Kaguya opened the door and to her delight saw you standing in her doorway. "(Name)? Your..."

"I'm here for you Kaguya. I know who I want to be with, and it's you.", you said to her.

"OH I LOVE YOU (NAME)!", she squelled in joy. She leaped on to your neck and made you twirl around from the force of it. "This is the moment I waited for most of my life and now here we are. (Name) pack your things, were leaving first thing in-", you stopped her sentence by putting a finger on her lips.

"Listen Kaguya, I need to stay here."

"But you said you wanted to be with me."

"I did, and I mean it. But I can't simply leave now. I have friends, a life, and a school year to finish. I promise I will come with you back to your home and we can live together. But I just need you to be patient.", you asked her.

"I've BEEN patient! Your telling me to wait longer just because you can't up and leave these monsters?"

"Those monsters are my friends."

"I can't stay here that long. It's too dangerous and I won't leave here just because I'm worried about my safety. I waited too long to see you again so I won't let it stop me from being with you. Lets leave here and then we can be married to each other like we promised."

"Kaguya, just for the rest of the school year. That's all I'm asking please.", you pleaded.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Kaguya

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
( Tarzan One Family Score )

Kaguya coudln't take it any more and slammed her door shut locking you out. She shut herself in and slowly leaned on the door crying believing she lost you. "Why couldn't she change his mind", she thought. "If I leave here without him I'll never forgive myself. But stay here and I risk everything for him? I'd do anything for him but this is too high a price. I don't want to take his friends away but still I want....oh (Name). Why did I have to fall for such a crazy fool like you?"

You placed your hand on the door wanting to talk to her but you knew she needed time alone. But instead of leaving you leaned on her door and facepalmed. "Is it so selfish of me to ask this of her? Her family is an enemy to monsters and I'd be placing her in danger. But people like Moka, Kurumu, and Yukari...ahhh what have I become? I don't know what the right thing to do is anymore.", you thought.

A couple hours went by and Kaguya leaned over and placed her ear on the door to see if you were still there. She heard you tearing up and started thinking that this was harder for you than it was for her. You were just trying to not abandon your friends and in some way Kaguya started to understand that now. She thought to herself, "Could I do this for him? I know I could, but can I bring myself to do it? (Name).....so help me.", she opened the door. You immediatly got up but didn't expect a happy answer.

"As long as I stay with you, I'm already home.", she said.

"So does-"

"I'll stay. But only if you stay with me the entire time. I'll feel better knowing your around to keep me safe."

"I promise."

She hugged you and you spent the night in her room. You both cuddled and slept on her bed sleeping in each others care. For Kaguya this was the first time since that summer you were this close to one another. She wanted to show some affection in some way, a simple kiss would all but satisfy her. But took a vow to only do do that when you were married. Instead she leaned closer to your face and rested on your chest. If she loved you as much as she claimed, then she would do all in her power to try and befriend her beloved's friends as well.

But that same night Yukari was alone waiting for you to come back, and you never did. She cried and felt heartbroken that you left her like this. "(Name)...I'll make you pay!", she screamed.

"YUKARI! Shut up it's three in the morning!", Kurumu yelled from her room next to Yukari's.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: She locks herself in her room

choices: You quickly grab Kaguya and you and her hide in the classrom
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
The next morning you woke up with the suns rays shining in your face. When you opened your eyes and you noticed something heavy on your arm. You looked and you saw Kaguya sleeping next to you. You quietly got up without waking her up and got dressed.

(name) thinking: Hm. You know.....she's kinda cute when she's sleeping. She reminds me of Yukari in a way.

Then you remembered that you slept with Kaguya without Yukari knowing where you were.

(name) thinking: Oh crap that's right! Yukari doesn't know where I am! Not to mention that she doesn't know about me Kaguya! If she finds out about Kaguya......

You pictured in your mind about Yukari's reaction about finding out about Kaguya.

-Fantasy-
Yukari: What?!? Not only did you not come back, but now I find out that you're dumping me for another woman?!?!?

(name): But Yukari I.....

Yukari: I don't want to hear it! For this you must be punished!

She waved her wand and you found yourself wrapped in a bondage suit and Yukari's wand was now a whip.

(name): Wh-wh-wh-what is this?!? And what are you going to do with me?

Yukari: Your divine punishment! This is what you get for betraying my heart and by the way, I'm not your master any more!

(name): WHAT!?!?!

Yukari: Now repent! And take your punishment!

Then she began whipping you like crazy. You cried in pain and were crying with tears in your face. While you were crying Yukari was enjoying herself as she was whipping you.

Yukari: Hahahaahaha! Now prepare to experience the ultimate pain!

(name): Yukari! Please forgive me!
-Fantasy ends-

You shuddered at that thought of what Yukari would do if she found out about you and Kaguya. Then you made a decision.

(name) thinking: OK. I can't let Yukari find out about Kaguya. If she does she'll not only hate me, but she won't make me her apprentice anymore. So I'll just have to try to prevent Kaguya and Yukari from meeting. Yukari's probably pissed off at me enough because of me not coming back. Oh man. This sucks.

Then you heard Kaguya waking up. She stretched and yawned as she got out of bed.

Kaguya: Oh (name). Good morning.

(name): Oh. Good morning Kaguya. Listen. I need to talk to you.

Kaguya: What is it?

(name): Listen. When it comes to Tsukune and the others, I want you to keep quiet about us OK?

Kaguya: Why? If you're worried about people who would oppose us then...

Then you went on your hands and knees and politely bowed.

(name): Please. I want to break it to them slowly, especially Yukari. It's gonna be hard because Yukari's my master and I know that she probably likes me. So please keep it a secret until then.

There was a long silence, but then Kaguya smiled.

Kaguya: If that's what you want. I'll do what ever you say (name).

(name): Thank you. You don't know how happy that.....what the!!!

Then when you rose your head, Kaguya began to undress in front of you.

(name): Kaguya! What the hell are you doing?!?

Kaguya: What's it look like? I'm getting dressed. I have to get ready for school you know.

(name): But can't you wait till I leave the room?!?!?

Kaguya: Well........I've heard that lovers do this sort of thing all the time don't they?

(name): Where did you hear something crazy like that?!?!?

Kaguya: What seems to be the problem? I don't mind if you look at me with my clothes off. In fact...I don't mind as long as it's you (name).

She looked at you with innocent eyes which made you blush. You had to admit it. Kaguya was very beautiful. Because of her statement, you began to get tempted. You were willing to see her naked, but luckily your reason snapped you out of it.

(name): I......I......I'll wait outside until your done!

And with that you dashed outside of the room and shut the door leaving Kaguya perplexed.

Kaguya: What the matter with him? Was it something I said?

Later after Kaguya got dressed you walked with her to class. As you walked with her, every student boy or girl would not stop staring at her.

(name) thinking: Oh great. Everyone won't stop staring at Kaguya because she's so beautiful. It's like she's a celebrity.

Then you ran into Moka, Tsukune, and Kurumu.

Tsukune: Morning (name). Morning Kaguya.

(name) and Kaguya: Morning.

Tsukune: Hey Kaguya. I got some friends I want you to meet. This is Moka and this is Kurumu.

Kurumu: Hi there.

Moka: Nice to meet you.

Kaguya: Me too. It's a pleasure. Any friend of (name)'s is a friend of mine. Right (name)?

Then Kaguya hugged you making you blush a little.

(name): Umm. Yeah. Sure. Hehehe.

Then you all made your way to the classroom. As you all made your way to the classroom, Tsukune talked to you in a low voice so the girls didn't hear you two talking.

Tsukune: So is Kaguya your knew girlfriend?

(name): I don't know. To be honest, I'm not even sure.

Tsukune: Well one thing's for sure, she sure is beautiful.

(name): Yeah. I know.

Tsukune: Hey (name). Is something wrong? You look a little worried.

(name): Well you see.....

Before you could finish you heard a familiar voice which made you sweat and get chills down your spine.

Yukari: Hey! (name)! Where are you?!? I got a bone to pick with you!

(name) thinking: Oh crapola!! It's Yukari! I can't let her see me! Wait! I can't let her see Kaguya either! What do I do?!? I gotta think fast!

You looked around trying to find out what to do. Then you see an empty classroom and.....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Keep it secret

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
You took Kaguya by her arm and ran for the classroom. You hid in a storage locker inside the room and prayed Yukari didn't see you. Kaguya blushed what with you two being so close to each other. "Are we trying to have a minute alone or was that your ex you were running from?", she asked.

"She's not my ex. I think? Any way shhhh. I can't let her find me."

"Sooner or later you'll have to face her.", Kaguya said.

"Does disappearing from her life count as an option? Because I'm too terrified to own up to facing the consequences."

"(Name) do I have to hide too?"

"Yes."

"If you want me to act like I don't know you in front of the others then maybe we need to handle this now. I know I agreed to breaking it slowly but I want to show my love to you in public. When it's acceptable.", she insisted.

"Kaguyaaaa.", you groaned.

"(Naaaaaame).", she replied the same way.

"Found youuuuu.", said a familiar voice. Your heart stopped and you froze.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: You quickly grab Kaguya and you and her hide in...

choices: She lets it go (not 100% but a start)
She puts a curse on you (attracts all the women around you except her and Kaguya
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!", you screamed. Yukari waved her wand but suddenly in a blink of an eye you were gone. You ran straight out of the building only to find Yukari jumped out the window and summoned a wall made of rock to keep you from leaving the grounds. "Yukari please I can explain!", you pleaded on your knees.

"Groveling won't save you! I opened my heart, my knowledge, and my trust to you and this is how you repay me?! By cheating on me?", she said in a mix of sadness and fury.

"Listen we got real close I admit it. But we weren't together."

"To me we already were! Do you know the impact you had on my life?! I thought you'd be different than Tskune. But noooo! I can't be happy with someone I love. Well if that's how it'll be then I say, DEATH TO ALL WHO BREAK YUKARI SENDO'S CONTRACT!!!!!!!", she yelled holding her wand up her head.

Kaguya stepped in front of you to confront her, "Enough! This is childish.",she said.

"Childish? Your look only a few years younger than (Name)!", Yukari replied.

"More mature than you are. And I am only younger by two years thank you. He broke your heart maybe, but it was his choice. He didn't want to hurt you at all. He begged for me to let him break about us at his own time."

"That supposed to help me?"

"I want you, before you cast your punishment, think about this. Does he deserve it after all you went through in such a short time?", Kaguya knew any reasoning would provoke her, so she tried a more subtle approach. Yukari starred in your eyes and saw your feelings on this matter. The guilt, the pain, the regret. She could read it. And...
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Yukari

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
"Fine! Today (Name) you live unharmed, but I will smite my fury on to you. But as of now you are no longer my apprentice and are forever banished from my sanctuary. I will leave your belongings outside the room so you can pick them up.", she said storming off.

Kaguya came to you and hugged you in response to nearly being attacked by an emotionally unstable witch. But at least she wasn't bitter, only hurt. "It's my fault this had to happen.", you said.

"In our youth we don't know better. Give her time, she'll understand.", kaguya reassured.

"C'mon let's just go.", you said wanting to leave the grounds for a while. Kaguya followed and wrapped her arms around your left one trying to comfort you. You let her do it as it helped make it better and she always had a way of making you feel better. You walked to the edge of the grounds where now it would take you two to the path leading to the portal home. You didn't want to leave but felt you wanted to get away from it all for just a little while. Kaguya looked out and asked, "Thinking of leaving? "

"No. Just want to look over the horizon by the blood ocean. It's grim but I liked the way the sun reflected the it when I first arrived. "

"Want to head out there and see it. We can come back and then you can move in with me in my room. ", she suggested.

"You know, I'd like that Kaguya. Your so brilliant it's astounding.", you complimented.

"You flatterer."

choices: Kaguya comes and the person in white disappears
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
A little later, you told Kaguya that you were gonna get your things. But you wanted to be by yourself. Kaguya granted your request so walked toward the room where your former dwelling was. When you got to the room, you saw a giant bag filled with your stuff was right outside the door. You looked at the door and was about to knock to check to see that Yukari was there, but you stopped. You remembered the upset look on Yukari's face and you began to feel even more guilty about what happened. You didn't want to anger her any further so you picked up your bags and walked away. You looked back one more time at the door and then you left. You slowly walked back toward the location where Kaguya was.

(name) thinking: This sucks. I made Yukari totally hate me now. It's no wonder she didn't make me her apprentice anymore. Even so, I have to be there for Kaguya. She wants to marry me and I have to protect her from the monster, but at the same time I may have to leave Yokai. Well for now I gonna stay with Kaguya for a while until Yukari cools down. Then I'll talk to everyone afterwards.

Then as soon as you walked past a tree, something flashed by in the trees. You looked, but you didn't see anything.

(name): That was weird. Must have been a squirrel or something.

You kept on walking. Then something flashed by you again and disappeared in the trees again. Now you were sure it wasn't a squirrel.

(name): OK! Who's there?!? Come out!

You looked and you looked, but you didn't see anyone. Then you a shadow on the ground. You looked at the source of the shadow behind you and you saw it. A person was standing in the rooftops in a white cloak and a white mask.

(name) thinking: What the... That's the person from my dream!

The person was standing on the rooftop staring at you in silence. You tried calling out to the figure.

(name): Hey! Who are you?!? Are you following me?

The person was silent and just continued to stare at you. Then....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Continue

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
The person in white flees despite your calls. Then you heard Kaguya calling out your name ounce she heard you. "(Name)! What's wrong?", she said.

"Wait come back! Stop!", the person in white disappeared by the time Kaguya had made it to you. She was concerned why you were chasing nothing. "(Name) what happened?"

"There was someone there. I've seen it before..."

"I don't see anything."

"Whoever it was, is gone now. Ugh....why is this happening to me?"

"Easy (Name), I'll be there right next to you when you need me. And if you want to talk to me about anything, you can tell me. I'll always be honest with you. After all, your my future husband.", she smiled.

"Kaguya...don't you think were rushing this with marriage? I know you waited for it to happen for a long time but maybe I'm not ready. Or at least I don't feel ready."

"(Name) I love you. Even now, with all of the craziness were surrounded by you are still the same boy I fell in love for when we were young. You were always unsure of what to do and never just went on to act. Always thinking things through to much. Where as I am more impulsive and take action like."

"Hm hm. Opposites attract I guess. You know it's what led me to have a crush on you that same time. You always dragged me around to do so many things that got us into trouble. But then, you were always there to get me and you out of trouble again. Never stopped to think about it, just went to my aid if I asked for you help."

"Because we were friends. And they tell each other everything. So tell me whats so wrong with you? What is on your mind?"

"Sigh...I don't know what I am doing here. Why is a human boy in a school of real monsters? Why is it that I'm having dreams of things I don't even know yet are real? And why is it.....I can't seem to know how to love the one I love back right? Kaguya, your all I have here that makes any sense here, the only one I REALLY trust. Help me.", you leaned on her chest crying. Overwhelmed with all this weight and pressure on your shoulders it was breaking you down. Kaguya comforted you rubbing her hand on your head.

"Shhhhhh. Don't worry (Name), I will be here. Always.", she said. For the next couple hours you two sat alone in the forest talking about what was making you so overwhelmed and confused. Kaguya in her special way managed to help re-shape the stress into a positive way. She was there holding you in her arms the entire time not willing to leave your side until you were feeling better. After a while you calmed down and you got back up with Kaguya holding your hand.

"Uh you can let go of my hand now."

"But were husband and wife aren't we?"

"Not yet."

"It doesn't matter, to me we already are married. In name only right now but soon the whole world will see that."

"Alright Kaguya, but I swear I'll make it up to you some how. I can't begin to thank you for just everything you have done.". you planted a kiss on her forehead.

"(N-name)! I told you not to kiss me until our wedding day. Not even ones planted away from my lips.", she reacted in emberresment and pleasure. She blushed wildly unable to hide it but while she protested against it, she loved to have you do it even so.

"Sorry Kaguya. I just didn't know how else to thank you."

"Do it by bringing your stuff to my room by tonight. I'll be waiting for you tonight. Let's head back.", she said grasping your hand tighter but not too tight. You grasped it just as tight and moved close to Kaguya and enjoyed the walk back.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Kaguya comes and the person in white disappears

Song playing
Inuyasha Fate of Awakening Love

Meanwhile Yukari was all herself in her room sitting on her bed. She was curled up in a ball and she looked miserable. Her eyes were red from crying and her cheeks were stained with tears. She tried to put it out of her head, but she couldn't help remember how she found out about you and Kaguya.
(flashback)
Yukari was walking to class looking for you. She was looking forward to giving you another test to train you. Then she saw you talking to Tsukune. She was just about to call you when Kaguya walked up to you and Tsukune. When you saw Kaguya, you were very happy to see her. Yukari was surprised by your reaction and how happy you were.

Yukari: Who the heck is that girl? What the heck is she doing with my (name)? And why does he look so happy?!?

Just from seeing you talking with another girl made Yukari burn with jealously. Then Tsukune left leaving you and Kaguya alone. Yukari went over for a closer look. She hid behind a tree so she and (name) wouldn't notice her You and Kaguya were talking about why Kaguya was here and her family being on the run. Yukari tried to listen in, but she couldn't hear it very well. Then she heard Kaguya say the words that made her heart freeze.

Kaguya: "Well listen (Name) I came here because well... I came here to take you home with me and marry you.

This made Yukari (quietly) gasp. Her eyes went wide in shock and clasped her hands over her mouth so she couldn't be heard.

Yukari thinking: WHAT?!?!? Is she crazy?!?!? Who does she think she is proposing to my (name)?!?!?!? (name)'s mine! OK. Calm down Yukari. Let's not jump the gun here.

After Yukari regained her composure, she looked back to see you were by yourself. Yukari could see that you were stressing on what Kaguya said. Then you began walking her direction. Yukari quickly used her magic to get away before you saw her. A little later she stopped by her room to catch her breath.

Yukari thinking: Whew that was close! I can't believe this! That little tramp is gonna steal my (name) away! OK, calm down Yukari! It's not the end of the world. Besides (name) is your loyal apprentice. There's no way that he's gonna dump you over some girl he knew ever since they were kids and who and a girl who out of the blue proposed to him. Right?

Yukari paused from her thoughts for a moment then she nodded.

Yukari: It's OK! I know that (name) won't betray me! I love him! And he loves me......at least....I think he does.

Yukari thought about all the times you and her spent together including when she confessed to you in the bath. Then she heard you walk by. She slowly peeked outside the room to see that you were heading a different. Yukari quietly stepped out and followed you until you stopped in front of Kaguya's room. Yukari ventured closer to you until she was close enough to hear. You knocked on Kaguya's door and Yukari listened quietly.

Kaguya: (Name)? You're....

(name): I'm here for you Kaguya. I know who I want to be with, and it's you.

Kaguya: OH I LOVE YOU (NAME)!

Those words sent shocks throught Yukari's heart and then her heart broke. Tears streamed down her face and she could take it anymore. She ran away toward her room, locked the door, and plopped down on the bed. She cried into her pillow emotionally shattered. She couldn't believe that you chose Kaguya over her. Then her sadness turned into rage and then she screamed at the top of her lungs.

Yukari: (Name)...I'll make you pay!
(flashback ends)

Yukari: (name) you dummy. Why would you choose her over me? It's not fair. (sob) It's just not fair!

Yukari began to cry once more. From the looks of things, it would seem that her heart will never be repaired. Unbeknownst to Yukari the person in white was watching her. The person watched on in silence and then disappeared in the darkness. Then....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Meanwhile

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
You finally settled in with Kaguya and spent the night with her. It was nostalgic seeing how you two slept over each others houses in the past, but now it felt better being romanticly involved. You two slept together peacefully that night and nothing ruined the moment. Morning arrived and you and Kaguya both got up at around the same time. "Yawwwwn. Morning handsome.", Kaguya greeted.

"Morning to you too beautiful.", you replied.

"I want the day to ourselves so we can stay like this all day.", she complained.

"Me too. But it'll be better to wait when I can properly kiss my darling wife."

"Sniff..."

"What's the matter Kaguya?"

"Nothing. In fact I feel great, I just....that's the first time I heard you call me that. Feels like a dream, but now it is real. And best of all you already accept that were already married, in name only but still."

"Kaguya..."

"(Name)"

"Oh Kaguya."

"Oh (Name)."

You two were starred at each other deeply in the eyes and started falling in love even more. You started getting closer to each others faces but you resisted the urge and pulled back. It bummed you out that you couldn't kiss her but you made do with what you could do. Kaguya hugged you tightly and nudged her head against yours like a cat. Soon you wasted no more time and started getting ready for the day, But the thought tht was in the back of your mind still worried you. And that was Yukari.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: The next day....

You and Kaguya walked over to class like a cute couple would, her holding on to your arm and resting her head on your shoulder all that jazz. Kaguya felt safe when you were around her but today she would need to attend a class without your supervision. She wanted to stay with you as long as she could but soon you made it to her class and Kaguya had to let you go for a little while. "(Name) I'm a little worried that someone might know I'm from-", you shushed her with your finger over her lips and reassured her.

"Kaguya you'll be fine. And listen if your in any trouble I will come running after you to keep you safe. Don't worry just blend it like your a normal student and nobody will notice I promise."

"If that promise gets broken I'll make you sleep on the floor tonight."

"What if I'm right?"

"Hmmmm? Well.............hows that sound?", she whispered in your ear and you had the biggest grin on your face.

"Heres hoping I'm right. I'll see you after classes are over.", you hugged her goodbye.

"I love you mwah.", she said blowing you a kiss.

"Love you too.", you blushed in reaction. You let Kaguya go to survive the class on her own. Now she was alone and nervous being a human girl to a anti-monster family. There wasn't even any sign of your friends for that matter. Except for one who Kaguya felt the most uncomfortable towards, Yukari. Of all the classes she took it had to end her up with Yukari. Kaguya got a glare from Yukari knowing full well she hated her for stealing you away.

"All right class we have a new student please give your undivided attention to Ms. Kaguya Yamauchi.", said the teacher.

Unknown to anyone the last name was fake to make certain no one else knew her family heritage. Kaguya stood up and gave a short introduction, "Hi I'm Kaguya and I hope to enjoy my stay here.", the response from the students seemed positive except for Yukari but regardless it all felt like she made a good impression. She wanted to boast about being Mrs. Kaguya (Name) but she knew that would hurt Yukari more than she already was. The class went on for an hour and Kaguya managed to maintain her cool. Soon it was almost over until something struck a nerve in her.

"Alright class next time we will discuss about the 6 houses of Kita and their families.", the teacher ended her session.

"GASP! Oh no! They'll talk about my family and they might notice something about me. And Yukari might....no. If she really loves (Name) she should love him enough to let him be happy.", she thought to herself. Kaguya left her class and moved on to the rest.

The rest of the day was bare bones and nothing else happened. After her final class ended she went right to finding you s she could hug you in her arms. But before she went outside to the courtyard she was blocked off by Yukari.

"Hi Kaguya. Listen before you freak out I was totally overreacting to losing (Name). And I apologize for all the crazy @#$% I threw on you. I love him and probably always will but I'm willing to move on. So can we start over?". Yukari asked offering her hand.

Kaguya was reluctant initially but she gave Yukari the benefit of the doubt and shook her hand as a sing that all is passed them. But then Yukari out of left field hugged Kaguya to her surprise. Yukari began crying and felt sorry for being so bitter over a crush. "It's alright you don't have to feel bad about it. It's normal for a young girl of your age to feel this way.", Kaguya said trying to calm her.

"I know but...whaaaaa!", Yukari cried even more.

After a few minutes Yukari got it out of her system and stopped crying. Kaguya hugged Yukari and said, "Listen that man for you will come. You just have to wait I promise.", she said.

"Thanks Kaguya (Name) should feel lucky to have you.", Yukari replied.

"Oh that reminds me I gotta go see ya Yukari I hope we can hang out some time.", Kaguya said as she left to go find you.

And like a true girlfriend protect (Name) from the fury of our school and be his true love! Mwahahahhahaha!", Yukari boasted.

"Yukari why are you laughing?", asked Miizore.

"Yes. I like him. But the new girl moved in before I could so if they break up I'm next in line.", she said.

In the courtyard you were sitting by the grass on a bench reading something. It wasn't school related but it was an interesting read. However your attention drew elsewhere when your eyes were covered up by a pair of familiar hands. "Guess who?"

"Kaguya cut it out hehehe. ", you chuckled.

"C'mon I like playing around with you. Makes it more fun for us to see something new in us.", she insisted.

"What is there to learn? Your always a little playful when things are calm. So does that mean you did fine without me?"

"Yes and even better Yukari is now trying to make nice. She wants to be my friend, and she was so sweet how she described you. I think everything will turn out fine (Name)."

"Great to hear, knowing Yukari is starting to forgive you at least makes me feel a little less heavy hearted.", you replied.

Kaguya wrapped her arm over your neck bringing you two closer. "You have such a big heart it's no wonder you carry so much weight. And I love you for it."

"Wanna walk on over back to the room and spend some time between the two of us?"

"Anytime alone with you is always a good time."
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: You later met with Kaguya

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Before you went to go walk with Kaguya, inside the fleet of people was someone wearing an all white school uniform. This sparked your attention because someone in an all white cloak was watching you a while back. You went to follow this person to Kaguya's confusion. You quietly walked passed through the crowd of students getting from place to place but you still tried to keep your sights on this person in white whoever they are. You tried seeing this persons face but you only saw grey long hair. The person was headed toward the school basement and was headed for the legendary catacombs which rumor had it held the old school dungeons. Kaguya managed to catch up and asked what you were doing. "That person stalking me earlier went down there I have to follow."

"Hang on maybe we should get one of your friends before we go on.", Kaguya suggested.

"You go ahead, I'm not waiting.", you answered. You walked down to the caves to where it was nearly pitch dark the staircase went down for a long way. Soon your footsteps echoed louder and louder. Soon you felt a torch while holding on to the wall of the cave. You took out a matchbook and lit the torch to find that this cave stretched out for miles! Hell may as well be a maze. You got increasingly worried you might get lost and stopped going down and tried listening for sounds that the person was making. You heard foot steps and continued walking but carefully and you hugged the wall to make certain you would not fall.

A couple minutes passed and soon you heard a roar that terrified you to the bone. A large groan and roar mixed with a raspy voice echoed across the cave. Soon the footsteps weren't so quiet. Now they were loud and sounding like they were coming back up! You knew better than to engage something you can't see in a situation like this. You ran back up and called out for Kaguya or anyone to help you get the hell outta dodge!
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Who is watching me? What is watching me?

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Suddenly a hand grabbed you by the collar of your shirt and lifted you up. Then whoever was carrying you, rushed you out just before whatever was chasing you. It happened so fast you didn't know what happened. The footsteps grew closer and closer and the roars grew louder. Then you felt the person who was carrying you jump up and unleash a powerful kick. The kick sent a huge shockwave toward the roof and caused a cave in. Rocks began falling all around and the person ran faster. You tried seeing who it was, but whoever was carrying you was running so fast you couldn't see. Before the rocks had a chance to fall you and your mysterious hero got of there just in time. Then you felt yourself being lowered on the ground. You regained your senses and realized that you were back in the school.

(name): Whoa. What the hell just happened?

Then you looked up to see whoever saved you. It was a silver haired girl with blood red eyes. When you saw her, you were scared but at the same time were awed by her beauty.

Inner Moka: Are you alright? Sorry if I was a little rough earlier.

(name): I'm....I'm fine, but....who are you?

Then Tsukune and Kaguya rushed to your side. When Kaguya saw you she gave you a tight embrace.

Kaguya: (name)! Thank goodness you're OK!

Tsukune: We were worried about you!

(name): I'm fine, but how did...

Kaguya: I ran to get help and I saw Tsukune and Moka. We rushed here as fast as we could when we heard the roar.

(name): Wait Moka? That silver haired girl is Moka?

Inner Moka: That's right. This is the first time you've seen me in my true form.

(name): True form?.

Kaguya: Let me explain. Moka is an S class monster. A vampire. Vampires are well known for their impressive power. So to keep her power's in check, her rosary keeps her power sealed and when it's removed she becomes her true vampire self.

(name): Oh. I see.

Inner Moka: I'm impressed. You're pretty well informed. Kaguya right?

Kaguya: Yep. Nice to meet you Moka. Or should I say Inner Moka.

Tsukune: Thanks for helping us out Moka. We owe you one.

(name): Whew. That was close though. What was that thing anyway?

Kaguya: What ever it was, it sounded scary. I hope it doesn't follow us.

Inner Moka: Don't worry. That cave in I caused should make whatever's in there stay in there. Well, for the moment.

(name): Yeah. I hope you're right about that.

Tsukune: Well we better go. Let's get out of here before more trouble shows up.

As everyone began to leave Kaguya looked back. She looked looked deep in thought and slightly irritated about something. Then she heard you call her.

(name): Kaguya? You coming?

Kaguya: Don't worry! I'm coming!

Then Kaguya followed you and the others. Then.....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Inner Moka saves you

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
You woke up the next day to Kaguya's arm wrapped around your chest. Being blissfully in the moment you kissed her hand and whispered, "Good morning." Kaguya twitched in her sleep but smiled upon knowing who was comforting her. Kaguya in reflex pulled you closer and started talking in her sleep. You couldn't make out the words but you knew it had something to do with you. You let Kaguya sleep longer and watched her sleep very cutely. She looked like an angel while she slept with her hair laid out around her and her beautiful smile. Soon she woke up and her smile grew when she woke up to the sight of you.

"Morning. Watching me sleep were we?", she teased.

"Can't be helped, your the most beautiful thing I have ever seen.", you complimented.

"Flatterer. This waiting for marriage thing is just killing me. May seem blunt but I want to make love to you so badly.", she said.

"Think of it this way, when we finally do it'll feel so much better when we waited that nothing will ever top it.", you said.

"Hehehe my patience can't take it any more. This school year it taking forever. When is it over?", she begged to know.

"Only have at least two and a half months before I can leave to complete the semester. I'm taking extra classes so we can leave during winter break. Won't the timing be perfect?", you said seductively.

"Ohh easy there, another comment with that tone and we'll skip the waiting. C'mon we have classes to go finish so that we can leave as early as possible. Gotta say I like your friends here. I really do, they seem nice.", Kaguya said.

"Hey Kaguya? What was wrong yesterday. Something was on your mind and it worried me when you didn't talk about it to me.", you asked.

"It's nothing baby honest.", she lied.

"Were supposed to be honest to eachother so why is it you keep secrets?", you raised your voice irritated by her reluctance.

"NO! It's just I don't want to talk about it now. Promise after class when were back here tonight please?", she pleaded.

"Alright Kaguya. Sorry I snapped at you.", you hugged her.

"I know. Love you.", she said as you broke away from the hug.

"I love you too.", you replied. The two of you got dressed and went to your classes but today was about to set i motion the start of your greatest challenge.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: The next day.....

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Meanwhile Kaguya and Yukari were having history together much to Kaguya's secret fear. The class was lectured about her family tree and how badly her family was hated in particular. While Yukari was fascinated with it she noticed Kaguya sweating while the really bad parts were being discussed. For Kaguya's family was responsible for nearly bringing the races of vampires and witches to near extinction such as the succubi. Yukari wasn't 100% but it seemed like Kaguya was afraid of that family in particular. Could have something to do with that she's a monster? She may be a witch like her or a vampire. But a more interesting idea floated through her thoughts, was she a member of that family? Yukari wanted to for certain to try and see if it would turn up to fulfill her plan. But in order to find out she needed to get close to Kaguya and learn more about her. She decided to act as soon as the bell rang.

"Hey Kaguya, wanna have lunch together.", she acted in a friendly tone.

"Sure! Hey if you don't mind I'd love to just get the whole (Name) thing off our chests so we can move past it.", Kaguya said wanting to break the ice.

"Of course. So tell me how you two know each other?", Yukari inquired.

"We knew each other when we were young. It was during a summer break, we did so much together in those few short months. It was like we were family, and we loved doing things together even when he was annoyed with me he still liked being around me. I guess it was love at first sight and we never realized it until I left to go back home with my parents.", Kaguya told.

"Your parents? Where did you live?"

"We lived in Japan but they were busy in China for so many years. (Name's) family was a friend to ours.", Kaguya answered.

"Does he treat you nicely?", Yukari couldn't help but ask.

"Oh he's so sweet, always asking me how my day is, giving me a hug every morning, he;s just wonderful. Were sticking to no affection until we get married.", Kaguya slipped out.

"Your getting married?", Yukari acted surprised when she knew from the start.

"Yeah, it isn't arranged it's our choice. I may have been the only one trying to keep it alive and going but thankfully (Name) still had feelings for me. And it's a blessing everyday I wake up next to his smiling face. I doubt he is as happy now as he'll ever be in his life. Sorry I'm just rambling."

"No, that is very happy. (Name) is special and I liked him a lot too. He has a way of making you the only thing worth living for in his life and it makes you feel wonderful."

"You know Yukari, he spoke highly of you even now. If you ask me I think he'd go out with you if it was different.", Kaguya said trying to cheer her up.

"Thanks. Listen I better go class starts in a few. See ya.", Yukari said, "Things will be different indeed. It seems that by getting rid of you (Name) will be all mine again! Just wait till I go through your room and dig up some dirt on you, then I will be the bride! Mwahahahhahahahahahahhaaaaa!", she said in her thoughts.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Yukari and Kaguya

choices: Yukari turns Moka and Kurumu against Kaguya
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
In your free period class...

"Hmm it's been a while since Kaguya's been here. And I just got word from the guidance consular I can leave soon as the season break hits, which means I can finally leave with Kaguya. Not sure if I want to get married right after, I'll probably be exhausted. Maybe in a week or two we can just take some time for the both of us to spend time alone and we can invite the others. I'm almost thinking about possibly telling them about her family but at the same time it would make things worse. I suppose it wouldn't hurt to tell them during the break so that Kaguya will be in less danger and it could stay between me us. Yeah, that's what I'll do. Kaguya won't like it and say no. But Moka, Tskune, Kurumu, and Yukari plus the others deserve to know. I owe them the truth. Now that I brought her up, I wonder how Yukari is doing? Maybe I should go spend some time to talk with her and maybe rekindle our relationship. It can't be like before, but at least she could finish with my training as her apprentice. I just wish she didn't find out the way she did about Kaguya, I should have told her directly and broke it off. Wasn't her fault, it was mine and I hurt her. Ah regardless of what or who the blame goes to I can't change how I feel about Kaguya. Still though....Yukari...."

Your deep thoughts ended when Kaguya came around and greeted you with a hug. "There's my fiancee! How was your class?", she asked in a cheery mood.

"Who cares your here."

She blushed, "You come up with ways to make me feel special, it's kinda like your begging me to up and kiss you on the spot. But I won't until the wedding vows.", she teased.

"The lack of affection is killing me, only about five weeks till break and more depending on the mood."

"Wait five- >GASP< oh you made me so happy!", she hugged in anticipation. "So we officially are going to be married by the time winter break comes, ohhh I can't wait to get ready right after we leave!"

"Easy there Kaguya we don't have to get hitched right away."

"Huh?", she reacted in shock.

"Can't we take time alone ad rest and act like a dating couple instead of a married one for just a little bit and then we can spend the rest of our lives together?

"(Name) I have our wedding planned and ready to go at a moments notice. Why wait?"

"I am not saying we wait a whole month, just a week at least to rest and enjoy ourselves. That's all. And it will give my friends time to be ready so that they can come."

"Hang on (Name), I like all of your friends here but they can't come to the wedding."

"What?! Why?!"

"My family won't accept them and it's meant for just our families and-"

"Normal people? Is that it?!"

"You know what I mean (Name)."

"They are as human as you and me. They can't be blamed for being born with a reputation of being feared of frightening children at night. They didn't ask to be here and be born with those gifts and I didn't ask to be here when I'm not like them, but we all are. You didn't have to come and take me away, you had a choice to be treated like they are even for a solid day, but they didn't. And I ended growing to love and care for them like I do you. So the least you can do for them is show them the respect that they deserve a spot to watch me in my happiest moment!", you argued.

"You think this is so easy for me?! I risk every waking minute to stand by your choice to make me stay here and I do that because I love you so much that I respected your opinion on these people. But the day we finally are bound by more than just love, that day needs to be perfect in every way. I can't have it ruined with them finding out who I really am and making it into a bloodbath. Something you vampire friend will know much about, and that broad with the hooters she'll be flaunting herself like a stripper in front of the reception, and need I remind you your ex will be there who's only a kid! You think I want them to be at our wedding?! You are out of your mind if you think I'll welcome them with open arms!", she said.

You two were getting at each others skin which was grabbing many students attention including Yukari's to her delight. Soon the both of you walked away angry at one another. In any relationship arguing is natural but this one hit a little harder on your emotional barrier and not just because it was your first real argument but because of how she insulted your friends. And in such a cruel manner.

Yukari had enough to turn some monsters against Kaguya and it was just the right kind of powerful monsters she thought were beneath her.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Breaking down your barriers

choices: Kaguya vs Yukari Kurumu and Inner Moka (She's screwed)
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Yukari went to go find Moka and Kurumu and soon found them alongside Tskune. Before she could face them she needed a way to make it seem like Kaguya was a real bitch. Yukari then conjured up some tears and pretended to run to them crying, Moka and Kurumu immediately noticed Yukari and went see what was wrong with her. "Yukari whats wrong?", Moka asked worried about her friend.

"Oh it's awful. (Name's) girlfriend...she was talking behind our backs. She >sniff< called Kurumu a broad and said how Moka knew all about making a bloodbath in front of humans, and she called me a stupid little kid. Oh it was so awful guys.", she said.

"What? That doesn't seem like Kaguya. I've seen her with (Name) she wouldn't say that about you guys.", Tskune said in her defense.

"I saw her talking about it to Saizo and the safety commission, she was saying all sorts of nasty things about us. She's a witch I hate her, she took my (Name) away and she isn't even worthy of him!", she lied through her teeth.

"OK Moka I think it's time we have a talk with Kaguya. Anyone who talks shit about you and Yukari is enough to tick me off but me? That bitch is maggot food.", Kurumu said.

"Tskune come here please.", Moka asked. Tskune knew what she was going to do so he immediately resisted.

"Moka I think we should talk to (Name) before we take things too far.", Moka then grabbed his arm and forced him to pull of her rosary. Soon Inner Moka was released and had a very sinister glare in her eyes.

"OK let's go 'talk' to Kaguya said looking back at Kurumu and Yukari. Kurumu went into her monster form to Yukari's pleasure. She completely manipulated them to go after Kaguya and she can get (Name) back! Tskune tried to get them to reconsider but knew it was pointless. He knew his only hope was to get you to stop and confront about this to Kaguya whatever the case was.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Yukari turns Moka and Kurumu against Kaguya

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Meanwhile back with Kaguya, she was walking on her own fuming. She walked outside the school so she could be alone.

Kaguya: Damn it! What is with him?!? All I said was the facts! Those monsters will cause nothing, but trouble! Especially since they're my as well as my family's enemy! Why does (name) care so much about those lousy monsters anyway?!?

Then she heard a voice from behind her.

(voice): Maybe it's because that you're being a total skank right now?

Kaguya turned around and there standing behind her was Inner Moka, Kurumu and Yukari.

Kaguya: May I help you? I'm a little busy right now!

Kurumu: Yes you may help us! Help us by explaining why you're talking trash behind our backs?!?

Kaguya: What?

Kurumu: Don't play dumb! We heard everything you said about us! Like the part where you said Moka a killer and knew how to make a bloodbath and called Yukari a stupid little kid! But most of all......you called me a broad and a stripper!!!!

Kaguya: What? What are you....?

Inner Moka: Don't play dumb. We know about your conversation with (name). And frankly, I won't tolerate any of it. Especially when you're insulting me as well.

Yukari: Yeah! So get ready to get your ass kicked! Cause you're gonna get it!

Kaguya stood there motionless for a moment, but then she began to laugh.

Kurumu: Something funny?

Kaguya: Forgive me, I just find it funny that you guys are letting a bunch of petty insults getting the better of you. Not to mention you girls are acting like a bunch brats not being invited to a party. Well you're all monsters so I wouldn't expect anything less from all of you. After all you're all nothing, but a bunch of killers and sluts.

Kurumu and Yukari: Say what?!?

Inner Moka: What do you mean by that?

Kaguya: It's true isn't it? All you monsters do is inflict terror on people and kill needlessly. Especially monsters like you three. Moka, a vampire who sucks on the blood from innocent people and then turn them into vampires. Kurumu a succubus who turns men into slaves with their powers and wiles. And Yukari.....

Kaguya looked at Yukari with a burning hate pointed at her which made Yukari cringe a little.

Kaguya: Your kind especially is known to use their powers for evil purposes and to create chaos. You monsters came into this world looking for chaos and destruction, You tricked and turned people against each other and even made them kill each other without ever having regards for your actions and only just to get what you want. In my opinion, I wouldn't know why (name) would like a selfish race like you people. Which is why I'm doing what's best for him and keeping him away from all of you so he won't get hurt. Especially Yukari. I saw the way you acted when you found out about (name) and me Yukari. You went crazy and almost hurt him which proves my point. (name) would be better with me instead of monsters for friends.

When Yukari heard these words she could not help, but feel a little bit guilty. Part of what Kaguya said was true. She did lie Moka and Kurumu and it was because that she wanted to get back at Kaguya for stealing her away from you. In fact she called it to a T.

Yukari thinking: She's....right. I did act a little bratty and...I even deceived (name) and everyone else just to take him back. Am I doing the right thing here? I mean this is a little overboard and....everyone's is gonna hate me when they find out....is this really the right thing to do?

Then Kurumu's voice snapped Yukari out of her thoughts.

Kurumu: Hey! That's not true! Sure there some evil monsters in the world, but there some nice ones too! Why the hell are you being such a bitch?!? What would (name) say if he heard you say these things?!? (name)'s our friend and nothing you can say will change that.

Kaguya: Don't act like you care about (name) succubus. All (name) is to all of you is his slave. I want what's best for (name). And what's best for him is to keep monsters like you away from him so he won't become corrupted. You hear me?!? (name)'s mine!

Yukari hearing Kaguya say those two words made her mad and then she steeled her resolve. She readied her wand and pointed it at Kaguya.

Yukari: How dare you say that! (name) doesn't belong to anybody except me! Someone like you who thinks that way doesn't deserve him!

Kaguya: Is that so?

Inner Moka: You know what? I think the time for talking is over. It's time for you to know your place Kaguya.

Kaguya: Fine. Then's let's get on with it shall we?

Then Moka and Kurumu charged at Kaguya with Yukari close behind.

Yukari thinking: Screw this! This is the only way. There's no way I'm about to give up (name) to this bitch! She's going down!

Kaguya silently stood there with a fighting stance and then she charged too. Then the battle began.
