1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Crush 40 - What I'm Made Of (The Best Of Crush 40: Super Sonic Songs)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0WcRRw9f...

Kurumu went on the attack first. She slashed at Kaguya with her claws. Kaguya dodged them with ease and with a big jump and landed behind her. Yukari cast a spell and a barrage of washtubs fell toward Kaguya. Kaguya saw the tubs coming and she cartwheeled to dodge. Then Moka came at her fists swinging. Kaguya blocked her fists blow for blow. Kurumu and Yukari came in to try to surprise her, but Kaguya somehow blocked their attacks sent them reeling back.

Yukari: Man! We're not even making a dent on this chick!

Inner Moka: She's certainly made this fight more interesting.

Kurumu: Grrrrr! This girl is really starting to get on my nerves!

Kaguya: What's wrong succubus? Have you been seducing men so much that you've forgotten how to fight and your fighting experience has gone to your cow udders?

Kurumu: What did you say?!?!? NOW YOU"RE GONNA GET IT YOU BITCH!!!

Inner Moka: Kurumu wait!

Before Moka could stop her, Kurumu came flying at Kaguya claws slashing like crazy. Unfortunately, Kaguya kept on dodging every single blow.

Yukari: Moka what'll we do? Kurumu's too pissed off to even listen!

Inner Moka: Yukari. Stay calm. You try to analyze Kaguya's weak spot while I'll back up Kurumu. When you see an opening, we'll get her.

Then Inner Moka leaped into the fray. Yukari stayed at a distance trying to figure out Kaguya's weakness to get an opening. Meanwhile, Kurumu kept slashing in a fit of rage, but all she was getting was air. Kaguya kept dodging her blows with ease. Then Moka came at her from above with one of her special kicks, but then Kaguya blocked the kick using both of her hands. Kurumu seeing as it was an opportunity to attack came at her from behind and closed in to attack. It looked it she was gonna connect, but Kaguya suddenly raised her leg and countered by kicking Kurumu square in the face. Kurumu was sent sprawling to the ground. Then Kaguya threw back Moka's leg and roundhouse kicked her in the gut. It didn't hurt Moka much, but the force of the kick sent her back.

Kurumu: (spit) Damn it! That hurt!

Inner Moka: I gotta say, she's pretty tough.

Yukari thinking: I can't believe it. She blocked Moka and Kurumu's attacks with ease! Most monsters couldn't even hold a candle to those two. Just what kind of monster is she?

Kaguya: Too easy. The succubus I expected to be weak, but Moka, I thought you were a lot stronger than this.

Inner Moka: Don't get your hopes up. I'm just warming up.

Kurumu: Me too! You'll pay for kicking me!

Yukari thinking: She has no openings what so ever and she's strong enough to repel two monsters at once. How is she that strong? Wait a sec.... Could she be....no.....if she's one of those races! Impossible! Those races were wiped out from long ago! If she's really one of those type of monsters, we better pull out the big guns! I gotta think of a way to catch her off guard.

Yukari thought and she thought until she had an idea.

Yukari: Moka! Kurumu! I have an idea! Try to get a hit on Kaguya!

Kurumu: Easier said than done! We can't get a single hit in!

Yukari: Just try to get a hit on her!

Inner Moka: You don't have to tell me twice!

Combat (MMPR Soundtrack)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wkeKWRuz...

Inner Moka charged at Kaguya and Kaguya charged at Moka. Both fighters clashed with fierce blows, each one being blocked. Then Kurumu flew in and slashed at Kaguya with her claws. Once again Kaguya dodged the attacks. Meanwhile Yukari focused on her magic wand and it began to glow. Then a ring of cards appeared around her and she began to chant a spell. Kurumu and Moka kept on attacking, but they didn't get a single hit in. They stopped for a while to catch their breath.

Kaguya: Come on. I'm getting bored. Just give up already.

Kurumu: Screw you! We're not about to give up yet.

Inner Moka: That's right. Besides, it's been a while since I fought a strong opponent.

Kaguya: Hmm. Very well. I'll just have to take you out!

Kaguya charged ready to attack, but then Yukari finished casting a spell and cast it. The cards flew around and became the shape of a crow. The crow flew toward Kaguya ready to peck her eyes out, but Kaguya raised her hand and when it touched the crow, the crow exploded in a pile of ashes and smoke.

Yukari: No way! She stopped my magic!

Kaguya: Ha. Is that all?

Then something came out from the smoke and attacked her. Unfortunately Kaguya blocked it.

Kaguya: Come on. Using the smoke for cover is the most basic strategy in the book. You disappoint me Moka.

But when the smoke pulled clear, it wasn't Moka. It was Kurumu.

Kaguya: What?!?

Yukari: Got ya!

Then a whole army of Kurumu's emerged from the smoke and attacked Kaguya at once. One of the Kurumu clones came at Kaguya and attacked. Kaguya readied herself to block, but the clone of Kurumu disappeared in a puff of smoke.

Kaguya: Now I get it! They're illusions! You think a bunch of illusions will stop me?

Kaguya then went to work using her feet and hands and one by one the illusions were destroyed. Soon the real Kurumu was left.

Kurumu: Aww crap!

Kaguya: Now I have you! Now prepare yourself!

Kaguya was coming at Kurumu with her fist raised, but she forgot about one thing. Moka. She came out of nowhere and gave her a powerful kick to the face!

Inner Moka: Kaguya! Know your place!!

Kaguya was sent flying and she was slammed into a tree knocking the wind out of her. She slumped over and she looked like she was knocked out

Kurumu: Yeah! We got her! Nice punch Moka!

Inner Moka: Yukari did all the work. If she hadn't got Kaguya distracted, I would've never been able to get a hit on her.

Yukari: Yeah! That'll teach you to insult us like that you punk!

Yukari thinking: Whew, We did it. That was way too easy. I guess she was all talk. Here I was worried that she was one of those monsters.

Then Kaguya slowly got up and wiped her mouth. When Moka and the others saw her getting up, they were shocked.

Yukari: No way!

Kurumu: No one can get up from one of Moka's kicks!

Inner Moka: Wow. She's tougher than she looks.

Kaguya wiped her lips and looked at her hand. There was a smudge of blood on it. When she saw it, she was trembling.

Kurumu: Hahaha! What's the matter? Feeling scared now that you witnessed our power? That'll teach you to insult us you little skank!

Then Kaguya spoke in a low voice that didn't sound like her.

Kaguya: How dare you......you.....actually hit my face.....you're dead.....

Then the ground began to tremble and Kaguya began emitting a powerful aura. Her hair began to stand on end and her eyes began to glow. This overwhelming power made Kurumu and Yukari sweat with fear. Even Moka began to get nervous from Kaguya's sudden change.

Inner Moka: What the....

Kurumu: Her energy......is insane! I've never felt something this powerful before!

When Yukari saw Kaguya's new behavior, she was paralyzed with fear.

Yukari thinking: This power.....oh no....I knew it! She's a part of that race! We're so screwed!

Kaguya: Now you'll pay! Prepare to die!!!!

Kaguya was ready to go on a rampage when.....

"Kaguya no! You have to stop! Listen to me if you kill them what do you think will happen? You'll be forced into hiding and we'll be separated again please! I don't want to go back to that so for the love of god stop!", you called out to her as soon as she was exerting her power. Soon the ground was getting shakier, "Just get out of here everyone run!", you yelled out.

Inner Moka took Tskune away from Kaguya and Mizore grabbed a slightly injured Kurumu at a distance from Kaguya as well. But Yukari just simply watched as you went toward her without thinking and soon Kaguya began to slowly float in the air in a fit of rage. She looked like she was going to attack the whole school but as soon as you took her by the arm she quickly glanced at you and you pulled her down into a hug. You shut your eyes tight with saddness praying you would never be in another argument with her again. And Kaguya herself began to tear up as she hurt the man she loved and treasured so much. Soon she began to loose consciousness and fell limp in your arms.

"He'll never let her go...and I caused this....but she's a part of that family that wiped out Moka's race and my own. She's a threat, to all of us and to my (Name). If I can get them to dispose of her in a more quiet and peaceful manner then I might just swoop in to have (Name) again. But nothing can be said now, everyones in too much distress.", Yukari thought.

"Kaguya I'm sorry please forgive me. WHAT HAPPENED?!", you raised your voice to Moka, Kurumu and Yukari.

"(Name) she insulted us! We weren't going to let her just talk shit about us like that.", Kurumu answered.

"First of all how did you find out? Because if it came from who I think it is I'm betting that it may not be the whole story.", you replied glaring at Yukari.

"Oh shit! He's on to me.", Yukari thought.

"Yukari said she talked to Saizo and talked trash about us.", Inner Moka replied.

"OK first off Kaguya didn't talk to whoever Yukari claimed she was talking to. We were in an argument and it wasn't about you it was about us. Second it wasn't your place to get in my business whatever the reason was regarding her. And third Yukari what was going through that mind of yours lying to them?"

"I didn't lie I saw her with Saiz-"

"If you say one more word to me again and I don't believe you, so help me I won't care your a kid I will beat the living hell out of you in every sense of the word.", you said clenching your teeth.

"I....I.......Kaguya said terrible things about us I didn't lie about that!"

"But you neglected to mention why or the context behind it? You dumb fucking brat!", you yelled.

Yukari began to seriously cry but Mizore put her hand over her shoulder. "Don't speak that way to her!", Mizore defended.

You wanted to beat the living crap out of her for what she caused but you pulled yourself together when Kaguya started waking up. "Yukari...come with us now.", Inner Moka said in a sternly mother-like tone. Tskune went with the others probably to discuss about Yukari's actions. They were the closest to her who didn't hate her right now and you needed to patch things up with Kaguya.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Confronting your loved ones

choices: Tsukune and girls comfort/talk to Yukari
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
While everyone else left to talk to Yukari, you were alone with Kaguya who was still unconscious in your arms. You were feeling a lot of emotions right now. Anger. Sadness. But the feeling that you were having most of all right now was shock, due to seeing Kaguya's power.

(name): What the heck happened to her? For a moment her power was crazy insane. I've never seen her like that before. Not even when we were kids. Just what the heck is she?

You gently stroked Kaguya's face as you prayed that Kaguya would wake up soon.

(name): Well whatever the reason, I'm glad she's OK. I just can't believe Yukari! How could she do something so terrible to Kaguya? She lied and it's because if her that Kaguya's like this. I swear if I see her again, I'll give her a piece of my mind! But......then again.....it's my fault that she's like that.

As much as you wanted to be angry at Yukari, you couldn't help but feel sorry for her a little. After all you did kinda make her angry at you by choosing Kaguya over her.

(name): I know that I'm mad at Yukari, but....I just can't help but feel sorry for her. She may have gone and lied and tried to turn the others against Kaguya, she's still my friend. Man. Now I've gone and made her cry by threatening to hit her. And right in front of Tsukune and the others. I wish I hadn't said that to her. Somehow, I gotta set things right between her and Kaguya. I'll try to talk to her when Kaguya wakes up and....

Then Kaguya began to stir and she slowly opened her eyes.

(name): Kaguya! Thank goodness! Are you OK?

Kaguya: Mmm.....what.....(name)? What happened?

(name): Well, you kinda went berserk or something and you blacked out.

Kaguya suddenly got up startling you and then the anger returned on her face.

Kaguya: That little vampire! How dare she hit me?!?!? And that lowly succubus and the weakling witch too! I'll make them pay for that! No one ever touches me! EVER!!!

(name): Kaguya calm down! The fights already over! Calm down or you'll crazy again! What's with you?!?

Then Kaguya turned around looked at you and realized the situation.

Kaguya: Oops! Hehehe. Sorry. I still felt a little loopy from the fight. Hehehe

(name): OK......so I take it you're OK?

Kaguya: I'm fine. Are you? Sorry you had to see me like that.

(name): It's OK. I'm just glad you're you again.

Kaguya: But.....why did they attack me?

(name): Well long story short, Yukari overheard our conversation and used that to make Kurumu and Moka angry at you.

Kaguya: I see. So where is everyone else?

(name): They all went to have a talk with Yukari. I'm so sorry Kaguya. I never imagined that Yukari would try something like this. It's all my fault.

Kaguya: No it's not. Yukari was the one that caused the trouble, so don't worry about it.

(name): Oh good.

Kaguya: Well, I'm gonna go. I gotta head to my dorm room before Yukari comes in with a second attack

(name): Are you sure? I can take you to nurse if you want.

Kaguya: No. I'm gonna go back to my dorm room and get some rest. Don't worry about me. I'll see you later K?

(name): OK. Take it easy Kaguya. By the way, you sure are taking this well. I would've thought you'd be mad.

Kaguya: Oh don't worry, I'm a forgiving person. Even though she and her friends attacked me and I may like them a lot less than I did before, I'm willing to forgive them for your sake (name).

(name): Whew. That's a load of my mind. Anyway I'm gonna go talk to check Yukari. I'll see you later Kaguya. Get plenty of rest.

Kaguya: OK. Bye (name).

After that you left to talk to Yukari and the others. Unbeknownst to you, Kaguya was still angry. Her cheek was still ringing from when Moka kicked her. Remembering that Kaguya seethe in anger.

Kaguya: Those little bitches! They are so gonna pay for what they did! The filthy vampire Moka, the slutty succubus Kurumu, and especially that little wench Yukari! How dare they do that to me! I'll personally see to it that they will all pay! I'll wipe them out just like my family wiped the witches and the vampires out! They will pay!

After that Kaguya left. Unknown to her, the figure in white was on top of the roof. The figure in white saw the everything that had happened. The figure watched with concern as Kaguya walked toward her dorms.

Figure in white: It's as I feared. The stress is getting to her.

Then the figure looked at you running toward to where Tsukune and the others were.

Figure in white: If that boy hadn't calmed her down, the result would have been catastrophic. But how was he able to do it? Could he be the one? The one that I'm searching for? If that is the case, he may be the only one that can save this world from the upcoming threat. I must continue to watch over him until that time comes. I just pray it doesn't come to the point to where lives will be lost like back then.

Then the figure in white disappeared. Meanwhile.....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: You and Kaguya

choices: You were by yourself walking to where Yukari was
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Meanwhile back with your friends Yukari was looked miserable. Kurumu was comforting her by hugging her and rubbing her back. At this point, Yukari had explained everything that had happened and why she did what she did. When she finished Yukari burst into tears again.

Kurumu: I see. So that's what happened.

Yukari: I'm....(sniff) so sorry. (sobs) I was so mad (sniff) and now....(sniff)....(name) definitely hates me now.

Tsukune: Yukari please don't cry. (name) doesn't hate.

Yukari: (sniff) Yes he does. He was right. (sob) I am dumb brat and an awful person. I don't deserve to have him anymore.

Mizore: That's not true!

Inner Moka: Mizore.

Inner Moka's voice stopped her from talking. Then Moka stood sat in front of Yukari and spoke in a gentle and firm tone.

Inner Moka: You're right about the brat part. You did act like one, but only because that you were jealous. Jealously can turn a person into something they don't want to be.

Yukari hung her head in shame. Then Moka lifted her head gently and wiped her tears.

Inner Moka: But you're wrong when you say you're an awful person. If it's one thing I learned from the other me, you're a good person.

Kurumu: She's right you know. You got a little jealous, but that doesn't mean you don't deserve love. You just gotta be more yourself Yukari.

Tsukune: And I'm sure that (name) didn't mean it when he said what he said. I'm sure you'll forgive him when you apologize.

Mizore: and if you need help, we'll be there to help you.

Yukari: (sniff) Thanks guys. I feel a little better, but I still don;t know if (name) will forgive me.

Tsukune: We'll try to soften him a bit. Just stay here OK?

Yukari: OK.

While everyone else went to find you, Yukari sat by herself thinking about what she should say to you. Meanwhile.....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Tsukune and girls comfort/talk to Yukari

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Inside the cave the person in white retreated down to speak with the associate. It was a young adult male who was able to transform into a were-beast at will. "So you waiting for hell to come knocking on your front door or are we going to take care of this now?"

"No. Kaguya will be fine its a mere annoyance but the boy will manage to keep her at bay. Soon as the break arrives she'll be stable, in fact better than stable.", said the person in white.

"Just let me kill someone it's dull sitting down here there's no music, no fun, nothing except playing cards with myself. Now you got to let me maul some people or I'm going to get anxious.", he said blowing out his cigarette.

"Well if its loneliness that's bothering you I can always attend to it.", the person in white lifted the hood revealing a woman with blue hair and whitish skin. "I don't mind the cuts you make."

"We had a king sized bed last time we did that. Were in a godforsaken cave and it would be uncomfortable even for the other guy."

"Well next time we tail Kaguya and her boyfriend we'll take some time off?"

"Yeah. Could use the exercise, it's the only kind that I need a partner for."

"Any way how are we on finding Mizuki?"

"Lost her scent last night. I tracked her scent but she found a whole garden of killer plants. Hiding out there to mask all the scents from the flowers and old smells from the ancient aluranes. This cave is like that maze in greek mythology."

"Well were going back down to try and find out where in that garden shes hiding otherwise we'll miss our only chance."

"I can't go back there exactly. Monster women all over the place, might be too easy to manipulate. You'll be fine without me."

"You assume cuz I'm a women and that we've had sex before that I'm just attracted to guys?", she asked and felt rather insulted.

"Never cared what you were into. Your still a sexy gal."

"Screw you Jack."

"I'll take that as a compliment Nori. Whatever you do don't go near the purple flowers."

"Alright, head back up and take the next shift for Kaguya."

"I'll keep quiet but if anyone messes with me I gotta go feral."

"Just don't attack her even she doing the attacking."

"Yeah yeah, you be careful."

"Afraid you'll lose your 'exercise' partner?"

"Honestly yes."

"Closest thing I'll get to legit concern from you." Nori walked down into the cave while Jack went back up to keep a stealthy eye on Kaguya.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Wolf pack

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Kaguya went back to her room and wondered what she should do. It's been a long day and she nearly lost the one she loved because of her stubbornness. She didn't know what to do any more and tried thinking of some way to figure out the best course of action. Then she remembered someone who she always could talk to when she was in trouble. She grabbed her cell phone and dialed the number. It rang until someone answered.

"I'm surprised you lasted a solid 12 hours more than when I expected you to call me. So what is it Kaguya?", said a familiar voice.

"Hey Jahn, I need you to come over here."

"Well I hate to break it to you but I can't otherwise we'll arouse suspicion. Why can't you just tell me your problems over the phone?"

"It's not the same. Just come over here and I'll tell you everything ok. I need you here so that I don't lose (Name)."

"Again coming there will compromise our identity."

"There's a succubus that's a g-cup, (Name's) friend, and she's single."

"I'll be right over.", he hung up.

Kaguya laughed at his mortal weakness for succubi. He's an odd person but he is one of the wisest and loyal friends she ever knew. Jahn made his arrangements and headed for Yokai immediately.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: The return of Jahn

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
A day and a half later Jahn made it to Yokai. He remained inconspicuous despite his rather awkward presence, he walked to the girls dorm and found Kaguya's room. He knocked on the door and Kaguya let him inside. "Thank goodness your here and safe.", she said.

"It was easy to walk in but even easier to walk through the female dorm without suspicion? Is it common among them to have their mates over and is that why noone cared or was I just lucky?"

"Jaaaahn."

"All joking aside what has gotten you so worried you needed me to fly on over and talk. Also you owe me a meeting with that succubus you mentioned that gave me some minor reason to come here."

"It was what brought you here in the first place."

"Not really friends support friends no matter what I only goaded you into something like that because I really want to meet one without them knowing I'm prey. My apologies for the deception. In fact now that I think about it regardless of what you said I'd have come either way which makes your point of undying loyalty seem to hold up. Consider me impressed on your theory."

"Oh you bastard you can be so sneaky. Well anyway I'm having a fight with (Name)."

"Healthy for couples to fight otherwise it explodes and the damage is irreparable."

"Well he wants his monster friends to come to our wedding and that's just plain-"

"Invite them."

"Huh?!"

"Listen it doesn't matter where they came from or what they are they are his friends and thereby your friends too. You do at least get along with them right?"

"Well yeah but-"

"No buts. Say I asked you not to have a bridesmaid at your wedding you would rip my spine out of my body. Your doing that to (Name) and subconsciously yourself. So make peace with that and embrace them. Sure they may be our mortal enemies but you know the old saying. Friends close and enemies closer thing."

"Sigh........you right Jahn. And (Name) was trying to tell me yet I wouldn't listen."

"One of the things to work on while together."

"Shut up."

"I'm free around 7 at the bus stop waiting to enjoy the town. Don't tell her its a date the more I surprise the better I read people. Double date is also fine by me if you two lovebirds makeup. Goodbye.", Jahn said leaving.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Jahn meets with Kaguya

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
As Jahn left Kaguya thought to call you about the double date but knew she would want to talk about where you two stood. She dialed your number and it rang. You picked up your phone and answered it almost immediatly. "Hey Kaguya."

"Hi (Name). I was just calling cuz a friend of mine wanted to double date and I was wondering if you wanted to come?"

"Yeah I'd like that. But um Kaguya..."

"What?"

"Do you really think that were ready for a full commitment?"

"I thought we talked about this? If it's about our argument then I promise you it's normal for couples to but heads every so often and I'm willing to for our sake let your friends come."

"I know Kaguya and I'm greatfull for it. But do you think that maybe we don't exactly love each other? That maybe we love each other for different reasons and not the ones we believe? I'm starting to think what we have won't last any more."

"(Name) from the bottom of my heart I love you. What's giving you any idea to think otherwise?"

"Nothing like that. Just maybe we love each other but maybe not in that you know, way that says your the one."

"(Name) I don't understand...your breaking my heart. Your sounding like your breaking up with me."

"Not over the phone Kaguya never like that. I'm just saying, you've been thinking about me for years and then when you come back I fall head over heels for you like when we met. Were compatible but not the right match."

"(Name).....", Kaguya thought back when she was away from you and when she reunited with you. Maybe he was right. Was it just a fling and you two weren't the item you ounce believed? Look at how much you both changed and how it nearly broke you two apart. "Maybe after the date later we'll sit down and talk?"

"Yeah. Look I'm headed back to my room for the night but promise we'll talk later and we'll figure things out ok?"

"Ok."

"I love you. Always will."

"Love you too.", you both hung up and thought about your future.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Kaguya calls you up

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
You were in a human cafe with Kaguya and Jahn was with Kurumu. Oddly the whole thing was awkward for no particular reason except Jahn's presence. For ten minutes everyone just stared at each other and didn't speak. But after a while Jahn grew tired of it. "Well the silence is just boring me I think it is best I call on our waitress and see if we can get an appetizer. Anyone have any requests? No one? Not you Kurumu?", he asked.

"Uh no thanks.", Kurumu replied.

"If your trying to keep up appearances I actually have a fetish for eating and I don't mind big women."

"Jahn!", Kaguya said like a mother talking to her child.

"I'm only trying to make her enjoy herself. Why is everyone like this? Is it because I was the only one who ordered only dessert and nothing else because it's not as odd as you think."

"No Jahn things are complicated right now."

"I see. Very well I shall leave but make sure you start showing a better attitude because this won't qualify as a date if nobody is enjoying themselves.", he said.

"Kaguya who is he? Or what is he?", asked Kurumu.

"An anomaly even for monsters. But trust me he's sweet and loyal.", she answered.

"But he's not that easy on the eyes and his mannerisms and his movements..."

"Are all Jahn's. He's a character for certain but trust me you learn to love him. Not that you have to take it literally in your case."

"Well I suppose looking at him from a different angle maybe there's something worth finding out. Like how openly honest he is.", Kurumu said almost starting to gain interest in him.

"He never sugar coats the most sensitive subjects. He ounce said to one of my friends and I quote, 'They had sex and sex makes babies.', the mother nearly fainted and the father came close to murdering the boyfriend."

"That is insane."

"Jahn isn't one for normal."

"Hang on I got to go to the bath room I'll be right back.", Kurumu left.

"So about last night?", you started after Kurumu left the table.

"Save it (Name). I thought about and you made some good points. But before we jump to conclusions, can't we still act like before?"

"Yeah we can.", you replied.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Doubledate

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
As Kurumu exited the bathroom Jahn stood by outside and watched the sky. It was cludy and dark and the winds were blowing quite faster than normal. Kurumu came outside to join him. "Hi.", she started.

"Hi."

"Looks like the weather will be bad tonight."

"Yes and I think rain will follow."

"So what do you do normally?"

"I just sit around and do nothing while I watch hilarious things on the internet as I contemplate life. Not very fruitful but I'm active to try and do other things if they present themselves."

"You jumped at the idea of going out with a succubus?"

"More than jumped I dove. And honestly compared to most succubi I have witnessed which I should say is a lot, you are by far among the most beautiful. And I am not making that up just because."

"How come you see a lot of succubi?"

"Actually I lived with a family of succubi for almost two years. Forbidden to do anything except admire and fantasize so I judged how I would be able to tell from the good to bad. Being personality of course not in looks they always win in that level."

"Hmmm? How do you rate me?", Kurumu asked out of curiosity.

"Assets large and soft beautiful to witness while coverings removed I'd imagine. Hair color blue. Colorful very sexy, also nice lips, probably excellent kisser. Eyes wonderful weakest out of all other points but not lacking. Bottom is fair size, never my main attraction, but limber legs make up for it. Overall rating a TEN, at least on purely opinion.", Kurumu looked at him oddly. "Did I say all that out loud? Sorry hard to remember whenever I'm analyzing things."

"A ten huh? Bold claim."

"Indeed, now how would you rate me and be honest."

"OK fair enough. Your hair is messy, you could use a tan, your eyes look kinda creepy, and your posture is hunched all the time. I'd say a five."

"I'm guessing what earns me those points remains anonymous. I have to say you are from what little I've seen and heard you seem to be a great person and I'd like to try and get to know you better."

"Can you give me any reason to want to get to know you?"

"I already have, my oddball sense of normal."

"Hmm hmm, well your kinda funny. And I do like that."

"I'm common with sarcasm and back talk."

So they made small talk for about a good fifteen minutes but soon went back when it started getting colder outside. Kurumu seemed to like Jahn but not love him at least this soon. But you and Kaguya managed to patch things up for the time being and would talk about your future together later when you got back home.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Jahn and Kurumu

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
Soon as Jahn and Kurumu came back the four of you enjoyed your meals and had a lengthy discussion about all sorts of things both personal and mundane. It was nice, just you and your friends all in one place just shooting the barrel. Sure some things might change with you and Kaguya but even so she'd still be cool with you considering how much you two cared for each other.

"So Kaguya how is it you know (Name)?", Kurumu asked.

"I met him when we were younger. We spent a whole summer together and it was the time of our lives. We got into trouble, out of trouble, and we were close as close can be. But later on in life I realized I wanted to be more than just friends and I guess he wanted the same thing. Were made for each other.", Kaguya said.

"(Name) I always thought at first Yukari was your soulmate.", Kurumu pointed out.

"Truth be told I still care about her. But right now it can't work even if I wanted to. She's too young right now.", you said.

"Well time flies so watch out, she could be a knockout soon as her body throws her a bone and her assets are deadlier than mine."

"What makes you say that?"

"One time she made herself look older and hers were bigger than mine by a tiny bit. "

"Do you mind we change the subject I'm not comfortable with this.", Kaguya asked.

"Oh come on were all adults. How about you Kaguya?"

"I prefer not to bring that up thank you."

"Ok ok. Spoiled sport."

"Indeed Kaguya you really did spoil the mood.", Jahn retorted.

You all had a good laugh from Jahns clever and perfectly timed reply. Soon enough the double date ended and you all headed back to the academy. You dropped off Kaguya at her room and wished her goodnight. You walked on back to your room and began thinking about the two women you cared the most. "Sigh Yukari and Kaguya. Kaguya and Yukari. Why is this becoming a contest again? I mean sure Kaguya has always been there and she is perfect. But Yukari I fell head over heels for. And not because of all the wrong reasons. Ah! If by any chance I love Yukari more what do I tell Kaguya? Well first thing tomorrow you need an appointment with Kurumu and search your feelings you know to be true about which woman a truly love. Even though one of them is absolutely bat-shit crazy for their age but again, choose to walk down that path neeeeed to wait until she's old enough so she'll be better by that time. Or worse.", you thought in your head.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Back to the doubledate

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
The next day everything was normal. You and Kaguya were on friendly terms still but you needed to talk to Kurumu and make her read through your thoughts again. As soon as classes ended you immediately saw Kurumu alone with a rather large smile on her face. You kindly said hi but broke her out of whatever day dream she was in. "Oh (Name)! Sorry I wasn't paying attention. What's up?"

"I need you to read my mind again.", you said.

"Ok but I need to go to my room and take care of some things first. Come over say 3?"

"Sure. But why much later it's only 1."

"No reason.", she replied.

Soon as the time was ready you showed up on time in front of Kurumu's dorm room. She wore a pink dress with a purple veil like she was a genie. "Enter oh seeker of love.", she said.

"Um why are you like that?", you asked.

"Don't question the all knowing of love and lust. Really don't question it, it takes alot of concentration and power so shut up and go with it.", she replied. You laid down on a mat and let Kurumu place her hands on your head. She closed her eyes and began to sense something. "Yes....I can see your love life will be quite unique. Kaguya and Yukari are the two biggest ones that play in it."

"Who do I-"

"Shut up (Name). Oh! I see! I see! I seeeeeee!"

"What? What do you see?"

"I see that you won't shut up and listen let me concentrate!", a minute of silence passed until she removed her hands from your head. "I can show you where your love life will take you, but know this, ounce I reveal these secrets they will happen no matter what and you won't escape from them. Who you end up with will be all up to you, but the events that occur will take place regardless whomever you decide to be with. Do you wish to know?'', she asked seriously and sternly.
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Continue

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
"Ok (Name) I warned you. Now I want you first to drink this liquid.", she handed you a vial of a red drink. You were suspicious thinking it was a love potion so you asked to be safe.

"What is this?"

"It's juice you dutz. It's not going to make you love me."

"Oh good.", then you drank it.

"It's just mixed with my special blend of love extract so you'll be absolutely infatuated with me for until it's over.", you coughed it up starting to feel woozy. "But since I'm so hot that effect may last forever but only subconsciously.", she finished. You looked at Kurumu her whole body seemed to shine and glow like a Christmas tree. Suddenly all but her necessary clothing flew off and she held your chin with only one hand. "Now let's begin with where love manifests first, the heart.", she touched your bare chest and traced your heart. "Ahh half belongs to Kaguya and half Yukari. So it's not so cut and dry. Now tell me from the bottom of your heart do you love me?", she ordered.

"Yes! I love you!"

"Good boy. Now tell me what you love about me?"

"Your personality, your chest, your mind."

"Good boy. Have you given me any sugar?"

"Yes....and er....no."

"Hmm interesting. I can begin to see your future. Now earn it by doing as I say."

"Of course."

"Close your eyes."

You closed them.

"Now who do you see?"

"No one."

"Good. Now open."

"Huh? Where did you go?"

Then your eyes were covered.

"You left your mind open to me. Now I know all about your love life in the past, now here comes your future. Pucker up.", you felt someone kiss you with an open mouth. Your tongues danced and your lips were smothered in another's. Then your dark blank vision turned into pictures of the future.

You saw yourself with Yukari but she was old enough to be dating you now. You and Kaguya kiss for the first time. You end up having sex with both of them. You see yourself being forced to decide who you will marry. You know that by choosing one the other will never see you again.

Then reality comes back and you wake up to Kurumu not making out with you for some reason. "Ugh what just happened?"

"You tell me."

"You kissed me just now what the hell was that about?"

"Oh that? How do you know it wasn't just the juice?"

"Huh?"

"Soon as you drank it, you went out like a light. Laid down and you imagined the rest."

"But did you kiss me?"

"Up to you. Maybe I did maybe I didn't.", she teased you by making a smoochy face at you.

"Ugh stop it. So wait who do I love?"

"What did your future suggest?"

"Nothing I came here and got my mind scrambled to still be on the fence?"

"Nope. While you conked out you told me why you loved both women. You loved Yukari for her mind for example and loved Kaguya's personality and both loved their chest sizes. Never knew you liked flat chests."

"Hey!"

"Anyway Yukari may end up being your girl in the end. Because when she's matured she reels you in like nothing else. But Kaguya is very sweet and special. However I know who you love the most."

"Who then?"
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: "Yes"

choices: Call them both to meet you sometime right now and tell them about the vision
Talk to them individually about the vision
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
"Yukari is who I love the most?"

"Em hmmm. But your going to need to wait until she's old enough to date you. Can you wait for her until then?"

"I'd revert to her age if it meant being with her now."

"Well you'll need to see someone else about that cuz I specialize with love not potions or age. But I do know a thing or two about chemistry.", she flirted.

"Why do you do that?", you asked annoyed with her flirting.

"I'm a succubus, I want to be loved and I want to give it. Though the last part is up to interpretation."

"So if I choose Yukari then I'll never see Kaguya again?"

"If that's what you saw then it's going to happen. They're always right no matter what."

"What should I do?"

"Tell Kaguya and Yukari the truth. They deserve that much."

"Your right. Thanks for everything Kurumu.", you thanked. You began leaving her room just as she replied with an air kiss.

"See ya. Mwah.", she winked.

You knew you had to tell them and you were going to. But how do you do it?
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: The time is now

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content: Yukari or Kaguya
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Who do you call first?

1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
(name): OK. I'll talk to Kaguya about what I first and then I'll talk to Yukari afterwards. Let's just hope that Kaguya doesn't get to upset with me. Damn it. Why the hell is love always so complicated?

After a few minutes, you decided that it was time to speak to Kaguya. You took a deep breath and grabbed your phone and dialed Kaguya's number. You waited and you waited until you heard Kaguya's voice on the other line.

Kaguya: Hello?

(name): Hello? Kaguya?

Kaguya: Oh! (name)! How are you?

(name): I'm fine. Um, Kaguya......there's something....important that I need to discuss with you.

Kaguya: What is it?

(name): I can't say what it is yet. It's something that I have to tell you face to face.

Kaguya: Oh. OK. Where and when did you want to meet at?

(name): Well, how about by the cliff next to the bus stop at five? We can be alone and no one can hear us.

Kaguya: OK. Sound good (name). I'll see you then.

(name): OK. See you.

Kaguya: Bye.

Then you hung up. You took a deep breath and let out a sigh of exasperation and stress.

(name): Well, that was the easy part. Now comes the hard part. Man. I just hope Kaguya won't take it personally.

You looked at the clock and saw that it was four o'clock. You got dressed, put on shoes and then left to go see Kaguya. As you were heading toward to where you were supposed to meet Kaguya. Something flashed by right in front of you with incredible speed.

(name): What the....! What was that?!? Crap. Not this again. I'm getting really tired of this.

Then you heard a voice.

(voice): Are you sure that you want to follow this path? The path that you follow may be a perilous one and may cause chaos in your life. Chaos that will affect not only you, but the people you love too.

(name): Hey! Where are you?!? Come out!

You looked around to see who it was. Then you looked up and saw it. On top of a tree, was same white hooded figure that has been following you since you first saw it.

(name): What the....! Not again. Hey you! Why the heck are you following me? You stalking me or something?

The white figure only stood there in silence. Then.....
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.title: Kaguya

choices: Kurumu, Moka, and Mizore vs the women
1553322222211111221121112121111121221111.content:
"Your right. (Name) doesn't deserve death.", Yukari said.

"Whew!", you and Kaguya reacted.

"So if he wants the ladies then he can have as many as he wants! By the powers of love and beauty, I make the women surrounding this man hoar to fall in love with whom is evil and sleazy! But neither this women nor I shall fall under this curse, for we see what he is, a swine, a pig, this chant I rehearse. Make him scream, make him sweat, one hell of a day he will never forget!", Yukari said casting the spell. He wand turned purple and shot out a pink fog up in the sky. Everyone was watching as the sky turned purple and pink. After a while you along with you'r sister scraped together enough money to founded a demon hunting agency named Devil's Never Cry much to you'r dismay demon hunting wasn't exactly a expanding business venture but then a job from a place called Yokai Academy came offering a place in the school for you. You blacked out when you came to you were standing over 4 broken and beaten (but still alive) bodies after this you were kicked out of you'r school but as you were leaving you heard people say they saw collect on fingers in the shape of claws before retreating into you'r body. 155332222222122.content:
Your name was Amaya Ayumi. You were a young high school girl with one small difference. You weren't exactly human. Far from it in fact. You were a vampire you think. You see you were never really sure what species you were but you do crave blood so you have to be a vampire. You spent your early school life in a human school. This year you were going to Yokai Academy. A school for monsters. You were always consumed in electronics. You had a laptop, a mobile phone, an mp3 player and a heldheld game console. So you had a lot of electronics. Your favorite pass time was watching anime and playing video games. You weren't a complete nerd. You were more of a geek.You had very few friends. You were never big on friendships. You had large dark red eyes, long red straight hair. You also had freckles along the middle of your face.(http://orig04.deviantart.net/37eb/f/2017...). You were in general a pretty normal looking
girl.

Anyway today was the day you started school at Yokai Academy.
So after you packed up your bag and said goodbye to your parents you were off to your new school. You arrived at a large forest with a castle-like looking building in the distance. You began to make your way to the building but hit something and fell down. After your vision returned to normal you looked up and saw a girl who looked to be about 13(13 legal age of consent in japan). She was short with short black hair, and she was wearing a witches hat. So you guessed she was a witch. You felt your heart skip a beat. Was this love?

"Hello." She said snapping you back to reality. "Are you okay?"
155332222222122.title: Yukari (Reserved)

1553322222221222.content:
''I'm fine.'' You told her as you stood yourself back up on your two feet. ''What,s your name you asked her.
''Yukari Sendo and you?''
''Oh I'm Amaya Ayumi.''
''Nice to meet you.'' the cute witch said. ''So you are attending Youkai Academy?''
''Uh ya. Today is my 1st day.''
''I hope we have some classes together.''
You hoped so too.
''Me too, Yukari.''
''I want to introduce you to my friends so come see me at lunch.''
'Sure thing.''
Then you both headed off to school.
You spent most of your day in class being bored to death. Then the bell rang signaling lunch. You were a little nervous to go talk to Yukari and meet her friends. So you had a choice to make.

---

The early morning chill made you shiver, your arms rubbing across your pink school vest. From what you knew, Dress code hardly mattered here from what you were told; Though right now you wished for a sweater as the early signs of people arriving into the school grounds from the dorm. Some attempted to look normal, but the odd Lizard tail and mono eye still stuck out as you walked about. Your knees started to rub in nervous excitement as you heaved your backpack up and walked around in aimless wonder to look at the view.

You continue to walk about before somebody catches your eye. It was only a quick distracting glance before you accidently bumped into another student and mushed right into him before recoiling back. You embarrassingly bow in apologies to the Kappa looking man as you turn to walk up to...
1553322222222.title: Tale of the New Girl

15533222222221.content:
The red haired girl looked about as you snuck upon her, she seemed she was looking for someone... But your mind could only race to think if she is looking for you as you tap her on the shoulder. Her body shifted in defence as a hammer swung upon you in an instant. You could hardly blink as it stopped right before hitting you. The girl blinked in confusion before she huffed and gave a mean glare at you. "Hey, You shouldn't be sneaking up on people sneaking up on others..." she blurted in anger

"Oh... I'm sorry. I'm new, So..." You replied innocently enough. But your comment falls on deaf ears as the girl goes charging towards someone else with her hammer, swinging at a pink haired girl and her boy friend. You give a sigh as you gaze in a stary eyed wonder. You slowly glide towards the school where they continue to fight until the bell rings, your heart breaks as you watch the fight break up and the girl wander to her classroom. Looking at your own paper, you sighed as you walked to your first class.

---

Standing before your new peers, you gave a small bow as you introduce yourself. "Hello, My name is (Name). I'm uhhh...' You look to your teacher who responded with a thumbs up before continuing " I'm a recent transfer after an incident at my old school, So I hope to... *heh* get along with all of you..." You gaze upon the somewhat less interested class, some talking with others and others paying more attention to missed homework.

Mr. Maki gave you another thumbs up as you hobbled to your desk on the left of the classroom as he gave you an 'Excellent' before moving onto the course.

---

*Knock* *Knock*

You hum as you wait outside your new dorm room, Waiting for your new roommate to open the door. What little you had for clothes and the like should have been delivered earlier, but your feet counted your lost patience. Your humming continued, hands running through your sandy blonde hair. Your eye turned as someone started walking towards you with a huff. Your heart skipped a beat, eyes glowing in delight as the red haired girl stomped upstairs. You gave a somewhat small enthusiastic wave as she stares at you 'What are you doing infront of my room..."

Your breathing stops as you gaze at the girl "Your room? S-so we are roomies!? Yaaaaay!", Your arms wrap around her as you rubbed against her/ Your flat chest rubbing up against one another as she pushes you off.

She gives a huffed "Oh...", her face red from embarrassment of what you just did as she unlocks the door to the dorm room. You wander in after her as you look about the somewhat messy abode. Some clothes and empty bags littered the couch with various instant products lining the kitchen counter with a sink full of dishes. Her eye gazed at your bags before she picked it up and tossed it to the hallway. She then turned to you, chest puffed as she announced "Alright, I am leader since I was here first and am the toughest one out of both of us! Now, Bow befo-"

You instantly kneel into a proper bow before she finishes, causing her to blush in embaressment with a goofy smile 'Y-yeah... Like that... Kn-know your place to the Vampire. Now, Uhh... Who are you and what are you?"

"Oh, I'm (Name) and a...."
15533222222221.title: Kokoa, who is waiting to attack her Big sister.

155332222222211.content:
"S-Slime-unculus? Wh-what is that?" Kokoa studdered in confusion

You giggle as you hold your arm, your body slowly dripping like mud "I was a human experiment gone wrong, So many whole body is sloppy human gene. But your a Vampire, An actual monster! Do you got the fangs? I noticed some weirdo's today, But... Your a real Vampire!" Your body shook in place as you squee'd slightly to her embarrassed discomfort.

Kokoa sighed as she looked away 'A-Anyway. Get settled in and uhhh... As my lesser, Clean this place up. I have a club meeting to attend to a-and deal with some things.' She quickly turned and hopped away, her bat companion following as you saluted back to her. Your hands reaching up and grabbing some of the loose refuse that littered the place and gulped it into your body. Ready to give Kokoa-sempai a treat. Perhaps more...

---

A Girl yawned as she walked into a dark stairwell, stretching her arms up as something splattered to the ground infront of her. Looking up, she could barely scream as something overcame her.

---

Kokoa opened the door again, blinking as everything looked... Different. The whole place was tidy, clothes were gone and all the food packages and cans were no longer there. She slowly mouthed a 'Wow...' as she wandered in and proceeded to kick her shoes off and flop on the couch. You quickly walk over, belly jiggling slightly as you kneel to Mistress Kokoa. The girl blinks before giggling "Heh, Seems someone put on some weight. I hope you didn't eat all my food..."

You beam back with "No, Just the garbage...." Your hands reaching for her socks "May I?"

Blinking, The pigtailed girl grins as she proceeds to pull off her socks and wiggle her toes in your face as she grinned "Only if you lick them first... Slave~" Her feet continue to wiggle teasingly, smelling tantalizingly sour from the being stuck in a shoe all day.You happily nod as your tongue stretches to lash against the bare sole. Her face puffs as she tries to suppress a giggle as you continue to lick the stinky sole. A small moan escaped as she leaned her head back, as you slowly bring her feet into your body. Your frame slimming as your body gives her feet a relaxing mud bath.

You slowly draw the feet out of her body to give another lick, your body back to normal as Kokoa looked over and stared in shock. Her once petite feet were now enormous, clearly slightly above a foot and a half. She stared as she wiggled her engorged feet as you continue to lick and rub them, Muttering 'I have the power to change the body of those... willing... So I can... change you if you want..." The vampire could only stare in shock before muttering in...
